user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"McDonald's at 6086 Russ Baker Way is a fantastic spot for a quick coffee run, especially if you're on the highway or heading to the airport. The location is super convenient, making it the perfect place to grab a bite or drink on the go. The drive-thru is impressively fast, and the staff are always friendly and efficient, ensuring your order is right and served with a smile. Whether you're a traveler or a local, this McDonald’s makes for a great stop. Highly recommend for a fast, friendly, and convenient experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ399FPTQeWCktKz3HuerB9Gkctq9m8E6-3Jno&fid=0x0:0x9ac75d0269dd32dd"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Rob Sebastion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjakSj6i9_7dOk20y3wCpxp4vXE8xXOrxZQc5WQ3-s5BmvTvRT-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not to be a prick but the cost of food today, I expect to get a decent burger, even if it's from McDonald's. The server was quick to exchange the burger for one with a bit more topping. It was still lacking, in my opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWLtBBQrpgL1Fz8Jp10iFO2MCA5VopthpEXpiO&fid=0x0:0x9ac75d0269dd32dd"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Maksim Baykov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf70phqE5pUVl_VbXf8xMN2o6_0SE_nppCXPPrhIte-0aKegO9ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited 23 Aug, 16:16. Great service, location, access to parking. The lady for my order was so kind and professional. Highest quality of food. Thank you. 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu6D4MKeHxGtyNsVKFj6k3d4GwAnUvjt1z_o2c&fid=0x0:0x9ac75d0269dd32dd"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Max M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjYNXpFmuJ5Mo3urIUy-gBQyfjedCSyECEsd75iy93lKJGKIBb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean and fresh McDonald's place.
Not to much parking spaces free at 20.00.
Limited siting capacity.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwkp9_d3gh5wrG2jj-YSQk_V46-EP6i4LjCoh1&fid=0x0:0x9ac75d0269dd32dd"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Pouria Eghbal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRbj9YYAh7NCZ0fkE47ve2qcrBkoCxlgc5V8F6hd2NmGvSviGR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently had a terrible experience with McDonald's coffee through a drive thru mobile order. First off, the coffee was filled so excessively that as soon as I picked it up, it spilled all over my hand, causing a painful burn. To make matters worse, the overflowing coffee also spilled onto my car's interior, leaving a nasty stain that I now have to deal with.
McDonald's needs to seriously reconsider how they handle hot beverages.
Overall, I hope this review improves this McDonald's service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeCDmpVi2qcOSTSRxzQkZ8otRi-prhuRUdfEh3&fid=0x0:0x9ac75d0269dd32dd"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Matthew Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJn5HwL9ZLJLEoMN6u7czZiBWfsEyYvMSh2z4ZDVrYUW9i-Uw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location "used" to be one of the best.

It has severely gone downhill.

Drive-thru orders seem to be a thing of the past, as you're constantly told to park and wait 15 minutes for your simple order.

If you don't go in to retrieve it yourself first, you'll be handed it even later, all the while your order just sits on a cold metal counter turning into ice cubes...

Hopefully you enjoy cold food and apethetic service, because that's what you're paying for!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jing Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Df2-VAiVKzfirMrc0lsqyq1YicdDg3DcoWb5P2882fZb3aRd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My toddler almost threw up after excessive salt chunks in his Happy Meal fries. This is the first time this ever happened… there was so much salt in his fries to the extent that it looked like someone had put white stones all over them. My toddler had a very upset stomach after these fries and nearly choked to death.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYL5zfzQhrDsP6sqc8rnBslNqt5LNwyTsudXid&fid=0x0:0x9ac75d0269dd32dd"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"is typing___","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSu8-pyAE_dAFMYnStWjseRTIFsAOpbFfltCK27aihurhYt1mHnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely disappointed with my experience at this location. I had to wait 25 minutes, and the staff, including the manager, looked completely lost and disorganized. Orders were mixed up left and right, making the whole situation even more frustrating. It was clear no one knew what they were doing. For a fast food place, this was anything but fast. Will definitely think twice before coming back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Louisiana-inspired fast-food chain known for its crispy fried chicken, chicken sandwiches & fries.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There’s only one place for a good chicken, that’s Popeyes. This time I tried the Spicy Deluxe Chicken Sandwich and it was amazing! My friend told me about this and they liked it very much so I gave it a try.
The chicken was thick, crunchy and flavorful. The bun was soft and yes, it  was spicy 🌶️:) Love it!
The store was big, they have plenty of seating area although I never saw this branch full with people. They have indoor and outdoor seating.
The staff were always nice and welcoming..
Will definitely go back here whenever I have craving for fried chicken or sandwiches.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3m24euUWIVDWB3jjYMB4R5Ha7tplA0JyRgYxt&fid=0x0:0x15b4e0c0f6070b86"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Harsh Kapoor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNb3NDULC2BC30mX5Xcs3NvYpZWXYN106jQLnTNUKpH3E9515C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been here several times before, however today I experienced amazing customer service by one of their team member, Sonia. She greeted me very preasantly with a great welcoming smile on her face. And took my order with so much patience. You made my day.

I would like to give a huge shout out to you Sonia.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9Q8K10a4SqqtAp9VMf4x_dfzm1fYeQilKFR5g&fid=0x0:0x15b4e0c0f6070b86"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Valkyrie Morningstar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlsZwQYAkw64EUhF8Nu1ddCB11NbS1QLSJ7YU2cqmsuvE3RGJs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place!
Best fried chicken in Vancouver
This place is definitely one of my guilty pleasures. The staff are friendly and always treat me well.
I am happy that they now have Vancouver locations and both locations always do a great job!
Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND_Yw_HAicwNqpjU3kO6tczjK5F1gVGOzK56RP&fid=0x0:0x15b4e0c0f6070b86"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Justin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOeD05YMoRteCUzjA8CmZkuWAlApzs05KbIHDCC-RF6VsI7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is pretty good (consistent), I’m never disappointed. Don’t really know what to say about the atmosphere, it’s a fast food restaurant but it always looks clean inside. Service is great, the employees are always nice and smile. One of the Managers Angel always makes my experience better. I’m a regular customer, she remembers me and lets me know how long my order will be when I walk in (I do mobile orders). They have good deals on the app in the “offers” section, I just wish they didn’t take out the 3 piece chicken tenders meal from the “offers” on the app.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Agnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyqJcbJDbElC-RwU1sBP46by6tVeVGdJmv6s9B0kjpjwDghjdVVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The only location that's in Vancouver area. Came here at 11:37 hoping to beat the lunch rush. They didn't have their mobile ordering available yet.

They have a deal at the moment that is 3 pieces of chicken for $8 which is a great deal. Usually other places like Church's is more expensive.

I got my order within 11 minutes of ordering.

Staff were very pleasant and efficient.

The chicken was very crispy and the skin wasn't too oily. The gravy was amazing and had chicken pieces in it.

The price is the best out there with the 3 for $8 deal.

The fries remained crispy after I brought it into the office 10 minutes later.

We also had biscuits and coleslaw. Everything was delicious. This was my first order from Popeye's and I chose them after looking at prices from Church's, Hi Five and Jollibee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiXVsdfIw580_CQ7l-6Q3Hy9AIjW1nTA8r1QNo&fid=0x0:0x15b4e0c0f6070b86"],"When":"2023-10-19"},{"Name":"Lea Lea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1dEv3S9lgIwJ9McDW61ksTikNRqSv4vC63Gg2uC2NMv04Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Five Stars!
The fried chicken is absolutely delicious—crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. The fries are my favorite, always fresh and perfectly cooked. Manav is so kind and friendly, which makes every visit even better. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenn E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYHGKr8tHHz75cKHTxSmDbo1dxTzMruC2jFQa233Os-zcL6KuE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bright and clean location, not busy at all, staff are pretty quick and efficient. Food tastes pretty good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgAdEKtldHw3y1JyFQbaVTvurUFYxeIfThkGaH&fid=0x0:0x15b4e0c0f6070b86"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Ponda Baba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB1Z_E00v52246I1gIoMBkczOxjQZj6Oq_4BUoL4Tw6wid095m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was my first time EVER at Popeye's. I got 3 pieces of chicken, onion rings a biscuit and a drink for 14$!!!!! That is a great price. The chicken was awesome. I loved it. Onion rings ok, biscuit great. Even though the food was all beige, it kept me full for HOURS which is not normal for me. I will definitely go back and try a sandwich next time too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCBOg9-39qUMJwbG-A6VGnp0hZLZao6D_WQBhW&fid=0x0:0x15b4e0c0f6070b86"],"When":"2023-12-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eric Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKkZ-jVeG1saWjOKzxhHeZJgACwmjNTfl7qIoMSS0Zij0dIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came the Wendy’s in Richmond today, when I asked why the hand sanitizer is empty, the waitress answered it will be provided soon, I waited at the counter for a while, I asked again when I can get hand sanitizer, she (looks like store manager) answered she will order it and maybe come tomorrow. I think it is empty for a long time, no stock? Why they operate the store so poor, they never think for the customers, everyday they clean the restaurant, no one finds no hand sanitizer in the container ? I never come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5cEuibWtfTbBBqLudSArxl44ioYd-Xmf_8zGF&fid=0x0:0x72077a8aab1b47ee"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"brook lynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJGy0oLTpXgVEg73RGC4Fr54JPSyq1qQWE5iA-n182JpmBhfeo4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"ridiculous.. i usually order here a lot, but never again this time. i brought my food inside and my drink was all over my floor and the rest of my food leaving it inedible. i worked at mcdonalds for 2 years and never has this been an issue. how hard is it to get a drink tray? or warn the driver that the drink could spill? this sucks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw0Zd5qj7pOK6Uis-OXE4EqfM4-6B9B7gSECRH&fid=0x0:0x72077a8aab1b47ee"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpwQlCo-1a84xml8SG0OhsKLMM8jjmMMx0eed-rBLLhfcQkz2NTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered delivery . No honey mustard dipping sauce ordered given. Second time in 2 weeks they seem to sub items without any confirmation . Guess they ran out of drink holders too as my drink was just put in the bag and spilled all over my nuggets and burger . Poor management on likely inventory control or just lazy staff or franchisee cutting corners to save money . How hard is it to bag drinks separately if you don’t have drink holders sk a they don’t spill and make a mess and result in soggy inedible food . How hard is it to provide dipping sauces selected and not sub without confirmation from customer ?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiboBbCK8t7JshqpjITvQlkwBwK-02b3Vt5Afj&fid=0x0:0x72077a8aab1b47ee"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Nas n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcVyLYTX378bWV_WiK6KtAP7az_DT6fngQYhUpoQ37gyPqjSU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pattys are now translucent floppy disk. I had to look with tweezers to find the meat. Profiting corporations now are taking it to another level.

Paid 30 dollars for 2 meals $30 bucks could get you 2 perfect sized sandwich at happy hour in cactus club for example of course not including the tip.

But their menu photos haven't changed which is just ridiculous!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAQipdVGtMu8txSJ6bDs2RJybghgx-sStc4WRt&fid=0x0:0x72077a8aab1b47ee"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place is close to my workplace. Hmm, the guys forgot to add my chicken on my salad. I also found out that the chicken has been processed, so it’s not a fresh one. They added some ingredients, spices, probably high in sodium etc. so it’s not my thing as I’m very conscious with the nutritional value of what I eat. Calorie is quite high.

But speaking of atmosphere, I like the place. The service was descent. They also gave me my other serving of chicken when I showed them the receipt versus what was missing from my order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnWq5kXMPzBdBKjpT5Xu0wAIfOHavDYAKGc4R9&fid=0x0:0x72077a8aab1b47ee"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It’s going to be a hit or MAJOR MISS here. What do you expect? It’s minimum wage workers with big egos. It’s a difficult job with all the food apps. To top it off there’s a drive thru and mobile apps. It’s not what it use to be. But they do have a spacious seating area. That’s a bonus.

When I was at the cashier and asked I like to order a JBC, she replied, what is that? She definitely wasn’t new I came to this location many times. I only ordered up front because their app wasn’t working.

But to be fair, whenever there is an issue, I’ve always had a better experience with the staff re-making the order. That’s an extra star gained.

I don’t think they are incompetent workers like what others are saying. I think they just need more direction. They have a care free I don’t care slouchy attitudes but all of a sudden when there’s an issue and the lines and online orders build up, they fix it right away.

Like I said, what can you do? Not many people work these types of jobs anymore. Would you? Just hold the manager responsible and if the manager doesn’t do anything request the franchise owners contact. And if that doesn’t work contact costal health. They have all the info.
So far I haven’t needed to use the owners contact… yet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMquKYPd4yTE_XmBo_Wm92CWFRbvm38n6uftUEa&fid=0x0:0x72077a8aab1b47ee"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Last couple of visit was quite disappointing so haven’t been there for a while.
This time is surprisingly good. Service is fast. The salad is very fresh and the restaurant is very clean. The burger is juicy.
Always love their chili

Plenty of free parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcOA9nTlf9XCPM0G7CkXsAhNZ4_rkXwgABGC6c&fid=0x0:0x72077a8aab1b47ee"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Den D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIufPSQrxthBd2yLrO36eaf9AzCaAuxn86kyl-ElyZDp685EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location, very friendly and efficient staff, food is also really good. In general I find Wendy's burgers more tasty than other fast food places. Absolutely love the square Dave's burgers and the chicken nuggets are tasty as well. The fries could use some seasoning though they are cooked perfectly. Will be back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jovani Roso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_hcpCpDlbrKgTXksm2WMK6qax6X_Bev0jL3b_cF4cEu3C5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t waste your money and your time in this place you can see and pictures fries burned with burnt oil for sure probably didn’t change for a few days. The burger it self was dry as hell, honestly I will go across the street to any Burger place will be better. You can tell their employees are lazy and don’t care about the food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhHwpnkoM-lC7-SbhexBu1FvRuhNTS8UX1UP1G\u0026fid=0x0:0xadaf9df3bc4f7cf7"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Kay T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGFFQ_h9KgIcnCir-JhWsJ9NfmIdstZ5YuLOM1-PNANZ8DlCYu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very sloppy burger. Had to remind them not one but two milk shakes were ordered and never give. Friends burger looked like the employee had a wrestling match with it. Food took a long time even when there were 2-3 other customers. The staff just kept speaking Punjabi to each other and laughing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6bBvjOPHNAg2uAaoE8j1Pybxzq5tTxuOlmx3z\u0026fid=0x0:0xadaf9df3bc4f7cf7"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Five Guys on No. 5 Road in Richmond is an absolute gem! From the moment you step in, the aroma of sizzling burgers and freshly cut fries envelops you, setting the stage for a mouthwatering experience. The staff is incredibly friendly and efficient, ensuring your order is perfect every time. The burgers are juicy, the toppings are fresh, and the fries are crispy perfection. Plus, the customizable options allow you to create your dream burger. Whether you're a regular or a first-timer, Five Guys never disappoints!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkRU49xzD9f1WponVT2d8-gQGaLmzrSEwJMpiW\u0026fid=0x0:0xadaf9df3bc4f7cf7"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Yarra q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw29Ik7AlhuIpyu0NhkVbdt8oXL4wzMS8uAnTMCR0oYHErsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their juicy burgers are made to perfection and the customizable toppings let you create your happy meal. The fries are undeniably fantastic, with a crispy outside and fluffy inside. The relaxed atmosphere and of course peanuts complete the experience. Definitely worth a visit for burger lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB-nXECWe-JKxD7p3Ikx-gmK1rNtjsNIA0N3BG\u0026fid=0x0:0xadaf9df3bc4f7cf7"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Tom Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyyQ5KvmKl4Z33nT4wusvkCwA9Cr-xWhWOhejIZbkV4EKIng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for dinner with family around 6:45.  Pretty easy to find a table even though lots of people are lining up to order. Little burger is the same size as the regular one, only difference is little one has 1 piece of meat while the regular has 2.  Price is around $10 without drinks and fries. But the burger is delicious.  You can add lots of items such as mushroom and pickles for free.  The unlimited peanut is also a plus.  The kids loved their hot dog as well.  Only thing we won't order next time is their fries.  We find it a bit salty.  Even the ketchup is salty.  Overall a great experience and we'll definitely come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3-JGd6DYbTusm3ghTFo1dKnDYrTifDQJA71RI\u0026fid=0x0:0xadaf9df3bc4f7cf7"],"When":"2020-2-2"},{"Name":"Selina Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkhYkD3SpMETmescS1PYdIbdJEawmCXCZQlnmigsplBzK04eI7SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love Five Guys and the Ironwood Plaza location is our definite go-to. The staff are nice and efficient, and very on top of the cleaning. Parking is plentiful and I've never had an issue with the quality of product or service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzBb7fAdxU4da5D-UyOytQmtDt9QA_T2Ua5pjOgeIR0Y5Iyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from Five Guys Richmond via UberEats and sure glad I did. Fat Burger used to be my goto but it was just getting too expensive to order from them. Five Guys has a more simplistic menu but the food quality and value exceeds Fat Burger by a long shot IMHO. My new go to order place when we're craving burgers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGGrjlqsBxN5RAUy0ndjk5NqopJxdTleiH97oq8AsqJq8V8vox=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is the first newly opened location in Richmond. The burgers are great and best of all you can add a ton of toppings to it. Our sude order of fries were huge, was enough for two. A nice touch was the free roasted peanuts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAEugroLuIwsjG6FChtonu1MD74xiZEDKleIsc\u0026fid=0x0:0xadaf9df3bc4f7cf7"],"When":"2020-2-1"}]

[{"Name":"Pouyan Dehno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtwhkr-cJdKmoYQrxfRnXcXnvOyhOTcEYJpa6EHWO8tS2Gmx8o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not recommended. I was driving and call them over 10 times but no body was responding to the phone. When arrived there, I called them while in the store and they were chatting and playing games and not responding to the call.
Safety and cleanliness can be questioned in this situation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFZcLVMP0DcWKpaz87hlEWGFtwPthh6eK2jkfJ&fid=0x0:0x135fee582f7bf1b4"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Kadir Ortak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRIyCe93MSNjmP8D31hVKXLuBQ97c6KEsboG29Y1-AEeewDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disgusting no matter how much extra money you give they won't do what you want. They don't care about you. I don't want pork. I told him 50 times but he doesn't understand. a lady brunette indian driveway","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwf76_yDcHZLFWOO2O-yoJR_HEZRDkI-3DX3i_&fid=0x0:0x135fee582f7bf1b4"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"joe smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVOJQpeFYOUXeOHsM2cwDPRBCd8APZoXz-YQCJZVJQ76Ffew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in on the way back from the airport, in rush hour. Staff was friendly, the order was prompt and delicious. While eating our dinner, the staff came over, asked us how everything was, and gave us a refund for the discount they forgot to include at the time of ordering. Wow, highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Al May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURsEKydI6yFDWfeEuJUm_zojUlbRJUnS2y7j3NZKmrARii_3iYLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from this location via a delivery app for the first time. Absolutely love the Coffee Crunch Milkshake. The onion rings were nice and crispy and the burgers came fresh and delicious. I ordered the Nashville Style Chicken Sandwich. It was a generous portion and really satisfying. I wish it was spicier though.  The flavour reminded me of Buffalo chicken.
Also ordered the Chipotle BBQ Bacon Melt which was pretty good as well.
Will order again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8hUEcpHjMPWWmtDSjmGIm8kdCe_i2iykMjl6y&fid=0x0:0x135fee582f7bf1b4"],"When":"2023-1-21"},{"Name":"Tianyi Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVad0Mj_Zn8LShZxeQiSbsEp6WYegWs6rOSbegSf-0eXPbp2dc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is amazing! Especially the garlic Parmesan fries, that was the MVP of the day! The onion rings were crunchy, the strips are tasty as well. Valuable meal for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvsgUEPyPEkXN02q45RhNHrcUGGaGuG-1BcqM&fid=0x0:0x135fee582f7bf1b4"],"When":"2023-3-19"},{"Name":"Orphan (Orphan)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMImERhe9wf1B0S5IdY4iztRLEt6UJd-AXQ1f-Mq4p40PE9ODS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"7.00 $ for egg and sausage sandwich. Acceptable size bun compared to Macdo. The egg itself was not so nice  .  Seeing evidently  due to the facts  that the grill was  not clean properly. The meat size was acceptable  although the  meat not cooked much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0okDCrMcHCpXStFZhFxDUyep_4SR1tHi6mBOv&fid=0x0:0x135fee582f7bf1b4"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Cathleen C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJx2MN1QrL-al0WVm-TdDcYk1o3G7xggxcy8iJJVzh5k2vq_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to the washroom while I waited for my burger. I am in shock!! This is an utter lack of privacy!! You could see the other person's privates with this very short wall between the stalls!!! Please fix this!!! I'm so glad there was no one that came in to the bathroom at the same time!!! Never in my 49 years have I ever seen something like this lack of privacy!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE2paLrmgXaki7EqOZ_Wvj19Tcc8q0l_a5-dim&fid=0x0:0x135fee582f7bf1b4"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"White Angel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7iJR9S8qBnYoIS-cwP5HHB30Td_IB85OHvaRZj5iXGPavINs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hello,
I am a regular customer of this location. The food is always great tasting. They always take care of me there. Albeit everyone is nice and good, my girl PUSHOINDER deserves an extra mention as she always greets me with a big smile and she always ensures my order is correct. She definitely provides excellent customer service :) KIRIM, you are lucky to have her working for you as it’s hard to find hardworking employees like that these days. Thank you for all the ice cubes Pushpinder. Lol. Keep up the GREAT WORK HUN. 👍😊
Again, the location is good but the food is the BEST! So the next time you need fuel for your vehicle go to this location and treat yourself to a nice delicious meal from Triple O’s. You won’t be disappointed.
👍☺️👍☺️👍","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"H W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXexF1ppHhagktR0Lj8tfRndSZu99-g8j0KJdvC6dho4atqtz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Dairy Queen is very kid-friendly, which makes it a great place to visit with children. Some of the ice cream flavors are a bit too sweet for my taste, but I really love their ice cream cakes. They are always a hit in our family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDO2UPsXKS-Gl4BRP24ki08p3UfZibWnuQlTVx&fid=0x0:0x2c104079de0f7950"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Kasumi A. Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7_0dE4TBrW-eazsY9gh6IEHsIYux8SX4ecNQs4YyVQn_4oH7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst services ever, they pre-made the pineapple sundae, they took out from the fridge,  instead make by order. They don't put real cube pineapple on top of ice cream. Their quality same as McDonald's,  but they charge double times for it. Their French Fries is not crispy at all.
Most of the tables and chairs are dirty. Nobody clean up there, even no customer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3su0ZW5hIu6xamsYWZvCnyWC0cWstMk8VFkZI&fid=0x0:0x2c104079de0f7950"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One thing I like about this store is they close late every day (until 12 am).
Meanwhile, the problem with this store is that they hired a staff member who doesn't want to work.

I always come to this store. So far, only one or two cashiers were friendly. I don't know how to describe the rest of the cashiers that I encounter. Their facial expression and the way they talk seem like we (customers) are a burden and uninvited guests for them.

Maybe other customers didn't realize about the cashier attitude, but for me, who have experienced working as a front service for more than 20 years, this is a big matter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOglWKy9niIm4hDBlrEpnnZkofscFduSnL5D-SM&fid=0x0:0x2c104079de0f7950"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"berfiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM5QGJDBE5m0qxX5L5L6jHqT90SrQC1Uz-KaCgjavuGKRefWda=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I really love birthday cakes. But on my last visit, the girl working was very indifferent and uncaring. That's why I'm making this comment  I wrote the things that needed to be written on the cake, by coloring them on paper, and when the cake was ready, she never said it was ready. This is ridiculous. If you don't like your job, you can quit. If you are not happy that day, you don't have to take revenge on your customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb2PNFoCK4TyUcj9MHD6CQyb9I919E-ewWobnA&fid=0x0:0x2c104079de0f7950"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"C Pedrosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcMDy4tMBdT1bu6DvBAjbPuH68jW3f1qeeNrDCc5DPFdSftMlu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Whilst this location is perfect. I have compared this to other Dairy Queens.

They skimp on the blizzards and never serve it upside down. They also cover the blizzard with a cover possibly to save on the set amount.

You cannot even complain to corporate. It goes to the owner of this branch !

As a franchise, they should stick the standard of the franchise.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Max M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjYNXpFmuJ5Mo3urIUy-gBQyfjedCSyECEsd75iy93lKJGKIBb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enough clean, even cleaner compare to many other DQ places. Definitely awesome taste of food. Doesn't matter burgers or ice cream. Many fridges with frozen stuff. Broad choice of cakes, ice cream.
Just one minuse: a looooot of people and long waiting line.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg8dC9DtoU_EuROqlTfJEzacCVe51faVgbTVWZ&fid=0x0:0x2c104079de0f7950"],"When":"2023-5-29"},{"Name":"R B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvwlyjB4u92gNs2XkVMCtEEv1bbhznwa-XyALuorQtBg64Yw0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got a ice cream birthday cake, ordered online, picked up but they brought out the larger size which I did not order. Staff member said to simply keep this size and will not be charged extra, much appreciated this jester 👍 I like this Dairy Queen as it is clean, room to eat in area, cozy and nice 😀","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Godard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYLH_YgpP2YBwVGKtZc7n02YhFUVBj7G8E7ASMtaHseE1Y5_s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was great rare to see such great customer from fast food workers nowadays. He was very kind and had a smile on his face. Food was good and warm","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lost in Flax Blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnuEdz0exGAqoaKWuU3YZ60m50P5j2VjB_aqaZVW3VnTtNws28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered 2 teen burger set meals, 2 mama burger set meals, kid’s buddy burger meal (subbed apples for fries and apple juice for the drink) plus a side of onion rings. The cashier was extremely friendly and agreeable to all our requests! The root beer glasses were well chilled. Lettuce and tomato in the burger was super fresh, as were the buns! Patties tasted nice. Onion rings were fried crisp and not greasy. Everything was served up quick. I honestly did not expect much from A&W but they pleasantly surprised me with quality, customer service, cleanliness and price (we used coupons for the entire meal!😁) Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaHtxihe6JYhvvWflYmOD0i_hHYCv8-YAJtcEa&fid=0x0:0xa287011f4a69ec40"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Donald Overlander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHkhUvtU4pxJdumyiSAcxjbcdGAGaHweKKGqPTFB4fZ5GX2Cx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"How could we NOT visit an A&W while visiting from the States! These are fading away in the States - and this location did not disappoint at all. Great experience.

Dining at 8:30pm - nearly empty when we arrived - food was fantastic! Great tasting grass fed beef, fresh, crispy fries, and they offered a lettuce wrapped burger for my Gluten Free family members.

We couldn't find anything about the toppings or condiments to dock them on! Portions and preparation were spot on and had no qualms about eating here.

Tables were all clean, restrooms were as well. It's a great fast-food option if you're in the area - and that is the only reason they got a 4 out of 5 on atmosphere... If I could give a 4.5 I would.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM61fawQp2zg0J7nRg7QQOz7i_W0gqnDZNb0-vO&fid=0x0:0xa287011f4a69ec40"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Stu “Stue83” E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm5Ddp40LUgNaEAAljyXhmiBY8bDcNZNS-EZtFS67SGKWOmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Male employee was polite and got my food fast but female manger is super rude. She just stuck her hand out the window with my food and didn't stay a word. I said thank you and still nothing. Think she had an ear bud in speaking punjab to somone. Franchise owner should consider hiring somone else to manager their business","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK6einisJNw5S0DItDyNPID7zDlHS0QIKFBv4u&fid=0x0:0xa287011f4a69ec40"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Harpreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQrE0Do3KTAeNzwfG0OqLSVXtXLQPt9u7QFMPWlVCpU6PG4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered two masala veggie burgers with extra chipotle and spicy sauce but they didn’t add extra sauce on burger and onion rings looks soggy and there is no seasoning on it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4d3c7GxjswtQUOXgSaUxPWCiGSlZxhoA3dv2O&fid=0x0:0xa287011f4a69ec40"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"David CM Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu9wKhvbfbXcUv3ddzu6Zbl9103spVjAaDikUakjLqFoCJejT0Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the BEST locations I have visited among the A&W franchises...first time here.   Very spacious.   Reasonably quiet.  Ample parking.   VERY clean.  Top notch location for a fast food restaurant...Will definitely come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXE2Ll9j7SH2Pv2LKZOOu1a9vVzagDBBZrAzHXMr1Z03rXNhk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"nicest staff there’s always these two guys working at the front and they are awesome together. They always know how to treat a customer right! Keep up the great customer service.  I usually get my coworker the masala potato burger is great for a vegetarians and I get the classic bunny burger. there’s always a table to sit, but it does get busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kranky Frog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_mdxm1jbn_NlUjCiE_Aqbk8e6lJAZdB_JgpN-54ts6wCM2B-j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the All-Canadian. One spec of butter on bread that wasn't toasted. (See photo). And I asked for over-easy and got over-hard. :( I was looking forward to dipping my crunchy buttered toast, into the yolk of my over-easy eggs. But I was very disappointed. If the other restaurant wasn't closed I would of went there. I tried this one and not sure I would go back. I had to toast my own bread and put my own butter on them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLC0ujIkiLP1gAACLgskv-embBPGg2EhjKnAyC&fid=0x0:0xa287011f4a69ec40"],"When":"2022-12-12"},{"Name":"Colin Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKsZm0dxkoaNVpT_U5MSz6Hu71-aJgYtlTkTneFejPbF30OZkbOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came beee at 840pm on a weekday. The location was clean and the condiment station ah five gar, Frank’s hot sauce.  No ice for the fountain it seems.  Sort station doesn’t have a compost bin so I took my dine-in packaging home with me to compost properly","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bao Khang Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-8hJuZCDFIJePGRD8jZwXpNYujvSOsB6SF-4gtO3ksSLSMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I worked in McDonald’s Canada as shift manager from 2020 to 2023 in a different location and I can you that this store is definitely meet every standards of the McDonald’s.

My Mighty McMuffin was so good, when I worked at McDonald’s, the English muffins were usually left in the cabinet for so long but the one I got was perfectly cooked. The bacon was tasteful and the egg was properly cooked, which means the grill was properly clean.

The store was clean and the team was very friendly, shout out to the counter team to handle food and bag food properly. The coffee I ordered also met the standard of McDonald’s. If I were a GM or Owner of this property, I would absolutely give everyone in the opening team a praise for doing a very well done job.

I ordered a mighty McMuffin, a burrito and 2 coffee.

Great job guys","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5vn7iLisgKimuLroBh49WKPKAFB0gsd-9uK4F&fid=0x0:0xce2d19065ffbac3a"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This McDonald's could be one of the best ones I have ever seen in Canada. There were tables outside if you wished to eat while enjoying the sun. There were surprisingly more rooms than expected as we went further inside. The fries were hot and the MsShaker’s flavor was great. We tried two other flavors before, they were not that good and were a bit strange. The chicken wrap and Egg McMuffin were both nicely done. The place was clean. Customers were all decent while we were there, while it was not always the case in other locations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPShNE9XW-uK7LDnkwcPUCeASM0fwe80zEs53yY&fid=0x0:0xce2d19065ffbac3a"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Annia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCmNf-6kVgoV3z2v1rhLUKPIXQtdwZxPsOxdlb6pZhbXP-BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Yes , I know it's McDonald's at 4am but I expected at least edible and it was missing an egg for my Sausage AND egg mcmuffin 😟 tried scraping the overly toasted bread, decide just to discard the one side and eat the rest.  Cranky, tired, hungry and it certainly did not satisfy my cravings.

I don't know about the service as friend picked drive thru for me but when I dine here ir usually hit and miss on staff shortage lately and the atmosphere is just same same but the washroom that needs attention usually","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdnlcLOIOeKz3aXwqh21yY8ANPrIdmBq9EsEyx&fid=0x0:0xce2d19065ffbac3a"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Thomas Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAwLp7How8ivwWkdMDFkTlDUKt8aSHtKfR2l7wbgFhAO4oqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I finally understand why there are so many single star review in this McDonald’s.   I recently purchase Ronald McDonald’s House coupon for $5 which contains burger ,fries and coffee etc.  when I try to exchange burger and coffee coupon today.   I was told I can only use one coupon per visit.  I can only use” one visit per day “ was not mentioned in the front of coupon.  When I discuss this matter to store manager.  She refused to honour another coupon if I visit 2nd time today and walk away without explanation of her decision.  What are great way to promote how  courtesy of this restaurant.  When I was talking with her, she stood still with her hand across  with arms.  It feels like I m talking with night club bouncer/ security.  So interesting to visit this restaurant if you are not going to eat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jedrick Parejo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdl-3cComtl3j9qi1d6qsdwgSr0GbVMoxJvGBMCDMTBIOpzTydyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently placed an order through your app, and according to the information provided, as long as I arrived before 3:59 am, I should have received my food. However, when I arrived at the drive-through at 3:52 am, I was turned away because the location claimed to be closed—even though it’s advertised as a 24-hour spot. This inconsistency caused unnecessary inconvenience for me.

I kindly request that you review the timing instructions in your app to ensure they accurately reflect your operating hours. If the app had specified coming 15 minutes earlier, I wouldn’t have attempted to place the order at that time.

Thank you for your attention to this matter, and I hope you can improve the experience for your customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Huang Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPhNDmH7GUrtMyjKiTROS1EOd7O8Of62qP4FRLid8Mfy8DSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place treats consumers like fools. I chose this location because it's close to my home, but I have had three incorrect orders through the drive-thru. When I tried to communicate with them, they actually told me why I didn't come back when I noticed the mistake. I completely did not experience the expected level of quality and politeness here. To them, my spending is a nuisance, and as a result, I was treated unfairly. Stay away from this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"barinder singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0XYkNbv5ltpr9yj7fSnPty9GdUjxs8xmecT6mrEvLULjmopI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This McDonald's location has the worst customer service. We were 3 and picking up an UberEats order and when I arrived at the drive-thru, they weren’t ready with it. When I asked about the delay, the staff was rude. I highly suggest the owner reconsider their staff. I won’t be returning to this location. It's embarrassing to see such poor customer service, especially when the people in my community seem to have lost basic respect and professionalism. The woman with the turban and the man with glasses working the drive-thru were particularly unpleasant.

If the restaurant isn’t able to fulfill orders, they shouldn’t accept them. And if they do, they should handle the situation with patience. It's unreasonable to tell Uber drivers not to accept orders during certain times, especially since the Uber app doesn't notify us that all McDonald's locations are closed or updating their policies between 4-5 PM. This is a problem that both McDonald's and Uber need to address—it shouldn't fall on Uber drivers to figure it out.

Additionally, the woman with the turban refused to speak with the customer when I called to inform them that the order couldn't be completed. I explained the situation to the customer, who asked for a substitution, but the staff wasn’t willing to help and treated me poorly for no reason. As a result, I had to reject three more orders from this location due to the same disrespectful behavior.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Mortimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHa7b9BxMJB0JwDNtjm5P94mIlM7lnO9lquliUH-bHR146LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After ordering a mcChicken, they refused to give me a sweet and sour sauce. I offered 25 cents, that was still not enough she required 45 cents. As I didn’t want to use debit or credit for 45 cents I had to leave without any.
No convenience or courteousness","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I usually stick to the grilled chicken burger at Fatburger, but this time I decided to try the Cajun chicken burger with cheese for a bit more flavor. The chicken breast was fresh, and the portion size was decent, but the overall taste was just okay—nothing particularly memorable. It had a mild Cajun flavor but lacked the punch I was hoping for like some more onions, bell pepper, and some spiciness was what I was hoping for.

The restaurant itself has plenty of seating, so finding a spot isn’t an issue, even during busier times. The price is reasonable, falling somewhere between cheap and pricey, making it a decent option if you're looking for a quick bite without breaking the bank.

While combo meals are available, I didn’t opt for one since I’m not a fan of pop or fried fries. If you're into classic fast food sides, those might round out the meal better.

Overall, Fatburger is an alright spot for a casual meal, but for the price and taste, it's just a middle-of-the-road experience for me. Not bad, but not outstanding either—solid 3 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMikO8JQiH485lV0QbBLoL_JNEpZGb7opiJLKTl&fid=0x0:0x5c4ad3db271c6112"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Heechan Kim (Philip Kim)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXUfLhUh5dMO1jOrNGAdjzrGu6EsZB1cv1RlI6OZ4TObUi7lBW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want classic American Burger, this is the place where you can get them. I liked the food and everything. If you eat a lot you might want to order two burgers, but I was okay with one 1/2lb bacon cheddar burger and chili cheese fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLyI_26uEm_CucbRlzg3DImszZGXo4x7SpbVL2&fid=0x0:0x5c4ad3db271c6112"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Thomas Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHMXMTB-MUMOkyzD_ow4IgBpzg_7V6FyszkGmJp-7JdrCijeo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ate 2/3 of my Mushroom Swiss and found 3 literal pieces of CARDBOARD sandwiched in the burger (have some sort of stripes running along them)... Disappointed and disgusted.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9qdcDeTSyn_pDoTYwuw54ZE71XNNT1G3HYl34&fid=0x0:0x5c4ad3db271c6112"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Nopphadol Wannakhet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaoXDtImsx6oP6xY_-uDofv1iIl3k0BbXWlhCBVOPpopCicg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst burger ever: lettuce was not fresh and the patty was super dry. Did not even bother to even eat it and waste more of my time and energy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY1MSJxDlcogVWbeR81Uzc9t_o8pRe7bJGcdab&fid=0x0:0x5c4ad3db271c6112"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwhlFiHPSDGYcBNEBZjiV401CUR-8LRwpy-nj0JN_nYZzCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Has several tables with tv to watch sports or news. The fatburger was decent size and loaded with lettuce tomato and pickles, so messy to eat as everything falls apart. Would have been better if it had cheese. Fries were hot and fresh. The milkshake is pretty good, not too sweet and is ice cold. Only thing is the autotip feature on their POS machine which takes several presses to bypass it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPrHk6kqoqOqvE7t0zPJbejCeaWwKWp9pdqRA5&fid=0x0:0x5c4ad3db271c6112"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Phillip Cavouras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh9XhvWwejqZfZOMZPDA68scaFF7ao-Y3qDsGnbDWhDhlr7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was very excited to try the California burger.  We usually go to five guys but thought we would try fat burger today because it’s closer to home.

My burger was very bad, as soon as I picked it up I could tell the bun was stale. Like very stale. It crumbled in my hand and made the whole burger fall apart.  Flavours mediocre at best.  I was very disappointed with my meal.  Neither of us finished our burgers.

The fries and orange Fanta were great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl3fY3sG53otgL2bXuJ2h4ktONlF3HRNOo2YUB&fid=0x0:0x5c4ad3db271c6112"],"When":"2023-11-11"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBWWyBQ7uB1dXJVgRLEg3YyV6-rci9Et6d4Q63wl-BpHN9TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The burger was okay, all the ingredients seemed pretty fresh but for some reason it just seemed really stand-alone, perhaps lacking in flavour? The fries were good. The only thing I would definitely NOT recommend is the seasonal blueberry milkshake! Thinking it was the summer season I had hopes that there would be fresh blueberries, but they brought out a blue/green colour dye..the whole thing tasted pretty nasty. Also, the tips option that is very difficult to bypass makes it a bit annoying, this is fast food right?!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kids meal are a good value! The chicken tenders were tender and seasoned perfectly. The burgers are the gem of the place and I can’t help getting the triple king with cheese in a lettuce wrap! Wifey likes the California burger.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrghTgHMpqVOG8z6ygcMOAhEAhVLdyAQLd2AMB&fid=0x0:0x5c4ad3db271c6112"],"When":"2022-4-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"rahat karim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6xXsnyPSTmjn1rTTo4mG---p6U1GffHHFEVwWeuKEyTOa1Ak=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went there with my friend, the customer service was really poor. After struggling for 15 mints they couldn’t accept my gift card. Then I got restless and said I’ll pay with my card just fine.  And the manager came but she was even worse! The chicken was half raw, really poor quality","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgfW3u8KMnFUsKLtiu2NjrwVobngzEzPJP7x9o&fid=0x0:0xdccfb8ae670e0c60"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We were here to try the long cheese burger. It was not bad. However, I felt a bit disturbed during my time dining in that evening.

I saw a middle-aged Chinese man came in and bought something. Then he checked the order and showed something in the bag to the server. Apparently, his ability to communicate in English was limited to convey exactly what he wanted to say. No one worked that evening was Chinese, so it made the communication challenging.

If I had to make an educational guess, the man was given something not what he wanted to order. It was because one of the worker kept yelling at him something like this was what you ordered, no, you had to go.

I did not understand why it was such a big deal to make a scene. When I started to think i should go forward and help, the man left with frustration.

All food we ordered was okay, I would come back if I did not witness this experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb6O9u8s-DJSCdvD75H7OT0FZ42VSnqddM3HX0&fid=0x0:0xdccfb8ae670e0c60"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"MIGUEL MARTINEZ CEJA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUztjwBaMsNtjBzVBFRcaUJ7t1cbUF1T1cS_N4MiFB5Ow65fUsX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Are you tired of paying so much for your small size McDonald's meals. Try the hamburgers here. They are the same size they had always been. Also, it's a better flavor. And great price. Staff are super friendly. Try it yourself to change your mind.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dennis Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJgBHuKaxB6_AGRs3DyAn5DYWAJVYL8OdZQBLbOlZjEJJMR8F5KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Only three tables have electric outlet beside them, and Whopper Wednesdays is still on","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI88TNzNHnPQFCui6tzu9MZ3uBvhmNgF5V438G&fid=0x0:0xdccfb8ae670e0c60"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Tomer Malka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2BR2MN2HeSKDMdZdmLLRcOb4QvXNabq_-59Z8K2rr1CTqjsdL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After waiting in the drive-through for about 10 minutes at 2:30 in the morning for a couple of original chicken sandwiches with only one car in front of me. Received a couple of the most disgusting items of food that I’ve ever seen. My hands are now filled with oil and I don’t have any interest in taking a picture of this greasy mess. Absolutely disgusting. The entire thing was just swimming in oil.
You’re only as good as your employees, in which case you are garbage
What is the main problem with training? Are you afraid that they will spit in the food if you start holding them accountable when it comes to quality presentation?
Threw then out behind the nearby Costco for the raccoons to binge on","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saffiyah K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoJFPB3UElzfFzgmtLAW8kHDStnnUR5JsiUwXk66DnEy17UnYN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disappointed. Came to get two meals. One Double Roasted Garlic King sandwich, medium fries, coke, and Crispy chicken sandwich, large onion rings with coke, and popcorn. Spent $40 for all that. Price isn’t what I’m complaining about, although they could make it not $40 for two meals. Anyway, while the crispy chicken and onion rings were really good we were extremely disappointed to see the boring and plain looking double roasted garlic king. No onions. No roasted garlic. Just two beef stacked and cheese at the very top. It made us feel nauseous after finishing it. It was not at all what the pictures on their website/menu showed. The fries and chicken popcorn were dry and didn’t taste good at all. Burger King is always a hit or miss.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfiiCJ_HENIqeI9Kq5RYrd92tvIwqGMvpeHX4v&fid=0x0:0xdccfb8ae670e0c60"],"When":"2021-8-25"},{"Name":"Arjun Tyagi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWopm7CB27Brsn2nZf_ZcGMYA1rC2xZn0gFS2Ev_B4zUk8mX8MoIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the new Impossible Whoppers (2 for a family member and I), absolutely excellent experience. Reasonably quick wait time from order to prep and staff were friendly in the drive through. The food was hot, fries were clearly fresh and crispy, drinks were carbonated and cold. The burger itself was amazing! I’ve had some terrible fast food experiences in the past and this was a shockingly good one. Keep it up folks! Thank you. I was there today Sat, May 8th @ approximately 1:10 PM.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIUntTOhqkzJ4s6Cz4i-0JCbH5CXtWYV0XcOrM&fid=0x0:0xdccfb8ae670e0c60"],"When":"2021-5-8"},{"Name":"Gurbinder Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8FgJHVxEh6gm13TETtMotvo4glQSYoIh9355A9bTR7ZRCkAID=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The girl jasmine working at drive thru  is really nice and polite. She has quickly taken my order and with in seconds i get my order. She has treated me with a sweet smile. Need such staff.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Aozora Bsl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1_SvQMK9vGEnWXxIC4kHMwLsvpyIO9mO64lGfHvjgBn54dSTq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"So I ordered 3 signature chicken.
2 were nicely cooked and juicy.
1 was overcooked and dry...
Mashed potato was perfect.
That was really funny. Depends on your luck I guess.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXgOOpONWzhYpfJra3Q8U5EsLHPFQ3PvwmVun4&fid=0x0:0x555cc22f1051196b"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Zohaib Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInqpW_ukF-xdqFrg9EpUave-0STedwoC4IBw40rUqVb7lTCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The customer service is extremely helpful. Can someone train the supervisor in this location to manage the queue properly? I can understand they are busy but there should still be a more efficient way a better system to handle walk-in, dine-in, mobile and online orders. Please give this a thought so your customers will not get turned off.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Onkar Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJaJn7fjYZuzBrigMEfSdfCBLMN5Y7dVJvvqPLusYgWAWNfwZNiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Popeyes and had a fantastic experience! The food was delicious, as always, but what really stood out was the exceptional customer service. Jasleen was incredibly helpful and went above and beyond to ensure my order was perfect. She was friendly, attentive, and made the experience so much more enjoyable. It’s rare to find such great service these days, and I truly appreciate her efforts. I will definitely be returning to this location. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"nadia only","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKu22aOHcT0G5vYisa3U2L5jCjSuBM707iUnJrxUiuUjcW_mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"i ordered 10 piece chicken ( half spicy and half mild) , but when I got home only 9 pieces inside the box ( 5 at the top and 4 at the bottom) . I Hope they double check the number of chicken next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIUYzCEauSaLnuxBet00P1pAmEtruGCj8xJ1Rh&fid=0x0:0x555cc22f1051196b"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg_KAqTQxsDLwon6O6f-_8Lc1dsT_DysWASplu1udt_XQYNiNq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have visited this store before and always enjoyed the food. I was at the opening as well where I met the owner, who lived in Dubai. I ordered take out this time and whilst the chicken was good, the fries were one of the worst I have had in Canada. It was refried, cold and hard. I am attaching the pics and you can tell how stale these are, to the extent I had no choice but to throw it away. To reiterate, this is the first time I have been disappointed with Popeyes Bridgeport. I have liked both the chicken and fries before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-fueEJHwCD35ZcQiCsMM-77UbJx6EfZJApWSY&fid=0x0:0x555cc22f1051196b"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We order the chicken nuggets combo and they where really tasty, the meat was juicy and the breading was really crunchy, the mash potato was delicious as well because the gravy have more spices than kfc, they give you two dips to choose and the blackened ranch was sooo tasty!, the staff was friendly and fast!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZEHRnUsKg_YJuNPParbXhZsUEA7mUqilNw_15&fid=0x0:0x555cc22f1051196b"],"When":"2024-1-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Catherine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAbzFXWl52Qg6VaDycpcYutqiygwBJlF-usNEhlu4Gs8-Z4hk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought those $5 charity coupon
And they are for Ronald McDonald house charities BC & Yukon.
So I handed them out those coupon and this store ended up told me that I can’t use them at once. They can only take one per purchase.
1. Why I needed to come up to the store 8 times for this coupon.
2. I went to two other different McDonald stores, noticed that other customers can enjoy this charity treats in one  purchase.
So I am not very happy about the previous treatment from them.
3. I will tell them off face to face as I was Very annoying and upsetting","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb6hcep72yOnEZJL41EzQ6ZBpr_l9BHCM5yzFa&fid=0x0:0xfa4e2ebd3629478f"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"helena garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4t8KG4DQNu2JZVQSow0co-JHBelRvZxaZjVVAVpQGrxg8GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came here on October 24th at 4:40 PM. I ordered french fries, a sundae, and a McFlurry. When I received my McFlurry, it wasn’t even the small size, and I had ordered the regular one. I asked an employee if it was the regular size, and she just looked at me, nodded, and then turned around. Really bad customer service and experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLjb5CHFmO5sn9irbGnmwKy4GVPpJ5ImdQ6g91&fid=0x0:0xfa4e2ebd3629478f"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Bernice Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW464GgS_HBBJK0gVSOz_V2cVFCOfEIhxQlpJbOB1YpbYmbNwD3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never come to this location.
Tried it many times and they never make the fries right.
If you order no salt fries, you’d still get old and oily
Same as the chicken nuggets, I don’t know how they are able to make it such different than other location. As if they don’t sell it enough and just giving bad ones all the times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrjwbf43psIH8SxI1EqmNkZjKI7gRPkNM_Hmzl&fid=0x0:0xfa4e2ebd3629478f"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Jonathan Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLAhWrf6wG2sHTLFm2_R6455DUIQUDB1rrVXWtvHmvlkwVLlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Disorganized and slow service

Gave us half the order then tells you 5 mins for the rest but ends up taking over 20 mins.

By the time the rest of your order arrives the fries and icecream they handed to you 20 mins ago is soggy and melted. We’re fine waiting a bit longer but why give us the fries and make the ice cream so pre emptively for takeout - leaving our food getting cold for 20 mins outside.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel An","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI58pyKzjyJvTdknP1vLfaZcjh-QQeipU_XVCQ-fKQMbZBuws0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Let me stand outside in the cold when im picking up the order, just open the door and let me wait inside. The employee need to have some common sense","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Razieh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInpNMoYCaljF57KAcXcrswWdb_OIHc_XeHyYTwSCM9529ZPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently ordered a hot chocolate at this McDonald's location, but unfortunately, it wasn't up to the usual standards. The drink was lukewarm rather than hot, and it didn't have much flavor—almost watery and lacking that rich chocolate taste","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shane Zwicker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaCQEJyGH7QxDCbzqSWBRvYrFswSlI7pb4-us8lO0AiWdEUNrV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Understaffed for how busy it is, and paid almost 10$ for a 6$ breakfast, just cuz I wanted hot chocolate in my coffee, and lettuce and tomato on my sandwich. And apparently 'regular' lettuce at this McDonald's is one half wilted leaf..

They were nice enough to provide me with proper lettuce after I complained, but there should really be some baseline standards.

Lotta people complaining about the homeless, but they mostly don't bother you if you don't bother them. Might get one asking you for spare change on your way in/out, but that's no diff than anywhere else in Vancouver. It's an issue with our society, not this McDonald's. But they do need to focus on food quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTuBah1fYNyu7QNNp3bHrdpv1IIBtc5veLZhL8&fid=0x0:0xfa4e2ebd3629478f"],"When":"2023-8-27"},{"Name":"J. Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK35GdM6kuQCV6VM_jE-3a56cYJvY6OqgV28tMgxT3m98_ErA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pick up orders only after 10 which is fine, but I looked at the employee straight to the face and asked if there was a straw in the bag. She said "yes" I get home and there's no straw. Now I'm sitting here eating McDonalds at 2 am and have a drink with no straw like I'm Steven glandsberg. Everything was made fresh at least but this coke ain't the same without a straw!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This location has plenty of parking and is very spacious. On the app it doesn’t let you have the option of a coffee when you buy a combo. My dad wants to stay away from sugar drinks as much as possible.

Just wanted to thank the kind tall lady who helped me on my order today. I wish the bk app would just offer coffee in their combos like all the other fast food apps.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0hsE4vNBkN2pKAMGB4Cc__lTVAFNSCoDTSZji&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Kinson Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJA-VBi5AxjvaHad-Nr3Bk13suaziKf1ceox7FfCGhMMBx0_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love to come here!   Service is good.   Restaurant is clean.    The restaurant is not busy and quiet.    You can enjoy your meal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON48a26sAROk7xHg2WITadQEu-Ffbpx2NlRouY&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Kayle G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiTsWeWndrNr6Fvrag55tcAkI3a4OPAmNwoxwB3ExrNdnGMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will change this review when the franchise owner teaches their employees how to cook bacon.

Every burger king ad since the beginning of time advertises crispy bacon. Yet this place serves it near-raw. Light pink, slimey, way undercooked, potentially dangerous? I wouldn't buy bacon menu-items from this location. Disgusting.

This is the third time this is happened, and the last time I'll be eating at this location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ-t0XyWDuVhgo6kEzYAXUivrmdMhi7OrblxOS&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Dr. Tse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1c97-meBhhJqxDvPj4fmZwUaEh_PPmcuc2SOSOUOWDAGqU11h8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The serving staff was polite, the sitting area was very clean, we ordered Bacon Double Cheeseburger combo which was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqRw6aQM_6ioSyhZYH6Krzx3nplZUGGvDeoOGZ&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"cen caberoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyOUXQhu5iziLFDYaFsjI9qoiA3_BG0yiXakZrFsSWeDMB8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered whopper with cheese but i got it wihtout again this is the 2nd time already .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMwQnEeMlCQmXNXzqY8F4uU-AnNXNJvjxI6PSG&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Lindsey Dia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoE47nj7vhoQn9v2IBpSkdCDNAhjA6Vqg_4dXMLWxFt_sOIMWL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I loved BK whoppe growing up and had it every Wednesday. Every since they closed the one close to me over a decade ago, this is the rare time I was hungry and around a BK. Quality has gone down for sure. Service and location was warm and cleaner than most fast food joints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtvGOJpSFDaAMxEzmzNPbOXJPQ2GlxEJ60A-rh&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"Adam Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRQ0qYP9WL4FVgPAn1FjwTP7dF5mWcw2Ma8tpf7E7Sqy_-VaHm9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drive thru was shady, even when it was empty at 11:40 am they still managed to charge us for a 9 piece chicken fries while giving only 5 pieces - didn’t even ask how many pieces we wanted in the first place. Please check your orders before driving off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI83WUW_pBake3Ff4Ji6KLwVbWyzyekBPOQ0-3&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Kristina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5iJ4zdT8p-IA7oKW2l9YTwtw4wkkeAG9F3kO81RCeOwqSK1BK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just got home with my takeout, and was very displeased to find a half-full bag of cold, hard, unsalted fries. My son refused to eat them so they went straight into the trash (I pulled them out to take this photo, hence why the wrapper is crinkled). Definitely not going back to the Burger King on Steveston Hwy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAzm3khfQ3nuEeVEi34CrwKfWEpTcI-FEIUo51&fid=0x0:0x218d543ec748242a"],"When":"2024-2-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you're craving sushi and Chicken Teriyaki then Edo Japan is a place to go. They have daily value meals to suit your cravings.

Good price with great food quality. Service is fast and awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipProUV-ShcwYEaVWIfofQbX5Okri5IziZHt2wdO&fid=0x0:0xfd3e55c185eeed57"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"ITwins (iTwins)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUfk9fQ2wnUPyx22p2MtHChD4th8SauoOfDx9kxsrTGIv_31wePQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The $13.50 "Sushi-lious", the rolls are mostly vegan. Only 6 of the 16 rolls contain cooked shrimp, and each roll contains half a shrimp. Meh.

- The rice used in the rolls didn't feel like Japanese rice. Either it's type of Chinese rice or some cheap sh-t Japanese rice.

- after eating the whole thing, 16 pieces of tiny rolls all by myself, my stomach was still growling. It's understandable - NO MEAT! NOT FILLING!

NEVER AGAIN!

.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0q84vKaKHGjgdW9encMmbVQ2nFfQ-YnJZDWCi&fid=0x0:0xfd3e55c185eeed57"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlELA-viI9YpTmnsNROWJ9sZL1WWI4O3ByXC_kKK2JFZhwmdQc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is what you would expect from a mall food court. The issue is ordering. Twice now I have ordered beforehand on the app,  and they only BEGIN your order when you show up. However I was willing to excuse it the first time. The second time they did this was even worse. They realized I was there, the cashier told the cooks to start making my meal.... I came back 5 mins later, and it turns out they totally forgot, and had to be told AGAIN to make my meal. To their credit, the owner of this location apologized to me, but they're obviously very disorganized and chaotic here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sabrina Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjsvCF2w1oI567TghlIVOR2ivk58LTQ9RlsDCAwySmN9B-Fxsgkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got their beef and chicken bowl with teriyaki sauce. It’s very tasty, and the price is also reasonable. You can get your meal within 5 minutes. The staff is very friendly, and will ask you if you want extra sauce for the rice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMugjZgKC3CosqaJ8CzTrz0gYHdDQst5NXUX6Sq&fid=0x0:0xfd3e55c185eeed57"],"When":"2023-5-9"},{"Name":"Noah Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0Tvwcv5YJkzhkgs7pGljXapBDsxB3w8WN-6y4sIApZggNd1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"They were very busy, but my food was still hot and fresh, right off the grill. The tofu had good flavor, although it was not marinated all the way through.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got the Sunday family deal. 2 teriyaki meals for adults and 2 teriyaki meals for kids.  Kids can get rice or noodles. Adults rice only or $1 more for noodles. Kids meals include juice and Pocky.

$30.99 is a good price for a family meal that is made fresh right in front of you.

Beef was a bit tough but chicken was tender.  Recommend the chicken teriyaki with extra sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxt2NjRgCTvEt2LfM1MVkTmGIEpPyhRqJZpMPm&fid=0x0:0xfd3e55c185eeed57"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Ken Gardner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvyof7lUz8g797ppj2dwyhJWIhYijCsVM9n0mSZR260SW7YZs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is okay. They close early, though. I arrived half an hour before the mall closed, and I was curtly informed that they were closed.
UPDATE
The owner responded to my review, saying that their team made my experience pleasant. In reality, their team refused to serve me. It appears that the owner did not even read my review before responding. That might explain the poor attitude demonstrated by the staff.
UPDATE #2
Someone from head office called to apologize. He seemed to be interested in accepting constructive criticism.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFH9mJ11YYnokl6Ncfvdpf82sbYzkKhtHU2owF&fid=0x0:0xfd3e55c185eeed57"],"When":"2022-9-24"},{"Name":"Xun Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHWrmk5sHYaYk3kGMrL_sropZ2GxSh8xYKBNCSSHIgtS5-n_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is too little for a male. My cat eats more than that.

Pre-prepared rice and veggies. The proteins are cooked for half a minute before it's served. Not even a meal without the teriyaki sauce. Taste okay, thank to the sauce.

There are lots of better options around if you aren't small appetite or in a rush.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Five Guys
descriptions: Fast-food chain with made-to-order burgers, fries & hot dogs, plus free peanuts while you wait.
