user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bruno Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhILuyIb0LIP6MudwbcSE2BAlE-f9U9SKRT2p9lsRwJ4hM0FgDLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Classic Five Guys restaurant with amazing burgers and condiments and loads of fantastic fries. Reception was friendly and the orders were flying, impressive speed from the staff. Location indoors is not huge, so you can stay some five minutes waiting for a seat during peak hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWtp4oqd9y2ahIlTVPwxjKXZb9KqkvTnsCVcqN&fid=0x0:0xb71d37c77cc9682e"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think this is the best burger in downtown. It’s the best quality you can get. They have many things in their meat is very fresh. They use a double meat layer burgers and their body is those fluffy ones like In-N-Out and toppings you can get as many as you want if you pay extra inside is usually a hobo style restaurant busy and not that clean but I kinda like it it reminds me of an old fashion fast food restaurant. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoVwMweUpUFa9njXZbX7CBLAk3sC8PZUQbB11A&fid=0x0:0xb71d37c77cc9682e"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Iman Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY_It5dFbhJ3ahD3y8wnnvsyYECBdVwU0ipYiueTLf-0IgvGbE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Compared to other food chains it has one of the best burgers and hotdogs. Fries could be more crunchy but no strong opinion.

[Update July, 2024]
I ordered the burger, which had two patties, and oh boy, it was really tasty. Maybe I was super hungry, but I enjoyed it so much. The combination of sauces I selected and the pickles was so tasty. This is still my favorite beef burger among the chain restaurants so far. 🍔 🍟

The portion was good enough. I'm still trying to understand their fries, but they aren't in my top 5 list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsW1-vSLY5SlXFFVB8adPE4vTC1E_NC6ky7xU-&fid=0x0:0xb71d37c77cc9682e"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Danbe Seo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1EMjN2eOd4WZ0pelt9_7zn4kXcAJdRE16SwPyaZlAQO4JUHUo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I really enjoy the food here, especially the fries cooked in peanut oil—they’re absolutely delicious!

However, one concern I have is that the staff preparing the food often talk to each other without wearing masks. It makes me worry that saliva could get into the food.

Other than that, everything is fine, and I hope this issue can be addressed for an even better experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samuel Barbosa de Mello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0peg6-WBhE0EbhzmdEe49pyBGvXkFFn6reIlxa2416ZpRVQKplg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"While Five Guys has gained popularity, I found the experience to be somewhat underwhelming. The burgers, while generously portioned, lacked the juicy flavor I anticipated. The burgers, unfortunately, were often soggy and lacked the juicy flavor I anticipated. For a truly satisfying burger experience, I recommend exploring other local options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB-syXMIdVcaD5h_fW4USPDLynss1UWPeesMcP&fid=0x0:0xb71d37c77cc9682e"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Andrew Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNZ_pvkQlgvJLQf8OH0R8SwU4mnsFF1lvTcdlboJ-4DK-Pr7bb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Five Guys restaurant is exceptional. The hamburger is truly amazing. The quality of the food is top-notch, with fresh ingredients and perfectly cooked patties. The service is incredibly friendly, making the dining experience even more enjoyable. I will definitely be returning to Five Guys again in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvMqvEmDV8sSSW1QOkAOtU_rfiMnDCYBXu0ooL&fid=0x0:0xb71d37c77cc9682e"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Hannah Hsiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5undqv6k1prGO5bK7GLTSz1rgSfSAhZOcrA8P3TjSA6EXYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They really know how to make a great hamburger. I ordered bacon cheeseburger, which is so delicious. You can select the topping you like. Highly recommended. The size is quite large so it’s quite enough for lady without french fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-GBWNSihV9svY-ddC6siRL7yOab7VrXEF13vE&fid=0x0:0xb71d37c77cc9682e"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"John S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXqytpKEY7-f7JKKymx1Tg8fiqmA_aam7d7ntMC60_o7ieUTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Five Guys is a burger paradise in the heart of Vancouver. What sets this joint apart is the fantastic ability to customize your burger just the way you like it. The sheer range of toppings and sauces available ensures that every burger is a unique and personalized experience. The staff's friendly and accommodating nature makes the customization process a breeze.

The burgers themselves are absolute showstoppers. Juicy, flavorful, and made to perfection, these burgers are a testament to the quality of ingredients used. The melt-in-your-mouth experience is unmatched, and it's evident that a lot of care goes into preparing each burger.

Now, let's talk about the fries - they're more than just a side dish, they're an experience on their own. Crispy on the outside and perfectly tender on the inside, these fries are simply addictive. The fact that they're hand-cut and made fresh right there adds an extra level of deliciousness.

The ambiance is lively and inviting, adding to the overall enjoyment of the meal. Whether you're a solo diner or with a group of friends, the welcoming atmosphere makes every visit enjoyable.

For a truly customizable and mouthwatering burger experience paired with some of the best fries around, Five Guys in Vancouver is the place to be. The quality, flavor, and the ability to make your burger your own truly sets it apart. A must-visit for burger enthusiasts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUE7GkyPio3PXGv0bLhCU_LLmCdFlr_kiCIehM&fid=0x0:0xb71d37c77cc9682e"],"When":"2023-11-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wayne Staveley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxVpjd0nhGXu9qmHi_EiMpfnWrD--rwI2L8w3YlpByyMGK5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So many issues I’ve just posted pictures over the last few years. Mostly fish sandwiches and a few pics are from the replacements. I showed the manager these and she said filet o fish are difficult to make… What !?! Once in the drive thru, I was handed a coffee with the lid unattached and coffee went all over me, my car , and into the charging port of my new iPhone. They tried to say it was my fault at first and then they were very reluctant to give me the managers contact info.
They clearly do not respect their customers. They don’t maintain even a basic level of standards with their staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCU5Ynzcg-Cz2kZRgOhiNOLkxeLJPhGaumQAah&fid=0x0:0xd98afe974aa927af"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Wing Hang Seto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIORgmzyD2_To7WP0HmXopyx-hTZJOWp_w8zjTmdK_SR2g_Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very bad service,  iced coffee tastes like water, whole cup of ice, and I asked staff a problem,  she said nothing happened, picture 2 was very light one tasted like water,  after a staff not satisfied to changed other one for me (pic1), that's a difference between the 2 drinks. Never Never come here again ..... July 19, around 9:45pm now","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVUvrXaVjZD7LWd0y8L-BriclHZUQEGEKXle-N&fid=0x0:0xd98afe974aa927af"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Ariel Punn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCmPg6twc5JwAMOM-o1dN6wNtOMWlGn_rcOtQBZ83gCZL6Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I always get subpar and very slow service at this location, no matter the time of day, which is quite the nuisance because I do shift work and they’re often the only place open during my night shifts.
Other than that, the food is normally poorly packaged and cold. Today, I ordered a 6-piece pack of nuggets (waited over 10 minutes in the drive thru because they messed up the orders of the two cars in front of me, causing significant delays) which was cold when I opened it up a couple minutes later. Not only that, but three of the 6 nuggets had undercooked breading - I tore one open to see if it was even cooked through, and it was super mushy and inedible.
Plus, the workers failed to even give me my receipt.
So, thank you McDonalds Ironwood for always providing slow, apathetic service from workers who barely even make eye contact with me, and for cold, undercooked food that I can’t even eat, despite the fact that I paid you money for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXakv7M5FQsKoWGVDNwdr2Rmtpreli3nz6mUvo&fid=0x0:0xd98afe974aa927af"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Richard Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2cf09CJVCwPtaIdza2emRsGKPGxomgAdgPhS277FEROf4Gro=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a McDonald's but their consistency in delivering food without many mistakes makes them better than most McDonald's I ever been to and that's because the staff works hard and they were trained by a good team leader who is the manager. I've seen the manager run the team she is darn good at her job as a McDonald's manager and employee at the Ironwood Plaza McDonald's. 😃","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kinson Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJA-VBi5AxjvaHad-Nr3Bk13suaziKf1ceox7FfCGhMMBx0_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"food is pretty Standard， dine in Service speed depends on How Long is the Drive through.    There were some issues and I reported to via survey.   The manager called and fixed the issue for me.    Appreciated the effort from the manager to make the services better","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0bs_MCsoZ5tF16GY_KhHkJv_JxvvKVSfaD6OP&fid=0x0:0xd98afe974aa927af"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Joshua Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJusR51fqFZEc1ncIbOXLpiPg3wblef8SIOJQBtftosNDljKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"the worst mcdonalds ive been to in my life. always forgets stuff for delivery. in drive thru, always tells you to park, in person, slowest service. fire the staff and start again, this team doesn’t want to work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jerry Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSHqXIQ70HeOoBu2UMtdnlxB4p4XF-FFogQUk-WywIwGuHBG58KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The establishment consistently delivers incorrect orders, and customers are often forced to wait in the parking lot for their food, even during periods of low customer traffic. This particular McDonald's location is widely regarded as the worst in terms of customer service and operational efficiency.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOns_TA3AwfwJzMcSz_qW0yhCSPtL5Tb12M9AQmovDTm7Tshs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am writing to share my experience with Jashan. He is very gentle and polite person. Yesterday night, I had a very positive experience with him. He was doing his work and I spilled some things on the table and without showing any attitude he asked for assistance and I think that was the best part for customer service any employee should have. He is really down to earth person. I appreciate his work!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Eddy Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3cHebbyh511rq2z0iRvhvrGW5QkCv444tJEv-VpRLhYhyCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Most amazing Korean fried chicken I’ve had in Canada. Always crave it. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb8IuYqU36CibrLIZvCCLLlfw4vF5MxF0zS2g-\u0026fid=0x0:0x98af080401021fe0"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Lucy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0k5B-vp18GuDKKCvr42ckdRvwitLU9As7kV88gtVgQ-qSR0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love chicko chicken so much and my favourite is haekbuldak flavour! (Perfect spice for me) It was my first time ordering from this location and I would 100% order again🥰💕 all the employees were so kind 🫶🏻 thank you so much!!☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa__kxOMV4nTED8hsqFnlaadKHS5SK2Mz6ADB5\u0026fid=0x0:0x98af080401021fe0"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"ERIC LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaJovYZAgLzUeUNtNtg127bXJTiz29J3-DCzJEx2zxmWPGyzyC1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Korean fried chicken. Friendly staff. No washroom. Indoor seating available for 9 people. Free storefront parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPxMH0kYJjT05CtgvIQkXtQ0f5cAkernHvYAx3\u0026fid=0x0:0x98af080401021fe0"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Belinda Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn7TTMzcgQmmumaUE-aWmYGctragvugCfl1hNlTJMZXNxjoJwLTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"American fried chicken is mainly seasoned with batter, which is roughly divided into spicy or original flavor. When eating, it may also be dipped in sauce. In contrast, Korean fried chicken has more tricks: sweet and spicy, soy sauce, honey, cheese... a combination of Chinese and Western  .  What makes Chicko Chicken's Korean-style fried chicken alluring is the moist sauce that coats the crispy skin of the drumsticks.  One bite is the wonderful combination of the velvety sweet and spicy sauce, the charred skin and the juicy chicken.  It's hard to resist the charm of Korean fried chicken!🍗😋👍👍👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHw9ZM1QpSP4LUxQgQYhvWzvlIqiknA22Bzsmb\u0026fid=0x0:0x98af080401021fe0"],"When":"2022-7-24"},{"Name":"Ben Choe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJujsEXF9sW3w8CtUyu8Lt3kBfV7G_RcFbmsfLigBfOovHkTyybw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love KFC(Korean Fried Chicken) and Chicko Chicken is one of my favourites. This location is brand new and it was very clean. I ordered four different flavours and my favourites were Sweet and Spicy(Yang Yeom) and Green Onion chicken(Pa Dak). I actually recommend Pa dak to anyone who hasn’t tried. Julienned green onions and fried chicken surprisingly go well together. Chicken tasted great and the staff was friendly. I will definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYXPbuEkNSOJaX-mrEI1_nX9hwjOh4s8RhRBT6\u0026fid=0x0:0x98af080401021fe0"],"When":"2021-5-17"},{"Name":"Cean Figueroa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg2R0zNCChJRC3se_H2VL3ZnEnKX6d0k0x2YiCdT7e1oMJaNMB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always enjoy eating Chicko Chicken. It is a family event for us whenever we order. Staff is nice and food is great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJGBQ5jUzMWOeu1vV0B9nq10ObvaBWjHg43HHUSfn-x_p_EqAT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just ordered via Ubereats. OMG! So crispy, so flavourful. I can’t believe I’ve never heard of this chain before. Fantastic chicken and generous portions. My husband and I split a half-half box and we still have chicken left for a midnight snack!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw3YACleMw-iv3zi2LA84XvpQnqOBh52YUALuW\u0026fid=0x0:0x98af080401021fe0"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very fresh and crispy fried chicken with nice large portions! Loved the pickled radish that balances out the greasiness of the fried chicken. Tried the Padak Padak half size chicken and there was lots of shredded green onion on top which was nice. The shake shake fry cheese topping is both sweet and salty.... Nice.... But probably bad for you cuz it tasted like the aspartame type of sweetness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz_TUhmW5zT13y4LTzvLNyDoHr2DLwvGIj-vna\u0026fid=0x0:0x98af080401021fe0"],"When":"2022-2-10"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Danial Emamhosseini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5yG-bMHoqbxyxcViS4vlLPGdzC7_8fQszfYP-souswf40xgFM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m on the Carnivore diet and I’ve requested hamburger patties which are 100% beef. It took them a little longer but they did a wonderful job of bringing it, it tasted amazing and I loved the packaging. I’ll be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt9ki6FtWceEAF8OxeloWkmDYnu9Kw38wg2hnP\u0026fid=0x0:0x16128afd68277f4e"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Jay Miner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIN6-dPQ5RX3tp-S6aw7PI5RuYpEk3z_bRP5eCOAxEfcx4Qpxc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for breakfast and coffee daily while staying at the holiday inn across the lot. Great staff and surprisingly good coffee / cold brew","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmwse3fTFWzYjiz8m6cPT81rW2HBdDeEbyRgAb\u0026fid=0x0:0x16128afd68277f4e"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Mike M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjCgzb0OJlXCk-WAK9SsEnf3vMl57FpIAZS92vCp5R8BGKs9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So after a very long day I went into this location for a late night meal. I approached the cashier and tried to order. He walks to the back and after 4 minutes returns. With the biggest smile on his face he states you're going to have to order at the kiosk. Then immediately states the food might not come out good as they're about to close. This is a terrible example of customer service. I personally will not eat at any location for a year or maybe more. I travel a lot and eat McDonald's once or twice a week. A very cheeky rude boy just cost you big.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4wlgtmAJFCPZ0n_3Eyp_TfiUVd1vo8vP_cRZSDslqagrvFfLC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered bakery and hot drinks... Our order number was on the screen under in progress and then moved to ready then disappeared while we were still waiting. We saw our drinks ready for a few minutes and we had to approach the staff to help us out and serve the order. One of the drinks came not as specified in the order so we had to go back to have it corrected. Our order was for dine in but it got delivered to go (no tray). They didn't include napkins and so we had to come back and ask for napkins. Quite disappointing for such an easy and what is supposed to be a simple order.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ONAI REYES","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTTSLqjXsoswFVi-9x9W303jXmX2oe4BNICP8Gg4zemAmeu2FD_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went for breakfast on a Thursday morning, 8 adults 3 families. Some of us was helped by Decelyn who was so courteous and  all smiles. But some of us was helped by a lady who was wearing mask and was a bit snooty, opposite of Decelyn. I think she's even the manager! My aunt politely asked for butter and she glared at her, got the butter and dumped the butter in the take away bag. I have to go back to the counter to ask for straw, but unfortunately, she was the one there, so i asked politely for a straw, same attitude eyes glaring and handed me the straw, i thanked her and giving her the look she was giving me too. Some customer service! She shouldn't be in front serving customers! She should be at the back instead. McDs should train their crews better!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHoJhnU2QFkkfHaUidKQuUVywIz-C7Lt6wx1AT\u0026fid=0x0:0x16128afd68277f4e"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Benson L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9SEW4MMhDwDPl-7XMw6DDJRHAu1Ns5mm1AsPvBgc9CZz9IYyW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible wait time! Been there a few times and the drive thru is always busy. Decided to use pick up this time. As you can see, the \"reserved\" pick up spots were all parked, with no one inside their cars. I supposed there wasn't sufficient parking? Entered the closest stall number and waited for more than 5 mins, and no one came out with my order. So I decided to go in and grabbed my order. Waited for too long so I had to leave right away. Ordered no ice on all my drinks and guess what... THEY ALL HAD ICE! Just look how much ice there are. There's enough to sink the Titanic again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKbtMICPcYeNxXZfLsJYbYwV4kDXZLIO2Y3tjX\u0026fid=0x0:0x16128afd68277f4e"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"Ta Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyjZRMvZZppkWxsP7QZYTXuqHnurmy426_v06CT59yNF6wlgGa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food was cold and hard. Fries tasted so stiff and stale. Filet o fish burger was cold and not heated properly. The bun was stiff. Felt sick after consuming the meal. Looked and tasted like the food was left on the counter for more than 2 days before being packed for take out.\n\nThere are better locations that properly prepare the meals. Recommend you to drive a little further for something more fresh.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taylor Kirkland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4cpJyXjA3za_-B-RuywY8pfgiwJu2zeJQSqp8Wz1tFl20CA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very annoying to get home and find missing items and I try to call the store 5 times over the span of 30 minutes and no answer. Why does the McDonald’s app not have an option to report an issue with your order. It’s not like the restaurant is capable of providing a solution.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN52qhAcxnqHZQgJO_sXZ8vp8syWJaHk31fDuH2\u0026fid=0x0:0x16128afd68277f4e"],"When":"2024-12-19"}]

title: 852 Kitchen Richmond
address: 10151 Number 3 Rd Unit 101, Richmond, BC V7A 4R6
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store shopping","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brandon Lee (Hugsmart Pet Store)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV58V-VtgrDszT9y60ynkuuShkJ01uR3iXPbiTvsUfKyZhRZwjX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious dim sum that you can make at home. Just steam it. They are very well made. Why pay $40 per person at restaurant if you can get the same or even better quality at 852 kitchen.

It only cost you $10 per person to eat at home using these frozen dim sum

Buy it, bring it home and steam it yourself. I love it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAjQNACw12W-qgPAOjerVDQiE1FdYpL8OIyE-L&fid=0x0:0x85b8881736440cee"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"852 Kitchen in Richmond is a fantastic spot for authentic Hong Kong-style frozen foods. Their wide selection includes everything from dim sum to soups and desserts, making it easy to enjoy traditional flavors at home. The black truffle Siu Mai is outstanding, offering a unique twist on a classic favorite, while the seafood dumplings are fresh and flavorful. Perfect for anyone craving a taste of Hong Kong, 852 Kitchen’s quality and variety make it a go-to destination for delicious, convenient frozen meals. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMClr_8l7GJSzWuFEUodRx3K561Co_Ji77rn_Q5&fid=0x0:0x85b8881736440cee"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Karry Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtc7DyUVgiueVvsKhotjBq0qRV4qkH8dVPQ8YptPr8zM0PuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend recommended this store, there are various options for Hong Kong-style dim sum and traditional dishes. I noticed some non-Chinese people, like White and Japanese bought lots of stuff. It made me happy to see people from different cultures loving HK food. At last, I bought the most iconic items like shrimp dumplings and siu mei (tasty and fresh texture)and also some desserts like wife cake(fluffy skin with soft filling, not too sweet) and tapioca pudding. As a newcomer from Hong Kong, I am satisfied with their products. They are all delicious, easy to make, and recall memories of my hometown. I will surely come back for more next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2k4V7vyLbOFKxlVHRrfs1vq77T7tAWnQkZwQ2&fid=0x0:0x85b8881736440cee"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Jeffery Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRt2AnI1HcMOdV90wNZvlRKvsD_c92fogeLehvUN50UE7pag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Fish siu mai not recommended at all, not what we are used to eating in HK. T&T frozen one from nissin is better. Got couple other items too. Price is too expensive, charges restaurant price but definitely not restaurant quality. Disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOGRLbXjhNhY4NejZa5KxdhrF_6VbIx36Xcge-&fid=0x0:0x85b8881736440cee"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for frozen dim sum. We used to go to that place on Ackroyd Rd. Not anymore. The dim sum items here at 852 are massive. Priced reasonable too. Check out their shrimp dumplings. HUGE!!

Our favourite is the Deep Fried Milk Balls. Instead of deep frying in oil, we decided to air fry (according to the instructions). To our surprise, it came out amazing. Tasted exactly like restaurant style Milk Balls. Sooo Goood. 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE1BLqGBZDEtsbEVA_DlDkJaUfgRUi52m5Wjzj&fid=0x0:0x85b8881736440cee"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Priscilla Yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl3bn5G8NS35bs-ANa90rLmgtf3hjQOsbIo_KxdoMVlLPP2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"852 kitchen specializes in ready to cook dishes from Hong Kong including dim sum, entrees, dessert, soup and most recently BBQ items.

I came by this week for some frozen dim sum and picked up some of their new BBQ items as well. This is my first visit to their Richmond location but we've gotten their products from the location in Vancouver before. We always love their shrimp wontons and this time I tried the steamed Chicken Buns and LOVED it. Soft and fluffy, tasted just like when you go out to dim sum (maybe better)!

For the BBQ items, we chose multiple items including their BBQ pork (cha siu), BBQ pork chops with lemongrass, chicken thigh in garlic sauce, crispy chicken wings and my favourite, the fermented bean curd pork fingers. All of the items were very flavourful and cooked up really nicely on the BBQ. Perfect for a summer party, family dinner or can even just be thrown into the air fryer/pan fried!

Great selection of products that are delicious, authentic and make for a quick meal!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"missalvali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqmg34nqi9a6OwxfeyxDYsAP7-bQV2YnrEZLvTOEYxxZbmY1fa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pepper pig stomach soup - way too spicy $22
Coconut crocodile meat soup - alright $22
Egg yolk custard buns okay, average, not as good as dinning at restaurants but better than T&T
Fish paste Siu Mind, average, probably won't buy again
BBQ pork bun, okay","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNTNMM_D63wGbmGSFQrArKiBTb_7nkTlwfIpwN&fid=0x0:0x85b8881736440cee"],"When":"2023-12-23"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXku1mc6pmeIDMqP2gIA1uCtfryJMYCip8UUonqzGQcOKr7CzokQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall we are very impressed with their dim sums, the only issue we have is some of the dim sums are very salty, like the bamboo sticky rice (Joong), and the beef wrapped with tofu skin was overly salty. I must caution the owner that a lot of seniors are trying not to eat so salty food these days. If you can let the people in the production line know that using less salt would be appreciated. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vritie Talvwar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAOst9UpNIor44pIelC-1HoC9pLJAUc-IC10DWOa1JPcX1ig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paulo's Pizza serves up a fantastic chicken pizza that's bursting with flavour. The crust is just right, and every bite is satisfying and definitely worth experiencing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMduuweMh0zqdV7iuabkvlrdhZTkeOsjGH9Ovxq&fid=0x0:0x81f551f5c1aa7536"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"joban khehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfmi71wzcU_RDEzzft8scdztLpJEWKitez4l9p3lNIKB-n_VPO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently tried the Meat Lovers pizza at Paulo's Pizza, and it was fantastic. The pizza was freshly made with plenty of toppings. The price was quite reasonable considering the portion size, and it might be even cheaper if you order two pizzas because they offer 2-for-1 pricing. I had some leftovers and planned to save them for breakfast, but I ended up eating them all shortly after getting home because it was so delicious! The service was also very friendly. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gursehaj Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXuD0fXykdszaXI0dBZMhzijFYDFQebnCuREw5huh9np-WV42-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG! This pizza place is literally 100/10.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Delicious Pizza and Friendly Service:)

I had the pleasure of enjoying both the Hawaiian and veggie pizzas, and they were simply amazing. The Hawaiian was a perfect balance of sweet and savoury, with juicy pineapple and flavourful ham, while the veggie pizza was loaded with fresh, crisp toppings. The crust on both was just right—crispy on the outside and soft on the inside.

What made the experience even better was the fantastic service. The staff was incredibly friendly, welcoming, and attentive. They went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect, from helpful recommendations to serving with a smile. It’s not just the pizza that will have me coming back, but the warm, professional service too. A must-visit for pizza lovers:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"GAGANDEEP SINGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzdbkfNq-Iq4iuG4_kHu8Bmad06CmvinDiE7I5xSmZSPwol7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Greek salad was fresh and delicious, with the perfect mix of veggies, olives, and feta. The service was top-notch—friendly, quick, and attentive. A fantastic experience overall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEn_rEDscHXQKjWJ91cVoJHIJL4Orgl2HKK86l&fid=0x0:0x81f551f5c1aa7536"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"J Anon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPxTa4RbZc6xgxlu-rwwjwBszcoIpm9kusdtaolkI0iI8XIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time trying this shop.
It's in a little outskirt of town and convenient if you're in the queensborough area and don't want to go into town (Richmond) for pizza.
I ordered the Beef (#17) and Shrimp (#33) variety and wow! I was surprised how fluffy the dough was and how fresh the ingredient tasted (recommend to eat it right away) . My wife could not choose which one she liked the most, but she was leaning more towards the shrimp variety. For seafood lovers, it's a must try!!! It's loaded with shrimp, you won't be disappointed 😋
Will have to come by again and try other flavors for sure !!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pete Fox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLU6dWTrUbTinszVceUdtrlGHizRwxzIx_h2JvNB2wit9PF2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place. I often go there for lunch. About once a week.  Pizza sub or mini pizza.  They have delivered 10 pizzas to my work at times.  Great sauce, excellent dough, and quality toppings. And the cheese!!! A+","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandin Cardinal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwhZkEAYY_iS4hcwMjFOEGAoNbwtFrGS-V0T1CsVQ1HUSkyFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great and Reliable place for solid pizza when you decide cooking is a bit too much for your evening.

Their pizza subs are a great introduction to their food, and has hooked us to them for a comfort food for the past year!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simranjeet Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjqu_82gCFDo8aOVbKuCfxmq1i7-2x6qPnM01JF1LqxVBKeNHW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had pizza from this place for the first time tonight, and it was fantastic. The quality of the pizza and the service were both excellent. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Darlene Rayment","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6j7D0ei-SMG8dHrV9YQAx1J2DLi5MJOpQuMUg8ut9UqvrAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for a birthday lunch with friends.  Was  fairly quiet. Nice place but I guess because of covid and their restaurant having to close due to picketing  hotel staff for over a year, that their menu is minimal and expensive compared to in years past. But again, still a decent place to eat, if I even for nostalgia sake.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen Cowling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5sI8WxTw5ysakho7oI1pJSv6GJWz1BFsy7lUgflDGgZL46g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had lunch 2 weeks after they reopened following the strike. I had the fish sandwich and my friend had the fish and chips. Amazing food, the fish was so good, they batter was excellent. Portions were very good. We enjoyed it so much.  The chef came out to see if we liked it, we thanked him for his new version.
We came back the following week and brought another friend with us. They had the burgers which were very enjoyable and I tried the katsu chicken burger. I was skeptical but again it was an excellent choice. I would definitely have it again. Great food, Love the menu.  Great service! Harold would be so proud!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aurora Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGRLQGGQUALeU-qgLfP9ZfVtHxHxiAcKE6odkfGBG0U0QSyWUW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has become my latest favorite and I have been dining multiple times since I went last month. I love the food and the service too. The lamb is soft and flavorful, so is the fish. The seafood pasta is creamy, the scallops and shrimps are the right texture I prefer, they are not overcooked. The vegetables are very nice compliments to the meal. The service is friendly and authentic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGZg4PaSifem6na1PDvUVx12f8VXwh6hSqrx8-&fid=0x0:0xaeaf7de0a401b93"],"When":"2021-12-23"},{"Name":"Lynx Lynx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIEobu6v-pMIWLrgOTpWQquDgA1rSo0B96UZ6W46SodMyNtRtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoyed the food and drinks here during a layover. I ordered the butter chicken and it was truly amazing! I enjoyed every bite. The drinks were great too!

My boyfriend said the chicken teriyaki was good as well (pic included for reference) but he said my butter chicken was a tad bit better.

The bart tender was also the one taking restaurant orders and he was courteous, quick and efficient. Many thanks to him!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGzyfcpQFWChWZ3DNC7DMEH0heqidbzphxWgWQ&fid=0x0:0xaeaf7de0a401b93"],"When":"2022-4-22"},{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went later in the evening for a couple drinks.
Quiet atmosphere, quick and attentive bartender.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0tyaThZQJgzzWlYdp-PHoLvrkNyRfI15sbA_y&fid=0x0:0xaeaf7de0a401b93"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Jamie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIsaaODpzZi62wV-93lE__3OFGYxafaFgdJgxMDBfyIfS_ESBX0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly service, pretty, yummy dishes.
We had a fish dish and baby back ribs. They were good, but not exceding expectations. They taste good as expected. They play sports on TV, a good place to enjoy a nice leisurely meal with friends and family or just on your own if you are staying at the hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9ZezH0KpNDaBk0hvR10mYvHbpo4t3kjO8f91r&fid=0x0:0xaeaf7de0a401b93"],"When":"2023-5-2"},{"Name":"love c.m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWzmhPxmbsBgLc7MemnZpCsA1FpLL0yrI1fT3DWCPb7wv0FNc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We’ve had breakfast and dinner here and the serves are wonderful! They are also very knowledgeable of the menu and provided great recommendations. The food is delicious and the restaurant is also clean and well-maintained. Thank you for a wonderful experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelvin Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGKIzFMT1ujpVXmgMH-YkzZ0osKlhHrXRzuFQTWyI5JaQneQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A bit of a wait to get service at the front desk but once seated, service was pretty good.  Burgers were tasty.  Clam chowder was good but potato pieces were on the larger side.  Calamari was solid if unspectacular.  Complementary bread came out warm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObTIzZoItVwsESYm-RyFQ4uZ-lN6j_AGJBqy2X&fid=0x0:0xaeaf7de0a401b93"],"When":"2019-12-11"}]

descriptions: Quick-serve fry shop specializing in poutine & hot dogs that stays open late.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"katelynn c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoqcwb_gcSeJsQp6Fk0xxFfLaz6Ca58KOlakGeP011yHdUWdF9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"the portions were huge for the price, like even the medium and small were pretty big and loaded with fries and toppings. it was basically a mountain of fries, gravy, and meat, so pretty much heaven. i loved how you could customize your toppings, and there was also a bunch of other sauces and other add-ons on the side that you could add to shake it up a little bit. no complaints, but i wouldn’t say it’s the best poutine i’ve ever had. the meat was really good and paired well with the gravy and fries though !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCDniSkdJVw4GvPS9JXl5XvgCvCy4PQsSNdKfd\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Cody Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLa2VUtv7DC_i8Wnp5Uag1FXkYZtN3PqArBTVfGIi_c0ZmX_uI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’ve got a gluten intolerance dietary restriction or lactose intolerance where dairy makes you poot nonstop, this is the place to be for poutine! The small size came with a generous portion good enough to split between the two of us for a great snack. The gluten free gravy and vegan cheese didn’t taste off at all and blended in well with the flavors. Crispy fries, well salted gravy, soft \u0026 tender smoked meats, overall very yummy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhZVBYbBETphvSUeJBPU-LWY5H-vacrYE-d_Jr\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Reuben James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGIYVAAO3rRMgU2q-a5Xu4Z-78qZw-JIrzOfyxzv_YXsiC35M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Legendary Stuff - easily the best french fries I've ever eaten. They make it fresh and it has just the perfect amount of crisp. The wasabi garlic dip (only for $1 as of Nov 2024) was also insane. Can't believe I've been in Vancouver this long and haven't been here before. I'm definitely gonna be a regular from now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJDqBwxtk6oZWJdh_21xnVI-vgywBXXpuwRxY\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Alexandra Gaevsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnjItyjfR1qVEZnY6caUOLCi6uNaCD4VjAop9J7DwgHSC2Qmwo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fries were crispy and delicious, and the toppings were full of flavor. I ordered the poutine fries topped with chili, which was fantastic. The shop is small with minimal seating, but it's a great spot for a quick bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhPuRZYg5B_ojRLzvDNgjNFrGPUv_JGxvlf0EV\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Melanie Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOnCXlUyDGCRthUKehak0_GUp_az2pTQqceWOyRQ-aAN0D6lJP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped in on a Wednesday at around 1 PM for a quick snack. We had the medium poutine with garlic dip to go, but we asked for the gravy on the side, which was the best move. I've realized that I don't really like poutine because the gravy makes the fries all soggy. But when I have the gravy on the side as a dipping sauce, it is amazing. The fries stayed crispy, even though it was for takeout. The cheese curds were slightly melted, but that's the price you pay for not eating it fresh. 10/10 would do this again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjsvhfY_SuQ_iUbesoztoqiWVb3U9BnCx-191E\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"D Milburn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYTJuyYJNW23XEIhyxDTO5WvOME5ipvEjz0dpndmARnqjZMtDf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have a craving for poutine? Because I was. After tonight, I'm not sure how I feel about poutine or fries anywhere else in Canada. The menu looked basic but Fritz European Fry House blew my taste buds away. From start to finish, it was packed full of gravy, bacon bits, melted, oozing cheese curds, with the most exceptional crispy fried fries I've ever tried in my life. Yummy !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbxAxHLJydgSlt-ALmrKUSirrhOkz3iuGb3T9r\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Sharon T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlvHI_kQcMxugba1226yW-8c1FCiqghQa5XvvsfV5MlbgvIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place serves a killer poutine. Comes with a variety of different toppings and sizes as well. We tried their smoke meat poutine. The poutine has a very good sauce but the sauce was not too much. The fries as a result to that remains crispy. Really good place for poutine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKaHEpgYJ_i4gx4nGAWCYChr8F9Urnn6l8-6Rg\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"C B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbzTQhFKVcqZjQK1pnRxiEVBBOfrvfJM3weCHu6u4IMHg3IQ0Kxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to grab a traditional poutine and go about your day I think the small is a decent size portion unless you’re really hungry but for a quick eat it’s awesome and tastes good. This location doesn’t have much seating mostly a grab and go deal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMzMtuX1U6s4tUqLZLuS6Hg6HwI1ro0RdYN16w\u0026fid=0x0:0x349d349c0326e5f2"],"When":"2024-10-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BDub 247","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTG5NYTeVC-prr_d-bcu-QDkvwa3Gqy_E00b26Ty-0tmu9VN1_uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried this restaurant because the one we originally had targeted was too small and too busy. We are glad we gavr this place a chance.  They had a good selection of Taiwanese dishes that were well presented and nicely flavored. We recommend the beef noodle soup, noodles texture was perfect and the beef well flavored and tender.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlHNt8eGS3sK8ch6YdEUqDpN_uCCVfwvUZph5M&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Edward Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYTrZ3y9H_TYChGjolO7g9aMfEV8hcGDsa4gSml3kZwLXszA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"the worst pork rib rice I've ever had in my life.  there's no battery at all not crispy.  an oil tastes very old disgusting. the broccoli's are all cold.  either they don't have quality control in terms of who cooks.  or the other location at Richmond Centre is better.  not worth the price I expected some crispy traditional Taiwanese fried pork.   well this week and wet thing that is completely unacceptable.  I will not give any start but I have to choose one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7tWHGYW-6H8-6wo-xsUMhXS0XlwNs_bgq_a2j&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Vivian Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-009goZzhJiHZtSwlU5S0gEdtD2DCLpJdWBJ-g_5KCcg2yKcLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must try if you're in Richmond. Always a yummy time at this OG Taiwanese spot! Good for gatherings/family style meal or individual sets. Very reliable, delicious food and well crafted bubble tea, the boba pearls are always fresh. Fast service and friendly staff. The milk seafood hotpot is my favourite!!! 🤤💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ukgGyU_KOPAG4P_UOD6ISfU0VICaj1kGDnsh&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"TERRY CHENG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsg-oI6sco7O5Go48_oGM2GdPS9ywAc_QfXDXDKM3uhrlF3VpMxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is okay. Nothing to rave or complain about in terms of taste. My friend rice was not hot evenly through and the fried chicken nuggets were also a little bit too fried. The service was good, staff were helpful and accommodating. The food took a long time to come. Atmosphere is very Asian, IYKYK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3HOC-K7J9L1_8eePywggkUoTIrcCYON0b-5Jv&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"TL;DR: bad service, big portions and mediocre food.

Service - 0/1

Servers were rude. It’s inconvenient that we have to order food through the phone especially since we have 2 older grandparents with us. We asked a server if we could order without using the phone and she very rudely told us in Mandarin you have to order through the phone. No one gave us utensils until we asked. Only one super kind server! He had a cap on :) Props to you for being the only server here with proper service training

Food Quantity - 1/1

Big big portions, my sister and I could not finish our foods and had to bring them home for dinner. Lots of noodles and veggies in my vegetarian noodle soup!

Food Taste - 0.5/1

Food is nothing special, pretty mediocre! Loved that the squid tentacles were fried in a thin batter tho! The squid tentacles won the show :)

Overall: 2.5 stars ⭐️

TL;DR: bad service, big portions and mediocre food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR9dcfsArxhRddMaGS7JoTDOtanN3X3Urm5dlR&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2022-4-28"},{"Name":"Grace Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2Gi0ImD_jtFaRjI_I4TvVHE6110eG-TPY1JG8d59XQJNTtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was great, the service was fast, the only down side is that they dont take credit card. (Cash and e transfer only) first time paying with e transfer @ a resturant. Ordered the pearl bubble hot pot, to be honest, the soup was was too sweet. The 3cup chicken was really good though. Big portion that you will not able to finish in one meal. Also, orders are only taken by the app.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbkYIKElfqcf4oLssqlaMV3G_yp7qxrJ9WgwFy&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Phillip Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDxeRsOu_38Vanl3R1pdCGsmerEkppvahiUYpCxDQNLI-FIgqgQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They renovated a while back. This is some of the best places for food in the area. My wife loves it here. We live in Aldergrove and yes we would come all the way down here to eat. Food comes out quick and the staff is very attentive. Must try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ronald Retandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiVTWQFKjqXe4UnsBFRIZ7GxF9tGrva9JzQ7uYayyA9RXk6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing spot for good food and good drinks, never disappoints!

This spot has been our go to place for Taiwanese food for the last 8 years at least, and throughout all the revamp and the changes, their food has always been consistently great, with excellent service all around.

So many choices for food and drinks, and I think even after 8 years or so of coming here to eat, we have yet to try every single thing on the menu.

OG spot for sure, and we will keep coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP86gIJQNsMwvppMl42359O13vBEk7OV9IsKipn&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2021-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andrea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtitTk8k-z2gLRtkMnBjOAegfzoVXGVnilyEyjdNs17VKaHa-zRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place to spend a sunny day relaxing and having great food. Generous portion for the price, fresh and exceptional taste. They have the best sockeye salmon fish and chips among the others I've tried around the area. Fish is crunchy on the outside and juicy fresh on the inside. Fries are like the old style fish n chips place, perfectly done. They have the original mushy peas too. Plenty of seating if you go on a weekday. Amazing vibe and scenery. The order in the photo is one piece salmon with fries. They often give more pieces of fish when it's not large pieces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl8gQl_-utVh73W0PUBXeUXDCebbJufu9sT8wq&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was really good! Had the salmon and cod with fries. Love that the fries were refillable but I can only have so much. Nice place to spend a sunny afternoon. Seems packed though so had to share tables with other people","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuxb6hV0wii7AZkm0cLY5hRvSaAiDsXzgpQThb&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Ash S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2CN5xxAMsX06vKwd5ojsEM_6x2BAAstbpJEk7IvtIe1L_kQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of each fish & fries (cod, salmon, halibut) is a really good value. The salmon tasted the best, but overall the fish/batter was flavourless. Ordered poutine as well. Fries tasted bad and the gravy was even worse. No wonder they offer bottomless fries… only someone without tastebuds would get a refill. Great service and atmosphere though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa2juK4CnFC2lsNcdeugcK5xhkiA099VjbmC-O&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Scarlie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWq3LOFd-NPra4PyAHQVw5RAaigUu-JcQEsa3SZNCFUXwfAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was one of the worst fish and chips ive had. The fish came out drenched in oil, maybe the oil wasnt hot enough? Tartare sauce was also below average, just tasted like sour mayo. And the fries were flavorless and lacked any crisp. I do not recommend it to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQkiozPrkRGb0tuxHpWHvVz_TtwvFOoE-BsMkI&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"kim moody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf2dRNGk3YU1-QFRLG1cGYzt1R4CaOTz23s4uspdYGvJBaduk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outdoor seating only. Your meal is served in a paper cone. A tray is provided to hold it. Put your garbage away to protect the wildlife living on the river and clean your table. Enjoy your hot fish n chips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDGmAdOC-EBqQCmHZOkUz_zHn47sf9C_G_0e6T&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Satomi Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIegKBx5sCwT6_yLl2zLy7PWje96kCOyjjhjX7f9lTkkM3-YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was very disappointed. I heard that the fish and chips here are popular, so I was looking forward to eating it. I received the food and ate it at a nearby seat, but the French fries were cold and not fresh at all. I think they gave me what they fried a long time ago. The fried fish was just good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7itiizmBl4d204oQAxevMyi4fkverGF3enxYs&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"🐟🍟 Seaside Snacking at Pajo's Fish & Chips! 🌊🍴

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Visited Pajo's at Steveston Wharf with the family on a sunny weekend. Despite the hour-long queue, the wait was worth it for their Pacific Wild Cod & Fries and delectable Cod Tacos. It's clear this spot is a favorite among both locals and tourists! 🎣🌞

🌊 Plenty of outdoor seating lets you enjoy the lovely Steveston views—just watch out for those cheeky seagulls eyeing your meal! 🍟🐦

🍽️ Pajo's is more than just a meal; it's an experience, combining great food with a scenic location. Given its popularity, consider visiting a bit earlier to beat the crowds. It's definitely a must-visit for a delightful seaside dining experience! 🚤💺","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU9iRYbb89MEfDZLLX09uBfJC7lzWsQc0DVWIK&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Obviously one of the better places to get fish and chips in Steveston and it's quite popular.

Some tips... Those holes that you see in the tables... That's where you're supposed to put your cones of fish and chips. Sizes are pretty generous so come with your appetite.

We wound up ordering the 2pc cod and chips. I used to like when they offered fish bites (you could get an assortment of smaller fish pieces so you could try all the different types of fish).

Sophie loved coming here and sticking her nose through the holes in the table to grab some fries.

UPDATE Sep 2024: Not sure why it took us so long into this year for a revisit. Since we already had lunch, we just picked up an order of 1pc cod and chips ($14.50). It's still a good value if you ask me. Nothing like freshly made fish and chips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEFuFXZjfZMIldfi0k6yfjaPPaWU6Q7EUpQq3y&fid=0x0:0xfa4ef57c4a72ce3c"],"When":"2023-8-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Salim Khoso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6akCIMssNMGSreWBJt69YfIq5wWOpE6tVrg0PyeWmvQaJL3P5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This MacDonalds branch in Richmond is very convenient which is exactly on the main road. It has a drive through and a nice Parking place where you could park and dine in. The area inside is more than enough and the quality of food is good as always. There is also kids playing area and many nice spots to sit inside. I liked it and will surely stop by again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl-6RUCwHY5UfWHF_y4wzmQaxtQ6oGnawHNVeX&fid=0x0:0xcc6921d90f13bd73"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I tried the S’mores McFlurry. It was ok, nothing exceptional but it was a nice twist to a regular hot fudge sundae. I like the added crunch .. a bigger pieces of marshmallows would had been better. The marshmallow was sooooooo tiny, never seen one this small ..
This is the branch I often visit but today the service was not good. It took 20 minutes to get the McFlurry order.. not that the kitchen is busy because I saw the staff just chatting around .. I had to follow up twice to get it. It was not as difficult preparing it compared to the sandwiches and all the other orders were our and mine was still not and I had been there before the others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFZMpOVl_m2yXlTmHcIGwNlcau7B0WPbuqN70o&fid=0x0:0xcc6921d90f13bd73"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Cyrus C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCDFPbc-Gi-0Ad8TID__uqE2jF9GJpFCEEvGBl9B4UqR58A2_3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a great experience at McDonald’s! The seating was comfortable, providing a nice place to relax while enjoying my meal. The customer service was excellent—staff were friendly, attentive, and efficient. The food was served quickly and met the high standards McDonald’s is known for. It’s the perfect spot for a quick bite with consistent quality and a welcoming atmosphere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hansen Ong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7tjah4JBnSXL3t3H73pC9PB0Pa5YDElQ7r2_mjm2f3GjJXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They always over-toasted the buns, I did report to the manager but they claim that cannot change it or I can request less toasted... finally everytime I need to use scissors to cut out the "toxic" over-toasted parts... Did MacDonald have a food health guidelines? Anyone also have the same situation?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFN-KGykyc_K5Z0No-RyIMqw96GRK5jQXEOyBn&fid=0x0:0xcc6921d90f13bd73"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"rocky constant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWszrstfNu5K6Xj-WLZqVyyZPrK-Lb_17AjfYlder_AeIBKxyoLZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The menu-breakfast are small.

Needs to be expanded because it's way to crowded, maybe because of the seat arrangement.

Otherwise, everything is great! Amazing play area for the kids","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz_QABR3g8bxWNRNrF1lAzciPlTnSkQE-N84ol&fid=0x0:0xcc6921d90f13bd73"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Miguel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2-IecaW59mf5An8MQhVKnDSGccnAb2LnzyUyZ8x0x0xs5Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visit this McDonald's frequently and, while there have been a few mix-ups with my orders, the staff always ensures they make it right. During my latest visit, I had the pleasure of interacting with Izzy, who truly went above and beyond. She was incredibly prompt and friendly when I called to address my concern, apologizing for the issue and assuring me it would be resolved on my next visit. When I returned, she exceeded my expectations with a thoughtful gesture that really made my day. I'm so grateful for her assistance and for the hard work of the entire team at this location. They consistently provide great service, and I truly appreciate it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfVa-fastbGVL3MhJOGcVaaalERRei_AUaJwQxYAZB1ubj-D8q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best food at a McDonalds in a long time.   This happens to be the first McDonalds built in Canada.   Fast service and great fries!  The way they used to be in the states.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvS62ByQPtH3EhVpUkM7DlYFBGKrumbsyHPnjO&fid=0x0:0xcc6921d90f13bd73"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Steven Matthews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKd0qACQtsvo4_0gN0_SmKbwDKTxBeU3LelbVpdqfersToblqmq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice location, very clean outside. I live in the Seattle area and was amazed at the cleanliness and service. I enjoyed the poutine and apple pies. We don't have poutine south of the border and the pies were different (in a good way).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1eXBwTwC-SvXvdyZqPh7jozabB0LlXQittT7q&fid=0x0:0xcc6921d90f13bd73"],"When":"2024-3-20"}]

title: Cha Don
category: Hong Kong style fast food restaurant
address: 4540 Number 3 Rd Unit 1175, Richmond, BC V6X 4E4
about: [{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A decent HK cafe style breakfast in the Empire Centre food court on No 3. If you crave the satay beef with vermicelli, or ham and macaroni in soup combo with egg sandwich and milk tea or coffee, then you'll likely enjoy this place!

There are other similar ones nearby so I wouldn't say this is the best, but it's still good! The pork cubes in macaroni and soup is quite spicy, so if you aren't used to it, I'd highly recommend the satay beef instead.

The seating can get busy, but people usually eat and leave, so you don't need to wait too long.

Note that this is cash only, and you can't get a receipt in case that matters for you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyMlwIGVdeWFCgoGSyafc1wgeyoXcj3FZGeeqg&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Gabrielle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPZLarUKpKgUXVfA9tOjdGjVW91k303l5VxK6A47szHf5BAzECDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s such a great value. They have an all day breakfast menu for $10.99 +tax and comes with a drink. The breakfast item I ordered was the egg and noodles in the picture. The other dish also a great value at $13.09+tax. Doesn’t come with a drink though. The food is decent. Service was good. Can’t complain.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsti8j8mcGCkrVnAozArQokaNFPL4oD5kO00ed&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"dabossdud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8qzSvvMAD5ffHxPidijA4FBHoh1MqBeLVTwN70J852UBbgpO7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The greatest place for brunch in all of greater Vancouver. Peak food, great prices, filling portions. I actively gatekeep this place from those who don't know. It's just that good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1tSojhtrKpC2n6-MnVfpOf3X1M6zu9Mo5TnI6&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Eva L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgGb8JAmA0gLaeP9hoLSZHReJNjbWXgY4r3aXF3YlCOFBh2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been at their sister restaurant Cha Kee many times so I was excited when I heard they opened another location. This location serves baked rice / spaghetti along with all-day breakfast. Loved the curry and black peppery chicken baked rice - large portions for $14! Another favorite item is their satay beef noodle - best in Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEd4ctFWeJrhWVaVP1rIl1gr2cqMgSToJ_i7Q-&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Justin Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdx52Kikwc0qLXVIQ56I9QgSYzQs4FktHZQJNeWk16LhVxDTSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food not bad, service was ok, even they lost my order, little mixed up. Food court vibe

Scrambled eggs was very good, milk tea was another good one

If I’m in the area, I might go there more often. Overall good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtx7f46S4bUKC0HIWYXulS4ZL0iwqKw_Eu-yJN&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This little food court cafe opened recently after they closed from Hong Kong.  Brought back breakfast combo A, B, C type of breakfast memory.  Price is exceptionally reasonable with the quality of food.

Recommend to go on weekdays and expect to wait 20-30min during weekends but worth it.  Scramble egg is so….good!  HK style milk tea is smooth 😋

Keep it up! We need more of these!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLEM9mstLsOIEGYUf0lbSrBA-Ul_EvZ25QEwyY&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Karn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmjXpRjC4se_W84BOJQWwjV0HACJzZR0EdIGtmqM6E-Be4MsV_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just as amazing as the first location Cha Kee, once you receive your food, you realize what all the rave is about.

Everything they cook, from the eggs, fish fillet, chicken, to the toast is perfectly done.

The milk tea has also improved, there is little dry taste. A very good milk tea.

Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbFa1yeqBTnAKVUQnDo0ljpAfXmqS377pS79dP&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"REGGIE NRI MAH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwcAfVQbjygBNPR1GqmfGPlFduk4OQyY-y__TAVw60yM9C12J_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a weekly sometimes more than one time a week regular to Cha Don for lunch with my co-workers. They have all the classic HK breakfast dishes that their original kiosk “Cha Kee” has + way more options included the baked Rice and Spaghetti entrees.

Be aware this is a Kiosk inside the Empire Center Food Court. It does get really busy during peak hours. Weekends I’ve heard people waiting up to 40mins for their baked items when it’s peak so please consider visiting outside peak lunch hours.

The food is all very good and probably the best HK style breakfast in Vancouver

5 Star for Food
4 Star for Service
3 Atmosphere since its a food court that could be cleaner","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9PSXoUqaA5PRv-9u9VwUP9ODUtFlP9x-_vRpn&fid=0x0:0x5fea62aa0a3b1ba7"],"When":"2024-12-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kylee muri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhtYis-Yv9RYNulaLIxPyBp7gsGMLv71dABOTyGdzl1Zy7Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came in the other night to Moxies as a treat to ourselves after a long day of travel- we were tired and hoping for a peaceful night and great food. Ours hopes definitely were achieved, honestly surpassed. Food was incredible and just to our liking! And our Server, Morgan, was lovely, funny, and so helpful to us! She definitely made the experience incredible and totally worth the long day of traveling lol. 10/10 would recommend to friends and family swinging by the Richmond area in the future- thanks for a great night guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgXF-DsFlhf_sUdbhtbM1qWQlKaZatVRVDwYZy&fid=0x0:0xf4303da5897c1038"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Kathleen Foxx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcOVJIXH5m7xjkzuAq_NjOFEHPMfLE6Vq2ZyFEARHQUHggJsI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Danny was awesome! Super friendly! We talked about our travels and flights and Trail and Vancouver and Toronto. The food was excellent and it’s always great when our server is so friendly and enthusiastic and personable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZX1Rv4Wr91HeEHRT7stGtXMT3fZzLMwjJeOqW&fid=0x0:0xf4303da5897c1038"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Jason Dawson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWF4kVd4exK6tNW1ZvvFuJexUbmYUyIMqGrqOedX3sFaJUR21BD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to Moxies Richmond based on a recommendation from our hotel. It not only met our expectations, it exceeded it! The food was delicious and wholesome, the service was exceptional thanks to our amazing host Chantal - she made our experience so much more entertaining and welcoming. Thanks for making our first night back in Vancouver so memorable and enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxlPRX0Lobo48903q95fjlpDgPZT7Q-dLCwr9y&fid=0x0:0xf4303da5897c1038"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Tin Hau Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrV5KFx8y73dRvXBZgqv_jT9t2B-9MDhW1PX-l3wXAx8c1ruc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are planning. To host our company Cmas party at Moxies so we decide to play a visit. Service is great and food was delicious. Although we have finalized the party venue I do look forward to return to enjoy the amazing food again~!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcQtyaDytSsZowDlzUKogmn_Q3pfq1vBCVF6Bu&fid=0x0:0xf4303da5897c1038"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Reg Belyea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLXkwhPLhl6PTOpWtztQvj60Mca6EyvG5NHU0tbTkXJ6YbgXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We took our son and his GF out for supper. The waitress was very friendly, the atmosphere was excellent and the drinks and meals were very tasty! We’ll be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFtDPYqkdyvnGXFAe9gk9dV2K-n9ObVQzI9q0O&fid=0x0:0xf4303da5897c1038"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Andrew Suba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwTCE4l_t4X6Q1PBN5hhMhcGovzja4JU1w6yq_Yl5aKyfCfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Moxie's the other week for the first time and was surprisingly amazed by the place! I've always passed by the place and wondered how good it really is since all my friends have been saying countless good things about the place, until I finally got to go for myself. The food was great like no other restaurant and the vibes just made me feel so comfortable! Even our host was amazing! If I remember correctly, her name was Nicole! She definitely made the whole experience complete and enjoyable!:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ray Brig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItuOwZguBIRxuTEoJmbUU74nr6sWiqHfpbRVETbtpo8dxeTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the Rib Eye…juicy, seared well and medium rare to my liking. The kids pizza was a big portion and is well made with quality ingredients. The flourless chocolate cake was rich and not too sweet, just perfect. Service was prompt and polished.

This is quite possibly the best dining experience I’ve had in Vancouver. I only wish I learned about it sooner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPowXahcKzmPMMLZ-fISRN4A2Iv6T2mFrZjS5lI&fid=0x0:0xf4303da5897c1038"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"**Moxies Richmond Restaurant Review**
- **Location**: 3233 St Edwards Dr, Richmond, BC, V6X 3K4

**Food:**
- **Thai Coconut Soup**: This dish was exemplary—rich and creamy with a perfect balance of tangy and salty flavors. It merits a score of 9 out of 10.
- **Calamari**: While the portion size was modest, the seasoning was impeccable. It earned an 8 out of 10.
- **Chicken Wings**: These wings were outstandingly meaty and flavorful. They rightfully deserve a 9 out of 10.
- **Rib eye Steak**: Though it could have benefitted from a pinch of extra salt, the overall quality was impressive. It receives an 7 out of 10.
- **New York Steak**: well-balanced seasoning, this steak was a delightful dish. However, by the time we finished the appetizers, it was not as warm as it should have been. It earns a 7 out of 10.

**Ambiance**: The restaurant provides a spacious and cozy environment, making it an inviting place to dine. The interior design strikes a balance between modern and comfortable, contributing to a relaxed dining experience.

**Service**: The service was adequate, with staff members being generally attentive, though not exceptionally so. Improvement in timing would enhance the overall experience.

**Price**: The pricing is reasonable, offering good value for the quality of food served. However, the overall value would be rated at 3 out of 5.

**Verdict**: Moxies Richmond Restaurant is definitely worth a revisit. The food quality is high, and the ambiance is inviting. The only area for improvement is the service timing. By the time we finished the appetizers, our steaks were not as warm as they should have been.

**Summary**: Moxies Richmond Restaurant offers a commendable dining experience with its delicious food, cozy ambiance, and fair pricing. The slight service hiccup is a minor flaw in an otherwise positive experience, making it a restaurant worth returning to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw6Iep1PTAq6vg97ou2EkfH8Z_rw7shDDqSKM4&fid=0x0:0xf4303da5897c1038"],"When":"2024-6-25"}]
