user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sylvia Lan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZOrignIxZtNQr5fqOb9lpoqxcw0LTJa79u5ODK0MTYwholQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Expect to stand in line for 15-30 minutes to order at the cashier, then another 15-25 minutes of wait time for the food to be served. This place is always packed and seating is limited at this food court.

Cha Kee is famous for their creamy scrambled egg sandwich, but I definitely won’t wait in line for this again as it’s not that specialty to worth my time. On the other hand, satay beef on instant noodles was good and scallion sauce chicken on rice was even better! They were both flavourful and very delicious. We’ve ordered less spicy for the curry fish ball, but it was still very spicy and the spice overwhelmed the aroma & taste of the curry. They’ve increased the price recently, but it’s still worth the visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuNLkI001Rgb-0Q2ZGthWZXY1TnQ663cnLNh50&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Colin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7h35ZtHaveCK9eq8-mDb7BmK8EeHfVN1usnvgcw8J_phkrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Hong Kong style food court joint.  In the corner beside washroom.  Large lineup on a weekend morning, by far most popular place there.  Take the FF elevator to reach with a stroller.  Menu flashes too quickly, had to take a picture to view properly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxDKB8WXhc8twOkMgwWfmraZ2QYhTp6FkW6-uY&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jaz Cheerios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWSsqMl_UJjmJASBF3hbFK4Z9HKEEe-XSiGeuCWW8bRGEK2Y5Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m impressed. The siu mai dumpling was super soft and tasty. I’m normally not a siu mai kinda person but I had to order to try because that blew my mind away being super Hong Kong authentic. I used to go to the other hk style cafe near by in the late 90s-2000s. After coming back, that store wasn’t as good as it used to be so that’s why I want to try something new and came across this one.

The Fishball was great but the chicken scallion was a little less impressed. I felt the chicken was a bit soggy and not completely crispy and not enough scallion sauce (Personal preference) Nonetheless, I think it’s not too bad.

And too bad the satay beef noodle was all sold out. Will come and try again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgMsrGDaBOxFcrKPk19tY0sOKob_0ZLc9S8Q2R&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"K’s coffee lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-385uQOflrqOxsV0QWsdIyhv-rxdZ7rLwLnLPmzpfPGzr9P6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place truly brought back memories of Hong Kong! The satay flavors and the soup base were both authentic and satisfying. The scrambled eggs were smooth and hearty, and the Hong Kong-style milk tea was perfectly up to standard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGFzDmYj2VBw7MXVRDSojMwkKD_7RdihefMn4&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Jason Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuQkBpFBNxfDVCdPMZPlKNkod3AabrNZg7qk8g7qYjlMsYKR78=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to grab HK style breakfast and lunch. Decent prices and the food is delicious. Would really recommend the pork chop. Food court can get very busy on the weekend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA8mlfsfq_OmMNBlQBrEsv5hhWiqsYBEkBl57R&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Smore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjSaUf7vOl2hGYXhAgxREDrK4inMpSiptrY_i_pmB_G1dvx0aI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you’re craving for cha chan teng breky,  this place will really hit the spot! No fuss, just order their signature “Satay Beef Instant Noodles Combo” with scrambled eggs & toast.  Their cup of yuan yang is ⭐️!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDZNQZ-s3k8absdLcAzobDefw40JNjgCiP1hDh&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"X C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWDLyl13mprvEmj4FbFEB0vsaF1P1nXZvaRVd_9Tu32pZ9oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Needless to say, it was a big rice dish with lots of meat, rice and some cabbage at the bottom. (See the mountain of meat and rice in the photo). Expect at least 15-20 mins wait for both ordering and getting the rice dish.  I think this place is cash only.

The only inconvenience would be the food court itself. It’s very busy with tight seating, not a lot of tables. Parking is a bit tight as well. Beware of questionable drivers 😅.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPEspEYxkxoYVdrd4uYcZuE_CpzvGz_LFT4JiO&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Clement Chew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwKhl3mEn2gCZF6VdKbi7gB6oYfqEyv4ScXRvTHDS2H04sB70nmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I finally had the chance to visit the famous Cha Kee. The chicken with green onion on instant noodles was incredible—truly a unique dish I haven't seen anywhere else. The creamy scrambled eggs were the best I've had locally and are definitely best enjoyed on-site.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSN0pW9uWmqqp8K0okVp3yj4MCuqQ_7LvFeuHq&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jade-Reanna Page","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVshWjv-fEH3l-iY85L1_MKQV9AYUbpiqASu83weQKL87dRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lulu’s burgers are by far the best burgers I’ve ever had! The bacon jam Boursin melts in your mouth, I don’t know how she does it! The longanesa burger hits the spot every time, but a fav is definitely classic Lulu’s. The little crispy bit on the edge are sooo satisfying, and yet still sooooo juicy in the middle! The house made sauces are everything, it’s all so well thought out. Every burger is a new experience, definitely a must try!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV3EbalHbqMMtASyw6NcJ1jXNe8BB_yCFkhQRA&fid=0x0:0x95d6c149503b0ae7"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Cici N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu7mZH8nBSPWe5_6B2A2PSU2g63qgAyuimOI-E5DNsDjTWmKYW6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the burger at the night market. By far, one of my favorite smash burger joint in Vancouver, and here's why. Every condiment / burger filling taste homemade, flavorful, and unique. Each burger is different from each other and thought out perfectly. No boring fillings. It was tough picking because they all sounded delicious. We ended up trying the longaniza burger. It's juicy, flavorful, the bun was soft nicely buttered, the patty was juicy and crispy, and the perfect amount of topping. Ratio of everything was spot on. Simple and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb4LOj0RPkDi63A3aUTDEBu8t4gw74hwO_AG4e&fid=0x0:0x95d6c149503b0ae7"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Scott F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3-hugGS8inN3Cv_w2ZGO_UqXeIc5dQNSYC1nMt8JlaGw_RJQq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I only go to the night market a few times a year. I was fortunate enough to discover this gem of a burger place last year and I am happy they came back!  I have had quite a few smash burgers before but this is by far my favorite place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDCJR2tYkl5QJgiHIVZCKzGq0QK70MxylYA6IQ&fid=0x0:0x95d6c149503b0ae7"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Lauren Mcara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJP_IjvqKVlEN1zG_5ryIsIwKiI0d0Qk2yST6eOeoin1jpNYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lulu burger is by FAR the best burger I've ever had. I highly suggest saving some of your appetite at the night market for one of the amazing variety of burgers they have. The burgers are also great to take home and they are just as good later.
I will probably have many more Lulu burgers this summer (:","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcf7jyzyam-8EyaqIES1hcfB37UhVU8So1w3BvqnmaFJLgNaXqKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"$15 for the smallest worst attempt of a burger I've ever seen. This whole market is a disgusting greasy over priced event. Save your money and go to a real restaurant with proper service for the same or less.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nestor Brito","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7hetOIOHluPYYQNk0VYpbraTjzDPciWuGPyRIiVTwvs_0Abg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of the tasties burgers I've had and a must visit stand at the Richmond Night Market. Varied options with unique flavors. You can really tell how much care they put into their recipes as they all feel fine tuned with love. Perfectly toasted high quality bread, top notch American cheese, crispy smashed beef, and excellent ingredient-to-sauce ratio.

I also appreciate their use of an IR receiver to notify you when your order is ready. Gives you a chance to look around or move to a less busy spot while waiting. Plus, it's one of the few spots that takes card, which is very convenient.

The Night Market is full of interesting things but some may feel underwhelming. Definitely not the case with these burgers. Ended up trying Truffle Aioli, Bacon Jam, and Longaniza, and would love to visit again 🍔💯","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"taylor adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtg2dRR8Vu2bMbfSsTlzOrONfOp2E9EfZ3nGj3PKww5y64Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place so much , look forward to visiting weekly for these burgers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo9ErZo-iMhSu7rPZEVYAJhdhKlDBWDTMhC2Ml&fid=0x0:0x95d6c149503b0ae7"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"tia martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7rfj4ke4RsatncrHsMD5UXz5pqWuO-9tpx-eI92oqsHWSYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wasn’t a much of a burger person until I tried Lulu Burger and now I don’t want to eat anywhere else. I am genuinely obsessed and at the mercy of the Lulu Gods. The amount of times I’ve paid to get into the night market just for a Lulu is astounding but worth it everytime. Expertly curated, crafted, and cooked. You couldn’t find a better burger. 1000% recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"H PC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0oJRCLIX8JB_vhTC4tXdPmpnVu0RGljA1ooM4VZX0HbCHtI1E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The BBQ ribs were  flavorful, with a rich smoky taste complemented by a tangy barbecue sauce. It will be better if the meat fell off the bone easily.

The clam chowder was creamy and hearty, filled with chunks of tender clams and potatoes. The flavor was a bit light.

The halibut was perfectly cooked, flaky yet moist. It was a fresh and delightful seafood option.

The calamari was crispy and not greasy, served with a zesty marinara sauce for dipping. The squid rings were tender and the batter had a hint of seasoning, making it a satisfying appetizer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcLa6kSq3t8_yL-JKiFO59Se0Ys9_J81TMO9_z&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Elvis Foster Jr.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsN6ZkhmQPh8W_5TojnQElHouzrCwY_TlKIswfxFoBKkdw96K5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place has always been a conversation favorite. Even if the name changes, the quality remains the same. The lamb was cooked to perfection. Burger plate wad beautifully plated! Shout out to Remy, who was unbelievably consistent with his energy and charm. The wife and I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8tX96LIob4BbTt_Qxu-HHkLKDY6lNh9ha-aE5&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Michelle McColm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1WQtRAhkW7mnPU-df8IpqHtjugxsr2m2q7yrxqJr8XIKEQve1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really have nothing bad to say about this place!

My partner and I were victims of the Westjet strike and we ended up having a 27 hour layover in Vancouver. We booked a room and after getting settled we went on the hunt for dinner.

We stumbled across this little gem and at first I was nervous that we were underdressed because the restaurant itself gave off a certain decadent vibe. However, no one batted an eye as we were led to our table. The waitress, same name as me, Michelle, was kind, helpful and knowledgeable of the menu. We knew we would be looking at more expensive prices but nothing seemed out of the ordinary.

I ordered the Blackened Halibut Burger and the flavors were incredible! I could've eaten two! My partner ordered the Chicken Pasta and he said it was amazing. We both decided to splurge and go for desert. He's a sucker for the New York Cheesecake with Fruit coulis while I went for the Apple Struddle with Vanilla Bean Gelato. It was so yummy! I don't even know how to describe it other than delicious.

When the bill arrived we noticed the deserts were missing. We called Michelle over and asked if she had missed them. She explained that she felt bad for our situation and wanted to do something kind for us to make our situation better! She also made a joke about wanting us to remember Vancouver in a good way! Well, we definitely will. 😊 I'm so glad we found 75West that evening. It had been a long and gruelling two days of travelling and that meal/experience more than made up for it. We were in Hawaii for a week and it was the best meal we had eaten. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAj4ZVF0eAkv4X2EFbobiJDQBFYoHhznxQh71y&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I stayed here for work. This restaurant opened earlier and closed later than other restaurants in the area. I have been there for early breakfast and late dinner.

The food was not bad but I felt conflicted about the service. I witnessed one server see my order was ready but kept ignoring it. I was corrected by my pronunciation by another server. Meanwhile, there was served by a Japanese lady who appeared to be the supervisor multiple times. She was super nice and efficient. However, I did try to go to somewhere else if possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjCcInTlrHiqd4vaZmdWtSdepIg9PEFbD4AFOC&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Eric","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfVa-fastbGVL3MhJOGcVaaalERRei_AUaJwQxYAZB1ubj-D8q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It the best place.   Service is slow at best.   Food was not very warm.  Soup was cool.  Nachos were just ok.   Disappointed for sure.   The McDonalds I had earlier down the street was 1000 times better.   Martini was delicious though.   It did take 30 min to get.   😵‍💫","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr17uJ7sPwU3Nn-fasoB_JzYbqp51B7zhLDNdF&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"marlene romero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnFhJJj5SHzKzKtQwqDnf_jHDKkRdg6koUYP20iPxFjqyh8d-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered the Thanksgiving 3-course dinner as a take out. It’s not the first time I got food from them, and this was the second time they forgot to pack the soup that was part of the dinner. I called to tell them, like I did previously but this time I didn’t have the time to go back to re-pickup the missing soup. Staff I spoke got my number and told me the manager would follow up the following day, but I never got the callback. The turkey was mediocre, the gravy was lumpy, the vegetables needed more time to be more chewable. The only course that was on par was the Brussels sprouts appetizer. The dessert choices were good but portion sizes were small. For the price, it was underwhelming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgPw095iGKwz_kW9OlLCCuuFJk7usK9Ty2MH4-&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a restaurant situated inside Marriott hotel
Comfortable sitting , great atmosphere
Server is so attentive to a point become annoying - they kept asking how we were doing
We came for breakfast and taste is good and presentation of the food is great
Coffee also good with strong flavors
Free parking , just register parking with hostess
Actually there’s 3 hotel there they share the big parking lot you can park anywhere except for those with reserved signs
Enter the restaurant through the hotel entrance then turn right…
$32 with tips for breakfast + coffee  is a bit pricey
They offer sour dough option
Hotel also very accommodating on substitute fruit instead of hash for me","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsykIl1-5WpHax4cO4VRx87mu4H3Eh4tzSb0x6&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Kernel Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtEHV1jtxb69Uptu3uOHvbUiLbDXNYSqYfQ9nJ618UDcO-13i7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service with reasonable price. My kid love their kids menu and the vegetarian pasta very much, and the seafood chowder soup suprises me and my wife, we both love it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsO9o05t6tYktnBVAr6H0Z-KqcUlRxssh6x_6B&fid=0x0:0x51c369f09984fb05"],"When":"2024-2-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The space in Robson is quite small, take out only. I ordered the Whole Mozzarella and it was sooooo good! Super crunchy and the inside was stuffed generous with mozzarella that literally melts and pulls when I bit on it. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnw08RBsp_mnjeIFVj8RQwVE9LfeAff359yDn6&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV3dRExUU6CcyKh7lSLVNfnclkZ3QvSxHjyu6gjmW4Ii5hPUY7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For the price, it’s a solid snack that satisfies. I had the cheddar corndog, but I think the regular beef corndog might have been a better choice, as the cheddar hotdog was quite rich. The exterior/dough was wonderfully crunchy and savory. Plus, the option to customize the sauce adds an interesting touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrWF4AeZB6TzsuInah6QyepLx2qTy2YG9tM-w9&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chung Chun has been a family favourite for years. They have kept a very good standard of food quality ‘til now. We got a box to fill up our cravings.  It's a variety of original Changchun (beef), Gamsung potato (beef&chicken sausage), ramen chip (beef), double cheese(beef&chicken), and whole mozzarella. All are delicious and satisfying.They also have drinks but the  downside  is there’s no place to eat. It’s a challenge to enjoy the food while hot unless you are parked nearby.  Customer service is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3OGP393MeiOWpGyq5Pk5v8Z_WXeNiRgayYKov&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Stuart Zatorski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSDRYqSOt57Z5cwdG02l7ycmr0cXhkj4Am4zko8chGPj1z4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Servers were exceptionally nice, corn dogs were exactly what you expected and wanted, waffle fries were a bit small but still done perfectly. It’s a small shop no where to sit but it adds to the character of the place! Did the volcano corn dog, great flavour, crispy outside, tons of condiments, I’ll be back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqmRG8sahyTmRiuXyNgBHFc1lb6Vlv4Ct28AlP&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the hot dogs here; they're crunchy and delicious with lots of toppings and various sauces. If you love corn dogs, definitely give them a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpWAIoW27rm31VuLKHugnCgiFtARTihO2Sj_L8&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried this wired hotdog place for the first time. I ordered half mozzarella half beef and it waffle fries. Half mozzarella one was interesting and delicious before I get to the meat part. Fries was nice too. Customer service was respectful as well. The down side is there us no place in and out of the restaurant to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnZSUv2jg2kQx_GhJJ9EyaOswt0kpeXDkWJrOu&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZkgGiC5-j-O-VzVgprqqwroxXjpq6xanKiXxkhY0oFzPVaY4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This tiny corner serves up tasty rice hotdogs, where one is big enough to be a light meal for a small person.   This is takeaway-only as there's no place to sit, and there's a table for standers but the place is really too small to support anyone eating in.

Because the hotdog is covered with rice mochi, it doesn't feel very heavy or oily, even when deep-fried.

I tried the half sausage, half cheese dog.

I liked the mozzarella in it: The mozzarella comes out soft, stringy and melted, which goes well with the crunchy shell.  It's very comforting/feel-good to eat.

The beef hotdog inside isnt anything special, it doesnt taste like 100% meat, it's just kind of soft processed meat... But the outside of the dog makes up for it. So the meat is definitely not costco hotdog level, it is almost like luncheon meat texture, so that could bother some people. It wasn't meaty enough for me. (Probably a typical "American sausage" texture in other korean/asian food places too when they incorporate foreign ingredients, like into hotplates and hotpots etc. Its supposed to be a bit light i guess?)

Next time ill prob try something with the chicken in it to see what it tastes like too.

Extra toppings come at a price, I think $1-2 extra.  But
there are many sauces and cheese/butter powders for free you can choose that they put on for you. I think i took some chipotle mayo and bbq and some of the powders.

Popular place for young people as it's also hard to find any takeout food under $10 that actually tastes good. If you are very hungry, you might need two dogs that would make it about $15 pre-tax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqu3F3gthiT_HezhQmGV4arsYPLukOq1ldEbSe&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Phoebe Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBobFZYdkUy0kQUzZxOyqZ7NGAyh6Lk-gQMCkP71H6TcT_C47A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is delicious and definitely an affordable snack or meal. They start around $6 and you can add however many sauces and powders on top. The staff working were all so sweet and welcoming. Just be aware there’s no seating inside so it’s take out only~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwKxU-HxFnswkibCGPSctyKMBeu4vcg8bo2C-h&fid=0x0:0x718bbd575e412752"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jesse Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqc4Js_hbpSJyGd7HxE4_GSDRsIjYI5FHNMKdapkO7Vpm1mm0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is definitely one of my favorite egg waffles I have tasted in a long while, including those in Toronto and in Los Angeles.\n\nI like the original recipe, but my family like the salted egg version, both so flavorful and tasted just what I remember from Hong Kong. Our fruit drinks were good and refreshing too. We specifically like the grapefruit and passion fruit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPkE09bYQ8a76hexs3JOIbFPOOrUp439Z-ylHh\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Eggette House is a delightful spot that never disappoints! Their banana bubble waffle is absolutely delicious, with a perfect blend of crispiness and sweetness. The house special milk tea is rich and flavorful, making it a great companion to any of their treats. I was also pleasantly surprised by the Ribene Sparkling coffee, which offers a unique and refreshing twist. The quality and taste of everything here are consistently excellent. If you're in the area, Eggette House is a must-visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaCIRUBydXMlnrNHRDZmAlgZdqIUrQ_wuk-cKG\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was sooo good! I highly recommend to check this place out while you’re in Richmond! The egg waffles are not really sweet, and they have stuffing inside. We ordered the Portuguese egg tart one. The wait was around 10 minutes but it was worth it, and the portion is really big too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjgvOmm3PoEvL02QuT0RhT48QnpOrlA1uiD9Y2\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"R L (Froyo)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCqdbgWznhU2EnuYICmvYBK8n_bnBg-Riap63TsJBz3enHzr0T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a bubble waffle with egg tart filling and it was great! The wait was a little long at lunch hour but it was fun to watch them making waffles","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS3XGOhAzlsS3lKYyQlO4nN0GE4gqTcM2InGEE\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"While it is quite difficult to craft the perfect bubble waffle, many vital elements, such as inner softness and crispiness, were lacking in the original version of the Bubble Waffle💪 On the contrary, the Hong Kong style milk tea experience was delectable, having the milk tea's unique milky and authentic flavors. 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_aMs5ub4rZ3dQAchsf4yMYwlQxzMwlu6MvjMv\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Khrys Burden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLZn9q35VDgCHOO8Jp2vSx9zNhESZQLmPGDnMXvFiAf8ERA2-v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the oreo flavor which I think they did well since you can really taste the oreo. They make the waffles fresh to order so they're both fluffy and crispy at the same time. Best to eat them straight away as they get chewy over time (but still good!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0TsgqFY7EhqZsHzmGvJrvVQevMYgHpLn8CtiL\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Shannon K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxjI21y6OvOpQaUtVQbBMPN8zACLBZJNsUniJUWz2xEJus_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bubble waffle was really yummy!!! I would recommend the original rather than the other flavour because it’s too filling and I could only eat like two of them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2k9i6w1faGhT9XOXUJaXVOOVNngAe5CJ0hKjm\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Kenrick Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Qlr-7avGGG_gw-sdMVAbZ5vTLZXDpwcJ4A7g2sjiGekUnOtm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Portuguese egg tart bubble waffle was great. Crispy on the outside and on bubbles with the perfect ratio was creamy on the inside. Hard to make every bite even though. The milk tea had a great balance of flavors as well. The bean cubes were interesting. Overall enjoyed a lot but one thing is I found all the flavors to be very mild; I wish I got more chocolate from the cube and a little stronger egg tart intensity from the bubble waffle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM9tShpQRciSXU_oT78n77uOa73IX6X_2BqtTV\u0026fid=0x0:0x9d0bdba48816def0"],"When":"2022-7-30"}]

title: CAVU Kitchen Bar
descriptions: Stylish, contemporary restaurant serving gourmet burgers & globally influenced mains at the Hilton.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Sheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyqqdoSxO8_09hTasSMmxRKIAiD7yhaUMiugV8IG4FPeT3KDoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cavu Kitchen Bar in Richmond certainly knows how to draw a crowd with their National Burger Day BOGO deal.

The initial service was commendable, with a server who was both attentive and friendly, setting a positive tone for the meal.

The nachos, however, were a letdown, lacking the robust topping variety one might expect, and while the cheese quality surpassed that of Good Co, the absence of salsa left the dish feeling incomplete. The smash burgers, a highlight in theory, fell short in execution with under-seasoned patties and disproportionately large buns that detracted from the overall moisture and flavor.
The fries, too, were a disappointment, promising crunch yet delivering a softness that defied their well-cooked appearance.

As the evening progressed and the restaurant filled, the attentive service waned, with a noticeable delay in receiving the bill. Observations of other staff members attending to tasks while my server was overwhelmed suggest a potential mismanagement of duties. This experience leaves one pondering the disparity between personal experience and the glowing reviews Cavu Kitchen Bar has received.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6_X3uyaS0PsCnyoMPkXmBxzbp3rrTSI0fLxKY&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Reilly videos Games","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDebdSxW4i3fCCuDyEg4qjUboi7kZm60BzHcCT6gi5MHuU-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I decided to throw my husband, a surprise 50th birthday party and CAVU popped up in my list. I live in Richmond which made this place super convenient and having my workplace close by I had great experience coming to this place before. With a limited budget in mind, I also don’t want to compromise the food, ambiance & overall experience for our love ones and this place had checked all the boxes for me. Dharm & Rishi communicated very well & right away each step of the way. They are so accommodating including menu options, set up and small request here & there were all assisted in a very timely and smooth fashion. Their staff was friendly & helpful and had smile on their faces the whole time, we had a lovely bartender throughout the night (shoutout to him for being so kind and generous! He was the cherry on top of our night) and everyone was as thankful as we are- such a positive environment to be! The ambience is restaurant style but had that classy vibe that makes you feel that you are in a special place. The food was all delicious, it was a buffet and the food was filled all the time, plus the staff at the carving station had this great welcoming smile when he was serving the food. Parking was free for everyone as well which is fantastic. I got a lot of compliments from my guest, thanks to Dharm , Rishi and their Cavu Restaurant team- certainly made my husband party more memorable & special than it already is. As for the price, it is unbeatable and very affordable, amazing places like this still exist! It’s definitely a hidden gem in Richmond and I highly highly recommend everyone to support restaurants like these who strives to provide amazing service while being mindful of the prices they ask from their customers. Thanks again Cavu Restaurant team, Kudos to all of you!  - MB","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgfA5tQHqmeD7PcwSc7_-abniS3wrq-c3fEGxM&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Elvis Foster Jr.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsN6ZkhmQPh8W_5TojnQElHouzrCwY_TlKIswfxFoBKkdw96K5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm pleasantly surprised with the food here. Well presented. Good flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvZ5BDOmWLGLL7g4hPL2Ui4T499kfaFdA7r7US&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Dorothy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2J6gxEc9-bp4oRKRy789Vjh-yJKbnbcdw-Mc_iV5gPcomB_o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The risotto is very soft and mushy. The chicken burger was mediocre, the chicken was quite thin. The pork belly and ribs was ok. Our server was nice and attentive. This restaurant is not busy so it's a good place for meetings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgKf47tip41GBMfMeJmTM_ippUxFnPPmht1sO1&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2023-12-14"},{"Name":"Julian Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmVaZUvzqUEe4YBgOKpkfc-l6TCT14mUfdd7xJk7HbssYnUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went for lunch on Tuesday for their BOGO special. It was half full when we arrived. It took 40 plus minutes for our burgers to arrive. I also ordered a seafood chowder.  It was bland, and it seemed like they ran out of salt and seasonings. I put salt and black pepper myself, and still no taste. I can only taste the sweetness of the onion. Both burgers were bland too. The vegan burger was soft and horrible.  It was not cheap too.  Their Signature burger was way off. A whopper would taste better than that. Don't waste your time and parking was expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Xd-rkwyz16bTyW6vW2T3dJ8u4ztybF-v5EUJ&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visited CAVU for the BOGO burgers on #internationalburgerday and enjoyed the experience. The sautéed onions were a nice touch on the Cavu Burger, giving it a great natural taste with perfectly cooked onions, smoked cheese, and bacon. However, if you're after a saucy, messy burger, this isn't the one for you. I'd recommend the smash burgers instead. If the Cavu Burger were priced like this regularly, the place would be packed. As a frequent burger enthusiast, I'd hate to see this burger not get the exposure it deserves. That's my suggestion to management.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0pvqNNG_NBD5fdyrRW0nYDHhL10oh_h9wgu_V&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJg_i0jcrkBGQ5zVNPxcWfY5xb8PdbtJbC3WlSVVcV_W6OPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ate dinner here, stayed at the hotel.

Was served by Hannah, very pleasant, cheerful smile and a good attitude. I sat on the corner by the street (her suggestion), good for a rainy, cloudy day.

I ordered a margarita, with a coconut rim.  Well flavored even this far from the our southern neighbors.

Also ordered a Caprese salad with goat cheese, salted pepper wings, and a salmon and Yukon gold potato chowder. All were flavorful and well seasoned.

The food came out at a reasonable pace, and my water was refilled without me asking.

Hannah was really the star with her fantastic service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDq8wWOHEXdjpyz-XWcMtGXiQHFo_ZjJlgrJy6&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2022-6-6"},{"Name":"Sukhi Multani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNKMMuqWym9OQCRfciJHIfOr2K0hsuU8z0QdCWhKVFSU-wobba=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you Allison for the amazing service and to the chefs in the back for preparing an amazing chicken burger/ fries.

Very relaxing environment near the airport so if you’re in the area and would like to enjoy a well prepared meal, I definitely recommend this spot.

First time trying Cavu Kitchen and it won’t be the last that’s for sure!

Great work team.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Matt E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZQfEG_xmBLRy05xS6KbedGsdkDNhef508QuEhW06OHHHM7HPG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Popeyes Chicken offers bold, flavorful fried chicken with a perfect crispy coating and juicy inside. The spicy option is a highlight, pairing well with classic sides like biscuits and Cajun fries. However, the customer service at the Stafford location falls short, with unfriendly staff affecting the overall experience. A great meal, but service improvements are needed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9DQPLrOm8Cp2Q8ZWkNUermORNFsnWwJuYLeRy&fid=0x0:0x9f18b936a818f3e"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"sharuq mt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFqmaROv7E7S4L9EYco4i2wwB43BmVXDpMA-rKiMDKktSI_7qJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this restaurant, and I have to say, it was one of the worst takeaway experiences I've ever had. From the moment I walked in, I was met with staff who were not only unwelcoming but downright rude. There was no smile, no greeting—just cold, uninterested behavior. Communication was terribly poor, and it felt like they couldn't care less about making the experience enjoyable.

What really took the cake was the greediness. The prices were already steep, but they kept pushing additional items and upsells without any genuine care for my preferences. It's clear they were more interested in making money than treating their customers with respect.

This is absolutely not the way to treat customers. I left feeling completely dissatisfied and will definitely never return. Avoid this place if you value good service and a welcoming atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkK3zYJm18jszX7E5VjJ_VEjRy3IL8unO4up0O&fid=0x0:0x9f18b936a818f3e"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Kieang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW2M9djIHzyHxcHtuo3N4yj8e9JyEXLnpZbATSvJoZof4rxFvn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered 10 pc chicken on Nov 22nd at 1730hrs for takeout. Store was busy. At home, we noticed the meat  still pinkish, checked another and they are all the same. Put it in the air fryer for about 10minutes. Legs are good. We regularly buy chicken at Popeyes but this is the first time it happened to us. Staff are friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyMbh5CepzYIXguCkaRZlyOItJ87Dza-dmdbOf&fid=0x0:0x9f18b936a818f3e"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Shanto Mathew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvdgIMX4iQ8LVs04k2SCdgy_8n-rv6OO3JlL5Pvmp8E8V2r7_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here yesterday evening with wife n lil kids for first time and the food was purely average compared to the actual Popeyes. Ordered family meal of 8pc chicken with popcorn chicken, onion rings and tenders. Most of the chicken pieces were oily and had dark blood fried colour which my lil ones didn't like so requested the staff to replace with better pieces but they replaced it with new pieces with similar defaults. Guess the staff didn't understand what my issue with the chicken was.
Anyways, disappointing meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSqjdEegHqY-r2PInhc-wPW_hF1i0_KAiFxGXJ&fid=0x0:0x9f18b936a818f3e"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Vincent Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIeve_sGGKpl5vWh190x1Mr1vWWq4pmojLFlZfMj4TZLWA0gyU0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"So I was glad to finally try POPEYES restaurant. I saw one out in the burbs a year ago and never went.
Today we had the 3 piece chicken with Cajun gravy. I found there were too many little bones for my liking. I could not take a bite with out having to take my fingers and pull out little bones throughout the whole meal... Too bad.
Biscuit and fries are simply scrumptious.
We also tried the garlic Parmesan wings. Tasty and stick yumminess. We will be back and will try again at a different time. Supper rush was probably not the best.
Where does that staircase go near the front? Is it for more seating? If so why is it not advertised.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1SuK9zCZzNHBx7T6GvzD_daLPHU29XF9jJ3UP&fid=0x0:0x9f18b936a818f3e"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Redy Vinluan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW79jXEHQvh8vx-LEVdXXac4-7gP7tmVt3UGJkpN41xjEu_9qtGBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered 6pcs chicken wings (18 November 2024), and I said to the cashier, just salt and pepper take out order. When I bite it, all 5 wings are burning hot, and only one is not. It's not pepper. It's  Cayenne they put on the wings. I garbage it. I will not buy any fried chicken there. The staff doesn't follow the requested order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_JTKC6IQ2v9EQ5tvCUY28njjhF1BvB1zoudcC&fid=0x0:0x9f18b936a818f3e"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"YUVRAJ JAIN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9FkXuBD1Vwg1tWcbUyqK8WWGgSYgwqZ8RgpQCY1Q2vpW0Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hey, I had a great experience at your restaurant recently. The service was awesome, and the food was delicious. There was this employee, I think her name was Sukriti or something like that, who was super friendly and helpful. She took my order even though the store was about to close, and I got my sandwich really quickly. She's a real asset to your team. Thanks for taking my order, and keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjAr-G5lK95Q8eTMCuKT6l6cm7MwuDC34mw6A-NaSk6cjDFiTSFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is tasty but watch for proper Hygeine. I watched them go from counting cash to putting food in orders and they looked annoyed that I called them out on it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcHUouZgmpVZpsCM98bw2bj2RKs4v-kPOO21DU&fid=0x0:0x9f18b936a818f3e"],"When":"2024-5-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Durango","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_2PesKmt-cFSjzAWF8ZpvzKFIQfYWeYB7sfNc7YronxWjhwaDKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pros: very nice atmosphere, nicely decorated, welcoming and cool. You can tell the food is freshly cooked. The receptionist is nice and provides good service. Price is not abusive, but not a good deal either.

Cons: I bought the bacon cheese burger. It was OK, but not great as far as burgers go. The patty is very thin and it was burnt at the edges. That burnt taste disrupted all the other flavours unfortunately. Burger was also rather thin, and medium/small sized for $12. The cost of that with a can of Pepsi was almost $15. Can't tell if it was worth it. Overall the burger was alright, but nothing special. I wouldn't come here regularly, but I might return and try other food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC_WSVm2R1iWnu3CrO7emblqKzKIatkUEdN5uV&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"AJ Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsu0-zLfdBIi0BMvFkmCrQ7LvpDpcqpsmyMO44b1viyR7y0ygy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great vibes. Love the wall art and neon signs.

Absolutely smashing smash burger. Got the bacon cheeseburger and it delivers on all fronts. Flavour! Texture! Toppings!

Didn’t try anything else but you better believe I’ll be back. Outstanding!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMq0ttU_bQMDF3XRWkQVIT4ns8WiFz2MCvNkrH&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Shelby McLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGrJIxT_w5hI3sCYlNvQIRBmY0nhG0Y1Wwz7fnYiH39NwxA_WG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool place with good food. Our order was a bacon cheeseburger with crinkle fries, a vegan crispy chicken burger with yam fries, and two milkshakes: Oreo and Reese’s peanut butter cup. I recommend trying the vegan chicken burger if that’s your thing, definitely with the yam fries!! Fast and friendly service at the counter. Compliments to the chef who came out to see us and check in — it’s a new place so they’re open and receptive to hearing what people want. No washrooms inside but affiliated with The Cambie around the corner. Added seating in the restaurant and a small patio out front. Will definitely be back (:","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdvrZ_7bO0zYB-y566GFF3Cc9bPZf4fkm4oT6j&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"em ladou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp3bi7taDvf1OUi1p06pu7kgDizbNv37YGZ7wxE7ujoS6rOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered from skip the dishes - I got the beyond veggie burger... asked for 1 patty and received 2, there was 1 piece of tomato, 1 flimsy leaf of lettuce and 3 pickles all smooched in the middle of the burger and smashed patties are very wide, also no option to add cheese... it just seemed like no effort was put into it. My partner enjoyed his double bacon cheese burger, just that there was not many toppings in it. Fries were a good portion but arrived cold (might not be restaurants fault)

In the picture I added my own cheese ( I didn't have much at home) pickles are on the other side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZRBiYjpxAO-QUcJz2r7ZKrtVfdAaQoXGn4-MS&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Olivia Levesque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUb4zZbV0YXKhHkU2F_3dwx03KNXKQqTHdsRQyeSWJ9SjDYl5kv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The single patty bacon cheese burger was absolutely delicious, ordered as a combo with the crinkle cut fries & brisk iced. Would definitely order the burger again, but the fries ill pass on next time as they were more on the mushy side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNWGu7jj0plNj9ZXWnfHWYCySZb1ilYzJZSY4H&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Emmanuel Morúa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVgDDr7Bq5maIJYTC_on0x6OlVE8ViM6rt1o7JGzQMU2HdiVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a Bacon Cheeseburger with crinkled cut fries and a brisk tea, very tasty burger with flattened meat which is unsual but definitely good as hell, service is super fast, courteous and attentive. Place is always clean, might need to add a washroom for customers tho, but overall very nice experience and a hell of a meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJy0Y21-kOiIRcC21u4vqQnUEKGH7fThlshY-h&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"cgmc70","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzXD32DfRqqvnrxut0qW4Xp1dRXi1jGQ41udzAPASAQpd5iacc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My cousin & I just came across this place & decided to try it .. Exterior vibe just called us in 🥰 .. Ordered 2 shakes & fries to share, picked the window to enjoy our snack. 1st impressions inside was that it was SO clean!!! Table tops were nice & smooth, and our window view was great!
Friendly & quick service .. Owner gave us a couple of stamp cards towards our next purchase.. We’ll definitely be back !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2UdZuJKWqbBaqRrtYIJ1akNRJnztBZQHXxv-3&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Keenan Nuttall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-45u8DUs7KPX3Ki1k-P7NTWYoNYOccWZLNsOVIRFCYOzhvSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Arriving at 5:32 and promptly receiving my order by 5:39, the efficiency of service at this establishment is commendable. The carefully curated music and inviting atmosphere, complete with the addition of a comfortable couch, contribute to a warm and welcoming dining experience.

Manager Thomas exemplifies hospitality by not only providing attentive service but also directing attention to complimentary amenities such as the free lemon water. Additionally, his evident kindness towards his employees enhances the overall positive atmosphere.

The ordered burger, priced at $8, while featuring authentic burger meat, falls slightly short of expectations compared to competitors like A&W. However, it offers a refreshing departure from typical fast-food fare, providing a pleasant change of pace.

On a integer scale (with 0 representing fast food), I rate this establishment a 0.2, acknowledging its efforts to elevate the dining experience beyond typical fast-food standards.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6V8cLCtXNdS19c57hY1mbofnILEdduN65i4lj&fid=0x0:0xeda594cb6ca6920d"],"When":"2024-4-15"}]

title: Mean Poutine

descriptions: Fast-food-style eatery offering a menu of inventive hot dogs & creative takes on poutine.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Parneet Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqz_l5BzN5_mBY3QC7SEZWEVervEPkE_VocF-ECzkBQsGcdPO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently had a chance to try this tiny place called Mean Poutine in the heart of Vancouver downtown and it was some experience. The customer service was good, and the staff was friendly. The food was tasty , but have tried better poutines ….

We ordered fried chicken poutine and it could use a little more gravy, it felt little dry. Buffalo chicken chunks are tasty.

Overall good experience, hopefully they can rectify the gravy situation and make poutine great again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsF5XxpXMDjIIn9SeRphkzHSmNEPJJ2E-8qVzP&fid=0x0:0x7c48d7a921f94b2d"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"CJ Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8BwdmFRPLCNaItuPHPEGYhoCxdRtBzI55h3t9XrHEzlNrgquaMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best gourmet poutine out there. Some way cool
Variety’s like the Philly cheese steak, southern bbq, meat supreme. We loved our poutine and we are poutine carnivores! Simple shop on the roadside. The worker, Hana, from Iran, was extremely kind and helpful. Super quick and relatively affordable. Merci!!! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBLz9DLBfH89AReP197xFMVsx7ZlEjiqxeaTL-&fid=0x0:0x7c48d7a921f94b2d"],"When":"2023-2-9"},{"Name":"Shay Seng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCvxNwIOZ3Xs-l0bfnzd6aOzeNSHHGz4yEItTU7keHzGc0P0LluQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I want too sure how to rate this place. I haven't had poutine in Canada before this. First the facts. The chips were crispy and we'll cooked. The gravy was deep and we'll gravy like... Savoury and salty. The curds were curd like I guess.  I ordered a fried chicken poutine so there was also chicken and green onions. Service was prompt and super friendly.
I'm not sure I get poutine though... I can see how people might like the savouriness of the gravy soaking up in the chips. Or the melty curds in the gravy. .. but for me... While all the individual components were good, they didn't seem to meld together.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs5qTprhbMeRavAqFN38B37Q1qT5qQQQ2WK7VW&fid=0x0:0x7c48d7a921f94b2d"],"When":"2018-10-26"},{"Name":"Elle N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGbOcGsaQSlrEBFLH15vmcEa_H0yjRJR8lfupxajXqqVNihA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Probably worst poutine I ever had. Served cold. I went back and nicely asked for some gravy to be put on the cheese because it was super cold (even though I prefer not to have soggy fries) and she said in a rude tone of voice that it’s obviously cold because the cheese is in the fridge. And I was surprised because obviously everywhere they keep their cheese in the fridge and they serve poutine warm / hot. But said it was super cold nicely trying to explain and again she rudely answered, … I was like may you add some hot gravy so it heats up (even though I actually *hate* soggy fries) and she again in a rude tone of voice said it’s 1 dollar for extra gravy. Lady, you shouldn’t be serving gross cold food first of all!!! The woman’s attitude was horrible and NO actually, in my whole life I was never served poutine where the cheese was super cold- ever in my life. Absolute worst poutine and the woman who works there shouldn’t be serving people food, she has a horrible attitude. Didn’t eat much because I didn’t enjoy it - but most of all just left with a bad memory. Some people need to think of why they push so much negativity on to others. Don’t have a good photo cause I only take good photos when I want to post on Instagram (and I didn’t want to post this memory) but here’s on now before I throw it out. Cost co poutine is way better, and cheese is actually melted and not icy chunks. *****by the way, just scrolled down reviews and many many people commented on the lady being rude.*****I see reviews of her double charging, or charging for a fork that was dropped by someone who ordered 6 poutines… embarrassing*****","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHN_Pxc8ZFRO37xEGS8hKHzEMs8kgu-M4mzmIM&fid=0x0:0x7c48d7a921f94b2d"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"Beezer333 Beezer333","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wo1m-4sufmg5069NtcuAFRSIVJ6amfyY9UrEO5NtVtv3Asyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update May 14 2022: gave it another try… delicious! But they now charge 50 cents for green onions

Update Feb 23 2021: went there today. had it to go and now that I'm home, the lady didn't put enough gravy, not enough cheese. they were so much better pre-COVID. not worth the $8 I paid for.

I started to go to Mean Poutine after my favourite poutine place changed hands. mean Poutine is fabulous.  The ladies behind the counter are always smiling.  It is a family business - mother and daughter look like sisters; there may be others outside the family.

I order the classic poutine and they put green onions 👍👍👍

I’m not sure what other flavours taste like.

If you like my post and photos, please give me a thumbs up 👍   Thanks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSRqB0i1PvidHQelISrYvW90huKODiha8Olf18&fid=0x0:0x7c48d7a921f94b2d"],"When":"2022-5-15"},{"Name":"Adam Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVAl4qiyNco9P5BQAdtkr5aMufsWx_Uhq_wpODWSGPcvdIbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was super tasty however they only offered one kind of poutine. They said the other were all gone but the bars hadn’t even let out yet. Amazing poutine for Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wish they put more cheese curds and toppings on (especially as the mushrooms were low quality and an extra dollar), but serving size was quite large for the price and it was otherwise good. There are better places nearby for poutine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKseK_PbC_8KUDfPO4r9htvIvthl3D9npDwFX8&fid=0x0:0x7c48d7a921f94b2d"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"Avery Carmichael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVCgHf-yv12L3ZHEkVUN55ICZNsuUQkkgZqLca__LapnX-_D88=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"SO GOOD!! I’ve been looking for some really good poutine in Vancouver and I think I found the best place yet. There’s no seating or anything, just a counter to stand at or you can take the food home. Lots to choose from, including a build your own poutine. I went with the Mean Supreme Poutine which was delicious, the pieces of onion were a bit large and undercooked but the flavour made up for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMsGOxFbfmKMJMtR7Lj5yWOjhj4RK5guOwoNHp&fid=0x0:0x7c48d7a921f94b2d"],"When":"2023-3-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rita S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz4B_m-DEY6gB1M4srcx7Pqc9qpVfzxMltQJQofY2yJbolWeK8BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last time I came here it was great but this time they had run out of toppings for the vegan dog so I just got it plain and I was going to add some condiments. The hot dog I got was nearly inedible and not because it was vegan but totally overcooked and dry with an also hard/dry bun. I went to pickup my other food order elsewhere and asked my husband to get this one but I definitely wouldn’t have accepted it had I picked up. The chicken karaage was also a mess fried in dirty oil flecked with black. Absolutely awful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSxuTgYWsxigHU41_yOQRZuTpQc9e8yJ5K54hO&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Alexandra Gaevsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnjItyjfR1qVEZnY6caUOLCi6uNaCD4VjAop9J7DwgHSC2Qmwo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The hot dogs were decent, but nothing extraordinary. One of them lacked flavor, which might have been due to the bread not being as fluffy or bouncy as expected. The service was okay, though the food took a bit longer to come out than I would have liked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBj1b89Ej4tYv213b66A0m3Vz2yo4MeVEy3WTL&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Rob Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY5NTqMTgx_lD2eaipV6ZhBPVVFvaOf4WFNgkQid9KGHJe0clt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got to try 2 different types of Japadog during my vacation in Vancouver, They were both quite good. My only regret is that I couldn't try more varieties. Okonomi was my favourite and they had a Vegan option as well which was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO41vOG-ZH-zO-nQoLHXcpGE3amDRgnbeY7grmB&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Alan Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMJD-0CMNr79zyDjaY-DyvlmCayfvuEGwkzuGa7BLyrbYyMDqo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A friend told me he drove 3 hours from Seattle to get this. After eating one I finally get why. The mayo is paired with a lean sausage causing it to actually be fairly balanced in terms of fat vs lean content. It's a well constructed hot dog.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOorMBjuXCYlF53Trn1vZcZ52o8LYt_pXbV_Y4X&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"sayo. ca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_x_czI-SgX-My0FUcudbm6l-nVMJffVnfmTctcdj39xcVOZoSgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I liked their foods when I tried them in Toronto. I was glad to come to the flagship store in this time. We had Wagyu Menchikatsu, Avocado, black sesame shake, lemonade and matcha parfait. I really liked “Avocado”, which has house made sausage, cream cheese and Mayo. I heard it’s quite popular for locals. Menchikatsu is much bigger than we expected! It was juicy and satisfying. Staff were very friendly even if they were busy. If you are in Vancouver, please give it a try these Japanese styled hotdogs at this store.

Wagyu Menchikatsu $14.98 Avocado $9.89, black sesame shake, lemonade and matcha parfait","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCBytVPOT13oD27KzLUjJnuNjy4NNhTM37DznC&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Jordan Gamache","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZmSaYmwhADhRlODHchAsnihXVMUVO1oBBO_boK7KmqaC9cZy35w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"JAPADOG serves the most interesting and delicious hot dogs with fun, Japanese toppings! The curry poutine fries were absolutely wonderful and the katsu and yakisoba hotdogs were spectacular. We were genuinely surprised with how well the flavors worked together, and the food came out really quickly. The JAPADOG tea/lemonade drinks were also perfect for a hot summer day, and we look forward to coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcDNjVxOcqerS8uls69IJV0GlwH09uZV-0-2_E&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Pushpa Perera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC_LqZDm87q7hBfncOFtdGHnXZ2H3BJ66AOmocM5ZUJc_QFwM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried these:Japadogs
1. Hot Spicy - All beef, lettuce, special spicy sauce
2. Cilantro - All beef, marinated cilantro, sesame special meet sauce and chilly umami
3. Teriyaki Tartar- all beef, teriyaki sauce , Japanese tartar sauce & green onions
Hot spicy Japadog was a little bit spicy taking over the beef taste.
Also tried Karaage and Love Meat (pork)
My goto drink Japanade with the hotdog!
Over two lunches in VC while traveling.
Also Jap curry poutine nice
Delicious Japadogs!
Sadly, didn't have a chance to  try other hotdogs.
Recommend if you are visiting Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdVPd1_JTnDUl9g6EyckSVu6R8xTfr667EinRD&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Chanil Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUQGp1nrL9JxzAwqk4JQgTjHyMBxLETKa4reQFPABq175G_ZSPDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Japadog is a must-visit when in Vancouver! This spot puts a unique and delicious twist on the classic hot dog, with Japanese-inspired flavors that are out of this world. I tried the Terimayo, and it was packed with flavor—perfectly grilled with savory toppings that made every bite amazing. The portions are generous, and the service is quick and friendly. Whether you’re grabbing a quick bite or exploring the city, Japadog is an iconic stop that you won’t want to miss!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0TEhFJscEAT1wRLwawGxjy1bG6oFG3yPBz7Xn&fid=0x0:0xd7477f4236c75e05"],"When":"2024-9-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here and spent our Christmas Party. We rented their heated patio and it was a great venue. Their service was excellent and fast, their food was great especially their creme brule was so good, price was reasonable too. We will surely be back and maybe have our parties here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzI-bZwCYSVgmTjwCA0Mc339vwgYnAWlzGJIpw&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"RhE “R”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhxn3fL4a0hIxT8HJcx09RB-3VeIdPygNVtHUnZO0hk197vWIP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fogg N' Suds is the restaurant attached to the Holiday Inn YVR. The restaurant is nicely decorated with a Sports Bar theme. It's comfortable and very convenient for the hotel visitors.
I had breakfast one morning. It was the standard Holiday Inn offering in a bit of an upscale setting.
The service was pleasant and friendly.
The restaurant offers a full menu, all day, which looked quite appealing.
This is a convenient location when staying at the Holiday Inn.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVDy_CnXoozIpKy_Mr9VH87gdSxzIu9yJDKTcO&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"grant johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOT5kNa0x4eE0h2LxlrWwjL4mH6PnEZaX0NHDhip8rb98DGHh3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fogg n Sudds is a very handy restaurant beside the Holiday Inn YVR ( not AT the airport). Service was very good and attentive. I ordered the Prime Rib meal, which was filling and tasty enough but the prime rib cut was the thinnest i’ve ever seen for Prime rib. It was maybe 1/2 to 1 cm ( 1/4-1/2”)  “ thick”.  for $29, i expected at least twice the thickness. Plus the Yorkshire pudding was way overdone ( i know it’s tricky to do). My wife had the halibut and no worries there, a very nice meal. i’d go back but not for the prime rib.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd58YRrkVKqWszNIOIoD2LerG_5HlbAnqk3LJl&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Julian Uhrig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW08nq9XmUdp3LXQYIWLa1rmdmrS7ft5311n---leOqXXtK-0-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was here in February and the breakfast hash included peppers and red onions, bacon, eggs and sausages cooked to perfection.

But now the hash is just potatoes deepfried to a very dark brown. This could have been a one off but was very different from February. Loss of quality for sure.

Service has been awesome both times and it's just a pub dinner so atmosphere is good.

Picture from what it used to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0SxkDixMX1lExfXzqlNDLXXSfdZNx08zUj8Gm&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"tlee996","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQ_1UZR5IqHh2weDbQuG13Guye1-3IdopwdQKCyvp3B2_Kmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think our server was David.  Had a friends bday party there.  The wings were good along with nachos, truffle burger, lamb risotto, steak & prawn, truffle pork chop and sear Mahi Mahi and chicken fettuccine alfredo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw1hFRkLe4KK2mHmlcA0EW58eUhLaqfrrcBr1f&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went for Xmas 3 course lunch meal on Xmas day
Surprisingly it’s not busy at all
Taste of the food meeting expectation
And the dessert much bigger than expected
They have limited parking in front of the restaurant so i park in the hotel car park ( all parking is free)
Entrance of parking right next to hotel , just buzz in they will open the gate.
The parking lot , hotel and restaurant is all connected so kind of nice for rainy days to stay dry
Ps don’t park on Volvo side might get ticketed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvnMeIJRBqSQfb0MXfpaWFXr3KnqgfwcHABglV&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Richard Oxlade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6dmdsmRg8ls0W8KfTsxibV4XJj0l366DGgb_zQ42TaifdINNk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place for an affordable dinner close to lots of airport hotels. Lots of menu options for a variety of dietary restrictions. Definitely a great spot to visit if you’re staying at any of the nearby hotels and don’t want to spend a fortune on dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb3CgWfWHCGOAkpZawz3-53wN4Do8s77P2u67b&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Wendy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXti_Nw51FeZwTm2Y6QWUQnS4XGNNxg279vOwOMNj1a6B1wn5Z1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was fantastic and the happy hour menu made sure it was affordable. The steak entree for happy hour and their burgers were amazing. Thank you as well to the staff. They were very pleasant and accommodating.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Jessica Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyQmsF3KqNCLdB7hez5zHXVreBUb6TObIEDByimX-1Y-wCGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered two bowls from chipotle, my bowl came half full. My boyfriend got extra meat and it was old and dry as hell. They should be inspected for food safety, cause this looks nasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2WsR6s1IKv3hXOwaw-l67EIR76Tur0xD1yNIr&fid=0x0:0x79daa037c79a9c84"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Dave Mossop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWALBQ7F3_B7LADdhDOSOhQzl0CWCtx3_M7oCfXaSHqVbp5aGK6Zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"As much as I love chipotle, this location is the stingiest with portions ever. Go to the other one if you can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFg3ESB0Azh1HEW7AmCPfTztnglTDUOl1e8zGQ&fid=0x0:0x79daa037c79a9c84"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"pri Ya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkh5JDU-g4emDsQIGv8hfqwihELpuF5xa1M1CUkRCsTgfHsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"it seems like staff doesn’t get proper training about customer service. we ordered veggie bowl it  was not filled properly. Girls were busy in their own backbiting’s.Atmosphere was not welcoming those girls make it stressful with their loud laughter. owner should teach them some manners or change their staff.👎","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Suyun Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq9V6Vha9sUNbwnt9Nj3a0dWvXMRpHq5bw4GJRrWW0eKZMhis=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They are always busy and staffs are not nice. But food was good! Its way better if you order through the chipotle app!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI8l_HFaGBuHgn5mX5bDcgbiuF2--yZlnTBos&fid=0x0:0x79daa037c79a9c84"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"rwpow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMZHZZy8yLkw6tffki855GmumW3XF5y9VuOp9bQBP0R4GbNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friday Nov 8 2024
7:05PM

I almost didn't go to this Chipotle because of all the bad reviews, but I'm glad I did. The food and service were great. They even remade my burrito when they accidentally put hot sauce on it. I love that they have Coke bottles from Mexico with real cane sugar. This Chipotle is small with just a few seats, but the burritos are huge and I was totally stuffed. 😉","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ishita Mahajan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2stJQQkyO54JPkk6zx94ZTmBWh0eGLDv32hiiWPV7EmY2yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Found a dead ant in my bowl… these are the hygiene standards being maintained at this place… I used to love chipotle never going to this specific place again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYDYIYalaMxlX2tTICklXACu2THjJbCeEhIe6r&fid=0x0:0x79daa037c79a9c84"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"karun nahar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqQwrR8l5EBDqEkEISj3iliWQo7p5h381kSsdbPn8uWHIP9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I love chipotle and i can eat it 4 times a week. But this location- very bad cook. I am soo hungry right now but the taste is bullshit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkYSzaeqz5mswYqI_60Cg_pJjWdH5bh_aG6bXs&fid=0x0:0x79daa037c79a9c84"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Keith Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfDv3eXqxnHhzG5LIJFzrTsAZMaxkU0fCFowhu6k6dmTNCsMM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Some of the most lacklustre service I’ve ever seen from any food establishment in my entire life. The guy serving the food in the bowl was doing it like it was some kind of speed competition like he was stacking cups. He was asking quite rudely about the ingredients too: “pinto beans or black???” The whole experienfe was over in maybe 30 seconds.  I would not go here.

Edit: Chipotle responded to this review with a link to a Chipotle customer support website. You are not able to leave a review for this Chipotle location on that website. I reiterate that this was a lacklustre, disappointing Chipotle experience. Cannot recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]
