user_reviews:
[{"Name":"This food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaxcCslaGrcC0u202g67ni7XJGWWGyPYtSKkUjWo5gpcXXO0Yv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem in Steveston, Richmond. Korean-Western cuisine that’s a must try. We had the fried chicken waffles and Korean bugolgi eggs benny including their strawberry matcha cold latte beverage - all a must try! Decent pricing for the portions (approx. under $25 per our dishes). They have a camera Photo Booth where you can print your photo. They have maximized the seating space all the way to the door. Hopefully one day they will open a second location or a larger restaurant as this branch will get even more popular in no time. Will be returning and recommending to other locals! Truly a Korean restaurant just like back in Seoul, Korea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKEzOp_7WZFQcJraDUbUZp_CKN5d9ggsRsJ_Ef&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Kelly Argue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHguvt2mUYK3ZLLT7t42H3YMBdzPp4wF0FbC-_ZBGyrnECZG3faw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We happened upon this place after coffee, at 1:30 on a Tuesday we walked right in and got seated immediately. Loved the ambiance. We were served immediately, and our food came out very fast. I got the avocado eggs Benedict, and it tasted good but my only complaint was that it was not warm - the eggs or the bread and the holiday sauce was a smidge above room temperature. My friend had the salad and she absolutely devoured it. All in all really good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLwQAyDLFgsIsGk68YJAGW1O89CJjtgaq6Hxx2&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Josh Kitagawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCvbFsAmQKXq7eYwIwTFh7lGkN3BybRNmerg8V0KRS7uDJMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A certain return to spot! Had a great morning walking along the Richmond Dyke, and for brunch afterwards we stopped at Toast to Coast. We weren’t too sure what to expect going in, but were both super super impressed with the food. We got the walk around the block and the Super Bowl and both were outstanding in their own way. Honestly one of the better if not best meals out we had both had in a while. Looking forward to the next time we drop in :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOpsYpHqKZreGxWznBhe6Fsq7uDnWIfyJh5IjP&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Holly Woosey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2lbZeCEe9uk_tp5v5HeEBpd05cOkWx2bWGKGCFJqdBVjRakcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Toast to Coast and were not disappointed. Really tasty food with large portions (definitely worth the price) we shared the Fisherman's Feast and the Pancakes and we were both stuffed! Loved the atmosphere/music was real chill and the staff were very attentive and helpful. Great place for a lovely brunch","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJoSR1iRK-O7LnHIv_yzY-DpOM75-6HHVnLRe8&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Hanson Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU05sdPHWWx_fwM9XAZhPqjZSqP90re58KpNh9FAdqd8EPWk7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are quite a few brunch spots in Steveston but I came to this one due to the reviews -- did not disappoint! It's a must-visit for any enjoyers of a unique brunch experience. The Korean-inspired menu adds a fun twist to Canadian classics, and the ambiance is top-notch. The interior feels clean and well-planned out, with a cute photo booth, too.

I tried the Fisherman's Feast and the Korean Fried Chicken & Waffles, and the latter was especially delicious. The portions are great, and each dish comes with very nice complementary sides, like the hash brown blocks, assorted house-made pickles, and creative sauces (the waffles came with a gochujang-inspired syrup).

I've read a few comments about service, but it's probably as good as it can be with the limited staff and busy clientele, as there was a line to get in. Our orders were promptly taken, and food arrived quickly.

I will be revisiting the next time I visit Steveston!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT-px7rpGMDAN_Q6N5eJ_VeYO5L1eoPiUmd2lg&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"good times","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlXM1yie2CwXWjZm6fYTFK1Gh8ZCQs6kWWZyWD3G60SgLd8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small place, so with a party of 4 you will have to wait.  They told us 30mins. (but it was 10min) We gave them our number, and walked around town. Plenty of places to visit.
Received the call and got seated. Servers were very nice.  The food was fantastic.  I had eggs benny with the aged bacon and a strawberry spiked lemonade.

Very nice town many places to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0lAtKIzEjRbjKuz-nAu34SbyVvDsZN6_2J6QI&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Jah Baraquiel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdBuhq7i5xDfhlyZYWuv00vGsCGhiHgFR8xbt2-zWDkYkrepBh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"foods are superb 👌 staffs are also accommodating especially the owner. She’s one of the kindest person we’ve met. We’ll definitely come back and recommend it to our fam ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF0bBO-e5spip9tHXr-4ztmNTb9t8TNoHJ5OIK&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Validorae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrAD3iajv4Yp09hKvvxZPV0GJ9zhq3gwKPSikmfm1tkCKmtL8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here many times, and the food quality has always been excellent. The flavors are particularly amazing. I especially love their matcha latte, it’s the best I've had in Vancouver!
Today, on this cold rainy day, we came back, and the owner warmly welcomed us with two drinks, making us feel truly warm inside. Thank you Toast to Coast, you made my day :)  Will come back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeidmk9WirpC76rMyBM7mEMEOrouYzSMx6jkQB&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-20"}]

Self checkout always more convenient for me than lining up for a cashier.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Siamese cats rule the world","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhIX5psAZ9h_Rwf2BE6bzqd5LbX6sAtkvjEf1lyHQbKRdTa_GT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sep 14 2024: I bought two bags of Compliments Cheezies (House brand) and they tasted old, so my wife and I checked the best before date and was June 2024. So, 3 months after the best before date the product was still on the shelf. Nicee!!! Also we once bought milk and coffee creamer were both rancid. \"not very freshco\" at all. Lost a client.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nabila Tanjim Jhilik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCPhZRMsFBWUXA23RSt51ycoAjBSbQl8jiwzTszJZvW9CDmeku=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I always do shopping from this freshco located at no 3 and today September 07,2024,I went there around 8.30 to 9.00 and I was asking for a  refund the lady was working till no 4 was very bad mannered.She don't even know how to treat with customer and was joking with her coworker while I was waiting for refund. She made me very embarrassed and we don't expect this type off staff and this type of attitude while shopping. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darlene Rayment","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6j7D0ei-SMG8dHrV9YQAx1J2DLi5MJOpQuMUg8ut9UqvrAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great sale prices!  Match other stores' prices. Give rainchecks when out of flyer items and subtract 10% from price as a courtesy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaeli Finnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9swc8R2K-WPKeSpodeW9gMPefWym8hWzzaxuYb_8dEHf-eO8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Just another chain store location.\nNeither positive or negative review. Bland and plain experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gaurav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnezii1qtazCADrWIf9b5ZBc-4Wh4iv9Evhz0J9DN1l4Gg3RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Okay’ish experience shopping here. I was charged more than prices displayed. I always relied on the prices charged never bothered to double check. First time ever I checked and it gives me goosebumps that i might have lost money in past as well. But the supervisor there was very nice she helped me resolve the price difference issue. She also gave me some free items. But the only thing i didn’t like was waiting 10 mins while she fixed everything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcqxK5Ej94tQDAqaHjDa54_zhQ7HnP8qfotzBO\u0026fid=0x0:0xc06562e78f7f467b"],"When":"2019-11-22"},{"Name":"Gary Faryon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6HSVc-qwEbj20jnAIHcW3Bj-1oaQJn33C9TJRqlHA70QBGv2G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely the best FreshCo around.  Shelves well stocked, lots of BIG in-store specials only at this store has. Much more customer focused and professionally run in comparison to other grocery stores in Richmond.  My guess is this store is owned and operated by a very seasoned retailer as it show, Well done!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bronson VM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtc-bPdNjsYMvBcP2Txz2fw_jtG1usp53QQ5fldtfCo_CO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Price are good and lots of items to pick and can find good deals here from time to time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ana A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzFLRx430WP_zCLshyOG7fdQIMQ7GepNLw5bm9JYjQyBt38x1m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When I first saw the menu I was doubtful about ordering because they only offer 3 types of burgers: vegan burgers are two of them and the other one is a regular cheeseburger.
I have to say the owners of this place nailed at “keeping it simple and making it better”. The hamburger is just perfect and delicious! All home made style and with amazing fries. I don’t have any complaints and I’ll definitely be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9U87Wc7OkmN8PVDmBryl14Pt4lpWMmb6gCJAP&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Bruno Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhILuyIb0LIP6MudwbcSE2BAlE-f9U9SKRT2p9lsRwJ4hM0FgDLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic burger. Juicy, flavourful meat and tender bun. Awesome fries and condiments as well. Place was clean and staff was friendly. Super worth the experience and not expensive by any means.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNZSD9lNGKwvY6DuRAbBLN1sH9xk6jpTGUfVvG&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Kimberly W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyEcFWm9KlF1A5qUr48_2k5NqNkBKB28_JBHp8Hk3SydvKzo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Burgers are not typically my first choice of food but my friend said she heard good things about this place so we decided to try it out! Even though the menu seemed quite limited, I actually really like how they offered a lot of vegan options. I am personally not a vegan but I try and avoid dairy products due to it not sitting well in my stomach. I asked if I could just have vegan cheese on a regular cheeseburger and they had no issues making that substitution. The burger was juicy and had a lot of fillings for a reasonable $11.50. It’s definitely an upgrade from your typical fast food chain burger and doesn’t cost very much more. I think though the highlight of this place though was their vegan milkshakes. I avoid milkshakes like the plague because I always have stomach issues from them, but this milkshake tastes every bit as creamy and flavorful as a normal milkshake! In fact, if you didn’t tell me it was vegan, I probably wouldn’t have known :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy7BZ2u43nJyiGy-xND-RF1Hzf-1pMPyvq9rG0&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best burger I have ever had. Their beef patty has a perfect balance of fat and meat, and it is always cooked perfectly. I love their sauces and every ingredient they use in the burger. Another plus is their fries, which are not too thin and not too thick. They are crispy on the outside yet soft on the inside. I also love their lettuce wrap comes with actual lettuce and a lot of them. The lettuce is very fresh and not the same as you get at shake shack or in-n-out

On top of that, their customer service is the best. The cashier is very friendly each time I visit and very patient. The restaurant is always clean, and it has a nice ambiance, making it a great spot for a quick bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOXEqJEmmXLNUV73PvWRf21qH-DXsMR4xW8JGK&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"S K (OxtailGravy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIINjUguJePPet75HTnX-unbS8rsk4LQ_Ku9eCz7eh0Wy--ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really enjoyed the food, the burger was juicy, crisot and fresh besides the the bottom bun being soggy. The fries were super crunchy which I loved even with all the sauce on top.

My order took about 20 minutes which was the downside, the restaurant was clean and the service was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmVD4hicbfm28biVDPgbhaq-xNqtnV-4s_DkyH&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Wilber Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI38MWEwmhuvl8lH_S2_6m5UKFyiIgKCTtacwDskGOOH4E-ubY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best burgers I’ve had! Their patty is a perfect blend of fat and meat, juicy without being overwhelming!

They use the freshest produce so you get the perfect bite each time. Their sauce is unreal, and sauce to bun ratio could not be better!

Highly recommend if you’re looking for delicious food, friendly staff, good ambience and feasting!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgpnNYdiNcpd98UrRmpcR9RZKoXN5umzIISBZS&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"신승민","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfmfnIt1jomQQhMAjGGupsq7U53qzk7-ocJcoNW8J2BNBao7PD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best burger ever!
Patty was absolutely juicy and full of flavor
and breads are also well toasted.
The combination of all ingredients was awesome!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMD_lrGSLBHpWXmPLH7RhyRuq_T99PwRnOOPlo&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Geraldine Hernández Al Attrach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0FVkm-kkMtvKYHXxnT3DAiypfS5YkTvRibMQ0AGtOqSlHhcC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice place to eat burgers in Vancouver, the taste of meat and bread is amazing. The quality of the service is good. The fries 🍟 are very good, however the thing what o like the most was the Vegan chocolate Milkshake very very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv8R584QslbLd_cqldBENXSpUTtmHBwWqEzHt7&fid=0x0:0x2bf2351e6acee74c"],"When":"2024-8-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLl_xDS8eCppzmL0Qw8tmEPd0aGFlGEFE20XIGATIH4uryx5m7i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our hotel's proximity to 24 Train Express Noodle House prompted us to try this Vietnamese restaurant in Vancouver. Intrigued by Vietnamese cuisine's reputation for authenticity, we focused on traditional dishes, bypassing the Cambodian options due to lack of familiarity. The Pho Beef noodle soup demonstrated the chef's skill. For allergy purposes, it's advisable to request blanched beansprouts. The lemongrass-infused broth rivaled our previous Vietnamese experiences. Fried chicken wings, a personal staple, were also enjoyable. Compared to other Pho establishments in Vancouver and Toronto, this restaurant excelled, though still falling short of Vietnam's exceptional Pho.

Exploring small eateries can reveal unexpected culinary delights, unearthing hidden gems that merit attention. Our enthusiasm for the pho noodle soup distracted us from documenting the shop's interior.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuUXx97AgeQdFiqw-lAWvlvH9H2rx73pH0kmKX&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came for lunch and it was a busy establishment on a weekday! They have both indoor seating and outside on a patio. Friendly service, and we were impressed by how quickly our food came out. I had the grilled lemongrass beef & spring roll with vermicelli. It didn't disappoint! The bowl was full of ingredients and the spring roll was plump with ingredients! Good amount of marinated beef slices as well, which contrasted the side pickled vegetables. My friend had their #14 pho (with rare steak, brisket, tendon and tripe). The tendon and tripe pieces were quite small, so they wished those pieces were a bit larger. That being said, the broth was tasty and the steak/brisket slices were fine!

They take debit card, but the only credit card payment they accept is Visa! The signage is a bit confusing, as it looks like they go by both '24 Train Express' and 'Gold Train Mien Tay.'","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6QHL1x2Ffds3zwTXgUsam-eomWPfYFGh9a-43&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Melanie Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOnCXlUyDGCRthUKehak0_GUp_az2pTQqceWOyRQ-aAN0D6lJP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were looking for a dinner spot that was walking distance from our hotel and wanted to try out the Vietnamese food scene in Vancouver. That's when I found 24 Train Express, which fit the bill. It has a mix of Vietnamese and Cambodian cuisine, the latter of which I haven't had a whole lot of experience with. To start, we had the cha gio. Since we just wanted to try it, we just got one roll and I'm glad because one roll here is actually the size of about 2.5 regular rolls. It was a little oily but well made with lots of filling, and it was crispy. For my main, I had the pho sate - specifically well-done beef with beef balls in a lemongrass broth. I really enjoyed it, even though it was well done beef (couldn't do rare since I'm pregnant) and I loved the broth. Hubby had the chicken thighs over "fried rice". I say "fried rice" because it was really just white rice with some sauce poured over it. The chicken was also dry, and it should be hard to overcook chicken thighs. But it didn't taste fresh. It tasted like they reheated it. He said the veggies it came with were also not fresh. Maybe he just ordered the wrong thing since this is a Noodle House, after all.

I would still give this place four stars, based off my meal and the cha gio. There were other menu items I would have liked to try if I had the stomach space. But it seems like the more popular options here are the noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2FpjQc0l3GYymhZA17UTzfvqkkK27Zdf0-Zdn&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Helen Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmYUJjEQqimZUxsYO-panWll5VdoLovGiZE6qwKER_MuLDDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this place near our accomodation and so glad we did!  We felt genuinely welcomed and were very impressed by the table service, quick and efficient.  The food was amazing, we had the chicken curry on steamed rice and Chicken Pho’ soup.  The side vegetables were so fresh and tasty!  We ended up returning on our last night in Vancouver.  Thank you from 2 grateful Australians.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtYE4Vab2PhCmWnEI3WSEp0lieDxSd6352kLI7&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Tianshu Dai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvS1zOhK8UsFWegkK5H3qPfEC7fQUJqGqbfHSzmK3Olp7VF4P3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited on a weekend day and was pleasantly surprised by the relative vacancy. The vibe was enjoyable; the waitresses were courteous; the food was fantastic with rich and balanced flavour profiles, and served in generous portions. I enjoyed my stay thoroughly and will definitely consider revisiting should I am in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAK91h25tZzScvAHE9o9iGj1v5QE_WiwwNXw61&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Ken B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0UHEqvrtK9b7zXvBSni89V4qdFRQmlmzKuNqGFJ9iPTWGGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked in and was immediately greeted by staff and had a table ready for me right away. Inside was clean and uniquely decorated. A
Had some questions with some of the the items on the menu and server was very friendly and helpful, did not pressure nor rush me. Ended up ordering a lemongrass pho and it was really really good I highly recommend it and will return for this in the future. I had an early lunch so it was not busy at all was easy to grab a seat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc9BgxWgjGmONhyaSTpX_f3m8ZGf5RpFwm1Tud&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Interior is okay, service is okay, food is great. A good spot for a quick and tasty bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhx_6PEQH5ZgBTp2f8izrZXo2UQDH6fuSaKSYW&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven’t been here for a while but it did not disappoint. The prices have gone up and the portions gone down but it was still as yummy as ever. Would recommend coming for a quick and delicious bite!! The spring rolls are AMAZING. Weirdly enough, we both felt kind of high after eating here, maybe cus of the neon lights?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKYPK-G9h-w8YIjdu6bxwGiV8iZafZM4-BP8tX&fid=0x0:0x14adca5d5100710a"],"When":"2023-9-16"}]

title: TAKO - Taqueria Korean
descriptions: Cheery, minimalist outpost for Korean-Mexican tacos & burritos, plus bibimbop bowls & poutines.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jaime Libby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWcuQUZBXxCRF5-27cV4MrzyteNpvh8tPhlqiQSMkU18wPjoAf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tacos are freaking amazing started with 4 of each kind had to get two more to try them all.
So freaking good!!!
The guy at the counter was so nice gave us water and cleaned up after us right away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa-Rv7TmsmOO28limP0dDRaGe1qDWnlq10jR1k&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"AJ Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsu0-zLfdBIi0BMvFkmCrQ7LvpDpcqpsmyMO44b1viyR7y0ygy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An outstanding taco experience for sure. Decided to grab some tacos before the Weezer concert the other night and love the idea of Korean flavours in that format. Turns out, unsurprisingly, that it works really really well. The Korean flavours combined with the delivery of a taco was an experience That I will definitely, definitely do again!

I tried the Tako Taco and Gangnam Taco and both delivered with big flavours!

Also grabbed a Corona while I waited for my food cause it is busy being at the steps to the skytrain and right across from the arena!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMArRTOEJIiRszjFLgCEA4OoBwmJN73C6y0K9YQ&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Ryebread the White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYI7riSNbXzxJTj16rHlDS_OZW-ptOhXUz30OebmywxJ6z7_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Immaculate vibes. Wasn’t too busy when I went, staff were chatting and joking around with each other when no one was at the counter so you know they have fun at work. Food was delicious, pretty decent prices, and convenient spot by the skytrain. Will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObU2-Cpak7f_V8iCHywb2EsLTbCP5TyxDspZEU&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice little eatery, conveniently located across from Rogers Arena and right next to the sky train station. The service was stellar! Very friendly and attentive staff.

The chipotle chicken burrito bowl was REALLY good! The spicy pork and beef short rib tacos were lacking an element - a sauce of some sort would take it to the next level. The spicy chicken taco and fried shrimp taco were significantly better than the other two.

I'll definitely be back! Perfect meal pre-game or pre-concert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlCRIy0m04ppJJ5NKb6AemtPXwq0GySUoJdJOW&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"Melina Faraone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGhWF6SDip0uRHcGmkbqvOFFL9wrSZJxAX1vssrjjh_8lBuKut=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place has great service and friendly staff, the cashier even brought us waters to the table even though it’s a fast place. The food is interesting but not bad. They had plenty of vegetarian options; there was at least one vegetarian option in each section. The tofu is sweet though, it’s the same type used for inari. I think the burrito & bowl would have been better with a different type of tofu. The quesadilla was fine but I couldn’t really taste the kimchi, and it has mushrooms too which was interesting but not bad really.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWvg5rcNNUekJW3FNSzy8_cu8zUv1eJWF-WEiy&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2023-7-12"},{"Name":"Angie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsm7lUHZmUGaGdcX8lFwvk_tgCxCRZArqbngkcHl5FANnfbBEm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soo good. Only had the rice cake skewers (so far), but will definitely buy again! The other items on the menu sound really good, too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAf93xHGyCW_0l8CF67smDaNzAVTUkjlcYHGtQ&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6JISdi7o-o-5brYgQvKoQPuBgWoAlhWZ4v-S-D1txqvQjtyc0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their spicy pork bowl and bulgogi burrito are so flavourful and tasty. They added some cream and spicy mayo sauce to the bowl and when I mixed them with the pork it supplemented the flavour even more. The bulgogi has a nice grill taste. The portion is decent for the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnYZE557Okyu3jho0LkLdZ6ppGTTV8o9uzHboL&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"J Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuhJ8VLmSrYDOHKh5VlLkb0TdL_oKDC7st_HxGZZFwtM3XYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bibimbob in a quesada with different protein option. A Great idea with a great taste! Staffs were also kind and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMefOxrjve62H4VCRvumnOyOV4btQXDT0J_f44B&fid=0x0:0x1425b0315edc6c06"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

descriptions: Modern source for build-your-own Hawaiian-inflected poke bowls, seaweed-wrapped burritos & salads.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve tried the other two Pokérritos in Vancouver and had good experiences. This was my first visit to this location and my first time trying the namesake pokérrito. Compared to the locations on W 8th and Hornby, this location is more optimized for takeout; the seating is just stools at counters along the walls and for me the counter was awkwardly high compared to the height of the stool. It was also a little loud. If you’re just getting takeout it doesn’t make a difference because the food is consistent between all locations, but I would recommend the other location downtown (or the W 8th location if that’s in range) for a more comfortable dine-in experience.
I tried the Diamond Head pokerrito and subbed out the spicy tuna for the vegan tuna. It’s still not a vegan meal if you do this because there are other seafood ingredients in the wrap, but I wanted to try the vegan tuna. It was delicious but very messy because the pokérrito is essentially a giant sushi roll and not sealed at the ends. You kind of have to keep it wrapped in the paper while you eat it but there’s no graceful way to eat the ends. I really enjoyed the flavours of this even if I had to get my hands dirty though. The vegan tuna is pretty good. The texture is close enough to real tuna that I wouldn’t have noticed it was different if I didn’t know.
I also got a tiramisu. When I ordered, the person making my order informed me that it was still frozen but it was still good frozen, like ice cream. So I decided that I’d try it and it was pretty good as a frozen dessert except the large ladyfingers at the bottom were slower to soften and hard to scoop out. The coffee soaked into the ladyfingers was pretty strong and the bitterness was a nice contrast with the mascarpone cream.
Their prices are very reasonable. The pokérrito and wrap came out to $19.90.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTjC9kGQ0l1NWQMC699VJJdGYmqQlrRwKIRRMz&fid=0x0:0xe1d6cf397e4fe3a1"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a random craving for poke when I was working from office. Got a regular build your own bowl for $17.8. Overall quite satisfied with my bowl. Generous portion for protein and lots of options for the toppings: I got spicy tuna and salmon with mango, cilantro, pineapple, jalapeno, radish, edamame, spicy seaweed and crunchy garlic. It’s also nice that they let you mix two sauces (the wasabi and super spicy one in my case).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuO6Qv7xMDVIgDa3hbEsZt0vRv6SVGybOb0rY&fid=0x0:0xe1d6cf397e4fe3a1"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Kasey Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgsP3vovAPWx3DTX3QaLRA4v3zTLZ6POmCD43Dj2s9RMbnYcSE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pokerrito is my go to place when I crave pokes! I love ordering my own customized poke bowl. Highly recommend creamy mayo+wasabi basil sauces :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5zg6Jnmkim5XP9WrjdiBc7TKUMStV8dFhp3-_&fid=0x0:0xe1d6cf397e4fe3a1"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Karla Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNs3c-MWimyZsLs7WphkCj7KqxFnWy9dkmzBMvPiaVBYFgkukk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service, the food is amazing. The quality of the ingredients are great.
I totally recommend you to come and enjoy a pokebowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlKW2udH9iCzs4J7Pjvaqo2D92seANvvgpH-4o&fid=0x0:0xe1d6cf397e4fe3a1"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Riza Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvD7JOMQn4e3Xz-hCiPiCXSLH-OSczl76x6ilWEf-V1tFJ-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The Asian women working there is rude, not polite was not friendly at all. I would not return. I have been to other locations with such a better experience. I ordered a burrito and it fell apart and the meat portions were small. It is clear she does not want to work there or provide a positive attitude to customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSHzFlWXO5vUtvNndE_yu2KUg5w1UUm-2yiDXU&fid=0x0:0xe1d6cf397e4fe3a1"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Sergey Ryabinin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzM2ooVPqRtZi3PBTSXbg3Cy_B-4LWBW0zpPrcAuaKmhjdOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The experience is pretty inconsistent.
Sometimes it is great, sometimes there is a long wait + wait for online orders.
Also the serving is inconsistent too: you can see the same dish in size large (left) and regular (right) in the picture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOomps6h0Ls3Z-ErXmadXCCGgH_Q0ByO4kFg5-v&fid=0x0:0xe1d6cf397e4fe3a1"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Lk H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1VFwnEbKInZmeJFVJ2c8hj26Y8kjlvh-hZrEoTpilcC1w0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite poke in downtown. The fish is fresh, in particular the crab mix is the best, value is pretty good for amount of food.  Very efficient service and fast for work lunches. Not a lot of room to sit, but great for take out.  #contestentry","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin Vila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM2hFJ2b4ZWEjgOUlPAyCOh7OiMgSztG_MoTFKLvq2TjG8z6SMkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had such an amazing service. The girl was smiling the whole time and giving me recommendations. Food was just perfect as usual.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdZ11tC3UAHiYhYCJiYYgDLOgjtJNOJsbXmGxj&fid=0x0:0xe1d6cf397e4fe3a1"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tammy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFow-Ji8MW2HXqG4vJQsFkRCD41LVkbxBsThihs9ptpGx1GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was not my first time visiting this restaurant, the food was tasty and eating area was pretty clean and comfortable.
The day I visited I only ordered food without any beverages, but one staff came to me and asked me if I wanted a cup of water kindly. I have been there for few times, there are always some customers spending time there with their own books or laptops. This restaurant is a good place to enjoy your chilling time with delicious food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtVXTPB17bLf7VLzhZxQrri0WyglczckqJ7kRt&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Daithí Kilcourse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpB0OmItsLBGGhpfNEcY_0lXbdAla_7jQ1ZQyMfHX5aboK6jFV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here for lunch today. It was the best food we have had in Vancouver so far. The food was so fresh and it tasted delicious. Not a long wait from when we ordered from the lovely staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGuIdrbl-uBRWL1zPNfedjA8OTVPwOZIbRlywl&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Salina Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxpGx9PtwU6w3sKuOjsoqRRctoryZk5GPJZ0KpCJuDAxGw6fJT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had no idea they bake the bread in house! The wraps were sooo good and they had so many flavours. My first time here and I'll definitely be back.

Big and spacious inside. Very clean. Staff were all super nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvKRCQOR56SSGxU7wG2mUmJBFdDm4Jh7AWL_Ud&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Sandra Tran Do","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9l6s1YZWB64Ki1thgUudvXKddmLpHe47fEzkyE5Wrayj1VfeG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The location and ambiance is clean, I love the service they were all nice, they were kinda slow but it is an event.

Their food was okay, I like the chicken wrap, the rest I think the herbs were too strong or the flavour blend was too bland. The pita wrap was too thick. Kinda got sick after two bites. Their pudding is not my jam. Their coffee is good though.

Not sure if I would go back but it's overall because it's not my preference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfvl0aMVzgbw-nxTILWaFSpXWw1Evmn4C9q5Eg&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Maide Akankyzy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLZQ6R1MIhLiOq8tOJ1zdSBrE75Ib_i0mdE8A-R65vwE2xNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Zaatar W Zeit. The menu is halal and there are plenty vegetarian options too. Food is tasty light and healthy. I especially love their green pea and kale soup. I also got one of their wraps which was delish and filling for me. Not to mention the kunefeh in a pan, it’s mouthwatering. Their happy hour has great deals and combos are really good. There are also to go salads so whether you dine in or take out it’s amazing. The place is clean and spacious with spots to charge. I love the ambience and overall everything. Perfect for a late evening too because they are open until 10pm. Service is great, Anna was very helpful. Overall 5/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTBkkjdT-TlW6x0joqLR90fSSR-lO6kn32-s8s&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Marina Garvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaQEZmQuInFCG4NBJpPjICbEG7y2Te3dnyglNmkqbq7FM8dlCz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great spot if you're looking to grab takeout. We stopped for a late lunch and ordered wraps—an avocado wrap and a beef shawarma wrap. Both were delicious and nicely packaged, making them easy to eat on the go. The café also offered us a special on salads—two for the price of one—but we passed, even though they looked good. The only downside was the service speed; we waited about 15 minutes, which felt long since we were quite hungry. Overall, I recommend this place for tasty takeout!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlqezKWKJp-06tTeVHF3IzY4P_yCJ9wEplVGn7&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Anas El-Aneed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlQ9-9X_Ve-n29FTeSernlhjnhGb-3U9yFLZsMUHalU5l4CfNoZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant for a Lebanese street food. The atmosphere is nice, welcoming with lots of natural lights.  The service was excellent and our server Regina was nice and attentive to our needs.  And yes, there was a bonus free coffee ☕️

Loved the restaurant 😍 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbC3VgQwnUVEFyAfoKHgIm_FVG-uAhAJ_c98FY&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Shahrzad Ansari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOyxW9ZyOea2CyWqUA5027lihrOFopi5FFC-3ipT1D5AWv1VGI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My visit to Zaatar was fantastic! I ordered their Famous Chicken Wrap with a spinach wrap, and it was absolutely delicious. The quality of the ingredients was top-notch, and the chicken was cooked to perfection. The restaurant itself was clean and well-maintained, making for a comfortable dining experience.

To top it all off, I received excellent service from a kind and attentive staff member named Anna. Her warmth and professionalism truly made my visit memorable. I highly recommend Zaatar to anyone looking for a tasty meal in a welcoming atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtnvtZ4IPE4q-u7-Y_2cVHEM9ymp4j_wUYtC8&fid=0x0:0x5468105dc33deefd"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jason Reeson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh-Y92ozUOY9zg0xrv6XBV11CnB_vozWUAEEtVxVTKZvxWlKY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered delivery to our hotel. Everything tasted delicious. Thanks so much. Ordering was so easy and the turnaround time was quite fast. My only criticism is that we ordered delivery to a hotel and didn't receive any utensils, my wife was fine as hers was to finger food, however I had a salad with my meal. Perhaps I missed adding that as an option during the ordering process, if so that's on me. It wasn't a deal breaker but just a suggestion for future deliveries. Will be ordering again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa656aSCnSzu43qDMzXQD-kVhpgZnZEYZKvKf2&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Chris Read","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJibxYccyqdQ0DQjW_1sroaoIwlQVomTmtmbgBpgjU8b-HsEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was amazing from the get go. Joe looked after us very well. Efficient and friendly. Was on top of everything but wasn't annoying.
The meals we had were fantastic. I had the fettuccine with lemon chicken. Brilliant meal, struggled to get through it but couldn't waste. Partner had power greens salad also with the chicken. Awesome. Dressing was light and adequate but great mix.
Totally happy we had a local recommend and nice background story for Vancouver. Be proud.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2zpCwLE2mSRe8fGOt_W8Ji52zQvpMR8CYHhlZ&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Red Redd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuW4frUJu_cv_DYJEwwpKzwj49L3WlhcWpv94rtKYLdajgtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Host has terrible customer service skills and worse manners. I’m writing this review now as the host/bus boy almost kicked me in the face while whipping the table next to mine. If I’m eating your foot should not come anywhere near my plate. Also the server who’s normally fantastic and the epitome of what customer service should be like asked all the tables for last call except mine. I didn’t get to get dessert because of this. Not my best experience here. Also waiting 10-15 min for a table when half the tables were empty and the ones seated were mostly waiting for bills but the host said they were too busy to seat me until the manager came out. If the food wasn’t tasty and good past experiences would’ve given this visit 1-2 stars. It’s only because of past vists that I kept a 3 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK7rRtzYvouwA_wKgfzICpXon9t2wG-t8h8g7O&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Henry Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUABDWdPKSgYOx_VW37XgvaNwZiAjvcgif90JdTJS8qojd5SO-G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so happy to come across this restaurant after worshipping at the Vancouver Catthedral.
Ordered the hearty breakfast and coffee. The bacon and eggs with sourdough toast were delightful, finished with the coffee. Wishe there was the option of Cappuccino or Latte though. Anya (or Enya?) was friendly and responsive though a tad shy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgNawoJjTZfQJTzd1IImkknNUCBSwzFvzFpgTO&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Brad Snelling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEo3ECglbJcC95bDjcm377gDXh3jMd9KEP9ANqJRBVc9D4SrM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Thanks to server Lindsay, me and my friend had a great meal and enjoyed the soccer game this afternoon. Had the special lemon grilled chicken and avo smash burger with fries and coleslaw, milkshake and blueberry pie for dessert.  Always good but miss the drive-in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqVXcCl2mdQbGdsQ79dFq6CgOgjW92G46NjFAg&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Mana Ghotbi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCCq8-gQVBtOypj2F9bK23mShq_4HPPBzG6tsM9uP2H6_ytRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went there for early morning breakfast so I was the only person there, lady who was my host was super friendly and nice she help me with menu as I am very new here in Vancouver, quality of food is superb and variety of foods are amazing also portion size is pretty good plus the one that I had came with unlimited chips , highly recommended 😍😍😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMThYzeiM163edDQT14zp4WZdCH2gO1eemhGI7_&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Hyunseok Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9NdXRoCWowr3I9cTr7cAKr3rHpxRcJ6KI6hAnP9dLBoaaPpqB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for breakfast around 8:30am weekday after we found another brunch place we wanted to try had a long line. To my surprise, I really loved their BC sunny start and crispy smashbrown potatoes that came with it.   Venue feels upscale and has clean and large bathroom on a separate lower floor.  Overall, didn’t regret the visit 😃👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOAJ_TP0GF0zR1j1TIu1cPipnEocD3qhakiZKk&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"William Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUaq8ltCYsMuv88ftRZ21aIDFNwPHGbQ9WfIAwcQDv8tEP8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was recommended to dine at a White Spot by a local and this one was central and near our hotel. We ordered one of the burgers which the waiter suggested and it didn't disappoint. The chicken salad was also tasty. The kids had their Kid's meals, which were great value with a drink and ice cream. Our waiter Joe was awesome and gave excellent service. Gave lots of recommendations on what to do in Vancouver too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXnR_FXl_q3OarmUvNSjdae_iYAoKY0TbpSqc4&fid=0x0:0x9f659e640e5029e8"],"When":"2023-7-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"YAN YAN TSO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhbLUIn1yZy2JSYF6hAmWuO50oMpGN3-gyPgpy-T7yn7P__hOD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"TASTY PIZZA, 10 slices pepperoni pieces per slice (I counted it while I waited for my STROMBOLI (it's like a pizza but wrapped up like a wrap!) and it's so gooey with cheese and so full of meat, it's worth the $10!   Made to order, piping hot, garlic spread with Italian seasoning (I dunno what they did to their seasoning but it was addictive and I couldn't even stop thinking about it I ordered it again the next day!!)

Fresh, quick, and very friendly staff (I had the same girl both times. She was honest and upfront about how long it would take to make my order)

The only interesting thing is there's no clear prices. On their take out menu.  Good simple clean menu. But zero prices.  Prices are only on their digital boards.

There's a bit of space to sit to eat there.  And a separate area for waiting for your order.  For a pizza joint this place is spacious!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbyg7C7ECLEnTskdXMRT1uaAIv2JJJb0fxjPAu&fid=0x0:0x7154d7ef27adf506"],"When":"2024-1-13"},{"Name":"Soula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWo4lJPUqhDoYHQrPJsQRFqnRLaRXGo6aqloBF8fpAADWGBgM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service! I could not remember my last order details, and they patiently found the details on the app on my phone, and made exactly the same pizza. Babalpreet was very kind and advised me to get a medium pizza - instead of a small), so I could have a better deal.
Very kind and professional. Strongly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"UNITY LIFE Mystery School","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1knA9ifMqPczsxebjyGzDBHkQ53wXPgd73IPPA5KNKcsdImU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one pizza joint with real quality. Everyone, rich and poor, is treated with the same respect, and never do they mistreat the poor! It’s an amazing price to eat there and I think it’s honestly yummy, and it has no addictive MSG additives too, so I feel much healthier about it than other pizza places. A classic personal favourite of mine.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arsh Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp8PtKOR2-zOsj7JRrdIqNsMMW9fYSwvSHPQ6jEj0a_CohLkyI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to the place around 7 pm and the staff was really nice. The girl that helped was super nice to me, she explained me all the deals and gave me alot of options. I loved the place, food and staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Snehpreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdcbqQepWAjf-bnWnS3k40-HXS84KZkmyZHQ0AaMxIUhMOnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really appreciate the services. Shivpreet was soo nice. I was bit confused. She explained me all menu with prices. She made my pizza which was quite good with thin crust, garlic sauce on base. So yummy🤗.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ranjotkang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9ZgGE_c0rCMVLWkjAQ6s-C_8moBJ3npvqP9h9Zs9GnI2Y-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my birthday yesterday and i came in canada few months ago. I visited at pizza pizza with my friends. I like the services. The great thing is lot of veggie options are available. I don’t know name of girl but she was working there in morning. She was so nice. Thanks pizza pizza to make my day memorable with delicious food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY-3EwmF92mBjT6rd5HLYM-xKGTjh_ikXs4m3Yto3WyRTtcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Living nearby, pizza pizza is my go to lunch spot for a quick bite. The food is tasty and service is prompt.
My server today was Shivpreet: she always remembers my name and lets me know if there are any fresh pizzas on the way! I really appreciated the extra effort.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emilie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINBA2dcaLJpvKBu6WUpF-u40Klx2AHogwLxG_SrDai5QuKr-hO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Please don’t come here unless it’s your only option. Come here if you’d like to do the eating 8 day old pizza without gagging challenge","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkZwAeZ858avpfbbjOCNPkRWtbdynJxtbR87Ao&fid=0x0:0x7154d7ef27adf506"],"When":"2024-6-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maggie Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9U1AHWIFw1hld34yP6Qh8FF4aghlscjOvV-nNysqvix3aqwV5jQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"atmosphere is good
service is good
food is ……
— order appetizer mussels： not fresh at all. seem like nothing inside
we reported to the server immediately. She called the manager and they got the dish back and exchanged all the plates for us
— then we ordered the tuna tataki instead： it was almost well done😅😅
We didn't make any complain since the manager said its free
then we waited almost half hour for the main course
— steak combo for two： average","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9c80kLwhn60V1YhcfkYrJFF_cPaaIAvrwH9FH&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"kaa ki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC3dgKPE6ZTd2SPBlgPMC-RbTEi6jGZ-HeowI3QJCreWu4ms1NUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chop Steakhouse & Bar offers exceptional cuisine and a superior dining experience.  The ambiance is delightful, the service impeccable, and our server provided attentive and efficient service.  We were all highly satisfied with our meals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPipnFMeFu894Qaq3LDzEQWpOPRmehd6dFF027W&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"James Daryl Masangkay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsOOr75jSDB7CTf1K8b_M8gelmVHQzK2OO9xFkkgxIh0tC1guB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We used their function room for our intimate wedding reception. The room was spacious to seat a maximum of 14 people, which was more than enough room for all of us. We liked the privacy it offered as it allowed all of us to interact closely with each other and simply enjoy each other’s company. One of our guests brought their child and another one brought their infant - both of the little ones enjoyed the space as well as they roamed around the room as if they were running a marathon.

Food was excellent. We chose a group dinner set menu. For the main course, everyone either picked the prime rib or the new york strip loin. They also served kids meal for the young ones. All of our guests loved and commented how they enjoyed the 3-meal course.

The staff service was nothing short of top-notch. They were very attentive and efficient. We highly appreciate their thoughtfulness in giving us a mini congratulatory cake to celebrate our special day.

Thank you and kudos to the Chop Team!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhJQAYIsOn2dPmyfqQjW1251O5FZCg7_ylyh2k&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Tiffany & Jonathan Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDmqV_vPpkNlVLog5r8mLjzNvXOUZiSZ42g48phTI6E7Ri9W0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had a horrible experience, the only good thing was the company I was with...

Firstly, I have never heard of a restaurant telling patrons they are not allowed to change seats. My friend came a little later when they sat down, the waiter was so fast in saying "You cannot sit there.". Those were his exact words. Excuse me?!? They also commented, "I have to change everything if you sit there, so you cannot sit there." Like if it is so inconvenient for you, at least you can ask nicely. But no, they had to make back handing comments for something they shouldn't be able to dictate.

We each ordered an entree and also ordered appies to share for the table. The waiter repeated multiple times, "Who is paying for the appetizers?". They were rude and demanding. We didn't make a scene regarding our treatment by the waiter because we were with old coworkers. I guess this restaurant is inexperienced in splitting the cost of items. I've never had any issue splitting cost of items/bills in any restaurant besides this.

The food is below average. Steak doneness was not correct. Ordered rare, came medium.

I would not recommend this restaurant if you have a large group. They won't be able to accommodate. Based on this experience, I wouldn't recommend this restaurant period.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4zHkAgbHoRrOKkRvECojTK-3Eu2K8RoS16cUu&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Stephanie Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkm7-6oDkCCUAYi-g0TIlNBjHcGtnL9icDAQIQZDRmhrv8r7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was awesome. Flavourful, and all the meat and seafood were cooked perfectly. We came here for our 1 year anniversary and they gave us complimentary goat cheese and bread and also complimentary creme brule :) Our waitress was awesome, her name is Sam. Would defs recommend and we’ll be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQFnmO7iY2Zx6Dy-zsfctQ6ULkdIBKaqIxdDM-&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Hzl W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGU1MwPkRNg4PvzWhvSV-sYjN_XAcFBZ1LJZfkgPJETJ943us2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice steak.  Ordered a prime rib and NY steak.  Both were juicy and cooked exactly the way we ordered. Salmon was a bit dry, but the steak was perfect.  (It's a steakhouse. Steak is their specialty, so we figured that's fair.)  Also did the dessert trio, creme brulee was the best out of the three.  Their non-alcoholic cocktails were great too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO58vL1J9Y3ghYrGsNOCB1Va_HKIj8_0xZNLsok&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"minnie li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRoQOlIxvrw__7xun_s22_XplGfNg8u2NALefXOOF5MWkjHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant is quite spacious, and the food overall is excellent. However, the soup of the day was a bit disappointing, tasting somewhat like it came from a can. On the other hand, the prime ribs were very good. We ordered the large portion, which was a good size for sharing. The mushroom dip was particularly enjoyable. As for dessert, it was just okay—nothing really special, and the portions were a bit small, especially the cheesecake. The crème brûlée was decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPG0yUY20cjL1G2NyZvvCfXIEb9mQsd5tJ0iIE&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Eric Hulien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO-Yy29vVaNcOIWTOR-rFBGH66CAFzfkHUsCk-at-RgB2dHH6xUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere is great, there is background music but not too loud for conversation. Our waitress Malka was phenomenal, Very attentive. We were pleasantly surprised with an appetizer by the manager. All the food was amazing, came out with good timing and all fresh ingredients. We were able to be sat right away without reservation. There was both inside and outside seating available! Definitely a spot we will come back to next time we are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5DMnfWBgUtTN_7rt7EPhWaLyiAtqHs-G_bzAJ&fid=0x0:0x4f4dc8cb87632674"],"When":"2024-7-8"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"London Drugs on Steveston Highway in Richmond is a fantastic place for personal care shopping. They offer a great selection of soap and body shampoo, ensuring you find just what you need. The personal care staff are attentive and provide excellent service, making your shopping experience smooth and pleasant. Their mascara and cosmetics selection is impressive, with a diverse range of products at bargain prices. The store is always clean and organized, making it easy to navigate and find what you're looking for. Highly recommend this location for all your beauty and personal care needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzHhFNEiO_JhHTD-ZA_p4Kg1nokQzthuwQ7poW\u0026fid=0x0:0xfa18f22847a9bd4c"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My review is specifically for London Drug Photo Lab. My husband and i came just to take a passport photo. Great service by Eddie, and he's friendly too. 👏🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3A_3Qpm04evM3sy7PVgSi4X0BhzY0B8xjBNig\u0026fid=0x0:0xfa18f22847a9bd4c"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Justin Swindell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKz6UW8EcavIYB3R3pgxDkb3SvjCFtwt3GgqQS8KsvEzKos7sU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The electronics department attendants are non existent, I've been there twice with having to hunt down the staff after 20 minutes or more of seeing no one. This last time I went I asked two staff that were having a conversation amongst themselves to help me make my purchase as I had to find were everything was on my own and just wanted to pay. They pointed to another staff member having conversations with other staff not acknowledging that a customer was looking for him at all, and instead of at least making the effort to say he was busy at the moment and would be with me in a moment he processed to have another conversation with the first two staff I had asked for help. Ended up just walking out at this point. Two out of the three times this has happened it's been the same guy that \"works\" in that department.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eileen Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUotK6bIs7p35Ro5gx5KSr2ebb1kEvT1YVakSt4N-Z4hzlou7o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today I went in to have my passport photo taken by Richard! Richard was very friendly, kind and compassionate with his job. He treated me like an old friend! After I taken photo the tall Asian gentleman with white shirt I believed he’s manager, he greeted me with big smile and asked if I needs help! Wow what a great customer service from Richard and the gentleman. Thank you for putting a big smile on my face! I love shopping at London Drugs","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Iveta Koeppel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJtCRWkcm9gFm-fVtoK_xMFQeRg_GqBzVix3YwNedWdcjyjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pharmacist (Derric) at London Drugs Pharmacy in Steveveston, Richmond (Ironwood) is one of the best pharmacists I have ever encountered. It’s obvious how much he loves his job and cares about the wellbeing of his clients. He went out of his way to make sure I get the right medication for my daughter, in the early evening of November 14th, 2024.\nThank you, Derric, for being so helpful, knowledgeable, patient, and overall an awesome Pharmacist!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samuel Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-xUJm8HV0p9SahBJRP6N77z20rf_RC6kW25iCx8evThdHNtk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in looking for a particular item they didn’t happen to have but that’s no fault of the store. Didn’t buy any other items but store seemed to be well stocked and clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Quyen Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNtBf8VGyRpLbHxxNkWIF4hGZiy9gfVhxTgQDT2ldqi4MMTXdL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went to get a passport photo for my two year old and the guy who worked there kept complaining how he’s not doing this or that or the chair was moved ??? And he had many chances to take the right photo and didn’t. Kept trying to rush us to leave too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richard Chi Fai Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD0_lEtVrk_JSHx17PEDvT88UQ8tBpitIaz04TCz90JnzlKWy__w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big, organized, free parking, far better than the one on 3rd Road. Like to wonder inside, always buy something here, beware of the attraction 😄","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joshua Ding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZPE1MNTiSYW266d26gwdTqL4M0B5bgmlpc2q-RY2uO7CjIFtW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"December 2024

Fabulous freshly made Chinese bun. Long wait due to make to order.
Enjoy knowing a fresh daily product. Smell appetizing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOvYEr6BQlsosYnZBXyR9isPV-kmiDOvKRazC5&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"NC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRXn7MhrYuulxUnAStsyAPxcJgk33_YlX1XE92srw1sAVjGeCWeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super delicious, very fresh buns. I got the crispy fried pork buns which was amazing. Lots of juice inside. So be careful when eating. Love that they make it in front of you. Makes for good entertainment while I waited for my order.

Cash only

Would’ve given five stars for everything, but happened to see the woman who took cash, then turn around and put the wontons into the soup without washing her hands or putting on gloves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8Eo73UKXrnC2IQh7OIzp6z7DIQbu9VF0pHECD&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Jennifer K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMkax_2fXXooiAm9665uAreOW8DfWCb1muQl5VZguzF-YboA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a new Chinese steamed meat bun place inside Parker place food court and has quickly become my favourite. I tried the pork bun and it was amazing! At $7.99 for 5 big pieces, this is a steal. The bun is super soft like a pillow, and the inside is filled with juice and a huge meat filling. The glass storefront is clean and you can see the staff making the buns right in front of you. The staff were very friendly and welcoming as well. Come get it before it gets too popular!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUU1UpITWn_bLGBgivI3ESy2q-apDd_aXrAh3u&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good value and delicious. I like how they have the option of pork or beef fillings. Love the texture of the pan fried buns and the dumpling skins were really well done.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDfGmyuJWp7plE5FXqbRhNQwLLmetG-sRs9ONd&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"What I think","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV29HaeFsNWkgPsI3q8cTp7ndAScxs2BDU3d8hn3sRLiNB2zus=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wonton soup base was tasteless. Pork dumpling skin were so dry that you can hear sound when tap on them. But worst of all is the service! No dipping sauce that’s supposed to come with dumplings, no utensils, napkins whether takeout or not. When asked for sauce, she said what do you want!? Then I (like many others also returned to get utensils), she impatiently gives 1 chopsticks even if ordered multiple dishes.
Served either gives cold shoulder or just completely ignores you. If she speaks, it’s just one or 2 words unless you speak mandarin her attitude is more pleasant.
Asians are not known to mediocre services at best, but this is the worst I’ve experienced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNlaOG-jK-Xr35w3yLWOVum1F50Jk8MCozFmly&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their bao and dumplings!!! So yummy! Bewarned if you ordered pan fried baos, you get 1 less than steamed bao. Fillings are very juicy. We bought some frozen ones and they’re just as good at home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU_9YGjLRYIPYKX4scFbzUe6I4ajXW6v685PLZ&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Yummy Bao in Parker Place food court impresses with their excellent beef brisket with vermicelli in soup—tender, flavorful, and perfectly seasoned. Complementing this delicious dish is their great Hong Kong style coffee, which is rich, smooth, and wonderfully aromatic. The combination of hearty food and delightful coffee makes Yummy Bao a top choice for a satisfying meal. Highly recommended for an authentic culinary experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhF8TdK-7o7WWel-ox967EHJ7QQMAQspUsv99u&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Tiffany T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlCK8Or5BR-LWatYwkWMq2L56DBJxoz0IK5n0EZtlrM786sA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The pork buns were terrific! The bun itself is the right amount of chewy and the filling is plump and juicy. They buns are freshly steamed which makes the texture even better. The dough is made in house and you can watch the ladies wrap the buns and dumplings. I will be back to try their dumplings next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpaZtuuVAGGZ0shpnd9kCXGZxUWE2f39cpYJMs&fid=0x0:0xcd36b94a79945790"],"When":"2024-1-1"}]

title: L.A. Chicken
descriptions: Modest fast-food joint focusing on fried chicken & classic sides like mashed potatoes & coleslaw.
