user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Majid Taherinejad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViDPiXU0JKzH_zVow85jmOX5CVYRWsJheQX5s1ReerMFEgHGH43w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"👎👎👎❌❌❌
I recently went to this fried chicken takeout place to order and wait for my food, and it was by far the worst experience of my life. The moment I walked in, I was hit with a nauseating stench of old, smelly oil. The whole place reeked of it, making it hard to even think about eating the food.

As a fried chicken lover, I had high hopes, but they were quickly dashed. The quality of the fries was abysmal—soggy, greasy, and flavorless. I can't believe this place has decent Google reviews because nothing about my meal was acceptable.

The chicken pieces were a nightmare. Instead of the usual thigh, legs, and breast pieces, I was served chicken necks and wings. It felt like they had scraped the bottom of the barrel for whatever scraps they could find.

The cleanliness of this place was the worst I've ever seen. There were spider webs everywhere, the counters and equipment were filthy, and the restroom door was propped open with boxes. It was clear that hygiene is not a priority here.

This place is an insult to fried chicken. If you value your stomach and taste buds, stay far away from this horrendous establishment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTGFLkmGAeIIIWkcAe46dmHOQ3sWhDWgGE9gBc&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Victor Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMFE5BNhgNfk5RtFjElijU5COak-F8KWg7vkC2eOWy-GXpNlUM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok, I've been wanting to try this place out for a while now. I usually read reviews before I even attempt to walk into a place unknown.

I must admit, the reviews are right! One of the best places to get fried chicken. No disappointments.

I got the 10 piece Family Meal (10pcs chicken (half/half), "Family" (large) fries, and medium gravy).

They have the right crispiness level for both the spicy and regular, surprising as I usually have to order the spicy in order to get that satisfying crunch. Anyways, the spicy is quite light on the "spice". The fries were good, although I like my fries extra crunchy; they were soft to bite into but still had a crispy exterior. The gravy. What can I say, but wow! It's actually made with a roux (flour, fat). I've never in my life experienced real gravy when ordering fried chicken. Needless to say, that's some tasty gravy 🤤

I was told to wait 5 minutes when ordering, and that's what I got. My regular chicken was still piping hot when I bit into it 10 minutes later. The spicy one was still hot, but had cooled.

Overall, what a pleasant experience. I didn't even get the prompt for tipping as there wasn't one 😆. You honestly can't argue with the price. I've never ever gotten a 10 piece, large fries, and a regular gravy for $35 or anywhere close to that. Go to Churches or Jollybee and it's easily $10 more.

Super friendly, counter staff. Fast service and you get what they say.

This might just be my new go to place whenever I'm in the area. Gotta watch the weight though 😆

One thing that you might want to be cautious of is if your parking there. It can be a little on the more compact side. Still space between cars, but watch out when someone is pulling out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3NKh3PtuLLTvb4Q7FPShhGm0F4tcbLDsBn6kQ&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Niloufar Mazaheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmR0rPTwq_DXIA1sLSHbkEVQL8L1x3WSgef_K_PkmOFLMBlA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had heard from a friend that LA Chicken was supposed to be good, which is why we went there, but our experience was the exact opposite. It was, hands down, the worst experience I’ve had in Canada.

First off, the restaurant itself was filthy. There were spiderwebs everywhere, and everything was greasy and dirty. The washroom door was left wide open, adding to the overall unappealing atmosphere. When we arrived and saw the dirtiness, we became hesitant, but having driven all the way from Vancouver to Richmond and being so hungry, we decided to order anyway. In hindsight, I wish we hadn't.

The food was absolutely disgusting. We ended up throwing more than half of it away and went somewhere else to eat. We ordered half thighs and half breasts, but we didn’t get any thighs. What we received were mostly bones with barely any meat, and what little meat there was didn’t taste like breast meat at all.

I generally love fries, but the ones here were terrible. They didn’t even taste like fries; they tasted like they’d been fried in filthy oil. We threw them away too.

I strongly discourage anyone from going there. If you do, be prepared to eat the most disgusting food of your life.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo8loJHcCkItt6igX_-AwiomTU6AhP4vKabcyY&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Shawn Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-YIiQlPOSReFNeT6qjGb923CSf84D0mfUae_jxylAzg3SJYVIMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been going here for years every few months. They used to have coupons but I guess ppl don’t use it they got rid of it. The chicken usually is crispy, not this batch today. Possibly because it was only the owner working there. Tasted similar to KFC today for some reason. We ordered the 10 piece special; great deal. Gravy is always solid. 10 piece regular, small gravy $35. You’ll have to ask for more than 4 ketchup if you’re gunna ask for ketchup. They have a store # but no one ever picks up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEy9JkEEcTsMB-92iLS_CpfT9a4t_VPTCSUPF5&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Kay Murray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_wOujHd-cAbXtQgjViTsA8s5Q7f4jA1EGkg0bXOQIom491Brj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love coming here for taking away fried chicken. They come in hot, juicy and crispy every time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYORaHWSLXGnNAeCdy7VCp6QV6LKFrbmudAZiJ&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Herman K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFxZg1i8kmZZmjRPD7Dawy7dScHEufsFpJaghfzr36uZwkvVtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Used to come here and enjoy their chicken a lot. However, the recipe appeared to have changed and gotten much saltier here without much seasoning. Huge price jump (23%+) also steers me from going back again. Sadly, probably better to go grab a deal at Jollibee or Church's Chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtAYKfRG-I-YxXxaLfQmNlbz6_10iKpBZN9FJE&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Chris Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtjKZfUumEKtngU5rtNJNS59sX1pSqb_RymG9KAKCuGqll4CrY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Struggling to understand why this place has such a high rating for fried chicken. To me, it’s the worst in Metro Vancouver, worst than KFC, Church Chicken and Chicken World. Meats are dry, not juicy. Seasoning is bad, too salty. Can’t find any positive points","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNelu7nCZRDJPwhBH496hBnriMbYA-ai2Xw_h15&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Karl Nikko Espino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2owmLIGhNQOu86rP6AAefE3e6KqBYMXelA0v7c2qUlHZOzA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LA chicken is one of the best. This is My go to restaurant everytime We have layover here in Vancouver. Chicken was so good and their gravy is the best. They always give me extra 1 pc chicken for every order. Staff very nice and serve the food very fast. Free parking in front and there's a nice park across the restaurant where you can chill and relax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSZZf6mqxvg6XuFd5MASMtkGkPcl4-5sZT23c1&fid=0x0:0xe62738cec803c0cd"],"When":"2024-8-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fanny Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXm8EoBzG77BIIjdpRb_CFwMHE1opsPQ_grOt4OaM_e6SqT8dAD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food court in Richmond is where you can find the most authentic, delicious and affordable food. Went to this food stall for lunch to try their signature shredded chicken. A combo for two came with half a chicken, 2 bowls of rice and soup. Pretty generous portions and fair price at $33. The shredded chicken with skin was tasty with great flavour and not overly oily. I would revisit for takeout or quick dine in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhyOKXiY4qpUwtiDdzkJCu2afSUq5jR2E54_fz&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven't been to this food court in a while and very happy I visited again.  Shredded chicken with their special rice and soup was.... Sooo good.   I love the shredded chicken with bits of chicken skin mixed in.  The eggplant special on rice was good as well.  A little on the oily side but most eggplant dishes like this usually are.  I have made a list of other items to try next time...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI3lA-8QfvAZ6rQFpVi7ZAnPjBSOLGDGkXIwh3&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Notesa Pooh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrjOWIJY4AVspUp0spzz7a7iVD4XW0AuZy93pCons02uHEEhjh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"$16.99 chicken, soup and rice
The rice was not very hot, but it was tasty.
Chicken was pretty good
Soup was nice too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfYsrY6X7IcBv94e4g0hAMJmH9EH_1xrh-2mxa&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Jason P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwQ6VrAafrL568UtVUXBwRugwDfBdgtXm5PLgDAxdMUbNAFin6DA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fei Mui is in the food court in Pacific Plaza. They are known for their shredded chicken. We ordered a combo - shredded chicken, rice and coke $16.99. We also got the salty chicken nuggets on the side. I was expecting steamed rice with the order but it came with a fried rice. Overall, combo was tasty and good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOkygOG1nHDr-TG9rxkcUsfXbmPKBgF1f1wGae&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Steve Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL0RjsrOlzpEGWPHTtGVBnzxg9_uzeaMd5fBXngEdoTt8WbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the famous shredded chicken, half. By the name, it should have half of a chicken, but there are TWO left chicken wing tips. Each of the wing tips are at least 3.5 inches long!!!

Chicken wing tips with that kind of size, the chicken should be quite big. At least a quarter of a chicken is missing from that tiny box.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPvx5Nh7oNpFYEHyE6CYqenm8JudOyIu3uL6kk&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2024-4-13"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love their hand shredded chicken super tasty
The lunch combo serve with rice , to my surprised they serve it with fried rice super yummy, rich in flavor and not oily
It’s in food court so not much to say about the atmosphere it does get busy especially during lunch hours
Parking is free in the mall
The owner is very friendly and nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFwvKrbiNggfKxY3koejFWk0FCivho-NJ8YZon&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"NN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWveMvGobCJlvOaVQ63o7qJlGt3Osfm-B4efuBk6RGEMDx62cJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This one is really popular in the food court, but I find the signature chicken quite salty…the stirred pork kidney is also salty. Perhaps I should order the rice rolls instead…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaPJ0cfbIj-pd8PaAUinaQgtAvXhbt9EDjjdZk&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2023-12-4"},{"Name":"Wei W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILZJl0UBAeMaYNSusoLWCs03tKI25WxjtJRGt0lJ__NHOtfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's crazy, this place is the bomb! If you're into Cantonese food with a twist, you gotta check it out. I'll order from here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYCdLuUrJxsjioPaIc3w2HIuOtu8rdIzPGT6Oi&fid=0x0:0xd8a269db2c52d372"],"When":"2024-4-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best rice roll in town. We always get it with the black truffle seasoning and the old style rice roll. The ingredients they used are very fresh and quick ordering system. The roll itself is so soft yet chewy and very thin. Perfect for a quick bite of breakfast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRJRQVGUBeMwJnz9sVejCdhLnX3Yr9RfMR4ddT&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Edith Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJmOen6EtIl7Ej_JFqybjeY6J0ua3WQel6_FE_xI_4sbCJAgJF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rice rolls are exceptional - so far, we have tried their beef and pork, char siu, and mixed sauced rice rolls. Looking forward to trying their other ones!

Their congee - preserved egg and mixed pork, another with minced beef - are decent (my dad really enjoyed them).

Steamed milk with egg whites was also very good, akin to the old-school Hong Kong-style. The stone grinder black sesame drink was good, but I prefer the egg white more.

The seating area is not great (considering it is in Public Market's food court), but the food here makes it worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5gd8FqG9_iS7lx4J3PHZL1AF5cpP5xsSOZQKA&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The three-combo rice noodle rolls at Xi Ji are absolutely delicious. The rice noodles are incredibly smooth and silky, and the sauce adds great flavor. It’s a really satisfying dish with perfect textures and taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO88M65SZmUdcmVlt3hK5egQpWyHAaMo2iIU3Y2&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Melanie Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOnCXlUyDGCRthUKehak0_GUp_az2pTQqceWOyRQ-aAN0D6lJP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Out of all the food stalls in Richmond Public Market, this one appealed to us the most because we love a good fresh rice roll. And they make them fresh because you can customize them. It'll take about 15 minutes. We ordered the beef, pork, and shrimp rice roll, and added an egg for $1.50. Free toppings include corn, bean sprouts, and scallion. It was a good rice roll, but I wish there was more meat and egg - or at least that it was more evenly distributed. The meat was all on one side, and the egg wasn't really spread out. $11 CAD seems a bit hefty, but it's comparable to NYC prices, so I'm used to the price tag.

Tip - cash only","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLK-W6tKFCnBRUShTg56XWDcueDt6XAF7OMlBA&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered their shrimp and minced beef rice roll. You can customize your rice roll. The sauce and the chilli oil is amazing. Cash only, plenty of seating. Wait can be long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqmjnz2StZl_kB-6nM9lTiiSF4eUjIbzxYdfhw&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Jesse Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqc4Js_hbpSJyGd7HxE4_GSDRsIjYI5FHNMKdapkO7Vpm1mm0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s unusual for me to give restaurant 5 stars because most are average, or super expensive ones I expected it to be good for the $. It’s unusual to get something that’s good, tasty and reasonable too.

As a ex-Hong Konger, Hei Hei rice roll hit the spot for me, the rice roll were perfectly textured, not too mushy or too dry and firm. It’s not too thick. It’s what I used to love about good Hong Kong rice rolls. Even the fillings were tasty and their flavored soy sauce is 😋😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHZr0-P8i_s3JHOoq032ARoj8O-Jk1pWcqypBq&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"R L (Froyo)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCqdbgWznhU2EnuYICmvYBK8n_bnBg-Riap63TsJBz3enHzr0T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is prolly the best rice rolls I had in North America lol, even better than some chain restaurants like Yin Ji Rice Roll. The wait was super long which is kinda annoying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN0LGzQkRpWIF8lwWdzgjrU6s4KMBUQ9QKv3FK&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple of times.  Their rice rolls are silky smooth and the soya drink was refreshing.  First time trying their congee and ordered the one with fish and it was also very smooth and tasty.  Price for the 3 items was around $18 which is reasonable.

Will be coming here if we have cravings for rice rolls and/or congee in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7hSE-DXEVh5GI_DOvgimFzY4XWekZoLa8R4K7&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of our go to Chinese noodle places! You have many choices of the type of noodles, as well as the different toppings.

Our typical choices are thick noodles with beef tendon, beef brisket, and chicken fillet. We also enjoy the deep fried squid and chicken wings.

You can order more toppings, and they range from $1 to $1.50 per choice. You can also get more noodles, but you must order the same type, and do so when you order. The choice also comes with a choice of sauce, but you have to select it. Drinks are additional.

It does fill up fast since it's quite popular. And the parking lot is usually full if you go for lunch on weekends. So it's best if you go when it opens at 11:30am.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTyGY8m4RyZdvsom9qhz8arOIKr4SvIBErHu1W&fid=0x0:0x54d7d1e917e42af0"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you’re craving good Hong Kong-style street food, Wo Fung Noodle House 和豐車仔麵 is the place to be.  Their deep-fried goodies are the stuff of legends!

Our Top Picks:
⭐️ Deep-Fried Chicken Wings (風沙雞翼)
These wings are crispy on the outside, juicy inside, and have just the right hint of ginger.  They’re a fan favourite for a reason — don’t miss out!

⭐️ Deep-Fried Squid (Tentacles) (炸魷魚鬚)
It is crunchy, tender, and utterly delicious — perfect for a snack that packs a punch.

⭐️ Deep-Fried Stuffed Tofu (Fish Paste) (炸釀豆腐)
It is a crispy, savoury delight that’s a must-try for tofu lovers.

⭐️ Cart Noodles (百搭車仔麵)
Wo Fung 和豐 has over 40 toppings, like pork skin, beef brisket, and radish.  You can create the noodle bowl of your dreams!

Overall, the portions are generous, the prices are wallet-friendly, and the flavours are on point.  Wo Fung Noodle House is the go-to spot in Richmond for a quick, satisfying taste of good Hong Kong street food.  Enjoy!

📝📝

Food: 🍗🍗🍗🍗 Should Try!
Service:  👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳
Kids: 👶👶👶 A-OK for kids
Price:  💲 $20-$30
Presentation: 📷
Parking:  🚗🚗🚗
Tips:
📝 Accepts cash or debit cards only.
📝 Can add a drink to make a combo for an extra charge.
📝 Have to mark your order on a paper order form.
📝 To check prices, you must scan their QR code.
📝 Minimum 2 toppings per cart noodles bowl and each topping can only be selected once per order.
Would I Return: Yes 👱‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1nI5aLuJVIRLqt3h3V18q3oRIgLOs7IjndYw6&fid=0x0:0x54d7d1e917e42af0"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Matt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSqC773LnF6p4Lu_u1jiSkdAX2Z9Dd01duxg-nPaiIrSZ3H9w4Gg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best fried chicken wings.

The soup base + noodle is $11, and you'll need to order at least 2 toppings. My go-to are 雞排 and 牛腩. Can also get free curry or satay sauce on the side. I usually order 3 toppings and share the deep fried chicken wings, and one iced tea. I usually spend less than $30, and always be full.

During busy hours, you'll probably need to wait for 30 mins.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsHQapcxICmCtUB9-ETXRRXUV6cAFxL3AUWc9y&fid=0x0:0x54d7d1e917e42af0"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"KentTa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9sDh51B2GR28uJKshUftP6vtMtumYW-ozVd4mMEHsPMyVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A spacious restaurant. There are just so many choices of toppings that you can probably find something you like.

The taste was good. Portion was average.

however, 油麵 was a bit different from what I expected. The taste was good, though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3Q-Y0ZVwsM6FYHHGWSZPvk45AAi6N31Zm_og-&fid=0x0:0x54d7d1e917e42af0"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Kuroba Yukiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9Ff2IkJvTHMYmFto4R6BwKKolusKDzzLVa1Issn5rC6L-518E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The classic Hongkong 車仔麵; great selection of toppings but the prices are somewhat high.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQwOGfgn6ax6LJXGFXH7P2jWxXifSgusCjqcEK&fid=0x0:0x54d7d1e917e42af0"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"K Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBu4_ZaAgECG41rev8GrGyGl2x4Ekp-734YP2jktPLGAnRXGaB4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You don't need to go any other place for che jai mien this is "DA ONE". The whole bowl is hearty and tasty. When you order a bowl of noodle you can get lemon ice tea at a discount. We really liked the porkchop this item is $2.5 very lean no fat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNe4TsXADvEOppO4Kk7mQf-VrI47WmVUFPmFAvv&fid=0x0:0x54d7d1e917e42af0"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Harry Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIuvYZbi0_LgxbeQgBvaMWaBVQeo6SdN187Jb2vf2LE1xidcpj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The noodles are overcooked and the selection is limited. Most of the famous ingredients of the traditional ingredients, beer internal organs, of 車仔麵 (Cart noodles) are not served here. It's rather disappointing.

Service is in fact very reasonable, which contradicts most of the reviews available online. very friendly staff compared to most the Chinese restaurants in Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G Ped","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHrmrXYvTUYCXIUoj9_ZTDNXBgGGkCpUWPmGom6IuIKQRtiIIpPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Spur of the moment dinner here on a cold, Fall evening. Ordered some of my fave dishes - deep fried squid tentacles, chicken wings as sides (these sides were to die for). Then also ordered my soup dish (oil noodle, satay sauce, chicken balls, wonton, pork slices, tofu skin) while my wife ordered hers (oil noodle, tofu skin, beef brisket). Soup dishes were ok. Bill after all was said and done was just over $50. Service was quick and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-h_bYvyf0h9VYDa7jjKhr-h5adUHlkCfB8Q39&fid=0x0:0x54d7d1e917e42af0"],"When":"2022-11-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Taiwanese food is one of my favourites. A friend suggests 'Old Street Express'.There was a long line, a hint they sell good stuff. I tried the 'Chicken Nuggets Noodle Soup' includes honey green tea for $13.50. I request for the popcorn chicken to be in a separate container so I can enjoy the flavorful soup and the crunchy chicken. My daughter tried the ‘Popcorn Chicken over Rice’ with free honey green tea for only $11.99.  Food quality is beyond the price.  It was delicious and comes in a big serving. This is an economical well well-spent lunch. I will be back and recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjS1b0QO0CehFMNhEeXrv-k3l4YMIMvB3XU1KU&fid=0x0:0xe5b4823de693b043"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Vy D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJga54ieWis9gS6TxlCbLf3pelnlP6Rw5sjWmq8-ZCzwaEu9rgT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came to the center to shop but got hungry. I decided to stop into this stall because they had the popcorn chicken I was craving. They have a ton of different options and many various meals you can get.

The person at the stall was very friendly and helpful! Service was quick and I waited maybe 5 minutes for my meal. I got the popcorn chicken over rice, which comes with a bowl of ice and bok choy, a drink, and a decent size portion of the chicken for about $12. The chicken was made very well, juicy, and tender! The only thing was, the chicken was not season on the outside. I was expecting a bit of salt or pepper, but it didnt taste like much of the outside was seasoned. The rice was drizzled with some sort of sauce probably from another braised dish, it was delicious!

I thought it was a wonderful meal, quick, and made very well. I would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHeUOJFfYYit-Wjlnk8jvoyJa2EJG8ZoZjbEXa&fid=0x0:0xe5b4823de693b043"],"When":"2022-10-25"},{"Name":"Full Circle Furniture","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr4bpuidNQ02Dgb1nhuasIli9Gk7npmvj4h6OrmzPkBi8rpmY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been coming to Old Street Express for a while for the beef brisket noodle soup. We actually crave for it especially when it's cold out or raining. The portion is good, flat noodles are chewy, and the soup broth is tasty- not at all tasteless like other reviews mention. The drink that comes with it is just bonus (and there are few options). Best value and very decent quality for Taiwanese food in the lower mainland🤤","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HECTOR TSUI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPHvrmtaI1O2D0-x-SnMYQHFcVbVOFBUQO2vkU_SgmBqfbyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Its rice is harder than its spoon. I should read the comments here before ordering. The staff is so stingy. I asked for a fork for my son and he took my chopsticks back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOveBN6ymfUNbMvOoGxMsVObV5Muf2hNrR2uES1&fid=0x0:0xe5b4823de693b043"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Missus and I were in Lansdowne Mall and had a quick lunch at Old Street in the food court.  Not sure of the low reviews, but we had no complaints regarding the service or food.  For about $12.50 per person, it was a very economical lunch.  The meals also came with honey green teas.

We ordered the Taiwanese braised beef brisket noodle soup and the braised minced pork on dried noodles.  The dishes were tasty to us.  We will try some of the other dishes on our next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyRBSTsS8dCi4TSd3Y0XQua6vNrNTMPoSa7aj6&fid=0x0:0xe5b4823de693b043"],"When":"2023-5-28"},{"Name":"Alvin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe7GNAcDD_olIxPvjJNxL1Hm7Qi7x4Wh-Txa7EiT1fdDm_8c2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent joint for Taiwanese style food in the food court.   Soup is average salty for Taiwanese beef broth, but heavily salted for those not familiar with the style.   Broth is flavors within the saltiness, but you'll definitely need a cup of water after.   Noodles where firm and bouncy with the thin noodles almost as thick as some thick style noodles at other joints, will come back for the thick.

Crepes are made to order and smell delicious as you wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCfZVNMK870T10wlthGSPZmB5uzpA3TaSXp64m&fid=0x0:0xe5b4823de693b043"],"When":"2020-1-18"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Update to from my previous post from 3 years ago when they first opened. Service is really fast. Had my noodles within 5 mins.

#2 Taiwanese Braised Beef Brisket Noodle in Soup was sooo goood. You have a choice of noodle and level of spice. Had the thin noodle and no spice. The meal also came with a comp drink.

Will definitely be back. This place also takes visa which is always a bonus for Chinese food in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz5HaiybmXQkoQM_OZfxXGsep_oePUWd0OIjUQ&fid=0x0:0xe5b4823de693b043"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Mediocre at best. With the choices in this food court I would suggest you move on. I paid $10 for about dozen squid legs with a plate full of peppers. The squid was tasty without being over fried. The noodles weren’t season correctly to be labeled Taiwanese noodles and they were a bit tasteless. If you were on a budget skip this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg9w6HWU9dXd4PcRkXaaCtHROAmYT7sEfNznN-&fid=0x0:0xe5b4823de693b043"],"When":"2020-11-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"蹟奇","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ3e6pcyA73GyEBQKixpIkaylsXbDDFhjhLskFoGJiuZ-c7g5f=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time here!

Ordered the salmon burger for the first time and it was absolutely delicious!
The service is very good, the ingredients are fresh, and the guests are cooked with care😋

This time they recommended the oyster burger. I immediately stopped~ Want an oyster burger? WT???🙄
When I came to my senses...it turned out I heard it right, it was really an oyster burger~
Then I will try it with curiosity and experimentation!🤭

I've never had one to begin with, but I've always wondered if oysters and burgers really go together🧐
Will it taste bad? I thought it was weird when I first heard it. The results surprised me again.
The taste of oysters filled my entire mouth!🥴

Friends who like to eat oysters. Be sure to try it, it will definitely make you feel unexpectedly delicious!😊😊😊

I will definitely come back in October!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-2L6v9la7aCDdD6sWFNGw2P7GMXSNlKT7wHjX&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"il sun song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5HEBvXIsbmaUpL_BhSS--tD0159gB7YDQHHarQxWsyN1_95k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They changed restaurant mood for new&clean! She recommends new menu like warm milk tea, beef brisket with rice and beef noodles (she make noodles directly). But, I ordered her signature menu for beef burgers &milk tea. Awesome! You can try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAw9Ar3KFr1VzRzK8aWBN0_puaiUMbHyV8UCY9&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Anna Sow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGINa1tQSRhNUVVCxxBrE_Nv4oNRI_DRNi_JeqaFLTuTKqVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A tiny and cute place with awesome food. No sauces (even for the fries) - just the pure fresh meat. We had a salmon burger and prawn burger with yam fries. All fresh and delish and the lady was super nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzdtW2U6gQtw5Q4jRsz0zlUWVrwwBg1_BEfd1p&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"D T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaRIdr8EX3V7WY9Qa4jOnAISw5FVr-4G9PhnivCRBjgZrG0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We can't believe we've been to Steveston so many times and haven't tried this place. A family-run, independent business that serves generous portions out of a small, unassuming storefront. We tried the classic cheeseburgers and the burgers were well-grilled. They also serve salmon burgers, hot dogs, and fries. We're so glad we tried this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcebW-AfD1t8ImM3YxAr916OQAAnzHze42DiJh&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Salmon burger was really good. My first time having it and it was very memorable. Not only is the burger good itself but the price is fair. I’ll have to try the other burgers some other time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY6LSmx5A-P_ujaxwV_zc-aR9bxLwK7VdcRaA3&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Azra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJznSd92fmJeHJSE_N0DPyGhtP3mgqz437BMaNyMM3NwBZMRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m astonished by how cheap the food was for how delicious it is! And the lady working was so incredibly kind. Most places ask for a tip, and I saw that the machine offered it but she skipped by the tip section before it was even passed to me (they’re worth tipping though!) Genuine people and great food. Would absolutely go back and recommend them 😊 nice gem!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4KNWv-lOdfHC1r_PuI2uHj_sTgMDtqeBsDtlj&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Dave Ballance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYX6nq_HLwpfRDMsBw6lLqPrWnr9cBkodLmufnMfPWG9e9gYI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super tiny little spot near the warf. Had good reviews so I thought I would try it out. Enough room inside for two people to sit, there are a few dedicated small tables and then some picnic tables outside.

Only had the $9.95 salmon burger. Was super basic but super delicious. Bun was fresh and slightly roasted. Salmon was cooked perfectly.

This is a super busy area for foot traffic on the weekends. Finding free parking in the area is like the Hunger Games.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrvBJw8sTQYOAgBfcQxJOIJL8xAd0BiyyUV6Ro&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Charles K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJF3odG4lYD9iSQQesocLriePBPGqgWQzctRM2vXxbF4B_trg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow amazing spot! Bison burger was exceptional, my wife got the wild salmon burger and it was fresh and tasty. Mountain of hand cut fries - a must try if you are in Steveston","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1lv4Ed8r8nOtwTVdU5obHKPvH0TvrCWCFaWfz&fid=0x0:0xe60aa568ba9e9fcd"],"When":"2024-7-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"McDonald's on No. 2 Road in Richmond offers a consistently great experience. The restaurant is clean, well-organized, and has friendly staff who are always quick to serve with a smile. The drive-thru is efficient, making it perfect for quick stops. I love their coffee and breakfast options – always fresh and tasty. The location is convenient, close to local amenities, and there's plenty of parking. Whether dining in or grabbing food on the go, the service is fast and reliable. Overall, a great McDonald's location for a satisfying meal at any time of the day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFey6sGuTLNH6Uf-3MxTvwPdPXd0tX7WHN_16R&fid=0x0:0x351996c33dc21857"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Jason Gold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4VPEgK26s28B32_4W6NuPYcZfuxORa4hkV5zVKcfOrSSz_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been here three times recently, and every single time, there’s been an issue. Missing hash browns, missing milk, and the McCrispy? It looked like it was thrown together by a monkey—lettuce everywhere and sauce smeared all over the place. (It was late at night. No other customer ordering )But the worst part? The bag and burger container reeked of cheap perfume. How do you expect anyone to eat food that smells like that? Seriously, stop drowning yourselves in perfume when working with food—it’s disgusting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn-qBQH1RQnuEDvCPBGHI-3FHnMCyHjz8M1qWY&fid=0x0:0x351996c33dc21857"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Joey Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2h6BhHbdVkJJLVWayFfW417pO3v1qiQNEEsRQKZgSH6Q8fALS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst experiences I’ve had at this location. Unfortunately, I had to make do because I work night shifts, and this is the only place open at 2 a.m.

They always get my order wrong—it’s happened three times now. First, they forgot my fries. Then, they missed my McDouble. And the last time, my drink came out wrong. But the final straw? They absolutely drenched my Filet-O-Fish in tartar sauce. It wasn’t just a little extra; it was swimming in it. Who sprays that much sauce on a burger? On top of that, the fish was cold.

Honestly, if I had a choice, I’d rather go ice fishing. At least then, my fish would be fresh, and I’d get to decide how much tartar sauce to use—not be stuck with this garbage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfCdZeQfzVYslFJxzoDkbe0m_x6q7XMfQhw08X&fid=0x0:0x351996c33dc21857"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"rocky constant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWszrstfNu5K6Xj-WLZqVyyZPrK-Lb_17AjfYlder_AeIBKxyoLZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clearly loved the cleanliness here.
The customer service is also great.
The meal is also well prepared and tasty.
Awesome👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD_BSKrkzSrFDsC0oq2SFcKkuDBcq7jGBgdPtX&fid=0x0:0x351996c33dc21857"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Jamie Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtljnytP9MzUubS0BzVaokol6FP4pb2PNW_RabgrCbwau3ZWO-YA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Its McDonalds...wait times are always long at all locations.  Staff are friendly. Came in for a dinner.  Nicely decorated for the holidays.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4w_0HyjZ8yTkk5eCoo6QkQ3C-r1D2qJM7Iz0c&fid=0x0:0x351996c33dc21857"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Shiery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9DXJLVvIr-wa3d-2e3EydDuliMv6o2ZbqlOPoJwltboCvQg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Excited to give the new Firecracker McCrispy a try. Very disappointed with the product. It looks like the ingredients were just thrown inside the box. Sad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5P3naBTuH4g62BGIw7UAYve4uz9TpevEvnTXs&fid=0x0:0x351996c33dc21857"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Colin Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKsZm0dxkoaNVpT_U5MSz6Hu71-aJgYtlTkTneFejPbF30OZkbOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"When I ask for a printer receipt, you are obligated by law to provide me with one. I don’t need a long diatribe about how it can be accessed in my email for a mobile order, or how you normally throw them out as soon as they are printed. It doesn’t come out of your front cash machines’s printer when I select “dine-in” pick up, as it does other stores, but it comes out of the printer at your packing station. It comes out instantly after I press the button and I see my mobile order number written on it.

I understand that what you “normally” do is toss out those receipts (garbage, instead of recycling, am I right?), but they print out for a reason.

Your non-response when I repeat your legal obligations to you as you continue to attempt to school me on what you “normally” do or where else I can get my receipt (which I already know) and missing the point of my request is a reflection of your comprehension skills and not a problem with the request.

I’ve had this issue with other locations and discussions with corporate always come back with my request for a printer receipt being reasonable.

Do better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Priyanka Midha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKajzsSJ3Px7JmNZvNAzHi3N0PMGfMNqh8c34Gn30wEjvvyHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went to this McDonald's today and ordered food. They ran out of sweet and sour sauce. Cheese burger was really sloppy and no onions. Fries were cold. My son went to ask for a refill and he was told by the lady supervisor that they don't do refills from 3 years. This is unheard of from any McDonald's. I think they are just trying to be cheap and trying to save money but doesn't seem like it's looking good for them with all the bad reviews. The supervisor had no name tag and was not very pleasant to talk to. One of the worst McDonald's I have ever been to.","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Relaxed haunt offering Chinese BBQ & side dishes in compact surrounds, plus a take-out.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good place for a quick lunch. Entry from the superstore parking garage. We tried crispy roast pork and duck along with sides of rice. The pork was excellent, duck just okay. Portions were a good size.  Service was very prompt and friendly. The visit to HK BBQ Masters was like being in a crowded Hong Kong restaurant for an hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoEDI7G_1mFML639xnFAiBtAKFk_BGNRNIkWzW&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Hung Do","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU97mpWni6hYlMOFamrkAWxpjDrzI4CjYuf3tuqzHM44ftqh6JV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place is very small, prepare to wait but it’s worth it & the line moves quickly. Short menu, just BBQ meats over rice. Steamed veggies & soup of the day, that’s it.  Cash only. Parking garage available for customers (free).  The soy chicken & cold salted & boiled chicken were perfection. The crispy roast pork was on point. The BBQ pork was good. The white rice was perfect. Steamed veggies (2 types) were good. Soup was on the sweet side, no MSG.  So so good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnm1HKMEUW-aEix5nSJ6HobuWcNYlHjPExC62Z&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Thanh To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd1WYJP1UmnIbSg76XorhMDMrCl48AkAncBIVkE7p0lcIIllbB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is good but does not live up to the hype.

I've always been a fan of Chinese BBQ. Seeing all the social media contents about how cheap it is, I had to come to Richmond check it out.

The roast pork belly and duck are good, but you can find better in Vancouver.

However, we had to wait 20 minutes to get in. The price wasn't that great and the portions were small. It was cash only and we didn't get our change back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB_fh1pSxO022mkGwsCTR_Bds7ZWfha0jColO7&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is so good!!! It is always so busy but the line moves really quickly for dine in. Their line for take out is even longer but it also moves very fast. Both the bbq duck and pork are so yummy and affordable. A combo with rice, meat and broccoli is around $15. The soup of the day is also delicious and I think it’s most of the time boiled from duck bones, as they have different soups everyday. Their milk tea is really sweet but yummy. Also be aware that this is cash only!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG9MDLTIKgJE1LgeKEDsc264WitCCiiJFs17nn&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK BBQ Master is a must-visit for BBQ lovers! The BBQ pork and 燒肉 are both delicious, with a perfect balance of flavor and texture. The 半肥瘦叉燒 (half-fat half-lean char siu) is especially yummy—tender and flavorful. The daily soup is 真材實料, full of real ingredients and rich taste. If you’re looking for authentic Hong Kong-style BBQ, this place won’t disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjMZO-Z-GWwExQQ4aCZvhFbx45SVXaXLtw6UUW&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Royal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIE8-P_rSsN5YnwwsMB_lRDuUDhR2CQbcnGIW45Tididjjs3IpZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a long line but so worth it. They have a separate line for take out and dine-in, so if you’re eating here, make sure you get on the waitlist.

Service is fast, and this isn’t really a place you go for ambiance.

Get the soy sauce chicken and bbq pork combo. Rice is also cooked very well, and goes so well with the sauce, which you can ask for extra on the side along with chili oil. The Hong Kong milk tea is also good.

Portions are smaller than from when we first went here, but that’s really a sign of the times.

Cash only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR4QTKLViOmPqjDm1b9bUIizs6ZSICbzA9aeI1&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Colin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7h35ZtHaveCK9eq8-mDb7BmK8EeHfVN1usnvgcw8J_phkrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very popular restaurant with delicious BBQ meats!  Popular items sell out so go early to ensure you get what you want.  Free parking underground.  Friendly staff.  Lots of awards proudly displayed at entrance near the washroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF3iwl1wIIy4ylhJ20HkNVjBF5YSFEFkC5gfX4&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Jay Son","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn0RkZudJ2rqo44cPCXRGdjl8jGgyzJ1HQ4rCm07nKJ8WlmMkc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The roast pork was definitely the best out of the town items I got. The meat tender, the skin was crispy, what else is there to say? The char Siu on the other hand was alright. Half of it was dry and hard as a rock.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMok1enFreJYpm8dEuvGQl_9x5-Pnz_e-6Mo_N5&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-12-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very big generous portions, cheapest Chinese food you can find that tastes decent & is better than most mall food vendors. The deep fried squid was especially good. The veggies were not over cooked and were fresh. Service was quick and she even gave me a complimentary soup and a side of beans on top of my 3-item combo meal. Can’t complain when $15 provides enough food for two adults!  Note this vendor is cash only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkQz1z_3bucCK2thXV5-ymveSV6ryoYwZG7qKS&fid=0x0:0xf534f50c4e8da542"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever we have a potluck in our warehouse this is the place I go to to get our food. For $54 you get 4 large orders which is good for 5 to 8 persons which is the best value for your money. Take note they are a cash only and they do not accept debit or credit cards. Servings are really bigger compared to other stalls in the food court. The drive going here took us almost 30 minutes but it is worth it  because of the food you are gettng which is also very good tasting and very affordable. This is a must visit whenever you are in Richmond public market. I highly recommend them for you to come try them out. I love this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKoOc7k6A0Xv-IcD98mVT3VLluB6rW9LDt6fS0&fid=0x0:0xf534f50c4e8da542"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Anna Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGBFoq-wqDtsu2E9VqMHDA2tmYvRFFvgHrGIpF8C_kgl3YFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here for the first time.

-Eggplant has too much oils and not enough flavor. Tastes old.
-Soy sauce chicken is decent.
-Honey garlic ribs are good.
-Noodles have no flavor and are kind of dry.

I like that they give extra veggies. Complimentary soup taste like water and kelp.

Customer service is best for people who can speak Chinese. The one guy who can speak English is unhelpful when it comes to food suggestions. The older Chinese lady who serves the food is sweet.

Overall, there are better Chinese food locations than this one with similar price range. I don't know what all the hype is about.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rupert Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt8ml-zyELcJn5n7mbMObX0OVwwAVyqI04N4IqTyH4TJ2dVGE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped by here yesterday for a quick Chinese lunch. What you get for the price you pay is really worth it. We live in Surrey and we make a stop here everytime we're in Richmond. The flavor and the portion servings is topnotch!! Will be back again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMisfeFACNGSmnhjjymCAwQNQunbhEf-Fslfux_&fid=0x0:0xf534f50c4e8da542"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Sue E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICcqHscHU_79ANCxjsuIGnZlyEJ01H_X0yqHSZFUvVWMFJxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must try!! Great place for authentic Chinese food! Also very good value! $15 comes with 3 items with rice or noodle and it also comes with soup or tea! Super large portions! More than enough to feed two. There are other stands there that sell take out boxes as well but this one is the best!! Wish you have other locations as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3eEYIoYgPFS0Q1GoTs1S_vP61kDv3lSBnU9IL&fid=0x0:0xf534f50c4e8da542"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Gwendolyn Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIuZBduGkP2J5tMkLziCnoFH3EybLsSoRXMEtupmlP1PwFd1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The portion is so generous and it could easily feed two people! I didn’t take a picture of the fried squid but it was super yummy and still crispy! The Sweet and Sour Pork and Eggplant was really good too and the man packing our food was nice enough to give us a bit of veggies! This combo was only $14 and taste more authentic than your average Food Court Chinese stall at the Mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7PGhTPbKG7bM15y6blTGyjxeJQdbgP4nPBRQ&fid=0x0:0xf534f50c4e8da542"],"When":"2023-7-14"},{"Name":"Sai Don't Know","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV-eBM6H5FN4T3LcIScJ1puBW7JeNYx8NzuvibYHnYz6jsghA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great serving size, value for money with lots of choices, and other combinations to choose from. Not offering gluten-free options. Not for people with low-sodium diet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsenREgbgK04oc5F2B5HYQfolikYqppqQJecHV&fid=0x0:0xf534f50c4e8da542"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend told us about getting a two/ three-dishes rice at the Richmond Public Market, so here we are. We picked Captain Wa simply because it seemed more people buying from them. Perhaps also because it was right at where people come out from the parking lot. They also seemed to offer more dish options.

The portion is very generous like what it was famous for. We chose sweet and sour pork, stir fried beef with mushroom, onion and celery (mixed vegetables), and Sou sauce chicken. The lady was so nice that she gave us a bit of extra broccoli.

Overall the food tasted quite good. Sweet and sour tasted what it supposed to be. Pork was rather fatty, but not too bad. Some of them might have more fat than meat.

Stir fried beef with vegetables was alright. The beef was good. The typical texture you would expect at restaurant with a tiny touch of baking soda. It is difficult to not to overcook beef at home. One of the mushrooms was very big and might could have used more time to cook. There were not many slices of beef but mainly vegetables. It ended up a good balance as we only ordered meat.

Soy sauce chicken was a good surprise. It tasted as good as those from a bbq specialty shop. It was still tender and juicy. If we come again, we will definitely want to have this again.

For the combo, you can choose steam rice, fried rice or noodle. We choose fried rice and it was pretty good, not greasy at all!

We ordered two juice drinks, one mango and one is guava. They did not taste very good. We would recommend to order those soft drinks that you would normally drink.

With a three-dishes combo and two juice drinks, it costed $22. It was totally a bargain and a treasure in the times of increasing cost of grocery and inflation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUytulLu3pin9OhsE099KMm3Oyr_mp-3QRA8-0&fid=0x0:0xf534f50c4e8da542"],"When":"2023-9-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Standard steam buns which come in a lot of flavours. We tried the lamb and chicken bola bola and both were good. The packaging is cute and they are decently priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyG9lggJfJe0DNUCrXZD-ATB5eq2vObE1hzBj9&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Brian Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtarcuPrvp74h-9m2FwxE9fV5YKeJg5MrVzlp4yApJYWKFpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The buns here were super fresh and flavorful. The bun melted in your mouth, but wasn’t over steamed.

Store was clean and cute, and the service was fast and friendly. Definitely worth stopping by for a quick breakfast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf8ik_fFf1A8oV4WjjwvWmvJ6wTUkckcsKUDO_&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Kinda hidden away near skytrain station in Richmond. They still both frozen and fresh baos and limited dim sum.

Thought the vegetable was good. Also got the pork, shrimp deluxe, and spicy beef. Prices are pretty good and you can get yourself a filling snack/lunch here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK4QOz3ZiHKbMIsiea2mjI92_-9db5TUwiAR2S&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Marcus L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZLCsGchamGOA-Wtg05cndL2yjt6EBGtYR9Y9cWGpcdNb3N09u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Bao Time near Richmond Brighouse station earns a well-deserved 5-star review for its outstanding buns, notable for their perfect texture and just-right filling. The service is efficient, contributing to the overall pleasant experience. The store's interior is notably clean, enhancing the dining atmosphere. An additional charming touch is their takeaway boxes featuring a cute panda design, making the experience not only tasty but also visually appealing. Whether for dine-in or take-away, A Bao Time delivers quality and satisfaction.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM36DOaPJTzyRFd0vMHuDS1FVxVPB-eCfDvzT4&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Jake Ireland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKNtQxswocgmLB9xR9ShhIwanKhoMTyscepXpjzjZC8Oa7LjbY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Literally the worst charsiu bao I have ever had. This is why I need to learn not to tip before eating take out. Honestly i would have been fine with grocery store quality but it was cold in the middle and inedible. Not sure how the ball of meat is considered char siu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA-b7kk1V43D8-uxU1r1g-hJX2Kvlw3FsQcrIc&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Josh Adelberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPQIY95Dd5qTT4v8HVujr2S9ZRbjpJ4unK8708bVg5dP6QNSm2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The to-go box containing the gyoza came apart and fell on the floor when packing, and we were charged full price for the remake. Buns were not good, particularly the vegetable bun which my girlfriend and I had to spit out after the first bite. The pork bun is a meatball in a bun. Another had a large piece of cartilage or bone. Would not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW30m5DyUJTW5qRpoNvda1Hoqml8Bw7SXVlIY&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Stephen Allinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2v3Jveuy0xleyN1dCHZhwnXQxHwdVM4nASpSG0QK0q7o1ZL4q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been here twice. First time on a Sunday with my partner and today early before work.
(It’s really nice having a place to grab good food that’s super fast so I’m not late for work)

The veggie and shrimp buns are devine. My partner says the pork buns are also very good as I can’t eat meat.

The price for the two in the picture came to a total of $4.72!! That’s insane!
(In a good way)
With how expensive things are right now, this is crazy cheap.

The atmosphere is very clean and inviting. Nowhere to sit but it’s more of a on the go place which makes sense. It’s hot in there.

The staff are super nice and patient which is good because I’m pretty indecisive.

I recommend anyone who wants a good spot for buns, and dumplings and a quick quality bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjCcfyz07x4A4ExCYlsN6k415p3DEtWvUCqrzl&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"TOMMY LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWPgWPrOC1lvNCModpnvaap-NwRog6YNULAARQI9BtWfn14oeP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden little bun gem in the heart of Richmond (bus loop) area.
Amazing buns at affordable prices.
Fresh and Frozen buns to go. 👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNp3xdxG2weym4FO7Dbh6kJ1z7gf3JpJwH_q-d&fid=0x0:0x1e504312b478029a"],"When":"2024-4-2"}]

title: Dragon Bowl Richmond 龍肴
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eden Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb32XvkTwBP-9A0_TFOY3va_3-hnti8P2WjVMJqcB_0cvCQ1Bz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very good service but the food was a huge letdown.

The location is on the smaller side and looks to be a take out style place. The employees were really nice and walked us through how to order. They were extremely patient with us as we figured out what we wanted.

The food itself was nothing special. In fact it was a huge disappointment. The proteins (beef and chicken) looked like it was just hotpot meats repurposed to these rice bowls. The sauces were just so subpar! With a name like "Dragon sauce" that's named after the store you expect it to have lots of flavour and be unique but it was just sad and bland. The only positive thing about the food are the side dishes that tasted good.

I went because of the grand opening specials that were offered but even then I feel like it's not worth it. Not worth your time or money","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQuedsajqkntyslnnY_-zXMH9fXr6xNCFZbcYD&fid=0x0:0x2322e6740eaf87b"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Sherry C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCjt5qmVwwpJg8lWnAgonfAUPdT69jEeBQyYuoca7dzcelp6eB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looks very clean, healthy Chinese food, tastes good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO9gsUYX24YbWTCGHOupMLnA5Ync3dOHqGq67d&fid=0x0:0x2322e6740eaf87b"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Vivian Jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuU4Z56mfDkcWbEIsrRYWyZEPd6Dsd8wMuHU_j7lEj8Y4ivg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time came to this place, and the food is amazing, the service is excellent!! Nice hidden gem in Richmond!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5g5vXQB734b6gqimO9ndbpRCrXwJYtGXe98VV&fid=0x0:0x2322e6740eaf87b"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Nick Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2smJ37FxXpDq_UHDMHhCB08FzrFcnTzAa6Itz08OzV9GxxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Dragon Bowl offers an exceptional Chinese fast food experience! The food is always fresh, flavorful, and served promptly. Portions are generous, and the staff is friendly and efficient. Great value for the price. Highly recommend for a quick and delicious meal!

---","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHi2VVulMtiIwKroc9YXrrZtO--Fxc7whC7IkCRSNF-1TI1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food at very fair prices! I love bringing my kids here because there’s many healthy dietary varieties and all taste great! Very consistent food quality and service as well, strongly recommend all to come and try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRgzFnZgroL9Y33N4DBwaacSdFkeN4RYabvljB_DhEy_DSs0HIVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very convenient! I tried their Alberni location and I’m glad they opened one up in Richmond!  Quality of food has also improved. Lots more selection. Clean place and fast service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"皮蛋瘦肉露","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuAeGgkcAmFP6IDtdzNawXQzinmfNpZpkW7Nd-OF8YNXc3Wrs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dragon Bowl is a fantastic spot for quick Chinese cuisine. The dishes are consistently delicious. Service is fast, and the staff is always welcoming. Perfect for a tasty meal on the go!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"david yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYFTa7d1wp_1PYvhvCH6jeNY2XiugIQJL9rvxifIeCeta1EA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried this restaurant in another location and since I work in Richmond, I know this is a good lunch spot for me. This time, I tried the beef with spicy dragon sauce, the taste is very delicious, side dishes are good as well.","Images":null,"When":""}]
