user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marisa Nu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp1lLf5AmycJn6Yltx7B7XJhorTHGMot-SHilz28mBIc65vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can make your bowl by weight or go with their combos. Even with the combos, they are very generous with the ingredients. Reasonable prices, delicious overall and staff are very friendly. Smaller ingredient selection than places like big way but far less chaotic. Would come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyQDTBTjJ9VJSJ2q9JCHNxlJDKukQRjNl0hLO_&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Ryan Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLen1El5S6hV5WASenIk3dUR7CAYnKTzpDsxfE3BtWS-yMN2AE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fellowship with friends from church over dinner @ this restaurant. They are indeed the best place for mini hotpot and noodle soup. The server was patient with my friend who doesn’t speak Chinese and always checked in on us. It was a pity that we didn’t capture the fried skewers picture!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdCGvVmz8RPdjI__MECA86-fVTCFKLJHzCQZZT&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great tasting malatang for a reasonable price!

The interior is minimal, nothing fancy, but the staff was friendly, explaining how to order.

I would recommend this place for a small group, as there arent too many tables here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbnOEbfLPCDxxvyxSOvWcx2M9fD5y5ak1qer9s&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Julie H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMPfD2ZwFG-YKfku0X66npWhqTiGAOemuza7tQ4QSYz6xOgnqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the past few months, I drove to Richmond from Langley more than 10 times just to dine here. I was thoroughly impressed by their malatang and now I can't go anywhere else.  The broth is very flavorful, always meets my expectation. The selection of fresh ingredients was extensive, allowing for a customizable experience that catered to all preferences.

The vegetables were crisp and vibrant, and the proteins were cooked to perfection. The staff was very friendly and attentive, making the dining experience even more enjoyable.

Ai-Boiled Restaurant is a must-visit for anyone craving authentic malatang. I can't wait to return and try more of their delicious offerings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiL8PeiTBJN22S3Mc4-SX9LlCfZBtFeJhwKu5C&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Joanne Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd04XEe24rKKcNkVAZi5lQsa11WHDkcQgaDPfFrJkgVwHC3Alt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go-to place for comfort food. If you love spicy, you should definitely try their Szechuan style spicy soup base and choose the highest spice level. It is spicy but at the same time very flavourful. I like the pick-your-own toppings setup and I usually get the hand-pulled wide noodles with my soup.

Your order comes with a small serving of chilled edamame for you to snack on while you wait for your order to be cooked.

The staff are super kind and open to any questions you may have about their menu.

I definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqQwrsfDU8j98fddeWx7pPAQJ3lUWArO7fL6M1&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Amy Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMShEyNaVyqkg_udSZIL6AtgBldvcAt4vOmvtftAdUJi-LcA7I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best soup noodles in Richmond! You get to pick what you want in your noodle (by weight), or you can get the combos. I love their spicy sichuan soup base. They have a government regulated scale, so you know that you are not getting scammed or overpaying for the food.
Staff and owners here are attentive and kind. Came here for noodles twice this week and will keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzTRU9yjSkQBwazBLr5BCo04xPgmuipS-oo5sb&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice facilities, cool, chill vibe. Staff are very friendly and the soup base was so good! We like this place because they have different selections for soup base. I really enjoy the szechuan base and the numbing feeling! The other soup we got was a lighter and was also very delicious. The selection of things to put into you soup is fresh. We have been to lots of these places and this one price is very reasonable compared to the others and better selections for soup. It's is pay by weight so it's really up to you how much you want to spend. I definitely recommend going here, we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvQXBgDTSO2zBFoDo1iy5GZvQHJcnZhDzEkUIZ&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2022-10-21"},{"Name":"Nicole E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS7c-r86PTrcEUXG-lTevYMh99JAxbB0HQLG-WLyXOLYTgebOF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an amazing experience. Great service and delicious food! We ordered fried lamb skewers and the combo for 2 which included 2 ice teas (so refreshing). The staff was super helpful with helping us decide what to order on their extensive menu! Our jaw dropped when we saw how good everything looked and how much food came with our order.
We ordered wide noodles instead of rice this time, which will be our usual order now since it goes so well with the broth!

Definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhax2l222rUI1j25IL5WnJkv6Tl-RWzvS3Ori-&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-2-13"}]

title: Grill King
category: Hong Kong style fast food restaurant
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is okay but on the rougher side. It is surprisingly popular in the food court and there are long lines for this place. I guess it makes for a decent, affordable quick lunch.

Ordered the baked chicken steak with tomato sauce over spaghetti. I think there was a language barrier and they gave me grilled chicken steak with tomato sauce and spaghetti that was not baked instead.

The chicken steak was crispy on the outside and tender on the inside but over salted. The spaghetti was overdone and soggy. The tomato sauce was basic and tasted like canned campbell’s tomato soup. The almond milk was good and it was the best part of the meal. That’s about it. Mediocre quick service Cantonese cafe food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO99LeR_mS7wgI1V1hpakRIlD2ooHdv3Jquuv6U&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"walton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEnL5NiVk4SLyGUO2hteVdA9_rEbhDKQH6a80OIyGt1tYqRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always come here for the mixed grill. Reasonable prices, fast service, and decent portion sizes. The milk tea here is superb! They also accept credit cards.

Update: I also recommend the scrambled eggs and the Mixed Tea and Coffee. I'd give the pork a pass next time as it's a bit dry. The chicken here is consistently the best. It's super crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_g0FEw-1wfReWUc9JobbLE6XjulJHLSsKYVZd&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"John lender","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkcpQ1MYMsPpPJ3JDffI_rwr5iRvTie5E35hqQo57LwH2qf8Dv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Portion size small to small medium
Price is affordable, they willing take credit and debit card","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFZO8WKMERrThfdoF21SJOOnvFHmsCi_5M6YoK&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grill King at Lansdowne Shopping Mall's food court is a gem for anyone craving authentic HK-style cuisine at a bargain price. Their Hong Kong-style drinks are a perfect blend of taste and tradition, and the baked pork chop on rice is simply sublime, offering a delightful culinary experience. The all-day breakfast menu is another highlight, providing hearty and delicious options that start your day right or satisfy late-day cravings. The staff at Grill King are not only smart but also friendly, ensuring a pleasant ordering experience. Be prepared for a 10-15 minute wait time, a testament to their popularity and the care they put into each dish. Grill King is undoubtedly a must-visit for a satisfying and authentic taste of Hong Kong.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5aM2J_uSXhleEno4-s00PP4cZQbbPETjZT55t&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Kin “Roderic” Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkK6DgzCJShRK56e_AG3IdlwhFoUCgUIyiwOIpjvXciE9fRpo9xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"If u are in time constraint, u had better go for others.  Special stir fried rice Chicken and beef at a reasonable price and quality is  good but not the best. However, the HK style milk tea is really good and worth a try !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQSG7PatIOEqjV7QXnZUkhBgYZ_fS-ITBzrN8D&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2023-7-30"},{"Name":"Vipin Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT50cgktpApBPjWAYGyhFVZCVNAsaS2Walp_G2PL-dgGyln8ah=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited Grill King at Lansdowne mall in richmond, a Korean restaurant offering a diverse menu. I ordered make your own combo. The chicken steak with black peppercorn sauce was a standout, delivering a delightful blend of flavors. However, the overall dining experience was overshadowed by disappointing staff behavior. Language barriers made it challenging to understand the menu or seek assistance, and the staff showed reluctance in fixing mistaken orders.Instead of fixing the order they started misbehaving. While Grill King's dishes are commendable, improvements in staff communication and customer service are essential for a more enjoyable dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCxiRSExE6P-IIlck4LSauhTs5DZSBCONQYJA3&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2023-11-10"},{"Name":"KT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMygczddxuI4a92C2Ugr42x635CpGtQdIDw3VekXKUfhJMpcZf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the "Make your own combo" with 2 choices of meat, pork chop and chicken steak. The portion is decent and the food is good. It just comfort food. The plate comes with drink for $13. It's consider inexpensive meal. It also come with your choice of sauce and you xan pick either with spaghetti or rice. I picked the mushroom sauce which I don't recommend it. I think it is better off with black pepper sauce. I will definitely come back again for the combo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXT9jDiWy_v2SNVJLmr9vVJiKtNPRpU2pSnQ-O&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2023-1-21"},{"Name":"Bryan Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWheqOfPV6Imbi7zXGAnDY_wmDIKDFBeiYMeGR-JDGsdaJp4kxM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered an all day breakfast. The chef grills the steak and the eggs on a grilling panel in front of you. This demonstrates that the chef is full of confidence in handling food before the customers.

The steak is soft and tasty. The iced Hong Kong style milk tea is silky and not too sweet. Not too much ice is put into the cup so that you can really enjoy a big cup of milk tea.

The quantity of food is just fit so that there will not be any waste.

The staff is diligent, polite and welcoming. Although it is a fast food shop in a shopping mall's food court, your merry feeling from interacting with them will not subside fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGAwtYRCKjF8QUuoJvuTNWpzaHjZSFAemkpI2s&fid=0x0:0x3bc372fd58ebc4e7"],"When":"2020-12-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you find yourself in the Aberdeen food court, you'll probably see a bunch of people ordering chicken wings from this place.

The 6 pc chicken wings is $15.5 (cash only) and comes with perfectly crispy (albeit oily) whole chicken wings. Definitely a must order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuwui8cygxMXVtc1rqysVP9hcbGbSO2IG0Vjx1&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place for chicken wings. My order was for 3 wings but in other places they would count the flat piece as one and the drumstick as another so really I got 6 pieces. I absolutely love the wing tip as well so I love that this place gives you the WHOLE wing!! And the iced coffee was delish! Just the right amount of sweetness. This will always be my go too at this food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP41iu9gCWFdMx1NzXzsnlf7X-FKGzb1vkKxRz8&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2024-4-25"},{"Name":"Bianca Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLQf55yrLfuQpaVH5_PAPb-xLqdrIrBA83-7_og5_ndyF7MIm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place offers nostalgic HK food. Menu has a wide variety of noodles and snacks to choose from at a low price.

Their deep fried chicken wings are a must try. Super crispy and cooked just right.
Iced lemon tea is also a must try. Not too sour and the tea just bitter enough.

Service is good as their staff are all friendly and polite. Food is served rather quickly as well.

Is cash only.

10/10 would recommend giving them a visit especially for the chicken wings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCcdOIGZUzRmwPWL3XCWLix91q3eufaLhJwSwV&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of our go to food stall at Aberdeen Centre. The Noodle Combo with Ice Lemon Tea for $10 is the best deal at the food court. Noodle dish is consistently delicious.

Their Fried Chickens Wings are also amazing. Tender and crispy batter. Seasoned to perfection. Great additional with any of their meals.

Like a lot of the places in Richmond; they only take cash.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNafJRgFgerEYU-5m4t2rezoW-8z-kYYt4wOsnU&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2021-5-8"},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzmIMdClD_EKzaLe1KeBgD1C80_nJRRFvPT1-KW88LywkF0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best fried chicken at Aberdeen, always fresh each time.  Nice and fresh! Good alternative if you want to try something different than KFC or the Asian KFC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe0kH7KjWsvNwxAcn861Wb_HyIsQYrVOs0Q_ip&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2023-10-7"},{"Name":"Adam Myhre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlloGTdin2BEFn5bg_e4KC9zJLJE3T-tVTT7t76H3j3mWQRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you find yourself at Wu Fung Dessert, you simply can't pass up the opportunity to try their Fried Chicken Wings. While the wait can be a bit long due to their popularity, it's because each batch is freshly made to order. The wings are lightly coated in flour and fried to a perfect golden brown, creating a crispy outer layer while keeping the inside tender and juicy. Just a tip: enjoy these delicious wings right away to make the most of the wonderful texture and taste!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzgnBHfbcAtwpWPiyjojHghhU9PxVsZQU98kuL&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2023-3-20"},{"Name":"Rebecca P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOtv1z9oQXsu_j8G9uE8jVQGZlbdGZfOgnrsP8gOev0iFfifM3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always come here for their fried pork intestine and iced lemon tea! They also have crispy chicken wings. Never fails to impress , always delicious! The cashier is super nice as well.

Cash only. They don't charge for extra sauce. 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDD1Q5XX65h2YA7GmG_kv5hPYgUnpa97AcMcuH&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2023-2-20"},{"Name":"Queenie Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISJksm7onaGvsC6PRrel6FETnHs8Hxr0KSOLVM5a3GCcBzdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just look at that crispy goodness. The wings are the best dry wings you will ever find anywhere! Personally I hate ginger, but the very subtle ginger flavour really works with the wings. Also hate that everything here is cash only. Those poor tourists from Spain were so lost, going to every food stall and just getting turned away because it's cash only. So sad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8cAG_fpxuNYdZ2wzEOMxmsKBhC-UtptFsJTKN&fid=0x0:0x734f00640e2cfaed"],"When":"2017-6-14"}]

descriptions: Unassuming strip-mall eatery serving familiar Chinese dishes plus sweet & savory baked goods.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjXHHF3vPFKXXTvrLI9L9GLLX-x9A-g0rYHpm8C9R04tRthXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For $15.95, Nutritious BF (option E) seems to offer good value. I chose scrambled egg and chicken, ham, hash brown, and lemon in hot water.

They allow customisation in many ways, like jumbo egg for $2. Not worth it imo.

Chicken was cooked right, decent size, crispy outside and well seasoned.

I liked the ham. Thicker than packaged sliced ham. Taste right. It won’t make you drink lots of water after eating.

I loved the scrambled egg. It came in 1 piece rolled up. It reminds me of the egg in my sandwiches back in elementary school days. I wish they provide us black pepper shaker. I only got white pepper.

I enjoyed being in this place when it is busy. Sunday morning seems to be one of the peak times.  Sat among many people who speak Cantonese who came in big group/ with family.

When I got up to leave, I forgot 😅 my cell phone. Our vigilant waitress spotted the phone at the table and ran out to the door and called out “Wait!”. I am so grateful. Waitresses were really busy but we got what we asked for speedily. Here is 5 stars for service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBoe0ScbI9QNhf8rGkzMc9-E9pSPBe6svhL6Jd&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Christina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIE7SKDZvMmixPw_VGe3Ej13nq3C_PaModBiwAEK3j8WVG2oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s a nice venue.
I don’t know if it’s because we’re not locals, we are used to service asking how the food is.  If we need anything else.

They don’t seem too friendly.

Atmosphere is nice.
Lots of ppl ordered the lobster dish.  We got it over sticky rice.  We went to another location which we thought tasted a bit better.

We also ordered the crispy chicken, fried squid, and sweet n sour pork chop with our set.

Big tip: cash only! Or use your debit card they don’t take cc! With prices on the menu I’m surprised they don’t take cc.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO53vdar_UV7FHO2c3BdvhbufGLduqGkx1R4HD7&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Maling Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLxrVpvBLeDjDbqxSw5ebEuGE6ULYMthOqllAX6mlVH_M9G0Z2Ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Early breakfast at Happy Day Cafe in Richmond, enjoying A5 Morning Special with two eggs and crispy top bun (bolo bao) and fresh butter & Congee combo steam plain rice roll. Both come with a hot drink; we chose HK milk tea and HK style coffee.

It was bumping busy at 10am but we were quickly seated upon entering the restaurant. I do like the contemporary decor as table and booth/chair are in good condition and the lights are bright with high ceilings. It's not my first time dining at Happy Day Cafe and every time the cafe is clean and bright. The service is always friendly and quick (never feel rushed).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSwe-IGVazNpjRc5Zhx4OvnXrF9c4HHgC_FqnS&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We visit Happy Day Cafe frequently, and it’s one of our favorite HK-style restaurants. Their breakfast menu has plenty of choices, and I especially love the satay beef instant noodle dishes—they’re my go-to. What I appreciate most is that they maintain a consistently good standard no matter what time we visit. It’s a reliable spot for a classic Hong Kong-style meal, and we’ll definitely keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi40wakEX-8rxA5PfQP4P56rnOJ6XfafHBXjoW&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"JOE CHEUNG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITcUa8udaZfgZECEKe5qn4g0G5mpOKc-aHAY-YGVBDA4qWLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Saw some bad comments and wonder why so check it out as also heard positive recommendations from locals.
I went here for late lunch
It was ok, not crowded
Service, I can’t say it’s good but it’s better than what I expected for HK style cafe/restaurant, they serve me well and polite.
Food, the food I order is pretty good to me. The fried rice is good, the noodle is fine, the BaoBao is only one SoSo as not likely freshly baked as it’s already late noon
Overall, taste and value to me is good.
Do recommend to come.
May be some others comments are right too as normally what I see from restaurant is that when they are super crowed or busy, some dishes will be out of control.
But in general, they are good
So, try and see","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4VQqYGERJ7_Fs6VnYDbDrotmKYHuWJKLGk4r-&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"S Chow YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLft45tqKYa6LWItZoKD8gx_lrSIIWD1eS02qURQYYbl6j37Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Looks like it is hard to keep food quality stable here. I used to like it’s breakfast and take out lunch. However, it has been in several visits recently that I found the food quality varied. The satay beef instant noodles in soup that I ordered recently was way over cooked. Noodles were so soft like it has been cooked for 10 minutes. Satay beef is hard and tasteless. Even the milk tea that I liked most was lukewarm and not tasted as good. I asked a waitress if they have a new chef. She couldn’t give a definite answer. For me, I definitely would move it downward from my list of favourite cafes","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rick Cheney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5kbPUX907HB9-JPnY34Lwfl0RWkDRVqUKYSlfGhZk1gBu8f0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I went there for a quick bite after work today.
Satan pork chop with spaghetti was ordered with iced tea. Delicious!

Service was the regular HK cafe type, where you have to hail down your server. Not attentive which is to be expected.

Men’s room was actually clean and not smelly, that deserves a star!

The bad: I found hair in the midst of my pasta when I was half way into my meal, gross!

Atmosphere just went down hill for me.

I suggest that the manager can provide cooks with hairnets to prevent this happening to other diners in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvuZ4TJCxhbL-wdCwMfvbICQlXSP3ePWRJLzXw&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Hong Kong Style breakfast
Always very busy here
Quality of food really depends - some days are good and some days are quite bad
Today is Happy Day the egg omelette perfectly made
Satay beef I wish they can give more beef
Milk tea is good
Server too busy to be attentive but still polite
Plenty of 90 mins free parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBKOqJzZqFkUU8D3CEv4zQEUHqADY3R0B8KBoq&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-5-7"}]

title: KFC

descriptions: Restaurant chain known for its buckets of fried chicken, plus combo meals & sides.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgPjHOzvdovQYG0nECSXGEnZcNqqG6kW1mAG0JhkaIVa_QQWs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Tenders smell burnt. Food never consistent. Big Crunch was not crunchy at all but soggy. On top of that, chicken was a little raw inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb_wCQGQFegbVwJShasj272hz5qPzSi7a6L7jU&fid=0x0:0x39cdd94d24747c6f"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Bryan Solar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNOcO8CZ3diktbXNOIPT6b3_ngTxtv6tfzizrl42_a5Z7sTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thank you for the refund on the off tasting rather tasteless chicken legs but the whole fast food experience was not the KFC that I remember from my youth… even Thailand did a better first time meal than this…  you have to do better from the ordering front of house and food experience… won’t be back…sorry but we the customer wanted better!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I can’t say anything positive about the food they are making, I ordered two combos of 10 piece chicken buckets with 3 sides for 3 people and it wasn’t only me who said that chicken was over cooked, smelled on old oil, fries was too salty…
I’m very disappointed overall with this place👎🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAyovNJPWZ42m_7gr66zdSu8qmS8KS1hrvCAk9&fid=0x0:0x39cdd94d24747c6f"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"K Mok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNSY-FpjGzZVwZtdhzMfXAyYD2a78DKF4OlQe-P0kX74rxiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DO NOT BUY ORIGINAL CHICKEN HERE!!
First, their spicy chicken is very good (if they are fresh). I gave them multiple times, diff days, diff time, and diff months. If they do not have spicy, then walk away, don't be lazy!. Their original chicken is the worst in BC. See attached. I ordered this last night, I went in for spicy chicken, but they don't have it, I was going to walk away, but they said the chicken is freshly baked/fried, so i ordered, and went home......","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEa97C5b2yyhSA31mlbp42wl1iuAXMXzOyYZEM&fid=0x0:0x39cdd94d24747c6f"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"Badhasa Hailu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGZxvir8qFFEL621f5C2QUvz7VImSJKfHGdyHaE12wy3SdhIU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It’s full of hair. I ordered Tuesday special. After I start eating aggressively I notice something. Countless of human hair fried with chicken 🍗 and you can’t even see. I approach and showed them ~ they didn’t even say, sorry! No regrets, no passion and no promises to enhance their services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crystal squad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9v4ef8i7MgJM5dBV8Hao669ChdoXNpqMJp-uNS96Rh0tulI7z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought this today 16pcs for $40 and the size of the drumsticks are wings size now. The chicken are too dark and it's overcooked. I complained they said it was the size that was in the bag there's nothing they can do but offer extra 2 little pieces of chicken. I understand there are coupons but I would rather pay regular price for regular size of chicken. What's going on KFC you guys even took out the Tuesday special.
Very disappointed. Not coming back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnS73x9ieGQJRmLlIxFeZLUWOmF2Vw9pljpnpE&fid=0x0:0x39cdd94d24747c6f"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Charles Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3wGpXHO2JYs2dYW5qhaBpLHaarJpRBhge_Og0gYmTM_0UQvU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Placed an order online.  Website said 6:00pm pick up.  I went to the location.  Saw lots and lots of people still waiting for their order.  When I actually got to talk to a counter person, I was told I would have to wait another 25-30 minutes for my order to be ready.  When I asked why the website said the order would be ready at 6:00pm, I was given some cockamaimie reason that didn't make sense and that they were no longer taking orders online.  So, I waited.  About 45-50 minutes later I finally walked out with my food without so much as a "thank you for your patience."

I understand about places being overworked and  under-staffed, and I don't like to leave bad reviews.  But, this experience was just a dumpster fire.   I will never order or pick-up from this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"See Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1b9YtFuJOzXfWMti4ZPObAacNJXiQ-4_Ts-2npBe01ImHgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Harleen the manager was extremely rude.
She made me wait 30 minutes for my online order. On top of that she threw my dip for my tender strips on the floor and proceeded to pick them up to put them back in my bag. I asked for a different dip instead.
She left out the napkins, too.
Will not be going back to this KFC anytime soon.
Very bad services. She served all her customers with an angry face. Not once was she kind to any of her customers during my visit.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shutter Count","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9xomV5QhIh3sPjkQMd2iwbwQVRO06l8X2MYS0X_705Y8MSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Seriously this location needs to get more staff. There is always one person taking order and do the cooking. Unreasonable long wait times. And they burnt my fries today. Nothing wrong with the lady there. She just needs more help. Need a better manager for the store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7ZbXe3JdRY7PEDbjA4JKoEyydGCC463c0bcNB&fid=0x0:0xb0444a8163e337cd"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Asma Riaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7OB2MsUVtKQtdm_XKxm3QuApn6ttoNLlmHVuChur7S67j_FWljQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the Impossible Burger and even though it took 7 minutes to prepare because it rarely gets ordered, it was possibly the most delicious burger I've had in a long long time. Didn't leave my tummy hurting or anything like that :-)

Riya who was our cashier is so kind and accommodating. I adore her and her service. She always leaves us smiling. She's a great asset to this location, an absolute gem.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Michael Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgf55PRX0OrGGfSDRIElT-FtOTQXttYx-5Wv72AkHL17GfhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wah Gwan Mr. Toigo!?

Big ups to that East Indian lady handling both the cooking in the kitchen while taking orders and handling the till as well. She maintained good composure and was a professional from start of taking my orders and 2 others behind me til the end when I got my food. The quality definitely passed and was kept warm til I got to my vehicle. I got a Monty Mushroom Burger and a Cod Burger which was the Wednesday special and also had those two burgers  for the first time! Cajun fries remains crisp and she didn’t forget the extra tartare sauce.

I’m an old chef and heyoka empath. I usually observe how well  employees can handle a quite busy and tough situation especially when alone and this chick definitely did her job well and an extra body that can do the front of staff work would be essential in regards of sanitation. Last but not the least, a staff like that definitely need a substantial raise and a promotion would be nice too so maybe she can get her PR asap.

Triple’s food never cease to fail me and always highly recommended to go for instead of other American fast food joints aye","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crystal Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg9qjzCSeTWfVVI5BPt7Ueey8jSKnKO6nNUXVWtx1Z-9YkKnHR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The fries look burnt and dry. The taste for the burger is ok but it’s a bit dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP23N8mwOgdqFgoMVj2ayEqr9w-Q4lsMbB_5pN&fid=0x0:0xb0444a8163e337cd"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Wayne Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZDrN3_5_3hd1YD0CALrOPDw2BBp30qpPhbK-tRwZyJBdLtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location is the worst Triple O's in the Lower Mainland.  I am now willing to walk to the mall food court for A&Ws.  Worst service, no seats because they put them all behind the counter, and overpriced.  There is a breakfast sandwich, not a combo that costs $11 before tax, it takes 20 minutes for your cold food to be made because they have 1 worker doing cashier and kitchen.  The cashier won't let you order coffee because he doesn't know how to use the coffee machine.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B Costalota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxeByZOUNZx_nyFpGs7uhdSYM3rvUdnjIeZzy3-bcXh5YQmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"So this is a white spot take out and corner shop all rolled up in one. There is usually only one person manning the take out station so orders will take a little bit longer than normal but not significantly so. If you are looking for a quick snack or coffee then the corner shop portion of the store has you covered. I have no complaints with the staff, they have always been professional and efficient.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jupiter Riggs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhU0iN1gfAaD3DHRhlOwCxrI4dtnckZ-nE_RxohjSceqBPvidg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the workers here, Riya, I always see her working by herself, she always has a smile on her face and the last time I went she took my order even though they were closing in 5 minutes😭😭😭The food here is great and the service might take a couple minutes but I blame the management for not giving Riya someone to work with on her shift. My go-to place for burgers","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Comendador","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT0yY3xY418FsX01VuqfFTbmEUgiBvjSJHzJojHGsBP9NXnT0J=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here after work. Gurleen was super patient with me, despite coming in 10 mins before closing. 😅🙏 Very friendly and welcoming as well! 😁","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jean AL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHZElWQBXxO94dtT9KgGJK7XHG1qNDyUmkLB2erHhXg0xu9ngl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible service, today Aug 18 at approximately 8:55 PM at the Wendy's in the international area of Vancouver Airport. I ordered a small Baconator combo with a Coke Zero no ice. When the cashier was serving the soda, I reminded her about no ice and asked why she had put ice in it. She was going to serve another Coke but I think it ran out, so I had to wait. After waiting for the order, they gave me the Baconator with only 1 burger when there are supposed to be 2 burgers and the soda had ice. Unfortunately, I didn't eat it at the nearby tables to complain but if she made 3 mistakes with me, I can't imagine what's happening with the overall service. I'm bringing this to your attention so that management can take the necessary corrective actions","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPMwW5QFIzC0755T5HVS7UDhw4SSpS2iH-1tbe\u0026fid=0x0:0xb1c09df34a2806dd"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Luckily nothing is wrong with my food order here. But wow the customer service here needs a lot of attention. There were a lot of customers complaining about their orders. There’s no sense of urgency and hospitality. It’s pretty bad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl8zH9H3js6dwVlFVF7eopUvU3lEwS-0v7TEYS\u0026fid=0x0:0xb1c09df34a2806dd"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Anveralli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJCG6DpsNv1IPs5MmBXnykWNl13VTlE5tvADCasjwZ2WtrYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was there at 4 am. The girl said to me that they were bon break for 1 hour till 5 am. Then there were about 5 customers were in line. All set to wait. In half hour all of them left. Then at 4.30 2 customers were served so I followed.  This time they didn't refuse.  Another time,  I was there at 3 am. The girl said they were closed for cleaning.  I waited for half hour and then they served. Attitude.!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catherine Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocII1cRvxS7jDvczerKbEzQnC3xIYhgcVXYemhTQBgPrOFZ6ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They have no hospitality. They're rude when taking orders and having a conversation in a different language at the same time. I had to get their attention to take my order as they're always hiding in the back talking in their language loudly. They've also gotten my order wrong a few times and were very annoyed at me when they're the ones not listening when i initially placed the order. I asked she upsize the order and she said ok and when i went to pay she asked if i had upsize and i confirmed and she huffed at me and said \"wait!\" And then attempted to correct the other several times. And when they were preparing the order they were still chatting away loudly in their own language.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Mackey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtjUENIbBQtXX_RrVQpiSz_G3o-S3_6uUnScayz5KnjencGQuL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was flying all day and hadn’t eaten for over 24 hours. I came here extremely hungry at 2am, but the two women working said that they weren’t taking any orders. They would give out sodas to people and forget to charge them for it, but refused to cook anything. They wouldn’t do their job. I’m still very hungry but I’m not going to try again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arthur Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlxYPFkvC81vA5tasND7__T2ksVDw4UlwiyGw0M_hn9habTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Foods tasted just ok (sometimes very salty).  Coffee is horrible.  Serve speed is normal.  Ordering speed is acceptable.  Credit cards accepted.  Employees are basically nice and friendly.  Open till very late.  Public restrooms nearby.  Located at second floor in YVR.  Dinning area available with chairs and tables provided.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw7a6gfjLmgvqZq5--gX-ZgSKXapiJxMMX4PUN\u0026fid=0x0:0xb1c09df34a2806dd"],"When":"2019-4-24"},{"Name":"M T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHVtRq1Wvjkdpp4uXU-s4IBd14nwlmuiRYgb-Aulv5fXZ0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Cannot use app. Limited items, higher prices, OK, expected at an airport. However, zero customer service, nickle and dimed paying customers, long wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dunsterman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Sl32gPXH19Hwyqr2RTGnTKRyl-pC6zgPrc-niqf2vIM-KW8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a spicy chicken sandwich from this location. Half way through eating it I found it was RAW!!!! Absolutely disgusting. I will NEVER eat here again. It’s not the first complaint I’ve heard of this location too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUjO7Pjrtn2DaZtaZEYzSkOmzwCwwcarLcJxth\u0026fid=0x0:0xb1c09df34a2806dd"],"When":"2023-12-12"}]

Soy garlic and sweet seasoning are my favorite flavors.♡

Both were really crispy even once I got home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPazSOmNXP4J30fxnWTGD50eUBWUMx60etsjYjB&fid=0x0:0xeb1dc7cb52da3550"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Ted Garrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6q49V3UgHlfYfgT0MTBwy6WUs9MV6EfIWzrcUHEF4yorKyjo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🇨🇦 🍗 in Richmond was legit! Absolutely 👍 have to get the pickled radishes to cut the richness of the 🍗. The 🍟 were awesome and words can not describe the flavor of the 🍗.
👨‍🍳💋🙏😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQra4caSc6_U_Jm_HLosefSY9wP_NJBYwTrdLq&fid=0x0:0xeb1dc7cb52da3550"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Sala Zhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvaMf7a54YHbCsMCPPtNfHLzU_IY_diNscAlLc6H7jqe02rHY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is cooked to order so it's always a 15~ min wait after ordering, however I recommend calling beforehand so you get your food faster. My favorite thing here is their fries, it's so delicious and probably the best fries I've ever had in my life. I always get an extra order of fries and the girl who is working is always so kind, attentive and asks if I need extra ketchup. The prices here are really cheap, I get the chicko special which is around 10$ and it comes with original fried chicken and french fries. Great value, great service, tasty food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cindy Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh0Mb2aZNKSbCg3ecIqP5jBLg_O2xXbsUeepw6K_Oegut6R9ZuHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"2024-July, I called in an order for pick-up. It was ready in 20 minutes.

We ordered a meal that had chicken, French fries, and a drink.

The food was good.

Bon Appétit 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPULgy7ZhQFSLL88wQZj9WsHNvqT-yt74YqOy2a&fid=0x0:0xeb1dc7cb52da3550"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Charly F Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqxqGPCObubkWoTPujjRJZGgdRWyXFcBLVdPrVMMarDyHmGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I always come here, always good food. The staff is to focused on the online orders and literally ignoring the phone, called multiple time and nothing. Drive there and the place is empty, I order and they say 40 minutes… I called the other Chico chicken on No. 3 Rd and just a 15 minute wait. I understand the chicken is Fred at the moment and we have to wait, don’t mind the wait at all  but as a business you can’t just ignore the phone when your restaurant is empty.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"joe burr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoL0VpVWD0ZP8bt0Y8Pb-v0jCc9IKI-3Np1nTnrQ3GPDlBxhk3wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited over 35 mins. Other people getting their orders before me and they ordered after me. Very poorly managed operation. Highly do NOT recommend unless you have lots of time to wait around. Unbelievable. $5.50 for a dinky order of sweet potato fries. Rip off","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuNZVi4-3r0tBnCPMllcIHIofs6UNQPmGivxDj&fid=0x0:0xeb1dc7cb52da3550"],"When":"2024-2-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ashwin Nagra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6iYePDA8ZgseGsnbRjpYMGZdTSNpODgTKwiiy71yxhRwud8Ph=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Arwyn at the cash desk was absolutely fabulous great customer service and was so kind to hook me up with a custom cake for my birthday needless to say arwyn was the best would recommend going to this establishment just to converse with such an articulate young man","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi1uQ04ZJlN-5biEyjqFeJfPLFZNY733xnzUF5&fid=0x0:0x206b06882e37f008"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Kenrick Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Qlr-7avGGG_gw-sdMVAbZ5vTLZXDpwcJ4A7g2sjiGekUnOtm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great newer DQ replacing the old one and the same location after rebuild. Consistent treats and friendly staff. Always enjoy coming here for a little pick me up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_MpvmIY5Z2PxNbhKTZr_mM6MIBFXlwZA3JdLd&fid=0x0:0x206b06882e37f008"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"DDPRR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSCUdy2waPWLdifQV8KEG6JIRoymfSOmOuKZBYTEbqi2pYvEgu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sometimes I find it crazy that you have to point these kinds of things out to people. Then I am reminded that we are all slowly losing our collective consciousness, that common sense is so uncommon, that any sense at all is a rarity, and that the world where we all looked out for eachother has faded into oblivion.

I understand that dq microwaves their burgers sometimes - but to receive a burger that is completely soggy, literally wet from being microwaved too long that scalds my mouth on the first bite goes to show that the staff here simply do not care about their customers.

EDIT: I now have food poisoning !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A really friendly DQ. They have a great group of people working here. Service is friendly and fast. Bathrooms were clean.  Ice cream is good and high in sugar :). Parking is available from the mini mall. There is a bike rack and they are on a bus route.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzbTw5N1scSOHt92bom85UUvLnJBT-377xlDX0&fid=0x0:0x206b06882e37f008"],"When":"2018-8-12"},{"Name":"Rahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4wlgtmAJFCPZ0n_3Eyp_TfiUVd1vo8vP_cRZSDslqagrvFfLC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The location is conveniently located in the plaza however the dining area is a bit small. The order was smooth. They made a mistake delivering a different burger than what was ordered but they corrected it very quickly. We order a mix of chicken and beef burgers. We all agreed the taste wasn't great... the meat is either old or just doesn't have good taste. If we come back, we'll just stick to DQ is famous with, that's ice cream and shakes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBmi4OqF21zpSqJPVv9g18c9RgTWbKeU8H2fsN&fid=0x0:0x206b06882e37f008"],"When":"2022-4-2"},{"Name":"Holly Zeron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUlzg7-iax5oqWqwOT85o07D9Al7gOjxl_D5aFu8iK8Ta2wA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered an ice cream cake for my birthday.  Rosana helped us; she brought out the different colours of icing and sprinkles and let us choose what we wanted.  The cake looked like a hot mess but it was exactly what we wanted.  Overall, this was the most excited I have ever been in a DQ.  Thank you for the wonderful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcImdhHNNcLGl8kSlvjwZx3GSno67YsWHXNCqx&fid=0x0:0x206b06882e37f008"],"When":"2021-3-23"},{"Name":"Carol Bower","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkKY9k2HR64MMTXYPRuJ2l36IidU2RPdWAAXDrj1vayeO56g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sneaky added tax to bill, with no breakdown to what the tax is.
Was charged 72 cents sales tax on a $10dollar meal deal.
Bill just shows Sales Tax amount.
No GST number on the bill.
When you charge GST on a bill there should be a GST number.
I don’t mind paying my GST tax or a take-out bag fee.
There needs to be more transparency, and breakdown for what the tax charges are. Feeling gouged!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"angelica cabrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwPNZTDq0RAnyAyfqK_NzQEpfL-0xtdXHgzWJkJ2OjvzoaMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This message is to the owners of DQ. Really you should hire more people specially Sundays . For a milkshake I have been waiting 30 minutes after paying","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vic W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpSPmDt4nq7hsVbYQlv9PQyLT9pSZXhNmOH1JaH0U1d7Hcx7v8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been here several times over the years. Service is always excellent, staff are friendly. The food is good quality. Coffee free refill. The best location in Richmond by far. Free parking inside Garden City Plaza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKR1ry85dxTJsYvfCi2S0nFeDjX-CFBTrYgm0z&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A&W claims to uphold high-quality standards, yet my recent experience at their Garden City location in Richmond was completely unacceptable. I ordered the Chubby Chicken Cruncher with yam fries and root beer, but the food quality fell far short of any reasonable expectation. The chicken was dry and tough, devoid of any crispiness. The yam fries were cold and soggy, clearly having been fried hours earlier. To make matters worse, I ended up with diarrhea after the meal. This level of service is absolutely unacceptable. As this was my first visit, it will undoubtedly be my last. The owner must take immediate action to ensure that the staff meets the quality standards expected from this brand.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJpmBM-Eo3BZEzcOOmBIAWZRiJqvti1JAXvAwW&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"jordan K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_oUrS5rrFikT9zMgreWZGSg7ji2MWj9fPkgEerXYXDrFwdKSW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here for 2 double buddies and bit into one of them which had mold on the underside of the bun. I nearly threw up especially since the taste had led me to look under the burger in the first place. Disgusting experience, can't believe I paid for it. Someone get a health inspector here or something, I see they had this issue 5 months ago. Ridiculous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGtp7yF-h_ldLMYSokWyMLIu8AK5FZKXwBqawJ&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Cheryl Hundal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkEXmHdu0BvBskm61CrVlC9OSIcFGuCOGj2gdo15iujYcaPV5tlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Spend 33$ on 2 combos. The burgers were, at best, edible. The onion rings were so bad we couldn't even eat them. Soggy and tasteless like they had been sitting dripping in oil for hours before we got them. Best part was the rootbeer. This store will never get my service again. Waste of money and gas 😡😡😡","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI_xSvHXpq7dR30o3afOoEIUe6a4SrJBjX9nrWy8wjOKiJhjKG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I usually dine here during my break time and always order Buddy Burger with cheese. But today,at around 12:45pm, I ordered the same thing. After the first few bites,I noticed that the patty was undercooked and it taste different than usual. I approached the staff and told them that the patty is undercooked. One staff just told me “ Next time, you should let us know if you want it cooked well-done” . I have never heard in any A&W location that the customer should tell how they would like their patty. He didn’t even asked me if I want to have my burger redone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3uUKbkBTQ1e9uN8SOBj5H3N_UYXydSikzSct0&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2023-8-16"},{"Name":"AMAN SHARMA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKkmXLCNJgEA31WlZ_mWA1Gi-X3wb2bQTjETGEy4lDyJBhVDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rupinder,

I had the worst experience at this A&W Location as i ordered veg peri peri burger and i got something with chicken in it.

Maybe you were in a hurry, but please listen first what exactly the customer is ordering if you’re not sure about it there’s no harm to confirm it twice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYQ1OJuiFutHEMWnE6tT2aU1ESP4oSs7OtdglaK0ViH_103ch2rw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The rep at drive-thru was patient was my question.  Beyond meat burger was meh, nothing fancy.  You feel some mushroom texture, some soy and bean ... etc.  KFC veggie burger is way better.

Didn’t wait too long though, I might come back for other stuff when I’m starving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpMrg9PYA8JRZweoaFSOF2W0p_Nomp-2Cd_wWO&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2019-5-17"},{"Name":"Aarsh Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoqn5WgDFnskFUfcIZqv0VD7VWhLGDoj3U0QK600p05HBvMFta=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"July 28 11:40 pm. Did multiple mobile orders and the girl made it fresh and overall food was awesome and delicious. Kudoos to great service. Best A&w","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cara T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_jaisylK8J3V6EiW0gF2yYKRHFkl_QakzNGoWKDjqJ_xxMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best McDonald's I've ever visited. Typically, you don't expect much in terms of service at fast food places, but this one stands out.
The staff are friendly and genuinely caring, making the entire experience feel different from a typical fast food restaurant. It really conveys a sense of warmth, welcome, and attentiveness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv3F_zzRQX2i21hlYv-5gkh5RmKAPbsx6G9T0b&fid=0x0:0x7daa82d53ff2d4bd"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"bhawna khamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvlZDAPXIn2QzGvKSQ7gpIUnyW5aQonA5fSyn25PggB50KTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"this morning around 9:30am i purchased a egg muffin before my work , and i specially customize it with no bacon because i respect every culture and in muslim culture we don’t eat bacon however when i took my order and saw it was bacon inside it, which made is so angry and disappoint. I call the branch however they just said come and take another one but they didn’t understand what i felt . what if i eat that without looking inside? who will be the responsible???????
i’m not gonna come back at any mcdonald’s ever .
i filed the complaint too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuxYLJFBIo1qqjwc_O8S19eoCqOu99zGlH2J9E&fid=0x0:0x7daa82d53ff2d4bd"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Don K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeMe3Z2Dwdjz2ebe9Hu9zPz3XZzwiZvAUP2ovxUEYWB0bHcVvHYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DON’T COME HERE! The machines are unreliable, and after paying, I couldn’t get a receipt to confirm my purchase.
If you’re thinking of buying from the front desk, be prepared for long waits—there are only 2 staffs handling the entire restaurant. It’s clear that the employees are doing their best, but they are severely understaffed, which seems to be a result of poor management.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ4EHAc3jj5_xJfLLpGrhitRUAc_mH6HmWoiLa&fid=0x0:0x7daa82d53ff2d4bd"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Flo C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSkNBtKboRWkj7Xe_Ea7aooo2aglAeOUviblFBJpS0P2HDAWGf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just realized I'm not the only one want to leave a DON'T COME HERE!  Comment to this shop (Hahaha) Worst experience ever!  It's a busy Sat evening, after I've waited for 20-30mins for my online order, I walked over to counter and asked the manager, he claimed he called it out long time ago, but my number was never shown on screen! Does he expect everyone can hear him?  And since I had one hand full of grocery, I can only spare one hand for my order for 2 meals and one box of 6's donuts; and they only packed the 2 burgers and fries in one medium paper bag with everything else all separate.  I needed to ask for drink tray, and they can't offer me a bigger bag or extra bag even I offer to pay extra (btw I paid on app for bag already); and what the manager offered is change the box of 6 donuts into 2 tiny white paper bag of 3 each which makes it even harder to carry!  I don't know if he's trying to make it worse for me or he really thinks it'd helped!!  Oh and there's no ice from the soda machine!  I usually order from the one from No.3 Rd and the one from Blundell Rd, they always have good normal service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Beats Angel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvIkcjp1xaKkdKEAd-Hnwm0P4uDLbWagvkLIh4AmLW9_B-EA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to buy dinner at about 7:30 p.m., and i waited about ten minutes for my meal. When I got home after six minutes and started eating, I found that the fries had been soft for a long time, and even found one uncooked French fry in the package, and the chicken nuggets were a little cold. The dining experience was poor, but the service attitude was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlMtQz-7zoZBOwfJ6nwm40xTRiLjKbDlQP0zQU&fid=0x0:0x7daa82d53ff2d4bd"],"When":"2024-1-23"},{"Name":"Kian Jan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk1_LNrVPo8UjPhwCKpKL4msuvykGnHcPTgGhOotlHWJaQog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"McDonald's has always been a go-to spot for me when I'm craving some good comfort food. The taste and quality of their food consistently great.The atmosphere is pretty chill, whether I'm grabbing a quick bite or hanging out with friends. It's got that classic McDonald's vibe that's both nostalgic.

Now, when it comes to service, it's a bit of slow. Sometimes things run smoothly and the staff is friendly, but there have been a few instances where I've encountered slow service or slight mistakes in my order. That's why I'm giving it a 3-star rating for service.

McDonald's still gets a thumbs up from me. The food and vibe are top-notch, and even with some service hiccups, it's a spot I'll keep coming back to this address","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdAH1x9UsyFcKY0ev5Ccbrv5O0BfA9d6iS7aqr&fid=0x0:0x7daa82d53ff2d4bd"],"When":"2023-8-2"},{"Name":"Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUI2GSqvzKBZrX86jhtU8WjOUfxMIP7NMYhzhHKU7b9i8Vnl3COxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of the two terminals for entering the order was defective and out of service.
Queue behind the working machine.
Friendly staff.
Small restaurant - with little bit of Christmas decoration. Enjoyed coffee and muffin today.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0RELLdGDmU4mUU2O4splg5RoL3yTJnShh825sqC7IizJnW3IrnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small!!! This is a tight McDonald’s! They could’ve designed this part of the building a bit better. Service is good and food is about the same as all other McDonald’s. It’s just the area that I can’t handle. Every time I pass by the area, it just discourages me to go in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ99cWKc17F-6G-6Ri7wKjyyPjSBM4japEq-uB&fid=0x0:0x7daa82d53ff2d4bd"],"When":"2023-4-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jasmine Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjl1vG8AfP1KQsme5lqEpYpQJBF68_I3YKilvkqGxYcn9Se447fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in to the Restaurant to make a take out order.
Immediately greeted by the staff in the lobby as well as the cashier.
The cashier was very helpful, as we were trying to make an order for a large family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSeIkioexmeyygElHt2lQ8XNfei6696r9qmDvH&fid=0x0:0xa69e0dfcf99fff88"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Quincy Diva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaMvt4uit0x88TeHz7St5TGqEmWVfN1laOlp8auIzjwGHhPxQnxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The washrooms at this location are consistently unsanitary, especially during late hours when only one is available. On three separate occasions after 11 PM, I found the men's washroom in poor condition, with urine everywhere and a strong odor. When I requested to use the women's washroom, I was denied access, despite the lady at the front desk admitting the men's washroom was dirty and promising to clean it later. This ongoing issue with cleanliness and accessibility is very concerning and needs to be addressed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWATpmWLW5ZPuOxVMp6iUDn0-bEbZ29uKoctSHBBnJvkyipCtXHiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Always have to wait over 20 minutes for my order.  One time I had to go up and ask for my order and then they started getting it together.  The last time I went they were behind on fries and basically left my chicken sitting in the bag for 20minutes waiting for it.   There are other fried chicken joints in the area, go for those. edit: the fries were so good so i forgive you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sherry Noravong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAU2bbXInZA4f7HHvmkOGiOFxal-qOq2QcINJgLZRl17mc1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First of all I usually get chicken here late nights because I work night shift. Sometimes they take 10 minutes or so preparing my order but it has always even fresh and tasty. However tonight I went (to my surprise, my food was already waiting for me when I got to the pickup window) and to my complete disappointment, my food was literally terrible! All I tasted was very old oil, the batter was hard, and the chicken was very dry and hard as well. I don’t believe it was safe for human consumption.
I will not order from here anymore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stu “Stue83” E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm5Ddp40LUgNaEAAljyXhmiBY8bDcNZNS-EZtFS67SGKWOmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Everytime I go to this location they mess up my order. No one in the drive through and they make me pull to the side and wait. They forgot my apple pie- 17.75 for a meal and it is always dry. Called and guy offered me a credit for a 1.75 for my apple pie. Lol what a joke. I will never go back to this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZyr8Kdjq__qnh5BweqKMrgwv_OpJjoJ3K3eIG&fid=0x0:0xa69e0dfcf99fff88"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Casey McEgg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIv7MkA8aQLH8nt_J7FcjdNdNkj6Po8QXnG1pSxblEgBBpTmGH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"*EDIT 07/31/23:
Won't be coming back nearly as frequently. Prices have gone way up and the value has decreased tremendously. 3 piece special jumped up 20%.

Wow. This place has been my go to for fried chicken in Richmond for the past 5 years. However, the quality and service has crashed hard. Church's has always been heavily greasy, as far as bone-in chicken goes... But now it's just completely vile.

I cannot possibly recommend this location to anymore. I'll unfortunately have to go to Popeye's, which is bland... But at least won't end my night on the John.

*Note: the piece of chicken in the picture is not dark from the spices, rather it's completely soaked in oil. My suspicion is that the oil temp was too low and it just soaked in all the oil

Couple of nitpicky things:

I redeemed the 3pc combo coupon that was circulating in late Jan. It clearly said combo and had a honey biscuit in the picture. They ran it in as the 3pc special, not the combo... Meaning it did not come with 2 thighs or the biscuit.  If you're going to advertise a regular combo, don't give customers the watered down version. That's just false advertising.

Finally, are you serious for charging $4.95 for these dinky fries? It's not even full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBlrfzWDrTdu3DRrSpsj2WBRtCVumEYRgEVw8N&fid=0x0:0xa69e0dfcf99fff88"],"When":"2023-2-24"},{"Name":"Doug Lowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcjzmZjbvzSI_na_MZ-zN9q-yVTxltZRiLbEImzin24G5Q2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I come here all the time and usually it’s pretty straight forward. I order my chicken, I get my chicken and I leave. But it seems like lately the service has really become a case of lack lustre customer appreciation.

On a couple of occasions they have left a piece out from my 20 piece order. Also, they use to fill the box of large fries up. Now it’s barely half full. I get that that cutting back to save on costs, but my gosh, they really are getting cheap!

When I asked them to maybe fill it up so the box is kinda full, they’re response is “with the specials, that’s what you get. I’m like, I realize that, but it’s only half full 🫤

Use to be much better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzed0qJQnkhDlXmCzfoqMiCAXbjJOyrR5vdZgq&fid=0x0:0xa69e0dfcf99fff88"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"Rupert Rhompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGZQPR5Z5CHv_OdHaRtzfKjo0uXi9-Py7nLQxL4zKgtkDVig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible service at this location.  Too busy standing around chatting.  By the time they take your order they fail to mention you won't get any ketchup or napkin with your take out order unless you ask for it.  LA Chicken is 2 minutes away and Popeyes is 5 minutes away.  Those are much better options.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Neil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR-92KfBTsczjBVZmLVTSeTy5dv04izsQa7WvVjH23sfnkaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is absolutely absurd. I ordered a junior chicken, a McDouble, and a MEDIUM iced tea at the drive-thru—A MEDIUM—and when I got home, ready to enjoy my meal, I started sipping on my iced tea. I finished it without giving it much thought, but when I took the lid off to munch on the ice, I was shocked to find that they had placed a SMALL cup of iced tea inside the medium cup, tricking me. If this is their idea of cutting costs, is an extra cup really cheaper than just giving me the right amount of iced tea? Honestly, I’m incredibly disappointed... McDonalds, DO BETTER!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0WnDtHN6guuyexIqmv4hFNGkRWExg2n5hw7y0&fid=0x0:0x102de80539c1e5d2"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It took me literally 25 mins to place an order in person because there was no one working at the ordering line. There were 10 of us all lined up waiting for 25 mins, while they kept pushing orders through for drive thru and kiosk orders. I had to line up because I was redeeming a coupon. There were prob 10 workers in the kitchen so there was enough help.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgaAITDVVvaEh9NczDbYoK_ptcOh6nVO4Wdng5&fid=0x0:0x102de80539c1e5d2"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Nikki B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLE-VkNCZr7LCcDh9wF48I1q_VBoBGFvx5nv4t7D8EZhMvsRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best filet o fish I’ve ever had in my life. I consider myself a filet o fish connoisseur and this one is by far the juiciest softest tastiest one in the whole world. Whoever made this filet o fish deserves a raise. I’d give this McDonald’s 20 stars if I could. Apple pie was also the best I’ve ever had at any location. These people are doing something RIGHT.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz-7jzmhjm5QPDoSA_c8HttzxXOVS-h7Ka6PyU&fid=0x0:0x102de80539c1e5d2"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Allan Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC1mqkSU2RT6J27TqxeZHWYZnFnv7bKKts9b0M5UHGva1jtQs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible food quality. Previously came here for an order of fries a little past 3am, they gave me my order from the window and disappeared, I took a look in the bag and grabbed a fry out and it was cold and stale. They had the audacity to serve this to a paying customer and expect them to accept it without saying anything? I honked my horn to get their attention to no avail. I honked a second then a third time, then she came back to the window and asked what’s wrong, I told her the fries are cold and stale. She took the bag back and said to park and she would bring out another one without even checking the condition of the fries, that tells me she knew it and was hoping I wouldn’t complain about it.

This time around I went before 7:30pm, ordered a large fries, received from drive thru and drove 2 blocks away and then opened the bag to reach for a fry and it was once again, not fresh and tasteless. Pulled out the box and to my amazement it was not even half full. I’m guessing it was what was remaining in the fry bin before the next fresh fries were coming out of the fryer. I would have driven back back was going to work so no chance to but I had to write this honest review of this location after my last 2 experiences here. Corporate should really educate their employees at this location and prioritize food quality/taste over giving them leftover/almost best before serving to their customers. This place gets a ZERO stars from me if I could give them that.

Victoria and Kingsway location is miles ahead of them in terms of food quality, customer satisfaction and overall just being pleasant.

Reading most reviews for this location is pretty on par with my experiences here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqXAmwatTkwwAPhkmAnBnMs2jPljdnpKk4xeWX&fid=0x0:0x102de80539c1e5d2"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Mark Royer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCTBWZctKVbXLo_R3by2XLM-2T6Iq-7HPq6SIpzj-7QYb96YKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped for a quick take-out meal.  Didn't add a bag to my order and one definitely wasn't provided with my sandwich and fries.  Had to carry food out to the car in my hands.  Order was accurate, served with minimal wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Sanders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWt92zke5F0H3Fy5MaOkZJWV4yI7R7Gy42x37hFUHHt_rg0w0st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This location is notorious for calling up your number on the "Now Serving" board before your food is actually ready. In this case, this morning I had to wait a full extra 5 minutes after my number went up for "now serving". I asked her if it wasn't ready, put it back to "in progress" but she was unable to.

I dunno why they do this, it just pisess off customers. If you're that short handed, by noting orders are done a few minutes earlier than they actually are, you're just fooling corporate into letting them know with your metrics that you aren't shorthanded.

If the order times were accurate, then it would show this store is short haded and they could hire more employees, but they keep faking the metrics.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wes Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoDxY2V5G6qWoPqf_BISoGmFE9_tnmlDOqyQQXDcejOEFDsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terribly disorganized. Ordered through the app ahead of time. Picked it up via drive through. Was told to pull out and wait in any of the reserved pick up stalls. Walked in 10 minutes later to check and it turns out they had dropped my order. When I finally got it, the order was wrong. And of course, I found a hair in my chicken McMuffin (definitely not mine as I am bald). Disgusting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcjzxVCfYPjpeQxxLLg6IM9OiIlZBvG4ki2AUw&fid=0x0:0x102de80539c1e5d2"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Alexander Pozon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzrjOYLXF3xU3EFAcg00YUTm9tZ-vgbhMTOzP6yBi87bUTjXXR7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were asked to park at the front since our order will take some time and it's fine with us. However, the employees looked so tired of their job, especially the guy handing out the food at the parked cars out front, and it's not even that busy the day we were there. It made it look like we were bothering them by ordering food. We'll definitely avoid this location from now on.","Images":null,"When":""}]
