user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered my all-time favourite beyond meat combo. There is nothing to complain about my food.

Just want to highlight the server. He wasn't rude, but he must know that when working in the service line/front counter, the least he can do is smile to the customer.

The food court is jam-packed on public holiday lunchtime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp8X9N0Z18Wu_nLCId7iozL2Tic3E7klqxNNM8&fid=0x0:0x25fa00086e294187"],"When":"2023-11-14"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently tried the Impossible Burger at A & W Burger in the Lansdowne food court, and it exceeded my expectations! Not only was the burger delicious, but the service was impressively fast. What's more, they offer a fantastic deal on their apple pie – just $3 for two pies! The combination of tasty food, quick service, and great deals makes A & W Burger a must-visit spot in the Lansdowne food court. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXvHUesmvJAW5zB51nd2ICdvZGCEWESQbRkeKT&fid=0x0:0x25fa00086e294187"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Jason Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo5sPZ67s_mnhJwZ79b2vBa8twlqYbk9eZujv14dBdLN9-xEyftw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lansdowne is definitely worn down but A&W does the job. Store also regularly offers deals on combos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMHlw7Qlfx4kXehB6sMInPjdTWGVU5mAqAZ5Yk&fid=0x0:0x25fa00086e294187"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Matt Fisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlZbMxnW7pIEWrx4cAM8XlFVnQf0gOEXEyL3ufwgpucvJF9i4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Would love to see what food safe says about the personal cell phone use and lack of hand washing, let alone the inattention due to being in their phones.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daman Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJ8wzl3Fukc1tug0jiNl4m-yG-5gcdTpqUMnqihtr5JVMf8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff wasn’t wearing gloves while making orders( really unhygienic). The wait time was too long as she forgot about my order.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"許克睿Cory","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDhQw0ztSFB4CF1kjbX8YwEa3KxKNDKakIowtGRfAApvXwscZ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a amazing noon at the food cort that tha A&W root beer. The burgers 🍔🍟 are great besides that I hate pickels and tomato 🍅🥒 so I have pick them out of the uncle burger 🍔. It's most expensive burger in the family series,but it worth it because it has a juicy meat with a special combination of cheese and vegetables. It's root beer🍺 has a special vanilla taste that gives you a refreshing feeling. The bad thing is that they don't seem to have the float root beer😭. The french fries🍟is is just amazing after all, he is freshly fried. You can get the root beer and the fries  just for 13 Canadian Dollars to get the teen combo. I know my English sucks but I wish I can give you informations about this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVcSPDB5SoquwTP8AB1u4bXykSWUemIJrtcHjG&fid=0x0:0x25fa00086e294187"],"When":"2023-6-17"},{"Name":"Chels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIEG8ImuHXjQ-hpfgYhplAhH9cls8PSmkmT9KPxEmPx9DwGMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"it’s inside the food court. The chicken burger is not good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiqFJGFp1DGqTspBKXtXXl79IyqhgM9WSjvu2X&fid=0x0:0x25fa00086e294187"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Edmund Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHvlF0urWYXIlPfQf5KowC1k-rq0AheQYSkLiZHu_9DBsVZPiP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had just the Buddy Burger with Cheese for $2.55.

The beef patty was decently juicy. The cheese and the sauces also kept it from being too dry. The bun was pretty fluffy. Not bad. Had too wait a few minutes for the burger though, even though it wasn't busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmRtD9x3X2ETO_beTBUs5CnltoMa8esK3caJBv&fid=0x0:0x25fa00086e294187"],"When":"2017-11-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jayson P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsTnfj-A-r4M5Q8VDtU0G6LNfKR92Yn-WgeHcUnuRHLekYsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 3 pieces chicken combo with the drink through the drive thru. Went home with only a box of fries and the drink leaked all over the cupholder in car. Went back and they only offered me the chicken back. The lady that took my order originally, laughed when i showed her the box of fries. Atrocious customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-QMw-mxst99ecwBB3_hhTnWvkBFfjAg22jLjd&fid=0x0:0x6da6f5359b9a156d"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Kenneth Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWamUMw_78jzRF5Sk7_eq9NWctaka_ymA9ZhKGR3Xg5tt76TrLE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Fast food was created in North America, but the taste, quality, and value are far below what’s offered in Vietnam. The chicken is oily, lacks flavor, and is too small, with little meat and no juiciness. The French fries are undercooked, not crispy, and portions are tiny. The honey biscuits are terrible—no buttery aroma, no honey sweetness, just soaked in oil. What exactly are you serving me here??? Texas Canada is awful. The President of Church's Texas should go to Vietnam and learn how they make your products there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPavv6azO51-_XzFsEF48Qp1SfdtJZpbVJckF2z&fid=0x0:0x6da6f5359b9a156d"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Sarbjit Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpoeiFX0Oi2mfwjcYcqPfDfAfZCjegbPMFxUajM_OhXawvtHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dev is an incredibly service oriented person, we were super impressed by his attentiveness. Haven’t been to this location in years - and were pleasantly surprised by the changes.  Its been renovated and staff was much friendlier than past experiences and  the food was better cooked, less greasy. Very generous portions, I had a lot left over to bring some back home to my dog 😀
Thank you Dev and we will be back when we are in Richmond.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christine D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDG9xqm7qyTUBaW0kuk2cV9oC5ahqhEILmLTDHopS_YS722TU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought take out and the staff he took my order was kind of confused when he’s taking an order.. and he gave me the wrong item as the one I want to get. I ordered Tex Supreme Sandwich, and I received the sandwich with the chicken dry as a car tire, stuffs inside ( cheddar cheese, lettuce,..) gave me the feeling like they just make it like whatever ( the cheese not even one normal piece like it has to be- it was like half and it was torn into pieces and they put it back together. ! I can’t even eat the sandwich. It was my BAD EXPERIENCE, never again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTGxjsINyajEv5X8Fqp6CvFXG8BRkXkObW29c&fid=0x0:0x6da6f5359b9a156d"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Carol Shum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWMOFp1fe9abPmUlWVVqdiJP4eUYalHseNCxLjIj8bc0sRWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Church's Chicken is the best place for late night dinner for me and my bf, we love to have 3 pcs chicken set with 1 side + pops which just costed $11.95. We lived nearby this shop last year, usually came here 2 or 3 times a week. This year we moved out from Richmond, although there are some Churchs nearby our new home, we still came back to here for late dinner, bcoz their chicken is bigger and juicier then the other Church's, I donno why but yes! Every time they can keep the same level of fresh fried food👍🏻 Today we met a very polite and nice staff named Dev. Our card was not debited successfully, he patiently re-press it couple times for me, even we need extra fork and napkin, he still keeping his profectional attitude. You made my day Dev! 5 stars for you and your colleagues 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1S4cELyD1ICXA1MyWY3FyH2LVDpUTUFgWSl4W&fid=0x0:0x6da6f5359b9a156d"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"BasiL C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOTb6hjUHVI4Nu6kNnwnz3wSdArPyBQHKwfRQQ-azRg0LR9Kndeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst location ever. The fries were cold and rock hard, uneatable. The gravy was cold too. The chicken I ordered was original, the receipt shows the original, but it came out spicy. Chickens were lukewarm at best, dry, and hard crunch. It had to be the worst experience I ever had with Church's Chicken. I'm sticking with L.A. Chicken from now on. This location is not worth anyone's time and money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaH1zIRiUbQDC63VpRo6lTR2M130BYaTeMhO0p&fid=0x0:0x6da6f5359b9a156d"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Eric Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt3ELKq1ByYi3NQoUpqFNP3Iexre3YjnHq3SK4LPy35bv15Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Outright fraud. I ordered wings. The receipt said wings. You gave me small drummettes.

I went and ordered 24 chicken wings half and half to go. The staff advised it will be 10 minute wait as they need to fry up new wings. It took them 30 mins.  They had only 2 customers in store. It is inconsiderate for you to lie to me. I had other plans and did not anticipate a 30 minute wait. I would have said no thank you if you had told me it will be a 30 minute wait.

Also, is charging for a paper bag that happens at all Churches location or just this location?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdN08jhosRXlolb9YWyIvH5qilqqlsecNex48Z&fid=0x0:0x6da6f5359b9a156d"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Karamjot Sahota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURobIFo-SPvOSYfhnOccGM1Q9zwdiLQk99VB6mkGltPNxrIej_9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could leave less then a 1 star I’d give them a -5 stars Would not recommend food was stone cold chicken burger looks like no chicken. Chicken tenders were cold was like rubber, the bombers were cold on the inside as they weren’t fully cooked, gravy was cold, straight in the garbage as not edible food. Absolutely unacceptable for spending over $100","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUjeYQmQXmDdDQt4a-jHGAa5JlpK8QpmZYwBBb&fid=0x0:0x6da6f5359b9a156d"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food quality is below the usual New York Fries standard. Service is terrible. The store is at the Richmond Center Food Court.  Not coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlIaSa58Gav5sQvTwCD_OihTygSScIjaEvBpwH&fid=0x0:0x32b0ef97b357393c"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Tom C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdiYc5x_E-Q2lE0z_5xM3LFSGfnEnGmUa_btawv_geQdXHww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Drink cups are different. No more plastic lids. Not sure how sturdy they are to walk around in. Mine kept popping out but I was eating at a table. Fries are fries…..it was good.

Only complaint is the California seasoning (you have to ask the server for it) was crumbly and in chunks. May have been old, they need some new ones.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIQpfLHLO07-Ycd8Nv7NUNHF63ZagZg3FyxSmN&fid=0x0:0x32b0ef97b357393c"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Sala Zhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvaMf7a54YHbCsMCPPtNfHLzU_IY_diNscAlLc6H7jqe02rHY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Best poutine I've ever had! I frequently came here for their nacho fries or their classic poutine. However, I've noticed the portion has been lacking. I always get a large, and the last few times I've came the box was filled not even halfway... It's pretty expensive, so the portion has made me reconsider coming here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harminder Thind","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiW_93qFRFI-2S6da-CluJulSXc4nKtJ_0e4RbkyPxAhfL63bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the service, best of all NYF's ill tried in tri-city. The guy serving with Tuban was approachable and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt9VIw2X8Hv-_A4WkPuVgx2Apv1bBZ8D-zVVup&fid=0x0:0x32b0ef97b357393c"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Mike Jack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfoMVgqBdGzj8XotTXWU8qwMsJC8JLF_30D_dYm_2wy23w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The customer service is terrible, I asked what is all on a Loaded Dog. The guy enters Loaded Dog into his register, I then said, "No I asked you what is on a loaded Dog?" He then points at the menu boards and says choose one. And walks away and starts doing other things. Not great Customer Service when you can't answer your customer and just walk away like you are too busy to help.

I then proceed to order a Chilli Dog Combo when he returns, as he makes my drink he used his chin, full of beard hair to fully open the lids on top. I was so grossed out I thru my drink away. That is not very hygienic.

The fries were old and soft, tasted stale.

Will not be return to this location ever, and will not be recommending this location to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonathan Roque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFLpLccAI3mES5N6KnbZjpIVWVrrZbHZ8-vumM-t5MEYyIrxoz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cashier Navdeep was friendly and efficient. I ordered a plain dog with ketchup, mustard and relish and it was very fresh and juicy. Bun was warm and soft. Restaurant lighting was bright and inviting. With so many choices in the food court, NYF looked modern, exciting and super spotless. Very clean. Will try their loaded fries next visit. 👍🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqkzqOD71rrJhDPdbxr2n49qRr1kGUFiAE40Zx&fid=0x0:0x32b0ef97b357393c"],"When":"2023-11-27"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Got the premium hot dog with chili and cheese. Not very premium in looks... A sad looking hot dog. The skin was dry and the bread was store bought Villagio bread. There is a Cobs bakery in the mall so if they got Cobs fresh buns instead of the processed buns they used, it would be way better. It's just essentially like a 7 eleven hot dog but 4X the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc3usQFrkmYLw3Ze3Q-d8aPL20OIMXVYFzsRSt&fid=0x0:0x32b0ef97b357393c"],"When":"2021-7-8"},{"Name":"LivingtheDream S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUutDoHoSrZH926drD82_vC53oanP63n9kt2fPxos7sD-cdXygy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’m sorry to say that their classic poutine wasn’t as good as I had imagined for this was the first time I tasted it and found the fries soggy and the sauce bland. After eating up the cheese curds that tasted like mozzarella, I had to throw away the rest of the fries. A Canadian friend from Toronto told me I had to go to a mom-and-pop eatery to eat the “real” poutine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtUdP8fHtU-H_fao4xM4aYG4u0NkrNZZxAnTr8&fid=0x0:0x32b0ef97b357393c"],"When":"2022-12-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kanwar SEKHON","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6CQMCc3TK9DOgcaVwnWRnMj24w6Pf6GP7z7TXjOEVhEyXN7Sx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Shawarma Palace in Richmond, eager to try their highly recommended Sharma wraps. The food did not disappoint—everything was packed with flavor, freshness, and authenticity. The wrap itself was a perfect balance of tender, well-seasoned meat and fresh vegetables, all wrapped in a warm, soft flatbread that held everything together beautifully. Each bite was a delightful blend of spices, and the textures were on point. The wrap left me craving more, and it’s clear why it’s a favorite among locals.

In short, the Sharma wrap is definitely worth trying—it’s a must for anyone who loves rich, well-crafted flavors. Especially their lunch time offers are really great and pocket friendly$.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIqwlcS_OMhNohwIs_aWHm7Ndx1eYdHs87kwzm&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Deepnath Majumder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIQht62NsCZjoqL19lxv-a8AyXuZV5TcGXV56AJHp5hy-nuPPi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped at this restaurant on the way to Richmond Country Farms. Tried the chicken shawarma here! Definitely one of the best shawarmas I have ever had! Would have preferred it to be a little less creamy, but great flavours! I liked the fact that they added potatoes in the meal, which I thought was a good combination.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkJZBsQbOhMAvKe0MG7SwZYpd_6yJ65QGYd8uW&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"cait Ee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMR2XtncP7wSL_0vL_4ka5aiBZDHZNFpJhs4Bv37Cr15t3M5iE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean and fast service. Food is decent portions and everything tastes nice and fresh. I gotten mixed shwarma platter and it was delicious. Potatoes is a nice mix up from only having rice and so good with the dollop of creamy sauce on top. And yes, garlic sauce waa so good. Will be back for shwarma cravings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN56SpUAIH-gr_tGuJqiWxgm0laUbZQOlEtG8aB&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Amir Hosain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH-6AKgSFENSkdfxr_cJ5byLBs33R05OSCTrGEFAaB6E7Hf_I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was very good. The food was also very good and the worker offered us chips because we were really nice to him and we left the tip. The food was very good and the atmosphere was amazing definitely Will come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrGpfcxzNuakBey2i2YcEWw6vFJVbkOMdRt7hD&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Jay A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0RELLdGDmU4mUU2O4splg5RoL3yTJnShh825sqC7IizJnW3IrnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’d say, it was good!! Love the big portion and the flavourful chicken sandwich (wrap!) it tasted awesome! Except, I think I find it a little bit on the saltier side. So, if you’re sensitive to salt, this might not be a good choice; although, you’re missing out on the flavour! Service is awesome and the place is fairly clean. Good parking (from the time I went there anyways, 11:45am). Will definitely go back to try other stuff here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN11EPe6Ttpwf8O6BLTZsQ2jD9lgEfk0v_uWztT&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Nicole Donnelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1jDB3nzn6IpYAINym3LTHNjJz-lCB_49GMJ5-92IMmdXpaEfE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soooo good! I had the chicken Shawarma plate and it so much food and every part is so good. The garlic sauce is soooo fresh and garlicky!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1ayDjABqjopDtCftTYuDQHuxXrkZ51v0cIVnJ&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Ralph Tanco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZjeeV0ru0eztAoT9ZH19Fr1rsNNtP8vGl78UIwcF7uzRyEg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place. Very generous serving. Amazing taste!!!! If only i had a bigger tummy space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbyy6B-VoEj16lU8hWfDNmzZuOoX7EoWpDdqNY&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"This food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaxcCslaGrcC0u202g67ni7XJGWWGyPYtSKkUjWo5gpcXXO0Yv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered for to go. Had a mix platter and I really appreciated the large portion. The chicken was on the dry side (as seen in photo) and difficult to chew but it’s likely because it was at the of the shift when I ordered. The potato’s were okay, but I loved the garlic sauce with it. The rice was also delicious. I ordered a baklava for dessert and I enjoyed that as well since it wasn’t too sweet. Refills for soda is $0.75.

May come again if I’m in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPelgA0Sg9Xcy1yNMdGBwK22lYZgiznk87XZz68&fid=0x0:0xac4fdba3cf56c1f1"],"When":"2022-5-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karen Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVy7IKDgoBu5-GpgCOSD4cGeZrgQ2WNTZ5s54ZY-vysf5NoRKzIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The rice rolls are good, freshly made and well seasoned. They have good texture and I would come back again. Spring rolls are good, crispy and filled with shrimp. 🍤

The service is friendly and fast.  Downside is the restaurant can get kind of noisy because it’s not a big place and seating is really cozy.

Good place to go if you want a light dinner with variety.

Parking lot is a crazy busy though as expected of Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSGNyBieP4HRamY_c_gd7WTLwUMdWsvAVcaSqH&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Maxine Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLFR4Mj--MigqFnqnuj_01HrJBESbEtH6Y9a1nlCZadfa3LvcI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were seated right away, and handed cups of tea. (The woman didn’t mind when we asked for it to be exchanged for hot water. Thank you!) We weren’t super hungry, so we ordered the beef and shrimp Cheong fun, the pork and century egg congee, fried mantou, HK style braised beef rice rolls, and splurged a little on a plate of boneless chicken feet.

Everything was pretty good, but also a little bland. (With the exception of the braised beef- that was fantastic.) On the HK style rolls especially, the tasty sauce just doesn’t penetrate or stick very well. The congee was tasty, with large pieces of tender pork.

The members of our group who love chicken feet enjoyed the boneless version. It came with a Thai-inspired thin dipping sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu0b89FARpWd0DFvYJg7eGrkUHsYYPfVnt4-RR&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Charlie Te","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM3tcz74rJ0DuYDDGqeapmHdklqGqUrrA6BTCZLUf9O7D5dKDG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A good casual place to get some quick food.  We ordered a couple of the rice rolls, congee, Chinese broccoli, and braised beef brisket over noodle.  The food came out pretty fast and everything was good.  The rice roll had a good flavor to it and the congee was good.  The service here is fast and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc8fSPJGaTU5zSAgmD9D82BWpbiV1KpnrVoArU&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent rice noodles with chewy texture and adequate portion sizes for the price. Very quick efficient service. Very busy at peak meal times but moves fast. Cash or debit card only. No credit cards accepted.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcp57FIEaNDnMsGoa1YLb5TAtarjB2k6mu2jiu&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not my favourite Cheung fun place in Richmond, but a close second. I find that their rice roll texture is a bit thicker than what it is suppose to be, but the quality of ingredients is not bad. Defiantly not worth the wait if there is a line to me, but I wouldn’t mind coming back here if I am crazing rice rolls. The congee here is really good, would recommend that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAKw6yhUNetksEn2-OQiJgvkYuSaq1-zY5BsGe&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Jessica Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbKN7JTB8-geSMCvSN4JUMFRJdzyUw9Zem00rFXxig6jms97b4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall, a great place to eat if you want to enjoy authentic Chinese cuisine.

Service: I think the service was good! The servers were nice and kind when we were making our menu choices. The food came fairly fast.

Atmosphere: There were quite a few families there eating, so the atmosphere was busy and bustling. However, as a result, there was a short wait time for us until we could get our table.

Food: Loved it! We ordered the curry fish balls, milk tea, pork and shrimp rice noodle rolls, and marinated pork liver and kidney. The curry fish balls were delicious, and the marinated pork liver and kidney was very flavorful. The rice noodle roll was also very good! I loved the shrimp in particular as it was bouncy and chewy. The milk tea was fine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCierEU2tuVu4BAIU8zUu1hc8nDDPM0rF8BRxr&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Congee is excellent. The shrimp and chives rice roll was pretty good too. I like the sweet and salty soy sauce. Our orders came out pretty fast too. Plenty of seats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtOb6FiY049VxWsjQBwDNTM0HBm4L0QscunbrQ&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Howard Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsAfm3230w0dAJLBZ8o_p2XLMkilppW9IqfpzIAqGS_PMu1RRt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The rice rolls are very thin and bouncy. Great taste and texture.  My first visit,  the congee was good, recent visits,  it's been very thick and bland. The brisket lo mein is just ok. I wouldn't come here for that particular dish. Fried fish shin was big portion and very tasty.  Overall,  I would come back mainly for the rice rolls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTyPKkXA5ohSWEshhUys-2kUk1goBTiv0yBOSG&fid=0x0:0x42c77122ef222502"],"When":"2024-8-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dr Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTIyqvQ-kcVJES6imkPC_gMuZGRi4rgpE35mzlk0diALP_6_Ub=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unlike recent reviews, I actually had a good experience. However, I specifically spoke to the staff member that I needed a bit more attention to details. The burger was crunchy, the fries were good, and it came with 3 sachets of ketchup and a soda. I also ordered their jalapeño mayo to have a touch of spice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcS3iTCuEYlj0Bhq1FMtHcLIBlp1CRfHtCohaX&fid=0x0:0x2c91cd01daeaeb4a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Richard Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_wgHpWx78E8QwqPq9m_Ybt_msW0M9bId2VBfyvwxn5SIkrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ate here in June 2022. Our last meal in Canada before we flew home. And we chose A&W. Service was what impressed me most. Wish I can recall the names of the staff at the counter.

The burgers, the fries and the onion rings were of course marvellous too.

I started eating A&W in my teens until the whole chain closed down in Singapore in the 70s (I think).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMagBQHvNWvqpPn2FjugsQdW13wAjrLQMn3XrYt&fid=0x0:0x2c91cd01daeaeb4a"],"When":"2023-3-7"},{"Name":"Kum K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFTitG95pQ6UvABe_YeQmMwEZfX_tIzCZYJGmt7vKE80zASw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just got to know that they are serving veggie masala burgers in collaboration with Nanak @ yvr now. It is very disappointing 👎that they are claiming it to be veggie burger with a veggie patty inside which is fried in the same oil in which they fry chicken n other meats. How the hell is it pure vegetarian burger? Its not for vegetarian people please beware. On asking about why you are not using separate oil...I was told that they cannot afford.
What the hell? Donot fool the people in the name of veggie burger. Please think about religious feelings of some individuals.STOP DOING THIS‼️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chinkal Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINRfWgbutn3E0injAYdVMPKh4wLdaHp4AQENfbsRISqWyPWxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So, picture this: I’m at YVR, exhausted and starving after a long flight, so I drag myself over to the A&W at 3211 Grant McConachie Way, Richmond. Enter "Mohit Khumbariya", the cashier who should be awarded for his Olympic-level skills in terrible customer service. He stares me down and says they’re not taking any more orders. Okay, maybe the grill’s broken or something, right? Except, not even two minutes later, a guy—let’s just say he’s rocking a more “fair and lovely” complexion—breezes through and places his order without a problem. Magically, the grill springs back to life! So apparently, in this brave new version of Canada, burgers are served on a sliding scale of skin tone. Who knew A&W’s secret recipe now includes a dash of blatant racism, served hot with a side of fries?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great restaurant at airport. Enjoyed teen combo. Fries nice and crispy. Enjoyed grass fed beef","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv9OYZPpZ7001PSFPgQbZ-3RHAcHW7YTKENgYq&fid=0x0:0x2c91cd01daeaeb4a"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Ryan Wallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4WCAXa6rJfYhUheKrqHt-dOdfksnofi4hwnq0Vpn6amr0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The guy working the counter was upbeat, friendly, and funny. His interactions with every customer was great. The people handing the food over were also smiling, friendly, and great. Awesome experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Oliver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD--UK2qn5rCriDJuUcm7qB_S5JSs8DUMSjs9RBsTp8eGS-oU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The guy that works here in the morning - he is so enthusiastic and energetic, he made my day. Nice to see people who care about the job that make sure others get their orders right and with a smile on their face when they leave. They are fast in service and best bang for your buck here for airport food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzh8Ne37fROXI4ksc6lCYnGM2V5uYXP1tboY57&fid=0x0:0x2c91cd01daeaeb4a"],"When":"2022-10-26"},{"Name":"Mat Blamires","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGfAAF4CVERYGkILvQm3wEA78eHGbDduZhLmM6poPrIbcJVfHZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"If you feel up to having your food, drink and straw literally thrown at you while not even looking in your direction then this is the spot for you.
Take a deep breath and be ready to catch","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"JUSTIN K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI63vwpSBFOsdjaFJIFl2KLZqJSlxJUhnmUT_46cCm3It1m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i love this KFC Landsdowne. the best in town. fries and chicken so fresh and juicy. will come again definitely❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQA431SUjy0u6UhjMIGkEzyIkY19k_9bXSM4E&fid=0x0:0xe8e514b56b721193"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Nathalie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhETdHVTLYdGgpynlh3jYrgWHrVbpIn97mL3vNM4Lu9dA1r3SC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought a bucket of chicken here at Lansdowne mall branch to have it for our dinner at home. And we were very surprised when we saw the chicken. It's as big as a ketchup packet! I should have cooked our own chicken at home instead! Very disappointing! I won't return and won't recommend! Picture attached for reference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXAjPUN76_nTSRR4WO29ey57yEI1-t1yuO7QLR&fid=0x0:0xe8e514b56b721193"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jeff Hohlbein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPlNcDi8i8PzH35XOvMQTzasIafq7V7xqYqm0KIPq1H59B8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Told me 5 mins for my food. Waited over 30 then was told I was impatient. So disappointed in the service. 30 mins for a sandwich and fries come on. Hire someone capable because these 2 kids that don’t speak English ain’t it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_3fkb6DcWCwKONmiT1bpJyIksRmMfPn_YzqHq&fid=0x0:0xe8e514b56b721193"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Shamir Valliani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImn2FjRZwKgFa0OsBC6iZAd07vjLGqJNiEMXG7z5jKNCyHRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was quick and friendly, and the food was delicious. Never again with this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarem Khan Yousufee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaZbU3kbymvsWg4-HdeBS0afmaqs6BeKGQsFd5hqFWsyel1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was recommended this meal by Salman the cashier, the service was great and the food was fresh and delicious would recommend everyone to try this zinger burger box meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8XxK_mQ-EwYSlJDZyZOOHsjeOg1q96KarNNFS&fid=0x0:0xe8e514b56b721193"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Jessica Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_1EcdYTaFhpF5WS_OiViyfT6kYiULqCUY2c1LW7hSTHTVFLvD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered a 4 piece meal and it took them over 30 mins to prepare! And they were not even busy! Only one order before us. Don’t order from this location unless you have plenty of time to kill or waste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpR5BgFHATs11LNSfMZKKzrHn3WlwWnLWXuRKS&fid=0x0:0xe8e514b56b721193"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Kaneez Aly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKW0iJVCzuRjTOYBM5iYURbOuu3OmOBh4aG7gCYWupx34YOcTy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the plant-based sandwich combo at KFC in Richmond, BC, and it exceeded my expectations! As a vegetarian, I'm always on the lookout for tasty plant-based options, and KFC delivered. The sandwich itself was deliciously satisfying, with a crispy, flavorful plant-based patty that had a great texture. The bun was soft and fresh, complementing the patty perfectly.

The combo came with a side of crispy golden fries and a refreshing drink, making it a complete and satisfying meal. The portion sizes were generous, and the service was quick and friendly. I appreciate that KFC is offering more options for those who prefer plant-based meals without compromising on taste.

Overall, I would highly recommend trying the plant-based sandwich combo at KFC in Richmond, BC. The service by Salman was excellent, making the experience even better. Whether you're a vegetarian or simply looking to try something new, you won't be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dusty Martell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUshEwtFshQNdDHT8koloDcbg7aX58fP4F24oZIUzyX7mWqHKb2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very welcome site at gate D at Vancouver international Airport, international departures.. marvelled at the fresh baked gluten-free bread choices and dairy free parfait as well as regular bought some candied salmon salad and the delicious parfait. It was still fresh and wonderful four hours into the flight. I felt very nourished and had to share.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyX3hHHFZoUH4q0miy6urPLrs25PdRBqzWEpFd\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Alan Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tBxa4h8cy8gIKrmiv3g6GGVfu5sND6jxGLRpI7LlmBwWwfWpdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent; got the Classic Bestwhich…very flavorful. Staff was extremely nice and helpful. Highly recommend!!! Heart Berry soda was great too; honored to support women/Indigenous- run businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCdSBlQcqYCKt_7Lt7us0lreIvuj-YBigldewc\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Aye Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcdcR97sPHm2P2BQ1oGrs1jZLuFwECVyEGRhd6sB5JFqGqPfKO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW! Food is outstanding here, and it is a really well executed modern twist blending traditional food and game foods into dishes that blow your taste buds out of the water! Complimented well with the traditional music playing over the speakers can definitely notice the unique sounds B.C has to offer. Highly recommend this place to anyone passing through, I myself had the open faced bison sandwich and wish I could have another. However, I think you'll find the portions here hit the spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdZL5kWDA9O4L8MYU5v3yv-qNXFjAXsJjE0usD\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Felix Rankin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpJ-yYQaqhIHkPOZ9xWbxX8zbVOuthsh7rV-GMj2_ucOkUKJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ah yes. The good ol airport. Vast majority of people lined up at fast food places, ready for the inevitable flight where they feel disgusting the entire time. Sure it’s like 5$ cheaper, but what’s 5$? We’re in the damn airport 😂. I thought I would give this place a try as it is actually fairly healthy for what you get. There’s overnight oats, yogurt and granola, big salads. I got the Elk Burger and I got gluten free buns as well. They actually tasted surprisingly good. Could hardly tell they were gluten free. Didn’t have that chalky texture and the burger itself was nice and soft too. Usually elk has a much tougher gamey texture. The aioli was a nice touch as well. I’m just like everyone else. I hate spending more money at the airport too, but don’t let slightly higher prices deter you. You may as well pay a slightly higher price to not feel like you drank a cup of canola oil at some fast food place. Give it a try. I might have to give the west broadway location a try soon as well. Thanks again for serving healthy food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMynX0zGOgavt5Awg2rCExFdoMadoFZS7CgWFJ-\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Esther W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ44_CjQ6-wehLPc33Ng17kPOWOSFrXqo3jg5WgP7CtwNUYUeR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bread is nice and greasy. Salmon well seasoned. RAIC airport card discount available. Thank you for a good meal. Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsJHMlCC4-NcZmU3MYByj9VxQIqlECmQV3eX03\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Isabelle Jacques","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJhDxr_TK6vFH3--5Vi3mvuyievSlj_c2odmBjpErJ4Pnge9Qk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best restaurant at YVR. Elk burger was delicious, staff is friendly, ingredients are premium and fresh.\nThe to-go salads also look fabulous.\nOrganic, fair trade, indigenous, what a treat before a long-haul flight. Will be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzJ7NFwJW8I-LeIAoh625xGWW37-fADbRPUD91\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Marie L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBOW2fW25xA6gAQ4RB5FolyTjuTQqRfivhdKhnUuAfbKwzRBOHpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Would have not selected this spot without reading reviews, thank god I did. Just ate the lox sandwich, no onions with salad. SO HAPPY! Bannock was delicious, freshly cooked, salmon portion is generous and the waitress very lovely. Your best layover meal. 5 stars all the way!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Victoria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVrIKPksQfKikh-avj2uJSa02wAloRKa2cUUtBRO1Ytk5YWu_1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not bad for a spot in the airport! Ate the BBQ salmon salad sandwich a bit too fast before taking the photo. Service was quick, others were at the bigger food chains so this worked out perfectly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ux9scZLPygCIET3xt0rN1Dk6r3hFi7sZ3OCm\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-7-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"K Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBu4_ZaAgECG41rev8GrGyGl2x4Ekp-734YP2jktPLGAnRXGaB4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family is a regular customer of this food court stall. Simple real flavours of hk cha chan ten fast food. The deep fried pork chop with vermicelli in soup is my favorite. The pork chop is very flavourful. Thought the pork chop is going to be crispy because it deep fried, but it wasn't. I wasn't bother by it though it was tastier that way.
I don't think you will be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhM058C5845qlRX3bHZ5MHvxh9GeiQgvQ2piM0&fid=0x0:0x3c827b3e549ee9b8"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Bryan Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWheqOfPV6Imbi7zXGAnDY_wmDIKDFBeiYMeGR-JDGsdaJp4kxM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This breakfast may probably be regarded as a basic thing. However, we may also encounter oily bacon, oily eggs or toast with few (or almost no) butter.

I appreciate the chef's preparation of the breakfast. The bacon and the egg are not oily. The toasts are with salted butter, which is seldom used by Hong Kong style restaurants nowadays. This makes me recall the traditional taste of the breakfast offered by the Hong Kong style restaurants of the good old days.

The iced milk tea is silky. The tea, milk and syrup are well balanced.

A Hong Kong style cafeteria I would recommend when you visit Richmond Public Market.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8Uj0L-nQWpuSw1ndshEGlq3W2x_VT9dgvP-ed&fid=0x0:0x3c827b3e549ee9b8"],"When":"2021-8-12"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very tasty! Good comfort food with Hong Kong vibes. I highly recommend their club sandwich. You won't be disappointed. You can even take it downstairs to the park nearby and have a lil picnic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHTzQfB0Jt_cGdpSlZwsHWhSnDNkWYzfqoJi3P&fid=0x0:0x3c827b3e549ee9b8"],"When":"2021-2-6"},{"Name":"Sab L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDjpfeqLrncdPKyjOP3vNxXUbolZSzy0X0fv5qQ6Z4ZYun3qyR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Breakfast meal $7.50 (#4) tastes pretty good. Comes with a hot drink (hot hk milk tea). Good for a light snack.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmUB010VMA6etLg7Y4V2Qp9FjKGW7exdoq3aaB&fid=0x0:0x3c827b3e549ee9b8"],"When":"2021-8-27"},{"Name":"Anson Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSBinSkzSkffuxnpXPvxiCI4mXS3gDEDMhlZgRH6F3dyWRLOAD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food tastes better than the pictures shown on their display board.  Run by a couple (it appears), cash only, taste of food was good. The drinks here are surprisingly well done. Have to rate again when I try it some more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Teddy WONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6M4Gb-Znoz5UXpED4gt8S7THBgwJiYWR5a4J9YAUnk781YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have ordered satay beef soup with rice noodles for $11.50, in fact, the price should be acceptable, but the portion is very small, the soup has no taste, and the worst thing is the beef are all over-cooked. For sure won't go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HomerTheFatzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNhB-yXt5_UM_dFbRmUP0eUUVT73whCZyrvaGfJLXySquTxhXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not bad. But not too much lunch selection in the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWYFvHJ9L0GOMGr9gCMjTPKHmvn3OU-kXUT9Ek&fid=0x0:0x3c827b3e549ee9b8"],"When":"2018-8-23"},{"Name":"Eddie Ansah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUdbOGoULXJHX9yzQT10CCM5nt0i6A1HC3eg7oZke6LjjnAqjfHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Basic but ok. If you're looking for a simple breakfast","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcW84STZufl7pvhWQArqvuY3HsVfR96Rnw9uGFJlKbjZtgNS0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very good burger at a great price in the airport of all places. They don't inflate their prices like the other restaurants in the food court. The promo masala veggie burger was phenomenal with sauce on both sides of the buns, patty tasty and full of lettuce! It was a very satisfying meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Wvyv1RQbp_IQTaAa84495_537z_HKyw2tjU&fid=0x0:0x6e490cd43ff3cd10"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"gyee001","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzbvMgR48Hk-AYTXHtf28cdH2tq_lel0GeO5epNlSbVK608A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They are handling food with their bare hands. They enter your order on the touch screen then touch their shirt, then their face and then adjust their pants  and then used their bare hands when picking up your burger by the bun and putting it in the wrapper. The staff looked like an extra from  the walking dead series. I asked for ketchup and mayonnaise and she moved like molasses to get ketchup and then when I asked again if they had  mayo she just looked at me blankly as if unfrozen from the ice ages and slowly started moving down the counter. I thought she was going to get me the mayo I asked for. Nope. She went back to the register to help the next person. Could have just acknowledged my question.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU61QiPq9KuLZIHUcFE-CvcNX771yaR2ZvyllULlobi_euwHUo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Who gives you the permission for not wearing the gloves when you handling the foods?!

Disgusting!!!

We will write a complaint form to Coastal Health.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZVro21yGO7nSqX52XZjYjfZvHffflBONNkFcz&fid=0x0:0x6e490cd43ff3cd10"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"ky s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2pdp8yqFDuAeLdAhN3eq-viTd4aiGYNxUvO8z8bbe2h9ZPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The most unmotivated crew I've ever seen in ANY WORKPLACES. I waited for over 15 minutes to get my order and good thing I wasn't in a hurry to catch a flight. There were at least 10 customers waiting behind me by the time I get to place my order. The counter was not manned for more than a few minutes while multiple employees were seen sitting / standing / walking around chatting and looking at their phone.

If their service is not this bad, who would bother to put a review on a $15 order?

A&W Canada should really look into this. I have never seen service this bad in their other locations before. They should all be fired, seriously.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kunal Biswas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmeFRc9T1Joebv_v-FpePIvctisvN8ZheF4P9Kk4xh7bG8lb-lSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Regular A&Ws- nothing much to say. Got the Uncle Burger meal and it was decent","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1-1FZ5VV59stvqJFoXDYb6jRygeaKacHG20-9&fid=0x0:0x6e490cd43ff3cd10"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"B Habibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf3PVgymHXL1r1ue6aROTNazoEDSFu-0MRLcmFs6sXD5nhazY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never have I ever seen such an incompetent crew. Waiting to order far too long because it seems important how your name is written or in which bag the food to be placed. The ppl making the food do that bare handed, but with facemask on...The display where you can see what you can order is too small, I took a picture to enlarge. When you finally get your food the fries are cold, nice work...not. Order isn't complete either, 30 dollars payed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP5srg-sh6ANVVSxP4Vyc58A_SOlHrolaU4tsv&fid=0x0:0x6e490cd43ff3cd10"],"When":"2022-9-28"},{"Name":"VISHAVJOT SINGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsE0mhFipQ-CVbG0XsSxHe6Wfwk8nSdA8I7swhOz3YX5AjSow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was flying today back to India and wanted to try something indian and from advertisements i saw about the new vegetarian burger of a&w. So i went in there as it was big line up and they were only 4 people working. There was an indian guy with earrings working at front he was so friendly and nice he answered all my questions and made sure i get everything i asked for. I loved the experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabriel Reis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUa1mk1aOQ805qOG5PohjtHnGy2kMj9EcpsDCO4U3ab8tzm3iU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Google maps says it open 4:15, but when I came here it opened at 5:30.
There were only two employees there, the cashier who was more sleepy than I was, and the cook who was killing it. She was unstoppable, handling every order as quick as humanly possible, really pulling the weight from the cashier.
The glove stuff is true tho. Not a single glove in sight","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dilly Bar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlTa5-wYzHysJdzzkB7I7IYfo0gl1tku8TcjhbIO7H2ox6oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"If you want good food and service, come on a weekend. It’s like there are two different restaurants. On a weekday you will get a bad attitude from the counter staff and undercooked food.
On a weekend you will get greeted with a smile and a cheery attitude. The food is cooked properly and the burgers are put together properly (not falling apart in the bag) the fries and onion ring bags are actually full .
Maybe the owner should give a raise to the weekend crew to reward them for a job well done. The weekday people can use that as incentive to get their attitude in check.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"anh nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZxLeF1XTWdjA0Yhl43VWTx-KghjU3yaymgCRoMxusjuvgpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ate few branch A&W, Seafair No1 road cooking Food didn't hot, no taste. It's cooler. Wish quality better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeglsigvdp3pub2mHziqnaOeb8xh97ZmZrTmSx&fid=0x0:0x1e6a7a96cb5d049b"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Pat Tessmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLayJIo3f4hZcBBMdIFKUvSW6kvPY5DMTTyOR2XZM-9oUtKfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is great! Even when super busy they are doing their best to get the food out in a timely manner. Hard working and always a smile for the customers! Delicious, fresh teen burgers everytime!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULq9GrOgvBO_U0bP5S5m00IW5J7veC5MzqD9skcYz36VRwARbCuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We believe in food safety at A&W,as well the taste. Although it decor is not attractive ,but it's good enough for a fast food restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkPc-M0VdE7X70s2ca6fAgDmWaNXA92SzIQaBB&fid=0x0:0x1e6a7a96cb5d049b"],"When":"2023-9-19"},{"Name":"Sisi Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4KkKMvBm0iGI_e1AqEi_heaD8_WloPPKTvN3Y_mUYxabhx2P2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"If you are craving for poutine and want something quick, try the one here. It comes with the squeaky cheese curds and gravy. Not going to blow your mind but it is decent for a fix.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNprDG74PBSbFtr0iVQAKLhZ1u-qegnCDMmC6vR&fid=0x0:0x1e6a7a96cb5d049b"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"M Aziz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsGvYBRjSNJUNQ4b9nvqJXd_76xZfMwnX7yUDl2wtIuo2POHJr_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to A&W on Francis's  and road no1 in Richmond B C to order egg sandwiches
And I said I will use washroom first and then I order she said no our policy you buy food first
That was unpleasant and I need to use washroom urgently but she insisted that I have to buy finally she let me use it then manager came and they are all international students same people all who work there they trying to have there own rules to be implemented on Canadian very sad
Stranger who is not having legal residency giving us orders unfortunately this is the results of Canadian government policies for immigration
Look what is happening in Ontario?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jim lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-OqgMZ9y8cZ8nnkdVbcOMfjRqoiDnBh3r7h262dtRK7_oK6GZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Of the four A and W in richmond I went so far ,
This one is the best taste for food.
Room for improving coffee.

The other two in food court, you may skip . I do not know why the cooking has such big difference even they have the same ingredients. I guess it is human makes the differences","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8N1Bd9ejBTTjPHx7kpV_qGwvv20Z_FI36UPf0&fid=0x0:0x1e6a7a96cb5d049b"],"When":"2019-2-11"},{"Name":"Robyn Hanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzU-QMjcmnA7UC7sqMqlUI6ZbNqjw3zbWECnZqekEbi_-eVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here are exceptionally friendly and go out of their way to make things right. I’ve ordered here several times now. The food is consistent and always freshly made to order. But the staff here truly shine and take pride and they’re a big reason I am a return customer.","Images":null,"When":""}]

They don’t have to clean it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXZls8ScoA7u2wnom9NbSQdI7ev76o42sBV8xT\u0026fid=0x0:0x7f39661137e794e8"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Akshit Kapoor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnR4LWh8nHC47ywt2_bQg4SwWpcZG0yqDhvoHBBo7NV5QDe5ga=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last Wednesday I went to this A\u0026W and ordered 2 Beyond Meat Burger meals, and 20 seconds after I paid I requested the staff to make the Beyond Patty Fresh and double cook it on the grill, But the next minute they handed me my order and said they already made the burgers. This Is the way you treat your customers??? Such a Slacker Behaviour from the Staff. I paid 36 dollars and I Didn’t  get what I ordered, Really Disappointed. I am also an A\u0026W employee but I would never treat my guests this way ever.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Lesperance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi3PhxNWcQWSaCxSixjGUC_hniW8RI7ALtWLTCFuQwF6zxb1UISQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The most disgusting A\u0026W I’ve ever been in. Stopped in after some shopping to grab a quick bite. The woman at the cash was rude, the store had food and spills on the floor and the ketchup area was dirty and trash over flowing. I spent 15 minutes waiting for a chicken burger and when I had to follow up because they forgot my order they gave me attitude. I had a few bites and it tasted weird so I threw it out, thankfully I did because I ended up getting sick later that night. The staff working in the back also didn’t have gloves on.. overall, stay away if it’s this disgusting from what you can see who knows how bad it actually is.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shuja Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEBorCT1xB53Ohf-r3sasYNY3f1aLK2cvkUGn0blmUthajlwZj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These branded fast food chains have similar taste anywhere you try but this review is specifically for the service, rather fast service. Brought my food to the table. Good place for a quiet breakfast. Handwashing sink is key- well done.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anna E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi2h3ArqgU_TYCKhB265HkgDHtTiZdy-WZwZpaips_tWOYQIIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've heard about this chain for years and was very glad to see that there is quite a few locations in Vancouver, Canada. The interior design of this particular restaurant is very nice, and they have a hand washing sink right by the condiment station. Very convenient, I wish more restaurant had this.
I tried two dishes: Peri-Peri Chicken bowl ($15.99) and Peri Q Chicken and Fries Plate ($17.49). The bowl was kinda dry, I had to add sauces on my salad. Other than that, everything tasted good. The plate was good, as well.
Big plus for having a menu on the website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNacxV1cld-Ii6zsbu4VfWk6BH0_YTXAUlmQIr3&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Tushaar Bal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4AMbgxUKoO28LvEh2ifbLcwYB_A0mjrxYuOyakOLaD9-3nFM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently visited Nando’s and was really disappointed with the experience. When we picked up our order and brought it home we noticed that the sandwich bun had visible mold on it. We went back and brought this to the staff’s attention, but instead of addressing the issue, they insisted that it wasn’t mold and claimed all their buns looked like that. When we asked to see other buns to compare, they refused. It would’ve been much better if they had simply accepted the mistake and resolved it, rather than denying something that was right in front of all of us. Customer service is about acknowledging issues and making things right, and unfortunately, this wasn’t the case here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXxbAOF24myG8Kl41EMk7deV3V9mb5wEeqQFBb&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Sean Clarke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHEQ8ZVdCiJ-KMalTctUWx7nICzxQHgfAdI2daY5TT96lWt-8z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool Nandos. Decorations inside and out are pretty dope, open kitchen, very comfortable seating, friendly staff. Good chicken as always, the menu has great choices. Thoroughly dope.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9IGwjAkJ-IzIllbZHoHnm8kaRwcUL4j2_cRMW&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Alejo Suaza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIZKfSpm4-G3sMiA6BYsw4Hh4HCI8PqveS9cFi-8rYKvYGqjBHcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time dining here, I came with my girlfriend, we both love chicken and we were amazed by the quality! Chicken was yummy and fresh, the lemon herb peri chicken is really tasty. The restaurant is cozy too, I can imagine the vibe during cold winter. The price is okay, considering we live in Vancouver is actually decent price, could be a bit better but for what you get is fair. Will definitely come back!👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY5VLrOpANwG1KMz6jQf0-UXCmFr6B-76MsPps&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an absolute blast at the Yelp Elite Event!  Everything was delicious, and here are some highlights:

Main: PERi Q Platters (non-spicy)
This limited-time flavour is a must-try!  The chicken was tender, with a sweet and spicy kick.  Perfect for dipping in any of their Peri-Peri sauces, from mild to super spicy!

Sides: Spiced Rice
Packed with flavour, mixed with bell peppers and spices.  It’s the perfect complement to your meal.

Dessert: Naughty Natas
Similar to Portuguese egg tart - Flaky crust filled with custard and caramel — sweet!

Beverages: Sangria
Refreshing and just right for a summer evening.

Loved their spacious indoor area and the beautiful outdoor patio with brick and greenery—perfect for summer hangouts!

I left with a bottle of XX Hot Piquante sauce, ready for some grilling adventures.

Big thanks to Nerissa and Nando's Canada for a fun and delicious night. 🎉 And shoutout to our amazing Yelp Community Manager, Anushka, for organizing such a fantastic event! 👏✨

[Yelp Elite Event]","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4ZgxiOjey3ZCImnpcjxWaITGWeX0Db5L1TpZf&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Laba Group","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKBffkXjyVpQ9hNDSIdczYqzHUSaC3cBZjTa55QNrNt8_IIIuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Angel Makes This Nando’s Exceptional!

My family and I travel to this Nando’s location not just for the food, but for the exceptional service we’ve always received from the local staff—and especially from Angel. Her friendly smile and outstanding customer service truly set this place apart. Angel goes above and beyond to make every visit a pleasure, ensuring customers feel welcome, valued, and well taken care of.

She’s a big reason we keep coming back, and her dedication to her role deserves the highest praise.

⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zhuge Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo5epQpB8uJydI3sToJa66foIacZBCLIBYQ-6Z79DDQxjMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Chicken was tender and juicy; but medium spice is still lacking 🥊 For the price, opt for costco rotisserie chicken.

Sweet potato side dish was the 🌟 - perfect blend of spice and sweetness, nice crunch from the sunflower seeds and savouriness from the feta.

Brussel sprouts had the right sauce but 99% charred 😑","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtgbjnQ7OLZzV3EL98eXUDddffqIKc_Ixag-oL&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Isha Dhoot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUODtmX3R0OeWQrlJ6M8qJrVJkadF_33Y_D9ufFismcxRjM8Djt1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved the quality of food, it was perfect to my taste. It is very hard to find that in Vancouver! It was our first time dining here and definitely won’t be the last.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWB462LpOxBV54yi_iVof3p34qr5VtA44TiMpb&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-8-23"}]

title: Burger King
descriptions: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Arün Dhir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWFTvyAJI_TKUbI1rrENteDb3bD5qtF5_8GXaSg1hrZlX2B1Vn1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The employees at this location are always very pleasant and hard working. The food is always prepared promptly and is consistent. Most importantly, the environment is kept clean. I recall one time we started to clean a stable ourselves with some napkins, when.a staff member noticed and came to clean it for us immediately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKQR3mqLy7fyKGIdxrZdUhV3ViHzJovXanuj9e&fid=0x0:0xd0004e2a188bfc70"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Joseph Fung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkZEb8e5c-d48CtQKYY357rxTS2qVXdqhij1aQG0wnJ9RdQaSW8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"On an early Saturday morning, I parked my car on the rooftop and hurriedly made my way down to the street level. Craving a quick breakfast, I stepped into The Burger King, only to be greeted by the sight of a construction sign at the entrance. Unaware of any ongoing activity, I proceeded inside.

Despite the apparent preparations underway by the two staff members, I couldn't help but notice the lack of customary greetings when I approached the counter. Having worked in the fast-food industry myself, I understand the importance of customer service standards. It seemed that such basics were being overlooked, perhaps due to inadequate training or management oversight.

Opting for a special and a small coffee, I was taken aback when a homeless individual approached me, asking for spare change and even food. While I sympathized with his plight, I couldn't help but feel a sense of unease about the situation.

Reflecting on the broader societal issues at play, I couldn't help but attribute some of the blame to governmental shortcomings. The decline in our communities, businesses, and overall trust can't be ignored.

As my order was handed to me, I couldn't shake off the feeling that proper hygiene protocols weren't being followed. Despite its prime location, the lack of crowd could perhaps be attributed to these shortcomings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDP4GqiBCDiYe5FFOGp_53OdzV0sjG_FwP7uhl&fid=0x0:0xd0004e2a188bfc70"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Ricky Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ4fb2X6guFVFiuhC52YjigU7XjCL9UKX76Fjc8hbYj4or5GU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"😥 sandwich was soggy , the staff was slow but they seemed a big short staffed , atmosphere cleaner and better than McDonald’s the fries no salt ? what happened ? not really worth the cost if paying more nowadays","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoPGzOmkjAVONGPzqKg3e8NQVj3UuJjbTpXKVW&fid=0x0:0xd0004e2a188bfc70"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"銀蕭","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQXVVFBObW2MkT0216b7nRG61-wU0iwymMawgviCFc2ElrL0Zk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Beware this place charges you extra without letting you know.  I was asked if I wanted cheese with my burger, without telling me the cheese was for extra charge.  The same went for extra pickles, I was never charged extra for pickles at any other place, and I honestly don’t have a problem with being charged extra here if that’s the case.  But, the lady also didn’t tell me the pickles were for extra charge, I only noticed on my receipt after I paid.(receipt shown is a different one since I asked for a refund) Anyways, I think it is unacceptable to charge customers without informing them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_5rlM8F12BfxykHalCHcnT4aQiDWk29I8uPLS&fid=0x0:0xd0004e2a188bfc70"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Gurmeet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDsjNQA9vqhnEfGtMY4Dm6cqkwabLBIrwVVg_6xv1CUDZcxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place to enjoy your meal with variety of shakes, I love to visit this place whenever I need to have something special for my day.
Staff is so nice and polite with helpful nature,
Always looking forward for customers and providing best quality food.
Specially that girl believe so supervisor; working with just one staff member they were providing food fast and tasty
Must visit This place 😊😊😊😊 not to mention store was cleaned.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simarjit S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX4bwpPZRmhbwaxAqLkCSHEoCq64MpM2VDeuzUYksHdbe9PEjq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was fantastic! The staff were super friendly, the food came out hot and fresh, and the restaurant was clean and well-kept. The Whopper was perfect, and the fries were crisp. Great experience—definitely coming back!"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shinn Inagaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpF1gPQ6II9FjL7HoACMWpgmrVznxivHZdomkvTJ9wRIkWHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food is good but both Men’s and Women’s washroom were broken.  😭😭😭
I had to go to McDonald’s washroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNspW5g1p0w_n5w4z5u7R1pWdl-IERg5SQKx5g&fid=0x0:0xd0004e2a188bfc70"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJke_H51lEVtqmQ6Mwhj0R5MqDW7L2xLlIdf0sg4kPFJFF0D9I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Polite and friendly people. New and clean restaurant.
Foods are not relay amazing and not sure why.
Usually whopper burgers are thick and juicy, but this one which we tried was very dry, and like cheap frozen ones.
Onion rings and Fries were fresh and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi-VspRQgLP0bpUMIvLtoJwW-wmgtulIxpkNxD&fid=0x0:0xd0004e2a188bfc70"],"When":"2019-7-5"}]
