user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Victor Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMFE5BNhgNfk5RtFjElijU5COak-F8KWg7vkC2eOWy-GXpNlUM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been wanting to try this place out for a while.

Glad I finally found time to visit, and I'm not disappointed at all.

Ordered the Super 10 (chicken), and the 12' soft burrito (beef) combo. The ingredients in the soft burrito were nice and fresh. The tater tots were really well done. Light and crispy on the outside, soft and fluffy on the inside. The crispy chicken burritos were good by itself; it had a sweet aftertaste. Plus, I recommend you dip your tater tots with the salsa they give you.

The service was fast too. Came here around 2:30pm on a holiday (Remembrance Day). Ordered and everything was ready within 10 minutes.

I'll definitely be back if I'm ever at this food court. Very well done. Highly recommend if you want your Tex Mex fix.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edward Jiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0_VfxfxZh02HFe4yL1O3tNCL3F-NdL3KMeLduXxNaCUos0HPv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here on a suggestion from a friend, was hoping to meet Luis. Was disappointed when he wasn’t there, but when I looked inside my taco, I saw L U I S spelled out in my sauce.

Needless to say, this spiritual surprise has turned Luis into one of my best friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz79mudwRyx0gFiq6haOzp6_qJI7NJO58UO1XA&fid=0x0:0x142825211699f058"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Still one of the best places to get a fast taco salad. Toppings are great and that deep and crisp shell really stands out. Miss the days when you could pour the salsa on top by yourself but I guess covid changes things. Crisp tater tots complete the meal.

Update: March 2024... glad to see their taco salad are still good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUxh2WnmZQ9NUViGNHQogHim3qpVZdKLATo2Pp&fid=0x0:0x142825211699f058"],"When":"2021-8-15"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were hoping to try out a 5 star Mexican restaurant in Vancouver for Cinco de Mayo Day but heavy traffic thwarted our plans. Ended up at the food court in Lansdowne Centre and got our Mexican fix at Taco Luis. I usually just order their tater tots for a snack; as I wanted a full meal this time, I decided to try the Tater Tots Deluxe combo meal. They put rice, beans, tomatoes, carrots, cucumbers, lettuce, peppers, cheese, sour cream and salsa on top. I had the option of putting guacamole on top as well but I decided to pass on it as I was quite happy with the mound of food piled on top of my tater tots already.

I really don't care whether it's authentic Mexican food, I only care that it tastes good. I've always loved the tater tots at Taco Luis, and now that I've tried their Tater Tots Deluxe I think I've just found my new "go to" meal at that food court!

There are plenty of other options as well if you're in the mood for something other than tater tots. Burritos, Tacos, Soft Tacos, Taco Salads...etc. My husband ordered a 12 " beef burrito combo and my daughter ordered a 10 " chicken burrito combo. (Didn't get any photos of their meals. Was too impatient to start eating the Deluxe meal sitting in front of me!)

Service: Good
Parking: Plentiful and free
Location: Inside the food court at Lansdowne Centre, Richmond","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPA1tim-YLiog7FGAzqVW1ky24-4lAD4xGpRIA&fid=0x0:0x142825211699f058"],"When":"2023-5-6"},{"Name":"Matthew Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD8HNK0uSQ1ldEBhEknSBv_0LEv7aALue1_vgFOemN9jzDpWU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic simple Tex Mex done well.

Get extra salsa sauce! It's amazing with the potato gems

Been coming here for more than 10 years, but have only returned after 6 years of going without. Still tastes amazing. Super sad that the oakridge location closed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEVb91-15lYhaib_0ILWbsqxqcRkeMGdofApjT&fid=0x0:0x142825211699f058"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Jay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKagpkay_tyMiZJ290grAjrZOpOEgY41rzeVSw6eYBfxe4VIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot has been around for ages and always reliable with their quality and service. Their tater tots are hands down the best around! Crispy, soft and tasty! Always end up going with Taco Luis when I visit this food court, no competition.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1IbF6OB2pBY78OlcMDHvCdzDV7SbG-VP9Djs_&fid=0x0:0x142825211699f058"],"When":"2022-1-30"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This food court stall doesn't look like much and I wasn't expecting much from this place at all. However, I was quite surprised to discover they serve some of the best Tex-Mex food I have ever tried. I had 2 of the chicken crispy burritos and they were made fresh and fried to order.

PEOPLE! THIS PLACE HAS THE MOST AMAZING UNIQUE SWEET SALSA! Like for real.... You need to try their salsa... It's tangy, refreshing, and sweet. This is not some typical store bought salsa but it's definitely one of a kind. And the crispy burritos were very very good. Like freshly junky very very good. It really hits the spot for its genre of food. The prices are quite fair too. A food court must visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMg5RTgJYlUHbsNdfjHxYZoM7czqu_J-htRgcV&fid=0x0:0x142825211699f058"],"When":"2022-1-23"},{"Name":"J X","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFKGXvrRdpPYblBIKOgqPq7hhjib8sXZ-wrvsqRzOqYWtgAYte=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good but I dislike some of the toppings for veggies and the taco itself becomes a huge mess if you order all the sauces.

The white salad dressing they add is a bit strange. Not something you usually have on tacos.

Overall it’s not bad just be careful of what toppings you order on your tacos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe8CAOjU2A4yrWJLoURL9si8cAQfyj1Lir3cuL&fid=0x0:0x142825211699f058"],"When":"2023-2-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Junr Cuddles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpP0UppqoHfUHb6E3SZPwvw49Tc8NvKZyqJUHsiajVnOxokdEpng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"$19.94 before tip for small portion of meat. They don't use the bigger square boxes anymore, and the amount of meat you get is so small.

When I went back to show them, she said it was because I asked for less rice and explained that it's standard to get 4 pieces of each type of meat. I asked for a refund and her manager got her to give more meat instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3T-NzWTlhPqmzTxxK5BrlT4ch40nC1tRKZILq&fid=0x0:0x81d1efd5220e254"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Ryan T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTbPLCIHZpRJHRZS0cmLS8P44BoiWoqHfmIqt5LGcRYqIp86z8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overly expensive meal + terrible quality + bad service
I ordered 2 meat meal and paid $18.26 to get this tiny amount of food, I haven't seen anyone charges higher than this yet.

What can be worse? their rice is half cooked 😡 they were so hard to chew and uncooked inside.

And there's more, I asked for refund and the owner says, we don't do refund, the fry rice is meant to be like that.
That is funny, I have been eating rice for all my life, I know it when the rice is not cooked,
The store prefer lies than a good fame, I really should have read Google review first","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRUQZhDO4b-Acy4FPTAq4yobJtOhakl1smLUQJ&fid=0x0:0x81d1efd5220e254"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Chris Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi1ZK3MHTnpPCOqLyzkVei_XbPaoQrMlHhumgnz4PKQx6hDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was warm and bland, I suggest you pay by cash because if you pay by debit or credit card, the reader will give you only two options and both are to leave tips with a difficult third option of no tip...if you find it. That fast food place make it hard to avoid the tipping selection forcing most customers to have to leave a tip. Total BS.  😡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUk8x6NPYoNorK_y40wzhMuuJ0ZOtIiPdnZDYk&fid=0x0:0x81d1efd5220e254"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Yvonne fenton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHpWo4pHrc6cYwvNNKZ7SSsr6v4BnPkKwrNqKusTqZeBg8-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Taking time to post this review because I think this location is great! The employees are always super nice and efficient, and they give massive portions. It's mall court food, and they do a great job. the food is also waaaaaaay better compared to any other location, I won't even go to the bourbon St grill in Metro Town or Guilford because the food is awful, like really bad in comparison (deep fried flour with no meat in side etc). I get the Louisiana chicken (breaded) and my boyfriend gets the bourbon chicken and we LOVE that they always have the rice noodles because they are so good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neri Matrixx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEAsQwNwiH4aesUxpapeB6lMqfjR6zx9Ff1axtQeydaL4OQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Use to LOOOVE this restaurant, they introduce me to Hong Kong mango chicken. As of late, the food quality and taste as dropped significantly. The Mango chicken is no longer golden-brown but instead is DARK-BROWN like its burnt. Can easily tell its chicken fried in OLD oil covered in so-called mango sauce. They claim their fried rice has in minced chicken, that's a LIE. The rice is basically plain steamed rice with minced vegetables, no eggs or chicken. I won't be buying for them again. Now I have to search for another Hong Kong restaurant whenever I need mango chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLLlWZyYacSfPUEM_y6eqF3gQpQnjt6MTg5hfV&fid=0x0:0x81d1efd5220e254"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Katherine Gaudet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtOSQd0ahPMgezmpxV3Q-fR5cLFCjTtlvx2MwI7jNqLXZ9EIlm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We got the three dish meal and it came in a small box… we asked why they didn’t answer only stating it’s the same amount which it’s not.The rice was crunch and everything else was wet and not flavourful they only thing that was good was the broccoli.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-exvyO-ZzS1GyRD_0qhfrCEcAd_rUUHTD5fCs&fid=0x0:0x81d1efd5220e254"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Ms. Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVk4Vq9tafC1UbckjWPZPkC-xhJ-wwZokeNEh23wrO4ohl8o8X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Extremely disappointed tonight.  Stopped by for mango chicken to go.  It was getting close to closing time and it didn’t look fresh. I asked if it’s still hot and was told yes.  Almost $16 for a side and sat down for a few bites.   Like warm.  Not crispy as I remember.  Total disappointment.  Have been going for years but I will rethink going later at night because it should have at least been discounted.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Topher Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYneZCby6Z6qtmC2BKA1J-r3-da0AFV_YXZUYQJ1q06Mz2qaDF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of my go-to places at food courts.. Food is good and fresh as its a popular place.  Staff at this Bourbon st grill is quick and the seating area in this mall food court is very clean and lots of seating for everyone. I really like the BOLD look at the new Bourbon street food court locations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSQJHn1a7OAMFZCe_ahusyJ8ZXwVaeVBir2DYS&fid=0x0:0x81d1efd5220e254"],"When":"2023-10-2"}]

Looked good, people came in but very surprised by the quality...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKJaQNzfkU0sXd_Q_QJKxUsB3yKS7itsX-fAtK&fid=0x0:0x308e3cbf3e0ba457"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Adrian Llonor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9w4BZt-d7o2AFZvLV9VPCtzeSpaMiN3DUMo5dUmE5SjB0HmNn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not worth. This is their calamari (~$14 post tax and before tip)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUl3PANwzb6MjU6qr6UrjJNeNAaY11svKDa8Ne&fid=0x0:0x308e3cbf3e0ba457"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Zackary Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJA-iLYTKd8fZAuBvIJS9NcFLgLHgCxUazVq2sTEUQlLf5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Opa increased their price and the amount of food does not worth the cost. The salad and the protein doesn't even fill up the box. It's basically not fair for its price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnBAuvRya-T_yu_K7DPSsYovD95bz_JutKAo7o&fid=0x0:0x308e3cbf3e0ba457"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Andrea Spelina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrcOkIDp3jZp_Bmh09A33e2NrtOGLEKDx-iUKLEVAzxV-e4tDG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Paid full price for a skewer of chicken but received a wooden stick with hardly any meat on it. What a rip off!  I did ask the ladies working about the lack of portion size but they just shrugged it away. I paid $16 for that pathetic meal. Never again at this location. Go to Metrotown, at least their portion size is still worth the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN99Tq9iYDrP3L71njdwPaNQV8P8QzjbwjQCWrf&fid=0x0:0x308e3cbf3e0ba457"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Joyce Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBAFjn7DHVIxFHUFMBx-PLDZL2mHuNqaeFO9H2Np-RjKSCcb5k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst portions I got when I ordered the calamari and salad meal. They did not agree to give me half rice and half salad, which is fine. However, they gave me the tiniest portion of rice and calamari. METROTOWN OPA IS THE BEST. They always allow half rice/half salad and portions are way more generous than this Opa location. I am expecting more for portions and I paid $15. Not happy!

Photo below is the Opa at Metrotown foodcourt. This the right portion for right price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBqzkr5LFzqwImSaJcfgiOuax9xufZTibr40EX&fid=0x0:0x308e3cbf3e0ba457"],"When":"2022-12-19"},{"Name":"Ebby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1S_gqJd4ufRyQLnyoRjSr6RuCVvESMOvFeBC3zP5wAYpJ5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was good at this branch and fresh. The staff were really friendly

I have one comments on the portions of the food:  the portions of the chicken or beef is not much compared to the price paid","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkr86YZTlF4hhKWqJUU8ney3ePv3UkOzrZ2o72&fid=0x0:0x308e3cbf3e0ba457"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"phaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGM311QkRSlkkPX1qzJTAF2OFab8wcMgdl6SB3-EdGg_q0FH2O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Stopped by this location for Lunch on Saturday July 22 at 2 PM for a quick lunch since I enjoyed the other opa location in ironwood. Ordered the ceaser salad with calamari. Person working up front had zero enthusiasm, zero care, and did not have any customer service skills whatsoever. Felt like I was talking to a robot, even that might be better than the service. I told myself as long as the foods good, Ill be fine. I got my food, and I got half the portion of salad that I did at ironwood. The calamari was a normal portion. I had no bacon bits on my salad, unlike the ironwood location, which I thought was included.. Calamari tasted stale. Salad was normal but had half the portions. Think whoever was working today needs a reminder how lucky they are to have a job in this economy and needs to be sat down to have a chat about customer service...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"fun vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa8Yb0IR8lDbFZTjHA3g18Wty6jiz-PUX_2Rjsm4lLWD5tfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible food, burnt bread..literally couldn't eat it. .customer service non existent. No one cared what was happening with customers, just dazed and confused. Cold rice, the chicken skewer was tiny. All in all horrible experience will never eat there again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQXHptqtgifZwo-yxSSFElWibEsFg4UvJO-A-X&fid=0x0:0x308e3cbf3e0ba457"],"When":"2022-6-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eyndyel Lasala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVexPgB5vtvtMOfz6Iz_M3mgsnQhRf_FnzqZpo_TVdlFhJDNY4-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It took us a while to find the place but it’s really worth the trouble. We were greeted by Abbas the chef and made sure we try his best pizzas. The Spicy Beef was phenomenal! I recommend visiting this place if you need a pizza fix 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcea62s1v2R57_9ojCoZXxkUrtcRdMKDmGMvXS&fid=0x0:0xf54a5c809ad063bf"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Kevin (KC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZpzDcm4xbgvb_oOynyP_bQvwIe7l-wMoPIs8L4UeVZ-waBkO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great pizza joint to grab a slice or two of wood fired pizzas. 🔥

Came here on a Friday night to grab a bite and they had a decent selection of cooked pizzas.

I got the Hawaiian and Spicy Beef and they re-heated it for me on the wood fire oven. Both were very good and the crust was great! There was little to no flop on the pizza which is good.

I will definitely come back here again when I'm craving pizza by the slice and in the Richmond area! 🍕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnM2IaJoV5E4pVGwWg7_QpEQfr2s6DoPESGdMc&fid=0x0:0xf54a5c809ad063bf"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Adam Doolittle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsnUzuHb8m_KIU05FDY2ohQ61D_k2XF3HKsROrSiVIlSVfZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**Romilano Pizza Restaurant Review**

If you're near Aberdeen Station in Richmond and your stomach starts to rumble like an untamed lion, head over to Romilano Pizza Restaurant. This place is a hidden gem, and getting there is as easy as pie, with the added bonus of lightning-fast service that leaves you feeling like you've just hit the culinary jackpot.

The prices won't have you feeling like you've been taken to the cleaners, either. They're pretty reasonable, which is always a pleasant surprise. But let's talk about the main event: the pizza. Each slice is a flavor explosion, like a fireworks show for your taste buds. The ingredients are fresh and the flavors are bold, making every bite a delightful adventure.

I walked out of there with a smile on my face and a happy, pizza-filled belly. Romilano Pizza is definitely the place to go if you're in the area and want a meal that's as satisfying as finding a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzwBSBVjuY5ayR9HwLmnBp_VHjzN08BuYEpLk&fid=0x0:0xf54a5c809ad063bf"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"R. B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjMfujT8nltBeRW-9Fq0u_t6mswF6rK52x4vPNlA8lYuHvr0Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome wood fired pizza super tasty and a good selection of drinks.  The seating is at a counter looking out at Aberdeen station so if you like to people watch and eat great pizza this is the place for you.   About $5 CA a slice; very affordable.  I am pretty sure they do full pizzas too.   Thanks for the great food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdks1jnl9MB4f45adEVnCeUGl5Sf-SfPPcWQ_c&fid=0x0:0xf54a5c809ad063bf"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"N Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKR-CyINqlHLR4EneAk40Oe8b2h93b6fDdscOzXMY9WcW-2Vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just made a order from Romilano Pizza earlier and I normally order from them so I know the expectations of the pizza how it should be made, however I called them back regarding the pizza how it wasn’t made right due to being super doughy and super thick, the guy that was on the phone instead of apologizing on how the pizza quality was he instead told me “ it’s because we are super busy “ than he was admitting that it was due to out yeast and dough was made. So he was well aware that the pizza wasn’t made right and still served me that .
uhmm so if your busy in your store with receiving multiple orders at times you still want to serve your customer shitty quality pizza that taste like crap ? Also after the news of no taxes on food he decided to raise his prices on the pizza so technically your still paying these dumbasses tax.
I will never be coming back to this place along with letting my friends and family know on what kind of customer service you have.

My expectations was to just get a  simple apology on how the pizza was made but he instead told me go ahead and write a review about it and told me good for you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karim Noueihed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7mt8KuESLPTSsvOdbTwPXnQqa5BJgLGk4t4FDy_Acw60FYmmc_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"*Food*

Oliva Funghi (8.5/10): I ordered the smallest size (medium), it's really good. The garlic ranch sauce that they serve on the size is so good. The dough is super delicious and crunchy, i loved it!

*Service*

Staff is friendly and kind. The pizza was done super fast.

*Atmosphere*

It looks like a family owned business, you can feel it the moment you enter. I personally love it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKjmjWKZ-ZcRyJ2R4USQ6zWBxdVl_Mb7QS6-QS&fid=0x0:0xf54a5c809ad063bf"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Abe Hamm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXR_AiBo8xo7nPNSNQ-ONs6O_xJegSCGlMTaCBIJfbwAuEmLM5H=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple and quiet. Came in while on the way home from work. No pizza labels so had to ask what the flavours were. Went for a slice of capicola and mushroom, spicy beef, and mushroom and fungi. A bit on the pricier side at $14 for 3 slices but the quality is amazing. Large slices with a beautifully crisp crust (the difference in their stove really sticks out here), complimented by amazing flavour from the savoury bread, delicate sauce and tasty toppings. This is quality pizza.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Michalski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjkZKM_Ia7NOgJi2BC-0VDdkYKD9En0ULq0BsIztIKWasGpJhR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good pizza! Stayed in Vancouver for a few weeks and this was my go to pizza spot for delivery! Easy to use website to order delivery and delivery was fast! Pizza was delicious had a few different types of pizza and they were all very good. Crust and sauce and toppings were all on point. The garlic sauce that come with it was very good too. Next time I got to Vancouver I will definitely be getting pizza from here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ9Ztaufg24MsW8flclzw8HJXGK8UE2FfnuDiQ&fid=0x0:0xf54a5c809ad063bf"],"When":"2022-5-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Hong Kong Flavor Restaurant

Address:
104-10151 No.3 Road, Richmond, BC V7A 4R6

Food

Cream Soup and Luosong Soup
The meal began with two soups: cream soup and luosong soup. While both were warm and comforting, they offered nothing beyond what one might expect from similar Hong Kong-style cafes. The flavors were passable but lacked depth or distinctiveness, making them feel generic. A decent start, but ultimately forgettable.
Rating: 5/10

Baked Seafood Rice
This dish was a major disappointment. The rice lacked the richness typically associated with baked seafood dishes, and the flavors were bland and uninspired. The seafood components failed to shine, leaving the dish tasting flat. It’s a dish that neither satisfies nor warrants a recommendation.
Rating: 2/10

Hot Plate (Three Items)
The hot plate featured AAA New York sirloin, gillette fish fillet, and pork skewers. The steak, paired with a well-executed peppercorn sauce, was the highlight of the dish. Unfortunately, the remaining elements fell far short. The fish fillet, though generously sized, was bland and lacked seasoning, while the pork skewers were unremarkable in both flavor and texture. This dish showed promise but ultimately failed to deliver consistency.
Rating: 6/10

Ambiance

The ambiance is functional but lacks character. While the space is clean and organized, it feels generic and uninspired, offering little to enhance the dining experience. The setting is sufficient for a quick meal but does not contribute to a memorable outing.
Rating: 5/10

Service

Service was the most disappointing aspect of the visit. A 30-minute wait for dishes, coupled with a lack of communication from the staff, set a poor tone for the experience. Overhearing a waitress admit that the food wasn’t ready only added to the frustration. When the dishes finally arrived, there was no acknowledgment of the delay or apology, leaving a sour impression. The service felt indifferent and inattentive, significantly detracting from the overall experience.
Rating: 1/10

Price

The prices are on the higher side, which would be acceptable if the food and service matched the cost. Unfortunately, given the lackluster quality of the dishes and the subpar service, the pricing feels unjustified.

Verdict

Hong Kong Flavor Restaurant struggles to meet even basic expectations. While some dishes, like the steak, show potential, the overall execution falls flat. Combined with poor service and unremarkable ambiance, the experience leaves much to be desired. For the price, diners deserve far better in terms of both food quality and hospitality. It’s unlikely I will return without significant improvements.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqTlxEedRQE7DISW3D8puAD8LpQohxR-oF7n3q&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Hugo Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFKB7_IX7_zKudRFRoFgVr64qNA-sn37U70tv-FYN7KNfyp9o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a late night, came with my family for dinner. The chicken skewer and Borsch is really good. The mashed potato complements the steak and black pepper sauce.

I will return again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBYDHv0Cl236vAKb8WIUrRH4bbgCny5LxNBF6t&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Annia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCmNf-6kVgoV3z2v1rhLUKPIXQtdwZxPsOxdlb6pZhbXP-BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nothing fancy just lunch combo for 2 under 40$ considered with inflation or comparison to McDonald's it's still cheap eats.
Tucked away in the corner of an older strip mall it’s easy to miss this place, but has lots of parking. Very extensive menu at reasonable prices for the portion size.
Service is typical no fuss accept Debit or Cash get in eat and leave.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7mARl5ObTp6PoXP_ZAQindMO-7XzotRBQO5Ke&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Benson L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9SEW4MMhDwDPl-7XMw6DDJRHAu1Ns5mm1AsPvBgc9CZz9IYyW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Some reviews say it's the best HK Cafe but that is quite subjective. I have dined in a few times and tried most of their dishes and the taste is alright. Can't say it's "authentic" since I haven't been back to Hong Kong for over 15 years, but it tastes like any other HK Cafe locally. Price wise it's quite good as it is on the lower side of the HK Cafe spectrum. Most of the dishes are decent if you eat it at the store. The service is decent, when they feel like it. There's times I were greeted with smiles and times when I was frown upon. One time I was there and was speaking English, I guessed the waitress thought I didn't understand Cantonese, but she was telling another waitress to give us the bill because we were there over 90 mins, but I already asked another waitress for the bill and was waiting for it. The restaurant was only 30% full at that time. Not sure why she wanted us out. Their milk tea is alright, sometimes too much tea, sometimes too much milk. Taste fluctuates more than my mother's mood. Most dishes are alright but don't get their congee. Their congee is more watered down than the drinks I used to get at the clubs. Take out is definitely a 1-2 stars and dine in is 3 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu9NN_CbVoM96A4VC90KYL54My6b11ff4KEFN7&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"William Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0b4s7KSCcWB_Lxre3zJVTlO2zuaYBCNAHameccCrF8vBLjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a fried vegetable with beef for takeout. When I got home and started cutting the cooked vegetables for my children, I was horrified to find several bugs in the food. Disgusted, I immediately called the restaurant to complain. The rude female worker who answered the phone dismissed my concern, claiming she had just served the same vegetables to another customer without any issues. Sure, that might be true, but maybe that customer didn't bother to look closely for bugs.

I brought the contaminated food back, and they reluctantly refunded me for the vegetables without a single apology. To top it off, this pathetic excuse for a dish of vegetables and beef cost me $25. This restaurant used to be decent, but now it's a completely terrible Hong Kong-style dump. Do yourself a favor and avoid this place like the plague. Spend your money somewhere else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI-tSNuwNBHelC7qgcC3EW0vMTwLwD9ej16Ju8&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Kenrick Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Qlr-7avGGG_gw-sdMVAbZ5vTLZXDpwcJ4A7g2sjiGekUnOtm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tucked away in the corner of an older strip mall it’s easy to miss this place. I live in the neighbourhood and I have only recently discovered it. Easy to miss but once you enter it is quite spacious and very clean. Service is typical no fuss HK diner quick and the food was came fast and hot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAk8wQtLdhYoSHCPalue2a2jnnAPkNy-GiDA6p&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2023-4-6"},{"Name":"Amy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjXHHF3vPFKXXTvrLI9L9GLLX-x9A-g0rYHpm8C9R04tRthXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast throughput and good service considering how busy this restaurant is. Comprehensive menus of virtually any kind of Hong Kong cafe dishes you can think of. Curry sauce seems a bit watery but that is just how HK style cafes and restaurants do curry. Good portion for the price. Probably not the best value but it is the only  HK style cafe in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq45EY3F9iPUL7_7ZOtdkQe8hT_VrTnGqaSxzd&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2022-1-20"},{"Name":"Tammie Kong-Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSmqigKx9ZgKlDJPsbs_C7qwNABUC7XrhxkalIouVlfxwl6sOslA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We’re SF Bay Area natives, and we’re a little spoiled by the foodie culture in San Francisco. So far we’ve been impressed with all the delicious food we’ve found here in Vancouver. Hong Kong Flavor Restaurant is like happily and unexpectedly stumbling upon a little diamond. All of this yumminess could have been packaged up in a high-end Chinese restaurant and instead, we get it in a cozy low key cafe. We indexed high on the seafood, which greatly exceeded our expectations. I liked the creativity in the Hainan chicken with truffle oil so if you like truffle-y things, it’s worth checking out. If you’re looking for a quick, hearty meal, the spaghetti is next-level delicious. My kids generally don’t like Chinese food and they said “this is a 10 out of 10!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjY5ehU_GHRF43IDWko2khsFjXzzgw_CY4moXc&fid=0x0:0xd747db78de59dfad"],"When":"2022-12-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cyrus Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPiR7P9QhffbKgNb40t2_DufCorpf21wV5a0sqg1cU5l7znDY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been here and order their food over 15 times past 2 years. I have 0 complaints for their food. Instead if I can give them a 6 or 7 stars I would.
The food is authentic and with quality. From someone who is born in Asia and with a mom that’s a good chef, I have pretty picky taste bud,  but I cannot pick anything from this restaurant. Their lamb soup always makes me happy and warm. Their mapo tofu is better than when I was eating in Chengdu (China). Their appetizer, the flavoured gluten is so yummy.
Most importantly, when I eat their food I don’t have digestive problems (gassy/uncomfortable) like other restaurants. Meaning their stuff are fresh. Also their waiters always attentive, and their wait time for food is just right. So I really appreciate a good restaurant like this!!!

Please continue to keep your good quality food and service ! I will come back forever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_aam2Tic1Fntee_uLw4sz8rR9BMeR-DKS3uqF&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had one of the most pleasant Chinese restaurant experience ever at this place. Aunty who was serving was super friendly and knowledgeable, the quality that more restaurants should adapt. She was really attentive, and friendly. Food however was the true star of the restaurant. We aren’t experts when it comes to Chinese noodles especially Xian. However this is one of the noodles that everyone should try at least once in my opinion. Thick and wide noodle will give you texture that you will fall in love with, if you are a fan of noodles. Splendid portion size and value for the price. These qualities make this place a must try restaurant. Two thumbs up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTf0fdXR4k0ELyTY2lZBGQMl7RqSf9MW2LKdvl&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Anu Sippy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuTJvyEcXL6MXdPE41FUt9VLt8NezVkUz2UM_3GZAcRfXQOvna=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was just planning on getting noodles but the discount over $15 was too good to resist. So I got a pork burger as well since it would just be a couple bucks more after the discount, versus getting a different noodle dish with meat. And boy was that a great decision. I was planning to eat both together but the burger was so good I ate it all before the noodles even came out. I even got another noodle dish for free. The only con is that I ate sooo much for less than $20, so I will definitely come back and gain weight 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVTK5oUCApzwUf-OW61qb-kvcOLkHUAP2toZcm&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is clean, flavorful, and very affordable, with generous portions.

We had Chongqing noodles, Xi'an hand-pulled noodles with hot spicy oil, and the house fresh vegetable dish. Everything was delicious, and we already can’t wait to try more of their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiNtuANcoDLh6CL8BDMPVzZltuyoArp0vJdkQ&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Intan Halim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJsqaxMzEuX6jSUFuK3ogLJQT1lyNN-iUuZU6Zyoj7KFOBB39v=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My 4th time here. Perfect for casual dining / dining alone.Attentive and friendly staff who are knowledgeable about the menu, making recommendations that enhance the dining experience.Reasonably priced for the quality and portions, making it a great spot for an authentic and satisfying meal. I love the 锅包肉 and the sesame sauce cold noodle 🍜!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXE9Lcq7GUTwU5Z1WLolRnmTrVKCgOeaICGnfS&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY8mzFyrlzJp1BB8uPY-pNs8oaw4KtAgQ2mOL1ULltsPjU3HrH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been driving here from Seattle just to eat the amazing food here. Food are amazing, and the staff are always very friendly. If you are looking for delicious Xian food, we highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK_eQZkW-O_6HCwQ-MLXu-F_qWt3D8OzGUaBNZ&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to with my wife to try out Northwestern Chinese food and it didn't disappoint.  Come early as it gets really busy for dinner.  Ordered the Xi'an Cold Noodle, Cumin Beef Burger and the Cumin Lamb BiangBiang fried noodles.  All dishes were delicious and reasonably priced.  The star of the meal was the fried noodle.  Will be coming back here again in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsyCHAGbHMZvpGI3TDpDPK3wOSyLG9Vkehd4sB&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"S Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJc32s5e82bIJTUSnDqhF_pmqa4Sr2XTAhkvHHSnii2y9U-3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummmmmmmmmm! Best noodles I’ve ever had, EVER! Hot and sour soup was outstanding and a huge portion. Really enjoyed the pork dumplings as well, so much so I forgot to take a picture. Super moist reminded me of XLB in a way. Service was lovely, we asked for recommendations and she was very thoughtful in her response. Dreaming of going again since we left!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk_uOV17_ZPuKtfJaGYkoZjcWHW3zbV_nT6hw3&fid=0x0:0x18c639359e18a817"],"When":"2024-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Barbara Cadiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_gO8YIgfTUZbjAQ33pGi17mkNV4Uxy3PCCQ3E0zY3mrBZ4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was there recently. I don't know if I'm going to be happy or not. I tip people if they're honest and they are service is right however the person who works around 12pm to 1pm who serves me told the price so 19.50 I gave her 20.00... she gave 5 cents change. Nowadays I need my change correct especially we don't live free we work.. we have to be honest.... by the way she didn't gave me the change right away she left then she was doing something at the back then come back......

Please give the change right away before you left the counter..... I'm furious because it's my money.. do your job correctly... I don't work that much...
Take note I have a kid too.. every cents count for us.

People who will buy make sure get your change before the workers do something else......

It doesn't means 1.00 or cents you can keep it as a tip or something... it can use for bus tix and stuffs...

Please retrain your staffs before you left the counter give the change back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzmIMdClD_EKzaLe1KeBgD1C80_nJRRFvPT1-KW88LywkF0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food has always been good but I think they are taking shrinkflation a bit extreme. Cookie used to go out to the edge of the wrapper. Only 7 pieces of popcorn chicken now and I can say the fries it not any better. The double stacker is still good and big those and very fresh hot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe8BKFSsKS4WqmI_uEQJLPucUmQaWaPPyQJsKa&fid=0x0:0x24813236de13ad9c"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Ramandeep Batth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcMlD1ieYyBgCZsZJ82umNdL4Q2Guk0-WsPA5GAjabNF4O9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The girl at the front counter was very very rude. We had some inquiries about the food, but  She was not willing to help. She wasn’t even wearing a name badge. We came here around 5:45 today. The food wasn’t even tasty. It was very oily. I know it’s fried chicken, but still, it was very, very oily. They just need to improve their customer service and the way they talk to the customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trish Phan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsUfT3RxakvDoujJ5oOmGfmPjxN-mfr_T1GhotWYFQLQGkAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Is it just me or KFC quality and quantity has gone down compared to Church's Chicken. I ordered a combo bucket deal and they served me poutine with little gravy and a few curd cheese... Yes it looks exactly what I've described. When I voiced that I wasn't content, they poured more gravy to make my poutine look more appealing. What a joke! Management needs to take customer's review into considerations, its not too much to ask when we pay accordingly for quality service and quality food..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Larae Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw-AHFnHp7VHMX2JJYRj3qiFtMCJ4AEiMqYF9gZMfpGjmPQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We bought food already and my kids started to eat and  my daughter she's 7 years old ask for a ketchup. The man in the front cashier  said to my daughter to wait in 2 minutes?? I'm a bit disappointed as mother that my daughter waited for a piece of ketchup!. That time is not too busy.
And when he saw me starting to stand up he grab a ketchup immediately? ??
And the crush soda tasted bad it tasted like more water that they get directly in the poset..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Repeated my order 5 times and the guy still managed to get it wrong. And then I had a feeling he would, so I clarified with him again after placing the order and he confirmed it back. Gave me the wrong order. Then when I exchanged it for a right order, they gave me RAW CHICKEN. They finally exchanged it again and gave me a free drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZJyOakscO-NZP11P4j1HGe1AOEp6nKqVEiY-I&fid=0x0:0x24813236de13ad9c"],"When":"2023-11-25"},{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hit and miss here.

Today was good because it was busy.

The chicken, nuggets and fries were really fresh and good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1qKfqax0S63JKR6btbz3AXDpZKsrdml2404FI&fid=0x0:0x24813236de13ad9c"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Jonny Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEVl68kkTHoiksI6Vu3soQ6l7tbGokzcstor-QyYMQQEYgZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I agree why this place Review rate 2.7 .
I order 4 pcs combo. 2 pcs of chicken can not eat because dry, burnt and cold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC6ZBYZ4u13ZS4gbiSDqNFEAJc2Ik3KYaB-K7E&fid=0x0:0x24813236de13ad9c"],"When":"2024-5-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelvin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn5_vle6eTXl_7L_paEAOnqv0RWr7Bg0jTzSORqq6cKLgf91yk3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located below the Superstore, this little Hong Kong Style Cafe offers a fairly good value and authentic experience.
Portion sizes are fair for the price. Taste is spot on.
Can't beat this place for under 7-8$","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzl0qZKG0WBtk1yLuE8TvUfO4PDuLlhX3EMDbI&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Michael Chou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUu1CRSNCes2sa1ZH1yWP1b-VZ9tZlM42hE2Up5hwvPM2vmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried the daily combo…and the soup was extremely salty and I couldn’t finish. The grill marinated chicken was actually pretty good and skew toward salty. The tomato based sauce was well cooked comparing to the soup and again saltier than usual. There’s no side veggies!!! You can get more food with veggies with daily specials at Parker Place food court. The only thing I like was that you can ask them to adjust sweetness in the milk tea. Sorry won’t be back again ;(

Everything was close to $17 before tips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX-SyZsimq2pgzO5Z7sssxXsg0GIq1ykPSlXAS&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Mandi Boss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBGKhM6ksHDazIfBY3Gy5uFzNwlOmzmNpMRPASGprOps0AnhRbfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I decided to go here based on Google reviews and wanting to find a hidden gem diner like the Golden Coin. I was massively disappointed. The food is abysmal at best. There is absolutely no flavor, no taste. The food looked nothing like the picture shown. The only flavor we got was from the massive glob of butter they put on our toast that tasted like lemon. Definitely will not return. Also the beef satay is actually just beef sauteé that's very soggy and completely unappetizing. That was a huge waste of money I couldn't even finish my food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxoqTL5BdioyDurZjCv2My0ta0uCgB-HXsJhLU&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Justin Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdx52Kikwc0qLXVIQ56I9QgSYzQs4FktHZQJNeWk16LhVxDTSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Affordable tasty HK style food. Great service. Good neighborhood restaurant vibe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkHauJcrNEsMHZo7TdAxOHs4z602C_NaCw-C-b&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXffDSSzNbupqvgm2wDM9ZIbZE3fqNBUop5zmP7v0h7bNTfOFW2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As an HK Canadian you can't get any more authentic than this. All the reviews about the service attitude or environment are missing the mark. You come here for the food. Satay beef noodle soup had excellent flavour. The instant noodles is on point. The char on the grilled meats is savoury and fantastic. On top of it the ladies are legit nice just efficient. Make sure you know what to order before you reach the counter. Went here twice on a trip to Van for some comfort food and it did not disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT7NKvkhLc6bEHDQZncymzmVeH8UrJWZ8Trzo0&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"T.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfSK5ODV4Qs2dErhY0JPPWRrISVm2njB6WdsZiIx4Fwx3eGrCK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem serving simple, no-frills HK cafe eats. You'll find classic breakfast and cafe options at cheap prices for good food. It won't be the best thing you've ever eaten but it's 100% bang for your buck and comforting food. So for the price in Vancouver much less, 5 stars for Paul's Kitchen.

We got a satay beef instant noodle and the pan-fried pork chop with curry sauce over rice. Both had tender pieces of meat and the curry sauce they have is very reminiscent of the true HK cafe flavour. The food is also served in disposable take out containers.

The ladies working the front were nice and efficient. The place has a bit of a grungy vibe but I think that was part of the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT0DMCS767xANh5QmMwtUw-iIQEVSFdqrmlyI0&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2021-7-17"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Basic Hong Kong style cafe fast food. Prices are low, food was prepared quickly. Tasted good, hot, good food considering the price. Service is friendly and seems like a lot of repeat customers. A bit dingy, but not bad. Located under Superstore. Access in the parkade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFearVI340gOtPa-J3T5O-kjrVOjv-JtiIW-sm&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Taste, price and service are all good
Always like their famous pork chop
We usually call 15 mins in advance to order the food & they will reserve the table for us

I always go there and love their fried pork with egg + rice  and milk tea only $12.1 very good price

Renovation is a bit old

Free parking lot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaKRTAmI66LaS-VSv-TMYxICFy3VG4U7L0QRTj&fid=0x0:0x245a17dec2038e6b"],"When":"2023-5-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mambo Cafe in Aberdeen Centre’s food court is a hidden gem. The baked spaghetti is rich and comforting, and the stewed shredded chicken on rice is flavorful and tender. Their satay beef on noodles is another standout dish, perfectly seasoned with just the right amount of spice. The portions are generous, making it great value for money. The staff are always friendly and welcoming, adding to the overall pleasant dining experience. Whether you're grabbing a quick lunch or enjoying a casual dinner, Mambo Cafe is a fantastic choice in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlhYbszibBgH-bsR_4pFxcyIlwHapoa6q5Csvg&fid=0x0:0xaf88c10af2170cfa"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"TL:DR they serve HK style (somewhat) foods. Their bitter melon and beef over rice isn't great. Small amounts of beef and lots of hard pieces of bitter melon. The sauce is flavorful enough.

As for the corn and fish filet over rice, it's quite nice. The corn is soft and the fish filet has a crispy batter with flaky interior.

Atmosphere is loud and stuffy, because it's a food court. About what you'd expect.

Overall, I would visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3yZXmcSrM2gpfImna4lTPk9DByD9YhhFWaVsz&fid=0x0:0xaf88c10af2170cfa"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXku1mc6pmeIDMqP2gIA1uCtfryJMYCip8UUonqzGQcOKr7CzokQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love to order the baked pork chops on rice from Mambo Cafe, they first deep fry the pork chops and then bake it on top of the fried rice, covered with tomato sauce and top it off with cheese, the pork chops is always crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. I think this is the best baked pork chops ever. The best part is you only pay for the food, no tips required at the Aberdeen Food Court. The quality of their food is better than Happy Day Cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX5ePcVgAbPmGwclKAfqA-6XQwrpUL_bwoyJeU&fid=0x0:0xaf88c10af2170cfa"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying this place. We ordered rice with eggs, shrimps and scallops and rice with bitter melon and beef. The scallops tasted a bit stale, but the beef was very tender. Cash only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNNwpMPezneArqmdkw5JnXP5qJa6jsjBuMtHZF&fid=0x0:0xaf88c10af2170cfa"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Blue Steel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOTZsFG7E7GDkm_WDp_sSD3LXV-gke4Cuw7r0oy67KoZeALp0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I live in Ferndale Washington where I can’t get HK food like this. Have to hop the border for this one. The baked Portuguese  chicken was flavorful for and the price is reasonable. Cash only apparently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgGRB0Wt6Jz8DYsD5cLyQqi_cSp50KpqmWSXHt&fid=0x0:0xaf88c10af2170cfa"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Cyrus C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCDFPbc-Gi-0Ad8TID__uqE2jF9GJpFCEEvGBl9B4UqR58A2_3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried the Barked Pork Chop Rice and it was quite satisfying. The dish had a pleasant tomato flavor, with the rice nicely integrated with the sauce. It was served hot, and the drink selection was good. A solid choice if you are looking for a tasty meal in a food court setting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious Beef and Bitter Melon with Black Soybeans on rice. Comes piping hot and fresh to order. Not many places in a food court offer this dish and bitter melon is super healthy and good for you so it was nice to be able to order it here. For an extra dollar, I added a cream of corn soup which was pretty good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoNkjWMrdc9QplHoSAj4z2-Gq1100tz0xMsesR&fid=0x0:0xaf88c10af2170cfa"],"When":"2022-1-24"},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Can’t really add to what has already been said.  Most dishes are at least average if not better.  I think there are better places for ice lemon tea, but Spaghetti Bolagnaise is always a personal favourite as well as their beef curry brisket. Our favourite dish though is the French toast. Easily the best and most satisfying dessert in the food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZbjjEU2SYP_DjvZxs2JvuuAdKMqnEP1DUiQpb&fid=0x0:0xaf88c10af2170cfa"],"When":"2022-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"John Kroetch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9ZriQY_5kscfPIHrXvfYdGx9n_pl7uxeCe99NVjU4snEQ59M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the Go Away Doc, large. They could not provide nutritional info for me, which is bad. I watched and saw her put in 3 apples and a large carrot,  so I did the math on my own carbs.

It tasted good, but a large was a bit too much. I'd get a small next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4dpbQPBImRj_GrXzisua82uPDMZ7fiv92k-6H&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Jenny Long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjQIesAdgBhFVRzOPI8tEyTFupFJtczlZAUdDSbGUTrWKyg-VKwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I like how crispy the flatbread is and the tuna amount is good. However it’s lacking  something, maybe some corn or something sweet/sour to give it a kick.

It is about $13 for the sandwich which is kinda pricey but it was a pretty big size.

There’s some seating areas too! But I choose to sit near my gate instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKcPdgRE8l13WtwvrY6UGxx5TuBRQ8Oj7vzA4G&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Arin Sarkissian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwSgOHACueM9TXGB4nEv4Lzml4dNuiGWfot_oUW_rbkobd6JDk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Nice little cafe in YVR!

I’ll start with the good - coffee and the beautiful space was definitely a plus. The coffee is quite good actually, so I might recommend it over Starbucks/Tim’s. The space was also lovely with nice decor and plants around.

More honestly, the food really missed the mark for me. While I might appreciate a quality of ingredients, the portion sizing was a bit of a rip off for me. My Serrano Ham sandwich was almost all bread and maybe 2/3 razor thin slices of ham. Cheese and veggies were cold while the bread was toasted, which was a tad confusing. It was also quite dry. After that portioning, I wouldn’t come back here for food unfortunately - I can find way better bang for my buck right next door.

Service workers were lovely, but did take quite a few minutes to take my order when I was in front of the line. Maybe not the best for a pit stop if you’re in a hurry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnrZEQBSyLcbWAJrw4ifq2wmuWklvMjjE5Ki0i&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Ann Karp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVv4K4XdYJTpGgKEEDdSoV-SJF1JItFZQyQyCQzBUDM4OSc_-0c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good healthy option in the US departures terminal, vegan and veg friendly. For $13 I got a big salad with lots of variety and the perfect amount of dressing. They were slammed but the staff was still polite and had a smile. As for atmosphere... It's in an airport, what can ya do?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODQctICyUyCG8W5c-rhcGZTXAM5UBoXYpcyKEX&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Nancy Valerio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT4qwkmT56Fh70mlUb_mcDzYahSeR_S9JZNFoJwibEHD3866SJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have gluten free and vegan options. The tunacado sandwich is just perfection! They have a nice area to sit and they are open until very late which is super convenient. My gate was completely at the other side of the airport but I still walked to this place since I just love it! 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgM2T3Y_qELgAIuqRcYZFEUXD7iE_iqyuRlqLJ&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"F_ C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVFvjlhOS27RWlrA0LGOck5Q0TQ7Eu-ON1nEAmLNgPAOosVl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never seen an açai bowl before with not enough açai to at least sink the granola. Had to move the granola around to find the thinnest açai layer I have seen. The entire portion is objectively not sufficient for the $11.00 price. The açai puree was hard and the granola feels old, dry, and hard (probably also due to the açai puree quantity and consistency issue).

Obviously, I would not recommend to order this dish unless you want to pay $11.00 for a handful of not exquisite granola.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEJ5eZGcLHUumxU3IlLfCgz0KuxgFmwxkvBXx-&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Joe n the Juice
I was deciding on what to eat on my way to the US and decided on this place which seems to offer healthier food. Turns out this place got quite famous from tiktok(?). Sandwich price was surprisingly okay given that this is located in an airport. The person recommended spicy tuna but I decided to go with chicken avocado (Joe’s Club) sandwich. I personally wasn’t a fan of the super thin and crispy bread, it felt like eating cardboard. The chicken and avocado also spilled all over the place when I tried to eat the sandwich. Overall, just a decent spot for your before flight meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqtki4WVaUdexyN_Nb4x0ldY7PCUCtzUchmi0&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Greg Shevchenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNXQmtGrd4iXm-3wflYNaE4wjSUrTuPvo6EH31UX7HZlC6tQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The beverage was excellent and made fresh.  Service was prompt, and the staff was polite.  The club sandwich was quickly prepared and was decent for what it was.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDThhi_pcj_Tc5haXtBb3XAgaS1VTrq89MNhnT&fid=0x0:0xd2f90b1a9aea072f"],"When":"2024-12-14"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Alan Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPt71-6y5q0wv-VYS50vtwi4S1OxdUfdlrfEZSOhPCLCUyk_sRiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This restaurant is located in the Airport Outlet mall and mainly serves hot dog and specialty drinks.\nHot dog is mainly Japanese style, very distinctive. However, the audio system in the store is too loud and noisy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMDaTMNaAlF72ffa7sDnSix_I0VYbtg4NeXVhf\u0026fid=0x0:0x91a2de11d15f0122"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Christian Strauss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCvwYoC6-80X-XeRwFLV47kdxos6XiQ3NLKjaDZ0pqObdcXfg8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The  hotdogs were good. Presentation wise as you can see not really. My hotdog buried in a sea of seaweeds never to be seen again. Wait was long to the point you want to leave. But is it worth the wait? yes. They have a good variety of hotdogs you can try. but dont expect it to be looking like the one in the menu. And tables are few and sticky. Still worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDhLp-OHUkrt5olSfEaqs9aZEUxb1_xACuuWP7\u0026fid=0x0:0x91a2de11d15f0122"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Stephanie De Leon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPtSGjsqOZ_EhbXhnwXOaGVL6b_NNivonu1chio9B4-8j5GbnL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Vancouver staple! The flavors mesh so well together. The portion is great, very filling. I've had my first japadog 10+ years ago and I keep coming back. The location here is very spacious, service is fast. It could get busy during peak hours. These is not ur regular american hotdogs, it's Japanese style. The fries have a selection of flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlvOn040ZzPl-QYTQZPI94Y1MS6dxxQv-dIVuv\u0026fid=0x0:0x91a2de11d15f0122"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love 🥰 the hotdog varieties n love the veggie choice n its good 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBx9X0TdoKt0vEzxXb-gMa0aZD1DXfoSoz2Swe\u0026fid=0x0:0x91a2de11d15f0122"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Nicole isabelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB_tfMiX_GVY5AdIm1IRvtMbk3_qwH5EgsNBZVuZUvtdK1WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Queue was  not that long. We ordered combo with lemonade and poutine: kurobuta terimayo, okonomi and beef bacon cheese. However the waiting time was too long (maybe cause it was a Sunday) \u0026 the place was not so neat but I appreciate the staff who were super kind to us!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbYFDi14735sj26hq7qmZDt6pIPq-t5m5v14_o\u0026fid=0x0:0x91a2de11d15f0122"],"When":"2024-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty fusion Italian Asian cuisine. We had the two popular pastas (seafood and pulled duck leg) with garlic bread, as well as the prosciutto pizza.

The pastas are highly recommended! Seafood was with tomato sauce while the duck was cream sauce. The garlic bread was very garlic-y too.

The pizza was good as well, but we liked the pastas more. Definitely will try again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3M1k7xLf8UPec4fNK4zf9LrsSgdjrYFOKjgUO&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Tashadow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjz9K5Mu0t-jjk90rO8iBqjufVP22Z2Y6uz20Icl88XuJdTzq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So I’ve ordered from here many times before, in person as well as through uber eats but this time around is just sad. Super peeved with this. You call this a $25+ pizza? Your description says grapeseed tomatoes, and where is the basil? Looks like garnish scraps as an afterthought. This is so disappointing. Super tasteless too.

Either update your descriptions and photos to match what you’re selling, or don’t make it at all if you’re low on ingredients. It just looks and tastes cheap and as a restaurant you’re lacking transparency. Whether you’re selling for delivery or for seat in, the food should have consistency. This is a bad look y’all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmjilflXeZ7o-Ny6iia3Z5IUp1pplR_HN6cuap&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Phil V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmEqLQpUyaBAZ4NYce7yQoSFGPG4magVakXras95JPsPwFSrPv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great fusion restaurant! Italian and Asian food together is awesome. The fusion doesn't stop with the menu, but also continues with the decor. Hints of Italian design in the restaurant with Asian decor scattered around gives you the sense they really do mean fusion here.

My partner and I ordered the Pork Belly Pizza after seeing so many reviews and it is quite tasty. Interesting use of pesto sauce (authentic with pine nuts) and pork belly!

I had the pulled duck leg spaghetti with mascarpone sauce and it was sooooo good. Nice and smooth, well balance creamy flavour and the duck was very tender.

We recently ate at Kissa Tanto downtown and couldn't figure out what the whole hype is about their food. It was good fusion and the service was good, but not great for the price. Broli is a GREAT fusion restaurant, with a great price point for delicious meals. Broli's servers are also very friendly.

For any tourist in the area, give this restaurant a try if you don't want to compete with downtown Vancouver prices and the headache of parking. Lots of parking here and it's free.

We also enjoyed the dessert at the end with the pecan graham crumble for the carmel macchiato pot de creme and Lava cake was awesome! Both are made in house and are a great way to end dinner!

Highly recommended! I am an Asian who grew up in a house hold with excellent Asian chef parents, but who enjoys Western and European food too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN01EKlOJHtCHJQ--pidCqYa-XhI1IQZaTJL6Y5&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Jen Cham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWajZIYf1ZeLCZoJ-AdgkJ5yZCYtkW2FvycXqL-VsgoiPeRYhmWmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I did not expect the place to be so cute, is clean and bright. However, the food is average there was not even one dish that we were super impressed for the price. We spend close to 300 for 3. Will recommend for casual dining but nothing special. The food was good but I think is a bit pricey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTVyNAu6qbp9AxJDhMhxTReAu5HEfpna5x_Fuz&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"George Cookie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAbri0D7DgObTN0l5bI_oleVemAatSMPB9CgchOjVn-CXCiTL0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Other people treat the restaurant like a coffee house, talking LOUD as if to out rude the other LOUD talkers. Food was a smidgen overpriced for the pork belly I received which didn't look at all like in the tv display in the place. I only tipped generously because of the service, not the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-tpurJvpsQnNxLRDq2JpDOoYifUPXHvkL48L7&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"yazhu Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLABuThiOeG0eMqa3l1FpLzj2nAxaAAJVWclx5s3NT_8c_ibQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Time and time again, I'm never disappointed by this restaurant Broli kitchen.Some time I came with my family, some time I came with my friends. My daughters loved the pizza and pasta! the perfect cook on the pasta noodles, just enough sauce to coat the noodles but doesn’t overpower. One of my favorite dishes is the steak, by the way, you need perorder it. It come medium rare, well seasoned and evenly cooked on all sides. We loved every dish we ordered. Portions were perfect and we ate very well. I highly recommend them to everyone I know as my favorite restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPi0hCdc2Y7RLi6bk0u8-VbeLsU92uVgt5iC3Lp&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2024-1-22"},{"Name":"John Stick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwA-jpzGraYUo7jr1qY95bukP2m4mzjWDFk6-stxq5hpHJcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My girlfriend found this place. Tucked away in a local strip mall near our house. It has a funny name, and the cuisine is a bit of a surprise...Asian and Italian.

The food is primarily Italian i would say.  We had an amazing mushroom soup and salad to start. We shared a duck pasta and a great pizza.

When we arrived the place was empty and the server told us we could only stay for 75 minutes. Magically at 6pm it filled up. The place was slammed.

The place is worth a try. The pizza especially.

$$","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhx0ccOayv8gb7nU101gJ7jBzaMlhOCytTVA0E&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2023-11-18"},{"Name":"Michelle Havvagoodey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOzetGkb5sfvQ2QqVQLz6HIVsUL94CClajRGhGVUfARW0O_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Stomachache 😭🥹 we got stomach aches near the end of the meal with sharp pains and nausea.. I haven’t had this happen in my life while dining out…

There’s plenty of parking as it’s part of brundell plaza.

Came here for dine out, $56 per person. It was nice they gave like two appetizers along with the food so it’s quite filling. Mushroom soup with some truffle oil? Not bad

Sesame crusted ahi tuna - it was okay… wish there was some sear. Or depth of more flavours

Would definitely recommend the seafood pasta over the duck confit… kind of dry. The sauce doesn’t pair as well with it and it was mainly just a regular boiled potato and boiled veggies kind of dish. Seafood pasta, just wish the pasta was more al dente, the salmon was fishier and wish it held maybe some other textures too. But flavouring wise not bad!

Tiramisu cheesecake, it was okay.

I think there’s potential, the ingredients are there but can be elevated with the cooking techniques. But yeah… we’re not feeling well after eating 🥹😭 and for the price point and value…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNifKPgNMkiXrEOQ2s0rW5xFvpnP-4ELgkeQis1&fid=0x0:0x676de47dfd28fb2"],"When":"2024-1-25"}]
