user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jinny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJF1E0u7aAYhoG0Ugnl_mjrDGZEqbFrHAer59dj1QQcIcrSbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe it took me this long to get here to have their fully loaded (the storm) pizza!! I initially thought it was just an over priced tourist trap...but man, how wrong am I!!! All the seafood on there are perfectly cooked!! Generous amount too! Definately worth the price we pay! On a cold winter night, they have an indoor space right next to the shop for you to enjoy the pizza while it's hot. I would totally go back again for special occasions splurge!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRBNjuYfSSfkp59zH_glIyAK24kMI8oRhuSOF5&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from here multiple times it’s my fave in the neighborhood! Recommend mist which is filled with shrimp and salmon, never got a pizza that disappointed us though 😌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm1TbTj_xPjaGSijBbYJyqX0gY23ddFcaHkacd&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"JC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWorCvbO5RYxEeXn58zCt1qpxaThFfJH8doddmh4RrxaswAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family have been ordering pizza from them for years. I would say that they are one of the rare restaurant that have perfectly maintained their top quality pizzas. Although the price have raised tremendously, but because of their top quality pizza and increased amount of fresh seafood, we ordered it as our treat during special occasions.
Another point that we loved is how they keep up the pick up time. No matter how busy they were, which the store were usually packed of customers and piles of orders, they always make sure to have our orders ready to be picked up on timely manners. Very impressive and highly suggested to order their Butterfly pizza and Hawaiian if you are fan of pineapple on 🍕:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH0r4YektdVtWJeUE2sxABhffte-g3Ff-XncN2&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"suga stan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZwq_G2yinCVeLJXOkCcyPB8ZORGrNnnuIq9H4z1eMNKw40Yk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a rainy day and our last day in vancouver, but getting pizza here is the best decision ever!!!! The pizza taste amazing, very nice staffs, and love the peaceful atmosphere! 😌🎀🫶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlNEU7XzWj08roTw4BpbeVmjWiuRg0FMaMngB6&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Faeze Fazel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWroUaTVwv9Ffyu5NvrNWR7BURgtHw2URWf-sGvYcg3ta5Knp06sg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered the Mist pizza, but it was undercooked and tasteless, so we had to bake it again + adding salt, pepper and more spices!
I wouldn't recommend it unless you enjoy raw food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2uukSGUC3bv2GOpfQXqTlUq6hcUp-7DZlE7zE&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Wanrapee Leevorawat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0quQNUS-k8_dTsbtTaO2SYt1e1rOXMioIv3ixFiQcl83JKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered mermaid pizza and shared with 4 people. Perfect place for seafood pizza! Totally worth it! Totally love it!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPun5MnRODrN47f0ski7bbZu0MO3WDlL9O2yiTV&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Chloe Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqEESWTSxK9Pt0Q0vaxxoceKapTsEiREU6mVITX_6aKfms4ICHJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the $120 serpent pizza with lobster , tiger prawn& smoked salmon. The luxuriouest pizza I’ve ever had. Appreciated the 5 fresh lobster put on the pizza topped with signature mozzarella cheese. The center of the dough was covered with smashed potatoes which created another enjoyment of texture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiIkn73S7n7H609P8zS-w7cSl9WK_Oj6BZRCS0&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Felix LIM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFC033J-sauXgqkB2d877c1Y6WdTxKb3qgOLkgE6_mBQwNR7U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Try Lobster Pizza :) Google for the image. It’s around $160, but totally worth it (at least first-time-try-in-life).

I put 2 stars for Atmosphere, because this is to-go restaurant. They have one space to eat right next to the store (where you will order).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgPwokT1Y9wDXBzmV6YFbqw0UU3XPZlKBC1z2g&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-8-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joanne Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbNbnty6WUucOGWy1hEMxE3ckQwgUFPhmuc7nM9DjT7gV7Br6nJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Rating: ★★☆☆☆

I recently ordered the platter of cashew shrimp at this restaurant, and unfortunately, I was very disappointed. For $105, I expected a much better experience. The dish was mostly celery—at least 90% of it was just celery and frozen veggies! There were a few shrimp scattered throughout, but they were few and far between. Initially, they charged $90 for a platter but then they called back half an hour later and wanted to charge $105 for the platter of shrimps because the market price of shrimp is much higher now. I felt like I have paid $105 for a platter of celery, when I did not even expect any celery based on the name “prawns with cashew nuts, 腰果蝦球”. This is disappointing. I feel like they cheated us on the quality on purpose because we are not regular customers, and are of a younger crowd. I’ve had better quality and value at other places for a fraction of the price（ie. Parker place food court). It’s frustrating to pay so much for a dish that feels like it’s mostly filler. I won’t be coming back. Feel free to refer to the picture yourself to see if it’s worth $105.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1DYtpRLlvXsaOCftHhJX9pGyW0hSlx1T7BZsp&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLLmSnBdeCk9BNUd6M-qKsiDgZNDs_6cFwLAbgf9yIFhFRVBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had a terrible experience at this restaurant. I didn’t just find one green worm in my food, but several! This is beyond disgusting and makes me seriously question the cleanliness and food safety standards here. It was honestly one of the worst dining experiences I’ve ever had. If you value your health, avoid this place at all costs. There are plenty of better options out there","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIR6x_SdHB4H8-c66Y6yhXz11bGggRBYKg6BlP&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Wanted to come for afternoon tea but they didn't have any tea set. We ordered 2 dishes and found out the hidden not on menu "French Toast".

Overall the food is ok. All meals come with a hot or cold drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODbm-fv3sJ--X_TatxP5xHx_lQcyfAJFyD8Ryj&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Ed J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXeZmUHGpsrfi3qr7xoyOiGCM-NR4m4LSiZMraZ406FGQqkvSO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An established traditional Cantonese style restaurant with typical service . The food is fair . The daily soup was lukewarm warm at best. The bathroom was also typical, not clean for a mom and pop restaurant. The food was also warm and not hot. The price point is Cheap to reasonable with big portions. I suggest coming during off hours, not the weekend. The food and service should be much better during the weekdays since when busy, it may not be the best. Check out the specials and photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE3z2uN9yTSO9ph3T0jhNNofr-8heHAPBcOdgI&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"5679 W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaqdAQqoWIxOnfnGUMMqp8kf4gY7k1aLklIIN17IpbGYrsHUBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very delicious Seafood and service. We will com back with our friends","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLUBo7FsDX3vP4wFynguUZG1o5bL61sieD_tf3&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Cheryl Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtu9EKv7gdpKIEDEY-G0clhxeOiyddVoR8BdRqIaJBtw_1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited the restaurant during the king crab season. Ordered their king crab three-way combo consisting steamed crab legs, the flesh from the body and a baked rice. All the dishes were fresh and tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhRI5kfhko65XHDMqW9DrBmfHHyjfnPMWjFGw&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Emilie Snowdon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3oTPiYIi699PT4M5DIBOFypCYeuWcj6yoTG3QIu5n9z9O7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Typical style Hong Kong food. The food is very salty and the service is not great. The lobster was delicious and tasted reasonably fresh. Milk tea is watered down and cheap quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcFEyT4B7cyROub_GPMHiFGoj2QNS1jlS9IRFk&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Kernel Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtEHV1jtxb69Uptu3uOHvbUiLbDXNYSqYfQ9nJ618UDcO-13i7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the king crab set cost $288 which is really nice, it included a coconut chicken soup, steam crab legs with garlic, fried crab with soy sauce, baked rice with seafood and deserts","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP20SjK8uyyNHzmb2c8wnja98P_9cJAH_xZr4_g&fid=0x0:0xcea71a3f15fe2352"],"When":"2024-3-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprisingly, this was a very impressive place for an AYCE.  They had quite the selection for an appetizer bar.  From fries, to crab and all sorts of Asian cold dishes.

We had their Deluxe menu and that was quite the selection already.  The quality of the meat was really good.

Service was awesome.   We had a table of 7 and they educated us on what to grill and how to grill.  Also, they were very attentive on changing the grill as well.

At the end of the meal,  they have us each an ice cream soft serve in a cone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4qT3wxVPtiSO4Id5NM40SnBDvJT0mMXYcbbEj&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Sharon Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhXCpweAE9EOuBRcwNbvbS7ArxaAcKzL855UJETyZxB8dmPSEe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were here as a group of 10 for a birthday dinner and they accommodated us extremely well, they reserved us a private room and the staff were so friendly and helpful, they were constantly checking in on us and helping us with orders. We didn’t even have to ask for water or napkin refills because they were always coming in to check up on us. The food also came very quickly and it was so good especially the wagyu and scallop. Overall, the price is very worth it for the food and the service is extremely good as well. Great experience, and would definitely come back again !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPinvyPJum8-LE_tuyZVMFPPlMycEXSyYCdiYfS&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Carlo Sarabia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrLzwZT-xz3Xh677PN1gQkw0HBZU4bk7mcezn66glNzKsXLWk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our team dinner last Friday and the service was immaculate. Meats were delicious!! Possibly the best in Richmond. Great food, great company and great service! Best way to end a busy week.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgSMzsugJO5MT4GyI9vCEt5u3KmjVGVD_2dLOf&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Margaret S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIac6W9M--2DNERGq16BFtSp_iUaM127QTioyhF1LcmedR_qg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eat here if you want great quality food and fantastic service. We went as a party of 10 for a birthday celebration meal. We were greeted by our hostess and sat in room and received great service. The waiter was always attentive to our needs and requests. So nice to not have to chase down a waiter to place an order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpvArFS9NlmwXjStfoxUa34pvuhiYUBTUYHT8z&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is a solid place for getting all you can eat BBQ and I will probably come again, since it's only 34 dollars for the basic set.

The standard selection is already great and it will definately satisfy you , they have good side dipping powders , both were absolutely flavorful and amazing.  The meets are all flavorful and tell a story on your mouth. They also give you icecream after, and the all you can eat has toast!

But it has some issues, like the meat taking forever to come we had to wait 15 minutes  , the meet cuts amounts being inconsistent every time they were brought out and the flame grill being really week ( we had this enoki mushroom on it for 30 minutes.) make sure your first order is really big  so you can wait less.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX4nNuVMHYXWq5fE5RFODI_rIuYFQVNES5itzY&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"I F (Ms. Berry)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeOO0thmZb8WiJAwYiUtFuIu5yHrQ4JOZVJ5Cz0O48r7h_CCho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there for my husband birthday celebration.  Very impressed with the service! The food was great too. We had a private room for our party of 11 guests.  The staff were very attentive and came to change our plates and grill mesh often.  I was worried about food and service because a lot of time when going to AYCE, those usually go out the window; therefore I haven’t gone for AYCE in years.  I was pleasantly surprised! We had a fantastic time.  Great quality and variety of grill meat and veggies.  Love the entire experience.  I recommend making reservation in advance for larger parties.  Thank you Jing Tan Grill House for making my hubby’s birthday a great one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw6FU-aP7iq5-H4DNP955bFf8qrnxpkfNkn1La&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Rebecca P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOtv1z9oQXsu_j8G9uE8jVQGZlbdGZfOgnrsP8gOev0iFfifM3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for the $68 AYCE premium tier at lunch. The first round had some delicious cuts of meat. I recommend the thick premium beef tongue and garlic scallops with the vermicelli. The Wagyu was ok, not melt in your mouth.

There was nothing really at the snack bar.. just some kimchi, edamame,and seaweed, not sure if that’s a dinner thing only or what?

The service was not great. No one spoke to us, no one explained anything or let us know what was being dropped. Servers intentionally avoided eye contact when we tried to flag someone down. Very unwelcoming atmosphere. I was not able to tell which meat were Wagyu or premium beef rib and the server had no idea either.

We didn’t get everything we ordered and felt rushed when they called for last order to prepare the 5pm crowd. At that point we had only ordered 1 round. So 2 rounds in total in the end.

Foodie influencers really hyped this place up, so we were extra disappointed when it didn’t live up to that hype due to lack of service and no abundant snack bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5g-6qMA0oHSvu2IGWfLvvFAVNU3N8U9NPv9ok&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I would say it was an average ayce experience. Only go in groups of max 4 people because they only have one grill per table and we were a group of 8 which we reserved ahead of time and still only sharing 1 grill made it extremely difficult to feed us all adequately in the time limit.

The buffet bar is limited and they didn’t refill it regularly except for the fries and carbs. At one point they had deep fried chicken wings which they never refilled when it ran out. We had to get full off salad, fries, etc. and some light bbq we managed to cook from the grill.

The ice cream at the end we got was almost melted. Food flavour was good but overall an average experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdbN5JcfVbbLD72V2idxK6Qms_C2UtPdDFVPWW&fid=0x0:0xeabc08fc09d4dad5"],"When":"2024-7-4"}]

title: OZ Korean Cuisine Richmond(Best Price on Website!)

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rita Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRwN3PgrxEkb5iajpOT5lg51d0YZ1pj1mavg7ckuqSiwl7sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cold winter is coming, and my friends want something warm and warm, but they also need to be close to a shopping mall for shopping, so we came to OZ Korean Cusine.

We ordered two meals in total, including kimchi pork soup pot and Gillette cheese chicken meal, which tasted quite good.

The kimchi and pork soup pot is very warm and can be kept warm from the beginning to the end. The spiciness is moderate and the ingredients are delicious. It is really suitable for eating in winter. It is appetizing and warm after the meal. It can warm your limbs. , so happy.

At first I thought the Gillette Cheese Chicken would be too greasy, but the Shazin dish is very fresh and sweet, the fried skin is crispy, crispy but not greasy, the sauce is top-notch, and there are some very delicious appetizers and snacks.

The environment is spacious and clean, the music is very soft, you can eat slowly and sit comfortably, it is a very cost-effective restaurant.

Location: OZ Korean Cusine
4351 No. 3 Rd #170, Richmond, BC V6X 3A7","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKeGyYxI9y-gmw8i_rgSAmoOLfwEcyzaxuHj-0&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Katie Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVws51m77m2_1nRcFvfLnvgtk5TKxejjzBsnfruPIurFSPpu_K0hQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The fried chicken was very crispy outside & very juicy inside. The Pork Bone Soup was very tasty, but a bit too spicy for me, next time, I should ask for less spicy. The meat falls off the bone. 👍🏻 The. Dduckbokki was ok. I found the rice cake a bit hard to chew, but the taste was great. (we added Ramen & Cheese)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiD9WNoEHihRQSyYqXy60q1ohB4JrZrAFDo5mj&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Jessica Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbKN7JTB8-geSMCvSN4JUMFRJdzyUw9Zem00rFXxig6jms97b4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Overall, a great place to eat at when you’re craving Korean Food!

Service: the staff there were patient with us, and helped us with our menu choices.

Atmosphere: at the time we arrived, nobody was there, so it was pretty quiet. The lights were also dimly lit, providing a serene mood for us to enjoy our food.

Food: the food here was really good! I ordered the tteokbokki,  and although it was really spicy for me, it had a nice flavor. My friends got the fried chicken, and according to them, was also delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4Ig-D1n4Q5OoS84GkX4Fc4Vkd1SRf_XJNDjgM&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Kid JL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmatjpkzwM-KNB2JSaZcgRg-sBGjirtYgly_C_mpCRt1ZDzFs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"In my opinion, beside the Cheese Katsu that served a relatively smaller portion for the price charged, the other items had a reasonably decent portion. The food is overall well flavoured and the quality of the ingredients were pretty decent. I especially enjoyed their Korean style fried chicken. It had a nice texture, a great ratio of breading and meat, and the chicken was not dry at all. I am sure it would have been even better if it had a crispy exterior but since it was a delivery, I can't really complain too much. The sauce that is similar to honey mustard that was served with the chicken was also incredible. It added a layer of depth to the chicken and complemented it really well. My only complaint would be for the beef, some slices of beef were too chewy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLsC30zce_4hvh54sgy4FEZ3EChh4GVODXUq4M&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"Broderick Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyQEDQVz3yiIx7bTnCTdZ4BHzWCw0Q4CMRjbOMfXL1Xlf0Ko4W=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Oz Chicken in Richmond is one of the gems in Richmond for the most delicate and tender katsudon at a reasonable price. It's hard to find anything here that measures up to what they offer in terms of value, taste, and portion size. I learned that the secret to a delicate batter is through the use of cornstarch vs flour as shown in the pictures here from several visits. My girlfriend and I love their Katsu Chicken.

There's a light crisp to each bite, clean flavors, tender, juicy but not greasy at all. It's all around, quality in preparation. I also learned that the owner of this location, Charlie, puts a lot of time and effort in his dishes, constantly improving and finding new ways of cooking, almost like creating art on a plate. He not only has a passion for creating a delicious experience through his own tastes and palette but he also helped me in creating a memorable experience for my mom's birthday, who is one of his biggest fans. She just loves their sundoboo and has to order this every time she comes around. Finding this combination of flavors and care in their dishes and in their customers make them one of the exceptional places to try and to continue to support.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOls4BQ_tFK6TvSl_weJxbgpreN373RqxwqpyUV&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Arno Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLLdn3jYhhzkIP0fU-fB9JfdP-_1nHALnddfRtCkYTzusudyE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spend my birthday here w. Family, there were no one other than us so it was really nice and quiet. We ordered spicy rice cake, kimchi fried rice, butter garlic chicken and a spicy chicken which were all good. My favorite was the butter garlic one i could not stop eating it, very crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. I did find the kimchi fried rice a bit too oily for my taste but overall everything was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCA7WoposHC01CobtezCxkSnxCJ58ahzYkKMgb&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2024-3-5"},{"Name":"Livia Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVie7wYIYnTNy_iOqvWMwiX-xgJH8Iz1_hWskpK-wZj63ZZMmbP6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am not a big fan of Korean fried chicken but after trying here once we just keep on going back! Oz chicken offers a variety of Korean cuisine including noodles, rice, and hot pot. For people like me who loves varieties this is the place to go to. Their food is good, not oily, and price is very reasonable. We particularly like the padak and fries at the restaurant! The servers are very friendly for the last few times we went we always had pretty good experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnbHEax5889aG6pMx5Qby4LxtSP4eSH5yPZ6_K&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2023-7-30"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I found the food just average. I’ve had better Korean food in Richmond. The Half & Half Boneless Chicken could have been crispier. The Beef Bulgogi Hotpot was alittle too sweet tasting. Didn’t taste the wow factor in the Japchae.

The service was friendly and food came out fast. The waitress kept our teapot full.

Would I come back? Probably not. Only wanted to try it out because it popped up on my IG.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5SNOqNYnQh_ONzXmzcWebmSv-SQNK3LYVjZxJ&fid=0x0:0x87b62bf1f6ce386f"],"When":"2024-2-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rachel Mc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAZKiCMCrm-O4vkS47_c7PcrxwGFTfQsHvTqsBXr7XVxxeuRnW8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've tried it about four times.
Other places are greasy and bread is burned. But the bread here is very good. The dough is delicious, and the store is clean. The staff are all kind.
The pizza is fresh and delicious. I think I'll keep eating. The pizza with garlic was also satisfactory.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM82JAEVl0jWf7400TGNx2X_ZRp-p4veavMDQem&fid=0x0:0x73c7cce707b814f5"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried some pizza slices and in my opinion, the pizza is alright but quite average and light on the tomato sauce with more bready crust. The sesame seeds are a nice touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdqipIcWWXLxjQskfGR3xvoKJjV7ECN4ir-32Z&fid=0x0:0x73c7cce707b814f5"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Stephen Allinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2v3Jveuy0xleyN1dCHZhwnXQxHwdVM4nASpSG0QK0q7o1ZL4q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I were overjoyed to see a branch open so close Richmond Mall & Richmond Brighouse Station.

The interior is stylist and clean. The staff are always welcoming and super friendly. They pay attention to their customers.

Their pizzas totally blow all their surrounding competition away. The prices are great for the sizes you can get.

We’ve been wanting a really good pizza place and for the last 3 years we have been very disappointed. Until now.

I would highly recommend stopping by this branch if you’re craving pizza and are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPESs-YFPitU8ZJsT2aQxm1h6kojSb71WPFEI5M&fid=0x0:0x73c7cce707b814f5"],"When":"2024-1-13"},{"Name":"J.R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-NL796hFt9x_FeC3hKl5nsIBH4bC5xXOBBesvZSGGzZZ1-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first time I visited the owner Uncle Fatih was working at the time, I'm not 100% sure but he looked exactly like the guy on the box. He and his staff was super friendly and down to earth. The pizza made by him was super saucy and cooked to perfection. I highly recommend Thin Crust Pepperoni & mushroom with lots of garlic sauce. I'd like to hear everyone's favourite combinations, since I'll be coming back many times to come.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU45OR4VUE2xeizlE_YztUrXJps1Axh-z8VYtOHZjuySdn2Wu3SWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here during their grand opening (staff was really friendly) and the pizza was great so we ordered from here again and it was the best pizzas in town! I ate 7 slices myself!
Taste fresh, fully loaded and the crust was tasty all around (I usually don't even like crust but I like theirs). Love the sesame on the pizzas. We used to order from other pizza spots in Richmond, but this will be our new go-to pizza spot for sure. Love them and I hope they keep up the good work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMIbqJKQVjals3oS0_09S4QPERkKGPJeGh43N6&fid=0x0:0x73c7cce707b814f5"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Veran Starre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW9RcPsbcHdTCg-Pcdf0x9DaHA5Fm0DE1X7hc4ZnA2VPIIWs8F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"$11 for a pop and pizza can't be beat. I got the vegan pepperoni and the pizza itself was quite dry. Quick, good service and comfortable interior.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg7ZLPfmSGw_PyPR7hd-Nt1O7KHEujvWj7DZvb&fid=0x0:0x73c7cce707b814f5"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"TOMMY LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWPgWPrOC1lvNCModpnvaap-NwRog6YNULAARQI9BtWfn14oeP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Uncle Fatith comes to Richmond. Amazing vegetarian pizza selections as well as meat  selections. Price point is economical for those on a budget and made with healthy ingredients.
They also have awesome walk in specials. 👍👍👍
You can find them where the bus loops around the bent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8iNReHcFEsDKMUExvcUaK9LvpwhbAVrcZCeZN&fid=0x0:0x73c7cce707b814f5"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Stefan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqv_Lhm3jFEsMMuBJC2BhxuFNscgAtZDpw4bum6kSEEyQEvSYh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a small vegan pizza and it was honestly really good. Much better than some of the other fast food pizza places I’ve tried!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoDHSFNHl71NBsEMTle2w7vRremRyrwoQPHAyL&fid=0x0:0x73c7cce707b814f5"],"When":"2024-10-23"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Giacomo Wells","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_DGxGG9nQKj4evlviiCM1hxKnAk8c7yUjp9PzGaYZFYjjpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went here for dinner with my girlfriend and we ordered the cheese fries for $10 and the cheeseburger with bacon for ~$12.

The cheese fries were completely inedible and made me sick to my stomach. I audibly recoiled from the “food” presented to my taste buds.
Staff were rude and were too lazy to accept our coupons and instead asked me to pay cash.

My burger tasted like wax, and our cheese fries were literally not food. If I could, I would give 0 stars. Worst tragedy since Fergie’s anthem recital.

Godspeed to anybody who experienced the same levels of trauma as us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvRtHuS7xrxN1Xm97BO4epBH_hy8M-pGdC5Zt8&fid=0x0:0xde4cdf505d1e3948"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Jonathan York","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU63VrXFSR7wyjZTGi3MIdliWBiY-M52j99Ij26yFIc6e3uxXVv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a meal with a burger and once I got the burger, it didn’t even have a burger in it at all. Only a bun with tomatoes and lettuce. I didn’t even order lettuce. They fixed it but it took way too long then it should have. The burger itself was eatable, but meh for sure and I would be much rather going somewhere else. The patty just didn’t taste right somehow. The fries were actually pretty decent though. What made me really confused is how the owner yelled very loudly in a public space at the girls who messed up my order which was unnecessary in and of itself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOczEJwKQc9znxulHlUk5yhocq3bqVD82Akzj7J&fid=0x0:0xde4cdf505d1e3948"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Tennesee Fafard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtAhgb8ZBk8R8mwqhdaWybrAgGBNZLgKzw5jzuPfTzk12GuWKbjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This food is pretty good for the airport. They had a lot of people going in and out and it was quick. I appreciate the hard work and the service was great all around. I will remember it. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaF1BewhppZUoIKtg5VkeTLzKrcFtTitV1BTUt&fid=0x0:0xde4cdf505d1e3948"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Ethan Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpGwx5bPB_Ku8tBYIerBY9I-9Q3dgnGD8zUF7OKWQhciRfAoVe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered their breakfast wrap. Took over 10mins to make when no customers waiting. The wrap is overcooked and burned. Meat and egg is tasteless. Whole thing costs over $20. Bad!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvwPz1vmArzEMfctcptT7R8lQFlw-V0vk8GpAh&fid=0x0:0xde4cdf505d1e3948"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Shania Scammell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJC1uCtscG3RkzujMHEQf3LCYpatIiFNRyLckzdnYm9C7AmAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"hot dog was cold, another guy complained about his burger being cold, they didn’t even put it back on the grill. Cheese on cheese fries were unedible. Save yourself the 50$ for 2 hotdogs and go get the 18$ sandwich next door.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRAv3uHkqMU5teTrSxR1WWBzDI0ga8ujbUCyo7&fid=0x0:0xde4cdf505d1e3948"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"John Kroetch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9ZriQY_5kscfPIHrXvfYdGx9n_pl7uxeCe99NVjU4snEQ59M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The burger definitely didn't look like the photo. Not even close. My wife had the poutine.

The price was high for what we got. The poutine was a nice serving size... just didn't have much flavor. The burger was pretty meh. If it wasn't for the relish I don't think it had any flavor.

It took about 10 minutes for our food to arrive... seemed slow for what we ordered.

I think all of the food places here are connected and run by the same people... so the same casual lack of concern is at all 3 places. (Mexican, Asian, American)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVh0NYoTvZGpgW3bsRtz6Oq4tV4LxH09rezfwo&fid=0x0:0xde4cdf505d1e3948"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"Aron Ashmead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvVhdxbD-va5R_dDMqipIdoG2JVlVDZm3zM2k0WyvVE1pjhuE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service was professional and cheerful.

The food was not good.. and to be clear I don't think it was the fault if the staff.  The quality of the ingredients are very low for the $20 cheeseburger.. seriously it must be there cheapest patties they can find. Mine was full of grounded up gristle and bones.. The bun was dry and broke apart a bit while trying to eat the thing.. will never go back.. I recommend an over priced sandwich somewhere else instead of this over priced burger.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christina Newberry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnU0ksR7hE5Va5xdnD4byQBoqbqMlcIXvB4VlSjl-zTKxJWop1Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I waited in line for this place specifically because I figured I could almost justify spending $18 on a veggie burger with no sides since it includes sauteed mushrooms and grilled onions, which are both listed on the "unlimited toppings" section of the menu. However, when I tried to order these toppings, I was told you can only get them on a cheeseburger. The sign has no indication of this. It's false advertising, and it's illegal.i got them for free after pushing back and you should too.

Burger patty itself was okay. Bun was cold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNozDxb2X1udmZKu36nEPUGlcDVwbqxeaXKwYyx&fid=0x0:0xde4cdf505d1e3948"],"When":"2024-7-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Motogal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX86UNSmCwse18CNsuEqiF0PrAvJ_WP3gGYv-_pHK24FrILa18=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was my first time eating at Chopped Leaf. I ordered a Santa Fe bowl with chicken to stay, and they made it to go. Which was fine. The greens were really fresh, but the texture of the brown rice was a  bit rough. The chicken was stone cold. Overall, the flavour was very bland. The portion was good, and it was very filling. But I didn't like the food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Junr Cuddles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpP0UppqoHfUHb6E3SZPwvw49Tc8NvKZyqJUHsiajVnOxokdEpng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We love designing our own wraps here. Plus their shrimp salad roll is so refreshing. The service is always nice too. Edit:

My last two visits to this place was disappointing. Major signs of shrinkflation. Ordered an Idol cup and the cup is now about a third empty. Ordered a quesadilla and there was less filling. It was so flat and half of it had nothing in it! I don't want to come back here if they continue to skimp out on ingredients.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMINd6UFiQRPzxiwLJt2BOufWw4RB3tcpPuS8UU&fid=0x0:0xff277361af72b08c"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Carrie Shannon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSKZbj2nkVKiCBvCkxxcYZu3htn10LZMYJ2B7DOf3RJcI1Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Typical auto response to my review below. " sorry to hear, fill out this form" blah,blah,blah. There are a lot of 1 star reviews for this location and if there was really concern, steps would have been taken before now to make changes.

Have noticed a steady decline in quality and then rock bottom today.
Food was terrible. Hard clumps of burnt rice. All ingredients so noticeably reduced from what it used to be.You should be ashamed to dare to serve this to anyone.
Used to frequent this establishment but we are done.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPpjiMcDfil4VzgEQQowlPG6QzLC_hXm8yR7lWEiH_omx4Ik3Agg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What a waste of money. A wrap with mostly lettuce very little flavour as I’m sure that cost them money. Bearded employees, not wearing face beard nets, no gloves. What a total disappointment for $15. It’s the last time you folks will be getting money from me so I hope you had a good laugh punking me off With your garbage","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rob P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCCk6hJ-vyMKINKQBF-vn8WMzd-xTnPHgdbYNjlCQPiselQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been going for years as there aren't many good healthy options around the area. But it's definitely not the kind of place if you want to be treated with any type of warm hospitality. The staff are cold, frowning (especially one of the girls). They basically say "what do you want/ how will you pay" And literally throw the food on the counter when made. Could they have some employees that generally don't have the most miserable looks on their faces? Not sure I want to continue being a customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin V.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHUWeLQtzrLwznxOz1qtEg2BlpBpzkU8Lx0nL6UaQRn9ju0mbz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Changing my rating to 1*. The chicken they gave me today was absolutely horrible, looked fake and old and tast: disgusting.
I won't be coming for a while!!!

Older visit:
3.5 star rating would be correct from me as depends when you visit this place. Many times there is mess left on tables long after people leave.
Food is delicious and portions are good, but i would like to see new things on the menu, because as of now I eat only 30% of the menu.
Little bit faster cleaning and couple new different options and I will give 5*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPronm7WXS5YnCGd25KzvGGXk-ytp3BDl-p0NKH&fid=0x0:0xff277361af72b08c"],"When":"2018-8-22"},{"Name":"Paras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFKJ4K5mhl7euCpFaC8ftpoHo0hT6-wF-HSLR0YGBpcbp6kI9s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The southwest wrap with chicken was goated and the evil peanut sauce was wonderful and the Prab was very helpful.

Would recommend if if your in a rush because you can eat and drive!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Uy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWI-WTuMFvAsriEBqg5SEZC4uhUbzkN2q2R05YQ6cpfNltBLr8v1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great healthy meal options, ingredients are so fresh. Lots of parking, friendly staff and just a nice place to have a meal. The Aztec is so delicious, don’t forget to order a bottle of Kombucha!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwkxezUmJPm9O-l_Kr3gMp2g_OHFetDVMFbgCO&fid=0x0:0xff277361af72b08c"],"When":"2020-3-8"}]

title: Chipotle Mexican Grill
descriptions: Fast-food chain offering Mexican fare, including design-your-own burritos, tacos & bowls.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaqqng1wvVRcs29xlxjOo0d6gVDEatEo7DMHPnNF0gvb4gLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Chipotle is a great choice if you crave Mexican food. There is a variety of meat, rice, beans, sauce, and vegetables you can choose from.  I didn't like the cashier rushing us while my tacos were still being prepared. The worst thing is telling me they only accept cash because their machine is not working.  I need to rush to an ATM to get cash. They should told me earlier before I chose the food. Piece of advice, ask them first if they accept credit or debit cards before deciding to get food.  Not coming back.  Terrible service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNkpHfnOwoQehKB5TdJNUiiCuYlMHREGjZeG_j\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f24b5903cf01555"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Erin Nunweiler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDVq5iPmjZ0NknNdChY5QEk1bFJt6EFnFZnZb-tbxgE9Rs0L0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This branch is not upholding the brand and I am sick of it . Chipotle needs to do something about it . They give 4 dollar portions for 18 dollar bowl. What is wrong with this location ? Did they not get training to see how the meals should be made ??? . As well ordering on door dash or Uber eats you can’t give them instructions anymore to make sure they give enough salad. Charging for guacamole why ???! They hardly give any for the 3.75 charged . Disgraceful . Contact chipotle.ca to make your complaints as well . Will never go here again at this location . Buyer beware . See from photo . Where is the guacamole ? Where is the ingredients?????","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvfW46GZYfGBR6DlwCOZR8UVdCq2HlNtkQqWFV\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f24b5903cf01555"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPZIUOsDwlBkFebhG04vj0-2yRgvhqZ8FA0OSOGGM5zHg8Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My salad bowl was quite good. However my biggest complaint would be about the cleanliness of the place and  quality of service. I did go late (1 hour before close), but the place and staff looked quite disorganized. I'm thinking it gets extremely busy, but if that's the case, management should make an effort to improve this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2YKan8TmhADRyKeCLeS6LJRXstO_LXajjX3hN\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f24b5903cf01555"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Christine Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLOwYojsGVVI4-TLDWGfw-CnmKFRXGg6KqWeBhMkPYl_mqmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered two bowls and the portions came significantly smaller than should be. Bowl on the left only had a thin layer of food and the one on the right… seems like it was half eaten and just had some cheese tossed on top. We called the restaurant about the order, and the girl who picked up the phone started to argue (almost yelling at one point) with us that they had given us food and it looked less because we asked for sauce on the side. First, we called to talk, not to be yelled at and accused. Second, it’s not like we’ve never had Chipotle before - the sauce does not take half of a bowl. Terrible service and now we seriously question the food safety… now we have to figure out dinner at late night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDcBC9XEsvN960TvfihkphhOoVQUBIwOJsE9FQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f24b5903cf01555"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Jeffrey Dy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMiEjnI9freTHtWnYtclguZliqreliGcoflwaiQg7DM9V83Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This Chipotle branch is the most ungenerous location in terms of food, not to mention the most unsanitary. Asked for a little more of the sour cream sauce..they added 2 drips of it. They will rush you during the food prep (its their style) and if you ask for extra..an attitude becomes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuid7Nj5SKger-NrRxTocbTktW2opSImZMr__l\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f24b5903cf01555"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"val yousif","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6cTbsd-U_vZAtZQvwmRSQHXcraGcWyOZIOOVimVCYmjMgrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are thrilled with the service and catering provided by sejal and her team! The team went above and beyond with preparing our order and made sure everything was ready right on time! The food was fresh and delicious and the service was exceptional!! They went out of their way to provide us with everything and more and had the best attitude! The experience was excellent and we will definitely be patterning for more catering with the !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John K Ninan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2bB3J5Ha96avksVLJRSa4A588bQh4f72XFWadChoxbaDAcYBMIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there for the offer on Halloween Night. it was crowded, however food was good. Could have placed more staffs during peak time to clean the table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPij91PQnzkHBoXCuY1c_GGdxSY7PtqCk--VE3Q\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f24b5903cf01555"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Edward Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDEe9JwTHnFrCoEzqfkiOnO0OacbBWPVxuS5subdrluzRGZg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location is honestly not that bad but you do have to force the workers to add more ingredients and make the portions bigger. Owners definitely have trained these workers to skimp out on the scoops unless the ingredients are coming out of the employees paycheques. Dining area always messy and the drink station is always full of trash. Stop making your friends post fake reviews","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Isaac Faulkner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhH1KK1azyxOBxfPv5AtFG4JRRhsK9g4RC4RN7bd_an3i55-6e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very standard, by the book bacon cheeseburger. This burger will never be anyone’s favourite, but it can act as a go to for those looking for a solid burger. Fries were excellent - very much a chip wagon style cook. Onion rings were well cooked, but bland and unimpressive overall. Gentlemen who served us was very nice. Overall this was a very good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS-tIT0h2ZrsAW7ghzQhP2jAf38cFgnGKwK1xj&fid=0x0:0x4cf80caa98262e88"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Eunice & Arthur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQBv2ExPMLGvKDHXSye0xDV3-vB7OxlkbuqoebOGbAZzY1MxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The last two times I ordered through Uber and the food was delicious. I rate this store better then an actual White Spot. Not sure what changed recently but it's definitely improved alot. Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angus Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwZPQ3v3Pnh_tcpDbVcwiZ7wdt12BheYclYq08zPSjStFGhTsryA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Definitely 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 the worse customer service.  Stood over 5 minutes in a empty store watching staff work in the kitchen and no one acknowledges to take my order.  This is not my first visit with the experience.  It’s multiple times.

New addition: May 2, 2023.
Look at my receipts.  Something is not adding up here.  Did I get over charged?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM71MZbTTQGRH6K7uxMMRFhg7vH_gzX7Zt8kK5E&fid=0x0:0x4cf80caa98262e88"],"When":"2022-12-11"},{"Name":"Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOOG5LKGCBksHgOxJxG_TzJxQ8k5R3qgqnuMpNfrhy5fkwsvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Been to this location a couple times and it sucks. The worst one of them all...

Food is always sloppy and watery. Had salmon bowl and everything was wet, seeping through the bowl.

Cold brew is watered down. 1/10th the quality of cold brew at Tim Hortons.

Fries taste weird and wet like oil. Avoid this location. Wasted $40","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhjN_JTGvtR_nqr2sX6QrC8bBLW_NYrXdd1zI7&fid=0x0:0x4cf80caa98262e88"],"When":"2023-10-10"},{"Name":"Rebecca B-rown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxiV1O5gmvVWXcT2mPoN-nVuYbNMEZgWyTAgkUy8GiSWrWUzuMDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whow - so fresh! First time visiting a Triple O's. Exceeded all expectations of a fast food outlet. Everything was super fresh and very high quality! I.e. that iceberg lettuce was super crispy and fresh!

Staff here were also extremely polite and helpful! Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLMfzo9IdBIC2PBl5wkfIpg1t5aSoNHvkU6gJU&fid=0x0:0x4cf80caa98262e88"],"When":"2020-8-1"},{"Name":"Warren Sepass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJE7T3lhPxe7yxNN_i28tWSTxTWNegvO9OS0PjJWwauWZhUog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Polite and fast service. Great place to stop and fill up both your vehicle and your body. I had a Jalapeno ciabatta breakfast sandwich and California fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP10JhiHTTnlPsFPL4wIIzHTyyFUPuukB54LFwn&fid=0x0:0x4cf80caa98262e88"],"When":"2022-10-20"},{"Name":"tom p","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0Jdy6OLWsDhE4V_kjNrGnmB8nQVkxCH1ZkEhe1SsUKXMGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food for a gas station. Not a place of your looking for a full sit down restaurant. Good music too now I wish I had music at my work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZsp0bvOLauHE0yLj45q9ftLADChjUBtGI8wxR&fid=0x0:0x4cf80caa98262e88"],"When":"2020-2-20"},{"Name":"Julie Holden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw_CK6KL50vp0SwzUCbUcONXlr-ZD0JuS_KclVH9N16JwLBcHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited upwards of 15 minutes to get my food. Love my spicy chicken burger no sauce. Will never return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvPCUV5cgL_Ahyb5JqclUEviZZMfU2twJ2HNB3&fid=0x0:0x4cf80caa98262e88"],"When":"2021-8-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Akanksha bathla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-Xp7oHpHaWF4KKVuj6ILEVKQiRdw1kkUJc-2kVrTfIPCYIDC-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the service here. I requested for a last minute catering order. The customer service was impeccable. They were quick, efficient and the food tasted amazing. The breads are always fresh. I would totally recommend this subway in all of Richmond!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jass Minhas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLh-q4YjjltLPm92z4u1_iTDgNL6jA6doXxX4yVumry_cyzFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food quality is really good and fresh. Ordered the subway today and everything was well cooked and quantity was great. The customer service of this store is also impressive. They greeted with a smile and listened to the order very careful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzmIMdClD_EKzaLe1KeBgD1C80_nJRRFvPT1-KW88LywkF0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Subs always good here as we’ve never had issues but why is there a minimum 15% tip? Not sure why there’s a tip everywhere now as I thought that’s for service if your eating in at a restaurant with a server. But this is a food court, I get it during the pandemic but we are out of the pandemic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQY3ox2kOHMBllqX28jMlC_3bfUc6_Qi1it47P&fid=0x0:0xe40fa3a062bd09f0"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"mandeep dhindsa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpGLKAGqskEcOg_kFO1jSrWp2Ejv4ExlREu9a3B7aFc6_8lG-m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am deeply disappointed with my recent experience at this Subway. I visited this store today way before their closing time, yet the employees were already in a rush to close up. When I asked for my sandwich to be grilled, they rudely refused, claiming that they had already turned off the griller, even though there were still more than 15 minutes left until closing time. This excuse felt very lame and unprofessional. The staff’s dismissive attitude and lack of customer service were unacceptable. I expect better from a brand like Subway and hope this issue is addressed to prevent future customers from facing the same unpleasant experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thug Nation","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDxXTK0qvpEA4W_x8sp8IECOgkCAp89AVmVfNEUic_l3Go8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience, enjoyed every moment. Staff is friendly. Food tastes amazing and the server was amazing too. Cheers to kuljeeg for serving the best and guiding us with the great hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ravinder Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEzrbW3bM6Ofs7ht_bJd1KqJwAo3ozrU37KlllGvsHrNr1JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have a fantastic experience at subway. The quantity of protein is really good. Highly recommend this location for great food and exceptional service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Steele Vancouver / Kelowna area (Realtor Vancouver BC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY5AYokNodhccb7bLk1A7kSxqiXee9yFcQzGTeTsQYbtPKFk2s-rk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast service. The lady making our order did not seem to be very happy and in a rush even though there weren’t other people
In line. The subs were fresh and tasty. The bread was great. We are looking forward to coming g back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY-WPF1vjRQRrIpAYMxCGvtrWkFFYuo_1wkbug&fid=0x0:0xe40fa3a062bd09f0"],"When":"2021-11-28"},{"Name":"Michael M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8dfQhpeb3og-b-WAAq1PzuQ4B2qHq4B9IlpCIV5bOdtVKkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible experience Oct 26th 2024  4pm.... 1st girl kuljeet was busy talking to co worker ignored my request put wrong cheese on sub and only half cheese on 1 sub then just shoved them in oven without asking if I wanted them toasted ... 2nd woman then slathered aoli sauce all over both subs i was buying problem was I only wanted sauce on 1 sub and distinctly told her only the sub on your right then half a bottle went onto my sub ... I told her thanks for ruining my dinner (no apology) insult to injury was the auto tip button .... yeah u wrecked my sub and still want a tip ... these employees win lowest effort given award !

Never go to this subway  drive or walk ANYWHERE else u will thank me !!

Gerbils would be better employees . . .","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Supreet Ranu Grewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPk0vymQfWbffXjRgPiBa8iRjNsMOp8qswzEkfmr0PQlatkgxYAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Employees were really polite and suggested every add-ons; i do appreciate when they let us know the available options. Thanks guys! Keep it up 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPW0eu-mOC29OqpjT7ShvjJhEtb6lTLLSy2xvW\u0026fid=0x0:0x63eccc4738e6328"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Raman Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtT5NroVDYTnMgtSYI452ttxLsOjMkugXqSJwA7MfuNN4Iht_m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The worker that was making my sub was nice, she understood what I wanted. There was another worker staying at the cash register holding a schedule sheet and told me to hold on when I asked to pay. I waited two minutes in front of her before asking again, then she told to me hold on and walked away without saying anything. This was not good customer service communication and her attitude was not friendly, she was rude.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"NAV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzPThMVhORcy6KwhSKbFGbiDb-Cr2KQ3aabKs73PFZuU2s7aI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Employees are very kind and polite. I recommend to visit there and enjoy your sub with good service\nThanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5vmy2WtrDFAbIkBtyCMx7mTp77GDcz8W_4gse\u0026fid=0x0:0x63eccc4738e6328"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Sandeep Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsEGMP0exqmUw1lFjhT6U8R1ZNCyTTum8Rl7DUDiSdW44njn8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Subway this evening. The girl who served me had outstanding customer service skills, and she made the tastiest teriyaki chicken sandwich I've ever had. Nowadays, it's rare to find such great customer service in the neighborhood, but she truly proved herself. Thank you for the delicious meal and exceptional service! 5 ⭐️ for Monika⭐️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sardaar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJO2BiZyB3Gt37cXh6Oc0W2thaFo65wO0IokR0lwoPHlvuo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited the store during dinner time, and although there was a lineup, the staff member working was incredibly friendly and cheerful. Despite the rush, he took the time to inform me about which sauces don't contain egg. This meant a lot to me because in many other stores, staff don't pay attention to these details, and I was disappointed to realize that I had been consuming egg for a long time. Krish’s assistance really made a difference, and I was amazed by the level of customer service he provided. Thank you, Krish, for your help—this is truly the best Subway restaurant in Richmond. Keep up the great work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Himanshu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDuCg0Qe2VY8Ac5aes_3rr9uf_24OZPhu65bENRNlvEhTH7I_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I placed an order with doordash at this location with only three sauces as last time the staff at this location told me that they can’t grill it if it has more then three sauces. But now again when I called them after placing an order the staff who picked the order very rudely answered that we can’t grill it with more than three sauces as this time they didn’t even read the instructions carefully and just make it.\nVery disappointing","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sharan Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO-AErMgsY-18GoYumurJxXdWlgF3dA9yTN0thJKdibEMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a veggie sandwich and it was well organized and delicious. The customer service was amazing, provided by Sikh boy named “Benipal” . I really appreciate his hard work. Thank you for great experience. 🙂","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AQUASTAR LESSONS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9tr_ykE3R8emRPkBi1cQlR4vvCtPAKfyHVnCgySFTDwpR-Fs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a long day of work. Wanted to grab some late night snack, ended up coming to subway 24 hours opening. Karan was extremely helpful and lovely customer service. We get to chat abit of everything and able to engage a good conversation about where to get some good curry. Karan is a good staff. Don't keep him too late at night. Give him an actual daytime position, I am sure he will do much better at his most effective time zone.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed our lunch on a Saturday, where we had the noodle in fish soup with fish cake and Vietnamese meat, bubble waffle, and deep fried bun.

Everything was made fresh. And we didn't have to wait for a table. You won't have to worry about parking either since the Ironwood mall is big.

It's also not as busy as the mall locations in Aberdeen, Lansdowne, and such.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuzBedDJyd2MYCAs-ijwgNngI1ldHysvDS8JDA&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"James Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk_o12iCtyO0gE_QoPCj5qJ7UUQkuic2cEzUnsQvn8LpSf4EV-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is amazing big serving with high quality. The bowl is fully loaded stuff and delicious taste, enjoy eat in all Bubble Waffle.
Lack of service from waitress and waiters, this is only one drawback I found.
As a cafe, no fancy design, but it is clean.
For a quick or nice food dining alone or with friends, here is a good option in near around location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGuxoYhYDl7d4r0b8ZuM2bAOlZUCeyhIOc1HVN&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"Nathan Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUqhHViBSLtdHMt4mH88tGeHDX5eWyDyhqv_seE1JhPaXLyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here tastes great and is always freshly served, so it's always warm. I often will get the teppanyaki, but the soup noodles are good too. Servers are friendly and the restaurant has a good atmosphere. Only drawback is that during peak hours it may be busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny De Dios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKVJwf1Ex29tGQ785s07hX6BKrba7ETM1DrwOJxxOK0qUhNwI6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After grocery shopping my daughter and myself decided to go for snack. I ordered spicy beef with dry egg noodles and daughter had Spicy boneless chicken soup combo. Both are spicy but not super spicy. We love it!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTY8uxIVMag-WF3Yj383Adu2w-2gAOknr520l1&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2023-3-26"},{"Name":"Andy Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKWeDyoIw7IK_VqaIoj_0v7_OdbrNd8MW5QegRs4TuCA76JU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Somewhat salty and the soup noodle wasn't cooked thoroughly and the noodles were too tough to chew. Having said that, staff was actually friendly and asked how come we didn't touched the noodle and offered to re-cook. Most servers probably would not give any concern into why customer didn't touch a big portion of the food. The attitude earned them a 4 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFAddQdwNgljfvZlOJ-15v9R8c_tytDiVas4Z2&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2018-9-11"},{"Name":"Yi Choi Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvz4rIlrXldaobEcKVbU3LH3vHbiebZchpYKi96-P3qiff2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered larksa noodle soup and found a piece of LONG HAIR in my take out. Please pay attention to your food and make sure it's clean. This is unacceptable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsBUGqpfiJMUNjvLayEq48qobMw4eo503Myv0G&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Kasumi A. Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7_0dE4TBrW-eazsY9gh6IEHsIYux8SX4ecNQs4YyVQn_4oH7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We are the only customer during dinner time. Their services are same as last time, no greetings,
no smile, no thank you,
not following instructions,
rushing us to take
orders and ignoring us whenever
we try to ask for napkins, we need to use our own.

​2 of us had tried their....

smoked duck on Ramen with
tom yum kung soup
--- it's not spicy, only sour, not much ingredients inside..

pork jawl meat and sliced lamb
on flat rice noodles with minced
pork fish soup
--- way too much deep fried garlic inside the soup + soup base was too salty
--- they put shredded lamb,
not sliced lamb
--- the soup base taste different than the Richmond center branch

2 ice lemon ribena
--- i asked for less ice, but they gave me less drinks, only 2/3 full..
---1 of them half glass of ice inside..
--- it's tasteless with a lot of lemon seeds inside.. I almost choke myself

Original bubble waffle
--- i asked for extra crispy, but it's
Soft and cold

They charged me $1.20 + $0.50 more for the drinks, without let us know, while we ordered","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH7LA3kc4DGRNL6NH0KWU6TwJ0FwgkIRxhwe0T&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2023-9-22"},{"Name":"Jenny Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJ3B3cWAsgRgXTco-R3FJMTFASfCKF9nFd4zjcNQ44iK-prg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The menu price here is more expensive than the other locations.

The food here is better than the Blundell location but definitely worst than both Lansdowne and Richmond Centre.

$11.50 for rice rolls and it came out room temperature.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5C4-3hHFFdw8mI5xxPG5vdUJy9x2tZVHLlqW3&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2023-8-26"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Veran Starre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW9RcPsbcHdTCg-Pcdf0x9DaHA5Fm0DE1X7hc4ZnA2VPIIWs8F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Indian girl working here has a really strange attitude. I asked her a question and she would looked at me and when I asked again she said she heard me the first time. Really unpleasant experience ordering. The churro was so hard I could barely chew it. It tasted stale and had gone bad!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPZJ-h9ynq7ewYbW1OS0mI5cTXfqroe7zsDUQg\u0026fid=0x0:0xf11a9465404eda0e"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"jaga rai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAr8CcRgZUkMEUJAhg6JbxeVuh6kHK4MXdf_ua1e0wdG9SdSbu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the tuna salad for the first time as I’m doing the low carb diet, it was great I think I like it better than the sandwich! As a health care worker pulling a double shift I had to order online it . The girl at the counter did an amazing job,\nand it was ready when I got there, I’m very happy,  will be definitely coming back here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandeep Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQnFcSXBuZn0ZIFCzsdwGjEoBM5hVH0Ky4770ZjGThNjWphQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m still dreaming about my meal at  Subway. Each bite was a delight, and the presentation just blew us away. Don’t miss out on trying their \"Veggies Patty\"!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurkirat Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwFgOhDEEb55CVlBCDWXUdc5peUFwBL3Dj8FW341nrL1ZCQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered online 2 footlong and the time it showing me that order will be ready by 6:00 pm and they started making at 6:04pm and got my order at 6:10 pm and i ordered veggie delite and she used hands used to make chicken footlong i was there and asked her to change it and if i was not there then who is watching her that what she is doing as i don’t eat chicken.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Souravdeep Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2f_20thsKRKIfh29lCPrNqS6GZi3vL03wt9NShkq3c4y6Qob6Zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The customer service is impressive.I don’t eat much in subway so was confused what to eat and asked the girl on counter to make me anything tasty and she just nailed it with the wrap. Really liked it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was friendly. If you have nothing else to eat at 10 pm this place is open, enjoy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8LCy4tTzSCCnq5eGJuanCBaxizIpby8YaQ491&fid=0x0:0x6aca46e11981bec"],"When":"2021-11-30"},{"Name":"OM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU33Qg1JE4YGnexw2nT6GbgjaBxZDhK0q9Dqqw_XlvAy_wSIlHW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of the busier subways around- the food seemed rushed but was still pretty good. I ordered Veggie Pattie via Uber Eats.
They prepared very badly.
Not toasted nor grilled.
They just put stuff on raw bread and sent.
Very bad","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn0JhtXDhIkW05y77om_Aijyb_Uc03b6b2enMcTHxOp-0wwAVraA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Asked for the veggie tandoori sub.
