user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"IKEA RESTAURANT RICHMOND

Mushroom Soup
The mushroom soup at IKEA Richmond is a straightforward yet satisfying option. The seasoning is well-balanced, allowing the earthy mushroom flavors to come through. However, it lacks the depth or richness that would elevate it beyond a basic offering. Its creamy texture and mild flavor make it a comforting choice, though it remains relatively simple without much complexity.
Rating: 7/10

Tomato Soup
IKEA’s tomato soup provides a familiar and comforting flavor, with a well-seasoned base that balances the natural acidity and sweetness of the tomatoes. While enjoyable, the soup lacks distinctive characteristics—such as fresh herbs or additional seasoning layers—that would help it stand out from standard tomato soups. It serves as a reliable option for those seeking something light and traditional.
Rating: 7/10

Vegetable Medallions
The vegetable medallions, while offering a decent texture, fall short in flavor. They lack the seasoning necessary to make them truly enjoyable, resulting in a somewhat bland experience. While the dish is a healthy option, it could benefit greatly from a more inventive preparation or the inclusion of a dipping sauce to enhance its appeal.
Rating: 6/10

Plant-Based Balls with Vegetables
The plant-based balls are hearty and filling, accompanied by a modest selection of vegetables. While the texture is commendable, the flavor is somewhat one-dimensional, leaving the dish feeling uninspired. A more robust seasoning or a dynamic sauce would significantly improve the overall experience. While suitable for those seeking plant-based options, it falls short of delivering a memorable meal.
Rating: 7/10

Ambiance

The restaurant, located within IKEA, offers a casual and functional dining environment. The setup resembles a cafeteria-style experience, where customers line up with trays and select their meals from a counter—evoking memories of high school dining halls. Despite this, the space is large, clean, and cozy, with adequate seating. While the chairs are functional, they are not particularly comfortable for extended dining.

Price
The prices at IKEA Richmond Restaurant are undeniably affordable, which is one of its main draws. While the food selection is not top-tier, the low cost makes it an attractive option for budget-conscious diners. For the price, the overall value is reasonable.

Service
The service was adequate, though not particularly notable. It follows a self-service model, where diners order at the counter and receive their food. The staff was efficient, but the experience lacked any personalized attention.

6 out 10

Verdict
IKEA Richmond Restaurant offers simple, no-frills dishes that cater to those looking for a quick, casual meal during a shopping trip. While the food is consistently decent, it lacks the creativity or bold flavors needed to elevate the dining experience. Ultimately, it’s a reliable option for convenience, but not a destination for culinary innovation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU7PHXXXsfMSLHGlzfydg9s-jQFhbvXML5_pUa&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sign up for a free family ikea membership.
Choose any 3 entrees at 50% off.

Go lineup. Grab a tray. Grab a cup (your tea and coffee is free). There are desserts and beers and salads while you’re walking if you wanna add to your bill. Tell them what entree you want. Proceed to the cashier. Scan your ikea membership bar code. Pay.

I got the fish and chips. For that price you can’t complain if you’re looking for frugal eats. But don’t expect fresh caught non processed. They get their shipment from Gordon Food Services. It’s a family frugal place.

I noticed they took the salmon off the menu.

*Update*
Not sure if anyone knows this. Every time you buy 10 meals in the Swedish Restaurant and scan your IKEA Family card, you'll get 1 free meal! You can log into the ikea website and check. Once you reach your free meal you have 30 days to use it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKAcUwsdEWUByAvfTynzCU8iFMsMPdcyYxV2t6&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Adam Truong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnKzCbjNxt18VXSbSzL1g7pvkQmP8tqRC673Ls95uotzGz0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What do you expect? It’s Ikea food 🤷 cheap, fast, and taste so so. However, the service is good and tables are clean. Whenever I have a chance to shop at Ikea, I’ll definitely stop by their food court to refill my energy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwswDhrb-jWbjxhQjZwvHcY0MGBO_WCXyQ8h_-&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Cathy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4K-b1pp8UkwCQabFg1c15aes6lTmBY7Kt_eMxlotNZcUAAbpK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Like most of their food but their rainbow cake is terrible, cake is not moist hard to chew and LOADS of sugar, wish they had used cheese instead of sugar coating. Avoid with young kids.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbmykrgRriMyJRIzHTc407qa8y0hdHfy3_gup5&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Ferlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyhN9COMWbZvujGjcXtb2QJJW4o9YiV8wo-a58P4P09YCpLW8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food that we ordered were all good. The servings were big enough for their prices. Clean area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOegWoqZc6v0wASPuGy-dP4QV18zEh1JyV-yyLU&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Keely","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPhWX1e7rxg7tZFNfTBzG-8D8OSQ8F6e_R4tSsbsCqwZ5hcuri=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was there this morning. The line was long and slow, seems like they are understaffed.
The cashier who is a middle-age-Asian-woman is very rude. I greeted her with “hi”, then she looked at the soup and started scolding at me in a condescending way “YOUR SOUP IS MORE THAN ONE SCOOP I CAN TELL IT BY LOOKING AT IT! YOU CANT DO THAT IT’S NOT RIGHT!”. I’m not sure where this attitude came from as I never said anything about not paying for the double scoop (all I did was greeting her 🤷🏻‍♀️). A normal person would have said “I saw you have more than one scoop and we are charging for double scoop here as indicated by the sign”. I didn’t engage with her as there’s lots of people waiting, said nothing else, and paid for my food. After I paid for my food, she scolded at the next customer as well “YOU TOO YOU HAD MORE THAN ONE SCOOP ……” (blah blah blah and went on the whole time the next customer paying for their food). Again, none of us saying we are not paying for the double scoops (and it’s allowed as the price was indicated on the sign).
The soup bucket was also almost at the bottom at the time so my first scoop wasn’t even a full scoop🤷🏻‍♀️ if it’s a problem with the business then it shouldn’t be self-serve, or use a scale to weight it at the cashier to make it fair and square.
I only went there for breakfast and got some decoration for my home, not being the cashier’s emotional dumpster.
The cashier no was 7013899.

Update: I already DM ikea Canada on instagram and I’m hoping for any update on this issue (I.e., action on this employee) thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZjiRhBqKF_07b7rdPxukbIlQNKFlf04BXt5Fu&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Stella Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvqyQ2KS_YIN6XYOMkDtQZO2ezjEJLWRODsOzNFIWuIhCYtAL-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Try to get here either early in the morning or late at night. We didn’t have too much trouble finding parking here at 11 am on a weekend but when we left an hour and a half later, there were many drivers frantically looking for parking and someone asked for our stall the minute we started loading our purchases.

Foot traffic gets heavy around 11:30 am at the cafeteria. Because of this, it seems like they open the second service lane at that time. We waited 20 minutes to order. If you are more into satisfying your hunger than telling everyone on social media that you ate at IKEA, an egg salad sandwich is a good choice, for both the portion size and price (it’s only $3.99 whereas the Swedish meatballs are $8.99)! Also, they don’t give a Swedish flag to everyone who orders meatballs, so do keep that in mind.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Timothy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXppglo6ZAetCQzplW2OLh2qI567m4ZgShYOz5i82egCmgzc4sM2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very subpar experience at ikea cafeteria. The staff are quite new and inexperienced. Lady in front asked for kids meal and the staff was stunned and 5 staff members discussed among themselves back and forth on what the portion should be. With bacon or without bacon. This much eggs? Or too much? They didn’t care that there were 10-15 people in line just waiting to get food. They had to get the kids meal portion right down to the atom. If anything, indicates a very inflexible and novice management team.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlMdo3MmCGue34vX23lb98gCjQzM55NvhhzH7V&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2022-9-28"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Bikramjeet Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXdZGDCl1_8K2uF2hMFwT3zTubFOHh6GlJVI0pDjd1_eFkbGev=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"\"I had a great experience at this Subway location! The staff was friendly and attentive, making my sandwich exactly the way I wanted. The ingredients were fresh, and the restaurant was clean and well-organized. I really appreciate the wide variety of options they offer, and the overall atmosphere was welcoming. I'll definitely be coming back for more delicious and quick meals. Highly recommend this Subway for anyone looking for a tasty and satisfying bite!\"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best service ever, lady was very patient with me while I ordered.. food is always the same.. the restaurant is very clean too..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTEZTZoc5bQBg3MIdJ_zBM1dWD0mBQXMC0FMSr\u0026fid=0x0:0x78acac2ca9570d19"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Ashley St Germain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIprpnnI-_6NkKC_WOzy4i0CfEXucbcHkloBXCWhHDLxnLG2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location is by far the best!! We always get such friendly service, great portion sizes, and everything is always so fresh!! Amon is exceptional! Great recommendations and lets us try new sauces and holiday editions! He even takes extra time to make it fun for the kids. Above and beyond!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Regina Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQY6dvYSrD--leEvPpBiRUcxLuRVDY2jxfDSYYu6z9c01ebg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service in this location is one of the best. I’ve been to other locations. Employees are fast, sandwiches are made well and they’re nice! Aman, the store manager is always welcoming and his employees are the same. One of my go-to Subways for sure. Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsLxCd7veOCcNddwawcQtwPzoM6ZaZBdTo9_-PF7P8cT5QoMQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I eat subway practically everyday during my breaks at work and this location is by far the best. I always see how clean the area behind the counter is, along with their floors, tables and chairs. The chips and drinks are always restocked which I don’t see as much of at other locations. All of the staff are very kind and patient to all customers who come in, always greeting you with a smile. Their portion sizes are great and you can see and taste how fresh they keep their ingredients. Even when I am not at work I will continually go / order from this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Puneet Basra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKeHtnQiJCadTQiw6yrQ1oarpJ-9nlacMneNxcl6QxYYuanA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff was amazing, super friendly and overall great service. I took my cousin for lunch and he has autism and they were super patient and helpful with him as he was trying to order. Thank you so much.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Zazulak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWocHqKKSHVEv4YbbHN7WzxON6BWp3GSRDQgMzsW8pzAWD5w8Z2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I attend this Subway weekly and am always happy when Sukhi is behind the counter.  I know without fail that she will greet me with a smile, a good morning gesture and is ready to build my meal. She goes to work making my breakfast with a perfect blend of all the desired ingredients while topping it off with a great crisp of grilling the wrap. She makes my morning nourishment flawless and is a great asset to the franchise.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Muskaan Bathla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyTwl1S8_JhrA_r5Vi_te2aMsLGx3Jw2G5BBzKzzfiHFzLG_Kmfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at this location. AMAN was amazing-he was so patient while I chose my toppings and even recommended a combination that turned out delicious. The restaurant was clean too.\nI’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Apparently they don’t wanna help ppl who pay with cash only
Also she was so rude","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfsXYQfO0Ypvd6twqod1pQc2HeHedomCq2zOAW&fid=0x0:0x5577858c03f0cc40"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Saaim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKo6i_dYF2LvmqcuGRMX18TFll7l1fAuSyKh12AAdhDVHB8-Qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BOMB PIZZA! Amazing pricing! They even give you the option for slice size (6,12,18). You’ll have to pay for the order at the kiosk but no wait for pick up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tom Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyyQ5KvmKl4Z33nT4wusvkCwA9Cr-xWhWOhejIZbkV4EKIng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love to come here for their hot dogs, pizza, and wings.  The price is really cheap.  Especially the wings, only $20 for 30 wings.  It usually cost $30+ elsewhere.  And the hot dog is really big too.  I'd say around double the size of a regular hot dog, and it comes with a drink too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anne CZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICjZmtGpaR3bzwt3KjR6sD7iZTuVW2P9FM7QboFNwJxB3crA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I always come for their hot dogs. They are delicious and huge! The service isn't the best but you really can't go wrong with the price you pay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"robby sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmcxeoHAIKvTDkbXOCdOJkkpKDtrdjhRdyVsZmnSt4os1E4NK_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I miss latte &  cappuccino in the food court , every time I use to go to Costco once or twice a week , I use to get my coffee ( latte) from the food court and than walk around Costco to do my shopping enjoying my coffee at the same time  . It was very reasonable price too only $1.99 compare to Starbucks $5.00 coffee latte ,Costco stopped it because of Covid . hopefully they bring it back soon .","Images":null,"When":""}]

Worst experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO7Pk_JMwpUCCqRbOeKNpFZF-79HOZ-BlV8V7b&fid=0x0:0xaaf25994dcbce649"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"daman preet kaur dhanjal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNYxcdHv5cmPlekWDBqVBEmqSFP4Elc1dLaiaK6v33fissxN4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favourite subway location I have ever visited. They don’t only provide exceptional customer service but also staff is very patience as they always consider and wait for customer’s choice while making sub.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the perfect subway experience! My veggie delite was made exactly as requested. It was bursting with healthy fresh veggies, thick, and filling. Generous portions of veggies! Loved it!❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO06cLfNIzmfJRlhLoyhFHfs1uqhllTYAEGdzNn&fid=0x0:0xaaf25994dcbce649"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Harnoor Sembi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDOimwC2OqHRCbKg3NJjalOt5KB2BqLQDk-eezXLAPnDoLkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service! Really appreciate jaswinder's sandwich making skills. She makes best subs for sure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harjot Kaur Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOnyizncktJRCoDtYoMCfj0gZlkWgoCr7H_jioucWVcA1O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to this location today evening. The girl there was super friendly and did exactly as i wanted. She made my day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like these new subway layouts. The warmer color makes me feel comfortable eating here. This is a pretty nice subway, they have good bathrooms and a decent sized area for line up. They have a small individual eating bar and two tables. Staff are pleasant. They honor the six dollar foot long deal. They make made to order subway sandwiches with fresh veggies.
Parking is accessible from the mall, there is limited transit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzhKy-XT1vp4VXoSXOhKiHPWfKqml-D0-_rqWE&fid=0x0:0xaaf25994dcbce649"],"When":"2017-8-5"},{"Name":"Priyanka Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd7krw2w9Qjk1kbzcMsBr8wTLEXuCKuiQp4H9vtV0Q6jvrHiUUDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great experience here for a brunch. Jasvinder was very helpful with options and served with a smile.
Thanks, will visit again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arthur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHQtBLiYEjnkxuZBSRZQ4_1TDFjG-d0rpN3hujsXfYBFeNuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They had one staff working on a busy Saturday afternoon.  Typical behaviour of trying to save money at the expense of the customer.  This owner should have his subway license taken away","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Taylor Kirkland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4cpJyXjA3za_-B-RuywY8pfgiwJu2zeJQSqp8Wz1tFl20CA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"South west steak and avocado bowl is listed as 600 cals for 11.99$, the wrap is 800 cals for $16.00. When I confronted the staff member about how I have been charged for a wrap not the bowl I’ve ordered 4 times now, she told me the bowl was infact more calories and more expensive and that it wasn’t her problem the menu said otherwise. This is completely untrue and wrong and they are over charging and gaslighting people when the menu clearly says otherwise, in store and online. I work at the airport and would like this resolved, it’s not okay to over charge people.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vinny Black","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4PzkdHccgpY4Gz2dpHSmbWt--fVzpyqJKM7CXRTvfKFgc68EJ5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Didn't even want to give this place one star but unfortunately you have too! Rude staff is an understatement! And they all seem to not be able to listen when you ask for an Italian foot long and end up with a boring white stick of cold toasted bread! Not impressed! 100% use one of the other take outs, as this subway is appalling! And all staff need customer service training!

48 dollars for two sub meals is always appalling! And very over priced!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KEN (FARMING IN THE CITY)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_QebmxMMHZs7sDWzJ6ExzfWdggCjvXA37UkVP2YzwlwLyTGTP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty slow serving but still work faster than other shop. Huge and cheap .

Wiki 寫到：

In 1965, Fred DeLuca borrowed $1,000 from friend Peter Buck to start "Pete's Drive-In: Super Submarines" at 3851 Main Street[16] in Bridgeport, Connecticut, and in the following year, they formed Doctor's Associates Inc. to oversee operations of the restaurants as the franchise expanded.[17][18] The holding company derives its name from DeLuca's goal to earn enough from the business to pay tuition for medical school, as well as Buck's having a doctorate in physics.[19] In 1968, the sandwich shop was renamed "Subway".[17]

In 1974, a franchise operation began with a restaurant in Wallingford, Connecticut.[8]","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5FbIeJfaKzIB9n_HIzwEq6jORlHz5zc4v36ZU&fid=0x0:0x5c0c8f3f9e1f026b"],"When":"2022-9-30"},{"Name":"Lisa Exton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkiumunI-TAGWWQ7MME4TnfpKddZoD5xp_zoTRsXNXhrCvgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Again not a good experience!  No sidekicks, Diet Pepsi wasn’t working, I added my rewards number and it didn’t show up on my bill.  Why can’t they get it right there?  Last time the staff wasn’t helpful they didn’t want to do a combo with a sidekick when every other subway does including other airports.  Disappointing…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B C L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhZoBo1l-5AD_evk3J4sFgonQe4J3BXyzpz1GtGlkzM-WRSow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"waited in line for 15mins to find out they don't accept subway coupons, so then maybe you should remove the subway franchise and just be called sub... your totally a subway! just forcing people to buy cause they thinks we have no choice but to buy","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Vinzenz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGd1MCfuFpU9lWvKh_Q2J-6Cyyj9NMgNSCdjb-Z-UB9GpcKhE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"so decided to try a different food delivery, worst ever! store lied about when they got my order. told me they had sent my order out. then they told me they got my order later and it is now really out.....came and the order was short but too bad for me. Send a not to Customer support at Subway - THEY DON'T EVEN RESPOND!. LOSING A customer that shops there a fair amount. Really sad they want your money but don't care about the product they deliver","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vijay Shivdasani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCigoFFjFGhR4aCljo1wcS8a1HaEz4ZQfV2xF47so7o3uaLZLc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"While waiting for our departing flight from Vancouver International Airport (YVR) we decided to have some Subway sandwiches from the outlet located in the Food Court inside the airport. We were here in September 2019. We enjoyed our vegetarian subs with a lot of salad like cucumber, tomato, jalapeno, onion, olives and mayonnaise and spreads which are typical of all Subway sandwiches. The six inch subs are quite filling and reasonably priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMnKfpMc2_bnFB24_wRoTElS7_mMxblztO5COG&fid=0x0:0x5c0c8f3f9e1f026b"],"When":"2020-8-6"},{"Name":"Linh Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-C2x9nsIlXy9na3T0NG7RdoYPjPj76OUeCpts3jOH-csNPUrx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Good food but staff is quite unhelpful and rude. She asked a question and I misunderstood and she laughed. Don’t know what she was thinking when she did that. Would she expect people know exactly what she said? She didn’t bother to give me the bill either, just walked away.  It could be that they are too busy and tired but still not having a nice feeling. Bought there twice but that’s all","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODPCbEQ1mgCW_Q9ed2CY1snJBvPrTQH4H06xjc&fid=0x0:0x5c0c8f3f9e1f026b"],"When":"2022-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amandeep Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITKdhtECztCb7k1YBhVl49p4_HDJ9d33nmdR0i9SUf1w33pv_t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""5/5 stars! I visited this location on Wednesday and was blown away by the exceptional service from Ramandeep. She was friendly, attentive, and made sure my sandwich was made exactly how I liked it. Her positive energy and smile made my day! Keep up the fantastic work!"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arvind Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsUbIf20CAKMEeto1XI7mwjrj_QxUj1UKs_EBJ-WY5p9zDikI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am giving one star because today I went to subway and there was a girl named Raman when she saw us entering in the subway she immediately turned back and said oh shit and told the other girl to serve us. We can't accept this kind of behaviour and we will dont visit again. thanks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Justin Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS-bITVeBM_xxvOcEFZVvNRDbrUxkQkjM_Ghy4C-ID8kUP9dY-7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just finished my shift at the bank, and I decided to have my pre packed lunch at subway. The manager was incredibly hostile and rude, even going as far as to threaten to call the cops on me because I did not purchase a Subway sandwich. I am deeply disappointed in the management of Subway. If I could give this restaurant a zero star rating, I definitely would.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice note on the packaging. Bread was fresh and my veggie delite was made well. Good experience but other locations have stuffed my subs with more veggies when I order extra veggies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSswpZ86khMcPE3tomDZjn8_B383FIF6iQlC0o&fid=0x0:0x4ed1c99bc3aa2c31"],"When":"2023-7-19"},{"Name":"Erin Batt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkuLEFjA3lbkSm67y9uQf7CQYF52f3n6beNcv_THKjjpgTznM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have never in my life been so frustrated. My children waited in line for over an hour. The store had maybe 8 orders ahead of them. I was circling the building walking the dog so wasn’t in the store to see what was happening but kept poking my head in and saw them in line nicely (they are teenagers not small children) but they kept saying these workers are just messing up every order taking forever. So they finally get their food. One of the sandwiches is wrong. Like not the same sandwich they gave him
The wrong one in the bag. Didn’t notice until I dropped them to the soccer field. So I mobile ordered the correct sandwich at 12:49 pm. It said ready by 1:05pm. I have it extra time even knowing how slow there are. Now I have a starving kid needing to eat between soccer games. Now I’m 90 mins into a simple subway stop. I go at 1:20 to pick up the sandwich and it’s not ready despite the app saying ready for over 15mins. I ask. He’s very rude. Says he has a bunch of orders ahead of mine and it will be at least 30 mins. I left and came back. I now got my sandwich at 1:37 TWO HOURS from when these kids first got in line and it’s toasted which it wasn’t supposed to be but at this point he’d eat anything. I’ve never been so frustrated with something so simple. Two hours to get an order is beyond ridiculous not to mention the time commitment and wasted driving back and forth checking in something so simple. I’m so angry and will be posting this to the restaurants review page I’m just so in shock at this level of incompetence at a very simple fast food restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nadim Reinprecht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7Qr2xs099l4QsGYjiq2D515wXGuuiqAdrOXHICeYeb72c5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location somehow managed to to spread a 6 inch worth of filling over 12 inches of bread. Don't waste your money. Try and find the tuna...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUjCP0Y-ud8d6rFeH5HG1BRMfqSwpt5sI0n7Ka&fid=0x0:0x4ed1c99bc3aa2c31"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Shawn Jahromi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK13OIHdeMCYKv5PULSENIJP9Kyn-Eyw2TEthSc6usulsdngQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1. They said they will have to charge me for extra olives. 2. I wanted to add meat to a sandwich and they refuse to do it.

The manager sent me a low IQ non-apology letter and then just ignored my reply.

This review will not be removed until this issue is resolved. Any PR gimmick messages under it by the restaurant is just a ploy to minimize this customer review.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anastasia Lukonina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVImFuChiU1ahRYKGFLzOYXkvDnjEfEDaaUb9jvPvG6PCwdSXya=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best locations in Richmond. Always fresh subs and super sweet personnel 😍😍 thank you!
I mostly order with Uber eats, and this restaurant always follows my instructions and writes nice messages on subs which make my day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm-kH3GiXvNY2P1DvTiLnePA-FgKFpd5qejg1y&fid=0x0:0x4ed1c99bc3aa2c31"],"When":"2021-5-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Taranpreet Badesha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHxnw4Vt71qn7odcG-ZfTsuJ75tZHsrM1xbuiyBa1Z6Ycx8h0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I always go here, their subways are delicious. Unfortunately, I went to this location before 11pm. Around 10:40pm, me and my sisters were about to walk in and the girl worker was like we are closed. The way she said it was so unprofessional and there were still 20 minutes. The only location I would recommend going to is the Cambie one or the Sea Island Way, that one is 24 hours.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bhavin Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHvS0cX1c2c-Kt4NI-pHY1zXxk8QlVHtyXGZBcVuuWd6wbOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had a disappointing experience at this subway location. The sandwich I ordered, the Veggie Delight, was poorly made. I expected a generous serving of vegetables, but instead, I received only a few pieces of lettuce, a single green pepper, two olives, and a thin line of mayonnaise. This lack of quality feels like a disservice to customers. I personally will not be returning to this location, and I recommend that others save their money and consider other options.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Narender Goyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWibp12EKW_M09_mQXJbdyo4bk0X_FHFrMQH-a6YdTj-MjvM62O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered jerk spiced chicken bowl and all I got was just salad and very less pieces of chicken. I asked her that the pieces aren’t less? Then she replied this is what we give. Like seriously? This is not the first time I am eating subway.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm-6-NR3LgxLJiLLE3GaR0OArE3y_gb-6Zqm8l&fid=0x0:0xf893215787d8ff08"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Aaron Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_QnWlFoQddpM3DMfRFoedO2LtACOwoCGl6ZIJ-WnLJigsKCc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This subway is always not too busy. Service is great and they make your sandwiches fast. Also I ordered a 6 inch sandwich once and they made a footlong instead. I told them about it and they said I could just keep it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Choo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsh9cieSQUcRhg0NUO05i_3K_jTZJanXH9s6cZUf6xbegSvOkU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"In the last 3 months, I have gone to this subway location twice. This was the only meal that was “different” in our day and after eating subway was the only meal and within hours multiple symptoms that are related to food poisoning for both my husband and I from eating the same sandwich and salad.
Only this location also, we have tried another location and never had a problems.
The staff were friendly & great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arshit Bhusri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbLOSziauxCDg0bfiPn-4n9Mq6VJ-Nnb5QQGpClsA9NV0Dgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited the Subway store and was served by a remarkable employee. I was thoroughly impressed by his exceptional service. He greeted me with a warm smile and was incredibly patient as I took my time to decide on my order. He was very knowledgeable about the menu options and offered helpful suggestions that made my decision easier.

He prepared my sandwich with great care, ensuring that all ingredients were fresh and neatly arranged. His attention to detail was evident, and I appreciated how clean and organized he kept the workspace.

Moreover, his friendly and professional demeanor made my visit to Subway a pleasant experience. He went above and beyond to ensure that I was satisfied with my meal. I will definitely be returning to this location, thanks to this outstanding customer service.

Thank you, Rajdeep, for making my Subway experience a great one!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nathan Duarte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrGWNDk4b7qlp5-rigudiO1xXgoA6zGP4S_4f1j3Oi-r-Bdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered some food from a third party app delivery service, subway wrote employees wrote a cute note on my bag, I loved it! great customer service. Well done.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Merz604","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjP9iiccjdMCVTQ2jq1ehRp5S5Oq6U1DSC5oVNH8LU0YmEhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After having several bad experiences at Indian owned subways and seeing that video of the Indian man barefoot on the counter making a sandwich, I am officially done with Indian owner subways.  These people have absolutely destroyed the brand.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Simin Afzountar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHBAtKoclGUVJfvhw6FLVC0SAmDe_rv_q607_JTAcwCM_4ng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered two pizzas last night with great deal ( $5 per medium size ). The quality was perfect. It was the last hour of day, after 9pm, they were very busy, but Very fast. The workers are young, happy, smiling and laughing during work.
I enjoyed the pizza and their energy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madhav Kaura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGC-YRrR6I3A6ZGKO35uK1nISmZplPSIzGbWKBwyYFS80rUHQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is very good, I have been there many times before, it is a place that never loses its quality.You should definitely come and try it. . The customer service was top-notch by the girl who is always in morning shift her name is Varan and the product exceeded my expectations.Love the pizza there, especially the cheese filled.I highly recommend them to anyone looking for quality products and excellent service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"OWEN HOPPS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjGl4Vr1at6sPAPaEd-JZLyOC9JhLR4GRocI_7znbQVZRzXSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The female staff at the front counter was very rude. I had a very disappointing experience at this Little Caesars. First, the quality of the pizza was terrible. The crust was dry and hard, tasting like it had been sitting out for a long time, with no freshness whatsoever. The toppings were also unevenly distributed — some parts barely had any sauce or cheese, while other areas had way too much, making the pizza unbalanced and unpleasant to eat. On top of that, the service was poor. The staff seemed uninterested, were unhelpful when I had questions, and the wait time was much longer than expected. Overall, this was a terrible dining experience. I won’t be coming back, and I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV3o7DMrYjyxr2quohyAT20hEtPAiVLaHszRSqlghkNgJiAVdpcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got the hot & ready - was a 10 minute wait. It was probably the worst pizza I've ever had too. Looked like frozen pizza they heated up.

There's this weird crunchy texture in the crust. The tomato sauce is the only thing we can taste. Don't think that's fresh cheese either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA7JV3992OP3cLHF6pFtpRQucj0tSdFLlSkzxK&fid=0x0:0x681b5b0ee4a8cbff"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"David Currie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAJxYUE363MOhirbWFvncu6hsvFGLGUcn3KGiFcjZvuWICVtXk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Hot and Ready? Not likely at this location. Staff is very slow and don't really pay much attention to customers waiting in the lobby.

To make matters worse the lady who ordered AFTER me, somehow got her order before me, despite ordering more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shutter Count","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9xomV5QhIh3sPjkQMd2iwbwQVRO06l8X2MYS0X_705Y8MSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It just happened 5 mins ago that the cashier was incredibly rude to 2 asian guys. I dont want to use the word “racist”, but it seems like the lady has no patience at all to someone who is not fluent in English. What happened seems to be that the Asian customer came early to pay for his order while the food needs longer to be prepared. The customer later came back to pick up the order but the same cashier didn’t recognize him and wants to charge him again. The customer insisted that he paid already while the cashier was constantly stating that he didn’t pay and stating that he was being so confused. The customer later came with his friend and stated the same thing. They had paid earlier already. The cashier seems not believing them but gave them the food eventually without apologizing for her attitude and misunderstanding. The same thing actually happened to me too as I came early while the food was still being prepared. I paid for my food and came back to pick up later. The lady asked me to pay again but fortunately i have my receipt with me so I have avoided being humiliated. They dont keep records when customer pay for their order and that causes complications when later we come back to pick up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zedroid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYrx9DOlmgMb5dlBWJnh1OOrScTmiAmi75V_va49hOShZ6Ynvb8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really burnt the top of my crazy puffs.  They used cheese sauce instead of real cheese on my pizza.  Mostly crust not cheese in my pretzel crust pizza.  Waited 40 mins nobody was there.  Said it was a 10 minute wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAJWlt-HBHhqbqpd-sW7ETBaKEtU8WNSyQUYZ3&fid=0x0:0x681b5b0ee4a8cbff"],"When":"2023-5-16"},{"Name":"Buniiezz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUODsOQJar5zBFl3SITj7u55aNR-pNNXcVcBxPe5dI9XYUOrs8B=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 2 orders of crazy puffs and I was the only customer in there. Took 5 minutes to pay and 20 minutes to get them when they were already ready in the warmer. Not coming back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited the Subway in Terra Nova Plaza at 8am and had a fantastic experience. The staff was incredibly friendly, making my morning brighter. The environment was spotless, adding to the pleasant dining atmosphere. I tried the Canucks Classic, which was very tasty, and the ham in the Great Canadian Club was excellent. Don't miss out on their chocolate chip cookies—they're delicious! Overall, a great place to start your day with a satisfying meal and exceptional service. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODfhsEsG4qWos-UyIdwRhUUylfoH5Vh3HgS3ly\u0026fid=0x0:0xf2897d5a1b419124"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The amount of veggies on my veggie delite was okay but something is wrong with the bread here. It was extremely dry and hard and was comparable to eating a crunchy crouton or a stale baguette. The bread did not taste fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-YdQ6p3XXTaRyyDIi74Cvp9SGsn14w0LB4m5N\u0026fid=0x0:0xf2897d5a1b419124"],"When":"2023-7-14"},{"Name":"yo bussey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnQ4m-pzIcvWLV1sVUTvPyF6IYHHm2JV6WgTKUlkG4kGg8oPiR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Decided to grab a sub here instead of at the save on next door. I chose poorly. Service was quick. Turkey sub had a decent amount of meat and cheese but the veggies left a lot to be desired. I skipped both the lettuce and the spinach as both had seem better days. The bread seemed very dried out. Quality wise this was definitely one of the worst subways I have ever eaten at.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MAX JD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuT1EUU3L2ljW1omiDM6wG-7w8EReLn8nJCV4IiuEqTPrhOYVPlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I haven't been to subway for such a long time so I decided to come to this location. The staff here are incredibly rude, I was going to the bathroom but the lady kept saying \"customer only\" I kept telling her that I was going to order food but she kept repeating customer only. After I used the bathroom she said that the reason she was saying that was because people would steal the hand dryer. You can't assume that everyone who uses the bathroom will steal, especially when the store is dead quiet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGQV870J4ZJ5cNDrBWGVx2EWgb58Leo6hfNezZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xf2897d5a1b419124"],"When":"2021-3-15"},{"Name":"Mike Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoqn_iR_3PM6GGzA2FqPY26mDSGqRsmnZCeczjwdSGv1olrno=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food server(Indian man)looks as if I took his girlfriend and frowned upon everything…\nI am reluctant to come here again although this is the closest subway to me…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"OnlyRealReviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLo-W08yMEBFnQMAHESWHl1x8KneP76qrloXFJHmK9pfFiG-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had the worst online order ever. It was made by a male in the morning of April 20. We requested 2 sauces for each footlong, both were non present. We requested more veggies,tomatos, and spinach- there were barely any. Tomatos were all tomato ends. Clearly did not give a dam about special instructions. Worst subway store by far…..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaVpAM_FMHst5xCcPUeijJtRbfEZV5BkNrsT6tSC1Nk0af557Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This Subway should simply be closed or sold to a new owner.  The current owner is extremely cheap on everything and got super sloppy attitude.  This person shouldn't run a business. Ruins it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kris Kallu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPnWBsUWH2K8kTAWXrCIIgZ9yC0dlXFgo6G775dYnC4m1MOq3T=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible!\nRude staff, veggies are old and bread was dry.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"J & G Fried Chicken in Aberdeen Centre’s food court offers a fantastic Taiwanese street food experience. The popcorn chicken is crispy, flavorful, and perfectly seasoned, while the squid balls are tender with a great texture. Their deep-fried king oyster mushrooms are a surprising standout—crispy on the outside, juicy, and full of rich umami flavor. The portions are generous, and the food is freshly fried to order. If you’re craving authentic Taiwanese-style snacks, J & G is a must-try spot in Richmond!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKifZk8rSU4PWpSxOlP3u57zq9AUWuqm3bI3bZ&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"ITwins (iTwins)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUfk9fQ2wnUPyx22p2MtHChD4th8SauoOfDx9kxsrTGIv_31wePQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As they all say, "Don't judge a book by its cover."

Its extremely dark-colored fried chicken is not as bad as it looks. Others brag about their 100-year-old Braised or Brine Water 鹵水汁; J&G can brag about their 100-year-old lard 豬油 🤣 To cut costs, they probably don't replace their lard as often, or they don't use healthier or lighter oil. Otherwise, their chicken color should not look like sh-t 🤣 like they do now. If you can look past its color, their chicken is actually pretty delicious. It looks very dry on the outside but is actually quite moist on the inside.

- They don't use white meat, again, probably to cut costs. Their 6-piece chicken that costs $15.75 almost always comes with 4 fair size drumsticks and 2 thighs. We actually prefer this combination.

- the ladies speak Mandarin only. Talk to the guy. He speaks fluent English, too. 👍

.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrs0cEdfMfzL-1ZOkVYRA8KcXlEpbMeosBH0r3&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAcWruSlhb6SY2VSSgNXTa_quO-xPstJIlNA8FBVmSmvTTJ-ci=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried this brand of popcorn chicken when I visited Taiwan this summer. After my first time I got it every time I saw their stores, so I was excited to see it in Aberdeen mall. The flavor is still as good as I remember, but it would be better if it was deep fried just a little longer to make it more crispy. The chicken pieces are big and juicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVS8KC_Y8AOGEKTmiTPA9NuNb0jn7EiyS3MlOR&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Star Platinum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb_QPC9_TatAdMnHZxHnPpwK9EAqKMAY6NDflfMjh5a4BtNtyI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the very first time, I have had J&G at this location and I would definitely come back! When I arrived there was a huge crowd waiting for their orders! Although i had to wait a while to get my order in, I was greeted very warmly by the gentlemen behind the counter who apologized for the long wait. I had order 2 of my favourite snacks that I always ordered in Taiwan, my order arrived under the given estimated wait times and my food turned out pefectly, with just the right amount of seasoning to my liking.

For those who complain about wait times, keep in mind food do require time to cook,  and if you can't understand that you can goto a fast food restaurant.

Edit: visited this location once again to see find out that my experience was still the same, foor served under estimated time, great tasty food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcme5EJTF0tfXsVgkNuiGzxgGfyisPNvJJeQjH&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Bianca Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLQf55yrLfuQpaVH5_PAPb-xLqdrIrBA83-7_og5_ndyF7MIm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The heart-shaped cutlet and yam fries are my go-to order. They are well done and very crispy.

The server is super friendly.

Wait time is typically 10mins since they make your order on the spot, so your order will be searing hot, fresh out of the fryer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGRy_jSdjZJEQV5nl6Vfwxehk1KNp3v3W4FOr2&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Emily Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_kXHBFVnill85Tw8NCm8r47l_oZAhD-LyHXsHQUhrE_c8RFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite comfort restaurants at the Aberdeen food court. The server speaks English and is very friendly, the food was done very quickly (~10mins). The chicken is always steaming hot, crispy, and salty/slightly spicy, very authentic. Get the combo with fried chicken, potato fries, and fried bun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ZzdSJrldir1tq87BZzcSp0dl3f_eud-uw1lI&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Steve O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjmYbAzncXOf6deK5dtSoTZXay2gzbtaNYQmuCdtzraLJbMc_XHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was at the mall with co-worker for lunch, saw this place and went "Hey, why not"

I got the combo #1, and I'll be honest it blew my mind.

The chicken was incredible. It was super juicy and balanced with a wall of flavours. The yam fries were a perfect complement to them, and the buns were so soft.

Highly recommend if you still by the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9xxy8ak1nDsf1po02Poo7NYKF0ifFQWEAv2L4&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2021-7-3"},{"Name":"Gloria Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKylgd_WBuGVd_Ic0HpfyJG8Qd2O1w5I43_ThxnIg3uVtBzJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've been a fan of there signature popcorn chicken since opening in this location, and I've always loved it and ordered pretty much over ten times so far. they have never disappointed me until today. The popcorn chicken looks fine and smells as usual but when I eat it it has a very strong sour taste. feels like the chicken has gone bad.... I thought it was only one bite and I tried other pieces it was all VERY sour! I know the weather is hot recently please check the meat make sure they are safe to eat! I sincerely hope the owner will take this problem seriously and give me a reply. 3 stars for the good taste of the past.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNivrP7AmsiAMuAwGmRwe0J5NjwaRDEVshYWr5q&fid=0x0:0x5f493b5158ce34d"],"When":"2022-8-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chocoviv Mashibaby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3bf31lghjL8sz48GYGJhVzSNwWw-vzBdCUjhjd1ajEHz7dp0_Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eating at this super busy food court reminds me of the OG HK style food courts… share a table make friends….:)….

The food was quick and very fulfilling.
I love that I can have all veggies and no noodles as an alternative.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYrR2U_ugy4QWuXC3n_i6wLgWsUdH0tCkch73T&fid=0x0:0xe500fe998716a6a5"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Andrew Pannu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC_29f_em9xkqMDmiwGRAvbMLMZ_0tvt48DRpZcdCI5t6fVr0ehg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried this eatery two times, the food is very delicious.
The first time I ordered the spicy chicken knuckles, it is spicy enough for my taste, can’t hardly imagine how tasty it was.
The second time is the curry, it is also spicy with a hints of pork oil, yummy.
The third time I order is the flat noodle with the beef brisket and daikon, the taste is mild than I expected, but the brisket is very tender, so far so good.
Finally, the lady boss is very polite and explained everything clearly, she used the fresh quality ingredients instead therefore she keep her menu limited variety. Overall I would still recommend if you really like spicy food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOS_9NieNsTXH31zQ3YjG-no5MGH8cX6IoWiP6&fid=0x0:0xe500fe998716a6a5"],"When":"2022-12-1"},{"Name":"Tim C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnUNZSQ38H_dRk2acXwl0f-e41grZTPhGg58HvZ9zZAz_Of-h5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'd probably have a stroke from having their signature rice dish: Chinese Sausage and Spam cubes on sunny egg rice with lard. （臘腸餐肉粒煎蛋豬油撈飯）Nothing in this delicacy is healthy, but 100% I will order the same thing again. And again. And probably get a heart attack, but it'd be worth it.
Spam and sausage is cut into uniform size and pan-fried to perfection.
They used enough oil to give that Sunny egg a crunchy edge, not the limpy under cooked "healthy wanna be" version.
The right amount of lard and soy sauce was added to give it the right touch.

Too bad they close quite early though. Can't even come after work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8LiMNUsbGpktPt8y1o8P9n2XabJBh1yb7zTJ3&fid=0x0:0xe500fe998716a6a5"],"When":"2022-11-15"},{"Name":"Rebacca Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV5CGbO8v62Uq06i6ew03FcnU970tW9IUSqIFVVS0Cb_Z_agow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic HK style cart noodle! Love their soup base and fresh ingredients 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDDJ_1ecBgvsXXXBSzAGA2tQ4mPZxJOWRtSLlY&fid=0x0:0xe500fe998716a6a5"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Kitty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMuwg_tl1TRTc24JxH5iTo3OJVTHqCQijM2P6PldLkYJ1Idkn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy cart noodle, comes to $16.50 for 3 toppings, and a hot milk tea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSgDaaSk4mRPgtF5Mox09J0_QipUpSAuwvKW5H&fid=0x0:0xe500fe998716a6a5"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Emil Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXknQyW2NyUMju0S4iRNBwNDE7nYLdVHOkBGGQSNCl5ndte_DxmgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Do not order the fried curry beef udon. Doesn't matter how spicy you can eat, the amount of curry powder they put in the dish can mute you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_9V622y0n_JpYp61l3n6ALj-IIe8hzvGoBV6k&fid=0x0:0xe500fe998716a6a5"],"When":"2023-7-22"},{"Name":"O-Cha Tea Bar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0yYXGtvueVC0cfBliG9kA18NV2Fy5_F_C2JFLPA3mmiBR9_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food and well price !
Strongly recommended the House Special Hot sauce (spicy) along with your cart noodle  🍜","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL0RjsrOlzpEGWPHTtGVBnzxg9_uzeaMd5fBXngEdoTt8WbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Tried their famous cart noodle today, I am disappointed…
$9 for noodle with squid-balls and dumping. Squid bits were stale and the bottom side of the dumplings were hard.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vaishali Urmil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgCjrJgdkJgqv1ThDZeqZZnzU4N3XJu3M5JInMKLK_VrGDJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited the store at 10:30 in the morning and it was super busy i have ever seen. There was only one girl Harmeet and the way she managed the rush hours and the customers is beyond my words. She handled everything very calmly and happily and she was the most cheerful employee i ever saw. Thank You for your service and I will definitely visit again just because of the service. Best subway🫶","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shreyasi Jaiswal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtt2BckyYDeVKfXywZKlBC8EDZsgE7nwruXOoiSv0qctiIWDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited the Subway on Chatham recently and had a good experience. The staff was efficient, and Harmeet stood out for her helpfulness and positive attitude. She made sure my sandwich was prepared well and quickly. I’d recommend this location for its good service and food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sheena SW","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx_7jJ8zz7jEPeLIzgb2CRxactN0sbeEkskdqOojIILwGaCcm9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always buy my lunch at this Subway because of the great service from the staff especially Harmeet. She consistently provides friendly, positive, and professional service every single time.

Harmeet's cheerful attitude truly make a difference, and she always makes sure my order is perfect. Her customer-focused approach really stands out, and it’s clear that she takes pride in her work. Thank you Harmeet for always making my Subway experience so enjoyable! :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jianna Kerry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcyYWGr9cU-wOlHFFr7nkV1zUOu1UFEBxTTGPsP1toHalicTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come to Subway after school almost every day, and Harmeet always makes my visit amazing. She’s lovely, welcoming, and provides great service with a smile. Highly recommend stopping by for a quick, tasty meal!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sherry Gulati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzHvUXWlEgPxJB4mmp5aQpySBPWYB-5Osoh8mF_5p8iA0DGKk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its a wonderful experience to visit subway Monday evening 5.30 pm and I am really pleased with prompt customer service of their crew specially Harmeet . I must say she is amazing, valuable asset of their branch at Richmond. Shez very friendly , addressing with customers with a big magical smile on her face. Today even i went their to see her and to get something to order but i didnt get a chance to meet her coz she is on off and I came back without having any order. I really missed her and her warm services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mirjam Kluijver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzMT-ei82ZCTa9NhuokUZ8k9ThLP8LNaseg-JcFPFJ4juLJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow, we wanted to buy 2 waters which came to 7.33$ and when we Decided against it, the lady was very rude about us saying it was too much money. We then asked for tap water from the machine which she ageeed to but only gave us one cup. She seemed miserable and judging on the reviews of the last 8 years has been miserable for a long time. Subway should do something about franchises like this.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vignesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXR0zXoFDZFobZs_zuxpEVKdkB5JukRi-yRKM6gq9T5Jy86P9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Usually visit this place just for pick up. For the most part, the place is clean, some other shops close by if anyone fancies specialised sweets or anything.

Staffs are great. They do a good job and a special mention to Harmeet. Very courteous and friendly. Good food, can’t ask for anything more here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elsa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyflzYhxmB1M37E9A1ClzuNnEkb8C-Et8OMnl2b0Oi8tXaPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great people works there, the best sandwiches and cookies the bread was so fresh right out from the oven.   Thank you Harmeet for your excellent service and made delicious sandwiches for our Sunday’s lunch:).","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"clyde eastman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6CEzrAjKPjni0O-E4PYraDMwFOBHU_Rl7Tmi1dELf_TGqhDI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very low quality food..Very stingy on meat .. I ordered 12 inch turkey bacon guacamole.. It came without bacon.. The turkey was sliced so thin you could read the newspaper through it.. The girl serving me did give me bacon bits after I pointed out she forgot to put bacon on my sandwich.. Did you catch that..? Bacon bits.. ! Give this place a miss.. You’re welcome..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNID2Tj9ykKGsyDBm_f4am73wjQFmlt-yj0FA6I\u0026fid=0x0:0x13efc662603a9336"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Sukh D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI08o2-_RwpItcOBUHUFCX1rDEBzcgjXPHZrNCNhXmTNEieDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Used to be much better, last visit the bread felt old and no pickels were given on the side. I asked to have extra sauce on the subs but it was not added at all. I had take out so didn't notice until home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diana L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW2kdRGGLj1j8iotZR8u_6cJvN47azaqWmh-dWmP_2e6mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not a busy Quiznos joint, but a steady stream. Low on certain things but friendly and quick customer service. Fresh as usual. Lots of parking in the lot. They have AC. The place could use some tidying up. But otherwise no complaints!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvM2tmcsAyk_ifkNlvNx_a16rhiuhrb2KO05k\u0026fid=0x0:0x13efc662603a9336"],"When":"2018-7-15"},{"Name":"R\u0026J Coridor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnysOPMp_9KkfSfoQT791q1xYhmvAudDxvMdXqEFV4Cf5FWI1f=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Grabbed a sub en route to YVR. LACK LUSTER is a nice term. There may have been ONE slice of meat on each half of the 12” roast beef sub. It basically consisted of sauce and a few mushrooms. For $15+. Crazy. If this is what Quizno’s is like across the board I would not suggest people go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyF8qxIGVrU7xY3kIcZBQr-vdg1SvkvT6KooPb\u0026fid=0x0:0x13efc662603a9336"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd2nly6dvRMQ_XhU54KbiBI9Ibe-aSu9gJptkbJSspabwF65Y3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Only a silly person would get a submarine sandwich from a where else in this area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC29G5kMzBgJSfAl3a575_ljRBp3b8-Gond6GH\u0026fid=0x0:0x13efc662603a9336"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their sesame bread is delicious! Nutty and toasty. Indeed they are way better than subway when it comes to taste and quality. The classic club sub was very fresh with a balance of meat and veggies. Definitely reccomend their sesame bread.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMoqQ1xPM58MWbJ2EBHenWkNSdpsjqai1BQM5Q\u0026fid=0x0:0x13efc662603a9336"],"When":"2022-1-7"},{"Name":"Arjun Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-tzNfLS1w3lWrXg6SXV0UHR-BzK8ds3tXk8qkUx_4U_EIOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here to eat with my kids at 743pm on Saturday and the girl working said it had to be take out because they were closing at 8pm. When I told her that it says they close at 9pm on the website she gave me a stunned look. I said whatever, because the place was a ghost town anyways and ordered some lackluster overpriced sandwiches. My older son didn’t want his sandwich toasted so obviously she toasted it, which lead to defcon 5 when we got home. Had to go to subway afterwards….should have gone there first. She had AirPods on the whole time and it was like she was talking to someone while taking our orders. My younger son didn’t like his meatball sub other, plus they don’t give you options for veggies or extras and there bread has sesame seeds-which my oldest is allergic to. Good thing he didn’t eat it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richard Rally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITC34MvTgnxRZBWRiS8Q7r53ooO3rNvI5gZjlc9qCZY558mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This Quiznos sandwich shop was very dark and looked uninviting inside. I got a 12 inch  sandwich and it tasted fine. However, it was very skinny and not very fulfilling. They need to be more generous with the amount of toppings that is added.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rajdeep singh Virk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFQtd7XRvZaYNtzTSYM09v6o52mTAG48ndS1oA5VUTNe408g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady named kiran is so unhygienic the more you can think of. First of all i was waiting for order more than expected which is ok seems busy but what made me mad is she made sub for someone(I don’t  know meat or veggie) touched the screen took his payment nd start making my sub with same gloves. Later on she sneezed by doing her face on other side but i clearly saw her saliva or sneeze drops on counter . That made me crazy but I was not able to say anything as  there were. So many people and  more disgusting was she was cleaning table again nd again with same gloves she didnt even waited to finish my sub nd started taking other order using same gloves. Trust me food was garbage. I wasted my $20 to just get food with some extra meat nd her saliva on my veggie sub. Disgusting 🤢.

Firget to mention she even touched the chicken scoop to flatten the chicken when she is making veggie sub. I asked her to put extra veggies nd she put less than regular amount nd all i got is lettuce

I feel light nd extra are pronunced different. Pls take care of her. But for sure we r not going back if she is working","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A very average mediocre subway experience. Ordered a veggie delite with extra veggies but the sub was quite flat with one layer of sparse tomatoes with a scant amount of veggies for “extra” veggies. I would say a regular footlong veggie delite at another subway has more veggies than this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBDZXOAwNnFvHXYY7SwyELxXQrYEixgdIJqOLd&fid=0x0:0xc428f4af1424bd7a"],"When":"2023-5-6"},{"Name":"Kevin Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdlQ1NoluBHSdqZlCc-J5bZBwmlI8YIsE0nAyWeL0Xf2c4G8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As i am diabetic, i always ask for extra vegetables.
Love how they are not giving just 2-3 spinach leaves when i asked for extra like some other Subways.

i can finally have full stomach with this location's salad!!!
Full of vegetables, see the attached picture","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqC-EpgTlOpKGAs7LoK2X2AtWMDgduSFVle4MM&fid=0x0:0xc428f4af1424bd7a"],"When":"2021-8-5"},{"Name":"Akanksha Akanksha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9ZIt8WAdKgfL0-P2Q5j_Kl7Vo29gqrc7rQy8y2iHR-_4kuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"women named kuldeep has no sense to talk with customers. it was my second time with her and both times she was rude. its like she dont want to work. other girl was really nice with me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deniz Mehmedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOM4uaBne0CbVomueeUAWGH0BrDEb9e7cGvs4q5iD3XmLSgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I called in to order 3 party platters for my workplace. Called in at 12:30pm. After I finished the order, she told me it will not be ready until 2:30pm, so I told her I can't wait that long, I will call another Subway. Then she said ok no problem we will have it ready for 1:30pm. At 1:30pm she calls me and says, sorry but we won't be able to make your order, if you still want it, it will be ready around 2:30pm. Also, we don't have anymore white bread so it will be whole wheat. Ruined the entire workplaces weekend lunch. Will NEVER order here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Kovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzMrLQByhtGYkdUlC1-iUncSqSIpp2uMOshM7xDlpSKZx5RA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m truly amazed at how friendly the staff are at this location !!
Always a friendly smile and fantastic service coupled with great sandwiches and soup ! It’s a great place for me and my family when we are on the run !
Thank you Subway !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaileigh Povey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJG0Rlw80FnO99hGiMSJ2vifYHDyxGXQoeQ7iYBTdVHNxVFKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Closed early, couldn't even order. Sever walked out with a few sandwiches for themselves","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTOHsOMJADN46xQ4qRLBXRjXwWyTsng4ecAsLQk3BL8BQ1lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not a bad Subway. There’s a large piece of plastic (for covid) that makes it hard to communicate through it, but if you know what you want before, you can just tell them around the plastic. Service was friendly, food was decent and fresh compared to most other Subways. A nice quick stop to make.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came here for a dinner with another family on Sunday night. The food quality was fine, just like at other White Spots. Kids had their Pirate Packs while we ordered the Legendary Burger and Chicken Tenders. Endless sides as usual in case you're hungry!

Once we sat down, the servers were good too. But since they didn't have a lot of servers, we had to wait 20 mins to get seated for a table of 8. You also can't make reservations here unlike other White Spot locations. And this was at 5pm .. the start of the dinner rush. So be prepared to wait!

We liked how it was inside Richmond Centre, across from Cactus Club, so we could stroll around after the meal. But parking was hard to find so plan accordingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP448XVx_W4NQIecv0OQ2L2mYf9D33sjBfiWswH&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Joshua Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiq_RKExmA89Du8aX-W-ZBs3qCm4qRSNgBD8pl68UG5TZxMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience on Monday, Nov 18, 2024 was very good. First , Katerina was very nice. And then they have fast food service. She politely waited so that we can think about what we want. There was a fireplace for people and it was kid friendly. Katerina was also very friendly. There is a separate menu for kids and adults. I have some pictures down below.

I wish I could give this a 7 star review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOPvDIaMgOOMCQEUbm_4nAE4E27c4dgxOcmSlU&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Anjali Pillai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbS9H8edzDEAxi_3l4xeMKVQAQwEbi1DVj2WXZmWpkCSekihg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered the Fettuccine Alfredo with the White Spot Club Sandwich, Fish & Chips and the classic Egg Benedict! It was soo good However the coffee we ordered was bad, it was cold and tasted watery.

I must say our server Kamila was fabulous, she kept visiting our table, we had mentioned to have our items served without bacon and she made sure our food restrictions were heard. She was very attentive and deserves a raise! Koodos to her!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJcfjhwECSiqSUh2GOl0bWP10OlosnhgEfrsPZ&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious and great customer service
I highly recommend this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj60ff0moHDoDJRYNeeLq8hwlt2tQyZcQt_k4a&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent breakfast taste pretty good and comfortable sitting
Staff not the most attentive but acceptable
Coffee  could also be better rather bland
Free parking at the mall","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWZ0S9hdPAgAVOGDipF4XYYBsVooBj1c5mlmij&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was decent and the server was alright. I do find white spot to be a bit more expensive","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLtvnKXV3NATlNx2jqqKnjyxWJdiXjRUL1q8fh&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It took awhile before a server came to take our lunch order, and we had to ask for ice water. While our server was efficient, our group had to ask for things like coffee refills (rather than them being proactive). My Prawn & Avocado Bowl was nicely presented and had a good variety of ingredients (bacon, smashed potatoes, toast, prawns, avocado, poached eggs and hollandaise). It had good colour. The eggs were a bit too runny for my personal preference, but was good to coat the potatoes in! The bacon was also cooked well, and was not shrivelled nor greasy.

The Strawberry Rhubarb Pie was much larger than what was pictured in the menu, and it did have a good tart flavour. However, it was quite saucy on the inside and we would've preferred if the strawberries & rhubarb filling was thicker and held together better. The vanilla bean ice cream also melted fast! Ample parking in the mall lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC8JADP1fUfxFU7Xpp3GshYVcMKMIVRE-o30Y_&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent very clean food is good service but little be slow the pork ribs is really good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcDSlE5agGCSkR-IOFZRGPHbw5jKJeNUbukQRU&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-8-19"}]
