user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ayumi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaO-YW-Cyzw9btnKIGsiX7PHX6L05CBVbL-_USFHAur0E7Av0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to the restaurant for the first time, and the staff was kind enough to explain the menu and even gave us recommendations. I went with a friend, and when we said we wanted to share a burger, they cut it in half for us. The taste was absolutely delicious! Next time, I’ll try a different flavor! Minami san Thank you soooo much♡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPexvPfzEKG-IJVtNcGefvQPN-8siYzY3tJiBb-&fid=0x0:0xc9241d3a469b53e4"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Ingrid Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYqxAub7e7OHHZJT1quQTyGmj3tSnisUSO5goVvS1zA9mkEFHK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It was quite price to have super rubbery cod. Paid $39.84 for fish and chips. It tasted like it has been refried a couple of times. Even though it was airport food, I usually buy fish and chips from Pajos and it’s usually fresh. This was disgusting. Very disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkVZt_VvMbM_uIWxhTkn65ZSCnxDufv9mkHNAa&fid=0x0:0xc9241d3a469b53e4"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Art Wagoner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBpzgm14DnKP9sEl9Ugk5ZqQQhPOOMoWT5B7aS5v1JRFg3r7s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was surprised to see a fish and chips restaurant that gives you a choice of fish. (Wild caught Cod, Salmon, or Halibut.) The service was very pleasant on reasonably prompt, considering the fish was cooked to order. The fish was delicious with just the right amount of breading. The chips (fries) were literally a mixed bag. Some of the fried were crunchy throughout, while others felt like they were undercooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg8X1HjGF6NbX4oGlKwMhmCyt3-qk6gDb6HIVI&fid=0x0:0xc9241d3a469b53e4"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Elsie Erickson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzoQRFPC6AIm3YfT6xj3SezT25AZpQij_3tPE_xlTIgr8Wew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am pleasantly surprised that the piece of salmon is fresh, and large. The fries are tasty and fresh. The coleslaw is tasty in a large proportion. A satisfying meal. Unlike years ago when I had a terrible experience, vowing not to go back again. Now I will look forward to a next time. Good job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Justine Thomson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2MSbKDx6KjZ-10-RxrSFngUtYsM2UU_04eqYjMHg1lWVcGm4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think the burger is smaller than other locations. There was lots of fish. It was tasty and the batter wasn’t too heavy. It was made to order so hot and crispy. The bun is a little soggy. The company asks for a 5 star rating to be qualified for a draw….","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pin Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPBWrCcgndfSa0BlC-_bzruu2t6sBDf3wHRkhHhhTOG9JynMOL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A friend told me Pajos was a must try! They were right! I ordered a 1 piece Cod, no fries!
I was give  2 pieces because the server said it was too small a piece!
I was thinking of telling him that no 1 small piece was fine , but thought that would be rude!  I am so glad I took it!
It was so good! I wished I had ordered more!  Will definitely come back next time at the airport !!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terri Mewborn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWIU-8pi4gI4S1D1GfSLUjzkOjLz4DGlBe63k7exooaSk3Cvo3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic cod sandwich with freshly it French fries. The fish was a big portion, cooked just right and not the slightest bit greasy. It came with tomato and a delicious Cole slaw. Fries also perfect. Service was fast and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1_5r2wSORgEDmVJAtg0P9hvwzkf8QRfNTDyVG&fid=0x0:0xc9241d3a469b53e4"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Preston Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOj3VqEcCHnvHUuhNY5eqGH_R4h_pFwoRif2Okt2tzMhf0iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I'm going to give it a pass because it's the airport so you can't expect much, but the batter was soggy with zero crisp and completely falls off the dry fish. Placed on top of soggy fries which makes it just a basket of mush. I've been to the other Pajo's but don't recall it being this bad. Very disappointing and honestly an embarrassment to real fish and chips, especially at these prices. Should have taken it back for an explanation but didn't have time to argue with the cashier. I guess it was my own fault to give this place a chance. Don't be like me. Just go to Wendy's, at least you know they won't screw a burger up.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jaros Hatajlo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3TJ-D70hqx6vAibtk4HfV0LjfUlBizHhjF73i2_dLryuiqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered early the morning for birthday party. Ordered a large amount of food but was on time and the driver was very friendly. I appreciate them getting our party fed :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lou V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIY3HJq7E8QnqnUZdbDRwlHUKeNhuZ1-b9Geq5FIq8Pv74plg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did a take out…pizza was delicious . My to go to now instead of others","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyoTwQewkqf8bKnrmrjzla9hRBBHyA8O1b24F9\u0026fid=0x0:0x42fdfb6e1b6ff156"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The pizza here is not bad but also not spectacular. I tried the Manhattan pizza. I commend them that it did do the New York pizza bend/flop. Standard domino's quality and flavour. Acceptable fast food pizza kinda thing but far from gourmet. Good that they are open late though and very affordable as it does satisfy late night cravings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwyOmXADq63xTCIti5XAniwz1qCajjJLBjPgSw\u0026fid=0x0:0x42fdfb6e1b6ff156"],"When":"2021-4-24"},{"Name":"Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqRwI_N5-jlH21SdZ5KzhdsDV_6bnCmnnvRAc7A0vTSwLG2a0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried their cheesy breadsticks, lava cake and the brownie. The bread was super tasty. The lava cake and the brownie was tasty as well but I do wish the brownie wasn't this thin.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpDyWo570SJ5_GP45PAK2sULZokx9_QCbq0Squ\u0026fid=0x0:0x42fdfb6e1b6ff156"],"When":"2021-1-29"},{"Name":"Shannon Barrows","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuQay_bX36cYazKkaJdpB95Qulmpo-OW1OaMGER5DfDhif5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had my daughter's birthday at Steveston Park and I wanted to have pizza delivered for the kids. Not only was ordering online via their app, super easy, but the service was fantastic. The app texted me to say when the driver was on the way, let me know who I could expect, texted again when he was in the area and then texted to say he was just pulling up. The order was exactly on time to when I asked for it to be delivered and the driver was friendly and courteous. Such prompt service! My order was exactly as I had ordered it and was delicious!! Thank you so much.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colleen Welsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgTLvbCHlDky6wD6vbvjVgAopATo8ead_hs8Di8vJmcEg_Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was hot, delicious, and looked almost picture-perfect! The driver was prompt and friendly. I am happy that I chose to order from this location!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGGrjlqsBxN5RAUy0ndjk5NqopJxdTleiH97oq8AsqJq8V8vox=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I wish I could give a higher rating as I actually really like their pizzas. I use their online ordering system. However when it tells me my order is ready for pickup, I drive over(2 min away) and find it's actually not!?!? Even though the order board says it ready! They often forget to make all of my order and I end up waiting 10-15min. Super frustrating!This happens about 25% of the time. Sadly time to drive a bit further for my pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfFATkJKdfUIqdCJSKGncmvepXmMFiG73H4DxT\u0026fid=0x0:0x42fdfb6e1b6ff156"],"When":"2019-11-22"},{"Name":"Sam A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzasCO_72NiH72meDrFNSwNmbwSDlxPyxPEvwoiO1YQmpt4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been a customer here for over a decade. The quality, management, and customer service has deteriorated so much in the past few years. Two employees working on March 12, 21:00 hiding in the back on their phones while customers were calling out from an unattended counter for about 15  minutes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8iymi484-Nqvk1A9qYeBCIzCk45XQhp9dB9RD\u0026fid=0x0:0x42fdfb6e1b6ff156"],"When":"2024-3-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cindy Hum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjH4N1rUDuOjyITDJwDvm4_wy9Fp9A0z3RcKXLo05agI102hxxCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Due to a cancelled flight, we had received a few meal vouchers and decided to spend it here. The staff was extremely patient and kind with us to help us maximize the value use of our vouchers, while being efficient to sort out our order (as there was a line beginning to form behind us). Despite our large order, we got our food very quickly and everything was delicious (especially given airport food standards).

A huge thank you to the staff for being kind to folks stuck in a bit of a bad situation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdoH7tWzrpeDbN7Jcv6rHIQ6JJGO0XE2zKkiRp&fid=0x0:0x5256710820561aba"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Ken Klatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB-1oiqzMhWKjUmFzUOOtexvucd3Jb1cxEjKIq4ksYwtPJuDs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"we are vegan and appreciate that there’s a separate vegan menu plus the server understood our dietary needs

We purchased two vegan hotdogs and yakisoba

All entrées were fresh, nicely presented, and very tasty

Felt good value for money

Noticeably the staff were very engaging and radiated a level of customer appreciation","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGTSAEgF5k4l3iVHQCbpAkUb6f3vq7F80Pl4Y&fid=0x0:0x5256710820561aba"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Alice R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnNxgS9DX-y3gmgAxmhqj178o3S78D2kd6IJ7JcGENqcpufQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a chicken tempura japadog while waiting for my flight at the airport. This place was quite popular and there was a long line.
I was surprised when I got my order that it seemed to be more of a chicken cutlet than chicken tempura. It's strange, as they also have chicken cutlet on the menu, but it was sold out.
The chicken was dry and the bread was dry. There was some egg salad in the japadog which was the best part of the meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrjsBEHUEz4qDN2vYdG-sKTah7R37efj064Sd3&fid=0x0:0x5256710820561aba"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Dominic Ling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9TLZnKngGx2XLsIrFLiNanjwuW-QA60CyuZbYIsfUONjJ0THx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always love getting a japadog here when I have a flight. Their shake fries are pretty good too! I like the okonomiyaki dog.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhwceeGYXXRMtt0AZrFIAi2Jd5xFSPl4QG0vry&fid=0x0:0x5256710820561aba"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"F S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX1VgSBxFf1DGK-_fl7n-1oSdnhtggoinMp9TVXEBHG8BhAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not recommend the sobameshi. It was pre-prepared and heated up in the microwave and not even to a temperature that I would call lukewarm. The beef was dry probably due to it sitting in the fridge for an unknown amount of time. Really disappointing experience. Would recommend A&W next door as an alternative as my spouse's burger came out piping hot, juicy, quicker than mine and way more flavourful!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We needed a snack so decided to grab a Japadog at the Outlets.  We ordered a Wagyu Terimayo and a Kurabuto Terimayo.  The hot dogs themselves were good but really in the future I would not go for the wagyu as it was no better than a Costco all beef dog.  The toppings were yummy.
The matcha milk shake was good.  Ume Shu cocktail was smooth.  I had wanted a Samurai Rock but they were out of ingredients.  They did say they were working on a new cocktail menu. Overall a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrndmcdYd_f3EbeHATZHuE4Fg2wRoU6xiGew5w&fid=0x0:0x5256710820561aba"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Raffy Pampolina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9lQ5cn5rz8GeacLwHcVBCcldT657JkqKVX82MgdYTfCqZYDl_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food quality has deteriorated.   The tonkatsu was hard(old) and burnt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjOLoySwTAydXaNsnHrUivhOFj0zu6qYMUQdA&fid=0x0:0x5256710820561aba"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"dontwaitdate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCZPFSiQScCR-Y1IS1KF_sgjAy1UyFnUADJqIdKko1jmZlsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Heard rave reviews but didn’t had a chance to check it out until I was about to leave Vancouver. It didn’t disappoint - love the soft fluffy bun holding the hotdog and its condiments. The dessert was a delight - sesame ice cream complimented the crunchy sweet, deep fried dough. Still dreaming about it now that I’m back home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV3VMJooTliFLdMg-Ms__GIHXOjv8OhA2TR-VJ&fid=0x0:0x5256710820561aba"],"When":"2023-11-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Simon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOzCJOO3IVWZeCzELdLvqwOZsNU3zAiUC8rrf-PGUawu7PavQB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Recently ordered the mix shawarma wrap / sandwich that came with a side of potatoes which was warm and got cold pretty quickly.   I cannot say that this experience was very satisfying.  Portion was not filling especially for almost $20 bill to foot.  Its not very tasty and is not the kind that would make you want more.  Donair is unfortunately far more superior.  I would like to see the portion increased and the flavour increased a little to really bring out the flavours in the meat.  My two cents you are free to try it 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnU5o1BUEfZSz717DoINC87E3UOT0XZwQky9K8&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"SweetNSpicyLiving","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2ajsu4e_PYiQu0KngKOy6ImBVQVFcT2XuaCxaGNshbDxPpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Basha have a small space in Richmond Center food court. I went and tried their Beef Shawarma Wrap for the first time. I was surprised how flavorful it was, definitely exceeded my expectation.
The service was quick and the staff were very nice. The dish are priced reasonably too with decent portion size. Highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRPcL-vpz68yMKEAlh7AGxeYk2JywKB1xuYd9Y&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Pino Canada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNwip4Np41ja9JrCjifiuKLPTSKnhIf0wG1Hpwg9BQQ5ojxeo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is good quality for food court. Chicken plate was nice. The beef kebab was over cooked and burnt outside. It was chewy and hard to eat. However overall, it was ok for food court quaity.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfAXX-D92ZD33iPqzV8LhWPwyr-khva4Kgrofs&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2024-12-27"},{"Name":"Foroozan Nobakht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRGxJQVDLxl2XQtPIOF9jEuvULqqilwDSVR4Ky-5JTkDJGREc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently bought a beef shawarma sandwich from this restaurant, and it was awful. Every bite had a big piece of fat, which was disgusting. I couldn't even finish it. I do not recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs6Ugz47L1LGY8foL8IM2Mc-lyimWooJJ9DMlP&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Vipin Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT50cgktpApBPjWAYGyhFVZCVNAsaS2Walp_G2PL-dgGyln8ah=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at BASHA Restaurant in Richmond Center's food court and had a delightful experience. The grill chicken plate and chicken shawarma were both outstanding, with flavors that left a lasting impression. The staff's friendly demeanor added to the overall positive atmosphere, making it a memorable dining experience. I highly recommend trying their dishes for a satisfying meal in the heart of Richmond Center.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkOScaI9mM6aVOZqssxdFLRXxOKzZOzNySWOmY&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Humphrey Yeh (Huffy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIVx8OtVUpsFeUSPRn2npx9O9hyqxwfV_3dMVkP3VSQ6bTPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The hanging grill is just for exhibition. I got the meat all from the frying pan and are black and dried. They didn't cut any fresh meat from the grill...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZwluFU4M0uXNZh1wdXCUQwOrpOeYCh55PsmRN&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Iris Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1iwoRm-sUZfzxB_8Ci6eehDD44eHj6hnjbcRICVKDc6o-xwIz1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located in the Richmond Centre food court where the old U-Grill used to be. Was very excited to try it out when I saw all the types of salads they offer. When you order a platter, you can choose whether to get the traditional rice, potatoes, salad and dips OR choose 4 of the various salads OR a mixture of both options. I went for the calamari platter and got potatoes, cole slaw, beet salad and roasted veggies. All the food was very delicious and the batter of the calamari was fried perfectly! Pretty decent price for the portions. Will be back to try some of the other menu items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq90zGE6R-k5jp5v_c6bEzrToJuT_YqA4TKjWv&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Jamila Starokha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO1rZO45Pu5Bl0r38OPCglS8qCglk4MAfvl5Vo0Kp25kRf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have finally found a place where I can taste and enjoy real shawarma in the doner style! For those who miss the authentic taste of Turkish doner, I highly recommend BASHA. The flavors are spot on, and the quality is exceptional.

Eggplant lovers, this place is our paradise! They serve the most delicious, well-cooked eggplants that perfectly complement the shawarma. If you're craving a taste of Turkey, look no further. BASHA Richmond Centre is a must-visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYCqIZ8OtcLM55lDnpfAW3n86MF7_nP0pWGTU&fid=0x0:0x8a098dadc74101dc"],"When":"2024-8-8"}]

You gotta be careful not to be blocking pedestrians and on coming vehicles. Late summer nights are always hectic here. But there is plenty of parking since other businesses here operate day time only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBNAfdxrJQmsxOZa26-wR7cf5egYDTkO7Srf-x&fid=0x0:0x83fd5b2f4a3a58b8"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this MC because they have a good and yummy chicken burger and ice coffee
I think it is the best MC in this area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd6lW9xNmOKfoohpI-Y3-QkeTj2Kh0tUgybtyg&fid=0x0:0x83fd5b2f4a3a58b8"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Vahid Movahhed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5Z6qg3Fw2WFxbsq2JCrN4NgXlzSuLhpcO1AOPUf0rKKGKqAdo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came this place after a long day working. I was so hungry . Was first time in this place. SAM is one of best managers in Vancouver McDonalds branches . Thanks for your service 🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9Lgk6oRB5D9SKac1sFM8mdachXLnf-iBQqfK9&fid=0x0:0x83fd5b2f4a3a58b8"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice clean, newer McDonald's. Seems to be focussed more on take out as seating inside is quite limited. Parking is not bad, but busy as it is a shared space with a few garages in the same mall.
Food and service were good, typical McDonald's.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jake H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNwkGEI6SJQvyWB1W9ltu164-lYv1DS8pwW5sT-OvREiA_uw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Menu said $5.79 for a sausage McMuffin with egg and they tried to charge me $8.99. I told them that the menu said $5.79 and they said that was without egg but the picture showed it with egg. They asked me to take a picture and show it to them so I did. Then they wouldn’t honour the menu price. I wonder how many people they scammed before I pointed it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZpv4edNOGTY5e6Eqyj5k0d83YTVnm2Rg3JonS&fid=0x0:0x83fd5b2f4a3a58b8"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Aman Jangu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKER_I91McUqfyWfqQlMdNFwg51MBjpLf5k81LKR9_z0lmCEGU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff at this location is very rude they don't bother if you are waiting as a customer you have to call them few times before they take your order they are only happy to serve drive thru customer on priorty if you call them they say we are packing your order when you haven't ordered yet.
Worst service ever.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rjk Sinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXLmMIw3IFKjkCcr_Y7hfuqWtQXprcb7_MC8VgL2j0pJc-wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This McDonald's was very busy during the morning rush, yet customers appeared to be receiving their orders promptly. The restaurant was very clean and seemingly spotless, despite the high foot traffic. The staff seemed happy and genuinely enjoyed working at this location and chatting up to make the job more enjoyable. I ordered a Double Bigmacs poutine and Chicken Wrap with 2 drinks, both of which met my expectations. The picture I took is from the evening same say.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPQq_eLezNQFnN_vw68hhxfgU5Jy-yt4g3whJU&fid=0x0:0x83fd5b2f4a3a58b8"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Christopher C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYkMauUcxeEq0OtNvB68OCOu6tprvEXgDnoYl_gmduOos6JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Little hidden gem of a patio. I might be here everyday when the weather improves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKjbgWFY8I7i716xM84Xbc1UspoASvrlGaO4gj&fid=0x0:0x83fd5b2f4a3a58b8"],"When":"2024-10-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justin Morales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqn2vD0E5uq0fG2YxWJjNd1TsCaZwtTBVhm85oaOYUa1rEBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When I go here I always get spicy chicken patties and regular chicken patties and they were always so good.

Tonight was a bit disappointing, the regular chicken that I bought was TOO CRIPSY and it tasted BURNT. They usually give me golden brown not burnt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQyKmo2VxcpfEq9l9YyOVm8PD40ZupGJgFzu4G&fid=0x0:0x622aac2934e320c8"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"andrei carrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpN6FQ_ZsXAN4g7k2qwg63fM6qc_JLXD42r_C5qfmAIB6zVNc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I told them No tomato, and they we’re calling it out to the Crew that the burger is “No tomato” but they added it anyways
I dont mind removing it off my burger but if this was another person who’s actually allergic to something, it would be really bad.

Please fix this behaviour and dont be lazy and do your jobs!

On top of that its way too expensive for  burger 15 for a meal is absolutely crazy, its almost a full hour of someone’s Hourly wage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjqQCOiucr_qQ6iWH7DiB9bDCPSVPCRnlXF1ZP&fid=0x0:0x622aac2934e320c8"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Merle Langlois","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZnruGVXm60ftapBuESQGQtjZaF1P3OYbvdZyq6WrVWTjNEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to this Wendy's since ancient times. I once saw a cabinet minister here. I ordered a salad once and they gave me a free frosty. Today I ordered chicken strips and it took forever and they offered me a free frosty.

The managers who have been here for a long time are super efficient and professional.

There are some individuals here due to the bus stop though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOKMhcgsMkjPZTPsa5k-F6xTCEpV7KocF1HGZ5&fid=0x0:0x622aac2934e320c8"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Shawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjDFHDIcbtV_DjbplKljLcAMOcHcimjCyqMXoLTCCbOhYL58Lu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"On the side of what is basically a highway is a Wendy's where the food is barely average and the staff let their machines beep endlessly. Eating area is filthy and the drink fountain area doesn't include straws nor forks.

Video attached doesn't properly show how loud these beeps are, but they can be heard from even outside the restaurant.

What a joke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPamxa4jruVp1D5_Ba2wgemfJj3gXrmTMO3zb1-&fid=0x0:0x622aac2934e320c8"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I gotta be honest, the burgers are way better than McDonald’s. I rather come here for jbc’s instead of McDoubles. Plus the baconator is quite impressive and addicting. Service can be a hit or miss here.

But Wendy’s coffee doesn’t stand a chance. There’s always coffee grinds in the hot coffee. For the ice coffee’s they have a weird after taste to them… maybe it’s the cream or syrup…

Plenty of parking all around. This one has a drive thru. Unfortunately it’s not a 24 hour drive thru.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4QqmmQyWBy26TMrsRGfG2RsVr7ff5sgBd6v5_&fid=0x0:0x622aac2934e320c8"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Evamae Bennett-Doerksen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLC2x82OWI32IGJ-lmd2V8iN8-wx2st1ytsecq0ow1x4Ma2lA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I only the grilled chicken wrap combo but it doesn't look like the photo and thay chep out on the cheese","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9By33M7sb9OlJZ7ynzknoiqgOvy_8K5WuYnsJ&fid=0x0:0x622aac2934e320c8"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Dylan D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs93jszeFFscNEtx5h0QN63fK2LAK9Y2edFkGxRs9jp39yXCE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I usually don't review, but I've been going to this location for about 2 years and just recently, at 11:40pm. I get my 2 dave single burgers, and the first one is pristine and delicious, best in town. The second one legit tasted like coffee?!?! i take off the lettuce, tomatoes and onions to see if it was that, nope still the patty, its as if they dunked it in coffee and tried to get away with it. Un-freaking-real.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly and helpful staff.  Food was made fresh and to order. The restaurant and washroom were kept clean during lunch time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYMz-ZLYyodpI0ogNeQKxpFFlC0SusM-ghMoIF&fid=0x0:0x622aac2934e320c8"],"When":"2024-3-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shivam Goel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCujVO_zwaIEZ2-rzH0DEH05p6iI4jS4eFHO8ajTSdYY5Lphcb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve always enjoyed McDonald’s muffins and usually start my day with one. Today, however, was a huge disappointment. I bought a muffin from your store, and when I opened it at home and cracked open the top (something I always do), I was shocked to find mold inside. It was disgusting and completely ruined my appetite.

This is unacceptable for a brand I’ve trusted for years. Proper quality checks need to be in place to ensure food safety. I hope this issue is taken seriously so it doesn’t happen to anyone else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdnxZ-s0n-AZ4sYXObW7FI_hW177oEIbVD-N57&fid=0x0:0x969d9f1f5092858d"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Farida I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNMTkKwdOMr4ub_wKd9GYVELWT4EByE1UnnnWA19O9vpX_Flsy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This location is bustling with customers and kids. There is one man that takes care of all the cleaning, and he does an efficient job. The staff are friendly and make due even when it's busy. But I have to wonder what happened to my McChicken? There was barely any sauce on the one bun and absolutely nothing on the other. Would have been very dry if I had not asked for more McChicken sauce on the side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf-8yO2UqL6TtZqKIBMRePWXuCmJOX6QjcnIsa&fid=0x0:0x969d9f1f5092858d"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The graveyard workers are very hard working here. This is not an easy job at this time when people are sleeping.

I always pull up before midnight from time to time and I always always have excellent and consistent service from 2 staff members.

But for some reason anytime I pull up before 8pm there’s this one staff member who is really young, that always can’t get my order right. I literally have to take a breath each time I encounter this young lady. I just find it amazing that she is the only one who can’t plug in my mobile codes and expects me to pay regular price instead, while everyone else that I have encountered can get the job done.
I have to get a manager every time she serves me lol. 😌 just smile it off I guess…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXzGJtffBZ0a7Tgtg8kMuZq2bJ4Ja1oG2I8MeE&fid=0x0:0x969d9f1f5092858d"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"ulysses886","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnXtv6bvlFUG79fgUrdKZ9sf3n7-k7H4bBhS7h9YOiaQhj2HlZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a dill pickle mcshaker fries, they asked me to pull over at pickup no.1. Gave me the bag, found out there's no shake powder but medium fries and 3 bags of ketchup. Even the receipt stated dill pickle mcshaker fries. How can you screw that up so easily? 😑","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Ali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ6kukrZ23qcHPPvq-zSmY0-9R1E7azJ8rDWbGa9xMeRZHcSy6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Numerous empty and UNCLEAN tables. Bathroom is gross (toilet unflushed, mess everywhere). Food was prompt - but we took it to leave. At least hand sanitizer would have helped a little. 🫥","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jason lal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKF3aLyTFUBWDSiIk2LeNxQeqkAkFou4xfRp1nSSbfardq8Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to McDonald today I have nothing but bad experiences at this McDonald. The people working there are so straight. I ordered 2 different orders and both codes go thru. When u get to paying they tell you it’s not possible and you should know. I think McDonald should update the app and not leave it to the customers and to looked embarrassed in front of everyone. I also think McDonald needs to go back to basics. Customers first instead of fill out pocket of $. They Owen 5 McDonald’s stop being selfish.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B Farzady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyHfR_5RZB4l7JmSTyH8olYJPFcaZ7zrcodY75iXSmu50rUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This Mcdonalds is packed. Drive thru lines out so far some parking spaces are blocked. Super busy dining room. Small kids play area. Very busy location. I had trouble finding parking. That busy. Maybe due to construction around this location also another one further towards Richmond on Marine is closed for renos. But with all of that. They got my food up quickly. Got my order right. So kudos to the staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Катерина Нікіфорова","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5aqpGhni2OHlr2HVumkdvy-rhhuiIkrht0yHlcZlCOzkrn6eB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was the worst burger I've ever had at a McDonald's. Dirty tables","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOELHig1Og5R2LqyiMb40cgupOsWkJ6hUKOTkm&fid=0x0:0x969d9f1f5092858d"],"When":"2024-10-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had an exceptional experience at Popeyes Louisiana Chicken on Steveston Highway. The boneless wings in the super tasty garlic parmesan sauce were amazing—crispy, flavorful, and perfectly seasoned. The original chicken sandwich was excellent, boasting juicy, tender chicken with just the right amount of crunch. To top it off, the strawberry pie was a delightful treat, sweet and delicious. The friendly staff made the visit even more enjoyable, providing excellent service with a smile. I highly recommend this location for anyone craving mouthwatering chicken and a pleasant dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMicuQ3oDa9IQaWGAps4UapX70_HwDxyY9sUeW&fid=0x0:0xa6c20905383d89cc"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Manar Almahmoud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ63gLfgkh-jgjNd7m_PmSWRRpjeTRhXFLkdRmRz14gc95Eew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have ordered a family meal because I have a big family and it’s more affordable to just get the family meal, however I have realised that they are adding smaller chicken pieces more often. But today when the lady came to give us our order one of the managers took the order again and exchanged some of the bigger pieces into smaller one. That was very disappointing. We are paying a lot for this food just for you to exchange the big pieces into smaller once. It just does not make any sense. The big piece you can see in the photo was literally just a back bone with some skin and we had a lot of hair those in our family meal. We are paying for chicken pieces for just a bone covered with skin","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIgwAcAglNvfPpUg2aIEqHJYOuLNGXh3gviJbk&fid=0x0:0xa6c20905383d89cc"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Krishna Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_LtallXvOKYnskPNOmFnzG1S0WHbDEDmi_S7_Pkh91OX4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience at Popeyes! The food was fresh, hot, and delicious. The fried chicken was crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, and the signature spices really set it apart. The staff was friendly and efficient, and my order was prepared quickly even during a busy time. Overall, the quality of the food and the service was top-notch. I’ll definitely be returning soon for another meal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo5sPZ67s_mnhJwZ79b2vBa8twlqYbk9eZujv14dBdLN9-xEyftw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for families. Chicken is crispy without the grease. Love the biscuits as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzbxf5kLiNLdkpN24LTzTXo7spWSgIQpUA9tEC&fid=0x0:0xa6c20905383d89cc"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"VIRENDER Shira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPxW1V2O03e-pypKytBxFd0I7nNpX3dzNMkr2UlfeyV64Fag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Review for Popeyes by Virender Singh

“I recently visited Popeyes and had an amazing experience! The food was delicious, especially the crispy chicken and the flavorful Cajun fries. The spices in the chicken were just right, not too overpowering but packed with flavor. The staff was friendly and efficient, making sure my order was accurate and served quickly despite it being a busy day. The restaurant was clean and well-organized, creating a comfortable atmosphere for dining in. Overall, a fantastic experience – I’ll definitely be coming back soon for more of that incredible chicken! Highly recommended!”","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"George Pope","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWOT4buaDBkdpS_vUryGUPiE89w51WMvYpy6i_I9dHcO23OeRT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I called ahead to reserve a bank of tables for a group I was bringing in. Chanez, the manager, was ever so helpful. Telling me it'll be done as asked; if I wanted I could call on the morning of, to check/confirm.

I showed up late after a few of my guests had already arrived.  Chanez had seated them & provided them complimentary sides and drinks to occupy them until I showed up, when we all put in our orders, & I paid.

The service was the best part of this visit, but the food was in no way lacking.  We each got a nice plate of chicken plus side(s) & drinks, & I ordered some of the unique sides they had (Cajun Cauliflower, deep-fried pickles) for sharing.  Portions were very nice -- appropriate to the prices.

10/10 would return & recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Puneet Bawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJUi8CUHRqyrxYtrARdNJ5TER9HXMiI5GRhf-ctQC_yPS_PMdL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited there first time with friends and there service was really good and fast. The cashier who took my order may be Jasleen gave very good customer service and recommended me the good food according to my choice. I will definitely visit again and recommend it to others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP11QXQfIVWAhWUiERKGilc3OClVW0OsK0D50xB&fid=0x0:0xa6c20905383d89cc"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Selena Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0EC9c8psjA6bh8C_Q6wZgZRd59sCeugm8i39RKUNh9oU721h9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super good customer service, food is always at the same quality, extremely good quality!!!!!!! Better than any other fried chicken places!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTnxe3rYocCVdrIP0nL5fsX88Yg6wQhpYD76jh&fid=0x0:0xa6c20905383d89cc"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Navjot kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGDkz5XR1JP5n7YRAnhdCXTHm8MTGhaMou9MFkJOUDySnV5M0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went there(domestic terminal Subway) today around 5:30 PM, and the Filipino lady was very rude. She didn’t even greet me properly. I’ve been to this place many times before, and the behavior is always the same. She really needs to work on her customer service. Additionally, while preparing my sub, she was taking sauces for her own food without asking if I wanted any or if it was okay to take them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"guru kiran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk_xLgOBENqlV2QWP1Y_qLgeTuldggLctZjzi1u4qwAIO5ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited this location today around 2:30 or 3:00 am. I am working at airport and the lady working this time was so rude. She looks like south asian or Korean. I was asking veggie sub and she just melting the cheese and not putting patty in there. When I asked her to put patty then she started giving lecture that you should told me before when I was melting cheese. I didn’t said anything and also the way she wrapped was so bad. After opening the sub, all sauces were dripping out. I eat subway in different locations and tried this one first time and having worst experience ever.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Farr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcVJIoCTV8GHMjKF0lGps11UnDU0-7X9tpsmaJ3ten6n-ivms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast, considerate and delicious. My server even cut each sub in 2 halves and wrapped separately in case we wanted half now and half on the flight. No complaints. I ignored previous 1 star reviews and I recommend you do too :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUoS-b6tImQTguv1XRqMuP4oQUk7bOh3RIpRo9&fid=0x0:0x8a3f55dd0eba5944"],"When":"2022-8-8"},{"Name":"Raja Singh Gujral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9D8R1D1WsDi-llKvubkZPZNLJDwAJZUB0ziCf8UTjfSD1qJqy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Highly unprofessional staff. I visited on 5May2023 around 6-7pm. First they did not allow to apply any promotion, then they overcharged me (two staff, one Indian Punjabi and other seemed like Philippine). Later when I realised and told them that I will complain to the authorities, they got scared and started pointing each other that she charged. Later the extra charge was refunded. But seemed like they do this all the time and god knows how many have ended paying extra to them. Poor service and highly unprofessional staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwlzD5w0LOsLdyHGyM5bML7CCleHTI9ZsS7lQ0&fid=0x0:0x8a3f55dd0eba5944"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"K L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmazoVbc4qwEPyfFRziakE4ZngVryIZrsL5ALsK7KBKq_ITPw0UQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to the location during night time, service was quick and friendly and ingredients were very fresh. Our sandwich artist was very generous with the toppings. Did not expect to have such a great subway experience at an airport.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbKCymACkwFznIU1CsC6pD4KsFm2DN4PbPMbI5&fid=0x0:0x8a3f55dd0eba5944"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Sapphire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGEHLOY-WdONB-whVmNu24yMNoxEL-kFBQMOZdeRRcHoNtreo4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bit stingy. The lady working there acted like I was asking for the biggest favor in the world when I wanted half my sub toasted then said just kidding when I asked why it was an issue. Way to make it awkward…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nishat Asif","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2yvmp_T5arLtKiMWu770dgNE9f0xTrk_n0RTBDZP8jNzv6n1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don’t understand why Subway is hiring people who don’t care to work. This was my worst experience at this outlet. Staff is least bothered, rude and has no answers to any of our enquires. There is one Punjabi girl, who could neither respond in English nor Hindi. I think she doesn’t want to work. Why is the employer making her work.. Hire someone who is more interested in working. Then there was this other South Asian employee, whom when we told to wrap the subway separately, became annoyed at us. We are paying for the food and service, not taking it free. I would have given them a ZERO star if I could. Also, SUBWAY should educate their employees on the Vegan products, whether the cheese also is Vegan or not.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raman Madara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY3WDoggr0uz70DtkhTI9xWhp9lZIqvKTZoizWTuTV1xJAF9afzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today around 1:30 i visit International side to order there were three ladies working and they all were not interested in taking the order,
I was waiting and they looked at me and then ignored
Like seriously they don’t want to take my order whyy they have so much attitude,
They didn’t  say hi.
The staff is not good
And my friend when she went to order they start arguing with her","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Suman Bilkhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgOEqlVcR-SHJwu_c7T9FCQhKLIbhYsmGic_lANm34xi4hCfo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not eat here! Rude and incapable staff. I ordered my daughters extremely basic veggie delight toasted with extra cheese  4 vegetables salt and pepper. Wow what a struggle..she puts on the fresh mozzarella..not sure if that’s what you get when you say extra cheese. When I asked her to please use the regular cheese she rolled her eyes and and took it off and threw it back into the cheese bin.
For myself I ordered a foot long tuna on multigrain bread . I specifically said no cheese and please just toast the bread before making the sandwich. She starts putting cheese so I stopped her and then she put tuna. I asked her again to please toast the bread before she put in the tuna. She was so upset huffing and puffing and then scrapped off the Tina back into the bin and toasted it.
I didn’t have any extravagant requests after that but she was so upset because I asked for extra pickles she only added 5 over the entire sandwich. As you can see she just threw them into 1 half of the sand was she did with everything else. She put all the tuna in one side and scraped it across so I had 1/2 a sandwich with some toppings and some missing and the other half overflowing with everything I asked for.
I would highly suggest finding another subway to go to. This is unprofessional and not subway quality!
See pictures for exactly what I mean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV4ooGIxTC6NelPB3ozsK6cTEDbgG99uXqYMIN&fid=0x0:0xc2e1313e8e5a8f9c"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered a veggie delite and Mozzarella Bella and both subs were made just like they looked in the advertisement with a generous amount of toppings. Delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ7AmDHAkhLZqIpImNt1mHUZnMhda7t66weJm0&fid=0x0:0xc2e1313e8e5a8f9c"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"han darren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDvBwVeJ2A14pHPpRNl1FPiKXibHWH_Qrxz5Ks6jOxFqltFvo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There is some problem with “no tips” bottom of the card machine. It automatically tips around 20% . When I told this to the employee, the only reply is “I don’t know”. Also I came at 10:40 and trying to dine in. She said you only have 5 minute. And keep repeating “we almost close” Are you suppose to open until 11?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMakjDock-ICydBIuQ8ZpLY-Bd2xgDO4EPVfpih&fid=0x0:0xc2e1313e8e5a8f9c"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Norm Nilsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-fznecgztxGizn4vKMYOzpUYz3Y-2cjpO4BFrdfJPa9uFWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have always been treated very with the two girls, NAV and Harmeet, they gave amazing customer service. I recommend this place to everyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mehran Meets World","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGX-1vHIbmT-pBZJH0-rDXoHHwiYEEQdSvlIdVEnIQgEvv0DJh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went in to order food. The washroom was so dirty, I cleaned it for them cause I felt bad.

The person working was a lady in her 40’s , looked like the owner or manager cause she didn’t wear subway shirt like the other.

She was doing an online order at the same time and kept asking me the same damn questions.
I thought she was doing it deliberately.

Using the same disposable gloves between multiple orders and touching cash register/debit machine.

My order was finished and right before I payed she moved onto an online order which came in after me and she tried to sort out a confusion.
Waited an extra 3-5 minutes before I had to ask her to focus on one order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBjZVF3Pl895L0ZQDVB6A3p7X29lida3RcgiGX&fid=0x0:0xc2e1313e8e5a8f9c"],"When":"2021-10-15"},{"Name":"Mike Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoqn_iR_3PM6GGzA2FqPY26mDSGqRsmnZCeczjwdSGv1olrno=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The Indian server does NOT know the WiFi password, and her reason was: not told.

Well, your manager needs to train you better then, what a shame…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Si","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwFPJbQK9VMk3AVKlUMDY20-wkL7FLAG8kM4Tr309QhzsDZzHK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff and good hours. I was greeted with a smile by Nav who worked an almost 14 hour shift (I came in close to closing) but she still had so much positive energy and was very accommodative. 11/10 service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evelyn Hawkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7JCZUogv07oImmwC_kCiJSIWx6snZ5YKbR3KXvtj048Pe9R9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Exstreamly rude staff and poor trained. My partner and I went in our lunch break . The staff took my order and completely ignored my partner didn't ask of we wanted order a second snadwhich. Staff need actually have some common sense and manners , utterly ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I gave them 4 star because the calamari and salad that i ordered was blunt. It does not taste the same as the other times i ordered it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVqf9xViPoOAe1Ju1ySbSKX-hOpfkAXvdJZZDQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xed06fc58a303ebde"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Shein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwwWGF_5HRniJ1qR_bfNHQziNJXJFUh4_mEI4T4kV59x90jtyUiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice clean restaurant and wonderful staff. We love coming here and will continue to do so","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkf4XTtWWyUvaXeeV1tWMCJWf-hAGiP2nFL5a-S26WLHYKcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered takeout Calamari and Cesar salad the food was amazing the calamari was so tender salad perfect.  Will go back for sure. The staff so friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Someone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV0xC3QM8xWRw865yA6MG24-6zdpAbPyW3HpoiQtv-7zdFCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Opa is my go to fix for healthier lunch options. Some places do it better than the others and I appreciate your help Kiran and Satish. The employee working on 16th evening and the manager did an amazing job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU013h56BWbSQR2BVcwTIAyp30f7d3_77spZTgxKR0SWt3HMOLM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not sure if it’s just me but this location does it better than the Richmond centre food court location. The pita was perfect. The shrimp was grilled perfect (not overcooked / rubbery). Was so solid I almost forgot it’s a fast food franchise","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM03FhecosmS3YP_gL_jhpU3si-4lTPk7mYnMoR\u0026fid=0x0:0xed06fc58a303ebde"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Kranky Frog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_mdxm1jbn_NlUjCiE_Aqbk8e6lJAZdB_JgpN-54ts6wCM2B-j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I come to this place often, they underwent new management just recently. I appreciate how clean it is under the new Management. Today I order via mobile app, come to say i was very disapointed with the food. First off the lamb was cold and overcooked. The overcooked part has happened before, but never has it been cold. Also the tomatoes are slimy and bad. I beleive they are ready for compost.  I used to come on a regular basis. I think i will go elsewhere from now on. The quality of the food has dropped alot since the new management.\n\nAnd to the Opa HQ comment below, you know how to get ahold of us reviewers, so if you really wanted us to share more info, you would reach out to us via email yourself, instead of simply saying it here making ppl think you have tried to resolve the issue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVrOH7irHGAdgXOTBUteIxwJFN7LZFHWQ6Ywq-dO1eJ-Urdega=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We always come to buy the Lamb wrap. They are so yummy. We super friendly and thoughtful。","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Greg Mattson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFrbttlbDAMTrqcEYaEoNGgTXaMwtarCi6C54s9mUz7zEh6gC-iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice lunch of 2 skewers (shrimp \u0026 Chicken) along with pita bread, rice, potato and Greek salad. Seems like it was the manager/owner who served it up, and he was very friendly. Prices are average for this kind of fast food. Bathroom is at the very back, but was clean and looked after. Good experience here, would gladly return.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"larissa sandoval","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHMsnNOyQ-dDeoTnqKIXCM1pOeSc3Hn8eBLvjCMupM9LsN7CuRvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This hidden gem of a mom-and-pop restaurant is truly amazing! Don’t let its location deter you—step inside and treat yourself to a delicious feast made with top-quality ingredients.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPspjAlfA_oOU1jjbYjbJDckIFlZ40v7ewYpe0p&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Colin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7h35ZtHaveCK9eq8-mDb7BmK8EeHfVN1usnvgcw8J_phkrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent genuine service.  Amazing food.  Must try if in the area.  Authentic family owned business.  We tried almost half the menu and will return to try the other half next time!  Hello from Toronto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFpWDAaFywc-M1GnARNYEm3ZiLZel84dlqpgMP&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came on a Saturday at 2pm and there were a few empty tables.

We got a couple of items to share. The food took awhile to arrive by elevator. Be warned it can get quite hot upstairs.

Our favourite was the pide cheese. It was the most visually appealing and also tasted the best. Loved the bread and the cheese combo. Doesn't get better than that. The other ones we tried all tasted similar to it.

I would skip the beef wrap and the pizza and just stick with the pide cheese

We also tried the napoleon and it isn't your standard puff pastry napoleon. It wasn't crispy but it was still made with layered pastry and custard. Not my cup of tea

Overall service was super friendly. Food wise it maybe just didn't suit us. I would say just try the pide cheese or the pide beef if you eat meat. Wouldn't make the trek out to this industrial area just to have it. But if you are at IKEA, it's not a bad place to stop by and try it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkg8zgrTxuLvFhIfDBHfklrMGLaoPmdjKu9vTS&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmKD2bj1fRErBMVVW1HuxjabqkrOQ7Iekj70MVT9jou0uRjgsO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered from Lamajoun for delivery and everything was nicely packaged.

I had the lajajoun beef, chicken thighs (SO FLAVOURFUL and the whole thing was big as my forearm), jingle bread (would also order that again), and basturma (too much of a kick for my mild tastebuds).

I can't stop thinking about those juicy chicken thighs but I look forward to trying more items from their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoaWmKlh8NTgD9VzXD3KmG_CsATfCACYs7Sb42&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Jonathan Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWddQo8wMBJzHSVbZqf3PzuLAF8cbLklc-QzLlTMxdNAQdxIUXqtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sergei was welcoming and friendly, explaining everything on the menu in detail (we only knew of a few Armenian/Georgian dishes) and he even gave us a sample of the basturma while having a pleasant conversation.

Very few other restaurants have staff that interact so nicely with their customers in this way.

In terms of the food itself, it was amazing. I am glad to have found this little eatery tucked away in the middle of a Richmond business park, especially because you cannot get anything like this anywhere in Vancouver. Highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to try something different. Flavours are amazing and recipes are authentic. Will definitely be coming back when we're in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQWpvFTD7b28qykdQWTCxLwMdsgF44Wj_WJBk2&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Amy Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIE3UOROV8NMo87qR9oHXk3F9ay6IRjlJvxzBx_WjoDffL02qA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice restaurant and people! I have not tasted such delicious European food for long time! Strongly recommend it to my friends and colleagues!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTrjp5cifMU9fCr4LjPYa1w63pqo65zrlL4ovs&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a place to discover, for sure a bit out of the way, extremely simple and down to earth. No fancy table, dishes, ambiance, you come here for the food, it is fresh. It is unique and it is amazing, if you have time in Richmond, you must try this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCzFgJhF8EzZ87PcBJ8cxv1gvlxCixqQ3JhW8&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Lina Gozman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt0-rgRow0xVQ7ri60vVSt4shjOmHP0wIlSp3-EBLuYNl7GTxleg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard about this restaurant from several people and was eager to try it. It was definitely worth it—the portions were generous, and the food was absolutely delicious. I will certainly come back here whenever I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmvFqgJalHp56tnWSFn0p8xReFZsKoVgvb4BIP&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-8-26"}]

[{"Name":"Eddy _","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgAbAjye2hnbGKrKeR5bA9jMC1pgyyuF5XGVOPDwlo-amKFXW4Pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was pretty good & portion size was decent but several issues: the tables were not cleaned so food debris everywhere. The trash can was overflowing so there was nowhere to discard disposables post meal. Worst part was there was no soap in the men's washroom... overall, not recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtq24FYgW4rq-15F9IQqLqsnSAOTWPKsFyaQg8&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Raiyan Abir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2qaKwaT55z4b1jsai2OscIEDQTo9mW3p47H7bxiSkS7njZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Manpreet is really a nice sweet person. I always liked their food that’s why I always come back again and again I always came from North Vancouver. But worth it. Highly recommended. Please visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM847fWyTZaSKaNeGLhhLI6-39wsvQuJvnKR7I-&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Adesh Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVDjRIVXUvbzgopQBxLetFxe7e0nHoVpp8i6a6yaIRsftf_XveHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":""I’m extremely disappointed with my experience at Osmow’s. I found a hair in my food, which is completely unacceptable! It’s clear that hygiene and food safety standards are not a priority here. This ruined my entire meal, and I won’t be coming back. If you care about quality and cleanliness, avoid this place. Absolutely unacceptable!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5EHd6WrhhvRdxe_deIJWoaHm4IQ5fwO2PX8Y3&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Cavemancavan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo0DI4xCYv6JOqFu2lbTAM2xAfP9MVOG1jX4q5925hUFXV1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast and polite service, and hours are great if you're looking for late night food and don't want burgers.  They have daily specials which is always good of you want to just get that and turn your mind off, but watch the spice levels.  Even mild has some kick to it, so don't try to be brave and not actually enjoy your meal.  Expect  your food in less than 2 min.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexander Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKntg94WsHup3cVgJBk3yO0jaRf4K-ndL2T0xGy94s_gBQtie8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"At the Osmow's Shawarma Restaurant, my friends and I ordered food and shared a good meal with each other. We ordered the 4-person combo with 2 On-the-rocks rice,  2 wraps and 4 packs of fries. It also comes with 4 drinks.

The food was ok. Service was ok. However, the combo was not enough for 4 people. The fries were overcooked and the portions were small. It was also expensive to buy the food here. Seating was very limited for this restaurant. But, there was no one there except my group on that Friday afternoon so my group could combine the tables to sit all of us.

If I were to come to this restaurant again, I would see if there is anything else to try other than the combo. But, if I am hungry or I want to hang out with friends, then I will go somewhere else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO8TtO5gxgFU8DJ4dW0LIXiiVJ4BARkds39KQH&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2023-12-21"},{"Name":"sng1002001","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTfKdGFrJyL8jc4znhIMXimj1BkuJ1S_SEthxZmoeo2Gf8Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you like your shawarma to have a nice spicy kick, you come to the right place. Different level of spicy hotness that you can choose from. The spiciness blended well with the sauce and the meat.

Staff very friendly. Generous portion of meat and veggie filing. Should have asked for lesser amount of sauce. Otherwise, the food came quickly and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwsU5QQQ_spPebtcz27iBK8Ab0KEFTbEXN80jd&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Alan Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHipm801YuXx_nwQR08mDwxgVkrGTiSd44wrgRS5nULNqTHOov=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place to get amazing Mediterranean food! With a wide variety of toppings, items, sauce, and spice levels ranging from no spice to scorching hot. The service there is very kind and quick. I ordered the chicken saj and it was delicious, it had a large portion of toppings and was Pannini pressed. 11/10 would go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyDwrrqPqcYMWehgO02-MlF1f_ZiMk4CGNQKqQ&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2022-7-1"},{"Name":"Narinderjit Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKXFJeZMzhYFXAl3b3VQsooKSFOHiYKZEZ97iB7HWIQ5uk59w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was very good, with rich and authentic flavour that truly impressed my taste buds. The atmosphere was very good, creating a warm and inviting environment to enjoy the delicious cuisine. Highly recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jason Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo5sPZ67s_mnhJwZ79b2vBa8twlqYbk9eZujv14dBdLN9-xEyftw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is decent but nothing spectacular. No sitting room in the restaurant as it appears to serve more of a takeout clientele. Service was slow as there were only two staff present.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMo34Pmgk9u9mU4GgkKewQqKiscXkAz77J18qDW&fid=0x0:0x522815a284c04cd5"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Aengelo Vargas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAdfdPGG6-Q9gCipXSjZC9qbdUNjC_ihhxrKCgKjdWAwA2eLun=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered chicken drumsticks, and over half of them were raw. Upon calling them and informing them, they initially dismissed my complaint as not understanding why it "tastes" raw because they claim that they "cooked it properly." I told them it does not taste raw. It is literally raw. They then denied a refund and then told me to talk to Uber even though they're the ones who cooked it, and Uber just delivers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV5efEw5F85zouoAeFJyyOUAVTnjRgAWbAO9cv&fid=0x0:0x522815a284c04cd5"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Asiyah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1bZhVBhohOOeFyQrdl3cJPNwWYZs1oea3VbrM3BrOXH0Ofw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there with family (including 2 kids). They enjoyed the food. The burgers onion rings, fries 🍟, spicy chicken wings, fried chicken, it was all yummy. The owner and the waitress personally came to ask if all the food was okay. It was all halal.  The place was super clean. There lots of drink options available. They do not have bottomless refill.

It was quiet, so nice place to be, there are a few parking spots outside, and it was empty so we got a good spot. It is wheelchair accessible. It's a good place to come with older kids. The seating area is quite small, but good enough. There is one washroom there which is also wheelchair accessible.
I would go there again and recommend this place if you like fried chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQDwToxiDWx1hn4DkfhVjnF93DJuoo26rCd-Bm&fid=0x0:0x522815a284c04cd5"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Moe Mahmood Leghari - Realtor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCngNzG1xlIpGxYvxc0BFRlpUhWhW6mAJYWdHjfDafwE6L2RPl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I personally found the food to be delicious. Kudos on the customer service and the place looked super clean. Fried chicken burger wasn't over greasy like some other competitors and the roast chicken burger was tasty too. I wish they had Coca-Cola but not a huge deal since they had other drink options outside of Pepsi. I'll definitely be coming back.

Update from my last visit:

I've visited Hi Five Chicken more than a couple of times . Their owner has been there everytime serving as the cashier. Great service. I ordered dine in and they brought out the food to our table which was a nice touch. I always order the Spicy Roasted Chicken Sandwich which was always amazing. Too bad they serve Pepsi because Coca-Cola Zero would have made it amazing. Overall, it was really worth the vist.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVDXw__N-yxUS31zdCK3_S3qVWtpnT0VPEramk&fid=0x0:0x522815a284c04cd5"],"When":"2023-12-24"},{"Name":"christina liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlu27L7N87N00vEvKyDIHwH6TimVMvDqcE5YhGynDzOQxrLpsN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was here not long ago and my card wasn’t tapping so the manager I think, told me that there was a problem with that batch of cards and told me if I call my bank they would send me a new one and then he made us a fresh batch of drumsticks and he was so nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_tXwae5ZNPnwTIBbkA9-RdZF773gzy-b8feZR&fid=0x0:0x522815a284c04cd5"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"sng1002001","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTfKdGFrJyL8jc4znhIMXimj1BkuJ1S_SEthxZmoeo2Gf8Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decided to try this chain (vs Popeye's) for a change. Had the grilled chicken sandwich meal. I liked the spiciness and the size of the meat in the burger. But the presentation was sad - soggy and flattened. Almost like someone pressed on the sandwich too hard when wrapping it.
My friend had the fried chicken sandwich and it looked way better. Next time should just order the fried food instead of the grilled. The food overall was good and the staff was friendly. This review is biased towards the poor presentation of my sandwich.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIpWxU4g0GdWnmQo5NRBH3k_rnzYsGSR0kGG1m&fid=0x0:0x522815a284c04cd5"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"CK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQjnAjGaa6mIbpiwNL99uaPISusTl9n7OnrjY5MCHmCyQ_oLZI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Store is open till 3am except Monday and Tuesday perfect if you work late or want a late night bite. I usually get the roasted spicy chicken which is delicious and juicy the fried option is good too and they serve only dark meat which is my favourite, the sides like jalapeño poppers and things like that were made to order when I got them it wasn’t sitting under a heat lamp getting dry and stale. Overall got my food fast, workers are kind and food is delicious it’s one of my favourite spots to come.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkFM95idvoMtQbVMT80MC43OWo8qyka0Ex67XD&fid=0x0:0x522815a284c04cd5"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Lam Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUov0bYqjUOkENnYaVrKb_hHIZF5ttjjQX3meUuUvl2Jr0dJOVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Refused to sell me a kids meal because the kid I wasn't buying for wasn't actually with me. It feels like there could be better policy for parents buying for their family. Also played rap with profanity in the restaurant. These things might make a difference for some customers. I'm waiting for my food now which might bump my review up a star. UPDATE: it took a long time on a busy night. It came out really fresh and tasty, so a better choice if you're not in a hurry.","Images":null,"When":""}]
