user_reviews: [{"Name":"Beatrice Sebastian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUwek93RSRQI7WTfEuNcqVL7HGmZluvzKeumWSk0H6j-wxN_r7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second time eating here. I love the prices and how reasonable they are! And the food itself is filled with flavour. I was able to feed myself and my partner with two dishes and two drinks for less than $30! Very good overall","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT8lAR4sRZ3IVLQPBGkXek_zCLdGIhlVpMorc\u0026fid=0x0:0xab39c61b4e265acd"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Avi Wadhwa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdEq_8KjVoK59RiAaytE9JgKyRoRuD_TuDRzHPy2OPCSqSs-1EeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Never get the rice bowl or wraps. Not nearly enough chicken. Just filled with rice. Rest of the chicken dishes are great but I can't believe this rice dish even exists on the same menu. Fell for it twice over 2 years. the scrambled egg on the side is pure white with no seasoning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIJwUK9QepaJwhfQdgeBTvV-nXVAmxy0RprxpN\u0026fid=0x0:0xab39c61b4e265acd"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cheap and tasty, a great go-to place for some quick bites for dinner or in the middle of a study sesh. It's inside the international food court, so a little sketchy, but that's where all the good food is tbh. I highly recommend their house special fried chicken bowl :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfY5TuklpIcrMPcs4-KjNRPqpUlDFyFsaPhalo\u0026fid=0x0:0xab39c61b4e265acd"],"When":"2023-5-31"},{"Name":"Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpyR6lW9JHiyXGuG73lo5A19PTb1WXFzVLCnrO84Gv3hfeDE5c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the fried chicken here! The outside of the chicken is super crispy but not oily, and the meat inside is tender. It’s delicious. I recommend this place if you have a craving for fried chicken while on campus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxwP1qr1tbv1fwtfM3Y2SxQVoKcrCZ6iHR-W-w\u0026fid=0x0:0xab39c61b4e265acd"],"When":"2022-11-5"},{"Name":"Simon Blizzard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3d4fwUCBSt_Mht_8fKEduAFdxHa2yGgbV-a0ZdghLFNvdhwuX1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good chicken, a little overfried so the powder doesn't stick well but I like how they price combos and sides when you order any chicken so hell yeah","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf69nfOL53Q2fJEdr8hjJDMWad6SpcSIsRdEzB\u0026fid=0x0:0xab39c61b4e265acd"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"Pratham Malik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOP3L1DK4wj646lDA_rgq1ZCExwnWL8Bjdj5jwrvrlAlXS8ZKq-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm delighted to share my experience at Chirpy Hut! The food was indeed nice, and the staff couldn't have been sweeter. I thoroughly enjoyed my visit. The prices were quite reasonable, which is always a plus. While the spring rolls were a tad oily, they were still enjoyable. However, the highlight was definitely the potato BBQ stick - it was spicy and utterly amazing! Overall, it was a fantastic dining experience that I would highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Nichiporuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMUo7vJRTLjS5Vph1J5OjCQjPWsKGPlNJaI4FKpAmzwqfqZMPt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Definitely one of the best places to eat on campus. My only comment is I wish the spicy options were spicier. Friendly service, good value, and the fries are fantastic.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAsRUwM1kr5fYWMaPSOwtGOGh-_MAyOOzjDYfokhHY8k5IaUlm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is generally tasty here but I ordered delivery that was not delivered properly (never received the order) and when Ubereats (which was fulfilling the order) told me the restaurant was responsible for a refund, I informed them of this and they disagreed and refused to refund the order. If you want to throw away money at food that does not arrive and get zero customer service then order here\n\nEDIT: they did follow up and resolve it the next few days. It ended up being a fair resolution, but it was difficult in the moment because of uber. So good experience overall from the restaurant itself","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ITwins (iTwins)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUfk9fQ2wnUPyx22p2MtHChD4th8SauoOfDx9kxsrTGIv_31wePQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"[Update: August 24 2024]

- What do you know? New members spend $30 or more and get $10 off, plus the additional 15 or 20% off 👍👍👍 Membership is free.

- order online and get 15% off. Walk-in gets 20% off.

- they will send you SMS the estimated time your order will  be ready 👍👍👍

- recommend buying one flavour each order. They don't label what flavour their chickens are if you buy two or more flavours. You will be scratching your heads what flavours they are.

- the meteorite chicken wings were pretty good, although we will not order it again. It's kinda pricey for a mid-wing, costing at least $2 each.

[August 18, 2024]
- Chirpyhut is one of the best deep-fried chicken restaurants in GVA, far better than KFC or Popeye's. Everything is made to order, not precooked and warmed under a heat lamp like KFC or Popeyes's.

- We ordered the $37.99 8-piece "Drumstick & Thigh Combo." It also comes with a basket of freshly cooked French fries, a small container of mashed potatoes with gravy, and a can of cola.

You get to choose one of eight different flavors, including one mystery one called "含笑半步癲" or "Exclusive Flavor." Non-Chinese speakers would be clueless about the phrase; that's understandable. Even for Chinese speakers, not everyone has heard of it unless you are a Stephen Chow 週星馳 movie fan. 🤣 But instead of "含笑半步癲," the movie uses "含笑半步釘." To know what it means, check out the movie "唐伯虎點秋香." A funny AF movie.

- We very seldom see anyone dine in for whatever reason. Most people appeared to have called ahead and then come to pick up their orders at a later time. We should have done that too, but we dined in this time.

- 20% off if you dine in or take out. No discount if you ask for delivery. Our $37.99 order after the 20% discount came out to $30.40.

- Honestly, the $37.99 price tag isn't worth it. There is a cheaper option: $6.99 for two drumsticks. Eight pieces will cost less than $28. Pretending that eight drumsticks are the same as four drumsticks and four thighs, that means the basket of French fries, mashed potatoes, and a can of cola cost $10? We can live without them. Next time, it will be drumsticks only!

- We should have asked for takeout because it takes 15-20 minutes to cook and another 5 minutes for the chickens to cooldown or it will definitely scorch our lips and mouths. It was extremely scorching hot. We should be able to immediately dig in after the walk home without the need to wait for 5 minutes. 😅

- the chickens were perfectly deep fried. And the "pepper salt" was great! The pepper salt was sprinkled on the skin or batter. The meat inside was quite bland, though. We don't eat the skin, but we peeled the skin with our mouths, thus leaving some pepper salt on our lips. That way, the bland meat can have a little taste too.

- The counter lady was quiet but not without compassion. Seeing me looking around for napkins, she brought a stack to my table without me asking for it. Then, seeing we were finishing up, she came over and asked if we needed a takeaway box for the unfinished chicken. We said no, but she added, "It's free." We replied, "Thanks. No need. We live nearby." Unlike what others say, she was helpful, just not very talkative. Asian girls, quite understandable. 😅

- We'll be back on a regular basis for sure!

.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZlJqEZIsOc87XEpEsdpZI1J4_1dM2yzKNX3sI&fid=0x0:0x8f705ce554605101"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jay Why","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf6qVrRB2FWSP3f_QpdYqgSMlmFo0fYvO9JkGkahstgPZxGBo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Chicken was good. The meat was moist and the skin was crispy. Everything was flavorful but it was a bit on the salty side for my liking. The black wings wasn't anything special, more a sales gimmick than anything else. It tasted like the chicken wing you can get anywhere else. I assume they just add squid ink to the batter to give it the colour. Service was slow. We waited 20 min for our order. Parking is horrible and when I asked if they had a paper takeout menu, the lady told me to go outside and take a picture of the menu on the window. Everything was good, but not worth the extra cost compared to other fried chicken places. You're just paying for the fancy packaging.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPH3-cd0umCrtrg5VLzYF3lRAXfXjSACVpakfN&fid=0x0:0x8f705ce554605101"],"When":"2020-11-16"},{"Name":"Kevin S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBZzsILUnPPyC3x_O8zi-K3pRdmXLfnc3FmaW707tuAQPBVyfq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went around an hour before closing. The service was non-existent despite providing a tip. I ordered, sat down near the till, and waited. After 20 minutes I asked where my burger was. Apparently it was already made and sat near the grill.

The chicken burger wasn’t anything special. Tasted very much like the A&W Chubby Chicken burger. Would not recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFckKjTkj_4MlazGuQue-hXw8k7evuz1CZCqnI&fid=0x0:0x8f705ce554605101"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Rene Perski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkqPWYq-Nl6GdVR0lZoNUkQH8Vu-qp4HYGn2ANKhJIA7vKjRX_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The chicken was moist and the crust was crunchy. I had chicken legs, tenders and fries. Good chicken, fries were not so good. They only had spicy which I like so it didn't bother me, also it felt like half their menu was unavailable. The cashier communicated in English well enough and they spelt my name right which is more than I can say for Starbucks. Anyhow, would give 5 stars if they had a full menu and non-spicy options. I ordered the food at the till and it was ready in about 15 minutes as I sat in my car. Overall I would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsYi5eg-nbGEPOz7mXehdUplmKpHmBwE8WeWQf&fid=0x0:0x8f705ce554605101"],"When":"2020-5-3"},{"Name":"Casey Ye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEApUDalFbqPMkPa848Ez6bzcTZugbIf9CdQT67iXdNxdfBiDr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried the original Black Meteorite chicken wings, they were fresh, crispy, and juicy. Disposable food grade gloves and wet wipes are provided, so very good for eating with your hands 👌

The cashier was rude and stared me down to give a tip after being rude themselves...

Only 3 parking spots, which are shared with the Malaysia St beside it. Not busy on a Sunday night","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbCiaslp4zq4XceQkzEjnX2iq_KAt7xMAKWulm&fid=0x0:0x8f705ce554605101"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"AG 88","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAxeMQUlodxbnCNfFvywUuBqRKXXvkp5MErZq755JFLGwZlZwH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chirphyhut Fried Chicken @ No. 3 Road, Richmond BC, very convenient location with bus + future Capstan Station. Fresh + crispy + juicy chicken wings (Black Meteorite + Deep fried) but a bit pricey + 3 parking spots only!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shivansh Thakur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK42nS4pyAjoLWRyyMyv1ggKZRVAqZ7vIQTAqypp8ZKjU1O-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a take out and the service is actually AMAZING they give you from disposable plastic gloves to the wipes they give you the attention to detail is crazy i dont usually ever give out a positive review on things nor a negative one ever but i was genuinely so impressed by the service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seth Paras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc1vDejILQNmdWmNY1b25qXfI43R_Y0se2LTWf3pdpiHTLcNsH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Black Meteorite chicken (spicy version) tasted so savoury! It’s smoking hot and juicy on the inside despite the charcoal-like exterior. It was well worth the visit, however I wish there were more for the price.
The server was very kind too. We were provided gloves and a sanitizing wipe for our convenience. The 20% discount for dining-in was the cherry on top.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Victoria Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVfaQAeLtKLGafbxOu4KJUr6F8OKPdGNR557-uiK4csZgjrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing, I was completely blown away by the flavors of the food, the staff are stupendously friendly.
I definitely recommend this place whether or not you're in the area.
The salad was a bit more sour than I liked, otherwise the food was wonderful.
The falafels tasted amazing and all the food smelt wonderful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_Uvxt2_t65ukPvTqQ1wrprW0jy5xvvZVW-kii&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Rosaliza JB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa30Lq-0IWmj7RPGPpc4QUnkMb7A6XF5PBL3Krl3WaDQ8f_b50xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered here via Uber eats. Service was fast and the food was 5/5! Really impressed with how delicious it was. It made me crave it for weeks. Will definitely order here again when in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNQhEdjjo9Wte8j8LLKHC6BwXVtzXRPEKZcSEF&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a great meal (take out) from here. The chicken and beef were good, but the lamb was exceptional! Definitely a must if you visit here.

I'd prefer a different hot sauce. The one they used just taste like Frank's.

Next time I'll try the garlic sauce. I missed ordering it this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAB7wNzSxaCsTCM6SJDww1yflGbvp-gK3VJgjS&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"KentTa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9sDh51B2GR28uJKshUftP6vtMtumYW-ozVd4mMEHsPMyVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great taste! I like the falafel. served hot and yum.

Friendly staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDa0HhMLwecX1egmY6qHicdQmon4OLgJUAZhAn&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Shameer Pulikkal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOHMSHxUaWurqQz3BtBfdTHxCWvMxlwX-ZtssiYEe2cEd-8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service and workers are trash, food is decent. Overall,   a below par experience. If you are in the area, Al Basha and Richmond BBQ are a better bet! ✌️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhKg-YEZ5VytgEiACU6_qWWzNS13Z0kqBEsTro&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Narine Snkhchyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPrGIbQ9lj39JI9No5tn-JAKkdrxXL0_o_JzZeWFh3GIlr1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My twin daughters grew up eating their lamb shawarma. I always get to them if no dinner at home. It’s fresh, super delicious with generous amount of meat and vegetables. I am confident my family will be taken care of and fed properly every time I send them there or order. And the staff is so friendly spoiling my girls sometimes. Thank you for great service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loving the new reno’s!!!  It’s bright, airy and open. The food is great, including and a little surprisingly the FRIES!  The friendly staff is always a treat. The Shawarma is a personal fave because it’s really easy to eat on the run and is great value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG6lDv4GKzbMuHZk5XHENe3XRPCPcgjcU9Ajbg&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2023-9-7"},{"Name":"Robel B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1Q6YAX7fi3QQ_rb4l1Tdgj6-54L86R4O4l7WPHK8RCUwTqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chicken shawarma was delicious,portion was good aswell.Uncle's Sal's received me with a bright smile,very friendly and customer service oriented staff.The place including bathroom was super clean.They had all the drinks you expect in shawarma places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuVlN77VkNsqYuen8c1_sZdzOCMhVKgLKcNj-n&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-2-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anson Sat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1dDwzZT5I5KXHOLv_Z7T0LmstpSWwUdsd0rzvJwqobStn5LL9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chose this because the A&W and subway lines were too long.  Now 12 bucks for a burger is steep but, it isn't a rip off.  The taste is good and you get a fair chunk of meat.  The bun is still bigger than the meat though.  It's decent and fast food appropriate for an airport.  I recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6QBPxWAahDRuFSNUAV9XQ80PumjoSQnznCElz&fid=0x0:0x1faa954d923e9d55"],"When":"2023-9-12"},{"Name":"Laputa Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuWh47k6runjnDRjiLQPtMvkCqcZKYBJeiKBGPkdRvf0riiN5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Is the worst one you could find in Van. Probably because it’s located inside of the restricted area, you don’t have much choices so customers are coming anyway.

This shop provides very limited choices of food, often run of out this or that, higher prices, slow service… i will simply pick up a box of chicken on the way to airport.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTBASZvxQoDKKf4V2UScJ6h1OMmzYIXXKZ5CtWa4YlqogjSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cashiers scammed me out of my change. They saw that I was paying cash, pretended to put my order in, and asked for "$20 even". I thought this was strange but I handed them a $20 bill. Then, as I went to grab my drink, I hear the lady take my change out of her till and throw it into her tip jar. Both cashiers were in on it. Watch out for these scammers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel Atkinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJM8t_R7FfJTxebTlSC9zIp6YzudmZ2_OgyUFto6b-JiQwLUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Chicken tastes like its been sitting there all day hope I dont get food poisening. There server barely speaks english.
The drinks are room temperature.
First time ever trying churches I wont give try again. I hope they cant renew their lease.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Suyong Shin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSLiWWjBrpNLMfym-XFGdoaHMSgZfMek043uYA2bfjn5q3NA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"better than non-airport branches.  $17 2pc chicken combo (dec 22 2024)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcus Xiong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNKHkNu0r9L6u_s13vBOcHGIOl_tisn1xjH9tQbojiCd_NkDw-YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I guess this is pretty standard for airport food and fast food. They have you stand at the counter while they make your food, and they don't take the next person's order until you get yours. Some kid went to the counter and stole a water bottle and the staff didn't really care (probably because they get paid minimum wage to deal with petty theft), and then 5 minutes later he stole another bottle and attempted to cut the line by standing next to me. Other than that, the food is what you'd expect from any fried chicken place, which is a good taste at the expense of your health, except at a much steeper price. Also there were out of wraps","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phung Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzDtPvgS3OcSJSTwRWaE0lIUeRghJeWETxUXTVgQl_aCqDPMataQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very typical airport food.  I got a honey biscuit, a fried drumstick and a breast.  The skin was hard and not not flavorful.  The meat was dry and not flavorful.  I didn't expect much and it met my expectation.  I tried some of the orange chicken from Hanami next door and that was slightly better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmMyamlMRyR-T6wHJtyXDd1IUFq2yAU1Kk7BjZ&fid=0x0:0x1faa954d923e9d55"],"When":"2019-3-22"},{"Name":"alicexxq","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl5y3p-QcmDlJ32UN3_mlsob-_Ae9YvC23aHRpiw9C0_5_JWOr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Said I wanted chicken tenders, the employee thought I wanted chicken pieces and refused to input the correct order","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Lots of seating at this Triple O’s location within the UBC campus. Menu is standard across all locations. You order at the counter and you get a number which they will call when your order is ready. Food is average fast food burger. Prices are a bit higher than the regular fast food restaurants. Service was relatively quick. Lots of garbage accumulated near the disposal area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkLm49YmLku_AT_Q089Oc1E98YewRHGmw1R3Tm&fid=0x0:0x688850f7f499fe90"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Hugh Gao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFlJmYlj82sx6sLKOje56IkZUG693ZnITvHtJUekoopvQlVKt9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great burgers that are a bit more expensive than other fast food restaurants, but worth the price. Come on Tuesdays for cheaper prices. Online ordering is also pretty convenient.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2RdCBbOiZ1lANFnbMlv4MR8BgSqpY_v82i2CAQnMwId2nHX4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The salad they served me is made of rotten lettuce! Please see the pictures! Look like garbage!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQL0I3B_Z8sBDNSTudKyJkRHZqCemrsx9iJNut&fid=0x0:0x688850f7f499fe90"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Hari haran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiG04_8rXv0XFEGQSVtxLwFR51JdEUoQ099gTHIIYGUB0FAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately I had small dark colored particles from the straw provided for the milkshake. See attached photos.

Seems like a good place to grab a veggie burger. But the plastics problem is a big one ! I didn't realize it until I came home 😔","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_-94PYLbNgDNUQ9Wwo9-UfyZbDt7ThhOb0hB1&fid=0x0:0x688850f7f499fe90"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"Tony A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZiODPA4JsIbC6cSBJZ_RVgZ4q0TYfuzdShQyHwHbnBVpMEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The only Triple O’s that charges $ for the infamous sauce if requested on the side…ridiculous!!
The service wasn’t anything special either- I got burnt fries.
However, an excellent location and clean","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucas Chretien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIn-MzI_6UqyLKUeJcrIQPohlzHiJxP-XYcCE0C3c2gTcLOig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sry but this burger ruined my day. The meat patty was just so dry and bad. Although, in fairness, I did like the milshake and the crunchy lettuce in the burger. So, if u want to come here, just get the shakes, or the lettuce. Cheers.

PS. The fries also suck","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanna “바내나” Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfdnARYVIBDrr_F-1nTbFy1pge1d4Xtp6cphSFg6T8dGPwwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I usually never post reviews but here I am.

SERVICE HERE IS 0. Ordered the simplest original burger with fries, IT TOOK 20 MINS to come out ALTHOUGH the food was right there on the counter already done made. The lady in charge of sending out the menu was so unrespectful and irresponsible. I have asked the woman to check if there was any mistake in the order, she did not even bother to ask my order number and just told me to wait. Cashiers receive as many orders as possible, but have no ability to serve the orders they received without making the customers wait for such a long time. Their organizing system is messed up and they don’t know what they’re doing most of the time.

I ended up receiving the food that I ordered, but the plate had a different number on it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIF06Q4wknrfMEKceeThMYIdsfxuUMLkefsNKu&fid=0x0:0x688850f7f499fe90"],"When":"2019-1-22"},{"Name":"Hagen Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0JsecRNUVWZmLoLdCDfqA77CYNv2Z44tPR1pD5xKgpWQBtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Onion rings were sitting on the counter long before I ordered. They were not fresh and barely warm.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jrdan punzalan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO_I9NFHmFwsnvTn12rp_Qh7hoy7TVvTdKAQOUD_KTdNAESg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a very high expectations for my visit again here and it absolutely did not disappoint. It’s very busy night.The counter Kirsten was very good when taking orders.while we waiting for our order the guy manager name Red was very accommodating we see him how he giving out food to other customer he working fast and have a big smile on his face. It’s nice to see workers that loving their job.The food here is so good!! The chicken was juicy and the gravy was super good too!! Be careful, the individual spicy chicken is spicier than I thought it would be, Can’t decide if I like the Spaghetti or Palabok Fiesta better - the Palabok reminds me of my Lola’s dish that I love. Looking forward again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIVqpOL0C_RWpaBe79XI7v8ggpVBwis1GBGebC&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The fried chicken at this location surpassed my expectations. This was my first taste of Jolibee in Canada. It was fresh, seasoned well, crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. It was the best fried chicken I've had in a long time.

We ordered a 6-piece bucket with regular and spicy chicken. I appreciated the labels added to the hot chicken, and the parchment paper used to separate the hot and regular fried chicken in the container.

The gravy was also seasoned well. Not too salty at all.

We also tried the peach and mango pie. Wonderfully sweet, hot and satisfying. They were a perfect end to lunch.

There isn't much seating, but tables do open up. It helps for one person to order food while another keeps an eye out for tables to become available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLHURZ0ck25KVrg_PlaYZ8HS10Cb-NXnW5pmZh&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Leo Bangco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYfCCpirtE-rfmwC1-LZcBx4fcjtnHR0xsdXbkqh-pyjTVUIMB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jollibee food has always been my comfort food since when I was young, and this place was able to replicate that nostalgia feel, food-wise! It has the same taste I’ve loved over the years.

The service is excellent and we’re greeted with all smiles.

Lastly, the atmosphere is fine but the place is a little small to my liking.

Overall, this store is great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJhIIubktbeBq4hX9B282BCOb1vP_n6RXcf-Qd&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"EWu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXeZM9PiRAnKYC5R43J1IAzNMl_-5hUKk10XpQewoddHsrSMrV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Jollibee downtown is a convenient location to grab a snack or lunch between shopping. We enjoyed a 3pc meal, fries and pineapple refresher and it came with gravy. The service was friendly and efficient. The food was nice and hot. The store was clean but you need to wait for a seat as it is often full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM72x4Y5yt6oTMmXp6k55Oi1IYx6NgMFZ4sHiFt&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"William Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIazUJuiO5iuTbqbWoKDjfvV4m4TRvqFZwazxqBdhTmqJmhkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally had a chance to try the fried chicken here.  Not disappointed at all.  Chicken was hot, crispy and fresh.  Spaghetti is really good for a fast food joint.  Saucy and sweet.  To top things off, the staff were friendly and SMILED when I took the order.  Leaving happy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGmUvBouOrHZfDCtUaJj8mgQzMpZmPTT5H2gFw&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Marsel Elaine Juntilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBxi4KTbooe-HxJ-LiPZ8gSHtcvyFddZlwZPGT8h3h3WmgX3Wd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy foods and good service just like in PH! 🥰 The store is clean too and has washroom! Always worth it to come back here! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqqx7CIX2k12a8PIz9ss8Hnz-RXxagb8l2GcQl&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Ethel Groger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_EUPdA8qCQZIbokg0fzKN6NZ7KN4nh06mnFkWNKL46NbXlMM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good delicious chicken! I always have to try Jollibee at every country, state, or city I am. I highly recommend the Jollibee here in downtown Vancouver by Granville. Love it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvh-kJpSWpUoJTwgrgnK7znBsNWPfs_ksoqwc&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Racel Jordan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP377UVkq5-41AOBMyEhhBh8tPfRZ_gfFhxY6HZxccVwHr4MDn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tastes like home! 🇵🇭 The crew’s amazing with their service and wait times not that long. Traveled from Victoria to this branch just to taste heaven 👌🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMazzSStSFFeOpP0K4AwVNVkj9dYwQwnaNGWIF3&fid=0x0:0x36ece58a6332843"],"When":"2024-11-11"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mohammad Afsar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUs4EO_c_af-WhEcbP5EjoU4iO9cQTxGwB6-EEKx4LfguBK_zxB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food. I come here every time I'm in the area. Can't say enough good things about Me. Shawarma. The best grilled chicken wrap I've ever had (mostly because of the amazing garlic sauce and Tahini). The philly cheese steak was amazing as well. Burgers also look delicious, will try next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSysGPiaCmaLb6eJ5MDwkgT3tOaD8vXrfwjGCM\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c2b9670c1e3748a"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Anmol Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNQWfJPYoz2PBfAB1StmopaHyNjYe7m3pl8iVMMfEQyIWJ9bxaJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a very old customer of their food van and they always tries to make their food taste same or more better. Had a very good customer service experience from youssef and MJ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCF9uCci11ZZdbwQrspgpAk9lYoBKECBurdAv3\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c2b9670c1e3748a"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"sooraj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2PW5Kp8OdeScrwus-5oaZSEJJ3_HbFAWG7tLBNqUug8_8C_lH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"got the philly cheese steak with swiss mushroom and it tasted pretty good but threw it all up the same night, got pretty bad food poisoning. definitely need to get their sanitary practices in check.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9EXSH-TCP1c4VHBnAsD_GwiO9xaHyVkJUkGCR\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c2b9670c1e3748a"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Maduka Krishni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4j4qEhpwh9pmNpEhdPU1uIifyepvV6HeX6YvhThLeV8K_2ipG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my friend had a fantastic experience at Mr. Shawarma! The food was delicious, and the service was exceptional. Yousef and MJ are two of the friendliest and most skilled staff members. They prepare the shawarma with such care and attention, and the flavors are always on point. Definitely a must-visit spot if you’re in the area!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHabCejRYdn1l9gj-1CZmbT0YH4FSV4pOXiZ-3muFfJM9B-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited 20 full minutes for a single cheeseburger and this was what I got - too pink for me dude. Didn't finish it. Hope I don't get sick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5QPCt65_Zt4wZxDnq8mFtdT7Qm9dzV2R4oPRq\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c2b9670c1e3748a"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Tarek K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLEh2ecynB8R599UZP3LMYryTVlhjICnS_olaLC4fD-AI0SOc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered chicken shawarma wrap with fries online (through Google maps) and the staff seemed to be unaware/confused about the order. It was cleared up after confirming the name and order items, but just be wary about placing orders through Google. Food tasted great. No complaints","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM39Fio3TL0Fgxzof5nWOAqm6yM_awBr9bzqdgq\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c2b9670c1e3748a"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Jarod D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyWSpCmZWjXtYDdmy-KAJEkXULGu_GoTf0r8oKGpKHZlIPWG9KYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been a customer for a few years now. Always been a huge fan and recommend to everyone for some inexpensive, delicious food. The ingredients are always the freshest! After a long day I went for a quick dinner and Youssef and AJ made the most amazing grilled chicken wrap. I should have gotten 2!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Syed Murad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd-pA6nhLoOh_V6d47JkHRWwbdROPpa1SwMg8vvMGjNvbYDRo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed the wraps over here. Value for money. Clean, tasty and fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR6AVFLzWskef1gQiwQrN24h7oXjEylzuXHJOt\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c2b9670c1e3748a"],"When":"2024-7-27"}]

[{"Name":"Анастасия Литвиненко","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMMVQi9qyE9gSYztxnxSPlLc54a3EwZj7USExPpBx1GEzA0WD4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Granville Kebab & Poutine is a true paradise for food lovers! The food was simply outstanding: fresh, juicy, and incredibly delicious. The kebab melted in my mouth, and the uniquely flavored poutine left me amazed.

I also want to highlight the service: the staff was incredibly polite, friendly, and attentive to every detail. The atmosphere is cozy, and you can feel that every guest is valued here.

I definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to enjoy high-quality food and excellent service. I can’t wait to visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXbdIoWS2pOUs3c4yZwpq7K17mwr9OXM8KFpBz&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"RhE “R”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhxn3fL4a0hIxT8HJcx09RB-3VeIdPygNVtHUnZO0hk197vWIP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wanted to try some local specialty food, something that defines the flavor of Vancouver. Granville Kebab & Poutine seemed to be a well-liked, popular choice. Now I know why!!
The food was worth the trip to downtown Vancouver.
I was greeted warmly as I entered the door.  The gentleman behind d the counter was quick to take my order and offer suggestions. Superb service!!
The beef poutine was Excellent!!  The  meat was tender and very flavorful. The cheese curds melted through and mixed with the brown gravy, coating the fries, creating a delightful mix of flavors!!
The mixed kebab plate had a generous serving of beef and chicken on a fresh pita.  Both meats were tender, juicy, and seasoned wonderfully. The mixed salad was crispy and served with a very tasty dressing.
If you are in the Vancouver area and need some delicious food, this is a perfect choice!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhfTLRZ6uxtsHlYOKT9BknqPbvXG_k3nMxQI1q&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Emily Olson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzcgEV5nus0hzaBx5tUMeLvYjjt5vu9E_0khJ0y_etciWRdCjW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The guys who work here are super nice, decently sized clean seating area compared to other kebab options, and the food was AWESOME - we got beef poutine and beef wrap. Delicious and huge portions. Great spot for a quick bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlt2slbGj432G3EOc1SHQ6tzaqi3Q887swmPuY&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Marcus Mante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHb1PvDL_OReByWvctcCIHSeWEEXQzR-iuOU7pA27qf57_zw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t think my brain will ever recover from the high I felt while shoving the Mix Wrap down my throat. Truly an out of body experience. The staff were super friendly too. 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjSZx1AHIZteSX53e2zsQN7BiUC6CE-uuF9ZSG&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Chris Hausermann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqFO4oG4XJj3OkmTyO7b_8SA19JmEqyu7mH7khiyZ7BYY9P4o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The flavors and the freshness of the food are just top notch. I had the mixed wrap and the combination of the seasoned chicken, beef, and crunchy veggies was just outstanding - sauces were on point too! Nice big portions! Just a stellar kebab wrap and awesome fries! Staff are as friendly as can be. 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGHWRdOy0Q2JHiFj9wzmlWJ3ALnB2aG-G6KtHC&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Robin Vaughn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaz7fOGXT-P4C1FOMBJT2aooeML-6wU3TdX55kGuSIbBN67Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m in town for Taylor Swift and ended up on this side of town late night at around 2am . The food here is absolutely outstanding! Honestly, the service was as well! I went to move some crumbs from my table and was instantly humbled by the staff already right behind me! The place had an amazing smell and they cooked everything to order.

My biggest complaint is that now I’m going to be in Dallas Texas dreaming about this place for the rest of my days 😭 the tzatziki recipe must’ve came straight from heaven.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSj8Hb-R4p6k3JeBXOt31j0zDdv9pgciZajXY6&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Iman Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY_It5dFbhJ3ahD3y8wnnvsyYECBdVwU0ipYiueTLf-0IgvGbE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the large beef wrap. The combination of beef and the salad inside the wrap was nice; it was tasty. Overall, I've had better beef skewers, but this one was fine—nothing to complain about. However, the wrap itself could be more generous. It's a skinny beef wrap, different from what I expected. I'd even say it's a normal portion, so if you're really hungry, it's probably better to go with the rice.

I looked at other reviews, and based on the photos, it seems they offer some nice dishes. So this time, instead of ordering delivery, I’ll go there in person and try one of the rice dishes.

For now, the whole experience was a 4/5. 🌯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOswkNpSqig83LGtaD1ZslZRIElC-pRzSfwzQQ-&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Diwansh garg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBDLNd-YelP7jXuy3L91yVcGY5cXrJfY3yeneZ92CgyTIr94Ja=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was THE BEST poutine i have had EVER.
I mean, the atmosphere was so awesome. The guys at the counter were so friendly, felt like i am eating with family. Will return for sure for there kebabs and poutine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp__k6r4fei8V6XDUHSJVjquohjFmEbHxER1sO&fid=0x0:0xad6f0e5370c08217"],"When":"2024-12-25"}]

title: Fatburger Granville
descriptions: Long-running LA-based chain serving burgers in several sizes, plus other classic fast-food options.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"Kids' menu","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Samuel Barbosa de Mello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0peg6-WBhE0EbhzmdEe49pyBGvXkFFn6reIlxa2416ZpRVQKplg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fatburger, you're the holy grail of burgers, a flavor oasis in a fast food desert. Your juicy, generous patty dances a symphony of flavors on your taste buds, while the golden, crispy fries complete the orchestra with a crescendo of satisfaction. Every bite is an explosion of joy! If you're looking for a feast fit for a king, Fatburger is your destination. Get ready for a gastronomic experience that will make you question the existence of all other burgers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOffOr271YxfPN_gn_e6pkn4IeQtu0BVBhMIz41&fid=0x0:0x84279e12d3f8cc1"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"T L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPBYh6J4_PE0ZODwQEK3zA7n0RjjOO6-F5azbw9oIUSg3f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a chicken burger which comes with sauce options like ranch, honey mustard and sweet Thai chili. I had mine with ranch dressing and it was really good. The lettuce and tomatoes tasted fresh and the chicken was nicely breaded and crispy. I liked the retro feel/look of the place, like an old 60s style diner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhs-9Y_o_k_RB1E6oFDietNZISLX0g-W7YP_k&fid=0x0:0x84279e12d3f8cc1"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Daithí Kilcourse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpB0OmItsLBGGhpfNEcY_0lXbdAla_7jQ1ZQyMfHX5aboK6jFV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great big juicy burgers done to your liking. The staff were excellent and the service was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUPpp9rOenbMKAFRD8SAbRbo400OBgBHARpjz_&fid=0x0:0x84279e12d3f8cc1"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Rebecca P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOtv1z9oQXsu_j8G9uE8jVQGZlbdGZfOgnrsP8gOev0iFfifM3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Just ok. The patty was dry and the bun was cold and dense. Did not enjoy it as much as I hoped. Although the burger was disappointing, the wings were flavourful and juicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrcw8iNufTDLv1saA6EAWAFzIVOCrql--OnD66&fid=0x0:0x84279e12d3f8cc1"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Fargol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6roV45JzYGP6MOSsGxN3Vgduj2-Ruh3UXpw908HBVRFG4fAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today's team, 29th May, they were energetic and lovely. It was Warm and welcoming.
Our food was delicious. Juicy meat cooked perfectly. We tried their burger last year, but this time was better.
🍔:9/10
🍟:10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORmd7U7zEZEGvpEzfe_Z7dRzZiasr6GdtwQdc&fid=0x0:0x84279e12d3f8cc1"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"puiyin0116","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZnuB2P3hOgakhWowlai6-DjvJR_H19Kpmsvk9I0OmgCItfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The burgers are gooddd here!
I ordered a 1/4fatburger meal. It’s a Combo, comes with fires and drink.
For burger, the meat was juicy and the veggies were fresh. I added burger rings(onions rings) in my burger and was impressed with the size and the crunchiness of it.
The shake was creamy. I ordered a mocha shake. A bit sweet,with a hint of coffee after taste and bitterness. Good to hv one after a long day. BUT not too often hahahaa
The staffs were nice, they greet ppl once they came in.
AND They hv self-ordering machines!! Feel super comfortable that i can take time to review what i want 🫶🏼
Definitely will come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKRDEak8krJjjCTqsmRdeLLzRus4clasubJDbM&fid=0x0:0x84279e12d3f8cc1"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid 4 stars.

The burgers here are great, just make sure to get a fatburger/kingburger instead of the extra value burgers, it's considerably smaller and less juicy.

I wouldn't recommend the big buffalo wings, because they're pretty small for what they claim to be and quite dry. Can't speak for the boneless wings or tenders though, haven't tried them

The dining environment is nice, feels kind of like a retro bar.

Service was quick and the lady was quite friendly! She yells orders so the cooks can hear and repeat it. Something you don't see every day

In terms of the view, there isn't much even if you sit at windows.

Their milkshake is also quite creamy.

Would come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR6mxAESMFVC62z_rshDUMsju_azk_KXpxkqFg&fid=0x0:0x84279e12d3f8cc1"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Jess T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIxMt3zPFtXFm-KuReoSWHN4Lb0f3NV07TDZu4dMGV5N-lspY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last time I went several weeks ago, the food was amazing! Just slightly not as good as before, but still superb. There was a small issue of the place not running as efficiently, however, I went again about a week ago and the staff on hand were very efficient.

Price point is a little expensive, but so worth it! You get quality food AND you get full for what you pay! Going to other fast food or restaurants these days cost more and you leave still hungry. Not Fatburger!

I also wanted to mention that I saw a kitchen staff member with a bump on his neck. It's potentially lethal and if anyone on the team reads reviews, I kindly ask that he take some time to get that checked out.

Anyway, will be visiting again soon. Thank you as always Fatburger! You guys really have a special place in my heart.","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Unassuming fast-food counter serve for Middle Eastern donairs with sauce, plus combo plates.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Miss A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhdpd3ejdp83C0oxMMoMw_7lDxzdlekwIWzXICA15sokV5arw5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is an absolute hotspot for donair enthusiasts, and trust me, once you've had a taste, you'll never look at donairs the same way again.

The donairs are a work of art – think soft, pillowy pita bursting with the freshest, most flavorful meat that's been spinning on the rotisserie to savory perfection. Each bite is like a flavor explosion that'll have your taste buds doing a happy dance. And the platters, oh man, talk about a feast! They pile on all the good stuff – juicy meat, fresh veggies, and sauces that'll make your taste buds tingle with joy.

But what really sets this place apart is the freshness. I mean, we're talking about ingredients that are as fresh as can be. It's like they pluck the veggies straight from a garden and the meat is so tender, you'd think it was carved just for you.

And the location? Right smack dab in the middle of downtown Granville. It's the heart of the city, and this donair joint is like a food oasis in the bustling urban jungle. The vibes are alive, the energy is electric, and the whole experience is just downright unforgettable.

So, if you're on the hunt for super-good donairs and platters that are as fresh and interesting as they come, you'll find your haven right downtown on Granville. Prepare to have your taste buds blown away!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK25XjMZdBlV3ZFs1E6fm5pdbZNOrbSy9tLd9e&fid=0x0:0x8d9faba0a8d54019"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Matthew Thai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVMr_vmwXGYGArq53J1AjhE6pAHK22uBL43X4Qu6KeK35fdmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"food is awesome, vibe is super great especially for such a small spot and it opens late! definitely one of the best places for late night munchies after a night out or just to grab a bite, will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqUTQSKG8noWj1Vf6fw99c34ShpCoYXy5Y3WLb&fid=0x0:0x8d9faba0a8d54019"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Sparkling Ice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGIGkmAxfTN5aYqESNn-w7i49eduk5x6QRBC1fSX8BmzH-GIu_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh Donair in downtown Vancouver is an absolute must-stop whenever you're in the city. I used to live in Vancouver and was a regular at this spot, and even now, living in Ontario, I make it a point to visit every time I’m back in town, whether it's once a year or every couple of years. The staff are incredibly friendly, and the portions are huge—definitely worth every penny. The food is consistently delicious, with fresh ingredients and flavors that never disappoint. If you're in Vancouver and looking for Donair, this is the place!

-----------

Original Review 2021

Excellent food, friendly staff, decently priced. Plan on going again^^","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9KUxDKNkDcLvddQ7Q2sxWNzu92bBSKTNxJAO9&fid=0x0:0x8d9faba0a8d54019"],"When":"2021-10-3"},{"Name":"Y K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbWq2eGUOm4UNIXDOxrBeYMbu_e74PMCdlEe2B7AItGOQ_kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very friendly staff who make the donair experience even better! If you go during lunch between 10AM - 2PM, you can get either potatoes or pop/water for free!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvlXoAbPxS8hWw78PthjNkZ4N9eByJ6q4MOkZW&fid=0x0:0x8d9faba0a8d54019"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Brandon Simmonds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhUgQ25ngzeoP-H3Hc7zzdxlT13QPA4VNhgZr-rC7l3IP8BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an amazing place to eat. As soon as you enter, you get a great vibe. As well as a friendly greeting.
I loved the atmosphere in there. All the pictures of past customers are great to look at on the walls while you eat.
Now onto the important part. The food.
It's definitely worth the stop in, I had the beef donair and it was amazing.
I highly recommend anyone who will be near the are give this place a try.

Thanks everyone there for the great food","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veronique Verreault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6sUqY21FX4jpkNnNJBUp7vkdwAx6JRIIWWPr-YfD5Hp8n6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been looking for traditional garlic potatoes (middle east specialty) for 3 years in BC (Kelowna area) and no success. Was so happy to see some at this restaurant when we visited Vancouver!!! The service was so nice, very kind. We ended up purchasing 5 lbs to bring them back home with us! Will go again!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RecklessTb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUADbVuXAxowFs6cAgjDhDF9dK8tS_dxyjZ-5PBqtWe3EBw-I_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food👌 The best Donair I've ever had! The staff are super friendly, 10/10 would definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn9bgfrZGAUh5Fee6b-uTXBP3lVM8GSW_AxKkW&fid=0x0:0x8d9faba0a8d54019"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Spencer Ronnie (Spenz)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWRMRyha9KjF5Mie3h5DBL8bkeUXCcSGuqldL0QG81OOQsCS3e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really enjoyed the customer service. Amazing employees and good food. My first time just came cause I was hungry. But will definitely come again. Probably this will be my regular spot when I come for class❤️","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
address: 2320 Acadia Rd unit 140, Vancouver, BC V6T 1L5
descriptions: Louisiana-inspired fast-food chain known for its crispy fried chicken, chicken sandwiches & fries.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Iman Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY_It5dFbhJ3ahD3y8wnnvsyYECBdVwU0ipYiueTLf-0IgvGbE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The new Popeyes restaurant in the UBC area is finally open! I've been waiting for almost five months since I first saw their signs, and it officially opened about a week ago. It's located inside the Lelem Village, which is great because there's a nice outdoor space where you can sit and enjoy the summer. There are also outdoor games available there.

The staff are nice and kind—I asked for additional sauce, and they happily gave it to me, so I'm giving them a 10/10 😛. The quality of the food is the same as at all other Popeyes locations: it's nice and tasty, perfect if you enjoy fast food. Everything is orderly and clean, and you can order ahead using the app and pick it up when you get there.

I definitely recommend their hot wings and butterfly shrimp; both were really nice and tasty. Try all the different sauces—personally, I prefer the buttermilk ranch, but I also like the Cajun cocktail sauce, which is pretty unique to me.

I'll definitely try more and update my review if anything changes. 🍤 🍗 🍟

[Update, 2024, September]
It's been a while since I posted another review, but everything is still just as good. They’re now available on their website, and you can order ahead. The rewards in the app could be improved—they don’t quite match up to others, but still better than nothing. This time, I ordered the classic chicken burger along with fried onions and mashed potatoes. The onions are on another level—I really love them. The mashed potatoes are a bit spicy but still tasty. As for the burger, I personally prefer it with a bit of ranch, but honestly, with or without, it's still delicious. The staff are amazing as always, and overall, it's still a 5/5 experience. 🍗 🧅","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBd9guMOXCE60RDnZXy9Hvbx18VQHuJpMdUBTO&fid=0x0:0x7118c4a8819bcd18"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Kamalnoor Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1TIHNOXScihCYhT1oo2KAGBU-6wfqxhlW7bvXUQrGKX2MvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The quality of chicken was really good. It was fresh and not oily at all like KFC. The staff is super sweet and really good at the job. My food was ready with 3-4 minutes. Very clean ambience. Must visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfuPZGkMNVjckgYiT6XQ2HMhaUUUKDe3k9dyTP&fid=0x0:0x7118c4a8819bcd18"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Dhlph KJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqiPr6WA08bifSVZYqDqPW7EaJE1MzTlz6w2D0IcLCAZ5wVPxd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"UBC’s new snack (late night snack) that you can go! Instead of eating McDonald or A&W((even though they’re good too. Was my first time trying Popeyes and it was also near their closing time!!BUT the taste wasn’t bad AT ALL! The chickens are still pretty fresh and yummy, definitely a GO TO place if you’re sick of other fast food hehe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6R8KKOteBdkvOX-2pfq3mMD09rS-7bS1tFLs6&fid=0x0:0x7118c4a8819bcd18"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Epxule Pxul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2zp0TsOfMLgZkTHD6dAXmTHuWQNwbFacKGtYpfvb0ZfjvTdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Warning!!! They are serving spoilt coleslaw salad. Scary thing is they knew it was spoilt and still served it. They offered new one but it was again another spoiled coleslaw. The cashier was very rude. When i informed the cashier she said i can take the coleslaw and then ordered me to toss it in the garbage, very funny. The manager also already knew it was spoiled.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC-6w8xcDiJXx96JTpExjYQXUmX3PXanqZ7qzl&fid=0x0:0x7118c4a8819bcd18"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Heather Seaweed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9RRgHmLLaKLp5Py3g9kXpnkJUIGVwWbnERbw_K6A90rN8MwdVEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I do like fried chicken. Sadly, I felt like the only thing I kind of liked was the biscuit. You feel like they are trying to throw a bunch of seasoning together,  but it felt over the top. The popcorn shrimp was a major letdown. Dairy Queen had better popcorn shrimp. Plus, their chicken wrap had little to be desired. In all honesty, I may likely not return to any Popeyes chicken","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurwinder Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLklZe0vD6T8cAQRu1MvRdJ6MTu0GDI8m1cpGIP25watjE7SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Popeyes, and it exceeded all my expectations! The fried chicken was absolutely delicious—crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside and Every time I visit, I make sure to order the apple pie, and it’s always absolutely delicious!
What really impressed me was the service. Despite the restaurant being busy, the staff was friendly and efficient, ensuring that my order was correct and delivered quickly. The restaurant was clean and well maintained.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marvis Mao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXnwb4QyDmKoqxzz666hrMAacB9h5g9tKD1a3nw5Hz-GzR-F7DNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DO NOT ORDER THEIR WINGS!!

I waited 20minutes for a order of garlic Parmesan wings and an apple pie. Then the cashier told me the apple is still not ready. I opened the box, there is no Parmesan at all, the flavor has nothing to do with garlic or Parmesan.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMeuNCNt4GegK8cPi9kWIo5JUt23nyY0MV9SGU&fid=0x0:0x7118c4a8819bcd18"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Eshana Bhangu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_-1j3F2DH1q0xpOjrP2iBcWHgoWK0gXud7e4zNl-bkjWKPmtW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location is super fast and everything always seems really fresh! The front of house staff is also amazing, we had a really massive order and the guy working there (Kunal I think was the name) was really helpful and got our stuff ready really quickly as well!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Cleanliness is poor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBcHmS668Cn78VdAiYWkY6oP5W7FV0aGFJ_T5e\u0026fid=0x0:0xab0515b5fc394ce3"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Evan Barr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLr78HWQ8Hf4hJvc2Kru8ECiVQ58_dDiJFBTxF48eXHVpLgNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently received horrible service. Was charged for an order, wasn't given any of the items and was told it was refunded in their system. It wasn't... I was charged and showed them proof on my banking app and they still didn't give me my order. I paid at the counter, so the guy literally rung it in, saw the receipt come out and still lied to me. I've never received such poor service in my life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Call","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrKpicJlOGcEVE9WGUUdPmVFwru8M5H3WG_2_Aa35MnTzCLrQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's not the worst McD's in the city, but it's hopelessly overwhelmed. The staff can't handle it without burnout so they take it easy. I understand. Thing is, this area needs at least 2 McD's to serve the demand, frankly, it needs 3 or 4 of them. Regional management has had to be called in to deal with it before. Again, it's not the worst McD's in the region. It's not the best. It just can't begin to hope to cope with the volume. I've been to all the locations many times. Blenheim is the best in the city.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"I Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvZ12JjwhqSTUOG1fhxcRBN5niWD0vOtNoQHx2VV4jUys_6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food not bad, same as other branches. However, the cashier who had a long braided pony tail on Sunday night, please wash your hair. It looked so greasy and dirty. Aren't you supposed to be tidy and clean when serving food to customers?\nI lost appetite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brendan Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVThiJe0KwC4wPgyLrZe1zD96qE2FTRwxCVm06JO3ImijqpDNU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got a deep fried wasp in my fries, went in to tell the staff and they didn’t believe me. Just told me no it’s not true until I literally showed the guy working the till. They just offered to get me another set of fries but I don’t exactly want to eat more fries out of the same oil that fried a wasp. Staff just kept working as usual. No one really seemed to care so I just left. It also took 15 minutes to make a wrap so I wouldn’t say their very fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPWLXQOS9uGC-tBvxfqYmg-PNsJACMOpK9HNw8\u0026fid=0x0:0xab0515b5fc394ce3"],"When":"2023-8-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"celisha delawsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1uVJ6SrJ9wyj7wxGt7LrSrZWtPolhZlUioHBUdwiTmF3E6OHf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so lucky to have stopped in here!!! Great music, extremely good food and drink specials and had the absolute sweetest server ‘Sam’!! He’s just new but is so personable , funny and hardworking!! Just love him!! So I had two beers, a tequila
Shot and a cheese ques/ w a sm side salad for $20 ! Unreal! New lunch spot
For sure!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP205Wnjki_MARZ6AA2v9LsiOPdz34P4pdJVqiB&fid=0x0:0x18a8c92d2e52e602"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Angie Lamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJA5bRrKwsJYgdjkR8XdxNacbN9kF89eYwK0ao-k7ynuJzBcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"On October 26th, Saturday, A group of us were walking down Granville St, Vancouver for the halloween celebrations. We noticed a girl laying against the wall of the building who seemed very intoxicated or drugged. We stopped to check on her as their was a man with her trying to make sure she was okay.
After quickly discovering, the girl was non-responsive, eyes rolled back, dead weight, ect. From talking with the man who claimed to be her boyfriend, he mentioned they came out of the business called "Moulin Rouge" which was a bar/night club vibe to where she was laying to the right of the entrance of the building if you were to exit the bar. I quickly started yelling for the employees to get first aid and for someone to call 911. The employees of "Moulin Rouge" were completely useless. They claimed they did not have first aid or had anyone who could assist until the ambulance arrived.  We also had a employee say to us "Go move her over there to die" as it was causing a scene for everyone entering the bar. They continued checking people in and ignoring the whole situation. At this point, we have the boyfriend doing CPR compressions, a member of my group calling 911 and giving all the information to the dispatcher. My main concern, is this business does not have proper safety protocols in place. We don't know if they kicked her out so they wouldn't have to deal with it as it would not become their "problem" if she was no longer in the establistment. She was overserved alcohol, or drugged or all of the above. It was a very tramautizing thing to see and to see how the business would not help when she came from there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIIzUUZTZXFSt5HqkIfb9TcxvS4ZtiYKggBBRe&fid=0x0:0x18a8c92d2e52e602"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Peter Mills","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfOplcWDGvSRU1qOLz7QzHUzXmsnFocxnjeEfHxxQXoNpHzlB0Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Go anywhere except here. Not a safe environment for anyone, particularly women. Pre poured shots on a tray are a despicable sight. Did not ID anyone at the door. Violated multiple liquor laws.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKFjKuQYU8AajsMo5eHazajVVac8I1MlEEXENc&fid=0x0:0x18a8c92d2e52e602"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Luis Patino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK24t72JKQIlf0sjVEyMs2x5MffMPUKy30LIoulM8nYmJka5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cold beer, good prices, super friendly staff and no frills bar. Stumbled upon this place while seeking a watering hole in Vancouver. We ended up staying longer than anticipated but definitely will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiOtEySCgF15ewxrd1illjuYVLpBkvEmHV34gk&fid=0x0:0x18a8c92d2e52e602"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Nooria Siraj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIehTLrzCupKUdF22bQy9i7eW6TWytnui2cCsV771dX9Jjt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When come for uber pickup the are very rude and tell you just wait more 20min. Absolutely cancel or wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWob1HL6hsnx3Y8VLGk2muGmLAF2y5SFuMXYQ&fid=0x0:0x18a8c92d2e52e602"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Darian Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa9tIQQ79AzRLuXQPjOsHXO8XmdfzgC67OKlKFj-Hw13RvVc0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"THEY RIPPED ME OFF!!! Watered down drinks, burger was subpar and not as advertised, and the table was dirty! On top of that, the server/manager failed to hand me an actual receipt, rather they handed me the machine and I tapped. Later I checked my bank statement and I was charged $76 for a burger and three shots!
The owners are the same owners as the rip off place Heaven down the block!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sugar Free Traveler YouTube","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKujDVMI8RDwfTS9XLp8x5hRAobDEsRoMCikceQSnP_tTI_eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Looked like a popular place as every time I past by they had tons of people but turns out they just go for the super cheap shots and draft beer.

Ordered a Deluxe Burger which according to the menu claimed it was a beef patty with cheddar cheese and double smoked bacon on a toasted bun with a chipotle mayonnaise on it.

I got an untoasted bun with normal mayonnaise, a cold slice of cheap kraft singles cheese on it (not even melted) and what appeared to be bacon bits you buy at the store and just sprinkle on.

Food had no taste, staff were really slow and at one point the server just walked out and the cook had to deliver food to the tables and serve drinks until some other person walked in a half hour later and took over the work shift as a server.

It turns out the place is owned by the same sleazy owners of Heaven, located a block down, who constantly rip people off and treat them like garbage so that explains a whole lot.

Got ripped off at Heaven a few years ago and if I would of known this place was owned by the same people I would have never gone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDRZYhGP0NiwXlFC0UXL4FdJB5z4zUtwo4t0RI&fid=0x0:0x18a8c92d2e52e602"],"When":"2023-7-9"},{"Name":"Zoe Evans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXii1TMJegPj9A93M7SLs_j5aDgDpa7atIpRuVazRhDbY_GKN4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Super weird vibe. Harley in the feont window but the bathroom looks worse than truckstop bathrooms I’ve been to. Ordered 2 drinks. Took forever for our order to arrive because the bartender was doing it with one hand while on the phone. There was no one else in the place but like 5 staff creeping around. The server gave us the machine to pay as she was handing us our drinks so we had to settle up before even having a sip of our drinks. We were planning on ordering more but left instead. Dont bother, didn’t even get a chance to order their cheap tequila as advertised.","Images":null,"When":""}]
