user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this burger 🍔 king 👑 in the granville mall hood /entertainment district  area ... lots of space  ✨️  to seat  around  .....its got  lots of verity  from beef ,chicken,  fish , veggie /vegetarian burgers  🍔  ....got Washrooms , indoor seating  ....its in a historic building   ...its in a good location not far from public transportation stations ,clubs  etc .....staff are friendly here .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpdIN0GNRIwcP6dMFfjCN7qUcamnY3efekuBXb&fid=0x0:0xfc8859d4067d57ee"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Irfan Rezwan Hossain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGXanxzpGKa2TPkeF2VIsGQ1hBkGXLgVN7cM_AEe1Q1eqNJH13=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a regular customer over there. They always serve with smiling face and all. They are very nice. They always greet their customers nicely. And about last incident about the washroom I was there. They were 6 people and they order one water bottle and they all want to use the washroom. That’s not right. People need to think straight and smartly. Manager said them nicely and they were so misbehaving with the manager . It’s not good at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrGTxlku5kvFv5W_FIgEmEYMaI5rjeEJ24c_v6EjYbpaZPvnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have to say I was very pleasantly surprised by how hot, fresh and tasty my burger was. Plus, they have a $5.69 combo that includes a small bacon cheeseburger, fries and a drink. The burger was the best fast-food burger I've had in a long time. I do love an A&W teen burger but they are NEVER hot! In fact, they are always lukewarm. I have even asked them for a hot, fresh burger but I never get it. I see the burgers come out and they sit there while the staff members faff about doing other things. For some reason they let them sit and sit and sit before delivering them. Well, I'm sick of cold burgers! So I was very pleasantly surprised by this hot fresh burger on a warm fresh bun delivered the way I ordered it (no mustard or ketchup). Too bad the fries were lukewarm because they seemed like good fries. Also better than Mickey D or A&W. So that was lunch for $6. Will go back and hope the fries will be fresh next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yasiru randima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsbhJMIHMW5VZmnMyRFgIhWNGpDQm8WtaQsBRIgGD5C2BzWqND=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was there yesterday because I want to got the Best Buy but when it’s open till that I grab a seat and mind my own businesses, then a guy came somewhat old and wearing specs yelled at me saying if not going to buy anything you cannot stay . Perhaps it’s my fault but there are ways to speak to people. I saw lot negative comments after seeing reviews i guess the management doesn’t care about the customers at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Edited as of 25 Nov 2024.

During my last mobile order for pickup in the downtown location last Friday. The service was atrocious. I asked the staff for no ice in my drink and was met with a rude retort from the lady, Kim?(unsure what her name was) saying “YOU COULD HAVE REQUESTED FOR NO ICE ON THE APP” before  rudely dumping my drink and ice and filling it again.

Never have I met such a rude and disgruntled staff for just a simple request. I’d suggest that corporate send her for retraining because this is unbecoming of a service staff.

Initial review 2021.
Sad looking whoppers. Service was surprisingly quick and efficient.

Probably wouldn’t come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6iCoY34Q2e6p28vpMA7o1xMutDGOswvvvV9VC&fid=0x0:0xfc8859d4067d57ee"],"When":"2022-6-10"},{"Name":"Go time","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgiSrNbyG9048VXqa4uTUzI8hDkRFy4_nI70JxYemrzAI8AdAd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We went there after the bars let out. The food quality was as expected but the restaurant was dirty and had two sleeping people passed out within view of the staff. At one point I thought one of the guys was dead and the staff said they will look into it. Luckily the guy was okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyhIpLqbzsVhVstCVl-n4CIVE0craJRr0BYWaq&fid=0x0:0xfc8859d4067d57ee"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"Rohan Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVoohtDvFJbJbtNW1Uk_H1d1NNiVNetz3mfPR4T1nuyZYZQkE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Yesterday, my friend and I went to a store to buy a bottle of water. The person working there, an older man with a bald head, was extremely rude. When we politely asked if we could use the restroom, he responded in a disrespectful manner, saying, “Do I look stupid to you? You can’t go.”

His attitude towards customers was shocking and unprofessional. Based on this unpleasant experience, I strongly recommend avoiding this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sophie N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHDslCfCMzHyuEzgj5qXRKt6SsEkiOUiykIa1LLNJL4Dh6c7dBxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Whopper is always delicious and big enough to fill your stomach. Chicken poppers are ok but the chicken is not high quality. Service is efficient and quick but I took off a star because they replaced my dipping sauce with another one without telling me because they were out of the one I ordered. I would have appreciated that they asked me with which one to replace. Also I took off another star for the size of the fries that is ridiculously small. Seriously bk, even the small size of McDo is bigger than your medium size!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI5aQ9OrEa1ul5EmFeoI-zbaYJNaCdWEHPZAEI&fid=0x0:0xfc8859d4067d57ee"],"When":"2021-7-20"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Meiy Palaniappan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmPxVdvOIYeiyHkmYjtFYjJv-D2O9TV2HdpwNT_AxpwnrRXdBG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This particular Thai Express is wonderful. With all the places in the food court, where they serve pre prepared food in a hot tray, this place makes their food to the order - fresh and tasty. We had the Tom Yum Soup (the appetizer version - kiddie portion), General Thairacha and Pad See Ew. All of the dishes were aromatic, tasty and out of this world. The beef was well marinated and cooked. The portions are quite generous. I asked them to makeine with extra ginger and they obliged (of course for a very small cost).\nI loved it and will definitely be back again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzW4tLU9BTcjTM2MQnJm9_wJes2ECqCRWIkQwk\u0026fid=0x0:0xd89496529cced696"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Crystal Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg9qjzCSeTWfVVI5BPt7Ueey8jSKnKO6nNUXVWtx1Z-9YkKnHR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered the Pad Thai and it didn’t taste good at all. It’s too sweet and too much sauce, didn’t look like an original Pad Thai.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_GJq8rsCbVNRaLx5paCn9T5p_PcW94wz0YbUb\u0026fid=0x0:0xd89496529cced696"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Paul Donovan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ0Qp6Zd9P2OAE_dTZmrZiNgzJ34f3HUx6RUznlTuNSwUymsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I don’t like leaving negative feedback. Today’s food was barely edible. This is not the first time at this location nor the same order. But today the food tasted burnt. Dry. Too sticky. The Imperial Roll — horrible. I ate it but I don’t think it was a good idea.\nI’ve eaten at this chain dozens of times and this specific branch many times. Never complained before. Not sure why today was bad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yollanda Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBYsT3BRIB-m81KpyRpCH7V-sLH11rfDD2Zsdyr3GzWezcDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrendous food, avoid at all costs. Ordered chicken dumplings via uber only received half of what I ordered. Not only that but the filling was slimy and sticky… we all know what happened next. If u don’t want food poisoning don’t eat here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"dck- design","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVx23hGM1Njr-iK05micwGx9f93yKJLnnklSdgTtoLjDlxYt2Pz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Is this chow mian or pad thai? The taste is okay. Spice level is on point 🌶️.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUCMeKSSNtDbOkcCOGgeiDTFHcW-HMqIbZLHCf\u0026fid=0x0:0xd89496529cced696"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Sabitha Siddarthan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJO921dvE9DTIX7bPNRfVjUyuX_fPDESL80odomaU0IRMwB5o8v=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"so basically I asked for veg fried rice w/ no peppers and she told me the sauce was not veg I said that’s fine and she did veg sauce, when i was eating my food the food was so bland never like before and when i went and asked about it she said it was with veg sauce which I specifically told her I was fine with the regular sauces and she was straight up yelling and saying “sorry” no one else came to help I wanted to talk to someone else and tried no one wanted to????? She’s litterly in her phone all the time why is she not being told she can’t be????","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olive Town","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEDuLspzw_LatBMmArqU2kGpoMiGIPnT82mRoyzxanzlueamy3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pad Thai was flavorful and the portion was huge!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRCxDE0A2pssSk8vGxDxWq0wqwvAUM2Zr6y7oM\u0026fid=0x0:0xd89496529cced696"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good food portions. Will make you full. Had the pad see ew, not bad, good noodle texture and the taste was alright. Average mall food court food vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwVs6Glq0lnRwf5hIRKPf6w8-AgbA4dGbXFVvc\u0026fid=0x0:0xd89496529cced696"],"When":"2023-6-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kathy Ngai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXPam56P-eBVBOPM-Kz5mdOMDI_efySUrvGQ4MnW4GvJEgKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Owner operator in a very bad mood.  I asked to have whole wheat bread he says my order say Italian. I explained it's my 1st time to use the app and order subway.  I had to ask for veggies on my order or else he won't give me any. Only 1 customer in the shop.  I won't return. Very bad attitude","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGcbvJ0Vr-ISIbCIjYk2sH3LR-MBqWitG6L90O&fid=0x0:0x9a3e5f390e644a68"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Jiyu & J.J Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsjNzZ14wseWG-IB5JmWv6WzA4VdO6HtSOCaK6rQ1hS1mMGcjn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I placed an online order for pickup, but there was no cheese, the extra veggies I ordered were missing, and there was no sauce. I’ve never seen Italian bread this burnt before. It was even missing white paper inside of wrapper. This is the worst Subway I’ve tried, and it’s hard to imagine a Subway like this surviving in Vancouver. They are so cheap. Hope people Never go this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TT C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWgku-e66NKnVNeIMU6-HM4xjTDfx5gPFmptZRJ5vGjgP5cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a footlong sausage and egg sandwich this morning, and the employee only put one egg and one sausage for a FOOTLONG!! Never had this happen and she said oh this is how we make this sandwich now… honestly the price of this sandwich and only giving half the ingredients now you’re better off going down the block to Safeway getting the same sandwich for 7.99 and waaaay more fresher ingredients. Ingredients here were soggy and old looking. I will not be coming back to this subway again. I get inflation but the same ingredients as a 6 inch is crazy…. I got this same sandwich at another subway 2 days ago and she used two eggs and two sausages…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert inVanCity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7ETHucLrpQdYDDpyrqpg70QR7Q5cIi3uNi4h0SDtyjuj-hMY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here on Saturday afternoon for lunch with my family, to what I was hoping would be a quick relaxing lunch before we started our day. Never did I think I would be waiting half an hour for a footlong sub! I don't blame the girl who was working, as she was overworked, and working extremely hard. I blame the management and owner of this location for only assigning one person to run the entire restaurant. This understaffing will lead to six permanently lost customers from this location. I suggest the owner of this location look long and hard about short-term savings vs long-term losses. My family, friends, and associates will not be returning to this location ever again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ariel Pintson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ28Oovk-zbVlvlAQmL-tavRuCzDIvbVspIiGmCNwodI4SDhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came during lunch time, only ONE guy was working and the lineup was out the door. My friend and I waited 25 minutes. This is way too long to wait.

You need to have two people on between the hours of 11 and 2","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steph Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKt-Huh4dKH1Hk1vL7y1_z1gdvG9x7DEdv-Ck39xWwkIQkgbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"love this subway location ! the staff is always so patient and kind! simranjit was so helpful yesterday when there was a mix up with a pick up order i had placed, she handled everything so well and gave such great customer service! :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roberto L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzKxwhGTW9N1_M7c79LeNopWpSZWIuD9n0a8lbTFIQ5Y3QdwrWYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’m a frequent at Subway chain, and this is one of the worst experience by far.

I ordered a takeout through Subway app. When the time was up I walked towards the store. When I entered, I saw no one in the store - no customer nor staff. I walked towards to the express pickup plaque and said “Pickup”, and a male came out from behind the wall with no greeting, no smile, and not even looking at me - just standing there staring at a certain angle. I then said, “It’s for Robert.” He then handed me a bag on the front counter, and I left the store. He did not say any word the whole time.

As I walked home I peeked into my bag. To my surprise, I could literally see my sandwich as the attached first photo. When I arrived home and opened the wrapping, I saw the sandwich sitting half-open, as if the staff didn’t make any effort trying to close the bread - as the attached second photo. Anyhow it’s just a bad CS experience as well as lousy food preparation.

Two stars are for the food - just standard Subway quality. Service and presentation - zero star. I will not return to this specific Subway joint, and I share my experience for your reference when choosing your next meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7HjkE0UyY4RUka-3IBht3pxdGxm5Xxi3vKGah&fid=0x0:0x9a3e5f390e644a68"],"When":"2021-4-27"},{"Name":"Raman Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQxKV-4SPd6zM-S0CV5EA7r5QcaPVga9kZgutFcGfa51JcpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Didn’t have option to give less star than 1, service is so bad. Food is okay but don’t ever ask for extra veggies on your Sub otherwise will have a bad day for sure. Their manager “boy” is saving really good money on veggies and loosing customers as well. I bought sub and he said can’t add more veggies than 4 🤷🏻‍♂️ , never heard this term before, and said they won’t add from next time. If owner is reading this review, shoutout for your Manager “ he’s really good on saving food cost “ doesn’t know how to make customer come again. Really good business Manager you got. Yesterday same this i saw by myself happened with another guy as well, he’s doing this almost with everyone. I won’t go there anymore. Better to be hungry than eating a “bad vibe Food”","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Van Views","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrM3s9VvN73oN3M_Jgvg9z6zkphB0X5_vmIkd7XUnXjFdzlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went for Dine in but the location was under maintenance so only take out was available.

We have had from this restaurant a few times and it has maintained standards except for the Phirni which we had this time. Phirni used to be more course porridge but this time it was very milky lack of rose water flavour.

Chicken kebab and lamb chops were juicy and flavourful rice. Vegetarian dishes are towards sweeter side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRdc0Pqy46AFxGy-7YYRL-45ND-IzFeKEmHAC8&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Danial Emamhosseini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5yG-bMHoqbxyxcViS4vlLPGdzC7_8fQszfYP-souswf40xgFM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can say that this restaurant from our Afghan brothers and sisters reminds me of the homemade food back home in the south of Iran. The staff are truly hardworking and caring, and I've never been disappointed with the quality, hospitality, and good price they have in the last two years. We usually order the couple's combo and eggplant dessert on it. You better try it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH_YcpnbF7f3AG-RHSFWzCD0g9r4DDUkSRqZGz&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"wajma fayazkamal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUMEH7ilKI5ivFlNTgyvAderjY9N4_ogWn9dnhKsmt0M9K8_4zdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered chef's special but were very disappointed with the food. The meat was burned and the description and amount of meet did not match when got home. It was as if a random variety of meat were dumped into the tray. The food was ordered for take out but packed very poorly that the bag leaked into my car. The vegetable dishes were pushed into of each other and all the oil and juices spilled into the car making a mess. When I called to let them know, the server didn't care and was annoyed that I complained. The food tasted very bad, service was horrible. Save your money and go to a another place. I would not recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP419leCMEleS8yCXWBewHWceWUzAJUKQRUym5I&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Maryam R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd89dXDCpd48jupIrIgLCGItEfpJ_1ItJSHoKqZIAiEA5wq5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the couples combo ($40+tax) and it was amazing! Definitely worth the price with three different meat skewers, salad, yoghurt and chutney, Qabuli rice, bread, 2 soft drinks and a veggie side. The meat was so soft and tender and the rice was amazing. Service was great and the stage seating was overall an amazing experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9m4kdzIM6kL7H_uTv5ePOTPkpfNZltIMg-Ac&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Monem Salam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvb6mhT5qBpCesjgABeZW9TvQuaDZJqVKBeiPCux_c3hA6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A go to place for Afghan Food; this is the smaller sister to the one in Surrey and doesn’t disappoint; meat was very tender and juicy and sides were the right portion;
Gave service a bit low cause only 2 person working; atmosphere is meh
They brought some bread out which was great, but why bring it if we are having rice 🤷🏽‍♂️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCQjXFH_fZTN7ijgPT_MfcoiJoI0hyrwXIyLnK&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Kubilay Telli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVblPoA-2gSkyNy2SsHzjatnxuZbbDRnq3FRNWwAANfKeI76_4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is delicious. I had rice and lamb, both very good. The staff is caring and helpful.  You don't have to wait long for the food. Prices are not expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2P4oP8grTOi28vSR4bMsGrk6XwX8sb2_L7mr5&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great portion size for the price.

I got the Chopan Kebab (lamb shoulder) - this was thin and a bit tough, but good taste. The naan was quite hard. Eggplant side was good. The mantu was delicious!! My favourite of the night. The Bolani was good too.

Service was okay. Would come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjRej9E_tYokPhHPr4sORg4hYHGWpQU3duZQtx&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Vincent Lilian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ12THs3huV6_Zw3JHVN9drEgDI3Zh2F-nkFaWG6KIeu4R66w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome food!
Love their bread.
Their shami kebab is superb.
They young guy at counter with curly hair has perfect manners.
The service was fast.
The prices are reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV6AYyuBv7_RvUaAzAnpowZ1ejKlqOvo4U5yvm&fid=0x0:0x5f677f34cac0e758"],"When":"2024-11-4"}]

[{"Name":"Vicky Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvz3HJ0xt_tszpaRlrk83fKfE6KrINuu23FnjXWLdZBIpmMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Freshly fried to order, good portions and chicken isn’t too greasy. Finished half my order before taking a photo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdYflDinIsjKzXWTqBHEggEeQMZl0E8Vkiz5B3&fid=0x0:0x7543cf19e9b769ba"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Stephanie MacGregor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6iDyNJYlsf4acWsidQ9p0E-E45bd1RfXQPnZh35vVbEYXxh-MRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty food and fresh from the fryer. I had the meal with 5 pieces of boneless chicken, fries and a drink. The breading on the chicken was excellent. I chose the yangyeom sauce which is sweet and spicy. It’s a super small shop with two tables. Feels like the floor tiles need a deep cleaning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxZQExSRmxC6WIhcCmpco-cRPzR3fshUW_ftW-&fid=0x0:0x7543cf19e9b769ba"],"When":"2023-9-5"},{"Name":"Jimmy Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYGjoiumDBK_ReHWc3wVQ1IzNM-rYRKyyCPgdsk7VkYi3NYEQN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered through ubereats and it says 400g of boneless chicken for menu item. I weighed the chicken because only 9 bite size pieces are no way weighing 400g(almost a pound) came for my order.  It turns out entire box with everything weighed 368g.Way overpriced and you could get better deals at almost all Korean chicken place. I ate 1 piece before taking photo. $20 for that btw + $19 for bone in chicken.

Edit:9 pieces, frozen bone in chicken. Beware of 5star fake reviews. Multiple reviews on different locations by same person.
Edit 2: added proof of frozen chicken to photo. Bone gets discoloured to darker colour when chicken is frozen and cooked. Stop lying to customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOYakNkLNgVYAVglV739kZbHQO5UBnRmh_dxwQ&fid=0x0:0x7543cf19e9b769ba"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"Ana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPWYOpS2DwddOzcXAgyyI7i75prQzTQozlVCF74-yBomLTDa-K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered on uber eats and the chicken was horrible! It smelt and tasted like it was expired, both me and my husband noticed. It’s sad because i have gone there many times and it was always really good. Now i probably have food poisoning :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ame Thapa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6WSpuHWieKYA5nUoadUA0cJ8Vmandvvb02UWoo1qmQHFq8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good to know that they have upgraded into their menu and have more flavours in the chicken with side dishes. We order half and half hot volcano and prinkle snow and also cheese ball and it  was really tasty and the flavours were better then previous sauce. Specially, cheese ball was so strechy and smooth. Next time i would like to order tteokbokki.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZudW-LofghQCUu49iyjcWWvImH0yQan_2PH1d&fid=0x0:0x7543cf19e9b769ba"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"Felicis Leo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3gQUWdSnyjQ37uash3yj3cla77Lf6_tJg8uHJS0m9ZyIbAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent fried chicken to go.  They said the spicy one was 10 out of 10 spicy, so I opt for the Garlic Yangyeom.  It's crispy, slightly sweet and spicy and taste great.  The seaweed roll is also very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYpsWMjwbqtqB9b4ezcXbpDF552y3T-9oR8ckf&fid=0x0:0x7543cf19e9b769ba"],"When":"2023-5-12"},{"Name":"R Ookken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBiW3MMW0s9qiU58oChiG2EitF0JPkLx6sgIXQEecWllHE_f-v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered for takeout. Chicken was crispy and well sauced. It tasted good but could improve flavours and chicken quality. Will definitely give it another try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsy4E4vOq91924uT4xeOQxz00vp4bCU6_-TLIl&fid=0x0:0x7543cf19e9b769ba"],"When":"2023-7-12"},{"Name":"Justin Ashton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZMz994Kq0QXcxoWhH2QtBwFq5iRQ5LzpCWadISUVvT58cS4k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is alright, but every time I’ve come to this store location the floor is audibly sticky and the tables and floor are never clean and there’s food all over the place. I honestly don’t think they wash or clean the floors at all","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdxjyP1BSJoBXoOnmx1zfK8DMyRLDJhalzqA0P&fid=0x0:0x7543cf19e9b769ba"],"When":"2024-6-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BBQ meats here are phenomenal! The sauces and BBQ flavour is uniquely pleasant and on equal ground with Hong Kong BBQ master in Richmond in my opinion. It may not look like much from the outside but their products are so good!

The BBQ sausage and chicken wings were delicious and perfectly basted in sweet and salty soy sauces. Juicy meat!

I ordered the BBQ pig tongue, and yes, it is adventurous and exotic sounding but it literally tastes just like fresh spam! For all spam lovers! It's even soft like spam. So... Trust me... If you try it you'll be like, this is just like spam! Maybe spam is made from pig tongue then?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV364uDudUIoj_qvzkbNRfRyvoL7_IdkYvRBPX&fid=0x0:0x35dfbeab6aa69692"],"When":"2021-5-31"},{"Name":"Lizzie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5qIG1VmBASZQRSYXsIMifm6rtLhZA6xcKTGDs0bvXyJT2pXkmsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very traditional but friendly Cantonese BBQ place, only for take out but reasonable price with good BBQ items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlLYvrVJLiqN_MQKuAGPoT-nDsL1tIedqRNECS&fid=0x0:0x35dfbeab6aa69692"],"When":"2024-1-26"},{"Name":"Odette Guarin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX14ZvbsLxUqqZ0iN6xLuCY_217XnTZ57VJByd123Ri9U4zwRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WORST SERVICE EVER. Service is very bad!!! She is very rude over the phone and does not understand a thing I’m saying! You need to improve your service if you’re standing a business. This is way overboard. So rude and saying that I should come over instead? I’m calling you guys because it is inconvenient for me! You cant ask me to come and say you cant understand?  Improve yourselves!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bubu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKmulypQQCbK9IMiGTQNMW88YqlMGTQllwLqXls65jTg8wYCPB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best BBQ in Vancouver! The crispy pork is very crispy! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"iris liao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwEL7fON82cpZSLnr31JLITHUQEq19o00u1WCoGp-Cf8h-2vQMsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We found a whole pancake on the floor underneath our booth seat. After  smearing it on the bottom of our shoes as we sat down.

(Pancaked left fom previous customers "probably dropped accidentally.")

Told our server about it, even jokingly laughed it off. But she didn't seem to care in regards to cleaning it up right away. The floor underneath our table was quite filthy. And our server just shyly said sorry and only helped us clear our dishes.

In addition, i ordered an apple juice, and it was extremely watered down and had no taste. They should probably get their machine checked out and serviced.

Other than that, food was okay. However, it could've landed 4 stars if it wasn't for it being so greasy.

The restaurant was extremely cold as they had the A/C on full blast when it wasn't that necessary.

Overall:

Service ☆☆/☆☆☆☆☆
Due to a lack of cleanliness. / awkward.

Atmosphere
☆☆/☆☆☆☆☆
Dirty booths and bathrooms were smelly.

Food
☆☆☆ / ☆☆☆☆☆
Pancakes were a delight. Turkey club was very greasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTWBY41TUIyHrdBxTJMrmQsjtMfQPumUNaumVY&fid=0x0:0x479ee30fc91d4156"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-FG0oSQOQNB8kqzlcFQt13PH0d45yiXvTcmJLfSQBtaFsSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I like Ihop brand because I’ve tried in other countries. This time I also like the fried chicken with waffle and I appreciate the staff that helpful and friendly but the thing was I saw a red lipstick stain on the rim of the glass. So, I asked a staff for a straw instead. I hope the restaurant will be more focusing on cleanliness next time 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIfxocevAy69RAC2mCz-jFT7jgC4-Gice63GX8&fid=0x0:0x479ee30fc91d4156"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Summer R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2VKfDXqJRoai2g0Fc1LdxD2MVUbZmxF0msqUvViGqui-p4rooEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After a long, expected wait on a Sunday morning, food was delivered!
The Breakfast Platter with a side of Swedish crepes was absolutely delicious!
Service was excellent too. Our server was friendly, courteous and helpful.
Will definitely return again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtvvKTmL4mTWCbZqeEZTLpK2zTGo_pXtXv8Ack&fid=0x0:0x479ee30fc91d4156"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Nicole Parsons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdQb75LPepw5QDCDrvynIBycNpScg_SOpvI2G7vW4IOArzZMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Honestly, my favourite thing about this place is the nostalgia.
It's one of the oldest restaurants that still survived from the old days in Richmond.
It was so busy. We waited 45 minutes for our breakfast. Yes, it was a Saturday morning, but it was not worth the wait as the food was horrible.
The service was great. So don't blame those poor servers dealing with the large family's full of kids and greedy clients.
The bacon came like this. Crumbled on top of the eggs.
The "avocado toast" came like this with 1/4 brown avocado, and the eggs were an add-on.
The hashbrowns were not cooked.
Also, why at IHOP for pancakes 🥞 can't you order a side pancake!? It only came in sets of 4!
What happened to all of the different syrups on the table to choose from? That was one of the fun parts of going to IHOP when we were kids.
I hope the building stays the same, but the food has to improve! Especially considering the price it is now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5NLAC3kJ9lIBrEkwiKQ8i7JqYaIDRoDn93LW0&fid=0x0:0x479ee30fc91d4156"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Isha Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeaytVbjCyMvFKFRM8pfKAcXlct8I2twO8ISZdwZwooWrkYom7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"9Nov24 Called at 1130am to order one entree for pickup. At 1215pm picked up the food and surprised to receive such poor quality food. I always order the same entree at any IHOP. Never experienced this before. This was the first time at the Richmond location. The tomatoes were whole instead of being diced, avocado was black, barely any egg in the entree - seemed like tomato and spinach entree. It was meant to be a veg omelet but God knows what it was. Threw it away, waste of 22$","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB2-jAbiB3oFXUyaXyT9V44Pc07TvT0ZsRixqL&fid=0x0:0x479ee30fc91d4156"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Foochfifi Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIsDypllDDyw0_6Xn_GhZpe1-cMNacexju32_lgwmSdUjsqvUJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It has been a long while since I been to IHop. It is the first time that I came to this location. Because it was early in the morning, so not many people.
I ordered an omelette meal and it came with some pan cakes. The mushroom and spinach omelette was delicious, the pan cake was slight undercook. But overall, it was good food.
I enjoyed the friendly service and through hearing the interaction of the staff there,  it gives a positive and happy vive. I was happy to be in a positive energy environment today. And I am grateful. Hearing the jolly laughter made my day. And smiling servers. Thank you for a good food and a good service this morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqszO16irfHnQVPO8kvU0w3npNMmaYrtmPGY4E&fid=0x0:0x479ee30fc91d4156"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"FEI FANG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoO-KUqrRj_tO1wXfir5-i92MMqaJu6rxLE-MMgqZgVKPhcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today is my first time visiting this restaurant and it’s gonna be the last time. The food is generic, nothing special. When we almost finish our food, we found there is a body hair stuck with the pancake at the bottom of the plate. (We were so shocked and forgot to take a picture..)That’s so disgusting. We immediately talked to the server and spoke with the manager. What’s even worse is the way how the female manager handled this makes me feel this happened all the time and it’s normal to find unhygienic food in this restaurant…she makes me feel it’s not a big deal. However, if you find a body hair in your food, what reaction would you have? Eventually she removed the pancake from the bill. In a nutshell, this was absolutely an unpleasant, off putting dining experience. I won’t recommend this restaurant to everyone considering the service, food quality…I wish IHOP can at least do something about this and care more about their customers ..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Burger is juicy with fresh veggie
Onion spicy guess they didn’t treat it  before serving
Scrambled egg is pretty bad
unlimited refill for coffee and coffee is good
Service is horrible they really short staff today and server just ignore you or in a hurry
free parking lot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND04_pwqUBxLIvu79SuwIF4NzK5ng-75EyuJkE&fid=0x0:0x479ee30fc91d4156"],"When":"2024-11-21"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Yunfei Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2bK6mBE2D4HOm5i86dUB6TG4xE7x89TqUC7U5BPoGqj98Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very nice place to have healthy food. A good choice after working out in the gym!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjVBhRkW2EejlcMImQo5kFUSUjoSxvCnYdTqZP\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf801ddeb5d4f11d"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Miyuki Food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIefbmBJIFd8vluRG1CtvO_cHUxsRdwtm3bVobO6E-icLpG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Meat had good flavour but was smaller portions, salad was also small portion. It was nice that you get to pick all your toppings and they have a wide selection of vegetables and sauces. They also overcharged me for the salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOTB3ARC9TrRjxAWwa2am4_CgSGuiWjnioQys\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf801ddeb5d4f11d"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Casey Byrne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURwojMEVsOhjYDhwhmO8ZlXMidh-sxVUDszU9JiN_muWO-YLE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always so happy to come here. Everyone is super helpful and friendly and the food is always delicious. The only place in the city to get a gluten-free pita!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Dafinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVgRxfBp6VMIHfTWsantiboN_3wV3cKgrdCUr_knYj_-dXSrU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The halloumi pita I had in here was very good in taste. They offer a lot of different ingredients to add to the order. I kept it vegetarian and I was quite satisfied with the result. I would return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpo-izfenoWzUOhbZuZBbyqWo0MjzmpBVy84Y\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf801ddeb5d4f11d"],"When":"2023-6-23"},{"Name":"Dan Beck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8OcD7rPHOCfyutdtetGCHag_7EU7AV4AB1RuZ4_i2Y5qZQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality ingredients and fresh tasting. Always delicious too. There is an Indian lady who works there who is always kind and helpful. I was a first time orderer so I was a bit embarrassed since I didn't even know where to order or how to choose ingredients, but she was so patient and kind in a calm manner. This is now a favourite spot to eat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mayukh Ghosal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_k_UXpJ0yVXBNyEd13GvUh3loLjBEAKwsl6bHKixwC9tqvxU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food. Enjoyed the wrap and the rice bowl. But the bread could have been toasted more","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mathew Berecry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3KmXrwSyoXj_7PmmvCYLDoTjVwvvW3qGEqqpUJOm9YLFY-zsHdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Haven't eaten here in years, thought I'd try it again as it used to be good value. Today upon ordering I received what amounted to half a wrap's worth of ingredients, if im being very generous to them. This may not be entirely surprising as a number of the ingredients I asked for were not included. The wrap was supposed to be toasted, it was not. Way over charged for what I got. I'm still hungry. Save your money","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dhlph KJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqiPr6WA08bifSVZYqDqPW7EaJE1MzTlz6w2D0IcLCAZ5wVPxd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered food from UBER Eats, delivered was fast and perfect but I have 2 ordered of cookies which it should be 4pc and I only got 2pc, that’s okay! BUT!!!! The cookies that I have ordered isn’t M\u0026M cookies, I have ordered the double chocolate cookies and this is exactly what I got… I mean, if you guys didn’t have any other cookies than M\u0026M you’d have to remove the item from delivery app.. why did you guys let customer receive the cookies which they don’t want it and get disappointed???? Only thing I can do from Uber is just got refund, but honestly!!!! This RUIN my day so badly!!!!! Please someone be more care about the situation and also manage the item on the app. I appreciate that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC9l-3hccvrHCyWegMdlSNWh197zdHpzOn2sqI\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf801ddeb5d4f11d"],"When":"2021-10-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mj Rafiee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdnlRPrjMdGMWb13tlnuZPCxgBQ9eugaLdoUPBmGrQDNDIDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience at AL BASHA! The taste of the food was absolutely great—every bite was full of flavor and perfectly cooked. The staff were incredibly nice and attentive, making us feel very welcome. The restaurant is beautifully decorated, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The quality of the food and service truly stood out. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a great dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrDTn2RaJrzwD699Y_ncT6R4nvBmvgP_dhSNS1&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Maryam R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd89dXDCpd48jupIrIgLCGItEfpJ_1ItJSHoKqZIAiEA5wq5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Al Basha beef and chicken plate with hummus is a must-try! The meat is succulent and well-seasoned, cooked to perfection with a great balance of spices. The hummus is creamy and smooth, complementing the meat beautifully. The portion size is generous, making it great value for the price. The side salad and pita bread add to the freshness of the meal. Service is friendly and prompt. Definitely a standout dish that will leave you satisfied and craving more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZKkBq0fbuGfoQTm9zRrgaFO-ZVWmzbXPZp4I&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Mohammed Yahya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLT1QQjsQL0cVBO4YH4tgQfBRBthb4gM79UjFdzAIKyKZVPkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"this is by far the best shawarma in Vancouver. However the service or the guy who takes the orders is kinda arrogant and can’t answer simple question. No smile or welcoming vibe. I hope they work on that. Restaurant is more about creating great experiences and friendly service not only tasty food. I tried the beef arabic shawarma and it was tasty 4.5/5. The price is kinda high but worth it. I would recommend the place. Deserve the shot 👌🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZTP6d9ZdB8A4O_2b2A5V2EjK8BA-8gvcKhBIb&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The location of the restaurant is great, and there are free parking spots available in front, but only for a maximum of 1 hour. The inside of the restaurant is very small, and there was a long line when we arrived, so it was hard to find a seat to eat. I’m not sure why such a popular restaurant is this small.

The food was absolutely delicious, I have no complaints about that. However, there were a couple of issues. The ayran was very bad, and even though we ordered a mixed beef and chicken plate, only the chicken shawarma was served. The beef was missing, but since there was a line, I didn’t want to mention it and wait again. Overall, it’s a good restaurant, but I’m deducting one point because of the ayran and the mix-up with our order.

I’d still recommend it and would come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpyfqivIERxBtXrQNMWBK7KMVtYF3ed2TN4grh&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"kamran shahrokh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnW3BKn89dGuAosnDpO1eQs955pDL6wqZ69_AnKg-v5vknxucnCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone was amazing there. The food was amazing. The staff was amazing. The atmosphere was amazing. The men working behind the cash were really helpful and gave us options on what to order. The baklava Tasted very good, and it's a must try. My wife and I really enjoyed the food And we will be coming back here for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNrbOltFMFgq9pL1PvY5AzKofkXECH2RGnrZs_&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Kendra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrPM42GFXCZgLpY36OfGTYBwQappVku5jisnWGkmbHZFY_irtCEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently dined at Al Basha in Richmond and had an excellent experience. The Arabic shawarma was absolutely delicious—saucy and flavorful, with a delectable garlic sauce that really elevated the dish. The tabouli was fresh and added a nice, light complement to the meal.

Overall, Al Basha offers a wonderful taste of authentic Arabic cuisine, and I highly recommend it. I look forward to trying more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIlyEyiv1y8PkUOsTuvCI2hgc6_B2TQO9P22pc&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Ali Refaie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Qb1nUMuhTdvKT5xKfXkaldS_6IEl3rjYIcb84mIig84o7rgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve tried many shawarma places, but this one has the best shawarma taste in British Columbia! The flavors are authentic, capturing the true essence of Arabian shawarma. The staff are incredibly friendly and welcoming, making the whole experience even better. Plus, the prices are very reasonable for the quality you get. Highly recommend for anyone craving a real shawarma experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEI6GO2-J7HnOUGBgm7ClOiMvUfiDxRKWFyg-V&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Sharif Bakouny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfbjmd7gfBv4gb-mUKIQxfP9RT7RF8lqNjjj8WpEH6B5_MSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've tried Shawarma in most major cities in Canada (Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto, Calgary, Edmonton and finally in Vancouver). This place serves the best chicken shawarma in Canada. It tastes the same as back home and the garlic sauce is unbeatable. Falafel is also very delicious. Also, the staff are friendly and generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLjG5QecQfQmKDvI04cc5Xj4JR6PqSzf_oXPOi&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-6-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Potato Corner in Aberdeen Centre delivers a snack experience that’s hard to beat! The seaweed fries are a unique and flavorful option, adding a tasty twist to classic fries. Their mozzarella sticks are perfectly crispy with a gooey cheese center, making them a satisfying snack. The real highlight, though, is the sour cream & onion fries, which are seasoned to perfection. Whether you're craving something savory or cheesy, Potato Corner hits the spot with its delicious and quick offerings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgMnJCzDC_QdWi0Xkdr7Gy1CmZ_M2TEzcty0n7&fid=0x0:0xede46e72a53a15d0"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjDYFCBzpt_1xnrtqsMAJ4a-DsJ13EA0Kdl46o_WhuUvaPNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff here have got to be the slowest workers I have EVER seen in my entire life. Like they literally spend 5 minutes each preparing one order of fries. There are two workers but no coordination at all. It was not even that busy and I waited 30 minutes for fries. 30. minutes. for. FRENCH. FRIES. Absolutely mind boggling","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJU_W2dXlejAD1Kx4_Y-txAhmGNQuQZEMFpRFOxDTXmhbi6SlY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"the portion size for the mozzarella sticks for the price is absurd. $14 for lousy amounts of mediocre french fries and mozzarella sticks. the service was also subpar and had contemptuous attitude towards me and other customers. probably wouldn’t recommend considering how with $14 you could most likely get yourself a better, filling meal from elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUu4DYXwupS1JzHY1c4ld7GYEZmS19lOfXYq4B&fid=0x0:0xede46e72a53a15d0"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Bryan081","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlylL1KDvWDNfSYmTltUy2yT4ffXKsIBqAIIjzPUpojQohcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time try potato corner in Canada. I try it in US before, good taste and nice service, but Canada absolutely different. Taste bad. Only one favorite you can choose, and the worst thing ever is no fork or any tableware they can provide.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFl_HZTbOqXBMD5cbO1ShVum8v6Zy15pHVYzCG&fid=0x0:0xede46e72a53a15d0"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Jay A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0RELLdGDmU4mUU2O4splg5RoL3yTJnShh825sqC7IizJnW3IrnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Want a resto that only sells fries with flavour?! Potato Corner got your back! This is a Filipino joint. Really brings back childhood memories! The flavours they have still tastes the same since when I tried it back in 1994 from the Philippines! They are even using similar topperwear container to mix the powder and the fries. I am amazed how they kept the same ingredients for that long! Family went to Aberdeen to eat lunch and remembered potato corner have opened a stall there so we went to try them out…. It’s made to order by the way, so, you don’t have to worry about soggy old fries. Order and eat immediately!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhcX7QZWq4jOzNhDn2HEA_fWGiufNWC21Kx4W8&fid=0x0:0xede46e72a53a15d0"],"When":"2023-5-9"},{"Name":"Jane C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzKlABpm7p9B6BdS4FiUw8VHLHocV91kPqA1ge7F8QzbYxjbFf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"let me tell you about this curly haired worker you have. I was standing there for awhile and not once he noticed a customer because he was too busy to be on his phone right in front of me. The fries is not worth it if you guys hire that kind of workers","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjvp1iJyoRvOEEzc5O1RCmmnlu-rVklw1x5oXiP-M3377HPAjc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time ordering to - go fries on this location. I am a filipino and was craving for some potato corner fries. To my dismay, the two indian ladies were chit chitatting and took about 3 minutes to notice that we are ready to order. When we were ordering, the lady look like she’s not actually grateful about her having a job, no smile, no greeting at all. So my husband said our orders and the lady for sure wasn’t listening because she asked the orders TWICE. So i interrupt and say it a little bit louder so she’ll hear. The order was one mega sour cream & one mega cheese corn.

We waited for about 10 mins, and I told my husband he can sit down and i’ll check if they gonna get our order right. Ofcourse i was right— the second lady preparing our fries put Cheese instead of Sour cream. She wasn’t reading the receipt that’s why she gave me one wrong order which is meant for the other customer.

The thing is, it wasn’t even that busy when we ordered. It’s just making fries and putting it in the correct flavour, I dont think its that hard. So we waited for another 7 mins I think for them to make the right flavoured fries. (wth!)

For the management, you guys need to change your workers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDCg3DV2GcVMS1xms4nHxnt4nrpLka7IZvteFL&fid=0x0:0xede46e72a53a15d0"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There are different flavours and bowl sizes that u could order from. I absolutely love the sour cream flavour fries!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuY8GCSFdYXwkpZkVkazcYA1XiTTcBH2XV-VXK&fid=0x0:0xede46e72a53a15d0"],"When":"2024-4-29"}]

title: Takeya Sushi
descriptions: Simple Japanese joint offering familiar rolls, bento boxes & takeaway sushi trays for large parties.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Véronique Brau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQIHe-JorrCRyMZIoGkZFkpLvP2mwrcc1dRjqrpE9Cs2_ai2QUsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were in Richmond for the weekend and we are so lucky that we found this sushi bento place. We loved it so much that we came back several times during the two days that we were there. Great variety of options and everything we tried was delicious. We found the place to be very affordable compared to what we’re used to in Seattle, and the quality was better. We paid around $50 CAN for plenty of food for 3 people, including a starving teenage boy! :) Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmc2a0iQ7kIhpw1RuANmkRD3gijzz3I6PM8hO-&fid=0x0:0xeced03a76b654895"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff and helpful. Excellent and large selection of Japanese foods. There are teriyaki and other bowls, sushi slices, sushi rolls, bento boxes of various types. Both snack size and full sized meals.  There is even a selection of frozen items in their freezer on the side. This is takeout only, as there is no seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLpWPdcA_ZCoL0pAF2gLjRRZWSgAhLORFKMfoB&fid=0x0:0xeced03a76b654895"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"KentTa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9sDh51B2GR28uJKshUftP6vtMtumYW-ozVd4mMEHsPMyVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Japanese grab and go shop!
they have so many optiona ranging from bento, udon, dessert, onigiri, curry, etc...

The taste was good! Price is affordable !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcxOwd5O8HkuVv-MSSDd6I_euw1w2-OkWLnM2v&fid=0x0:0xeced03a76b654895"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Ellie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzPXm7yzmjwIi7z40aX-XbcjL84D3EATyCX-2d4N01jMWZel46SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great place for authentic grab and go sushi. I enjoy their bentos, sushi rolls and donburi, I also like their portable onigiri and rolls. There are also Japanese sweets and desserts as well as packaged snacks and pre-ordered hot foods for sale. Everything is fresh and delicious, however there could be more filling in the onigiri especially the ones with ikura.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn4QEb7-za8t3kRK14xQJnrfYs1CcI-WS34YDH&fid=0x0:0xeced03a76b654895"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Kevin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO5F8gwSxN-aH8NIriv-z2ODat0nsjea07lC7Ero_AYpvDg15o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love coming here for a quick bite or something to take home to eat later in the day. Lots of ready made options such as bentos and onigiri’s. I recommend the ebi mayo onigiri, always my favourite and the poke for $14(really good value).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzVIujYwhZa0uReZam8w3iAlgiwTT-GwmI9zZn&fid=0x0:0xeced03a76b654895"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Dawn Mist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyR-na2sQcGqnSW-JxTn27RMX1oocQ3hojpV86Eb8qwbPHRL0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food here has always been pretty good but prices have gone up steadily and the portions are getting too damn small. The spicy tuna roll used to have an excellent amount of tuna in it for $9.45, now it's a fraction of the tuna. You can do better. The bluefin tuna roll has also gotten skimpier and more takuan inserted instead. The service here is still fantastic. Just very disappointed in the portion size. I am not looking for massive rolls from unauthentic places. Just don't want to be skimped on by an authentic place. Step it up brothers, I'm rooting for you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRCya2mfvzjJnfvokN9ze3mqCQo1I1ALFfLvOI&fid=0x0:0xeced03a76b654895"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"YU U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0nH1IDVl5JKBE-6ym-GzRTN424F1AIj9FKlXASZfTI9-nMv1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm thrilled to have discovered this fantastic take-out sushi bento restaurant!🥹🥹🥹

The combination of reasonable prices and mouthwatering flavors has won me over. Each meal feels like a delightful culinary adventure, and I can't get enough. I'm excited to become a regular customer and share my positive experiences with others. If you're searching for a go-to spot for delicious and affordable sushi, look no further. Highly recommended!🥰🥰🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNpbcDvPO4Y2CGWqRXYyNbLtcRbTJRbja5rCrL&fid=0x0:0xeced03a76b654895"],"When":"2023-8-15"},{"Name":"Emma Jordan.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSWWP32hk94cTcwvyM9x0dcvdRRECxjDjDlH1upNYPCKGKTl6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It tasted pretty good. The prices were great and the food was tasty. I got thr spicy chicken don. It was good, but not spicy. The only issue I had was that I found a long black hair in my chicken, and it's not mine. But that's it, would recommend this place to friends and family.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ventured over to Kove restaurant today.  If my wife did not venture to the end of the dock we would not have seen the nice patio and view Kove has.  We were greeted by friendly staff.  The drinks (Blue Kahuna and 33 Acres beer on tap) were cold and yummy.  The waffles and fried chicken were savory.   The batter on the generous 3 pieces of chicken were seasoned well.  Waffles were good.  The syrup brought it all together.   The fish and chips were good.   The pacific rougheye fish was moist and had good texture for a fried fish. The fries were well seasoned although I would prefer a thicker cut.  It seemed like I got a lot of ends.
Overall I highly recommend visiting here.  Dogs are allowed on the patio but they do limit one dog per table.
Cheers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyXPhVxVp-pgEA51kBSoVIeMWwIyGrpJN8HuxL&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Tony C. Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg2hItphmDzADo6eJVMoupXSGu6cUX_5BRGxO8PmcjleCK5rzk2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Laid back burger joint at the waterfront with a Ukrainian touch. Our server was super friendly and keep offering us free beer samples. Burger was tasty","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7ollQH_UDw7N0mmOdCOSnAZkmlu4chG68IKv7&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Ada Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZS31x788z5Sx39ClFe-nCKeE-yr0DOjemrNGL0Qgq3_eJnabT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for lunch with my mom, quick to seat us down. Amazing & attentive service! Mom ordered Steak & Frites and I got the Black Bean Veggie Burger w/ Impossible Patty. Meat was a little dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO_L9iyFZkDfWHHT_KYN1afuxP5WEJTbee9gpB&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Sarah K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY-JgvN5-mznvqsAYHtcaVGAhVC2l-m6xd8sNXk8E9qqKEPNzX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The fish & chips was tasty, and their cheeseburger was very good. Their clam chowder soup had too much butter flavour though, which was not my favourite. There was nice seating outside the restaurant as well as inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyEkq7heCfMe5LF6EwliV3KnKvWg-1mYUL1y5R&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Peter M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk-rxpOq7GwruvLmSaB76J3zaSuKi4IDBOqoO6XW92wB2_VA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little restaurant with a fantastic view of the water. Dog friendly patio.

Super friendly and efficient service.
We had the clam chowder soup, and the one of the egg breakfast brunch meals.
The food was great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiLWkBehUAoqecBLb-PR1WXkxDLUfUaNZAk5e7s-opHpmA48OSHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service! Jennifer is amazing - my new favourite place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwcuvMEFfskdBh4LAkwtv_aqMQy08hOLHQdsaF&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Alex Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4m-RrKihCXXLVuygCulk_5TFxSVm8ArERd9VI1no5NHh65w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing! The sweetest, kindest people! Beautiful views! My husband got the butter chicken and was SO happy. I got the salmon burger it was delicious! Everyone shared the calamari and yam fries it was un-beatable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuH6IHIwGhhE28_QO9nKYG61zRWEV4EGss3_7-&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2023-8-2"},{"Name":"Azuki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDO580thEC_aOqQ6Ey2F5p_tJwlNUQNurFMEvymExhrUJyiE5I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What a great restaurant for group gatherings!  A semi private area on the 2nd floor for a party as big as 20 with enough space to walk around.

- Private patio with seating overlooking the waters
- A decent menu selection for 2 or 3-course set menu between $50-75/pp + 18% gratuity
- Generous portions on shared plates
- Able to order off the regular menu in addition to the set menu

Their Butter Chicken Poutine is surprisingly a very nice combination of tender chicken, thick sauce and fries... and came in a big portion!

The only downside was there was no aircon on a hot summer day.

Perfect for family gatherings, grad dinners, company events or just a ladies night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhQDPtosNzq3HCHmCJAwpg-an8UcGZN3EJqsoS&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

[{"Name":"Julia CAO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqGhlfEq90FrldKnt7GOeOvCAscm0OZ0AR3GpJKYjG3kN9_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great supermarket. Their black pork, seafood, blueberry juice and cakes are my favorites. I can always see some promotions for different products when I go there every week.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCv2j64UO8Xv38GZfZMBBAKPtueTRnldii370Om3IpnkZ6G0YN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The store is nice. Seems to be a great selection of food. I’m rating only 3 stars because the outside of the store is filthy. Their loading area is on the side and you have to walk over a lot of garbage to get to store if you park on the side. Garbage also spreads all over from wind etc.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryusuke Fukazawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwtbEG7uL51_GMCQmn9CAnzxT0dYJPs2YLJP_vGApv1Lu28EDt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for the first time the other day, I was pleasantly surprised! Not too expensive from what I saw, and if I had to give a comparison, I'd say it's like an Asian version of Trader Joe's! They've got some private-label brands with having this sort of small, local market feeling. I don't believe their bakery items are baked in-store, but they were still delicious, as with almost any Chinese bakery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhHYTQ-wkKIgPGrzXkAMqKR4R6rOyLgUU3d4Wh&fid=0x0:0xa26c78a49dbadedb"],"When":"2022-10-26"},{"Name":"Edward Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCFugQ2lBj37qRR0-gMltAOCDFrWw1SIqeBgSf8HiiK9plMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The store is spacious and clean. We went on a weekday so there weren't many people around. The store is a little out of the way from many of the other stores in Richmond. They have free parking, working wifi, and accept credit cards.  When I went the bathroom was dirty. Hopefully they have someone clean it better and more frequently","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPGJ3_zJEqqZWAvJbgkHYUZLtNCtFFwj-1wRql&fid=0x0:0xa26c78a49dbadedb"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"Angelo G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfPze-DY-vCwWD1wQbCU5ToBweXfUsVctTtK4oaA_q7cX3SKjRWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jessica was a super friendly and efficient cashier, she gave me and my partner a flower for Mother’s Day 😊 The store is very organized and offers a wide range of Asian grocery products. We love their snacks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuvoJw5fteZ2Glnav-ILBdb6CQ1Tax2Kkdtf9B&fid=0x0:0xa26c78a49dbadedb"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Winnie Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNqxCZ5iiIXxxKERq24_DDrKjThHyxqsbEZJXl2GSF2zRjR7pw7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very clean and tidy store. The layout is exactly like trader joe's in the states. Everything is well stocked. They also have their own brand of groceries and pastries. Overall the experience is good, the price is very competitive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeAkFKDoriJNf9XVGdESZl852ZSeBsgLrag6Wp&fid=0x0:0xa26c78a49dbadedb"],"When":"2021-1-25"},{"Name":"J K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoX1SBs7Gw-KGn7dTDs-OdDnmV2fzplNmiUA1NymRbmzVmkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"great customer service and tidy and clean! I love the store. price is very competitive too! veggies and fruits are fresh too! I'm also very happy that finally there is a grocery store in walking distance area!!

**update
I tried their food, 10.99 for 2 choice of food, one egg and green leaves.
Only half filled in the box and the box is not water proof so leaking in the bag.  I felt it’s very expensive compare to the amount I got. Other places they fill up to the top.

**update
Came back and they made new plate filled with food.  Great service, organic eggs are cheaper then other store too.  I always buy eggs here :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLhAiB3E98zc2Vr6JQkV6Kqc5YEyZ7wcKrcs-r&fid=0x0:0xa26c78a49dbadedb"],"When":"2022-1-10"},{"Name":"J W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX46TSnPK82Rj2OXEn8FYPemmOs2-2u1LkTTp8stydnJz7yV5m0zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Check the expiry dates, especially for on sale items. Store likes to offer discounts to make products way past their best before dates sell. This is a very deceptive practice, at least state that it has expired. The following pictures were taken January 9, 2025 for products that have expired back in Oct 2023.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtRYfYq_hHeBVIdsd-fCgc74gP4E0-yQYzJ44Q&fid=0x0:0xa26c78a49dbadedb"],"When":"2024-1-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYStB8Z1GJc0QGfDhIJmsPIQs2NpavRqZcjm96KgX5x6r1B4T9pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious juicy chicken and incredibly friendly service, I didn't get a chance to get the name of our server but we went around 4pm on December 22nd. Server made it a really fun experience, thank you for that!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7TFFBYmn8KFviKJ0ROKTOlQ9O6KzSOHU800Al&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"LA 13","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgVDIlqYYSIoXF0M7e9nAWoEGWq9Ly0qwBkADGFNbZH7CIvjez=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I love supporting local Stevenson shops. Heard/read good things about this place, so I decided to try it for the first time today - 2 for 1 special on Tuesdays!

I had to wait 25min cause they were making a fresh batch of chicken. No problem, didn't mind the wait for fresh chicken.

I don't know what was wrong with fries but they were so salty, burnt to a crisp, and soaked in grease.

Chicken had nice flavor but undercooked. My kid was eating it! Didn't think I had to check if the chicken was cooked all the way through.

And they forgot my gravy!

First time and last time Ill be going there.

Shame","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN46_F7f_6J_TzpWImLprr9XYskXRrnwuhvg47V&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Laveen Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRXEoPik772km4nNxtheUFjtSR4iAug5hLQd65hl4GopHvIOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic service by Joseph! Delicious, juicy, and fresh fried chicken. Tried the French fries and ube cookie too. Everything is so yummy here! Must try in Steveston

*no photo of fried chicken as we devoured it instantly! haha","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg9SjwXqHHuZW7XfR1xMW1tHFlhotAbu93CzY5&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Lilia Cantu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTvoybN0qAcTBGA-4cDstYnttHAuP2jp89tq8quiI24ylAHikV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best fried chicken in Richmond! Always hits the spot when I’m craving something savory with just the right crunch! 😋 Also, my boys and I love the delectable ube desserts—a celebration of Filipino sweetness!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf8mFDSqbKcXRtY49AxWGxG3LuXc-FskPAR4Zr&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Kalvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzAZd-0_JeniSNljNxgImCwzlXWbe6PzaDeAXT6_nhg5vP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Missing bit of flavor for the chicken, chicken burger tasted good as the chicken was not dry and they sell ube cake","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuVtrpjod2L3kQoqMCS5XE_m8c37tUw6yFzkku&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Miriam Shim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1IdOG8jkv63SxilWkqQuBRJnn8nUYA30jpTVf-iH5v3yqSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fried chicken was crispy and juicy on the inside. Well seasoned without it being overwhelming. The macaroni was yummy as well. They also have ube desserts which I would like to try next time
The atmosphere is casual but welcoming! & staff was very friendly. Would come here again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joyce Ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl3ZRznAfpwHD4_bRT_KEw-3SQJUX5RBIz8oGQKui1baeS3scbcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner, Joseph, is really kind and the fried chicken is finger lickin' good! My husband and I have been going to Win Win for the past 5 years now and we've celebrated major milestones with their delicious food. They're definitely my favourite family run fried chicken joint!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIz_gZ5gBnGugtZQRGmvbISHXsQ3hs3KL8nQDLUF1_KS_1CCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Updated below for June 8 2024 Price Change and Proportions.

Original Review from April 2024:
Great little mom and pop place.
Best chicken in the lower mainland IMHO 😋
Better than , Kfc, Popeye's and Mary Brown's.

It isn't greasy, the spicy is great as is the gravy.
Prices are good too, $27 for 5 pc chicken,  fries a, gravy and 2 pops after tax.
I get this often when coming back to my hometown of Steveston.

There are a few spots to sit and eat inside but there are plenty spots outside at little parks or near the water.

Edit : Went here earlier today June 8th 2024 and I can confirm that ownership or the folks that run it changed.

The chicken was still good but somehow not as good as before, maybe more oily or as another post said old oil, not sure..

I used to get the 5pc with one side, we always choose gravy for that but the menu has changed and prices were significantly higher today.

Also we got 3 drumsticks, two large ones tbh but the rest were small pieces.

I never had to buy more food before when I had 5 pcs, today my wife and I were still hungry after the 6 and got 2 pcs of pizza around the corner.

The other thing was that they asked if it was okay to wait 15 minutes for fresh which we were okay with and went out side for a quick walk and were back in 15 but when we got back we were told that it would be another 8 minutes which turned out to be longer, not sure how long but probably another full 15 minutes...

But they now do more online orders so my sneaking suspicion is that ours was given out for an online or Uber order and made to wait again, it just felt that way.

On that note, mentioning that the prices were higher, it cost total after tax 6 pc and 2 cans of pop $35.02

So as I put above 2 months ago we got 5pcs, fries, a gravy and 2 pops for $27 after tax, now it's 6pcs, no fries but a gravy and 2 pops is $35.
Inflation and Shrinkflation.

So the better way to order so its cheaper is to use Groupon to order.
8 pcs for $22.40 through Groupon was the offer I saw at that time if that deal is available when you want to order.

I should have checked before ordering.
So I will check that before coming next time.

Photos are from June 8 2024
Dropped food and service ratings to 4 stars

I still like the place, its still better than Kfc but unfortunately the Proportions are less and costs more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipParAt6Zg941nG_t7O6ovcNgWfCIXrdKoRJznfb&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-6-8"}]
