user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Sheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyqqdoSxO8_09hTasSMmxRKIAiD7yhaUMiugV8IG4FPeT3KDoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"On my quest for the ultimate nachos, I ventured to Good Co in Steveston, lured by the promising pictures online. The presentation of the nachos was decent, a beacon of hope in my search. However, the journey took a bland turn as the cheese failed to deliver the flavorful punch I craved. Despite the array of toppings, the dish remained parched, leaving my taste buds underwhelmed. On the flip side, the service shone brightly, and the view was a delightful bonus to the experience. Catching glimpses of tantalizing hamburgers on my way out, I'm tempted to return and navigate the rest of their menu. Perhaps the perfect dish awaits in a different form at Good Co.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtSsPm5fovK7Nzo_1gs3v-XV0pUA9_gmHTcrDu&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Jay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKagpkay_tyMiZJ290grAjrZOpOEgY41rzeVSw6eYBfxe4VIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had a mediocre experience at this location. The food was okay overall, I quite enjoyed the corn dogs, but outside of this, it felt like our chips were stale and taco shells over cooked. I had mixed feelings with the service, we waited quite long (left our name, came back an hour later) when there was plenty of seating available, our waitress was doing her best but it seemed like they were short staffed because people were waiting by the door for way too long before anyone noticed them, I saw many people just walk away frustrated. It is a beautiful location right by the water, and it has a lot of potential, but they really need to sort out their staffing and customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO37Pl1M0iYkwOk49XzULBARULvpr5YFb1hgPra&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Beautiful view and newly renovated restaurant
Relaxing sitting in front of blue sky and the water in this pet friendly place
I wish their service be better
Took a while before they come to greet us and then another while to take the order
We went at noon and they only have decaf coffee and coffee not fresh
Food is great tasty beef dip
Plenty of free street parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMK3eofp0QySzEOKe6pFhQhxRgtGErOkeK7fTG&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Romika Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY6as9-bSinq9gaUKOywKMCyiSu_BecTd5Yscu_UCRkMeN2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a private party in the back area of the restaurant, the service was incredible, app staff were great but Jose went above and beyond.  We are grateful for the amazing service he provided.  There were over 50 people and he was able to keep everyone happy.  Thank you again Jose, you did an amazing job.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa Goldie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxmXZaQDcvOe1mU4SUzyLX4hakDaX1d7j1GGNtS2aIUqq9C6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were at the Steveston location for a fundraiser last night, November 30, 2024, and had the most amazing service.  I wish I remembered our servers name because he was by far one of the best servers I’ve ever had.  I never had to look for him, my drink was always full and he was so engaging.  Food was great, side salad was great with my burger and the bartenders were fast and friendly.  Highly recommend this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc7f5SNKehOZbKDpfCcumFJlrX2_iy31I1KkjK&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Nathan Still","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_QoLY82Rt8F0zZynPofXsKzBiBHXMTScTWvtGhePvo_G-AcPs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed sitting near the window looking out at the water.  With such a great location, I'm happy to report that the price is reasonable, and the food/service great.  We especially liked the lemon pepper fries and the Thai curry although the Korean chicken salad and wings were great too  The staff were friendly and attentive.  The happy hour deals until 6pm are good also.  We will be back - recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4DxGHS48k5_VsZq0s1BZaBsg0nJNlbr5keXU&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2022-12-28"},{"Name":"Michelle Laffey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5baHRivTSTt9QDgxhhtGfdOJDsq--gvMcO0yy_36Kk1SjiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my friend went to good co steveston recently. We had  an amazing experience, our server Kristen was absolutely wonderful, her attention to detail and service was immaculate , her personality and sense of humour was superb and not just at our table but to other customers which is lovely to see. She definitely made our experience incredible. The food was amazing too, we could not fault any off it and we will definitely be back for sure. Thank you Kristen again, 10 stars for this server.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Babs Gordon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdFTewd287Yhm9H_DZodSgdrhTXjYHGlQvbiuqaa7RkzUVfrc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious, though I found myself thinking that the name was misleading. In this day and age, I read "Good Co" and expected it to be predominantly health-minded, probably with a plant-based focus and eight dishes drizzled with green goddess dressing.
In fact, it was much more of the comfort food variety, where everything is either fried or deep fried.
I was pleasantly surprised, and have been craving their lemon pepper fries ever since!
Our party's spread included: nachos, fish and chips, fish tacos, wings, lemon pepper fries, loaded tater tots, and the shrimp fettuccine.
I've only included a photo of the nachos as I was too busy stuffing my face to take any other photos.
Of all those dishes, the only one I felt disappointed by was the tots and I can't put my finger on why.
Service was decent, and my complaints are few:
- Our table was rather sticky
- The seats for the long tables are placed with their backs too close to the next table's. Uncertain if this was due to shuffling over time or simply a crowded floor space. Honestly, it didn't feel crowded when we walked in.
- Bugs, but what can you do? It's a waterfront spot with garage door walls, so you get to enjoy the riverside air, and sometimes that means bugs! It also means having the sun shining directly into your eyes due to the absence of any kind of awning or overhang, but the breeze is still worthwhile!

Overall a lovely day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWyJ1FaEu_XDy4qb2Tl2LyLyz5lCP4cXaR0nqS&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2023-7-24"}]

title: Kisamos Taverna
descriptions: Rustic Greek dishes plus desserts made in-house are offered in a homey atmosphere or for takeaway.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner spoke very highly of this place and we finally got around to visiting last weekend. We came here for lunch and I'm so glad that we did. This is probably the best Greek food I've had, the whole time I've been in BC which is over 5 years now. My partner ordered the moussaka and I ordered the vegetarian equivalent, the boureki, which was so yummy. Both meals came with salad, rice and fried potatoes. Plus we got some pita bread as a starter. The staff are warm and friendly. The food was great and I'm look forward to coming back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_MToJC0jjopZVhdgCEAytXGPmktLgq7bi01-H&fid=0x0:0xe9b1bd24d462137f"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Y C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXms2sclWSEC3QGPeBjL-2kcGh7jSlO2Axdbzvyfen0VG-v--o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Terrific time here to hang out with friends and enjoy Steveston village.

Really nice service from Crystal, super attentive.

Potato, rice, salad were sooo enjoyable. Lamb was slightly gamy, so depends if you like that or not.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVd2Ve1LPZgI1ukY0oixqwhPlAOhpXNQlwz-Uh&fid=0x0:0xe9b1bd24d462137f"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Darell Mcbride","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDgM3LB_6bUb8Sdl0lKMDB_UD_d6-KkNR6UEBsbycRC1rvk08=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful Greek restaurant with an abundance of yummy food on each plate. Excellent and friendly customer service, thank you Crystal. If you can, try to get a seat by the open window in the summer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqWdQ_nmRVt1Lau-7KliNOyQBfP2YF5Sy82eg&fid=0x0:0xe9b1bd24d462137f"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"J. M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxEsO36_fIIzXk-KX3GwyaYENkfRciO5KsVwIJjBXKRYGmBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I always like trying Greek restaurants. We're glad we went early (a little after 5pm) on a Monday since the place was nearly full by the time we left. He had the lamb souvlakia, and I ordered the roast lamb with no rice and extra salad without the cheese. Both were quite good, and I gave my husband some of my meat because the portion was so generous. It was also very tender. The roast potatoes were perfectly lemony. Service was good, and the atmosphere was pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM93DC8sdhveVqp1MhC2lt33FxocbqAIp3_EAUm&fid=0x0:0xe9b1bd24d462137f"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Jennifer A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD3-LwjnLM0C0--yWQi6QqQvRFDZ-klJnrpWnkkMyFTpqeBQvx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a few times. Last time we came here, the steak was a little dry but the lamb was great. Got it again this time and I would recommend the lamb. It was tender and falling off the bone and was a huge portion. I also tried the prawn and scallop and it was yummy. The calamari was good too but the breading was coming off easily. They have great tzatziki and pita. The service was great and the decor inside is very pretty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhRzmnIim0teCqBxDleGoOClBlz-ln85tLcqxx&fid=0x0:0xe9b1bd24d462137f"],"When":"2023-7-24"},{"Name":"Kuna Huan Hsuan Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKmp-1FOs-XpIK6Yh8WC35HuUI7lDi_umt6t0Vsx_BbiaBNtkkxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love such exotic cuisine hidden in Richmond. We had a great lunch time dined there. The seafood is tender, meat is juicy and pitta bread is yummy. Certainly we will go again to taste more of Greek cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrg7yqWp1VRfM4t7uk7EiS-KIH9P18KXcIZhcE&fid=0x0:0xe9b1bd24d462137f"],"When":"2019-3-26"},{"Name":"Sable A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJUX2xCs2HbF-93SEKOnrMKKF_7TBh-IoDVnzARWOcWjXDRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service was amazing. The waitress was very sweet and very attentive. We ordered the meat platter for 2 and were quite disappointed. Rice and potatoes tasted like they’d been cooked days before - burnt and no flavour. The lamb was good, otherwise the food all tasted bland. Ordered a coke and it tasted like it came from a coke bottle that had been opened and left flat. Paid over $80 and left feeling underwhelmed and disappointed in how much we spent for food we didn’t enjoy. Went in at 1:30 and the restaurant had max 3 people in it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay Why","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf6qVrRB2FWSP3f_QpdYqgSMlmFo0fYvO9JkGkahstgPZxGBo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was last here 3 years ago and I remember the food being very good. The restaurant was packed and there was no way to get in without a reservation. I have to say, I was a little disappointed this time around. We started with the Mezethes Platter which was excellent. Our mains were the letdown. The lamb chops were bland and was very tough. I had a hard time chewing through them. The Lamb Souvlakia  was flavorful, but was very dry and chewy as the case with lamb when it is over cooked. I'm hoping this is a one off as I love this place and there aren't any other Greek restaurants in Richmond. I know they are still busy as the hour or so that we were there, the takeout window was going non stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOZHvLZBPUkstggOMmfkXrv_enhP-YKWSHGZro&fid=0x0:0xe9b1bd24d462137f"],"When":"2021-1-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christian Metatron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbB71b_6BYyu3cZ6xoveog7lX2YqgJi2mdnK2HUb7ekKzx5V6I1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dave's Halibut and fries is very good. Crunchy and tasty batter. We also got the platter. Things have had a slight change on the menu since we last came 3 years ago. From what I understand, Dave's has a new manager? Or new management? Not sure. If someone can confirm this that would be appreciated. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHCtL1XOppP3I2SKjr9JB3891b6vpdOTLJSF8b&fid=0x0:0x5aa67ad0d5130d47"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Michelle Jenkinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJruNDPmGJ67xKxdyD_wPKoX5tkwiSR7bMD7BkvdBZUALfZEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Couldn't believe the portions they were fantastic. The food was good value and excellent flavour. Service was quick and efficient, friendly easy going. Great choice for fish. I had the salmon and the others had halibut really enjoyed it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUj7C11W4EHW05z2DBEJVxL2-MJwK4ckde5GIh&fid=0x0:0x5aa67ad0d5130d47"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Anna Kostyk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ5Q3BOg2vUeBRhZgC-dBf8dAVqOnthhpaShvFF0RqTBgy6VU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celiac here! I haven’t ate fish & chips in 8 years and Daves fish & chips did not disappoint! Everything was delicious and fresh. Had halibut, salmon, yam fries and coleslaw. We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_1wfGMiA0iQufXBbkW-Ha0QaZXUlv90dT5lbB&fid=0x0:0x5aa67ad0d5130d47"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Y C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXms2sclWSEC3QGPeBjL-2kcGh7jSlO2Axdbzvyfen0VG-v--o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fabulous place to go on a sunny afternoon! Kids friendly and nice and chill during weekdays.

We ordered calamari, clam chowder, fish and chips and a beer to share for two.

Highly recommend calamari. Portion felt a bit short for the price, but really good!

Clam chowder is thick and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh_v5sl0OZiZgCOL2rKjF360clY4gP02ah6V23&fid=0x0:0x5aa67ad0d5130d47"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Jonathan Tin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW--tm4xws8wH-RGwfFJsn6JJV78S1w-uWlu-Vb1VMH9K-MLh1f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good, the fries were a bit hard but the fish was nice and fresh. Portion size was ok, maybe half a fillet’s worth per piece. I’d recommend getting one fish and then substituting the fries with poutine. Their service was really nice, they worked very quickly to fit us in the restaurant and we were a group of 10! Also, they DO have free parking on the side even though there’s a sign that said no parking :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONKNpjus_-Q7NomTMi3DOLxG-hXrbVDHEGMHFA&fid=0x0:0x5aa67ad0d5130d47"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Owen Carlos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuTsGhOIqdNO0fVaA_PYlmwGcYNDYk4-GYtWWsaV2xM8sHbTso=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My girlfriend and I used to come here at least every month, and the food was amazing. Once the ownership changed, not only did the quality of the food drop, the service was laughable. My girlfriend ordered a root beer (the soda) and they forced her to show ID. FOR A SODA. We had to explain to them what a root beer is, and even after all the explanation they continued to ask for ID. They reluctantly brought the drink, and they even ID’d her one more time before finally handing it over. An absolute joke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf6RSTxE_b6MWK5BeoIOrt-jAwXxxvYoCmtEQk&fid=0x0:0x5aa67ad0d5130d47"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Derek Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaBRm-VY_m99UwZ6UwdvGjzB7nw1EejvhcMIUbGB5N2HHxrZpHjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good fish and chips place thats reasonably priced and friendly staff. They even gave us an extra piece of fish because the kitchen was feeling generous! Would recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc6Yh5P71YqIZvVASTN-n541QN9rV_1vjlK7As&fid=0x0:0x5aa67ad0d5130d47"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Eric Jacinto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX359gQz88WXOVjKKE3kSarvfzhF68m1Dp4TBCFVKdGjrW-UAdALA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great spot to have lunch.

I ordered the 2 piece cod fish and chips and was super pleased. The fish was cooked to perfection and the batter was not super oily or thick. The fries and coleslaw were a great side compliment and were prepared good as well.

You should eat here!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karen Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxZHtI2a_ExlNYwCwp-uwLeaG0hCCmCziIHzCMLJYVJ_2HwQZi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great spot in Steveston if you are craving southern style BBQ and beer!the vibes are chill and casual with a huge tv on the wall playing sports. The wall above the bar is covered with ribbons from various competitions.

Our group ordered a Jurassic platter and a brisket plate with corn bread, yam fries , coleslaw, baked beans, and cheesy corn as sides. The Dino bones in the platter were a bit smaller than expected but still tasty. The pulled pork was quite juicy unlike most places. The brisket was done well although we got a few pieces that were a bit more lean.

Our server was quick and efficient, and checked in on us accordingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-xh_BvlMwmOsbA64hQu_iawZZnHYWtejYsj5-&fid=0x0:0x39118639d372adf4"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Mack Benz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3-a22DBVAppk_FXSQQwPiPXPQi0d3PCNvsjkyH7gemYeuxoDC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a smoked meat restaurant with what you'd expect. It's delicious and decent size portion for what we ordered (the Johnson plate). Decent BBQ sauce, definitely Carolina style because of the vinegar, not my thing but it's pretty good. I prefer Memphis or Texan, more smoke and mesquite. Nonetheless, nice meat, nice pork, nice all around flavour. We took takeout and it was easy to transport. Restaurant definitely needs wetnaps for takeout customers, especially if my only tip option starts at 15%, which even with takeout I do. I hope the kitchen gets a decent tip out on takeout orders. The sides were okay, nothing to write home about, but they are sides for a reason. The cornbread and the coleslaw are what we had. Again, I'm here for the smoked meat.

Also please note portion was bigger, I was just ravenous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5SA0G8u7wuJ57gX52R2ynlEWrXljKkrZBCZ_N&fid=0x0:0x39118639d372adf4"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Dominique Ann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljtrJ8UQjyeFl34JrzSv73YF22UwLuv3gJxvfRvTmX_45PlvM6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Unfortunately, our experience at the hog shack was mid-tier at best. Mid service, mid food, and mid drinks. We ordered the burnt end brisket platter & the sausage flight that was on special. The burnt ends were doused in sauce & were a bit greasy. Taste was ok. The sausage flight all started to taste the same after a while. The brisket & rice sausage was a bit reminiscent of what you’d feed a toddler - devoid of taste & mushy. Restaurant is ok for what it is, a BBQ house - but don’t expect anything mind blowing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvyubySMpZLbnpnp8NCVzLPT9GdixUk8KPGD9G&fid=0x0:0x39118639d372adf4"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Nicholas Sperling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqkJbnJpe916U8AIcQSHFScMMCPJK87tF8E1CagYxQYLBMEBgS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has been on my list of restaurants to try for some time, and they did not disappoint. We ordered the Allan’s Mammoth Platter which was so massive it came on two platters. All the meat was warm, moist and flavorful, but I particularly enjoyed the Dino ribs and the pulled pork. I’m not sure if they use a different dry rub and/or sauce for each meat, but each meat had it’s own flavor profile which was nice.

The sides were also pretty good. I’m not a big fan of Beans, but these were delicious, as was the corn bread. We also got the fries, yam fries, coleslaw, and the side of the day that day was pasta salad. Very good.

If I were to nitpick, I did find it interesting that the platter is intended to feed 4+, but it comes with 3 chicken quarters and 3 Dino bones. I also wish there was a bottle or bowl of sauce served with the platter, but that’s personal preference (I like things saucy).

Honestly, this is my new favorite local BBQ restaurant. They are a legit, and I will definitely be back again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy8JMpL0IHa34KxH7vIGvwaiW7NHtnpVDHGo7F&fid=0x0:0x39118639d372adf4"],"When":"2023-5-23"},{"Name":"Heather Cheadle-Yamamoto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB_0GZi44C0IUuVHH6IhRymJk04nr_3HH0Ybj7pqEzV_lmNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not go on a Sunday!  We ordered a $150. Mammoth platter.  The girl who answered the phone didnt even ask which 6x sides we wanted. When we got the platter home, there were 5x chicken legs, three mammoth ribs, very little brisket, a scant amount of pulled pork and two half racks of exceptionally skinny pork side ribs.  The pulled pork was mostly unpulled, and the mammoth ribs were tough and dry.  The pork side ribs were also dry, and exceptionally small.  They packed the platter so that it appeared that the brisket and pulled pork were plentiful, as they should have been.  We used to go here, but no more.  Get it together.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Loewen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ubkatUwr1T6rLIZLLHHj6fIvR_roTk96XH4VAwaaKIz3GH06Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location, good food, decent service. Lots of good menu items, great music list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBbu7fHTLCu1NgQABYdzPdIvr9B0I1G19pKpz2&fid=0x0:0x39118639d372adf4"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"MaFer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmbB59zPdhehDsyG4YPmBCi_aGZzpirNPgrd0Pn1FpyfmJGRQxCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All I can say is that the ribs, chicken and beef ribs were juicy, fall off the bone, and full of flavor. We had a big combo for 2 and the side of beans, and fries. The beans were amazing and the gravy for the fries was the best gravy Ive ever had and I order gravy for my fries everywhere I go. I will definitely go bavck for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnf8CABbecZF98JcavBtGBPvT_FgffdESnIzFK&fid=0x0:0x39118639d372adf4"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"norei pira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwOjOdNaxieHAZkX_swaQv157H0mWZLuTGuacL5HeqggrYqdda=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"we had high expectations here after looking at the reviews and wanted to try the brisket however we were very disappointed as the brisket was dry and not juicy, probably one of the driest briskets we ever had. but i do have to say, the sides were awesome and the kfc bites were really good. just the one thing we came in for, we were disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlKyyJwXMiKgjon48eVJxiNEq99dt1H1ODZgc4&fid=0x0:0x39118639d372adf4"],"When":"2024-4-17"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Vikraant Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTeYE_u-jjHmOycGAMzss8kScN2fwvucCgudri1-JgMFCMQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best choice for food in Steveston! Great pizza variety and taste, the wings are a must and now serving alcohol too. Great atmosphere with some TVs to watch some live sports. Would highly recommend checking out if you’re in Steveston!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWiRwOwAF-YHOPaIa2Dr12G612nyiyGehEtk6a\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Tom Marvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcByMBNEit9KjWswT3pON6apoAYayce4voEhevygfF_hEjbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have been eating pizza here for over a decade pretty sure ownership has changed a few times. What I remember about old John's Pan pizza is the amount and quality of toppings. Even though it was never the cheapest option i would gravitate here just to get that solid carnivore feeling . Unfortunately my recent experience here is very average.  The crust is not great and the toppings are sparse. I will probably try to explore other options in the area after being disappointed few times. Attached is their pepperoni premium pizza and something they call Mediterranean I think.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0adcdWZtnQosxpdLqV7si29FQg4GNRm2sPi8U\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Joe Ji74","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4vl1PEGpRLeDtZJ_VpKmPPSov8M1kXju9xR2ergoWv0RM-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very little toppings on the pizzas. Ordered the Pepperoni Lovers and it didn’t have very many pepperonis. Slightly undercooked.  Much better pizza in the frozen section at Save-on-Foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdPtTrR-zYrybKWgvS5zJtiuoino24TcG37h4p\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Sukhman Boparai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVVHjijTOI_TZ4AQxqTxOLwFAd6kUwAuzmAUpZy-t9iQCXbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"stepped into this pizza haven today and was blown away by the variety of flavours they offer, welcoming staff. I ordered one meat and one veg pizza, both were very fresh and tasted superb.  I will surely come again. Best pizza shop ever!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoa5msmaXZrY9xqbx_C-5SAYoV16_kPnDQlzzm\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Kathleen Hackett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHiH7LDEy-QfyvS90GkzH2wLw9wVETFHAXYIpRkceY-V0ETMV0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food was disappointing . Staff not familiar with Mediterranean cuisine. Macaroni noodles in the lasagna underneath the lasagna noodles. Greek salad made with white onions in massive chunks and skimpy on the feta. Maybe the pizza is good?  Pleasant staff but really slow.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Remington Trinidad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNQoYECz7m1_QqzDvhY3-NTTxpJBEBL1YGNAT4c9cRY-iqCeg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got to try this gem in Richmond. Ordered the Vegan Pizza with everything loaded then the Vegan Pasta. The pizza was absolutely delicious, but was dissatisfied with the pasta. Was expecting more veggies in the pasta. Had to dig into the noodles to find what little spinach was in there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORFX5X4pIst-gzc5O3Od-7X893M6B9iSoJds8\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2022-5-12"},{"Name":"Bhavna Sood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlv7R_iKLechPtFR6Z-ISgj5tAXTXooxANMdaPTcZh-UG2OsLn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved this place! Pizza was amazing, we ordered 3 different styles, all were above par and above my expectations. Lovely ambience as well. Service was par excellent. Definitely recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The pizza here was delicious. Of note, their tomato pizza sauce was quite special and unique with a pleasant fresh tang to it not found at other pizza places. I tried the pizza by the slice which was $2.50 each. The Hawaiian pizza had nice round thinly sliced ham on it. Good stuff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcv6QbSlHJpyrnzPpCpnMb9AJFmLGZnA7DSL-3\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2021-4-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark Bullock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXurhNUyvU-UwJu3PIhpIoO401kmvr3NAof13pUMcZTWY-2ZCva=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great seaside restaurant with amazing seafood. Had the brussel sprout starter which was amazingly seasoned and roasted. Followed by the shrimp and scallop linguine. The only shortcomings was I wished it was a larger portion of pasta. They had blankets on all of their seats outside for your convenience too. Would dine here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ2RVKdLXQZckACzvGg1dHNJPzzYsp7fb5VWR8&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Lola V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1al5Yf2wMmDiwMcPERtx0uh9FAIeT9iZgDVgy1AtbJ47LLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the Warm Seafood Salad: Seafood was very fresh, really loved the vinaigrette dressing!
Cocktails were  tasteless:(
Our server was quite forgetful and was mixing up our order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_k5MZR9m6nrzFMmP6Zjot3qIRXk36LIzdzI8v&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Milad Oshaghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvjtK7IvidFs0Ikmi5NW5qOuRhfrOD033R1ZNMTBgJLfFCI1WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was there recently,, we ordered CRAB & SPINACH ARTICHOKE DIP & FRESH MUSSELS & CLAMS and fish& chips and side burgers(beef and salmon)some drinks including ceaser ans mohito ,the dip and todilas  around was really amazing the ceaser drinks amazing in compare to ones that,the view as you see was great if i get back to steveson village ofcourse catch kitchen   is a place ill go back there","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzAFbrkEdNfBy8GlYJHsAlTxsxbnO2Pm3ozsg1&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Jam Hinkley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9aDUW4jjezO6WoO3B3Dn6cBdRfltIu9eknIJNl9zQEZuQ2Ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recommend by our Hotel Reception, we weren’t disappointed. Had fabulous table over looking the water. Food was great, very fresh and decent portions. Topped off by a nice cool glass of ‘Catch’ beer.
The service was excellent and the staff very friendly, talkative and quick to help. Highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrc85j7XX9sKAmoT0jWF2IC9TuW6vA2m6y84NN&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Neri Matrixx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEAsQwNwiH4aesUxpapeB6lMqfjR6zx9Ff1axtQeydaL4OQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lobster 🦞 tail is absolutely delicious. Would have it everyday. Also, got the delicious King Crab legs to take home. Only bad thing is I have to travel too far to get to Stevenson.

The service was ok, nothing special. Outside patio should have sun umbrella ⛱ for ALL tables, the sun 🌞 can really do some skin damages after sitting there for 1+ hour. We like being outside, we just don't want to get bake while out there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXvgcXZo8lxHqxC79qd4GZk7taYc1fPW9qt8pC&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Melissa Denise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPJUZyg5bbjNmbLw_9Zpw5GxBBDSB1XEPNgj4DHq-_lkoMwmALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really great location with a nice view if you are seated near a window. The staff was also very nice although our server forgot multiple items multiple times. We asked for ice tea, butter, and extra bread which she forgot (although she was very apologetic about it).

The food was mediocre. I order sablefish at a lot of different restaurants but I did not like the sablefish here. I thought it was very plain for the amount of money you are paying. Plain rice with sablefish that was really soft and soggy. At other places I have gone to, the sablefish was soft in the inside with a crispy sweet outside.

My friends had the chowder and some pastas which they liked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG3ySGw0fipTUmDXeY4JlyQ4HiwTrcl0dKSAjJ&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"Timothy Chan (TimTim)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURIoSl-5oBZzcRd91bCuWm5mXoW-rsGa8ZawpNSjddYI4bCo-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As always, excellent customer service, food, and nice views. We especially enjoyed the tasty fresh mussels and clams that we shared. The sauce is well made and goes really well when you dip it with bread. Our family and our family friends really enjoyed the evening. Highly recommended, and we will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzh7kAliV3GS6SSpcjzvXNtgHCv9rGAPPD5Fvj&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Selena Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcoguULyjIq-ui7NYg-RspfD3LetHt1NMZHIqZbej2HD4cdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We came here for dinner and was disappointed. We’ve been here before, and don’t remember the food being this bad.

We ordered calamari, black cod, and grilled chicken burger. The calamari was good, but portion was quite small for the price. The black cod was really really plain (pretty much tasteless), though the cod was quite big. The grilled chicken burger was really tiny and disappointing for that price. You can probably get a bigger burger at any fast food restaurant. At least the fries were really good.

Service was okay. Nothing special.

Atmosphere was a bit dark (they had candles on every table, but ours was out and they didn’t bother lighting it). They are right by the water though, so I guess there’s good views?

All in all, my husband and I were really disappointed this time by the food and will probably not go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOORIGYBdaMGOUUQ7lkwkxh9UFZSDkp21nSoJ22&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-2-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINOajWqz0XV0vpC9IsQo0JnRUsZU5BE2RJJx-pBiB4H1nJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience here. I ordered the poached peach granola bowl - the portion was huge, delicious, and very reasonably priced. Iced latte tasted burnt though. But most importantly, they are pet-friendly. My friend, her puppy, and I sat on the patio on a rainy October day. Their patio is covered and heated, which is great even in lousy weather.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwxJFhfrY6PGKIN7HYpy8vbQ4GpycnHxU9ajQ&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Turtlekeeper Designs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZmq2g731Yc8XnFSpBiniWaYnYNraL7GVOPNZyVCF5ChC8dro=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Casual cafe. Bright with indoor and outdoor seating. Nice servers. Healthy food menu available!  Food was fresh and looked like care was taken in presentation.  We were so hungry and the food was so good I forgot to take pics of my companions’ food until they were partway done. Oops.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL6_lx7Pj8q7OSSf-P1iv2_5FwT4v_0GNnSvXJ&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Nathan R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNn0dQ7dlU8l9n6uQSJCYngVxoJQg5dtCAXhDC50DzdQml0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm disappointed with the food and the service at this establishment. We got take out on friday night and ended up finding a hair in my food🤢.

The service was poor and the waitress was rude. I explained to her that I found hair in the fish and chips but she didn't seem to be very caring. I asked for a refund and my money back.After I was given the cash I was informed that she cannot remake it. It's quite ridiculous that I have to spend my time coming back with the food and you guys can't even have a bother to make it right? Why should I even bother giving a tip and spending my money here if this is how they treat customers? This is not the first time we have dealt with a rude waitress.

I do not recommend coming here at all! I suggest going elsewhere in the village where the service is better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMavn7CEBjB6kNaYVFVdGfFmUZKupnNkToZM_eU&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great (and strong) cocktails, a diverse range of beers, and tasty food! Definitely worth the visit when in Steveston.

I was pleasantly surprised by how large the serving of truffle fries was.

Really lovely patio space as well. Would go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbEy5FxWoHm4G2M3CeyUb88yIZ9-fP63Nzecf7&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Maschanka Fernandes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ToBWhyLBbGLZ9_8uWWhNnrT3Kh2_4kSVOU9RxE3Xv4dVckVdYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm surprised I haven't been here before. It's so lovely inside. Came in on a Tuesday night so it wasn't too busy. Tried the salmon burger and the shrimp and crab spaghetti and both were delicious. Lovely interiors, good food and kind servers what more could you ask for?!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8USZknU9rZP6JrPOEGcQd2yj0gXJmbFvi2lEM&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Matthew L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc9fHn8uXVktnQv8aocHCHj44Jm3-C13gSis0GjGhXqRQXFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice brewery and restaurant in Richmond. This was my first time there, and the staff, food, and beers were all great. A definite recommend for all those visiting the area, and be sure to try a flight of their beer as well as their clam chowder.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBPwbK4-4fm8JkoAFVuIW6qyRLxemldYPmhfNF&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice atmosphere and good service. Their miso glazed cod is pretty good and I loved the risotto that came with it. Would come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzVkGvF2aUby8dkYHvrKSUWWL2WxX75QVhPSpG&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Vivian Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWymnfRRGxsO6LjaKcayb9Cx0WHFTJm7tpbK6onLJDZ7RN5LmN9eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to for a friends birthday lunch and didn’t realize it was Dine Out Vancouver.

Small but cute and cozy restaurant, recommend getting reservations for a weekend. We were able to be seated right away at the bar luckily!

Our server/bartender was very kind and friendly. Gave some great suggestions for cocktails!

Food came out quickly and the portions were big! I really enjoyed the dine out menu, we all ordered something different to try everything. Would definitely come back.

Some topic picks are the ratatouille, fried chicken, prawns and crab spaghettini, salmon, and the butterfly sour cocktail!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX-uOnfc3bfoYLL20pQtnzADT1sbSp1g4MAnz2&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-1-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty frozen yogurt, especially on a hot and sunny summer day! Definitely one of the most popular ice cream shops in Steveston.

The kids cone is pretty decent sized. It's worthwhile to pay the extra $1 to get the waffle cone.

After buying the ice cream, you can walk around the waterfront and pier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPLevv_Xu1AreA-mimZQxLz-9amYd7ksTnC5ip&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Ash S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2CN5xxAMsX06vKwd5ojsEM_6x2BAAstbpJEk7IvtIe1L_kQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Loved the Rum Raisin flavour. Espresso Flake was just okay. However, they were both too sweet. Gelato is supposed to be intense in flavour, not sugar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2UHusPb_xo1y8Cu7zXTqbvNxoxtIgMAWPZI0W&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We always come here for froyo for the kids, it tastes very pure in ingredients. The raspberry was a little sour that my niece didn’t want to eat it (meaning no/not much added sugar 😂). Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsDBcqsUQw41h2rNqsvMwnkgK-JQ80OVpi8ag5&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Reshma Manohar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5l8oaz-v1-h2I1TPRLsgz2wTv9HJgM1Rwd6TXAb4tmk9JP471=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great ice creams but their frozen yogurts are KILLER!
My personal favs ice creams and sorbets are matcha, lemon sorbetto, coconut, durian, vanilla and the rum & raisin.
I can hog on their frozen yogurts at any given time. Almost all the berry and fruit flavours taste great as frozen yogurt.
Great option for people with dietary restrictions and healthy binge eaters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY3eHP6Q4IPuTZz_csl-NG5IUZHfZFQxmfS15j&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Sahar Khyabani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1iYddhPhfLlKdZph2Ma43GiD7IqN5Zwh4h2PODnKdqpPKH3oR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have to be honest… I loved this place growing up but I came to visit recently and for the price the tiny scoops that are given are simply not worth it. Also the waffle cone didn’t taste good and was crumbling and leaking. I’m going to stick to Ernest who is roughly the same price but bigger scoops AND the ice cream is creamier. And their cones don’t crack and leak. Plus no sampling??? The minute I read that sign I should have known that the ice cream was no good anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhUXLichlIhwQ4tf7Aem5tZnHS7Ed59IaWj2jl&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"mahesh nandwani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWNF-5hvw4aOh0fqy4HB8nf8fWmTh5VJAVHjDHlshTviuAhfyP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great ice cream selection. We got the white chocolate Raspberry. This is apparently their house favourite. It was really good. The perfect balance of sweet and creamy. It was not overly sweet as well. 10/10 will come back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAMPKn17jAlNSF6RVHxIushkL1Xe0HhWnXWDbl&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great tasting gelato in the Steveston area! Just wish you could sample flavours before deciding - I ended up getting rum raisin and salted caramel and luckily ended up liking both.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2zNkv_u6JKMO7qYNV2ClMaJOn_gq-5JMopkmo&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Saskia Asyari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOw-vGRppaZWH-87l0DTjRp6cH2-cGmCr2why8D5leomPAj1GywA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wish they have another shop in Downtown/Burnaby/New West/Surrey because their ice cream is SOOOO good omg so creamy and tastes like a real thing. The cone is freshly made. I got the matcha and chocolate gelato ones. Such a heavenly combination. Will bike all the way from Surrey just to try it again and also give the frozen yogurt a shot!

Edit in 2024: finally tried their frozen and yogurt, as a hardcore froyo lover who have tried multiple froyo in her entire life, I must say this is the BEST frozen yogurt ever😭🥹🫶🏻they mixed it with REAL FRUITS of our choice and ofc i tried and mango and the taste was sooooo surrealllll it’s so creamy yet light yet fresh yet idk how to even describe it it’s a perfection in a cup. Would definitely try it again in a heartbeat 💗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP27T2x2aS3LontzxcssCNQNfzj_hKDFBGmmSrK&fid=0x0:0x577949abfe0c1e44"],"When":"2023-9-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little place with a nice atmosphere. Located in a central location of Steveston. Lots of seating, great bar, multiple big screen TV. Staff is very friendly and quick. Ordered the Bacon Blue Burger, very very tasty. Will be back to try something else next time. Lots of street side parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcjqUUq2GR4SAxSMh2RWE9_wQW1_UfYova5MpT&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Prince Poo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoxxgycgXTlCr-InOoVvNG3Q7jby-aaA_RBgIV7L29tE2RJr8O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of Poo’s favorite gastropubs in Richmond. Locally owned, quality food and decent pricing right in touristy Steveston Village make this a win. Not a huge place to roll up with 10 of your buddies.. this joint is where to go if you want to watch the game  with a small group from the bar top, or have a nice conversation without screaming at each other.

Hot wings with delicious buttermilk dip and the beef dip standout. Staff are laid back, friendly and always helpful when it comes to the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBek0-opeGvi2raMwyuWEUWAq0KXLQG_gQdBuH&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2022-12-12"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place had amazing chicken wings, the batter they use was amazing however everything else was a disappointment.

The fries were too salty and the kids menu of the chicken strips were so tiny. I have never seen chicken strips this tiny in my life. Also was not a fan of the BBQ sauce that they use in their burgers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGbI0MrELVMUot-lZWlkjrRVWNY8tWP40rUslO&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2023-5-1"},{"Name":"Austin Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtmQwwdNLx8jhzhMyuMKiSGI-p4y31sHh46NnIqNhLwnUb1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of new favorite spots now. Finally found a place where you can relax, have a beer, and have a conversation without having music blasting so loud in your ears. The music is just perfect.
Though we waited a bit too long for food, it was very delicious. The prices are fair and portions are big. We all enjoyed our meals. I'd never admit this again, but I had a bite of their Beyond Veggie Burger and it tasted better than my beef Burger...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcSg6WfSP5Xx1TaQ2jspHOOsbNQP2BWZuPjRqS&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2018-10-16"},{"Name":"Roxann Ck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILOyQrznnB_QjxfD2zuoh8C8xniTVPpbO_HiDCW1J9AetePg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The menu is amazing! Makes it hard to choose what to eat . Everything I saw that came from the kitchen looked soooo good! I had fish n chips my friend had steak frites both were delicious! 🤤","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdt8O-CA7EfmYfaA3SM5FJzIju3fzw-18qaPJaXOe3LtaoSo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was slower than I would have preferred given that it wasn't particularly busy. Once we ordered the food came out fairly quickly. My steak was cooked a bit more on the rare side than what I ordered but was acceptable. My fries came out ice cold, which when pointed out were quickly replaced with fresh ones. My dining partners beef dip had cold cheddar on it, would be nice if they tried to melt it a bit before hand. Overall the food and service were just ok. The beer selection was decent but easily beaten by other establishments in the area. I'll give this place another try in 6 months to a year before deciding not to return again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYRBx8dc4fl64KyPj3xKK0Cfv7Il5QV9ZCgzta&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2018-11-11"},{"Name":"Emily Ching","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVR5-jlk6Jy9z7mqJi1OoDYBUwNEGrtSQbHbdNBPmbnyqKwfyidw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The first thing my daughter told me after we ate there: “Mommy, can we not go back there again?” It sounds harsh, but it was pretty accurate. The only saving grace was the nachos. We went there last Thursday after trying a few other spots that didn’t have room. There was only one table occupied when we got there. (We should have taken the hint?)
We had the chicken wings which mediocre. I had the Beef Melt which was very bland. My daughter had the Mac & Cheese which she only took a few bites from. I don’t think we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgGf6Zqnb47ZsA1hGDQSgy5g1S0w2mKM3O14p0&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2022-8-13"},{"Name":"Music Preservation","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP5xMTBNvDTvXF15vF6LA-5zcLt_JFx5XDJ1-0RRt6m4prSIk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Good tasting food and all but outrages portion size for how much you are paying. So expensive for so little","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Anar
descriptions: Laid-back eatery serving Mediterranean & Persian fare such as grilled kebabs, salads & stews.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abdul Rahman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1y16W-JihptuYSezk2yfyADxj7Dl7B19TPhziB_5Xa6dveCtB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down, one of the best Iranian restaurants! Loved the atmosphere and the food.
My son tried lamb shank and he loved it. I tried Joojeh and loved it.
But the award goes to the hot, fluffy, crispy bread.
Anar, I loved your painting on the wall with the woman with the violin. The message was obvious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-tUzHTlZ1oVIHNpMPKtAw3nSjlUSs-zQUa-B-&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Abdelrahman Khalaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2jHI4KfqcSaV3xQ_vuzOHPSCzM5tStwL7T9jnOX2wCZGamqfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never rated place five stars but this one absolutely earned it. I eat lamp chunk every where i go, Anar serves it in a very unique way with the spices and the whole combination. My only recommendation is to serve it with plain rice.

Big shoutout for the owner who showed Persian Hospitality and served tea to the whole team.

Thanks for the amazing experience.  Will come again for sure :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKw3_H04Zlb3iAElf9mLmHoN42zgxCcqz6Qqq0&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Cecilia Rosell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwomk9hg14pcxT_1Pv82sThciTLOUVA0AIBBVtyCCEFbgnW0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lamb/beef kabobs and the chicken were both incredibly juicy. Rice was flavorful and fluffy. I honestly can’t remember last time I ate rice this perfect, or meats this juicy.
The eggplant dip is also so, so amazing. This is food heaven! I clearly need to eat Persian food more often.
Also staff is so friendly and sweet.
Can’t wait to be back and try more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA1jsnBeabyBXRZvcLuTbR_hL-7cDN5wn2qcQg&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"H Mir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKltxLfBFcp_u0TiyRkgOBXXJ0JsQNYaNf6ammLlh9LQsuUTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Anar Restaurant in Richmond, and it was an amazing experience! The food is incredibly delicious and truly authentic, bringing the real taste of Persian cuisine to the city. The ambiance of the restaurant is cool and inviting, making it a perfect spot for a great meal. A special shoutout to David, the owner, who is super friendly and fun. Thanks, David, for the wonderful food and the warm hospitality! Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2zHJepxlBFMlG8TJDhkmOJo2y_rgppS-ad5oE&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Y L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNU1df5LXNmrErSWyQZKM2biUyNZpBpYpeIyc2OqSSiS6ANfs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow. Got the Curry chicken, logmeh and sharbat everything slapped so hard. I thought I knew what good logmeh tasted like but wow this one was juicyy af and the salad was so fresh that alone was great. The curry chicken was so zesty, perfect spice and chicken was tender. Must have is the Sharbat, beautiful presentation and a refreshing drink with a QQ taste. Saffron ice-cream also 10/10 and ON TOP of that gender inclusive bathrooms 🤓","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq-ps_UX9h1RlJn4APqa-E2lsjOq387NOx8nLb&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"andy a","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7Y7rwHyjfulEA1YHdfgv-xt7-eGezTRedst5phEBEmPsbXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful experience.

Never had Persian cuisine, nor did I know what to look for or expect. A parking spot opened up right up front while looking for another restaurant. Had seats open and the menu looked intriguing. Ventured in and fell in love.

A couple lovely families enjoying their evening when I was seated, normal family friendly atmosphere. Full of laughter and joy. Soon everyone else had left and I enjoyed the whole place to myself. I got to experience a few firsts.

The lamb shank was cooked perfectly, only needed my fork to pull apart what didn't fall off the bone.

The rose lemonade was out of this world.

Their eggplant appetizer and crispy soft pillowy bread was unlike any bread I have had before. Every bite was delicious.

Ended with their half and half dessert, the rose syrup was a homerun.

I will definitely be coming back to try their kebab.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObWBxaKMRaoi7cU6geR93TIG8Hti11Z2VvBcR6&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Alison Campos Granados","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaEZoJf9UKAjD4SdoX8PMMm_BQ0K34JLP5KdJ9XzrtohmuE-1T=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing dining experience at Anar. The Vegan Fesenjan and Vegan Kashk o Bademjoon were phenomenal—rich, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The pomegranate dressing was a standout, adding a fresh, vibrant touch to every bite. Great ambiance and impeccable service. Highly recommended for a memorable meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3A0bwjxxnAPZIvkFQDTaBbwVfeiiAjFo2S7WX&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Zhuge Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo5epQpB8uJydI3sToJa66foIacZBCLIBYQ-6Z79DDQxjMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly service, though longer than expected; guess it's made to order 😉

Rice stuffed in grape leaves: taste and texture on point.
Roasted 🍆 dip: truly an appetizing appetizer, especially with the freshly made bread 😋
Fesenjoon: unique (sweet/sour) taste, reminiscent of Filipino dinuguan.
Loughmeh kabob: the 🌟- order this if you only have one choice! Juicy, flavourful and tender...the jeweled rice, however, lacks in taste.
Beef ghormeh sabzi: thick, salty beef stew, nothing stands out.
Chicken curry: tender but lack the flavour the menu suggests.
South Beach fish: bit dry, saved by the dill rice and sautéed vegetables.
Faloodeh: skip it. Lemon (?) Ice cream was OK, but the blocky cubes of syrup are poor execution and presentation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhe3wezcPJzBsZk6bX1kZWcy1fYLvkEr9Odhi1&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-5-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Iris Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1iwoRm-sUZfzxB_8Ci6eehDD44eHj6hnjbcRICVKDc6o-xwIz1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious dishes here. Excellent tasting, especially if you like spicy. The atmosphere is also quite nice, usually very spacious and not that busy so you can enjoy the beautiful interior decor and calm lovely exterior scenery in peace. There's street parking and right outside, there's a path to take a walk right by the water, making it a very unique location. The staff also make quite an effort to provide good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO82FKxMsOsvn4VLWoC-LH0FmpwfWf4Iwzi3By&fid=0x0:0xb5f8a02aa64344f3"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"TERRY CHENG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsg-oI6sco7O5Go48_oGM2GdPS9ywAc_QfXDXDKM3uhrlF3VpMxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful time. The food was delicious, a burst of flavor in your mouth. My only suggestion would be to use dark meat instead of white meat for the chicken. Service was stellar. Our cups were always filled. Food came quick. Service with a smile. The restaurant is beautiful inside and outside. Very cozy and modern.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_wsq_ursALDclXHTaWWrfINczcJ_oH11BfZA0&fid=0x0:0xb5f8a02aa64344f3"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Fanny Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXm8EoBzG77BIIjdpRb_CFwMHE1opsPQ_grOt4OaM_e6SqT8dAD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here on a Sunday afternoon. It was quiet with only a few tables occupied. Spacious and clean restaurant in a quiet neighborhood. We both got the Dine Out Vancouver lunch menu for $20. It came with an entree, a drink and a dessert. Pretty good deal with everything so expensive nowadays. Food was decent, nothing too fancy. Service was friendly and the owner even came over and chatted with us a little bit. Would go back and give their regular menu a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0YqlkckLrMu6YKnJFu4QJ_A1Pi-ow0foY7sHZ&fid=0x0:0xb5f8a02aa64344f3"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Meraaz Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKojh51RHMoq5BAcgGQsBhMnZrg9J7guNq6rHJzD_eMDzSe3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nestled in the heart of Steveston, this Indian-African fusion restaurant is truly a hidden gem. My taste buds were in for an unforgettable journey, leaving me more than satisfied with my meal. The atmosphere inside was delightful, particularly because it wasn't crowded. The service was impeccable, with an elder gentleman who made everyone feel at home. The food was served piping hot, and each dish was a hit.

For a point of reference, I sampled the "kukupaka"—a boiled chicken dish cooked with coconut cream—and it was exceptional.

I highly recommend giving this place a try; it's an experience you won't want to miss.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"van 2024","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPCUmmEsFOT0pOXMyYTOnYdLx-D6gdiMsXJxJoJAtyom4BxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it's not like other Indian restaurants, Ember kitchen is a very good place to have dinner here. Nice services and environment! Food is nice too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0u01ukZ89ToyOdRevH6dysl_lZ85JR2MyMlXG&fid=0x0:0xb5f8a02aa64344f3"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here twice (2021 & Jan 2024). Excellent service, nice food and atmosphere. The owner always takes time to chat with customers. He's very nice and humble.

This restaurant is suitable for everyone, especially perfect for couple romantic dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfTKtj8QmBG3LQ_buInWVv9giCtqyVI7Ezf0FY&fid=0x0:0xb5f8a02aa64344f3"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"wacka fame","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhf98SJGWWHG8XKy7VNDuqod_mJEixi9j5SXv_Q9ksTBDx3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let's start off by saying that I am not a person who would pick an Indian restaurant as my first choice to dine out. This place just blew my mind. It is Indo-African cuisine at its best. From all the food to beverages everything is well thought-out and the ambience is great. I love the view of the bar and the kitchen everything looks well maintained. I recommend it as a hidden gem 💎","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sharmila kasbekar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaOQkqY32Iz4d-UmVbQ7ZF1gryy139wx-O4OaQsFu-54XMhj_pGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took my parents for lunch on a Sunday and we enjoyed our experience. Nice location, good food, service.  Will visit again. Indian restaurants in lower mainland tend to have the same dishes, so it was nice to see a varied menu. Chutneys were delicious, fish Tikka was very good and so was the biryani. Okra  and eggplant fries were tasty as well.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jason Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo5sPZ67s_mnhJwZ79b2vBa8twlqYbk9eZujv14dBdLN9-xEyftw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My son and I came in for a late lunch, and thankfully the lunch sets are offered until 3:30pm! The portions are perfect for us. The butter chicken and naan wrap was really tasty! Great service as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLeCQaCN6W9866x1Rk0TjqzDsic5IIhE6VTveh&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered butter prawn and naan.
There are two different type of butter prawn. I chose one of them and the taste was weird. It's not the same like typical butter prawn (or butter chicken) in other restaurants.

This place is small with limited table.
Luckily i came late past the dinner time.
If i'm not mistaken no restroom to customer. Maybe you can ask if they allowed to use their own/staff restroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxe1wGEKOoCtflY_8JhxYPgD7ym_UStTFvQAvW&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZLT69rehlvFvDm5qWpfEuJbJS_vlr2aPoBKjZZPBXujTC8I-X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Average butter chicken - tastes more like tomato soup. However the mixed plate was great and we enjoyed the flavour and portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNUBTrr8kVbUSLovgNTs5VNgdeyS0pI3cUgs6f&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A small store with roughly six tables.  They have a variety of menu items.  The lunch special is relatively cheap with a good portion.  The taste of the food is alright.  The server had an amazing service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ8uwyVQhPLmqyWMZ3dlX1vHmUQIX8LSZNfKl1&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXku1mc6pmeIDMqP2gIA1uCtfryJMYCip8UUonqzGQcOKr7CzokQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The mango lassi was good, the meat tandoori platter was well cooked, the garlic naan wasn’t as good, had better ones in other restaurants. But overall their cooking was good! The price is worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKgSujyYSPxk0gmI7fZ7WNObQ45EaJWGosGFXo&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Dewang Lakhani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGRY1vV3JMn8f0oqzL-F_T1UtjEgKWx5r1mo_ZG91Qhz4P90cG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy Indian food, this is one of the best food I have ever had, I really wish we had this restaurant where I live. The hospitality was great, we were seated immediately and the food was so fresh. I left this restaurant with my stomach full along with my heart full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_Lzp-vDwZYhMkLosf9N6hfRpD84Wgb5dXxxfF&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Louise Yeoh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKn6H1v99edwzRk8pxHxqcfGWgIZaHgZyHlx8FsGc__i8U2ig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the Fish vindaloo  with medium spice level and Garlic Naan as a Take out.  Naan was very good . The Vindaloo fish was very tasty and portion of fish . But it was way too Salty . Had to make brown rice to try to make it edible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFkGsTv5TKqCCvxp_Ib06eeDhChSZLNKtvz4kS&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Sanjay Karve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOiT1a2kvyIetbSm4Y1-A_kBKUa44e9t-gQ8-h3PcYTzXWLaS6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got to know of this tiny Indian Eatery from our Son and we reluctantly went in.

Its a small Clean place with 5 to 6 tables.
It offers a variety of Indian Food , though primarily from North India. The tables are neatly arranged and it does give u a lot of moving space. The Restaurant was clean and gives positive vibes.

There was one Girl/lady who was maintaining all tables, taking orders and serving them. She is helpful with Suggestions , should you want one. (Incidentally all her suggestions were woerhwhile)

We ordered Paneer Tikka, Gobi Aaloo, Butter Naan and Garlic Naan. The lunch culminated with Masala Chai.

The preparations were nice tasty and the quantity was more than sufficient.  I have been travelling into USA Canada and Europe for the last 17 years,  and this is by far the Best Indian Food that I have had.

A well done to the Village Curry Team ,in losing the Backdoor staff like the Cook.
Would love to visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONjMKQUCno-gey9XAbstk3orrLhy5jICFby97S&fid=0x0:0x364f1e7d077132bc"],"When":"2024-9-22"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Shawn Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-YIiQlPOSReFNeT6qjGb923CSf84D0mfUae_jxylAzg3SJYVIMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here for the first time, appears to be under mew management. Previous time been here things were great 👍🏽. Appears to be really pricey here. Wife ordered the crispy fish burger and she thoroughly enjoyed it.  I got the Seaside fish and chips, added 2 pieces for extra $20 for my kiddos. It was a bit greasy, bitter batter and not fulfilling. The servers were great and exceptional customer service 👍🏽. I’ll give it another shot next time order something different on date with wife and kids again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa32Rwrh5mZSEShSJCaKFvQ_j0sdLQVxOl-yd5\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Jacinta Kuznetsov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn9e1RYuJDikoVvtGXWaURC7b0bqWHRKo7pNdMl4HGqy4RdMbl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love the food and service here. Got the prawn pasta and gnocchi and both were fantastic! We have had other things in the past and love to come here. Definitely a must eat in Steveston!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC1s_tm70LlTVLRhMZojTj3xUF1_whnTeNfl5y\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Aves","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIO8uvFJaKHMJfZyhUlNUskNNfgBnbY_EbCix4av00-r77U30=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Overall amazing experience. Both owners came to say hi and chat for a bit. I had the Brisket Sando, it was very good. The seasoning was amazing. One of the best briskets I’ve had in forever. Fries were delicious as well. My grandma had the Prawn Spaghetti which was very tasty. I also got a pineapple mojito which was good too. Service was great, very good experience overall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJUBK79ubf3FpAIwWQYdgiD1M34ruOWS-67Cg\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Tiger Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbPSbdquohUV5n4fd8Skf5K0yyIXa05kG-FI_e_IrKXHaI9IgS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good spot, great music and renovation. My coffee took 40min to refill, the pasta is kind of raw. The coffee taste plain, too much water. The price is kind of high compared to the given portion","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlk4rAh_lYues2hAN7giaNA-bgC0KwETwKnYr3\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Kab Kbaas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5U0xr3upvQTURbvXCvcu5mgHu9kAs3kt9vv_C4iuqaE8mdtRkEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We recently had dinner at this attractive restaurant and opted to dine outside on the patio. The food was very good; we enjoyed a variety of dishes, including fish and chips and a hummus platter with several slices of melt-in-your-mouth beef. The service was friendly and cordial. However, the plates were left on the table after we finished eating, likely an oversight by our waitress, who appeared to be new. I'm confident this issue will be resolved for future patrons of this newly owned restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPerLvx8vf6agHWgl4E2iuR8wu8PZtZtmNoo5AI\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Dennis Gane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK2vTygrzeOffxfKsRU6ycdG1u0olNgxzT4KW4dGrgRw_eMLtMtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are several restaurants I've tried on the wharf and not been disappointed. This newcomer on the block likewise was not a disappointment. They have only been open a month and appear to be tweaking their menu. I'm happy to see the new one (see pic) and they limit their offerings. I always consider this a good sign. Typically to many options results in mediocre food as chefs try to do to much and it's really noticable when a restaurant is busy. I had the fish (cod) and chips. The fish was was cooked perfectly. The chicken burger was equally good. Our server (Teressa) was very pleasant and attentive. They also accept private bookings for a lovely area overlooking the wharf on the second floor. In addition, they have many patio seats. They are definitely worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNry4eJlKBfL-OJFkU9CY9pK-1UN1ecCvTphzfx\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Mackenzie Biggar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvOHHjIsRsUfCLYuXKWpnpVyZIW755hk0GRJEmXglHx4jTxPTM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This local loves Lavash! I grew up and live in Steveston and have seen my fair share of fish and chip efforts - and this is the best I’ve had. And I don’t say that lightly. We had halibut and chips - it was cooked to perfection, the batter was perfectly balanced, not over or under cooked. The fries were crispy and delicious (I’m not a fan of the soggier British style chips), tartar sauce was delicious along side a dash of coleslaw. If you have room for a warm up, the Sexy Olives are just that and the Lavash Classic Hummus is fantastic (I’m chickpea’d out lately but this hummus was everything!). While there are more famously known places for F\u0026C, I would absolutely give this newcomer a try. We sat seaside on the patio, an excellent way to spend a summer night. We’ll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi68WrK19v2DlKR06hXUJ-pYwwf5P9mAN3sq32\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"romi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqhv9gBGfDtbLzcB4jJepsUXtD2u5MuzE9exz-__bCGWLBsR6h=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"genuinely had some of the best seafood spaghetti i’ve ever tasted. the fish tasted amazing and i would 100% recommend coming here. waiters were also very nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPR5VWplWLG-X6ejtbrGNGAkODACvn97xDceIm\u0026fid=0x0:0x958fda7643bc1c3"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]
