user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joy Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC-_yA3p_X742W41EdNrtxi3vJwE-8nzXlxcJ1ULn4Y4bOuMMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend commented this place. It is the Taiwan’s style restaurant. My favorite dish was beef noddle soup, the meat was tender and juicy. I love the fried food and wanted to try everything. So I order D1 including many things.  The double chicken legs combo must order. The tasty or food are good flavors not salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPAUWhUH0uyIcKY-I4kWCCVGNDpe0-tKQ8HJ6W&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Yan Jie Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWtJgsuhwRId0t1MOzd5ywiIXfrBfIFDTo7UODkLUu9At3EXtegw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service: The lady is super kind! We arrived at around 2pm, and there’s about 4 groups in front of us, she kindly asked us to walk around or wa it inside the car cause it too windy outside. And when we were dining inside she keep saying sorry for the wait, it’s very heartwarming.
Food: their Taiwanese food is truly amazing. Great selection, and very authentic. I recommend fish belly soup, fried chicken, and sausage. No wonder there’s always a line! It’s worth the wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlbT6nS8QRvE7r0EjXvN0p8UVjdaYIf2qnVItY&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most authentic Taiwanese restaurants in greater Vancouver, great for when I’m missing hime. Love the small sausage in big sausage and stinky tofu: I just wish it was more stinky lol

Of course the prices could never compare to the prices in Taiwan but it’s Vancouver 🥲

The food is great and I always bring home the frozen gyoza 🥟 鍋貼which is sooooo delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB8vLmjd-icEEX5dB4X6adZXa4xLl_CbmdtYGA&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"James Coles-Nash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkJrmtjWT371XtK4SkdD-gc4742YrtKT1KSibl27VRSYpTt9Yi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Taiwanese food at a reasonable price. We had the Taiwanese sausage, drop fried chicken nuggets and beef noodle, all of them were great and came fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOubFZ14jTdQVCHMsiH3pkkFvTCFDU8RrOYCqEm&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We will go again to order other dishes.  We enjoyed the food and the service was really good.  We had the oyster pancake, beef noodle soup, oyster vermicelli soup, pork belly on rice, fried tofu, Taiwanese sausage and rice sausage.  Looking forward to our next visit!

Pictures from our latest visit.   They had a new lamb hotpot.   They asked for our feedback...it was very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeCdmRIVc-f6B30uuAF5MHN74iHvM7PWNa3lOd&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Albert Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu_EXMOFkw3t7ieiosbnUm8U0dDlr8SUxo6E0Nm1EZRYvKeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Everytime when coming back, the food elevates it flavor.  Indicating they are always seeking to improved its dishes and giving room for improvement","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcDqQQNIfKM0qk-892nM0CTf6YpdvHGtHSLHjy&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"Alastair Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2gspK8j66vIPaBKlAUhLSLU2O8o8CDsdJ6D5x5Th63iSt_sjDAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a bike ride with my buddy and decided to stop by here instead of getting pizza (which has become way too expensive). The patio was lovely on a sunny Saturday afternoon. The service was friendly and prompt. The food was delicious. I really enjoyed the beef noodle soup. Popcorn chicken was good but had a bit too much batter or fat, couldn't tell. Maybe use better cuts of chicken with less fat? Not sure. Dessert was aiyu and deliciously refreshing on a summer day. The price was very reasonable. Which is funny, because if it were more expensive I would've ordered a lot less (usually I just get noodles and call it a day). But I ordered 2 appetizers and a dessert at this restaurant and ended up spending more 😅.

Keep up the good work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLK9eHJg0oxVm0NEUtP8_tD47CkAglDTnfMvca&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Nicole Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdAow82J4tPwMSY2ca6JgSF68bASnvtD-62FnrDIFUIVzacw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is super yummy and flavorful with an authentic taste from the southern part of Taiwan (Tainan), and their service is absolutely amazing! We got the Formosa Platter which is a great choice if you want to try several different night market snacks at once and share between 1-2 people. The plate that they used even has the shape of Taiwan! We also loved the Pan-fried Oyster Pancake as it’s loaded with tons of toppings and the oysters are huge! The Mega Meat Dumpling is really unique with a chewy texture and stuffed with a good portion of meat. Their drinks were very refreshing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-yWx-db5o2E1ryYNLAOfJu9SYAXpvfpjcK1QM&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2022-8-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Secret Avenger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcLg50FQDZ5LMiWF85LMU8y4vrJLdccz3r8DiPK89UXYZYmc5zNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried this place for the first time today & well there aren't many places that serve plate lunches like they do in Hawaii around BC. This place absolutely nails the food & the Aloha that goes along with it. I was given the recommendation to go with the Huli Huli chicken and man it broke da mouth along with the Mochi, Coconut Flan and the Shave Ice! Braddah these grinds are Ono! We will be back for more! Thanks for the Aloha of Hawaii!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNespJhLVr7w8NiUYHDMOt7uIBAkNCo2SWqiaOi&fid=0x0:0x3017e03aba3cdad8"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Stephanie Choo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsh9cieSQUcRhg0NUO05i_3K_jTZJanXH9s6cZUf6xbegSvOkU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time to Aloha Hawaiian Grill and it was so delicious!
We walked in and were greeted, we took a look at the menu ( there was a lot of delicious choices) 3 of us ordered: canned pop from Hawaii, spam Masubi, pork rib platter, chicken platter and the garlic shrimp platter.
We shared it all amongst ourselves, it was all delicious.
The flavours were all different and unique, very fresh and generous portions for the prices.
Our first time and definitely not our last, we would like to spread the word on such a delicious cuisine and we look forward to our next visit back :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here on a day when most other restaurants were only taking reservations. I miss eating loco moco so that’s what I needed up ordering. Pretty standard and it satisfied my craving. Seating is pretty limited so hopefully when you go it’s nice out so you can sit outside. Service was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0HdYr8AJ4pTKtpyxR1s8iAQIcW3FSnoCKHg-F&fid=0x0:0x3017e03aba3cdad8"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Fanny Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXm8EoBzG77BIIjdpRb_CFwMHE1opsPQ_grOt4OaM_e6SqT8dAD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here recently with a bunch of friends for dinner. A small causal place for quick dine in or takeout. They were very accommodating and accepted our reservations for a group of 12. I tried the Hawaiian Garlic Shrimp with extra Huli Huli Chicken and Loco Moco. I haven’t been to Hawaii in a long time so I can’t comment how authentic the food is. Food was pretty delicious overall especially the Huli Huli chicken. Nice caramelized flavour with moist and tender meat. The garlic shrimps were cooked well and had a little spicy kick to them. The Loco Moco was probably my least favourite. It was just a bit too salty for my taste. Overall an enjoyable meal. Staff was really nice and gave each kid a Hawaiian lei. Would go back for the Huli Huli Chicken if I were in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSfAHuOEiZqJLl4YjNRkfTa7jrDMm_SgyUgbfl&fid=0x0:0x3017e03aba3cdad8"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Newish Hawaiian spot that opened up in Steveston. Small little shop with a few tables inside. Dishes are generally served up like the plate lunches that you find in Hawaii. Kind of wish they had more environmentally friendly containers.

The garlic shrimp is served shell-on (gotta make sure to suck all the flavour on it. Served with rice and their version of mac salad. Overall good flavour but shrimp are kinda small if you compare them to the garlic shrimp you get in Hawaii. The sauce is a bit more thick and savory.

Really enjoyed the huli huli chicken. There was a nice caramelized sauce on the skin and the meat was nice and tender.

One complaint was the spam musubi. The rice was hard and crumbled apart (kind of reminded me of rice that's been sitting in the fridge). Not sure if that was a one-off thing.

Update: revisit in mid October. Ordered the huli huli chicken again but also tried the Maui beef ribs. The ribs were plentiful and saucy (although some pieces were a bit tougher to chew through). A feel like the chicken was better on our first visit - think they didn't sauce it enough (mental note to ask for more sauce next time).

Update: March 1, 2024
Returned for a revisit in early March. The huli huli chicken was as good as I remembered (especially with the sauce). We were trying to decide between the Maui beef ribs and the pork ribs so they gave us a pork rib to try.  Definitely the Maui beef ribs were much better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPZpkaS8Uk_zZB5MxCXiDxOMlX9KFa_AWxlnuv&fid=0x0:0x3017e03aba3cdad8"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Mackenzie Biggar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvOHHjIsRsUfCLYuXKWpnpVyZIW755hk0GRJEmXglHx4jTxPTM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mahalo from a Steveston local! Good value, good food. I was excited to see a new casual lunch spot in Steveston where you can do a quick dine in or 'grab and go' and not spend the 'tourist tax'. The Hawaiian garlic shrimp were tasty, cooked perfectly and came with a stack of sides including white rice, macaroni salad and sweet corn. Make sure to ask for some dipping sauce for the rice which is served plain. My husband had the Huli Huli chicken meal which came with the same as above - he gave it a solid thumbs up as well. The only downsides were that the meals are quite carb-heavy and there are few options for vegetarians. Wishing this business much success in our community!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY7Q2ZYCslQB0PuArhk2fYPXvdQu28JTe-z5AX&fid=0x0:0x3017e03aba3cdad8"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Sara Cortes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5kIIGzl7XiJqBpoz4J21plBrzs42LPyiMKrSYYG_Wmug-nYbKrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very happy I got to finally try this place! The loco moco was such a classic nostalgic dish for me it really satisfied my craving for hawaiin food. My partner got the chicken which was so delicious and the Mac salad was such a great pairing. Ended off with the shaved ice with condensed milk (mango and passion fruit!) it was so fluffy and creamy, the perfect treat to enjoy along the water 😁 already excited for our next visit ! The staff were very friendly and helped me decide what flavour to get!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc5lABxQoBDcLaJMK3pjS0VZ4fN3aozBgBjJed&fid=0x0:0x3017e03aba3cdad8"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Lexi Malana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBSmKarIAf3phPO31xymVA5Pehks0mmx9PYXh6FS8wUXzy7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried this for the first time last weekend. It was pretty good!! We had the short rib rice platter and the garlic shrimp. The short rib tasted delicious. The garlic shrimp I wish the shell was peeled off because I hate shrimp with shell intact, makes it less flavourful. So the shrimp was okay to me.

Shaved iced was delicious!! I recommend adding the condensed milk. Spam musubi was also pretty good. Quick and easy bite size snack. Will come again to try the other menu items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMZZExaC7Widd07ZbugHkFuDDSfDseopSx4jHp&fid=0x0:0x3017e03aba3cdad8"],"When":"2023-9-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah Wootty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7AAitqYRi3Dv8-ARHluxK55qFjxWTN-sqFKnOyb-SK5eVruA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is in my top 3 favourite brunch spots in Richmond. The food is always fresh and delicious and they have a great selection of hot and cold drinks. My favourites have been the chicken and waffles, truffle brisket Benny, and the hearty breakfast. The garlic hashbrowns are delightfully crispy. The truffle brisket Benny was exploding with truffle flavour. I’m obsessed! The little side salad that comes with your meal is simple, fresh, light and so tasty that I always eat every single bit of it, and I’m someone who usually ignores a side salad. Service is always friendly and efficient and the place seems well cared for. If you love hot sauce, you’ll love the options here - there’s at least 14 different kinds. The only downside is that there aren’t many tables in the restaurant so they can only serve about 8 or 9 groups at a time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW-gdL1y91Fn8bgmqV9sTq6pvqyRX4AyP4KS3z&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Finally made it to Chef's Playground in the beautiful town of Steveston. We had lunch and the wait was about 10-15 minutes, but it was worth it! The food was spot on, and the portions were HUGE. My personal favorite was the Texas BBQ burger – the combination of beef brisket, beef patty, and fresh veggies was perfect. My wife really enjoyed the chicken curry burger, though it wasn’t my favorite since I’m not big on fried chicken. The boys had chicken waffles and loved them, though the waffle was on the sweeter side – I'd recommend trying it before adding syrup.

What truly stood out was the fresh juice of the day – super refreshing! The ambiance here is warm and welcoming, and the staff was friendly and attentive. Definitely a place we’ll be visiting again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF-_lKpkgOrNTidoahy_8cMDeRqQTvIBRNkTvw&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Richard Oxlade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6dmdsmRg8ls0W8KfTsxibV4XJj0l366DGgb_zQ42TaifdINNk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time exploring the Steveston area and decided to try a new brunch spot. The service is friendly and prompt when arriving and the menu has a decent amount of unique brunch items suitable for any dietary needs.

I was very impressed by the efficiency and quality of the ingredients making it a delightful start to the day. I got the Fried Chicken Benny which was amazing in every way and exactly as great as you’d hope it would be. Definitely worth coming back here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdRBvb3XA8L6W5FFMs01apPf9YXIDPUr8Tl6Lc&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Caelin G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLGC4bNAQk1QiGf1k6SS7zGCvN-prlMszCXle0MDeZpWWLgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a calm and relaxing atmosphere here on a Saturday afternoon. It feels like a small seaside town with a lot of diverse options on eatery! Lots of street parking and paid parking lots and garages as well. Definitely a walkable area to spend a whole lunch and afternoon.
I stopped by this place since it was just after the lunch rush and there wasnt anyone inside on this cold and rainy day. But I saw they have RAVE reviews and the pictures of the food look amazing! The head chef built this whole indoor space himself! Down to the bench that
The atmosphere and decor is relaxing despite the open kitchen floorplan.

They also have SATURDAY Happy Hours!!
I ordered 2 happy hour items (triple garlic fries + oyster chowder), their blueberry lemonade, and a bbq burger.
The BBQ burger is one of the BEST I've ever had! And I'm from the US where we ARE burgers lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC0l4rjLFzkKKf2K1IC-cfbI0wS6IK9R3ETJ2l&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little hidden treasure right in Steveston village. Excellent atmosphere and the service is fast and friendly. Ordered the really tasty, King mushroom burger, and the nice crunchy fries. Has some limited street parking right out front. Come try it, you’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4sodV6tgnnEK4LoJNLcwEsiKsUjx8PyymxnoB&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Vancouver Subaru Club","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU1rgxG9uka5-poCI1yeNpCECc1amazzTb2-ax3YsN6JYZCg8d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the steak and eggs. Everything was very good, steak was cooked to what's requested. Only I server working so server was very busy hence service was a bit slow very understandable. Very nice size piece of steak but would rather have a smaller size but better cut of meat, just my suggestion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoyA-hoTzjpRq_SpFUYhC22srfJ3vLTEInU9SY&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Kel Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlG7dSzG0XCaRucFdzjLtGXMN3t4REtRn-uT0qJZlGy2kASSN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little brunch spot in Steveston. Service was very attentive. Brought my youngest here for a birthday breakfast date. Food was very tasty. Place is small but cute. Bacon was a bit overcooked but really nothing else wrong. Would definitely come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_ooa5wMwu2fh14BEde_dmZqTs9PzVH5FwVRY&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"EL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2yPryHESod9FDq67pH52romRyAqfPUNSbzpu6LFJOTGTMUhsZvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favourite brunch restaurant in Steveston (yes, better than the ‘newer’ ones that opened). Generous portions. Nice service. Their fresh pressed juices are really food. And also drinks like the oj pekoe tea, very refreshing. Favorite dishes include the chicken and waffles, or the hash. Definitely give this place a try when you’re out in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMecoy86Xiq_vz042QhzzY65TVzSNnHu4CLSgbc&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-8-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Erin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNddZXBvjo1lM53d1JsGHCCAsJEWmjzWHaoOXhqaaioyHgIgaf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for lunch around noon on a weekday and it wasn't busy. The patio is clean and comfortable. Our server was nice and attentive.

We ordered eggs benedict with garlic shrimp, and another benedict with fried chicken. The fried chicken is well battered and fried, and was juicy since it was dark meat. The garlic shrimp was good, but if I'm honest I was a bit disappointed by the small size of the shrimp and the eggs that were used.

They were generous with the roasted potatoes and our meals tasted good, but for the price point it felt a bit underwhelming and the overall portion size for the eggs benedicts themselves has left me less than enthused to try this cafe again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtWcduJACjN62oAr55sTFfkUQMyOaymDFgDP3n&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jennifer Osuna Ausa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTgleJyQy49XcPyy0x9GmD2FZbgVovfYE7EubdT6hoNd08zgl3SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time dining here, and we were not disappointed. We will surely return.The breakfast paella is a fusion dish, and the orzo rice is well prepared. They add a lot of shrimp, and the flavours combine nicely. The calamari was tender, and the flavour met my preferences.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp_4vdbbuq2tc_DUI7IbtdJ_WZx5MQmN7UzA3D&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Mochichi Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFyjPl7H-V7mWpuOxmhOZJlef_eIhgoybBQQCMDjX3GS8zgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my first visit: Cannery cafe has  clean and comfortable outdoor seating.  Love their dishes with very good quality and presentation. Their spare ribs are so juicy, waffle with deep fried cod and poached egg is so good, Granny's clam chowder is extra yummy with the fresh bread. We also enjoyed their fresh brewed organic coffee, with hot milk and cream. Smart and courteous staff marks a great experience at the restaurant.  We'll definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnMjBhICueHZW4mFKOtAtFIXY1vC8tsfHrnDd1&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Ciaociao k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC98o0SMyIGT6PBDZZ1upK5e-wMdf2iaJ8WiCTjsLkNTDWJTYB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Patio season! We visited at Steveston early in May,of course no patio that time. Super nice weather no complain outside patio! Cafe is cute and cozy, not fancy but comfortable. Do not expect same as SFO or Seattle clam chowder. Soup is not enough. They have 3 options pay, cash, debit and credit. Cash and debit are better for pay.credit has to pay extra dollar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGps6B6xh1GlixVEitud73CAC-hmcKS-qaeWD&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Ryan Dai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvz_7CRNc0uzQynlzLBSk6wo_JRdBk-3lTZRZl_hkyJTXWois=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely brunch spot in Steveston, offering a lot of options and great portion size. Plating and presentation was a pleasant surprise, had a wonderful time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuWezNJHt4pq31mT2OYMj2oKszPkY-DifGrhLL&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Mike Hassard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH-ZkQW5qJlRiHy-FNQ8xn3HmqC9mLEUcZ168947ILG-lhIDuY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyable relaxing breakfast. Food was great service was great cute restaurant with history. Make sure to check out the wall of famous patrons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK6wko7OMh1XCyrSjN3djzqlKSneNKNDCMyhWR&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Liked the brunch options, their fries were unique, the food was displayed nicely as presentation is important. It's a small place that seems a bit crowded. It's busy on a sunny day, but didn't like that the building was old and glad we sat by the door for air circulation. Servers were nice and can customize your meal. Steak and lobster were surprisingly good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmWFDYqwWFxnXqha36ZojG88iuXufxmwP9-55D&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Sophie Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYv0ajQfaQ3wgEOSuA8kGAiDy6DmnBuYNOsG4Nm-68UM6xqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We gathered at Cannery Cafe on June 23, which is our yearly gathering and already keep going 6 years. We love the Cafe's environment, we choosed to sit at patio, beautiful view. And great service, when we told them that day is the birthday of one of our friends. The lady offered us beautiful cake. Nice experience and food, we love the granny chowder , and granny hot chocolate and salad.Back home, I started to watch the TV show: once upon a time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6_4KrXIH2SK-Ilu4hdG00CLlpIWpRl4y9uXba&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-6-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Look Look","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFnkEC0Vtlns3Rc_vpXyJoBK911s7R33e1juwoNfOw_Qrl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a family run restaurant and located inside the Steveston paramount.
As to support our neighbourhood restaurants, we want to try this for long time. However, their open hours are almost similar as my working hours and we can only try on Saturday (Sunday - off)!
Finally, we come today for late lunch. The owner are friendly and the foods are good. We try Pho/Coffee today and they also serve burgers, western breakfast too.
Sure will come again and highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS1--Bia62cs6TVnicIpLFJfMgdTUY__WwetM&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"paul grewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLL_5gAyVLhbsVHe22HJLiK-LIuUTj6EISuJJYPFgPYOIZ2KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Greasy spoon/ Vietnamese
Fast and friendly service, the staff is great. I'm a breakfast fan so I came for that and it was good,  I would have given 5 stars but the hashbrowns are a potato patty. That being said, the Vietnamese food looked pretty good and my friend was quite satisfied with it.
Will return again and again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnBmb0w8cIZ9ukxl51-xBtxseYbfuNhDleoZneQ-8UT_K7VCq_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here multiple times, and I've never had a bad experience. The food is always great and the service is equally as good. I would highly recommend eating here if you are considering trying a new place for Vietnamese food or just in the area for a snack","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Desy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrUNUi5nBlBmUQMOU2Lo2Yu5SjMGgKZ2L2N1xVRXSvhFjaBcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Riverside Cafe!  Hidden away inside the Steveston Harbour, is this family-run Vietnamese / American restaurant.

Another hole in the wall! Food was good, but nothing to rave too much about.  It is COLD inside so you might want to keep your jacket on for your meal!

1) Lemongrass Chicken on Rice with a Spring Roll
Overall it was a tasty dish, but I prefer ones from Pho 37, Thai Son, Com, Bonjour Vietnam, etc.  Despite being quite a bit cheaper than those other places, it does have less meat than the others.  Spring roll was decent!
4/5

2) Pho
Pho was standard, nothing to rave about.  Meat was a bit too lean and tough.  Broth was good and flavourful.
3.5/5

This cafe is situated right inside the Steveston Harbour, so feeding the cold fishermen with a nice home-style meal is perfect.  Would I come back? Yes!  But don't expect anything too fancy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYMlXQa9_bHdHFTKbDGB248ZcIFaPOt3VZ_tg&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-12-5"},{"Name":"Clara C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmc5kzCO5tkFsn4680DdIqFR890DxrKckFqBbF2fQo-K5WEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hidden gem! Fantastic noodle soups and staff is friendly. I don't drink coffee but the Viet coffee is a must! Wish they opened for dinner as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was a little hard to find but glad we found it.   Nice little place with good all day breakfast and Vietnamese food.   We had the eggs, sausage,toast and hashbrown, rare beef, beef ball pho, lemon grass chicken, fried egg, spring roll on rice and lemon grass chicken, spring roll vermicelli bowl.  The food was very good and service was great.   Will come again...great find!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc4hEPcv63VHIUJry-IGKT5pMyEODEj8e8nTzJ&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-9-20"},{"Name":"W T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdu0TMV7B9Y2mJkSC3Cb_ZRin-xtIVsRd9t2JXcXN3mCCzpbY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is made with love.  Good portions and tastes great. Staff is friendly.

Went back for takeout. Food still made with love. Eating it makes me happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORckN6FU0wNOvDZzmckccpe7k0nj1hjuI2eSXy&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-11-12"},{"Name":"priscilla luarca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcHPyL4PQvXbHxJODS88u4f2xMg0a4bTylbgmnRVCK_Dsnqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a hole in the wall hidden gem. Came here for lunch with the kiddos. Ladies working were friendly and vietnamese food was good. Exceeded my expectations, given the location.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Five Roads Brewing Steveston
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Bar on-site","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We drove all the way from Vancouver to Steveston on a hot Friday evening. We needed a break from the heat after browsing around the area briefly. We went into this pub with no expectation. It turned out to be a good spot for watching sports. They had multiple TVs on the wall at different sections of the little pub. We could witness Canada beating Venezuela on penalty kicks. It was quite a magical afternoon. The staff who worked there seemed super young but they were very friendly. We will drop by next time when we are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMehSv5qK5c_dHHM6yXW1zy6Qd9ijzce4OIn937&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Colin Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZp9_lV8pRp5vdxZ55gJhPc2X5trs5ePUFqraR0pMh47ShlBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to Five roads brewing all the way from West Vancouver on a hot Tuesday evening. We decided to try out the patio area and it very private and relaxing. We ordered the Moncton lobster roll. It was PACKED with lobster. Perfectly cooked and seasoned. The Caesar and beer flights were unique and delicious. Will definitely be making this a routine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAkReHUP9MUuSs-2Byi0OVDO-VoBlxu-3RmTlg&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Steven Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUdCMXU-vTG7wFG8ffaLxrR1rzEIZCV2d2O99a36kgQUAq2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst lobster rolls I’ve ever had, 38$ for this, that’s disgustingly over priced. The soup was cold in the middle, the server was very nice.
We came here cause all the good reviews, but the food was really disappointing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVP95Bol4N8rAMdr_gI_M60PNvzasDzgxECTx-&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"i’mvicki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtvnsbbLDU8XLfOtgkf6Yb2_QNqnJ4bTxWSAtu7xvWneKydXpl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very very bad experience. Soup was cold the first time so we had to ask the waiter to reheat it.  The lobster roll is overpriced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHIb4xQLEEFPvKPYFphC3TlPrpzkZgTpsm6QzY&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Jolie Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbIxM1bUQ9tgjKNyRumXO2IxM64BaaQIpwnFb8fKAhTndY0Ahw-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had such a great time trying the different beers with my family! Great location and the ocean blend bisque was to die for. The owner was very sweet and we felt very welcomed. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFasvMw0Axw3gwb07nQSK2ec98ZmHqLbXO5UOx&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Matthew L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc9fHn8uXVktnQv8aocHCHj44Jm3-C13gSis0GjGhXqRQXFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great brewery in Richmond to visit. It is in a bit of a tucked away location. Be sure to try a flight to experience lots of their different beers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUz0DAJSO3HBuU21myK1VJyp8IHl9_OQOVe0GM&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Sarah Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_FahoQBKzoW_sAhVyOAftvvYLkKcOIWVsBwi6lWnNai8UudNI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun small place to visit in Steveston. 8 beers on tap, including stout, lagers, and a pilsner. They also had a cider on tap. It was pretty sweet, but I liked it. It would have been better if it had been carbonated. The one I had in a flight tasted rather flat, sadly.

They also sell their beer by the can in a 4 pack to go. You can mix and match for thr 4 pack.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Five Roads Brewing is located in the Richmond, Stevenson area. A great brewery to sit, relax and enjoy a beer after walking around the shops surrounding it. Delicious beers, patio seating, food offerings and great views. Perfectly located in the Steveston fisherman wharf shopping district. They also offer wine, cocktails and Five Roads merchandise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHV9HNWuyGaG4AT1EyXfxWQS6ReKNb6Ddtn4j8&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"YU U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0nH1IDVl5JKBE-6ym-GzRTN424F1AIj9FKlXASZfTI9-nMv1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited a restaurant that specializes in curry rice, and I was really impressed with the overall experience. One unique aspect of the place is that they use ramen noodles with their curry broth. While the noodles become a bit too soft from soaking in the broth, it doesn’t take away from the flavor. The broth itself is rich and flavorful, as it seems to have been enhanced with stock, making it incredibly satisfying. Paired with an onsen egg, the dish reaches a perfect balance of texture and taste.

I ordered the fried oyster curry rice, which quickly became my favorite. The moment I bit into the oysters, the fresh, briny flavor of the sea burst in my mouth—it was simply delightful. Another standout was the fried chicken curry rice. The chicken had a perfectly crispy exterior with tender, juicy meat inside. It was easily one of the best fried chicken cutlets I’ve had recently. The portions of both the curry and rice were generous. For first-timers, I recommend starting with the regular portion, and if you’re still hungry, you can always opt for a medium-sized portion, especially if you can eat a lot!!

The ordering process was super convenient. Each table has a QR code, so you can order directly without waiting for a server. While the restaurant was a bit crowded, it’s a typical atmosphere for a Japanese curry shop. The rice they use is imported from Japan, and the quality really stood out—it paired perfectly with the curry. We each spent around $25, and we ended the meal with a fried pumpkin pie, which was the perfect conclusion to a great dining experience.

Overall, I had a fantastic time and will definitely return. Oh, and by the way, the male staff members are really good-looking too and nice!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU0nIsUbouIeh1AiOPnh7tpKX-YiokPotxhB4W&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a sunny Monday of the BC Day long weekend and we decided to try some Japanese curry.  We brought our dog along so sat on the patio.  One thing of note is that the patio is considered take out and you are served with take out containers.  I would have preferred regular plates, cutlery and table service like other patios.
The curry was good.   My pork cutlet was spicy and the beef curry was regular spicy.  I could taste the difference.
The servers were nice and brought us water and our food.
The atmosphere can’t be beat.  The sun was out.  The patio had one umbrella and gave us enough shade.
Overall it was a very good experience.
I would definitely recommend coming here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN49QI48twGrUiqh1LjhAcvZ4PYAQrOe6BqZz84&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed lunch with the curry tendon on rice and also the chicken cutlet on rice also. Staff was friendly and had a very nice atmosphere. Pleasant Japanese music was playing in the background. Each table had a small traditional dish of pickled daikon. Yummy. Street side parking just outside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkbxEn2jnXAV6pKZvo2EWwJcShBTPDAS3iVl1t&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Duy Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVz1tslmAQwYz1qTXDoD6uDzJRzvSbywSCZD9ZMaBJCTs-0-DMD9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We managed to beat the crowd for once 😆 The food was very good. I found the pork a little fatty, but was very flavorful nonetheless.

The curry sauce was excellent. Very light & balanced. Would definitely come back here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzr_t2pIXMwFk_hGRQGsKlS3ctqWDfP2qCMS7g&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Skyluv M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeMhjqz2fJaC95WJ1pz2QIuKmoxBalutljcSRhi8q1Bfe_rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We finally came to this Japanese curry restaurant at Steveston. The moment I stepped inside, it felt like I went to Japan ! The atmosphere was authentic and cozy. The waiters were friendly. The menu had a variety of curry items to choose from. My children and I loved the pork cutlet curry the most, it was juicy and flavorful. The chicken cutlet curry was crispy. The curry beef udon had a hint of sweetness to it, we just want to have more and more. The red pickle were so crunchy and fresh, it was the highlight ! The portion was generous. We loved the dishes so much not abit left on our plates. To end the meal we had matcha ice cream, was it ever creamy ! My child said it was one of the best meal she had in a restaurant! I can't wait for Lee's donut to open and we would definitely come back to this restaurant again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfLJzzQBB9pke6k3VOCWJKtdVz8ZzWHQdoK9du&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little place and Japanese curry is always yummy! I liked the curry rice, and both chicken and pork chop were tasty.

The curry ramen is tasty as well, but a little too heavy so we got stuffed pretty quickly. Would definitely recommend the rice over the ramen.

Decor is nice too, but may want to reserve a table if you have a party of more than four people as they may not be able to easily accommodate you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqHjxwmjA1eHLPVBh7hFIRxtSXQF378Ul-PLyU&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic curry place! The pork cutlet is so crispy and juicy! The curry is slightly on the sweet side. The curry compliments the rice sooo much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCrKotjSryi8L0nhSmXbpNhlgvgUylHv3M2Efl&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love the way the price starts. Basically you pay what you want to have. (In this way, not only can save money but reduce food waste 🥹) If it’s a small size plain curry only, it’s $10.50; the price goes up when you size up your plate or add on more items to it.
Food is overall amazing! You can simply take out the plain curry and add more ingredients at home ;)
The only thing is that our clothes got super smelly and my eyes were quite sore after our dinner there 🥲 guess it’s the exhaust from the kitchen and since the place is relatively small?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8HyIIH45e2HKf1J-lV993BM1Um3wAthfJNlCU&fid=0x0:0x8e8c17f4274afd66"],"When":"2024-7-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍳 Perfect Family Brunch Spot at Breakfast Table Steveston! 🍳

🌞 Finally got to try the Breakfast Table—this time at their Steveston location after visiting Fisherman’s Wharf. The cozy, welcoming vibe was perfect for a family brunch. With a lovely rustic-chic decor and bright natural lighting, it’s an Instagram-worthy spot. The kids loved it and are already asking when we can go back!

🥞 The food was fantastic! We enjoyed both savory and sweet options, all beautifully presented on charming rustic plates. The portions were generous, and everything was packed with flavor. The staff was super friendly, and the restaurant was very accommodating for families.

🍴 Located right in Steveston Village, it’s a perfect spot to fuel up before exploring. The relaxed atmosphere and attention to detail make it a wonderful place to start the day.

⭐️ Breakfast Table Steveston is a must-visit for anyone in the area. Whether you’re a local or just visiting, it’s a delightful spot for brunch with family or friends. We’ll definitely be returning for another round soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9npqzVPmN3LB2nuejkj3XjcrFRpBmgLRa7Vsi&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"T Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMSEwMA3m2f2pUNvDSD01evNvY5ImU08gKtdPmCpcdgJy2LmVY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably one of the best brunch places I’ve been to in a long time. Every single staff member is so kind and respectful. Even when walking by them to go to the washroom, they’ll step aside and let you by with a big smile on their face. It’s so rare these days to see this kind of service.

The food was so good too. Can’t say enough good things. Only wished they had a kids menu but the sides were pretty good so we made it work. 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpZSncihfvJnA5hnV4Da9BX-zv8xoq4fbkQAVe&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Tyra Baltram","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvzE7mZZZY3BoRgyYVAmckgE999jzZibrXNp_9UUb3Q9Lw6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Breakfast Table is a cute little brunch spot in Steveston, close to the pier. When we arrived, there wasn't a long wait for our group of four to be seated. The service was amazing! Our server was so friendly and quick too.

Everyone ordered drinks; I picked a Steveston Sunrise and it was absolutely delicious. Very sweet and a perfect pairing for brunch. I also got a Hipster Benedict because I wanted to try their house made bacon, with fries instead of breakfast potatoes.

Overall, I was not too impressed with their Benedict. The eggs were poached well, but I didn't get a lot of flavor in them. The bacon was also only just okay, which was a shame, I was expecting to be impressed! However, the fries were amazing. They had tons of flavour and seasoning and every bite was delicious. I was so pleased with the taste and couldn't get enough!

Ultimately, I should've picked their current special, a steak and egg sandwich, but I know for next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO85-3rM7kvTOpSQ7k7wtEmXF_Hl01NkshDBuRG&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Shirley Lew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_zh2rXt6NRpS7hUVsiSyPxmUiDc5QqHYAiVjYQIeJIj5ygA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Steveston for breakfast on a Saturday and found a gem. The staff was so kind and friendly. She was very knowledgeable of the menu and made great recommendations. The avocado toast with smoked salmon and poached egg tasted so fresh and light. We also had the chicken and waffle with Brussels sprouts was also amazing. Try to get there early.. and enjoy the serenity before Stevenson touristy hour!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3Pf_vrBjrOCO5eM9rdiSCHduhCQxpSuMUn8fN&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little restaurant in Steveston village. It has a little twist on the standard breakfast with a Korean fusion infusion. All of the standard meal that you would expect wth a very nice surprise twist. Staff is very accommodating and friendly. Parking is on the street right out front.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZuC5WWMcXtjM1KYRYV5cRn3C9WRS2rUeAKwP0&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Agnes G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKArPrkBFRutixEQunjb2zrjlckEKRTU-61HutgiIMCw-CpUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Still quite busy on a rainy day, but surprisingly quick service, lovely staff. Eggs benedict exceptional, potatoes freshly cooked, hot and crispy on the sides. Will come back to try their Asian-fusion menu items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMenQ4vlxVhvdewoAafDh-ASRbecC4dQjS8V68&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Mikayla O`Leary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD3JRgziQcE-_PzCbOfMc6pc3d2Y7aMwDmw4DAe0Cf43RBim8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brunch here was delicious! My partner got an omelette, with some of the best sautéed vegetables EVER, and I got the Challah French Toast (half) and Gluten Free Vanilla Waffle. Both were DELICIOUS! I am not GF, but the waffle tasted no different than a regular one! The salted caramel latte was also amazing! The staff were amazingly friendly! Very clean and modern vibes, would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJNUx3-X8Ukru2xosdDqoXyN1AB-bgNyawU_Me&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Doug W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhy5zidbGw7YT76n8e23XBKnwnPzmd2NsZebIoBJ1bZgTIBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Spotlessly clean, friendly and courteous staff, good but not great food.  Recently had a late breakfast (a vegetarian omelette) and very much enjoyed the meal.  The service was top notch, however the food was merely ok, bordering on good.  Their menu is a little bougie, but it’s that kind of place.  I also found their prices to be somewhat higher than the average for this type of place.  They did however appear to have very high quality ingredients.  The coffee was excellent, and they were fairly quick with refills.  4/5 is a bit generous for the food, their service however earned an honest 5/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3iSvyHkDzm3dh79dE6iAxtI71K9F_bnjQwjll&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-10-30"}]

title: Pizza Factory Steveston (Steveston Village)
descriptions: Order-at-the-counter chain serving lots of specialty pies & other Italian basics.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"VVitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqMxih1XfAF_WQrph5bnMipJY4xoPnVDzNiNojijwKwtpO4zCG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Pizza so good I could cry😭 Really really delicious and well made! Generous amount of toppings and everything is so fresh. The vegan cheese/veggie options are great and plenty. Omg the veggie Hawaiian is killer! Excellent crust as well. Also the service is friendly and kind. Thank you for making the best pizza in the city!🍕","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Min Bae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPZXydxFZUyhXAWI6pnhpGV1NQDzoYYSBLPZazpHHNYh4QMhqM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a pleasure to finally find a great pizza place in Richmond!

We got Shahi paneer and butter chicken pizzas. What really sets Pizza Factory apart from all the other places that offer similar take on pizza is the sauce. While the crust is good and the toppings are fresh and generous, it's the curry sauce that really elevates their pizzas. It's savoury and spicy without overpowering the dish.

Can't wait to try again with Punjabi style & bottom-up options!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would definitely recommend this store to all of my friends if they’re craving for pizzas and want to have something different! They got lots of vegetarian options btw
The pizzas we ordered were amazing 😳 It’s not too salty or greasy but rich in texture and flavour. The tomato sauce might be light when you start a slice, but at the end you will have a tasty crunchy crust (they put more sauce here so it’s not dry!)
We simply enjoyed every single bite, I would say that’s one of the best pizza I’ve had 🥹 Plus, the owner was very friendly too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsFY4JGnzeKW9VXIXN84n3cIQCBYT7d6LX8N79&fid=0x0:0xc57d59f80edc13a9"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Niharika Niharika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPA_NXwZ4dQ9xgmFLfXkbymTw9ovRVQN7GN9r3M5T19XSucQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this place and the pizza was absolutely delicious! The crust was perfectly crispy, the sauce flavorful, and the toppings fresh and generously portioned. Every bite was a delight, and the service was prompt and friendly. If you're a pizza lover, this place is a must-try","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristian Gustafson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8vuwAlQAQwxBBjM8q1u5eEdJXVy8MpvcLyqILo411QrRpDFCqKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the opportunity to get a few free slices from the Pizza Factory on their annual free-pizza day. What a treat! We loved everything, the p8zza was delicious. Especially, the Butter Chicken Pizza was a revelation...so delicious. We went back and bought a few more slices, and my sister bought meat samosas, which were epic. Prices for the food we bought were very reasonable.

I can't wrote this without praising the family that own and run this shop. They are *so lovely*. It seemed the entire extended family were out around the town handing out flyers, and were hanging around the shop chatting to everyone. You felt really welcome. The one gentleman, perhaps the owner, helped my elderly mother go in to get a slice, helping her walk into the shop and then to sit again after.

Consider me a fan.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"No Name","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLySAeSIprxOJL81beDQ_G9ZtqTWKkP1Gaq9IP88t2KzwE6JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Now this is the best pizza in Richmond! Arrived hot! Was what i ordered! Full of flavour! Dough was light and fluffy, not dense! Cheese was browned! Even the samosa were good and not dry!

Definitely the place to go for pizza in Richmond!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJcT6X_rFaRCeEyL1LbgJV2DsGNEawwe_qWfhT&fid=0x0:0xc57d59f80edc13a9"],"When":"2022-8-1"},{"Name":"Tina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAKiC5J1ql1LsLTTfBwgvAj6sVGUusHXghumDKVG9ZTQ8QjcD_1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Full disclosure: I’m lactose intolerant and I still had some slices from my partner’s order.

Smelled SO good and the bread was divine.

Had the Butter Chicken and Taxi two large pizza combo. Called to order ahead, quoted 20 minutes, drove to Steveston just in time for pick up.

They have two tables for outside dining since it’s COVID.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfRNjlFAxYZ61Vyz5zwns5ud-tiY2ELN7qsoqu&fid=0x0:0xc57d59f80edc13a9"],"When":"2021-3-7"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For only $2.00, you can get a slice of pizza and be able to choose from several flavours they have on hand too. Pretty good pizza for the price, and they have extra cheese and hot pepper toppings if you want. Makes for a nice, fast, affordable, to go snack while you explore Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0ct8MeFwsOVu5rrejF7p758q31MzecqMzbCU4&fid=0x0:0xc57d59f80edc13a9"],"When":"2021-3-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"sarbjeet saib","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISBO96PsiFEk0GTrXPgkpxsdh2rI0h4HFak3ssNBYm_JVjkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have order today 2 regular sandwiches today at about 6:30pm, I ask the order taker 2 time please add honey mustard sauce no bacon. Came home to enjoy my dinner and find no honey mustard sauce added and my sub is burnt, I call restaurant and told them the lady in restaurant who took my order told me honey mustard is not part of sandwich also she said I can give you sauce but can’t make me new sandwich. I been many years customer but this year every time there is problem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1o29sNlRQV-pmuDlYgQwAxCjwQAB_l0DNcdoW&fid=0x0:0xbd8593896c6b0fa5"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Dat1 Beats","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzHF6s7PyEmm87FLtJN3bbEYcKBqowp1kS8L8e7tWGpKsc6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today I purchased a mosquite chicken sandwich and was asked if I wanted bacon and onions so I said yes. The sandwich was made with the smallest specs not pieces that could not even be seen and there were no onions. When I called to complain, she argued back that there was bacon and onions to which I sent a picture. She circled the tiny specs of bacon and sent me the picture back. I have never had such bad customer experience. The specs of bacon resembled the size of black pepper and absolutely no onions. They are quick to over charge for a sandwich and not even give you what you ask for. Customers be aware! I will never buy from them again because they rip you off and then lie about it. I am so disappointed in the customer service and no resolution. The quality of sandwich has really gone down and be prepared to be ripped off by them cheaping out on toppings.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hardeep singh Mehroke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9V9q2H5d-fRo-RecRPfCZX6m7oAn1vFA-4vxKnC4JwJ9maQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Broccoli soup is too salty, and veggie guacamole sandwich was okay,

The lady who took my order, was coughing alot, of course she did not cough on the food, but I think when you're coughing alot, just wait and let someone else prepare rhe food, there was one more lady in the kitchen

There's much better options in the same plaza","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqV_w5JA0euVK9G4E3WA2uV_T7dFQ9im4yZQo2hNvSCVOc8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to Quiznos Steveston Hwy and I was told they charge 65 cents per vegetable except for lettuce and tomatoes. I asked if I would get charged 65 cents for one pickle and she said yes.
There is no signage indicating this and I asked if it was all Quiznos and she replied “yes”
Something is weird here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMN2LOVCFBYvxUIc3E0i6z6_EG37jVTMKlxRT9cHc0JiTvG-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have come to this location a few times this year because I was in the area and it’s always bad. The woman, who I assume to be the manager, is always rude and condescending. She gives you attitude if you ask for more napkins, after she gives you one napkin for an entire sandwich. She doesnt wash her hands after playing on her phone and taking payment and goes right back into making sandwiches. She seems to hate her job and hate her customers. Never going there again and I would discourage anyone from going.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caitlyn L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJf0mGBlYXwNEdZRdk3nrJ5icjZprVPjrdCH_ON53ItJYShRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have visited this Quiznos at least a dozen times just in the last 2 years, so I think this review has a fair amount of data behind it. What I've discovered is it really depends on the worker you get and the time of day you go.  Sometimes, you have the best sub ever - it's toasty, sauced appropriately, ingredients are fresh and generous. Other times, it's dry as the desert and ingredients essentially missing. Oh, also. Occasionally it's 730 pm, you're rearing to get a sub and they're already closed... which is really unfortunate.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John S. Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2Ep7ch7V2UQQStkfKRCyZc0k9VeqhcTlPhj83vVQx0-nqsPqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried out the new seafood sandwich. Was okay, a bit salty but lobster and crab bits were quite big. Would give a better review but workers did not seem very nice, shouldn't you tell the customer what goes on the sandwich before putting the ingredients on? Or asking if they want anything on it? Also workers seemed too busy speaking amongst themselves in their own language, not really acknowledging the customers needs. Besides that overall sandwich was a good seafood sandwich and worth a try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Antonio B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKag2vxZrqcH3D8EZLoaAI5-V6Yw7ffmCBWGV-xmQAY15yC4ohRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Deal of the day is one of the best values in the fast food game, low-key. Sesame bread is always nice and toasty but not burnt. The peppers on the side is what I never knew I needed with my sub sandwich. Workers are pretty chill and have a generally positive mood despite working the fast food grind. Probably my favourite fast food subway chain.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm surprised this place has so many poor reviews. I chose the any 3 items with rice or noodles. They did charge $1 extra for the flat noodles but it was worth it. For my 3 items I chose honey garlic chicken, spicy chicken and prawns. Flavor wise the spicy chicken and prawns (a bit spicy) were quite good. The honey garlic chicken was a bit bland. It was enough food to share. I paid just under $20 but with increased prices everywhere these days that's not too bad. There was one server who seemed more friendlier than the lady at the cashier. Overall, I would return because of the decent portion size and because 3/4 items I had were good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN6inifI4opPg0m4mHYZvUX-hODx6OeS6YB1IO&fid=0x0:0x75515129455bbd16"],"When":"2023-8-6"},{"Name":"Rachel M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJgdf4PO15zZDqxTkfXugsJ_4Ld6gVvsEEdKfAB2MMW5bRgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food was not hot. Barely warm. My friend found a hair in his food. I brought it back to show them and get a refund. They grabbed the hair and pulled it out and said something to each other and laughed. I got the refund for my friend and just threw mine away without asking for a refund. I’d give 0 stars if I could. Don’t waste your money here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rocky constant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWszrstfNu5K6Xj-WLZqVyyZPrK-Lb_17AjfYlder_AeIBKxyoLZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food wasn't bad tbh.
Even construction workers prefer it here.
Meaning it's fulfilling 😌.
The price was good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAKUBESEn2URQMIv6fdKt7VYDOCG8FTynFWQDR&fid=0x0:0x75515129455bbd16"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"John Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnMisfdHb6NkwCCEQCRFloOnee8J5V_tdds72Wu0KcQWaPlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited 20 minutes for wonton soup which was worst quality. Wouldnt refund me when i wanted to leave. Worst service and food. Go someplace else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTulsl797VPoMUESgy-y4U6sjYQSN5nKkltQN7&fid=0x0:0x75515129455bbd16"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Zedroid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYrx9DOlmgMb5dlBWJnh1OOrScTmiAmi75V_va49hOShZ6Ynvb8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Noodle was great but sesame chicken and milk tea too sweet.  Also the other chicken was hard to chew but i forgot the name i asked for a little lemon sauce.  $17 for big drink was a good price","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM9lkge7v9eSuTukyiwEPFbQGhJy-NbdtRFnBs&fid=0x0:0x75515129455bbd16"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Maria Diaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1t44A7rGMZH0c-5ImbaYO4bIIixv5k6W4hgkzwgO2FS8MH1zV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place honestly is a hit or a miss. Food can come out delicious, a little raw or way to greasy and dry.  But worst of all is the service last time I went there the girl who served me gave me sass.
I ask her I wanted a 3 sides meal. She ended up forgetting and gave me a 2 sides instead. I nicely reminded her it was a 3 sides. She straight up told me in the meanest way possible "OK, well people forget!" I don't know if she was having a bad day or hate her job but I that's no way on treating a paying customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a combo with 3 items and noodles. It wasn't clear that the rice noodle base was $1 more until after I made my selection, but I was able to switch it before they began scooping the rice noodles. It would've been courteous if they indicated that when I asked about the base options. I had asked what would be included in the combo, and the staff had indicated that the rice noodles, chow mein and fried rice were included.

Therefore, I ended up having the regular chow mein with beef and daikon, honey garlic chicken and eggplant. The portion size was good and was enough for lunch and dinner. I thought the chicken was cooked through well and the daikon had a good flavour. While the food and service were not outstanding, I didn't find many issues with the taste, as I would expect at a food court stall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6KmlnLq5Zf9OV82ao1ksIEqM7qSB-w6fOoBz7&fid=0x0:0x75515129455bbd16"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Chris D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7Dc2jPUDj8t_K2r2dJ3ZHoTP5DErnUes3nsN0CnjSZuiU2yCa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered chicken here and it was COLD. On top of that the fried rice was bland. At the very least please make sure that your food heaters are on and operating. Chicken should not be left out at room temp for more than 2 hours. It is a safety hazard, this is stated in BC’s Public Health.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Matthew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0gEutCkVy85lNE5yJs-pQ4pTE7pdX1KFJfbub7hOq1zsEkMc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you May! You were an awesome server as you were kind and efficient with our food! Even in the busiest moments you were able to rush over and serve us immediately as well as interact with us. I also really enjoyed using the secret codes for extra goodies! 😂 Coming all the way from California and waiting a few hours it was totally worth the wait! The food was also tasty! I definitely recommend the Tomato Soup Base! I had an amazing experience at the restaurant and I will definitely be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS_lMRXtqFHvNLdqOD7CVxVFdtEKHRIsmCemvR&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for birthday celebration and it was a great experience!

You get very good service, where the staff comes to help you fill water, remove excess leftovers from the pot, and more. Of course there are the performers too (face changing and noodle acrobatics).

The food was good too, very fresh. You can get endless sides, which the kids enjoyed. A tip is that you can save a bit on the soup base if you order half of one flavour, and then choose water for the other. They'll refill the soup so you don't miss out.

As a member, which is free, you get $30 off. And you can check online for "quotes" to say to the server, and you can get a free toy for the kids, deep fried bun, or other choices (only 1 tho)!

It can get busy, so definitely recommend you to make reservation. There are quite a bit of parking on the street level lot and parkade, but the spots are pretty narrow.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGxl2aiSaRZcj3qZ8Rk7eaFL9TeZvyyC1S90lu&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Megan Louisse Minierva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfAfQxuFsj4khIEi5kDmUTeRyn5-wY2CuJNm3drV-Yk_r4jkT87Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kay was our waitress and she was absolutely amazing!! It was our first time and she explained everything clearly and made sure to check in with us frequently. She also gave us so much gifts! Snacks and free broth and a toy! My friend and I felt like we were in disneyland! The food was fresh and the flavors were on point! We even got the noodle dance thanks to Kay!! Thank you for such an amazing service and food! Top marks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2nSHuYpmNGGpuycIDkiibLpWhihTA9sT-PhM_&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Kai Ge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiaX2UUUnpC8JQmQ-qdkmPV0njxr3XWjzsI9QbhLR3GbAkHhJY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hotpot, tasty. Enjoy the night since we goth the best service here. All the stuffs are so nice and I need to say that May helped us a lot with her  smile when she knew we are now visiting and living in a hotel room. She offered some fruit and snacks to us as the goodbye gift and also gave some recommendations about our next plan. Thanks for all of the best experience here.😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWLSdlH-35lFOx_ACLDvWFqyXttA7NvDEr1vqf&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Wendy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2nm6z9B3nK1bYVTwrF9ELmaxBDr4raC-RcToavUHEzjeSBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the most interesting hotpot places I've been to! They give you an apron to wear to keep your clothes clean and offer performances to keep you entertained. The shelves at the tables provide a smart option to hold more dishes in a small space, and they offer wet napkins at the end of your meal to clean up with.

The menu isn't the biggest I've seen but offers a variety of choices for all. Ordering the hand-pulled noodles will give you a table side performance of a piece of noodle being twirled and stretched before being dropped into your soup. Most of the items were good except for the beef tongue, which was on the tougher side.

I really enjoyed the mask changing performance. It was very well executed so you couldn't see how it was done and exciting to watch up close.

Service was good. They unload your dishes from the robot to your table and even offered to peel our shrimps for us. They also check in periodically to make sure you're getting all of your food.

The biggest drawback was the price. I've never been to a hotpot restaurant that charged you for the dipping sauces and the cost for the dishes was a bit on the higher end.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPRaZc1e70WAHMfreU6fldM7dzr_TGLbHOKjyR&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Rae Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXludIfvxP0lSashqAP6J43sWBimKhhDxCMUWR6u1Oxcwk0m3TvVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing experience at Haidilao Richmond! The staff service was absolutely perfect – attentive, friendly, and made us feel really welcome. The food was also great and reasonably priced, with a good variety of fresh ingredients for the hot pot. We had so much fun watching the noodle show, which was a unique and entertaining touch.

Overall, it was a fantastic dining experience, and I’ll definitely be coming back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz3qCIGT37zzgvAY4lqotKvt32__0V--BDlG3j&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Michael Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuGN27E9kJAwTBX4dUmXIrcLK8dm39fbRd80c6ccKz2xK4V1Df=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best hotpot place so far. The service is great, they provide aprons as well as even hair ties. Also they can cover your cloths so they don’t smell.

You pay for the broth but the quality is well worth it. Ordered the pork broth and the bones include marrow and are very flavorful.

Quality of meat is fantastic. They have robots bringing the order, but servers will put if on your table. Our server speaks perfect English and Chinese. Skip the carp.

Top hotpot place in Vancouver thus far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_wY8DgZESbr4R4wCC0Xrpstka2OUOiHlmiax7&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Camila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5mUug49GCiiW4DcAB5vc0QOLQBYUriUb09Wjx1Hf5Iwn4xWW8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very very good service. The food is great as always. Normally I always call the Pork Bone Broth but today I tried TomYum and it’s soo good. The staffs gave us some different sauce to eat with different dishes. It’s nice that we can try their recommendations instead of just grabbing random sauces ourselves. They even gave me this cute little chair as I was watching youtube while eating. Service here at Hadilao Richmond is 10/10 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHkGZ6774O8DgxWRmShxaOuMdLZcfniGVNTy7R&fid=0x0:0xf740f260acdcd6e5"],"When":"2024-12-3"}]
