user_reviews:
[{"Name":"rocky constant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWszrstfNu5K6Xj-WLZqVyyZPrK-Lb_17AjfYlder_AeIBKxyoLZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My order was great and deliciously prepared!

The gravy was sweet, spicy and satisfying.

The service was clean as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJC44BWABeJBtPNM03MJHyCSoX7fyYjUNZ--vd&fid=0x0:0xc2bac4b797d97768"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Gerald Chan REALTOR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCpREkwnUh4wXrr2y8N_IOxuhnSi4Z3pXpRG_xB3VWEQMeH8Ho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had their Chicken Biryani today. I like curry as a whole and on each of my visits I’ve really enjoyed the food.
The Biryani took about 5-min to prepare and worth the wait.
The curry was mild - the way I like it.  A little on the salty side but that’s my personal preference. 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX-fOPqiEanHbq-iT--mwwlDDlQj0ItMcWUdB4&fid=0x0:0xc2bac4b797d97768"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Yhanvi Holm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOX9mWR-gVPTAvi166fAqwPqSDP-S97mrXtOhAPmI5w76RqwQT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I walked up and there was a young girl barely 20 years old. I waited for 30 seconds for her to recognize i was there. She made eye contact said hi and then went back to writing on a peice of paper.  30 more seconds go by and she again looks at me but still doesn't come to get my order.  Finally I walk over and id like to order. She lolligags over after putting away her paper.  And i place my order.  She had to go to the back to get enough naan for my order.

She bring out 4 peices of fresh Naan and proceeds to give me the old naan instead of the fresh stuff.

I ordered 2 naan and 1 butter chicken and it came to $17.

Naan was $5 each.  For half a peice of Stale bread...  you gotta be kidding me.

The chicken was gross. Clearly not chicken brest with disgusting flabby skin peices and joins and cartilage in it.  The sauce had no flavor.

Ill never go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTZD2AdOhDk_GkI-IyLp_wQ-CwMtfOQQAgKVS3&fid=0x0:0xc2bac4b797d97768"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"neeetin sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNNNs-c7jYEZnihuUJI3RuiAgyNOV5_r5t4WLcVFBdSxg0fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst experience with curry express. I buy samosa from them they gave me overcooked and it's evennot  fresh it's smell so bad 😞. After eating and I vomit 🤮","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRi5IJY9w-meEhkZ9K72PwVH5veHtMOJHecBD5&fid=0x0:0xc2bac4b797d97768"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Raj Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFMVcljCAQEcc-MHCYlVXnx8VJdK_x-h1zAQTrstMGBtd7DA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Hi there, today I came here for the very first time. The overall experience was not good at all. We ordered pav bhajii and samosa chat. The pav bhajii was good but the samosa chat was cold. I decided to return it and ask them if i can get the pav bhajii instead they refuse to do so. They were like you want warm curd on that. Oh come on i am from india to and i know much more about snacks. For sure i had the worst chaat in my life. The worst customer service i ever had. If you guys want to run the store change the staff please. I am also working as supervisor in a restaurant this is not the customer service a person deserves. We spent 28$ for the cold food. Thankyou for ruin our day!!!!! Never come here👎","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2VC5iz3EU1ZXhwd0_mjOJBTcZCGaGYtfl-lML&fid=0x0:0xc2bac4b797d97768"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Manpreet Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWnuhCRQkii7GBxM-LNfPkRH9F_OSbNcpuxM9p243-l6vzHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very bad experience we ordered pav bhaji and samosa chat pav bhaji was fine but samosa chat was worst. It was totally cold and when we told them about the girl showed us attitude that it comes with sauces that are cold but how samosa can be cold from inside even if they have sauces on it and she said no one complained about this disgusting","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0_h8VCWAgGEjfSFzHd3Vw_DkSkAMODCDzRezt&fid=0x0:0xc2bac4b797d97768"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Isabel Arsenault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSBOUMQve9fGPx-RRPvwzYRpVYUDPAU1kJTzTMygFMLGfehpRt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great Naan bread. Food rather bland, not authentic. Butter chicken made with brown meat, mixed veggies very lightly seasoned.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5aGdWaLqnOl-w8fwAJ1QaGXKPA7JBiYYX60gX&fid=0x0:0xc2bac4b797d97768"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Neri Matrixx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEAsQwNwiH4aesUxpapeB6lMqfjR6zx9Ff1axtQeydaL4OQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I always go to CF Richmond Center but never tried Express Curry food. Today I got lunch there and it will be the LAST time they get my money. First of the server was horrible, she packed in a LOT of gravy and little meat. When I pointed it out to her to add meat, she added a ONE small piece and pointed to the menu price. I bought the large lunch with 2 meat options, the taste was BELOW the standard I'm used to from other Indian restaurants. WORST Indian food I've had in 4 years.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Pepe's
address: 49 Great Horton Rd, Bradford BD7 1AZ, United Kingdom

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Barbara Cooke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUbtTch2bPxLV4yocY7Pvlgktkf_xC7UpHV86x4fzs6BpYWK4mQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I walked past this place at least twice every day and never stopped. This time, I decided to stop here for the first time, and I must say that I was pleasantly surprised.

There were not many people around, so I got served very quickly, which was good cause I was in a hurry.  We had the grilled chicken with wings and fries. I found the chicken to be very tender and well seasoned. The fries were hot and soft 😋, just right.  Overall, I liked it, but maybe that's because I generally like salty food.  The seasoning was extremely salty but nice 👌.

The environment was clean, spacious, and well organised. Parking is an issue. It is right in front of the university, so there is none.  You will need to park somewhere else and walk. That's what I did.

Not bad, check it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG24qWfKDk0PUIcf7lIADa9N-tH6PE8M-95s1O&fid=0x0:0x9aa82c94d805f19c"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Omair Mahmood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLe2HhFMUlofcNqdYLa1KMChYZroPeF4XznABsDW4W2CtGAcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered food last night and was hugely disappointed.  First of all the delivery came in an hour and fifteen minutes.  The food was obviously cold.   The worst part is I was sent the wrong food.   They advertise a chicken burger as a fillet burger and then you recieve the frozen non fillet burger which was tossed into the bag without a box and NO CHEESE !  For which I paid for !!
The food had no taste and I ended up leaving most of it.  Won't be ordering anything from there again........","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL6jv6PfLFsZU_kseDJUYjYAO6psQZ4GqvTV7H&fid=0x0:0x9aa82c94d805f19c"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Georgina Okakoso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURBfb1fO3Qek3KVDSjV73SxdeGx-2EE4T8b0abXSWf5nqezQJhBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Located just opposite the University campus amongst other fast food spots. The service was okay and the food came out promptly after placing our orders. I ordered the rice but couldn’t eat more than half of it including the chicken as I felt an off taste which might really just be my personal preference. But in all good experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY6r_MxpFcvcZBLSIPj-9hSiP9TMnM3F93XHcY&fid=0x0:0x9aa82c94d805f19c"],"When":"2022-11-2"},{"Name":"Mohammed Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7TT1s6vKG6kETcPTohkdtLhm7Hn_TSP9fB6GhR1a2Sfs83A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm a regular and have noticed the portion size of the chicken in the chick and nice meal had reduced dramatically. I hardly got any chicken in my chicken and nice meal very disappointed if I wanted just rice on it's own I would have ordered it you cant call it chicken and rice with a couple measly bits of chicken.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu7MQCNg7OZY_oNRZpiLdUDS4remrIUOgyST8Ar-8E8krIVRtX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As someone who has Celiac when mentioned to the staff the first time I ordered from there they just handed me a piece of paper with common allergens on. The Paneer and rice and Paneer and nachos do not contain any wheat so I ordered the paneer and rice however, when placing the order the staff failed to mention that the sauce flavours had wheat and barley in them too so when I had a flare up and checked the website I realised it was the sauce/marinade flavourings.

Food itself was nice I ordered the mango and lime flavour paneer and rice I just wish next time staff are a bit more aware of allergens and let customers know instead of handing them a piece of paper.

If I come here again probably just going to order without the marinade as it is hard to find halal gluten free food in Bradford","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdLtK8WQPYoKU_QFrZfFqlW01_Xv_hLiuPPfJL&fid=0x0:0x9aa82c94d805f19c"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"CHLOE HAIGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgHOls2e3HlFMnzk5aKB5RGdkN37u-BPKB1bXh35VeWmrMyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"ordered chips they came cold, overcooked and tasted bitter, then upon eating them i found hair in the food, so i called in to complain and got told by a member of staff impersonating a manager that it would be sorted out next time, and then rudely i was hung up on. disappointing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt-ZkbnyIhmVZekVapBqmUu7Pv9qG5iL6oJO9b&fid=0x0:0x9aa82c94d805f19c"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Daniyaal Raja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBJsSabO8_sArRLuqrCNm2WIHXr8t1vMIJQdaj1ojQZEMuRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came with friends to Pepe's and was pleasantly surprised by the menu selection and atmosphere. Lovely presentation and decent prices. Service was excellent. Will definitely come more often!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Farah Hussain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX53WmZZ19JD2H7xf728MWDJrohTp79kLHhW2QkJwOxiWbuz-l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never ever order from them online, their delivery is ridiculous and they constantly lie that its on its way. Food and quality is downhill. Do not recommend","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mina Meola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_A2vOKfLfd24HRTou-8xfEkk22v7O4iWwyBGz4GRMoLjqykLUGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service very slow considering only 2 others waiting. Chips were already bagged and cold.Our burgers were fine. Our food was bagged even though we had said we were eating in. The lady next to us had also been given cold chips and burgers .Not much care and attention given.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Charles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgdR6y4jBKjt8zIfyOn-aWcKwgMv0CIsdcVVgCy0IZ-6Q1_8hP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Having never eaten at any fast food outlet before - I sought help from a young lady on the counter .
With the images on the screens and the size of the portions - I felt a little child-like
Excitement.
My hopes were dashed when I got back to my room after receiving my order.

Bun was dry and powdery , burger patty was Cold and lacked any taste that screens alluded .
Onions rings were Cold , Processed mush and lacked crunch , freshness and mouth watering experience you get from real onion rings .

The loaded fries were Stone Cold, squashed and appeared to have been cooked hours earlier , and left somewhere keeping warm .
The cheese sauce seemed artificial
( made from powdered reconstituted sauce mix ), bacon bits also leaning on the overly processed from ( lacking any resemblance of crispy bacon ).

Overall a throughly disappointing first fast food experience.

Staff were friendly and helpful when helping me chose the meals I ordered , but don’t let your eyes and appetite be drawn in by these large screens depicting plump, overly-full , generous portions - it’s all a ploy to part you with your money for substandard “food”.

Truck stops are unfortunately a captured market - so plan a head .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO10_oXZav0XI3moGrT8eBIE2CbFLJ8P4lq78OY&fid=0x0:0x94b6960a9d85a96b"],"When":"2022-12-23"},{"Name":"John Loxley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeduqDLL4Uwf8cGBCLDvofs27kyyhIJ2JesT6iPLnlXsZlqwcV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My other half was feeling peckish.. it was already 10 o’clock at night. She suddenly decided she wanted a Burger King. So if we went to our nearest one which is at Scotch Corner. Absolutely spot on. Had to check myself to some as well. Well, you would wouldn’t you! Brilliant service and only a few people there as it was quite late… thank you very much guys 👍👍😉😉 🍔 🍔🍔","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Dixon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtKnh_GsMp44PlaBrfzP5wo229Icj0EFs0bppqTsujW0vqJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped off here for breakfast and were pleasantly surprised at the variety available. The food was very good & served piping hot & fairly quickly too. The order was spot on and the drinks were very good too. Burger King breakfasts have come on a long way!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny Hocking","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIovG5_h96gcFrI_xed5n0tdZP-0RWs_E-FfXP3pWtp_XGODg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service was very slow, and despite the restraunt being fairly quiet the lady behind the counter somehow managed to get our order wrong 3 times, and didnt once apologise for our inconvenience.

The food was cold and very overpriced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7cEv4W1kdvCraRRaOMu2eNMouRVj2EokMz-ZSf0cdPlkeRmLT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good food.

No order at kiosk and pay cash at till option like kfc are doing now.

Per £13 meal - you are allowed 1x sachet of ketchup. So mean it's ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRo37Sh-2Ejy8HRGbsy65I-Mc5erZuFUlBQWz1bVsCn4metnM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time I’ve had breakfast in Burger King. Served by the lovely Lynsay and Olivia. Very bubbly. Food was gorgeous, coffee perfect. Thank you both!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgV574ixcyEL1CHZxktPIkzIGoe2XRa_Osep7O&fid=0x0:0x94b6960a9d85a96b"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"Darren Barrett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR8MEzcFuIkJD4kPoXFN_T0vUFMdRtnz-XAGasIuvcKabKAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very quick service. Stopped on our way to Scotland and large queues for food but service via automated screens and cook time meant waiting time was under 10 minutes which was great. A breakdown on the drinks machine meant soft drinks were bottles which was completely acceptable and welcomed as even with the high customer numbers the drinks were cold so very good service.
Restaurant was clean and tidy and social distancing was present.
Covid precautions were sanitising stations available and face mask wearing were 90% adhered to by customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQY3bqSiqo41CLPCJA_-uFro2BxyEGH8kav66Q&fid=0x0:0x94b6960a9d85a96b"],"When":"2021-12-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louise Gregory","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiZIpUlDeq4Xdu4T16BkHzpYCa5_y_KA3upNhfs8dxZ639D2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited here purely because it was the only McDonald’s that had every part of our order available!!!

I always use the app to order as it’s a great way to avoid queues, plus you get points which transfer into free food which is a great bonus.  On this occasion, all our local-ish restaurants had something missing from our requested order so we decided to have a little drive out to Catterick. Upon arrival it was clear to see it was  busy, however we found a table and requested food delivery to that table.

Food arrived quite quickly considering how busy it was but it was just the food; no straws, no napkins; no sauces. Wasn’t a problem as I just went and got some from the self service area, but did think it was a little bit lax as you do expect these items delivered with your food, even when busy.

8yr old had standard 6 nugget medium meal with vanilla shake plus a Maltese McFlurry. I had a medium mccrispy deluxe with vanilla milkshake and a cream egg McFlurry.

Mccrispy was packed with salad, was very nice, apart from all the salad making it a bit lopsided. In addition, the sauce was only on one half of it meaning that the other half was a bit dry. Maybe nitpicking but just being honest.

Parking: lots as part of a shopping complex area.
Toilets: Clean and smelt nice.

Was a short drive from the A1 so a nice little stop off if you’re on a long journey and don’t want to stop at a motorway service station.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpvBJB7SXVu_kY2UDGAmELc7uF8UJ0rP34nfYM&fid=0x0:0x2f0bf41550a3bfa8"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"David Dickson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIHa5zw40dQ2J1knWcY9A5Rf6BeoUMoBNpddSKje_8EecKdhaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a large hot chocolate drink, and a medium coffee arrived. I took it back to the till and they replaced it with a large hot chocolate. I negotiated to keep the coffee, rather than them wasting it, sat down and tried that hot chocolate...it was 3/4 full, and regrettably diluted. I added 6 sugar sachets,  and drank it regrettably,  and the coffee is terrible, a word that sums up my visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Wilkinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0ll5jnFSTEfwXInoTUWpMyMAX-5cn1G2X3QYD-XKk4RGsfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Where to start . Wrong drink when told they didn’t have any frappes so gave us orange instead without asking. Cold fries and hard the burger was just thrown in the boxes on big Mac only had one burger in the bun and the gherkins on the side very disappointed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pamela Shipton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKe13TfUi-PwZi5FUGnBTJQ7j3wIgOi7Y-Q0q19-7SGvFXqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My one treat a week and you totally buggered it up.
Just look at the bill that I’ve added.
Got Big Mac with pickle
Got quarter pounder with all the sauce onions and pickles and got 9 nuggets instead of 9 selects. No dips even though paid for
Shocking service it took a hour to get here and I understand Your busy but shit service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmmXYpSnbGb-pQXIHCkQjxdl0HKtZYD5g_H8QE&fid=0x0:0x2f0bf41550a3bfa8"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"jason Wojcicki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ4PJy-ctlQBoPgkNlGxOV06t-62FSPltUqG1ZZWvuqLsHkjAV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been a few times, messed up orders, things missing ect....
Recently used drive threw between 1am and 2am no one there.
Really long wait ?? No one there ! Eventually got food and it was stone cold !!!  Had the MC crispy and it was just thrown together !!!
As a chef I know I expect more... But this is just not on at all... I actually have a video of a big Mac being opened somewhere which I will upload to social media... It's literally drowning in lettuce and it's all thrown in the box !
McDonald's is supposed to be constant threw out there restaurants so wherever you go it's the same.... This place needs sorting out !!! Those chips were stale cold !!!! Old !!!! Bunch of idiots!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sabi Ali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI93pChWD0c92maZOGjlCKByFgTbFz1VHGQUiXSRdwfvzWHkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible experience. Was told to wait in the bay for food but they never turned up. Had to go around the drive through multiple times. Never returning here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPnzA8QAeLvSEPq1J0Jf1q1m0lOJTtwYbty9M7Uj3bV_QWSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Once again order nearly £50 of food and order was wrong we keep getting cheese sticks instead of 5 chicken strips that was ordered. Chips stone cold (2.7mile to delivery)Then get out on hold for 10 mins so far as they don’t want the complaint as we get, we don’t deal with that just phone customer service's and they will help you!!!!!!!!!!. It’s the worst McDonalds in N. Yorks.the staff don’t care at all the lad still has me on hold 12 mins now …………………. Stay clear of this place it’s a joke","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Derek O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1BlTHnJXHKpG23AkVKZDH2U6X8oDSTG6MCSu_ugINy55kvDwBSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went in for the breakfast special offer. Sausage and Egg McMuffin + Coffee for £2.79.
Seemed to be a good deal, but it was smaller than usual, appeared thrown together and squashed and even the coffee seemed weaker than usual...
I should have known .. 'you get what you pay for'...","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeffrey Dignum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBcy9wgOwUkphKaqP4bahnJB4Lyue2aCceXAC-n2AHGbEzZkBt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m not usually leaving a review but this person has beyond my expectation! Kudos to Glen who took our orders! My son’s keep changing their orders when ordering in the store. he managed to work with us professionally and patiently to settle our orders. Even his manager or supervisor asked him more tasks to do while taking orders. Thank you for an Awesome Customer Service Glen","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc5lf0g3EwLuBVOa5u2KhV2PVeFUsX8ky8A6bp&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Daniel Coronado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7Wok1Lbp5ZwkPDltYCf4EbML5IK2dF9W9g4ARthOrTXxgOkax-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped in while in Vancouver to get some of our "Official" Canadian stops out of the way! We were pleasantly surprised by the coffee, food options and of course the different types of donuts available to us! Not to mention the cost, two large coffees and two donuts for about $9 Canadian which was about $7 something US, I believe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPxsVUOxabwkbTerKff7q8yGC56PORGDnB-TMs&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Amelia Glover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPzbKvPKixw2fn2bhrmZMSrYCMzRxDkdSWGi9Jb05c5s-R=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a very busy Saturday especially since it’s almost lunchtime, but the staff are doing their best to serve everyone. The little lady preparing our food was very friendly when she asked if she could replace our sandwich, as they had run out of biscuits. She worked very fast despite the hectic atmosphere! Kudos to this store for providing great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diana Ortiz (Nana)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd7UoDX_Ek-Akz7kCAus8GC8vLoXqsxTHIG36bj2PGLMQa60O6Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast service, good customer service, delicious cold drinks (we didn't try hot ones).

The donuts are delicious and we tried the garlic ones with fine herbs, which were delicious.

A good option to share and chat with friends, family even by himself","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY_r_yjItmSI31XHP73boy_SJOeHy-5bNu2fJz&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"O B S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5-acwaSzcuibtCxkLzYSF1VQcKmzy0DgJzLAVRn0lDfG5uHfFOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I controlled myself before in giving a bad review about this location but it happened again for the 3rd time.
I usually order online for pick up so when I get to the store my order is ready or close to being ready. The first 2 instances my order has been ready but no one called my name or my order number. We kept on waiting for my name to be called but nobody did which made me decide to come to the mobile pick up. There I found my order , coffee getting cold and no one bothered asking me even if I was already standing by the Mobile Pick up. I will be forgiving if it was crazy busy but it wasn't and staff were just chit chatting. Today, went straight to mobile pick up because I'm not sure if the staff will call me. Waited patiently and saw my order being prepared. (The counter order which i think I was about 5min ahead since I placed my mobile order was served ahead of me) I was standing there waiting for the staff up call or ask me but my order was just placed down and was left beside the machine. So I need to ask if that order is for me which was definitely mine. Had I not asked even if I'm standing there for the next 30min or an hour nobody will bother asking if I'm waiting for my order etc. So different with RC which I think is way busier that this location. Bridgeport","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXE2Ll9j7SH2Pv2LKZOOu1a9vVzagDBBZrAzHXMr1Z03rXNhk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my favourite Tim’s I love how they offer drive-through pick up and in-store pick up. It’s great if you have a car or just walking to the bus stop. they always have everything in stocked only during the nighttime they have less baked goods which is totally understandable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was near my house I used to live so I’m always glad to come back and have a quick lunch.
Employees are always friendly and fast with orders and I like new stuff on menu like Cilantro crispy chicken bowl 👌🏼
All recommendations for this Tim Hortons restaurant…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlxYkYCfw87UmHAHrlVu3UUDC_7e3eBAs6lJjs&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Reg Belyea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLXkwhPLhl6PTOpWtztQvj60Mca6EyvG5NHU0tbTkXJ6YbgXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped for a coffee and breakfast sandwich, as usual the meal was excellent quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP49MLlu4z0AjVG8WS6bvfGxWjkf_8lOkoro4n2&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-8-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joanne Julia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm_tXiOF_L1HYwmfioWTODaQDMOM4FYl_6EM6B5LJU8NK_mDCK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can I say about Timmy‘s? It’s a great place. I love going there. I love the coffee there atmosphere they have good choices of food. Great donuts to die for and really good tasting coffee, steep tea and hot chocolate.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sunny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9fyAKm7pFni1MIgaaYssJ4Y49Mqp9AnfHXff2ge3FLPxnk4WY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Missed Tim Hortons so much! The staff is very friendly. And of course, the coffee, donuts and bagels are amazing 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtlH4CexMas0vSBWl6GFRAfcmuXclChhNIZpzF&fid=0x0:0xb9974c1195cc5010"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Jason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu-aRF10e9Dcl6PcvyE1SSiwi_0uOZJ13HX4ywADoFPUAyzzs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not happy with how this Tim's operates. I've been coming to this Tim's for a while and most of the time, I have to wait a long time to order anything. The managers here don't seem to understand that it's particularly busy this time of year. They shouldn't be having one person taking and filling orders when there's 20 plus people in the lineup. It's bloody ridiculous having to wait almost 25 minutes just to order one thing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This review is for Sheeba, the 4'9 Indian female supervisor.

I called to check that they have the Timmies Timbits pool floatie. Spoke to Sheeba, the supervisor. She had no idea what I was talking about. She kept asking me how many flavor Timbits I wanted, even when I emphasized that it was a pool floatie and a Tim Hortons merchandise. I asked to speak to someone else who would know, but she insisted she was the "only one here" when I knew it wouldn't be the case.

I told her I had seen it on the shelf, above the coffees. She tried to tell me that "it must be there still if you called to check 8 hrs ago and it was still here". I requested she check as I had only seen 1 when I saw it yesterday, and it could be gone by the time I get there 9 hours later. I was also driving from Vancouver to Richmond, and I explained that I didn't want to drive all the way there only to return empty-handed.

She promised she would put one aside for me in the office and even asked for my name "so I can pick it up anytime". When I got there to pick it up, not only did she NOT put one aside for me, there was literally just the 1 with a dented box. I was so disappointed since I had called several Tim Hortons that didn't carry it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsX4p_Scfw0dnL8dPrwf1uOYXVKYRVVUkIlIl2&fid=0x0:0xb9974c1195cc5010"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Yashwinder tungal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-mW4khkKySXGfLrhXDOK_LLBvy-RCpWsuuSL39zsNO3AjfuQC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Two girls ( Naaz & other ) simply deny to warm my food and they don’t know how to treat the customers.
Instead of service they focus on talking with each other.
Baddest service i had today from Tim Hortons locations.

Request to management to communicate with them and train them how to do jobs in food industry","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juan Velasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUIxcI_7xSrQjRQCJLWV31nhCAJ9HvOJF_qNkUFjpw6nlnJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's hard to mess up Tim Hortons.  Really.  This one was very conveniently located (two blocks away from my hotel, lots of parking).  No drive thru through.  My food was fine, it was a donut and coffee so easy to make.  It was odd to see that there were like a dozen and a half people in line to order with a person, and no people to order form the kiosks, so I ordered from the kiosk and the food came out very quickly.  A+ service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deep Taggar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT1_qCqtQFsW3fScB67Ym5eyohlA3AJaqmqgHN3Q28zagMLWFb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went to grab coffee this morning and placed a mobile order. We waited 15 minutes and asked one of their rudest girls if our order is ready and the way she answered us, she should be fired right away. She yelled at us for no reason and ruined our whole day. I would suggest her to leave the job if she can’t even speak nicely to their customers. She has zero customer service skills and an abundance of bad attitude. If you work in customer service environment, you should learn how to keep your tongue under control. I would never suggest this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jagdish kaur Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITbgtxTMg1F6OS8WaXxCPImr-aXMJKU-qEcNyoMDWDDALQUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst service I can ever get is here specially from Punjabi girls working here. They think they are real canadians and behave like they hate us. Have some senses girls and please be nice to customers and give correct orders. Complained to manager still the service is worst.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"yo bussey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnQ4m-pzIcvWLV1sVUTvPyF6IYHHm2JV6WgTKUlkG4kGg8oPiR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was here on opening day. Amazed by the number of people hungry for another food option at YVR. Service was extremely quick. They were still learning the ropes but doing well for a first shift. The burger I had was not the best choice however. Next time I’ll try something different.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuB9jhNdcTrzX2GdWEcyQRX1Wa9YqdUnkcuq30&fid=0x0:0xaf37d1d91a4c2491"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Alex Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLG3Wbpib8iMKbEWPUXtZU-Z1m8IFDQ3HWn777Bg6t_O97FQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was fine, but I didn't appreciate the tip options on the machines when you're paying by credit card. Tip options, which were all over 15%, are predatory against international travelers as they would think they need to tip when they don't. I tried pressing on the screen to change the tip option, but then realized that you had to use the physical buttons on the machine as it was not a touch screen. It took me a while to figure it out and the cashier didn't help me when I was struggling. I told the person beside me how to change the tip options using the physical buttons as he was having trouble changing it also.

This is not a sit down restaurant where wait staff provides you service. It is a fast food restaurant and it is self-serve. Tip options on the machines should be removed. You seriously can't expect 15% to 20% tip for grabbing fast food. White Spot is a sit down restaurant. Triple-O's is not.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jassie Uppal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaOZeeh0FMUqVLb5x0JDXdMiqtmCQuL-9Wo007nGL_SdIeqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered veg burger, asked about mustard in sauce. Cashier was unsure and asked supervisor and she said "I don't think so" thrice. Totally Unacceptable. As someone with a severe mustard allergy, I was shocked that my health concerns weren't taken seriously. The lack of clear information and dismissive attitude.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEHNwpkS9dn9BAKON5J7LRGOKNGg7TBHo7PaFG&fid=0x0:0xaf37d1d91a4c2491"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"McGriffin Correos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLvislWQz1gH7Vy0wsX-jG9r0eZoLxanRu-u0jyRBZbS--y6b7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by Triple O’s while waiting for my flight and their burger was huge. Didnt get anything else but it was worth it. Highly think it’s over priced even for a big burger but it is expected in an airport.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO71HLPh338_CRRDt6eR-MzXbDvXLKNzIbMoy48&fid=0x0:0xaf37d1d91a4c2491"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Alessa Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnoJhBSkjNvMJDW88qrHQrszHTgvFsfGPD_8IqjTwfIEyS05Ju=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located in Domestic Terminal B, Gate B14.

Surprisingly great for airport food. We enjoyed the original burgers with cheese and garlic parmesan fries. I was shocked that the burger actually looked like the picture on the menu! 🍔🍟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-VTGnVhdVQP9qPvLzsmRll2ZIvarPytczgUQX&fid=0x0:0xaf37d1d91a4c2491"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Banafsheh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuB-r8UbMYsZjVV-oh2NjlweF99efnDg5x04VVEtofE6JjYv9d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For airport food, not bad🤷🏻‍♀️I liked the taste but still think they’re tiny!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUOc2ymjCZ1fg_EM3TcJ66NbhXZ_h3ryWnM1kq&fid=0x0:0xaf37d1d91a4c2491"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Desirae James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQTvEgyBgfkayhFDkJb09muBHMo1Wi8Gor5mmYqm_LBk9kXnUt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Poor costumer service. Long wait times and found a long hair in my burger.. no discount when I brought this to the staffs attention.. very over priced paid $20 for only small fries and one small burger. Horrible experience. I only ate it cause there was very few options in the air port.. shame.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kashish Madaan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI62nkg-lcdkuUaUJD1FGO9n9C0qX23N0kqj0k1veDszTfHOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was here catching a flight on 12th Sept evening.
Usually I am someone who barely eats burgers but wanted to try one eventually. Muskan was my server and i got hot spicy chicken burger and she was very welcoming and suggested me some good options
Also i observed that there was someone in black shirt and white turban working there who was extremely attractive. Wanted to compliment him about his style and physique but couldn’t as he went somewhere.
Overall great experience !","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Padius Paidion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrfscLzEXXQZ6N3v42jPS8zQpXMUb-NIFOPJ4hkJUi4mCDNr_m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chips good. Batter good. Garlic sauce good. Curry sauce good. You can put your own salt and vinegar on. The haddock could of been nicer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLLLVIci_29mu8GoZRXzuzaS65kefSuN4Ws6qL\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6cae5f8f25c07b5"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Luke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG4WqGzX_Qkser66cLoajHfu3rJtx77f3f4G7jqpBwA2FR0cPt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Yeah, not the best experience unfortunately, didn’t really expect a sarcastic response when asked how big the fish was. The fella who served us was rude and we felt like we were interrupting his afternoon by being there.\n\nTouching almost 30 quid for two portions of fish and chips I expected a lot more (one regular and one small). The food tasted like what you’d expect at Wetherspoons, bland and boring. Avoid this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb3gM7ci78EtsSx86xbrWo_wafHXDcaTn7E_Ci\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6cae5f8f25c07b5"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"T Vickers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJiaA3AojiZCzzoqDfw_XJSpB3A_hFxqUmq70Yoh_izFcRcSEc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Have had fish and chips from Barker's a couple of times passing through Richmond. Had small fish and chips which comes with a sauce if your choice. Fish was cooked fresh to order, no issues with the wait for it to be cooked. The fish was of quite good quality and the chips were cooked just how they should be! For small fish and chips with sauce and a drink it's approx £8.50, a bit on the high side for small portion. Would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG2CaFevvW4v7-8nGZOq3Rz2JM88dInf-8tDAE\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6cae5f8f25c07b5"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Ian Burns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzmMvLYU9y5yKr_5HnQb7LcVvFhQMkXCZUSrNWSnTQUXauZOhD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered fish and chips and the fish was excellent.i couldn't fault it at all.nice crispy batter and flakey fish and it was a good size but the chips were a massive letdown.plenty of them and they looked good but they must have been the greaseist chips I've ever had.honestly I had to bin them and I don't like throwing away foid.for me inedible..shame as the fish was so good and the price was ok.well it was untill I tasted the chips.doubt I'd return here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrsNR6P_nlAoEUIX76Kn2Rs7jcdAfLGa6FDeqy\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6cae5f8f25c07b5"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"David Fryatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqPolCHLAV8MiFnzUwWbcKvEVvi7UCNlQDzbt6ZSFP0FrFbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fish and chips, very generous portions. Phoned in an order, ready promptly and friendly service. Also compared to the prices we pay 'down South' very reasonable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reinhold Behringer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVx2Eu6nNQJVqLs3Lh7Q6hE4LPnl4S0JwTKGqHouqC1LBcNirE29A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A miserable weather outside, rain pouring down. Walking from the castle, I smelled some nice fried food. Saw the place and went in. Ordered \"Standard\" fish and chips for 8.50, the fish was a Haddock. I got the box, then saw the tables, so I sat down. Tasted great! Nice thickly cut chips, and a thick piece of fish, juicy and crusty outside. Delicious! Will come here again, when in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs-J2PRfpBlKx9laqurV2JCSRxXrVycsPDnWLy\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6cae5f8f25c07b5"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"Nicole Snailham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf-GHIlMO290pVvsfoipiw044uPUUxvR1pmRP1f93ExYkulv2ScA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fish and chips and peas were lush, we had a pot of tea as well. The service was a bit lacking, the man who served us was a bit rude, it wasn't very busy when we went which was good. We sat inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdN6YIPvNN6h8JF_T7-wyk7O2CHDwGroiJdftV\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6cae5f8f25c07b5"],"When":"2024-4-5"},{"Name":"laura young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2weJ_8NXyhh7c6IDYK2uDN9Zk_Pm41NJmyUs3vSgYnKBOIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just spent a week in Richmond and came here twice. One of the  children didn't like fish  but staff were happy to change it for the meal offer. Young girl at lunchtime was very helpful and friendly as was the older lady. Food is amazing and price is affordable.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Texas Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVciTzFeEqYuAOfoSkmWyMeXMf4QdcpHXUOxHfuaeMzI840AZ6kEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so happy to see a Japadog cart on our way to get our rental car! Ordered the #5, and it was delicious! Service was quick and came with chips. They accept credit cards. Try it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0yDfi-0Gc9Sjz99rAcpQp0R4GApMCxRofRP5b\u0026fid=0x0:0xad572b8d29ded9f7"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Lucas Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWjXAP-4dJ5bbSqE8yqulU_KtsBvlnixyK7_3hM18AQUXDxjU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Japadog certainly hit the spot after a long flight into YVR. The food was nothing like we had eaten previously and was truly a unique experience. The hotdog I ordered contained a relatively normal suasage on a soft japanese bread bun. It was topped with cool and crunchy radishes with a slightly sweet sauce on top. This combination created a variety of contrasts that really rounded out the flavor of the entire dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPTL4y1kE5LtV7Tx5qcNQVOP32q9-rO-UL3mTI\u0026fid=0x0:0xad572b8d29ded9f7"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Doris Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaUWlMndxdoVOanRCF6ns-cojd45I3c7ko9v34sqGJziEXLzfMvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall the hotdogs were yummy, didn't have a lot of options and the soup shelf was pretty much empty- only 3 containers of the same type. This is at 10am.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Reaume","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvAM7SKD59dMPsPixesiJN1LoC95KNO7sFwh6iWNHQBcpToRDNBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just arrived in Vancouver after two weeks in Tokyo. I was eager to continue practicing my Japanese so I ordered a hot dog combo. It was pretty tasty! ありがとう！","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edie Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlm2LOSk1Q1TY3ht-TB-YyafYn6mXegO7wxahxWRaZ0KZeu84=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There was many vegetarian options, and the food was super yummy- especially after a flight","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZjy7XzbXNKS-Gchsg7Nem4xoHIsOugoBF3zg5usHWpT4n8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A rip off","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edgar Algario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUyO1wrN93MDbIr4-8EpjTgB2MzNzFa7aTvZapkveOyyD0t1e97w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh surprisingly good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Acer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXQ03oVRviREP5QPsqid98tY7-Vz_YVJffSYkgE8dhjuel9dKrUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Awe","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Megh Raz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ4q-z4LFs37HL-LH9u0JenlekZ4kvp37NW_mrc_ElfMJTIDnP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love the chicken at Jollibee! Their spicy chicken is perfectly crispy and flavorful. They served my favorite drink, pineapple juice, which complemented the meal perfectly. The sauce they provide is awesome and adds an extra kick to the already delicious chicken. The view is also fantastic you can see Mount Pleasant and downtown from the restaurant. The service was fast and friendly, making the overall experience delightful. I highly recommend Jollibee to anyone craving tasty, well cooked chicken and refreshing drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0Bm6dPsRhLGc7diP3oHrHMOodQN-0_orYaj2M&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried Jolibee in Vancouver for the first time. The Broadway branch have a lot of seating area inside and few outside.
The staff were nice and the service was quick.
I ordered the 2 pcs chicken with mashed potato side. I had one regular and one spicy.
The first thing I noticed, the chicken pieces was quite small.
The chicken was crunchy as expected for a deep fried chicken. It was also moist, but I find it lacking in flavor. The regular one is a bit bland, the spicy one is better. I can taste some heat but also lacking in flavor.
I did not like the mashed potato, jt was smooth n it same problem as the chicken, it was bland.
The gravy taste good :)
Overall, it was ok but I prefer Popeyes chicken. It was good to try though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_t9-z1Zwn7OkabffD9kHuTLn-fTv9Ve2R3px0&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I normally don't give bad reviews, but there were several shortcomings. I ordered a 2 burger combo with a Jolli spaghetti upgrade. The burger steak was cold at about 24C which surprised me because burgers are terrible with cold fat. It was promptly replaced but I discovered the problem, the gravy was cold and it was cooling the burgers. Luckily the replacement burger steaks were hot enough to warm the gravy. Considering the premium  prices for the quantity served, I expected better. The Pancit palabok skimped on the toppings and egg.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRZfOn5uT508N7RS0chrT11kRGkJPaheQDM6Kq&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Autumn_Kiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1zcZdU411-b8f5Fcx7HImynMifJ7qg-_yzjSJzTLgmhJaggW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For a fried chicken placé it’s ok.  The best item for me was obviously the chicken.  I did like the flavour profile.  The other dishes not so much.  However all my Filipino friends love the other dishes.   It reminds them of home.  For me it’s just the chicken.  But I do recommend them for that.  It’s just that there are so many fried chicken options in this city.  I know I know. I’ll get roasted for not giving Jollibee higher praise.  Sorry chaps","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1OybNa9qb7AoP4dCdNDO06TMZ3-H7RlXHfBU4&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Jyn San Miguel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUOliweXs_wImUTvRSH64GMR_26U6jitTvJkokXQXsS9NcE1JA-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent experience at Jollibee, thanks to Lance! He was incredibly friendly and efficient, making sure my order was accurate and served promptly. His cheerful attitude added a personal touch to the fast-food experience. Keep up the great work, Lance!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFwkTVuFjy5cO8LldhqnHkApFNAfXiMGgsH4a_&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Ronald Gonzales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu_qMBYRQzMxPvC1VqPxURH-6i0LZqoUY9DdNjVP7URT75_JU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to place when I’m craving for that juicy-licious and crispy-licious Jollibee Chicken joy. The staff are warm and friendly, the food that I ordered is warm, fresh and delicious. We ordered the Spicy Chicken sandwich with fries and pineapple juice and a Ube Dessert Pie. As well as my nostalgic childhood favorite Jolly Spaghetti with it’s sweet savoury flavour and the irrestible Spicy Chicken sandwich which has the perfect blend of flavour and kick enhanced by the soft fluffy bun, the crisp tender chicken breast and the jalopeno peppers surrounded by the signature spicy mayo. It’s like heaven in your taste buds. The Ube Pie much like its O.G. sibling Peach Mango Pie lives up to the hype with its crunchy flaky outside crust and soft warm and taro like sweetness in the middle. What can I say about the pineapple juice, it’s like summer in a cup. Cool & refreshing. I’ve gone here on my lunch break with family, friends & co-workers. Being centrally located between Cambie & Broadway. Close to Sky Train, City Hall & VGH. Jollibee truly feels like home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPSG9StuC0X4F3qUvJgEuMqBtNu798HGgd1KwN&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Asimov C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlK1Ddp9SlXQAmYnBYRUpOnRwspEIip3hgYKsyK1tYRO5fPmaC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"First time trying it and it was disappointing. I ordered through DoorDash. It felt overhyped, like Popeyes. While the skin was crisp, it seemed like the oil was old—fresh oil usually results in a lighter color. The herb taste of the skin wasn’t to my liking, though others might enjoy it. The mashed potatoes tasted like powdered ones, the gravy was nothing special, and the fries were super greasy and soft (probably due to delivery). I’m glad I satisfied my curiosity, but I won’t be ordering again. I prefer Church’s (when they used fresh oil) and Shawn’s Chicken in Richmond (which uses fresh, not frozen, chicken). Overall, $50 of disappointment.

I gave 5 stars for service and atmosphere because I used delivery but the food itself only 2 stars. I did felt like puking after having the mash potatoes and discarded all the left over. It was disgusting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsmphE6RBxFo6u6MQHsA-6X2sqq7zSn86cfZo5&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Emily Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEvwebxzOOvHfn2UnHwr4i_lsQ_4WBBcdmwEUmGOtZoyfwO9Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Since they’re known for their fried chicken, I thought their chicken sandwich would be nice too. Boy, was I disappointed. It was dry and lacked any sauce/veggies in between the buns. It was literally just a piece of fried chicken and a small dollop of mayonnaise sandwiched between some bread.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTd72_kwJr5t4wVNSAoMXATqlHGsEbxiQjHI1r&fid=0x0:0x1b70cbce4dc1e91d"],"When":"2024-3-8"}]

title: Xi’an Famous Food Chinese Crispy Burger
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle Danyluk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuJ3TA3vHpNylvGZHk1ulXsnvrZNgLnBl4LVcwrre95g5CxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I lived in Richmond, I'd be here non- stop.  From what I've studied about the region,  this food was authentic and did not let me down.  It far exceeded my expectations and what's even better is the family who runs it.  English menus are made easily available and the family is friendly and able to suggest their favourite dishes.  I was given a very ample sized dessert sample which is made fresh daily from rice,  red beans and dates.   Not too sweet.  Just perfect and very fresh.  The crispy bun was indeed crispy on the outside but light in weight and filled with succulent pork with just the right amount of flavor and a couple drips of oil for good measure.  It had me checking the bag it came in to make sure no pieces were left behind.  Best of all where the glorious hand made noodles which I'll be thinking of for days to come.  Perfect texture with just the right amount of chew.   As full as I became,  I didn't want to finish my dish as I was in my happy place the entire time.  I can't recommend this place enough.  Fresh,  authentic and friendly.   Both my tummy and my soul are nourished.   I am so happy I found this gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNODwBqLUYuGQH2bpjsPMwvM1enKTppszQvuXzl&fid=0x0:0x527571836e43536b"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Y S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfDs1_umU2t0UKD4qwnDxA_I3J5pgYwzZYZWB98tXVXevngPfHRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious and most authentic Xi’an food I have had in Canada- speaking as someone from Xi’an. Family owned, lovely and kind owners.

Ordered cumin beef burger, crispy burger, cold noodle with sesame sauce, biang biang noodle with beef. Every bite was heavenly. The noodles are hand made to order. They also have a traditional dessert Jing Gao (steamed sticky rice) which is amazing. All these items are must tries!

Definitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOvHxySvEyPpW8ZEtJn4agN2-wMiu0Xl60ZkjV&fid=0x0:0x527571836e43536b"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"W V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ0HOcew-m8gvR5ZIjO1rC79zMVU7gmV4g1NnnhWWW4H4QXE-W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is located at the entrance of the president’s plaza. We came here on a long weekend and I was craving for a Chinese burger. The bread was crispy and the meat inside was soooo juicy and flavourful. I also got to try the cold rice noodles, thanks to the owner. Easily the best I’ve ever had! The sauce and the texture of the rice noodles hit all spots. I will come back for more for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQuF4N-Zi4JFTEEf4SIxbj1rrHYa-1wfQRFmzu&fid=0x0:0x527571836e43536b"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Justin Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfeYet6Yset78toNpAWVdZhvDbKY_RoLeIZtvATRdrWvGid73C=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had their cumin beef burger. The bun is pretty crispy. The meat inside is juicy and flavorful. I love cumin so the flavor is a plus to me. [{"Name":"Gordon Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYpk0cIhtHUvM7XXheJSxz2s3kSGL8HqlDSxLxb-fzNnM7pgBx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is really good and has a ton of variety. I got the Portuguese style chicken rice and chicken burger. The chicken is really tender and juicy. It’s open 24/7 which is awesome and there are a lot of customers even late at night. Cash only. Added more photos from other visits","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaOLpmiAF-B_pd3qCJdN_Vc7jVhJJNSNbEy8Ee&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Judy Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV97FGp6pvH2GB0Sbbd5vzH4RVaCgHQ1POlgKRZoLObEp2Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Despite the many reviews we read online, we received great service during both of our visits. The food was not bad, but nothing special. It’s a feasible option for late-night food, but there are better options available at other times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8HdzaLXeOsOLAnXjpR0j3CuwRcgIKv4vRocT5&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Rongting Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoUuPmBkCCZ4u--x14TLCOW3fVhRv0PFZZ3T-BSlj2I0mcMQMi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Chinese Cantonese foods, i ordered one of my favourite congee, fried dark Soy sauce noodles, and spicy sour soup. Everything was perfect, served very quickly as soon as we sit down. Highly recommended if you are looking for a very good Chinese foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-QNN5sgZCyEBtAXjKzHqVypbj3UBIxvUqJHKM&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"No.9 restaurant

5300 No. 3 Road, #812, Richmond, BC V6X 2X9

I opted for a late-night meal at this location, primarily due to its 24/7 operating hours.

Food:

Pepper Salt Fried Squid:

A standout dish and one I highly recommend. The squid arrived hot, with a crisp exterior and well-balanced seasoning. The flavors were satisfying and memorable. 9/10

Century Egg and Shredded Salty Pork Congee:

Among the extensive congee offerings, I chose this variety. The congee was creamy and well-seasoned, with a generous amount of ingredients packed into a small bowl. The portion size was ideal for a light bite without being overly filling. 8/10

Ambiance:

The seating was reasonably comfortable, though unremarkable. While the establishment was clean, there was an unpleasant odor lingering in the vicinity, which detracted from the overall experience. The source of the smell was unclear, but it did impact the ambiance. 5/10

Service:

The service was adequate, meeting expectations but offering nothing exceptional. It aligned with what one might anticipate from an establishment of this nature. 5/10

Pricing:

The pricing structure is mixed. While the congee was reasonably priced, the main dishes were slightly on the higher side. However, portion sizes were fair given the cost.

Drink:

Iced Almond Milk:

The drink menu offers a wide selection, but I opted for the iced almond milk. It was refreshing and enjoyable. 7/10

Verdict:

I would consider returning, primarily due to the convenience of the 24/7 hours and the availability of parking. The extensive menu also offers plenty of options for future visits.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEAxgKL2ND_kC2C_5m-XPcz3DtgA6v78XdvQpe&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Polina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiyqoycI0Ysocr-kj8621bO4G6RrqpNlPOKg7m9EOi6JsVvyPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. The servers are really nice and helped us decide what to get, the food is delicious and the portions are great. Their menu has literally everything and me and my family had an excellent time. Will definitely be coming back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6mGlRNpe-QsP3spTlVgAG9YperBj7pfJ36Fyc&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"J. Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc0thC-iDujIZ9E4Ya3FGjxAiajh4VoiSbuoyhVWO45E221fab=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good soup I had on rainy days. Pork hock noodle soup for only $12.00 plus tax medium size bowl. Lots of meat, I'm actually surprised by the amount of meat in a bowl, I thought they're gonna be cheap on meat, 🍖 like the other restaurants. 😆 Really good soup 🍲😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhibfYdFlslJwpl1VP0EKszfasv6bpyTePHplo&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"wing ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWatT9GFgKWeeaf2n2D4FcwN8eiVO8Fg_BArCj_SSEvm2dZlNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a worst food that I had never eaten before. The beef looked liked rubber band which is so difficult to chew with my mouth. I think it was a fresh beef and cooked on daily, but I don’t think so. I hope they can make it better and improve the quality of the food!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGE1gqdrC_g8b2YkzwOerUr-VinWltZ4V6pBvO&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Ruby Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3LrrVwi-mDW5WQKHXOamURBu-eEORn8gD4ZzWQ3IMFrFb_ts=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you live in Vancouver, you must have heard of No.9 Restaurant, which is a famous and iconic Hong Kong cafe opening 24/7 in Richmond. We arrived Vancouver at 3am and drove straight to No.9 to satisfy our late night HK food cravings.

Their menu is a thick chunky booklet and I was impressed by the insane variety of food they serve. No wonder it has been a neighborhood favorite for over two decades.

I don’t really eat at late night, so I only had half of the sandwich and a few sips of the milk tea. The corned beef egg sandwich (鹹牛肉蛋治) is the best I’ve had in North America, comparable to those in Hong Kong. The bread was lightly toasted, and the scrambled egg was so fluffy and loaded with corned beef.

HK style milk tea (港式奶茶) was rich and creamy. It came with a big glass so it justified the price.

I was also craving for something hot and homey at midnight. I got the ginger steamed milk (薑汁燉雙皮奶), hoping it could recall the taste of my favorite cha chan tang (Australian Dairy Company) in HK. The texture was apparently not super silky and smooth, but good enough to cure my homesick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzA69FIc44zXCGVu6udNRKTif0KiI8-vNrjRCe&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

[{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly I was surprised by how clean this place is. Staff are friendly, food is good, ingredients look fresh. Usually wouldn’t have donair in Richmond but this place is top notch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrecYJ2d-EjDL9MgUxH1PcmzyHRYuYEJx32O16&fid=0x0:0xd947980ee3996532"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Daniel suarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDRtztYTYuEL1ka9r6icEbOFftBrxyh5j4ifu-ZyvC-iDflQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"After a long flight I was happy to order some food. They were kind enough to send me a completely frozen mango cheesecake I can't even eat. Just don't send it whoever was a schmuck enough to send it frozen. Now it's trash I just payed good money for. Don't waste your money or time with these guys. The chicken wrap I got was OK at best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katia Vazquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8jf9oF89vsNC7ZTXpteIGVkpMvBbtSAL3CPWCDphpJfeHJm8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered 24 platters for a company lunch, Dalvinder made sure we had everything on time, he was really helpful and went above and beyond. Everyone was pleased with the food as well. We would give 10 stars out of 5 for his service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John S. Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2Ep7ch7V2UQQStkfKRCyZc0k9VeqhcTlPhj83vVQx0-nqsPqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of their newer locations, I've been to a few of the others, this one is definitely the best!! Everytime i come here they are very friendly and provide happy service. I love how they have a value bowl! I'm love their lamb value bowl, perfect portion for me. Not too heavy where i am very full but it does the job everytime. I usually come here later in the evening and the best part is they open very late every night! So if you're ever hungry and want some quality good food. Come here! They also offer toasted pita bread and hummus dip for free!! That's amazing in itself! Amazing food for good price and healthier than the fast food alternatives. My go to now when i need a Donair bowl!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5wAQ8NKFoPCPv1gloLts8yP1ROyaCxZ2O5GIe&fid=0x0:0xd947980ee3996532"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome, everything is always fresh and tasty, ordering food is fast… My favourite thing from menu is chicken donair plate, comes with rice salad and fried potatoes.
My only suggestion is to put something more for dessert for example baklavas…
Plenty of parking space and I highly recommend this restaurant 👌🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-8Q95BDC0vvU5VjQPIGs8tmvnE_nryMfCnTlW&fid=0x0:0xd947980ee3996532"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Jimmy Last","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6105jxEfw5VSNB7az_JgX0XGKva6O-bR4nVPJo5fqfxQ2Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m absolutely disgusted by the blatant price gouging happening at Donair Dude. They have the nerve to charge customers 75 cents for pita bread, which is not even freshly baked. Instead, they buy pre-packaged pita from a store for a few bucks and mark it up at an absurd rate, passing it off as part of their “authentic experience.” It’s insulting to customers who expect quality and honesty, only to find they're being scammed with store-bought, stale bread.

If they can’t even bother to make fresh pita but feel fine about squeezing every possible penny from customers, it really says everything about how little they care. There are plenty of places that offer genuine food and fair prices—avoid this place if you don’t want to be ripped off!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL7r5AGCZ8XwyaRb0keGIrtuwEGMjSRpnwPWkpgstkD4DDv4E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently had dinner at Donair Dude with my friends, and unfortunately, it was one of the worst dining experiences I’ve ever had. We ordered the chicken wrap and the chicken platter, but neither lived up to expectations. The food lacked authentic chicken and meat flavor, and the pricing was ridiculously high. Every single add-on, like cheese, olives, and jalapeños, came at an extra cost. Even the wrap didn’t come with the platter—it had to be purchased separately.

The way this restaurant operates seems to reflect a sense of greed, overcharging customers for subpar food. On top of that, it’s upsetting to hear that the hardworking employees don’t even get the tips they deserve, as the owner allegedly keeps them all. I’m not connected to any of the staff, but I feel deeply for them and the Canadians being ripped off here.

Overall, I would not recommend Donair Dude to anyone. There are far better options out there that offer value for money, better food quality, and fair treatment of their employees.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7QM5WEGnXGT9Z76Vw4a0-tgChlel_fW--m76N&fid=0x0:0xd947980ee3996532"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"melody Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsdV74aFev7Q_0EGBEkVxg1JeNqmhGEQVHexXxBLWF2sae2F5u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"people are nice, food is good, will back again😃","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkDQc9R6QkXpaLZlZBEpDwBlJiMw7M05lz16WX&fid=0x0:0xd947980ee3996532"],"When":"2024-12-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sara Rostami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-0F0X5uejpgUPksS3dNe8lvbqXi3gXIV5sSqvv6JCvVyYEIfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually order special chicken and everything special pizza. They were both yummy and really worth the price. Besides the food, the staff has always been nice and friendly.
It’s the best pizza I’ve tried in the greater Vancouver. We live in downtown and usually drive 46 minutes to just get the pizza from Round Table. 😋🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPts4hknnHvrM-vK-wXBW6ywRn1cKPD8PZsaE5I&fid=0x0:0x3c6a525de86e4699"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"joe burr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoL0VpVWD0ZP8bt0Y8Pb-v0jCc9IKI-3Np1nTnrQ3GPDlBxhk3wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After over 20 yrs of going there, not going back. Ordered my usual Mon/Tues special but when I got there, they said no discount today even though it was a Tuesday.

Took advantage of customers and did not tell them in advance or at the time of ordering that after all these years, they are charging full price because it was Christmas eve day.

Multiply that by the number of customers thinking they would get the discount. Money grab! Never going back to this dishonest business.  No 2 large for price of 2 med, no pick up discount. Rip off!!

Going elsewhere from now on. Service: 6/10
Location: free parking for pick up

As an experiment, we decided to get the exact same pizzas from both Pizza Hut and Round Table Pizza to see which one was overall better.

Taste wise they were both good but Round Table Pizza definitely wins in the topping category considering they actually went to the pizza crust edge with the toppings. It’s also evenly applied throughout the pizza. It’s quite tasty. Crust though, Pizza Hut wins here. My bf disagrees though. He thinks they’re both good.

Ordered Supreme and Pepperoni Lovers from both places. Overall round table pizza wins in value (slightly cheaper by like a dollar).

Customer service is what you expect at a pizza place. Don’t expect much and it’ll be fine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXdrY9tBQR-OdNYgHikQDfZvJk0oCs5S-0Au9P&fid=0x0:0x3c6a525de86e4699"],"When":"2023-4-22"},{"Name":"Jimmy Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhkWVEjW391-3KZoIg-J2oESX35HLqOaW4ISOpBCVpA_p4lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pizza in Richmond and maybe in Vancouver.
